name: {MASTER_NAME}释放{SKILL_NAME}，进入【挑衅】状态，2回合内非范围技能只能攻击自己。

name: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{MASTER_NAME}2回合内所受伤害减少65%。
value: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {MASTER_NAME} takes 65% less DMG for 2 rounds

name: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}被【燃烧】，每回合收到{DAMAGE}伤害，持续2回合。
value: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Ignited] and receives {DAMAGE} DMG in each round, lasts 2 rounds

name: {MASTER_NAME}对{TARGET_NAME}使用了{SKILL_NAME}，造成了{DAMAGE}伤害，已处于【燃烧】状态的目标伤害加倍。
value: {MASTER_NAME} used {SKILL_NAME} on {TARGET_NAME}, caused {DAMAGE} DMG, causes double DMG to target with [Ignite] effect

name: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}被【虚弱】，2回合内攻击力降低50%。
value: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Weakened] and ATK is decreased by 50% for 2 rounds

name: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}被【致盲】，3回合内命中率降低80%。
value: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Blinded] and ACC chance is decreased by 80% for 3 rounds

name: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，3回合内{TARGET_NAME}的防御力提高60%，攻击力提高18%
value: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, in 3 rounds, {TARGET_NAME}'s DEF is increased by 60% and ATK is increased by 18%.

name: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{MASTER_NAME}进入【残影】状态，3回合内闪避概率提高30%。
value: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {MASTER_NAME} enters [Afterimage] state, increasing EVA Chance by 30% for 3 rounds.

name: {MASTER_NAME}对{TARGET_NAME}使用了{SKILL_NAME}，造成了{DAMAGE}伤害，并将伤害的10%回复给自身。
value: {MASTER_NAME} used {SKILL_NAME} on {TARGET_NAME}, caused {DAMAGE} DMG, and restored 10% of the DMG dealt.

name: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}被【封印】，2回合内不能释放技能。
value: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Sealed] and is unable to use any skills for 2 rounds.

name: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，造成{TARGET_NAME}【流血】，1回合内无法回复生命值。
value: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} [Bleed] and cannot receive any healing for 1 round.

name: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}进入【晕眩】状态，无法行动，持续2回合。
value: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Stunned] and is unable to perform actions for 2 rounds

name: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{MASTER_NAME}进入【奋起】状态，防御力提高150%，攻击力提高25%，持续3回合。
value: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {MASTER_NAME} enters [Provoked] state, increasing DEF by 150%, ATK by 25%, lasts 3 rounds

name: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}被【击破】，防御力降低60%，持续2回合。
value: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Pierced] and DEF is decreased by 60%, lasts 2 rounds

name: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}【中毒】，每回合损失3%生命，持续2回合。
value: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Poisoned] and loses 3% HP in each round, lasts 2 rounds

name: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}进入【晕眩】状态，无法行动，持续1回合。
value: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Stunned] and is unable to perform actions for 1 round

name: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}被【冻结】，无法行动，持续1回合。
value: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Frozen] and is unable to perform any actions, lasts 1 round.

name: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}被【燃烧】，每回合损失4%生命，持续2回合。
value: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Ignited] and loses {0}% HP in each round, lasts 2 rounds

name: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}被【致盲】，2回合内命中率降低60%。
value: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Blinded] and ACC chance is decreased by 60% for 2 rounds

name: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}【中毒】，每回合损失3%生命
value: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Poisoned] and loses 3% HP in  each round.

name: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{MASTER_NAME}进入【援护】状态，2回合内受到伤害降低55%，反伤增加60%。
value: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {MASTER_NAME} enters [Bolstered] state. In 2 rounds, reduce DMG taken by 55% and increase DMG Reflection by 60%

name: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，额外对{TARGET_NAME}造成了{DAMAGE}真实伤害。
value: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, deals an extra {DAMAGE} True DMG to {TARGET_NAME}

name: {TARGET_NAME}被【燃烧】，每回合受到{MASTER_NAME}攻击力100%的伤害，持续2回合。
value: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Ignited] and loses {0}% of Lilith's ATK HP in each round, lasts 2 rounds

name: 无数的怪物嘶嚎着从迷雾的阴影中涌出，鲜血，火焰，尖叫与绝望的祈祷···我们必须杀出一条血路！
value: Countless monsters poured from the mist, howling. We are surrounded by blood, fire, scream and prayer in despair... We must fight our way out!

name: 挽狂澜于既倒，扶大厦之将倾，英雄的使命就是如此，用光明之焰净化那些堕入黑暗中的人吧！
value: The fate of a hero is to save a collapsing world. Use the flame of light to purify those who became slaves to the darkness!

name: 迷雾中不时浮现出朦胧的未知阴影，像潜伏的野兽一样跟着我们，令人恐惧···
value: An obscure figure is lurking in the mist, following us like a beast following its prey. It's horrifying...

name: 迷雾中不时浮现出朦胧的未知阴影
value: An obscure figure is lurking in the mist

name: 比怪物更可怕的是人心···乱起时，一些被财货和私欲支配的人们居然化作强盗趁火打劫，他们必须受到惩罚！
value: Some people are worse than monsters... In chaotic times, some people are blinded by greed and turn themselves into bandits, taking advantage of the crisis. They must be punished!

name: 怪物们呲着獠牙，流着酸臭的口水将一群手无寸铁的妇孺逼到了角落，我们必须为了那些不能作战的人而战！
value: The monsters bared their teeth, with vile saliva coming out of their mouth. They've cornered a bunch of defenseless women and children. We must fight for those who can't!

name: 怪物蜂拥而至，首尔在哀嚎与哭泣中绝望的燃烧着···神女的庇护去哪了？我们被神女抛弃了吗？
value: The monsters surged in. Seoul is burning and the people in it is screaming and crying... Where is Angel's protection? Have we been abandoned by the Angel?

name: 怪物们在围攻神女栖所，守护结界一触即碎，神女危在旦夕···绝不能让神女受到伤害！
value: The monsters are attacking the residence of Angel. The ward of protection is on the brink of destruction and the Angel is in imminent danger... No harm shall come to the Angel!

name: 更大的威胁降临了，隐藏在迷雾中的魔影终于现身了···必须战胜它！
value: An even bigger threat is here. The shadow in the mist finally revealed itself... We must defeat it!

name: 魔影重重，兽嚎声声，日出之国陷入了漫长的黑夜中···天照女神在哪？
value: Haunted by shadows and howling beasts, the land of the rising sun is plunged into a long night... Where is Angel Amaterasu?

name: 踏进荒废已久的神社，远处传来的呼救声惊起角檐上的渡鸦，是谁在呼救？发生了什么？
value: When stepping into the abandoned shrine, a cry for help in the distance startled the raven on the eave. Who was calling for help? What happened?

name: 怪物的利爪刺向了神社巫女，怎能让她的生命之花陨落在这种地方呢？
value: The monsters' sharp claws is going to hurt the Witch in the Shrine. How could we let her die here?

name: 幽暗的长廊不知通往何方，更不幸的是我们在黑暗中迷失了方向···
value: We don't know where the gloomy hallways leads to. To make matters worse, we got lost in the darkness...

name: 黑暗仆从们驱赶着嗜血的野兽加入了战团，他们的灵魂必须用鲜血来净化！
value: The Dark Servants have joined the legion alongside bloodthirsty beasts. Only blood can purify their souls!

name: 月读的神社前有八千台阶，踏上去，将天照女神解救出来！
value: Climb the 8000 steps to the shrine of Tsukuyomi and rescue Angel Amaterasu!

name: 月读神社已成为了黑暗爪牙的巢穴，浓重的黑暗气息令人窒息，为了神女，也为了受苦的人们，我们必须前往。
value: The Shrine of Tsukuyomi has become a lair for the Darkspawns. It is shrouded in suffocating darkness. For the Angel and for the people suffering, we must go there.

name: 那时的月读喜欢在月下漫步，那时的月读喜欢在花前起舞，那时的月读会在静谧的夜里为劳作了一天的人们送去一个又一个美好而甜蜜的梦，而现在，一切都变了···
value: Back then, Tsukiyomi would stroll under the moonlight, dance before the flowers and countless weave sweet dreams for tired people in the quiet night. Now, everything has has changed...

name: 雄伟的神殿只剩下了几块残垣断壁，残破的雕像似乎在向过客诉说着当年的辉煌与美丽，而今，废墟间只剩下黑暗的爪牙横行。
value: The once majestic temple is left with a few broken walls. The ruined statue seems to be telling passersby about the past glories. But now, the ruins are filled with Darkspawns.

name: 黑暗，淹没一切的黑暗，尽头有一盏残喘的灯，我们必须穿过这条危机四伏长廊。
value: The darkness has engulfed everything. There is a dim light at the end of the crisis-ridden hallway which we have to go through.

name: 鬼影们睁着猩红的眸子咆哮着，稍有不慎便会摄去我们的灵魂，请务必小心。
value: The ghosts are staring at us with their crimson eyes, roaring. One mistake and they could take our souls. Please be careful.

name: 长廊尽头那盏灯从不曾熄灭，正如光明从来不曾被黑暗吞噬，加油，我们的勇士！
value: The light at the end of the hallway never goes out, just as the light has never been consumed by the darkness. Soldier on, warriors!

name: 毒蛇吐着猩红的须子盘旋在神殿大门之上，这扇门后会有什么在等着我们？
value: The serpent coils itself above the temple gate, poking its crimson tongue about. What is waiting for us behind this gate?

name: 众神的遗骸遍布神殿，哈迪斯痛苦的张着嘴巴，波塞冬拄着断戟死去，雅典娜，阿波罗···众神陨落，天地失色。
value: The corpses of gods scattered across the temple. Hades died in agony with his mouth open. Poseidon died holding his broken trident. Athena and Apollo were no exception... The death of gods has shocked the world.

name: 魔盒，潘多拉打开了魔盒···必须阻止她！
value: The Box! Pandora has opened the Box of Devil... We must stop her!

name: 我们一定要让光明重现人间，那怕阻止我们的是神！
value: We must return the light to the mortal world, even if the gods are in our way!

name: 浩浩乎，平沙无垠，渺不见人，风悲日曛，兽铤亡群，往往鬼哭，天阴则闻。
value: The vast plain is desolate and uninhabited. Wailing wind, dim sunlight, and the occasional stray beasts are the only things here. On cloudy days, one can often hear ghosts cry.

name: 天空诡异的飘起了飞雪，曾经的骄阳大漠变得如同鬼域般寒冷···
value: Strangely, it began to snow, and the scorched desert became as cold as the land of the ghosts...

name: 大金字塔耸立在沙海之滨，喃喃的向世人耳语着沧桑与过往——这里是神之墓地。
value: The Grand Pyramid sits on the edge of the Dune Sea, whispering the words about the past. -This is the Tomb of Gods.

name: 需要祭品才能打开通往主墓室的大门，而祭品就是黑暗爪牙的生命！
value: The gate to the main chamber requires an offering to open. The offering is the life of Darkspawn!

name: “打扰吾等安息之人，死神将张开翅膀降临到他头上！”——墓室大门上镌刻的诅咒
value: Death shall befall those who disturb our rest! -The curse written on the tomb gate

name: 墓室大门打开后，尖啸的魂灵们喷涌而出，他们是最后的守护者，他们想扼住我们的喉咙！
value: Screaming souls erupted from the tomb gate when it is opened. They are the last guardians and they are trying to grab our throats!

name: 故事大厅——记载墓室之人生平的祭祀之所，如今，在这大厅中又要上演怎样的故事呢？
value: Hall of Stories-A place of sacrifice that records the life of the tomb owner. What kind of story will unfold here today?

name: 谎言与背叛撕裂了堕落之神的伪装，太阳终将升起，而黎明的篝火将由我们点燃。
value: Lies and betrayal have stripped down the Fallen God's disguise. The sun will eventually rise and we shall light the fire of dawn.

name: 此去泉台招旧部，旌旗十万斩阎罗！
value: I shall summon my fallen comrades and form an army to take down the enemy!

name: 这片森林是活的，它呼唤着你，引诱着你，等你踏进时再将你吞噬！
value: This forest is alive. It calls you and seduces you. When you enter the forest, it will devour you!

name: 白骨累累似深冬雪原，鬼火粼粼若鬼蜮起舞，阴风阵阵如冤魂嚎哭。
value: The tons of bones are like a field of snow, the will-o'-the-wisp is like the dancing ghosts and the howling wind is like ghost crying

name: 没人不思慕美杜莎的美艳，没人敢直视美杜莎的眼睛，没人能活着从这片丘陵中走出。
value: Everyone admires the beauty of Medusa but no one dares to look Medusa in her eyes and no one has ever walked out of this hill alive.

name: 迷雾从未在这片沼泽上消散，只有缪斯的歌声能引导你走出去，或沉下去。
value: The mist has always covered this marsh. The song of Muse could get you out of here, but it could also make you drown.

name: 三生石上看来世，奈何桥头叹奈何，越过这座桥，才能到达开满鲜花的彼岸。
value: Read the next life written on the Stone of Life, count the regrets on Naihe Bridge and cross the bridge to reach the other side.

name: 矗立于血色潮汐中的血腥城堡，黑暗之神们正藏身于此，找到他们，杀死他们。
value: The Darklords are hiding in the Blood Castle within the Crimson Tides. Find them and kill them.

name: 永远不要忘记生而为人的骄傲，那怕对手是神！
value: Take pride in being a human. Even if you are up against a God!

name: 连通阿斯嘉德与世界各地的彩虹桥，而如今，黑暗爪牙们摧毁了它···
value: The Bifrost that connects Asgard and the world has been destroyed by the Darkspawns...

name: 神王奥丁的居所，由黄金铸造的宫殿，无数勇士曾在这里豪饮至天亮···不要染黑暗玷污这里！
value: This palace is made out of gold. It was once the residence of Godking Odin. Countless warriors have feasted here... Do net let the darkness corrupt this place!

name: “持有此矛者，将统治世界。”——永恒之枪上的铭文
value: He who wield this spear shall rule the world. -Inscription on the Spear of Eternity

name: 女武神曾骑着白马行走于战场上，赐予无畏的战死者一吻，可是如今，黑暗蒙蔽了她的眼睛···
value: The Valkyrie once rode a white horse across the battlefield, seeking the martyrs and bless them with a kiss. But she is now blinded by darkness...

name: 传说真正的英雄在死后，灵魂会来到奥丁的英灵殿，白天战斗，晚上豪饮，而如今···
value: Legend has it that the soul of a true hero will reach Odin's Valhalla when he dies. He shall fight in the day and feast in the night. But now...

name: 支撑九界的世界树崩塌了，绝望的火焰撕碎了阿斯嘉德，人们在祈祷，去吧，去帮助他们！
value: The world tree that supports the nine realms collapsed and the fire of despair has torn Asgard apart. People are praying. Go help them!

name: 大地在震颤，海洋在沸腾，恶魔们坐着死人指甲做成的巨船汹涌而来！决战的时候到了！为了永恒的终焉！
value: The ground is shaking and the ocean is boiling. The demons are riding on giant ships made of dead men's nails! This is the final hour! For the End of Eternity!

name: 在绝对的黑暗与力量面前，任何的反抗都是徒劳且无力的···
value: Resistance is futile before absolute darkness and power...

name: 相传亿万年前，天幕崩裂、生灵涂炭，女娲大神以石补天，救万民于水火。而如今，黑暗爪牙竟想对女娲大神不利！
value: Legend has it that billions of years ago, the sky was torn apart and creatures on earth were devastated. Nuwa patched up the sky with a stone and save the people. But now, the Darkspawns are trying to harm Nuwa!

name: 三十三重天的入口，曾有仙人骑鹤，曾有力士开山，而如今，黑暗爪牙占据了这里···
value: The entrance to 33 planes of existence. An immortal once rode a crane through here. A powerful man once cut into the mountain here. But Darkspawns have occupied this place now...

name: 曾经的造化钟神地，而今却成了怪物横行的死亡山口···
value: This place was once a land of marvel, but is now a monster-infested deadly mountain pass...

name: 始祖神农曾尝遍百草，教授黎庶农耕草药。将怪物驱逐出去！
value: Shennong has tasted a hundred different herbs and taught people about farming and herbal medicine. Banish the monsters!

name: 两仪、四象、八卦，我中华之瑰宝何止万千！邪魔退散！
value: Ying and Yang, Four Symbols and Eight Diagrams creates millions of artifacts! Back off, evils!

name: 这里是火焰的世界，焚尽一切的红莲业火！
value: This is the world of fire. The fire of red lotus will incinerate everything!

name: 昆仑天池孕育了无数的生命，雪猿、青鸟、鸿雁、白泽···将让光明重新照耀这里！
value: The Heaven Lake on Mt. Kunlun has given birth to snow apes, blue birds, swan geese, Bai Ze and countless life forms... Let the light shine over this place again!

name: 悬浮于天宫之上的神之国度，请借诸天神佛之力助我诛魔！
value: The Kingdom of God above the Temple of Heaven, please grant me the power of the gods to kill the demons!

name: 谁能想到此处曾是丰饶的天国沃土···魔主藏身于此，把她找出来！
value: Who could've thought that this place was once a land of prosperity... The Demonlord hid herself here. Find her!

name: 魔血腐蚀了这片土地
value: The demon blood has corrupted this land

name: 堕落的天使们背弃了自己的信仰与责任！
value: The fallen angels have abandoned their beliefs and responsibilities!

name: 魔血腐蚀了这片土地，堕落的天使们背弃了自己的信仰与责任！
value: The demon blood has corrupted this land and the fallen angels have abandoned their beliefs and responsibilities!

name: 我记得这条小河，牧童赶着羊群在此休憩，农妇唱着歌儿漂净衣服，上游的磨坊吱悠吱悠的转来转去···而黑暗使一切不再！
value: I can still remember this creek, sheperd boy are resting here with his flock of sheep, farm woman is washing her clothes while singing and the mill uptream is grinding nonstop... Darkness has destroyed it all!

name: 堕落天使赤裸着身体，踏着一地的羽毛婀娜起舞，猩红的嘴唇如美酒般摄人心魄···不要吻下去！
value: The fallen angel dances naked on a floor of feather. Her crimson lips are as inviting as a glass of wine... Don't kiss her!

name: 天使与恶魔有什么区别？善与恶又有什么区别？你是否怀疑过自己的信仰与坚持？
value: What's the difference between angels and demons? What's the difference between good and evil? Have you ever doubted your beliefs and resolution?

name: “万物皆虚，万事皆允，唯信吾之道者得永生！”——死亡圣经卷十一
value: Nothing is true, everything is permitted. Eternal life is only granted to those who follow my cause! -Unholy Bible Volume XI

name: 天使总喜欢审判，无论是堕落前还是堕落后，或许他们只是借助审判来巩固自己摇摇欲坠的信仰吧。
value: Angels love to make judgments. It doesn't matter if the angel has fallen or not. Perhaps they are using judgments to strengthen their teetering faith.

name: 以身饲虎者有，割肉喂鹰者有，舍身取义者有，敢入深渊一往无前者，亦有！
value: Some are willing to feed themselves to the tiger, some are willing to cut their flesh off to feed the eagle, some are willing to sacrifice themselves for the greater good and some are willing to travel deep into the abyss without hesitation!

name: 黑暗之海，剧毒沼泽，破败之地，燃烧山脉···这是一条注定不平凡的旅程···
value: The Sea of Darkness, the Toxic Swamp, the Desolate Land and the Burning Ridge... This is not going to be an ordinary journey...

name: 南朝四百八十寺，多少楼台烟雨中。
value: The four-hundred-eighty temples of the Southern Dynasty in the mist and rain their many towers can be seen

name: 雄伟的神殿只剩下了几块残垣断壁，残破的雕像似乎在向过客诉说着当年的辉煌与美丽。
value: The once majestic temple is left with a few broken walls. The ruined statue seems to be telling passersby about the past glories.

name: 而今，废墟间只剩下黑暗的爪牙横行。
value: But now, the ruins are filled with Darkspawns.

name: 黑暗，淹没一切的黑暗，尽头有一盏残喘的灯。
我们必须穿过这条危机四伏长廊
value: There is a dim light at the end of the crisis-ridden hallway which we have to go through.

name: 鬼影们睁着猩红的眸子咆哮着…
value: The ghosts are staring at us with their crimson eyes, roaring.

name: 稍有不慎便会摄去我们的灵魂，请务必小心。
value: One mistake and they could take our souls. Please be careful.

name: 长廊尽头那盏灯从不曾熄灭，正如光明从来不曾被黑暗吞噬！
value: The light at the end of the hallway never goes out, just as the light has never been consumed by the darkness.

name: 毒蛇吐着猩红的须子盘旋在神殿大门之上。
value: The serpent coils itself above the temple gate, poking its crimson tongue about.

name: 这扇门后会有什么在等着我们？
value: What is waiting for us behind this gate?

name: 众神的遗骸遍布神殿，哈迪斯痛苦的张着嘴巴，波塞冬拄着断戟死去，雅典娜，阿波罗···
value: The corpses of gods scattered across the temple. Hades died in agony with his mouth open. Poseidon died holding his broken trident. Athena and Apollo were no exception... the world.

name: 众神陨落，天地失色。
value: The death of gods has shocked

name: 必须阻止她！
value: The Box! Pandora has opened the Box of Devil... We must stop her!

name: 我们一定要让光明重现人间！
value: We must return the light to the mortal world.

name: 那怕阻止我们的是神！
value: Even if the gods are in our way!

name: 浩浩乎，平沙无垠，渺不见人。
value: The vast plain is desolate and uninhabited.

name: 风悲日曛，兽铤亡群，往往鬼哭，天阴则闻。
value: Wailing wind, dim sunlight, and the occasional stray beasts are the only things here. On cloudy days, one can often hear ghosts cry.

name: 天空诡异的飘起了飞雪···
曾经的骄阳大漠变得如同鬼域般寒冷
value: The scorched desert became as cold as the land of the ghosts!

name: 大金字塔耸立在沙海之滨，喃喃的向世人耳语着沧桑与过往
value: The Grand Pyramid sits on the edge of the Dune Sea, whispering the words about the past.

name: ——这里是神之墓地。
value: This is the Tomb of Gods.

name: 需要祭品才能打开通往主墓室的大门
value: The gate to the main chamber requires an offering to open.

name: 而祭品就是黑暗爪牙的生命！
value: The offering is the life of Darkspawn!

name: “打扰吾等安息之人，死神将张开翅膀降临到他头上！”
value: Death shall befall those who disturb our rest!

name: ——墓室大门上镌刻的诅咒
value: The curse written on the tomb gate.

name: 墓室大门打开后，尖啸的魂灵们喷涌而出。
value: Screaming souls erupted from the tomb gate when it is opened.

name: 他们是最后的守护者，他们想扼住我们的喉咙！
value: They are the last guardians and they are trying to grab our throats!

name: 故事大厅——记载墓室之人生平的祭祀之所，
value: Hall of Stories-A place of sacrifice that records the life of the tomb owner.

name: 如今，在这大厅中又要上演怎样的故事呢？
value: What kind of story will unfold here today?

name: 谎言与背叛撕裂了堕落之神的伪装。
value: Lies and betrayal have stripped down the Fallen God's disguise.

name: 太阳终将升起，而黎明的篝火将由我们点燃。
value: The sun will eventually rise and we shall light the fire of dawn.

name: 旌旗十万斩阎罗！
value: Form your army to take down the enemy!

name: 这片森林是活的，它呼唤着你
value: This forest is alive. It calls you and seduces you.

name: 引诱着你，等你踏进时再将你吞噬！
value: When you enter the forest, it will devour you!

name: 白骨累累似深冬雪原，鬼火粼粼若鬼蜮起舞
value: The tons of bones are like a field of snow, the will-o'-the-wisp is like the dancing ghosts.

name: 阴风阵阵如冤魂嚎哭。
value: The howling wind is like ghost crying.

name: 没人不思慕美杜莎的美艳，没人敢直视美杜莎的眼睛
value: Everyone admires the beauty of Medusa.

name: 没人能活着从这片丘陵中走出。
value: But no one dares to look Medusa in her eyes and no one has ever walked out of this hill alive.

name: 迷雾从未在这片沼泽上消散。
value: The mist has always covered this marsh.

name: 只有缪斯的歌声能引导你走出去，或沉下去。
value: The song of Muse could get you out of here, but it could also make you drown.

name: 三生石上看来世，奈何桥头叹奈何
value: Read the next life written on the Stone of Life.

name: 越过这座桥，才能到达开满鲜花的彼岸。
value: Count the regrets on Naihe Bridge and cross the bridge to reach the other side

name: 矗立于血色潮汐中的血腥城堡
value: The Darklords are hiding in the Blood Castle within the Crimson Tides.

name: 黑暗之神们正藏身于此，找到他们，杀死他们。
永远不要忘记生而为人的骄傲
value: Take pride in being a human.

name: 那怕对手是神！
value: Even if you are up against the God!

name: 连通阿斯嘉德与世界各地的彩虹桥
value: The Bifrost that connects Asgard and the world...

name: 而如今，黑暗爪牙们摧毁了它···
value: But now, the Bifrost has been destroyed by the Darkspawns!

name: 神王奥丁的居所，由黄金铸造的宫殿，无数勇士曾在这里豪饮至天亮···
value: This palace is made out of gold. It was once the residence of Godking Odin. Countless warriors have feasted here...

value: Do not let the darkness corrupt this place!

value: He who wield this spear shall rule the world.

value: The Valkyrie once rode a white horse across the battlefield, seeking the martyrs and bless them with a kiss.

name: 可是如今，黑暗蒙蔽了她的眼睛···
value: But she is now blinded by darkness...

value: Legend has it that the soul of a true hero will reach Odin's Valhalla when he dies.

name: 白天战斗，晚上豪饮，而如今···
value: He shall fight in the day and feast in the night. But now...

name: 支撑九界的世界树崩塌了，绝望的火焰撕碎了阿斯嘉德
value: The world tree that supports the nine realms collapsed and the fire of despair has torn Asgard apart.

name: 人们在祈祷，去吧，去帮助他们！
value: People are praying. Go help them!

value: The ground is shaking and the ocean is boiling. The demons are riding on giant ships made of dead men's nails!

value: This is the final moment! For the End of Eternity!

name: 在绝对的黑暗与力量面前
value: Facing the absolute darkness and power...

name: 任何的反抗都是徒劳且无力的···
相传亿万年前，天幕崩裂、生灵涂炭，女娲大神以石补天，救万民于水火。
value: Legend has it that billions of years ago, the sky was torn apart and creatures on earth were devastated. Nuwa patched up the sky with a stone and save the people!

name: 而如今，黑暗爪牙竟想对女娲大神不利！
value: But now, Numa is under attack!

value: The entrance to 33 planes of existence. An immortal once rode a crane through here. A powerful man once cut into the mountain here.

value: But Darkspawns have occupied this place now...

name: 曾经的造化钟神地
value: This place was once a land of marvel,

name: 而今却成了怪物横行的死亡山口···
value: But now, a monster-infested deadly mountain pass...

value: Shennong has tasted a hundred different herbs and taught people about farming and herbal medicine.

value: Ying and Yang, Four Symbols and Eight Diagrams creates millions of artifacts!

value: This is the world of fire.

name: 焚尽一切的红莲业火！
value: The fire of red lotus will incinerate everything!

value: Let the light shine over this place again!

name: 悬浮于天宫之上的神之国度
value: The Kingdom of God above the Temple of Heaven!

name: 请借诸天神佛之力助我诛魔！
value: Please grant me the power of the gods to kill the demons

name: 谁能想到此处曾是丰饶的天国沃土···
value: Who could've thought that this place was once a land of prosperity...

name: 魔主藏身于此，把她找出来！
value: The Demonlord hid herself here. Find her!

name: 我记得这条小河，牧童赶着羊群在此休憩，农妇唱着歌儿漂净衣服，上游的磨坊吱悠吱悠的转来转去···
value: I can still remember this creek, sheperd boy are resting here with his flock of sheep, farm woman is washing her clothes while singing and the mill uptream is grinding nonstop...  it all!

name: 而黑暗使一切不再！
value: But it has been destroyed by darkness!

name: 堕落天使赤裸着身体，踏着一地的羽毛婀娜起舞
value: The fallen angel dances naked on a floor of feather.

name: 猩红的嘴唇如美酒般摄人心魄···不要吻下去！
value: Her crimson lips are as inviting as a glass of wine... Don't kiss her!

name: 天使与恶魔有什么区别？善与恶又有什么区别？
value: What's the difference between angels and demons? What's the difference between good and evil?

name: 你是否怀疑过自己的信仰与坚持？
value: Have you ever doubted your beliefs and resolution?

name: “万物皆虚，万事皆允，唯信吾之道者得永生！”
value: Nothing is true, everything is permitted. Eternal life is only granted to those who follow my cause!

name: 天使总喜欢审判，无论是堕落前还是堕落后
value: Angels love to make judgments. It doesn't matter if the angel has fallen or not.

name: 或许他们只是借助审判来巩固自己摇摇欲坠的信仰吧。
value: Perhaps they are using judgments to strengthen their teetering faith.

name: 以身饲虎者有，割肉喂鹰者有，舍身取义者有。
value: Some are willing to feed themselves to the tiger, some are willing to cut their flesh off to feed the eagle, some are willing to sacrifice themselves for the greater good。

name: 敢入深渊一往无前者，亦有！
value: Travel deep into the abyss without hesitation, they are real warriors!

name: 黑暗之海，剧毒沼泽，破败之地，燃烧山脉···
value: The Sea of Darkness, the Toxic Swamp, the Desolate Land and the Burning Ridge...

name: 这是一条注定不平凡的旅程···
value: This is not going to be an ordinary journey...

name: 挽狂澜于既倒，扶大厦之将倾，英雄的使命就是如此
value: The fate of a hero is to save a collapsing world.

name: 用光明之焰净化那些堕入黑暗中的人吧！
value: Use the flame of light to purify those who became slaves to the darkness!

name: 像潜伏的野兽一样跟着我们，令人恐惧···
value: An obscure figure is lurking in the mist, following us like a beast following its prey. It's horrifying...

name: 乱起时，一些被财货和私欲支配的人们居然化作强盗趁火打劫，他们必须受到惩罚！
value: Some people are worse than monsters... In chaotic times, some people are blinded by greed and turn themselves into bandits, taking advantage of the crisis. They must be punished!

name: 怪物们呲着獠牙，流着酸臭的口水将一群手无寸铁的妇孺逼到了角落
value: The monsters bared their teeth, with vile saliva coming out of their mouth. They've cornered a bunch of defenseless women and children.

name: 我们必须为了那些不能作战的人而战！
怪物蜂拥而至，首尔在哀嚎与哭泣中绝望的燃烧着···
value: The monsters surged in. Seoul is burning and the people in it is screaming and crying...

name: 神女的庇护去哪了？我们被神女抛弃了吗？
value: Where is Angel's protection? Have we been abandoned by the Angel?

name: 怪物们在围攻神女栖所，守护结界一触即碎，神女危在旦夕···
value: The monsters are attacking the residence of Angel. The ward of protection is on the brink of destruction and the Angel is in imminent danger...

name: 绝不能让神女受到伤害！
value: No harm shall come to the Angel!

name: 更大的威胁降临了，隐藏在迷雾中的魔影终于现身了···
value: An even bigger threat is here. The shadow in the mist finally revealed itself...

name: 巨大的障碍挡在前方
value: A gargantuan barrier stands in the way...

name: 愿先知给予帮助
value: May the prophet light our paths？

name: 还有一丝希望
value: There is still a glimmer of hope…

name: 不行了……实在是……走不动了……
这就是寻找的希望吗
value: Is this the hope I’ve been looking for?

name: 愿神女与你同在
value: Good luck will be with you!

name: 这里也撑不了多久了
value: We can’t hold much longer here!

name: 绝不能让怪物进来
value: No monsters can get through here!

name: 出发，为了未来而战
value: Move out. Let’s fight for a better future!

name: 热爱这个世界，绝对要保护它
value: We must protect the world we love!

name: 英雄之魂，在呼唤着我
value: The heroes’ souls are beckoning me！

name: 有人帮我们开辟出一条道路
自由与光明的旗帜
value: The banner of freedom and light！

name: 人之初、性本恶
value: Man’s nature at birth is evil...

name: 人类不绝，怪物不止
value: Monsters won’t disappear unless humanity is wiped out

name: 英雄罗穆卢斯守护着罗马
value: The great hero Romulus watches over Rome.

name: 这就是英雄的力量
value: This is the power of heroes!

name: 每一个人都是平凡的
value: Men and women—everyone is just an ordinary person…

name: 昂日星君
value: Astral Deity of the Maned Head

name: 点击切换到女神界面
value: Tap to switch to Angel Screen

name: 点击女神头像，开始对女神的操作
value: Tap on Angel avatar to adjust

name: 选择要强化的装备
value: Tap the gear which you want to enhance

name: 点击这里，将女神设置为「出战」状态
value: Tap here to set the Angel to <color=#6DCFF6FF>[Fighting]</color>

name: 点击这里进入战场
value: Tap here to enter the Battleground

name: 点击「选择」按钮，即可换上装备
胜率超过80%，就可以去挑战BOSS
value: Reach over <color=#FA931AFF>80%</color> Win Rate to <color=#FA931AFF>challenge the Boss</color>

name: 战胜BOSS，才能进入下一副本
value: Defeat the Boss to unlock the next dungeon

name: 疯狂点击这里，给女神送礼，提升好感度星级
value: Tap here repeatedly to send gifts to the Angel to increase Affinity Level

name: 星级达到要求，可以觉醒女神
value: Reach required Star-Lv. to awake the Angel

name: 进行快速挂机，可立即获得2小时收益（本次免费）
value: Perform <color=#FA931AFF>Quick Combat</color> to get 2 hour earnings instantly (for free this time)

name: 进行快速挂机，可立即获得2小时收益
value: Perform <color=#FA931AFF>Quick Combat</color> to get 2 hours’ yield instantly, which speeds up your leveling and helps you in boss fight!

name: 选择刚刚换上的装备
value: Select the gear you just equipped

name: 强化装备，可以进一步提高战斗力！
value: Enhance your gear to further improve your Power!

name: 点击【强化】按钮，进行强化
再次点击【强化】按钮，继续强化装备
value: Tap <color=#FA931AFF>[Enhance]</color> button again to continue enhancing gears

name: 最后再进行一次【强化】操作
强制点击关闭装备按钮
value: Force tapping the close gear button

name: 战胜BOSS后，已开启下一关卡，点击这里切换地图
value: The next dungeon is unlocked after defeating the Boss. Tap here to switch map

name: 点击进入新解锁关卡
value: Tap to enter the new unlocked dungeon

name: 强制引导玩家点击【进入挂机按钮】
value: Force the player to tap [Begin Idling Button]

name: 装备满，推荐进行装备熔炼
不需要的装备，推荐进行装备熔炼
value: There are some unnecessary gear. It is recommended to carry out gear <color=#FA931AFF>smelting</color>.

name: 点击这里进入技能设置
value: Tap here to set the skills

name: 点击这里进入副本技能设置
value: Tap here to set the skills for the dungeon

name: 点击选择技能顺序栏位
value: Tap to select skill sequence slot

name: 培养女神，可大幅提高战斗力
value: Complete <color=#FA931AFF>Training</color> will greatly improve your Angel Power

name: 点击进行1次普通培养（本次免费）
value: Tap for {0} <color=#FA931AFF>standard Training</color> (For free this time)

name: 点击这里，开始打造神器
进入商店，可以购买各类物品
value: Enter the store to buy various items

name: 有可以合成的女神，点击背包，进入碎片合成界面
value: An Angel can be Synthesized, tap the bag to enter Shard Synthesis Screen

name: 选择要合成的女神碎片
碎片已集齐，点击可以合成女神
value: All shards have been collected, tap to <color=#FA931AFF>Compose Angel</color>

name: 点击这里，开始打造装备
点击这里，刷新打造的装备
value: Tap here to refresh the gear you want to <color=#FA931AFF>craft</color>.

name: 点击打造装备（本次不消耗熔炼值）
第三个副将上阵槽位已解锁
对装备进行强化，可以快速提升自己的实力！
value: <color=#FA931AFF>Enhance</color> your gear to further improve your Power!

name: 战斗采用车轮战模式，被击败的女神无法再次参加战斗，请合理安排阵容
value: Angels battles in rotation in battle, and defeated Angels will not be able to join the battle again. Please arrange your line-up wisely!

name: 来吧来吧！在死之前我会把你们这些怪物送进地狱！
value: Come on! I shall send you monsters to hell before I die!

name: 巴里公主？！你们怎么会在这里？！
value: Princess Bari? ! Why are you here? !

name: 来不及解释了！先解决掉它们！
value: It’s too late to explain that! Deal with them first!

name: 公主，谢谢你···谁！谁在你身边！？
这是大韩熊女的后裔，我们为了消除日本的黑暗而来！
value: She’s the descendant of Ungnyeo. We have come here to eliminate dark forces in Japan!

name: 我们听说夜神月读囚禁了天照大神。
value: We heard that Tsukuyomi had imprisoned Amaterasu.

name: 月读···所以怪物们才会暴动！这个混蛋！她背叛了我们！
value: Tsukuyomi…?! Yes… That's why the monsters rioted! That bastard! She betrayed us!

name: 和我们一起去打败月读吧，把天照大神救出来！
value: Siren, come with us to defeat Tsukuyomi and save Amaterasu!

name: 谢谢你们的帮助！我需要先清理一下伤口。
value: Thank you for your help! I need to clean my wounds first.

name: 没时间了！我觉得我们自己就可以搞定！
value: There's not enough time! Bari, we can do it ourselves!

name: 好吧···妖，你好好休养，现在月读在哪里？
value: Alright. Siren, take a rest here and we’ll deal with the rest. Where is Tsukuyomi?

name: 我会把你们传送到她的神社。
value: I’ll send you to her shrine.

name: 女神和巴里公主被传送到了月读神社。
value: Then the Angel and Princess Bari are sent to Tsukuyomi’s shrine.

name: 月夜见尊，好久不见
value: Haven't seen you for a long time, Tsukuyomi.

name: 巴里？居然敢踏进我的神社，你在找死不成？
value: Bari? How dare you come here? I’ll kill you!

name: 住口！叛逆之人安敢在此饶舌！天照大神在哪里！
value: Shut up! A traitor like you has no right to say anything! Where is Amaterasu?

name: 哈哈哈！我的仆人们，把他们吞下去！
value: Haha! Swallow them up, my servants!

name: 呵呵···我，居然，败在了人类手里···
value: I never…never thought that I would be defeated by human beings!

name: 他可不是普通的人类，他是神裔，血脉中传承着神的力量！
value: She’s not an ordinary person! She’s the descendant of Ungnyeo, and the power of the goddess runs in her blood!

name: 我居然打败了神？！不敢相信！
value: I defeated a powerful angel?! Unbelievable!

name: 天照沉睡了。。。咳咳，她不会醒来的。。。永远！
value: Amaterasu fell into a deep sleep…（cough）She will never wake up… Never!

name: 你对天照大神做了什么！？
value: What did you do to Amaterasu?!

name: 世界终将陷入永恒的黑暗！
value: Finally the world will be plunged into eternal darkness!

name: 如果天照大神就这样沉睡下去，韩国和日本就完了！
value: If Amaterasu cannot be awakened, Korea and Japan will be doomed!

name: 经历了这么多···一切都要结束了吗？
value: After all we've been through… Is this the end?

name: 我该怎么办。。。该怎么办。。。
value: …What should I do? What should I do!?

name: 公主！如果韩国和日本都有神的话，那么希腊也一定有神存在！希腊神话中有那么多的神！
value: Bari, if there are angels in Korea and Japan, there must be angels in Greece! There are so many angels in Greek mythology!

name: 对！梦呓女神倪克斯！！如果得到她的帮助，或许我们可以唤醒天照大神！
value: Yes! The nightmare angel Nyx! If we get her help, we can awake Amaterasu!

name: 希腊的神社在众神的守卫下得以保存，雅典的守卫者倪克斯击败了前来侵袭的巨型噬魂怪，并将它的核心剖出来，放到盒子里交给潘多拉保管。当伊利斯奉命将盒子交给潘多拉后，无法压制住自己好奇心的潘多拉，打开了盒子???
value: The Greek Temple had always been under the protection of the gods. Nyx, the guardian of Athens, defeated the attacking Giant Soulreaver, stripped it of its core, put it into a box, and sent it to Pandora for safekeeping. When Iris handed the box to Pandora as instructed, the curious Pandora couldn't resist the temptation and opened the box...

name: ...我们要尽快到达倪克斯的神殿！
value: We should go to Nyx's temple as soon as possible!

name: 呼，这里也乱成一团了…
value: Phew, this place is a mess too…

name: 新的敌人吗？这些跟之前遇到的怪物不同
value: New enemies? They're different from monsters we have met before.

name: 那里有一盏灯，咱们往那走吧。
value: There's a lamp over there. Let's head that way.

name: 这些怪物无穷无尽！
value: There's no end to these monsters!

name: 等一下，那边好像有人！！
value: Wait! It seems that someone is there!

name: 等一下，我们这样打下去太慢了，需要快速提高实力才行，特殊的时期只能采用特殊的办法了！
value: Wait a minute, we'll take forever if we keep fighting like this. We need to enhance our power. Well, drastic times call for drastic measures!

name: 你没事吧？好像伤得很重！
value: Are you OK? It seems that you are badly hurt!

name: 战斗力上涨了好多！记住，每件装备都会给你带来质的飞跃哟！
value: Fighting power has risen a lot! Remember, every piece of gear will bring you a qualitative leap!

name: 我叫伊利斯，众神的信使。
value: I am Iris, messenger of Gods.

name: 这是哪？我们再找倪克斯的神殿…
value: Where is this? We're looking for Nyx's temple…

name: 倪克斯击败了进攻雅典的巨大噬魂怪，将它的核心封印在盒子里将给潘多拉保管，并拜托潘多拉绝对不能打开…
value: Nyx defeated the attacking Giant Soulreaver, stripped its core, put it into a box and sent it to Pandora for safekeeping. Nyx told Pandora that she cannot open it…

name: 是的...潘多拉被黑暗所侵蚀，我试图阻止它的堕落，可失败了…
value: Yes…Pandora was consumed by the darkness. I tried to stop it but failed…

name: 快到了，潘多拉就在那里！
value: We're almost there! That's where Pandora is!

name: 谢谢，勇敢的女神，多亏你们我才能阻止潘多拉的暴走！
value: Thank you, brave Angels! I couldn't have stopped Pandora's rampage without you!

name: 不能把盒子交给潘多拉！它好奇心太重了！我提醒过你！
value: I told you before not to give the box to Pandora! She's way too curious for her own good!

name: 唉，所托非人，悔之晚矣…
value: Sigh… I've entrusted it to the wrong person, and now it's too late for regrets…

name: 倪克斯，请您让天照大神从沉睡中醒来！只有她能拯救我们的国家和日本！
value: Nyx, please awaken Amaterasu from her sleep! Only she can save our country and Japan!

name: 伊利斯跟我说过了，我会帮你的，等你回去时天照估计就会醒来了！
value: Iris had informed me. Don't worry, I will help you. Once you get back, Amaterasu will have awakened!

name: 终于...谢谢你！
value: We finally made it… Thank you!

name: 怎么回事？！为什么在希腊，黑暗力量越来越强了？！
value: What's going on?! Why is the dark power becoming stronger in Greece?!

name: ...这是太阳之力被削弱的原因！没想到会是这样！
value: This is because the power of the Sun is weakened! I didn't think it'll come to this!

name: 倪克斯是什么意思？
value: Nyx, what's the meaning of this?

name: 现在马上去找盖布，他在请求你们的帮助！
value: You need to find Geb right away. She is asking for your help!

name: 埃及的大地之神盖布？？
value: Geb? The God of Earth of Egypt??

name: 我会送你们过去的，帮他把太阳拨回正轨！
value: I will send you to help her to put the sun back on track!

name: 盖布与努特背叛了光明，奈芙蒂斯和其他神一起将神母努特封印在了大金字塔中，而盖布却逃脱了…而对这一切毫不知情的女神一行人，应盖布的‘邀请’，来到了埃及…
value: Geb and Nuit had actually betrayed the Light. Nephthys and the other Gods sealed the Mother Goddess, Nuit, in the Great Pyramid, but Geb escaped… However, the group of Angels who had no idea of this arrived in Egypt at Geb's invitation…

name: 哇！这就是有名的金字塔吗？！好壮观！
value: WOW! Is this the famous pyramid?! It's so spectacular!

name: ...好奇怪，这里的太阳之力太弱了...到底发生了什么事？
value: …So strange. The power of sun is so weak here… What happened?

name: 埃及...不是应该很热吗？现在是正午怎么会这么冷？？
value: Egypt…Isn't it supposed to be hot here? It's noon now, so why is it so cold?

name: 请问你是盖布吗？倪克斯说你需要我们的帮助。
value: Are you Geb? Nyx said that you need our help.

name: 没错，感谢你们的到来。
value: Yes, I am. Thank you for coming.

name: 奈芙蒂斯背叛了光明...他封印了努特，使阳光不能落到地面...你们会帮助我，对吗？
value: Nephthys betrayed the Light… She sealed Nuit, which prevents sunlight from shining upon the land… You will help me, right?

name: 这一切都是奈芙蒂斯的阴谋，如果你们能打败奈芙蒂斯并救出努特，太阳就会重新普照人间！我带你们去奈芙蒂斯的金字塔。
value: This is all part of Nephthys' scheme. If you can defeat Nephthys and save Nuit, the sun will rise above the horizon again! Let me take you to the pyramid where Nephthys is in.

name: 这就是奈芙蒂斯的藏身处吗？
是的...我恐怕只能送你们到这里了…
value: Yes… I'm afraid I can only accompany you up to this point.

name: 这个金字塔中有使我力量衰退的东西...我不能再往前走了…
value: There are things in this pyramid which reduces my power… I cannot go any further…

name: 愿你能重现太阳的光辉，愿你的前方是温暖的沙地…
value: May you restore the brilliant sun again, and may warm sands guide your path.

name: 小心影仆!!!
value: Be careful of the Shadow Servant!

name: 此处禁止通行！即使你拥有太阳神的力量！
value: None shall pass! Not even you, who wields the power of the Sun God!

name: 命运的谜团...答案就是死亡！
value: The answer to the mysteries of fate… is Death!

name: 欲求长生？献出你的心脏！
value: Are you pursuing immortality? Give me your heart!

name: 变成沙漠中的沙子吧。
value: I shall turn you into grains of the desert sand.

name: 奈芙蒂斯！拿掉这些肮脏的绷带！放了努特！
value: Nephthys! Take off those dirty bandages! Release Nuit!

name: 你们是谁？盖布！你出来！做个了断吧！不要牵扯无辜的人进来！
value: Who are you? Geb! Come out! Let's end it all! Don't get the innocents involved!

name: 放了努特？休想！
value: You want me to release Nuit? Never!

name: 奈芙蒂斯，收手吧！放了努特，这世界需要太阳！
value: Nephthys, stop it! Release Nuit! The world needs sunlight!

name: 咳咳...原来如此...你们这些白痴…
你们被利用了...我在阻止努特的堕落…
value: You've been deceived… I am stopping Nuit from degenerating…

name: 咳咳...努特被黑暗腐蚀了，我拼尽全力才将她封印…
value: (Cough)… Nuit was consumed by the darkness, so I tried my best to seal her…

name: 哈哈哈！这该死的绷带终于被破坏了！我可怜又愚蠢的孩子，你以为这样就可以阻止我吗！
value: Hahaha! These cursed bandages are finally broken! My poor and foolish girls, did you really believe that you can stop me with these?

name: 干的很好，白痴们！多亏你们打开了努特的封印！现在，用你们卑微生命感受黑暗的降临吧！
value: Good Job, idiots! Well done for working so hard to break Nuit's seal! Now, offer up your meager lives and feel the power of Darkness!

name: 该死的！你骗了我们！
value: Damn it! You lied to us!!

name: 无知的蝼蚁！我是神！低贱的人类怎么可能理解神的意图！
value: Ignorant ants! I am God! Lowly humans cannot understand God's intention!

name: 你不配称为神！你是恶魔！
value: You don't deserve being a God! You're a devil!

name: 修我战剑，杀上九天！撒我热血，一往无前！！
value: Repair my sword and fight to the ninth heaven! Sprinkle my blood and press forward with indomitable will!

name: 好，好，蝼蚁们，感受神的力量吧！
value: Well, ants. Prepare to face the power of God!

name: 怎么会...我怎么会输...我可是神！
value: How could this be possible… How could I lose… I am God!

name: 糟了！努特的封印完全解除了！她要暴走了！
value: Oh, no! Nuit's seal is completely broken! She is going to go on a rampage!

name: 没有办法了吗？！
value: Isn't there anything we can do?!

name: 努特！我的爱人！展现黑暗真正的力量吧！
value: Nuit! My lover! Show them the power of darkness!

name: 呼...还好阻止了努特的暴走，你还好吧？
value: Phew… Thank goodness we managed to stop Nuit's rampage. Are you ok?

name: 我们...真的阻止了吗？可是...有点奇怪...我的身体...啊！我的身体在燃烧！
value: Have we really stopped her? But I feel a little strange… my body… Ahhhh! My body is burning!

name: 不！太阳之力太强了！不！
value: No! The power of the sun is too strong! No!!

name: 虽然阻止了努特的暴走，但直接暴露在太阳之力下的女神却掉进了地狱。。。从地狱醒来的女神要重回人间，必须得到地狱之王路西法的允许。于是女神踏上了寻找路西法的漫漫长路。
value: Though they managed to stop Nuit's rampage, the Angel was directly exposed to the power of the sun, resulting in her descend to Hell. In order for the Angel to return to the Mortal Realm, she has to obtain permission from the Queen of Hell, Lucifer. Thus, she embark on a long journey to find Lucifer...

name: 巴里，这是哪？怎么什么都看不见…
value: Bari, where is this? Why can't I see anything…?

name: 真是万幸，神女的力量还在。你能听清楚我说的话吗？
value: Fortunately, we still possess our Angelic powers. Can you hear me clearly?

name: 可以听到...我现在在哪？
value: I can hear you... Where am I now?

name: 冷静！我正在找让你复生的方法！
value: Calm down! I am looking for a way to resurrect you right now!

name: 我是地狱的守护神——米若陶洛斯！！
value: I am the Guardian Deity of Hell - Minotaur!!

name: 不要闹了...我很累的...不要打扰我休息…
value: Please stop the ruckus… I'm really tired. Just let me rest already…

name: 好大的胆子！居然说这种话！我要把你做成晚餐！
value: Did you really just say that? You've got guts! You'll make a fine dinner!

name: 弑神者！感受被地狱支配的恐惧吧！
value: Damned God-killer! Cower in terror against Hells' dominion over you!

name: 只要我们不停探索，怪物就会不断出现，我们的女神们会自动战斗消灭他们！
value: As long as we keep exploring, monsters will continue to appear, and our Angels will fight to destroy them automatically!

name: 强化刚刚换上的装备，可进一步提升战斗力！
value: Strengthen the gear that has just been replaced, and further strengthen the fight power!

name: 已派上新的女神和您一同战斗，快进入战场试一试
value: New Angel has been deployed to fight beside you. Try it in <color=#FA931AFF>Battleground</color>

name: 提升自己实力的诀窍就在这里！
value: This is the key to improve your strength.

name: 消灭怪物会随机掉落装备，看到小红点的提示，就要及时换上新装备，这样就可以变得更强！
value: When you see <color=#FA931AFF>red dot</color>, you should equip new gear to get stronger!

name: 换上并强化装备后，战斗力已大幅提升，赶快到战场试一试
value: Your Combat Rating increased dramatically after you equipping and enhancing your gears. Try them out on the Battleground

name: 战胜BOSS，才能进入下一关卡
value: After defeating the boss, you can enter the next battlefield.

name: 你的战斗力非常强大，会在专注中爆发！
value: You are very powerful. Focus and direct your power!

name: 怪物太多了，我们需要女神的帮助！她们也在期待着你的召唤！
value: There are too many monsters, we need help from the Angel! They are looking forward to being summoned by you!

name: 已开启副本下一章节，点击切换地图
value: The next chapter of the dungeon is unlocked. Tap to switch map

name: 你到底是怕麻烦还是怕死更多一些？
value: What do you care more about? Trouble or death?

name: 战斗力上涨了好多！不要小看装备的提升，每件都可能带来质的飞跃哟！
value: Your power soared! Do not underestimate your gear, cause every piece of gear brings you a quantum leap!

name: 加百列你真的好厉害！以后请你不要离开我身边一米！
value: Gabriel, you’re amazing! Please always stay by my side!

name: 古神之力么，可我有种今日额度已用光的感觉啊。
value: The ancient divine power? But I feel like I tried my best today.

name: 请你用心神感受与加百列的联系，用古神之力浇灌她。
value: Use your heart, feel your connection with Gabriel, and nurture her with your ancient divine power.

name: 消灭怪物会随机掉落装备，留意小红点提示，及时换上新装备，就可以变得更强！
value: Pay attention to the small red dot prompt, and replace it with new gear in time!

name: 向左滑动，切换到下一页面
value: Swipe left to the next page

name: 希腊的神社在众神的守卫下得以保存，雅典的守卫者倪克斯击败了前来侵袭的巨型噬魂怪，并将它的核心剖出来，放到盒子里交给潘多拉保管。当伊利斯奉命将盒子交给潘多拉后，无法压制住自己好奇心的潘多拉，打开了盒子。。。
value: The Greek shrine was preserved under the guards of the gods. The guardian of Athens, Nyx, defeated the giant soul eater who came to attack and cut its core and put it in the box and handed it to Pandora. When Iris was ordered to hand over the box to Pandora, Pandora, who could not suppress his curiosity, opened the box...

name: 怎么这么麻烦？
value: Why go to all the trouble?

name: BOSS_OPEN_TIPS
value: Guild Boss unlocks.Go for a fight?

name: 女神觉醒界面使用，增加400点好感度
value: Use it in Angel Awaken Tab to increase Affinity by 100

name: 每天21点通过邮件发送排名奖励
value: Ranking rewards are awarded at 21:00 each day

name: 胜率已达80%，战胜BOSS，即可进入下一副本
value: Reach over 80% Win Rate to challenge the Boss,and go to next Dungeon

name: 可用于打造装备和神器
value: Used to craft gears and artifacts

name: 可来购买宝石
value: Used to make gems level up

name: 可在积分商店兑换稀有物品
value: Used to convert rare items in point store

name: FAST_FIGHT_FREE
value: Quick Combat for 2 hours is free now. Continue? (You are VIP{0} and you can purchase {1} more time(s) today)

name: 在这里可以进行不同类型的召唤，现在就试试吧~
value: Different types of <color=#FA931AFF>Summon</color> can be made here, try it now ~

name: 在这里可以进行不同类型的召唤，获得各类奖励。现在就试试吧~
value: Here you can make different types of <color=#FA931AFF>Summon</color> and get various rewards. Try it now ~

name: 觉醒会提升女神属性，并有机会让女神获得技能，赶快试试吧~~
value: Awake can improve Angel attributes and has the chance to get Skill.Try now~

name: 任务奖励包含大量钻石以及各类稀有道具，现在把它们全部领取吧~
value: <color=#FA931AFF>Quest rewards</color> include massive diamonds and rare items. Claim now~

name: 使用后增加1次boss扫荡次数
value: Sweep the current highest level Boss that can be swept.

name: 在切换地图的界面下，进行扫荡BOSS
value: Tap here to change map and sweep the Boss

name: 扫荡前一副本的BOSS,获得更好装备的可能性更大！
value: Sweeping Boss in the pre`vious dungeon is more likely to get better gear!

name: 自身的血量上限增加12%，攻击力增加20%
value: Increases self Max HP by 12% and increases ATK by 20%

name: 自身的攻击力增加22%，暴击值增加26%
value: Increases self ATK by 22% and increases CRIT by 26%

name: SUMMON_HERO_HAVE
value: Converted to {0} Shards when you already owned the Angel.\nThe shards can be used to awake Angels to get skills.

name: HERO_ARRAY_ADVENTURE_LIMIT
value: Angels in adventure can't deploy on fight

name: 我的大小姐，快一点吧，再晚了就抓不到妖怪了！
value: Please hurry up, my Lady! Or we can't catch the monsters anymore!

name: 妖怪才不会来这种人多的地方呢！挤死我了，小巴，咱们早点回家去吧。
value: Monsters won't come to such crowded place like this! The crowd is suffocating me. Bari, I want to go home now.

name: 别抱怨啦，你可是神选之人，怎么一点吃苦耐劳的精神都没有？！
value: Stop complaining, my Lady! Please remember you are chosed by God. Why don't you have any fighting spirit? !

name: 神选中我主要是因为颜值，又不是因为我能吃苦。
value: What? I am chosen because of my pretty face, not my fighting spirit.

name: 快看！舞台边上有几只妖怪，咱们悄悄过去消灭它们！
value: Look! There are some monsters beside the stage. Let's sneak up on them and wipe them out!

name: 总算没白来，赶紧抓完妖怪收工回家咯。
value: Luckily, we didn't come in vain. Let's catch those monsters quickly and go home.

name: 你看！就这么简单。下一个该你了
value: Look how easy it is! You're up next.

name: 好吧。神选之人终于要出手了，嘻嘻！
value: Well, looks like the chosen one is itching for a fight, heh heh!

name: 早说过让你不要同时召唤三个妹子！后果很严重的！！
value: I told you that you cannnot summon three Angels at the same time! You will get into trouble!

name: 别！别这么激动，我选一个还不行吗...
value: Oh! Don't be so excited. I'll pick only one of them now...

name: 就是她了！用剑的小姐姐最性感！哈哈~
value: I will go with her! Girls with sword are the sexiest! Haha.

name: 就是她了！会射箭的小姐姐最性感！哈哈~
value: I will go with her! Girls with arrows are the sexiest! Haha.

name: 就是她了！用魔法棒的小姐姐最性感！哈哈~
value: I will go with her! Girls with magic wand are the sexiest! Haha.

name: 这才乖嘛。恭喜你，今天的教学到此结束！
value: Great! Congratulations my Lady! Today's lesson is over.

name: 这么快就结束了？！真让人有点不适应啊...
value: It is already over?! I haven't really adapted to it…

name: 本公主心情大好，决定好好睡一觉。
value: Princess Bari is in a good mood. She decides to take a good sleep.

name: 巴里公主原来也这么难以琢磨...
value: It turns out Princess Bari is quite hard to understand…

name: 求求你，放我走吧，我想妈妈了...
value: Please let me go… I really miss my mom…

name: Auf keinen Fall! Du bist Gottes Auserwählte und es ist deine Pflicht, seine Aufgaben zu erfüllen.
value: Auf keinen Fall! Du bist Gottes Auserwählte und es ist deine Pflicht, seine Aufgaben zu erfüllen.

name: 可是我只是个来韩国旅游的学生，明天的返程机票早就订好了。
value: But I'm just a student traveling to Korea and I have already booked my round-trip ticket for tomorrow.

name: 不要在意这些细节，今天有重要的技能教给你：召唤天使！
value: Don't bother with those details. Today I'll teach you an important skill: Summon Angels!

name: 哇~~~这个小姐姐好酷，居然长着翅膀。
value: WOW! How pretty she is! And she has a pair of REAL WINGS!

name: 我早就说过这个很好玩。她叫加百列，是一位天使，未来她将永远跟随着你。
value: I told you that will be fun. She is Gabriel, an angel. And she will follow you in the future.

name: 对，她会陪着你战斗，消灭妖怪。
value: Yes. She will help you to destroy the monsters!

name: 果然三句话不离打妖怪...
value: You are always talking about monsters …

name: 这是神给你的使命，赶快让加百列和你一起并肩作战吧。
value: It's the task God had delegated you. Now let's go and fight alongside Gabriel!

name: 当胜率超过80％，我们就可以去挑战BOSS，只有打败BOSS，我们才能进入下一个关卡。
value: Reach over 80% Win Rate to challenge the Boss, beat the Boss, we can go to next Dungeon

name: 加百列果然厉害！很轻松就干掉了妖怪。
value: Gabriel is indeed powerful! It seems effortless for her to destroy all the monsters.

name: 是的，而你是加百列的主人，所以你才更厉害！
value: Yes! And since you are the master of Gabriel, you are more powerful.

name: 接下来，沿着这条路一直探索，还会遇到更多的妖怪，请消灭它们！
value: You will encounter more monsters as you venture down this road. You must vanquish them all!

name: 哈哈！有天使小姐姐做打手真棒。
value: Haha! It's so wonderful to have an Angel as a bodyguard!

name: 不是打手...天使是神派来帮助你的，和我一样。
value: Not a bodyguard… Angels are sent by God to help you, just like me.

name: 我知道啦，巴里公主是韩国著名的天使，神指引你来帮助我，所以我的旅游全泡汤了...
value: Yeah I know, Princess Bari, a famous Angel in Korea, has been sent by God to help me, then my travel plan is gone…

name: 你这家伙，怎么还记挂着旅游这种小事，你可是神选之人！
value: Why do you still remember such a little thing as traveling? You are the one chosen by God!

name: 好吧，好吧。请继续你的表演。
value: OK OK, please continue your presentation…

name: 小巴，我刚刚捡到了这个…看起来很厉害的样子。
value: Bari, look what I just found. It looks very powerful.

name: 这是击杀怪物掉落的武器，赶紧装备起来！
value: It's the gear dropped from killed monster. Equip it now!

name: 提升自己实力的诀窍就在这里！消灭怪物会随机掉落装备，我们看到小红点提示就要及时换上新的装备。
value: Here's the key to improving your power! Replace new gears in time when you see a red dot!

name: 果然感觉到力量更强大了。
value: Sure enough, I feel stronger now.

name: 是的，一定要记得经常更换最新的装备，这是你变强的诀窍。
value: Yes. Always remember to change to the newest gear. That's the secret of becoming stronger.

name: 现在打这些妖怪好轻松啊！
value: How easy it is to fight these monsters now!

name: 当心！他们只是小喽啰，我感觉前方有巨大的黑暗力量！
value: Watch out! They’re merely a bunch of minions. I sense an immense dark power up ahead!

name: 是的，干掉这些小BOSS，会得到很多奖励。神不会让你白干活的。
value: Yes, there are many rewards for killing the Boss. God won't let you work for nothing.

name: 好的，我明白了，是不是又该更换装备了？
value: Okay, I see. Is it time to change the gear again?

name: 真聪明呢！不愧是神选之人。
value: Clever! You're definitely the chosen one.

name: 换上新的装备后，力量真的很强大了！
value: With the new gear, I feel I am now stronger than ever!

name: 及时换上新装备，就可以变得更强！
value: When you see a red dot, you should equip the new gear to become stronger!

name: 打完妖怪，现在是不是可以回去休息了！
value: Area is cleared! Can we go home and take a rest?

name: 口误口误，我是说咱们今天早点休息吧，明天还要去日本呢。
value: It was just a slip of the tongue. I was saying that let's have an early rest today, because we have to go to Japan tomorrow.

name: 什么？！怎么突然就要去日本了？韩国我还没好好玩过呢。
value: What?! Japan? Why do we suddenly have to go to Japan???! I haven't had a good time in Korea yet.

name: 韩国的妖早就被我们消灭的差不多了，日本才是真正需要你去除妖的地方。
value: Korea's monsters has been almost eliminated by us. Now, Japan needs you more.

name: 天哪！还要去日本打妖怪？！
value: Gosh, we need to go to Japan to fight the monsters there?!

name: 对啊，机票我都买好了。早点休息吧，嘻嘻...
value: Yes, I've bought us the tickets. Take an early break. Ha ha…

name: 这里的妖怪要厉害很多，看来还得再加点帮手。
value: It seems that monsters here are much more powerful. I need more help!

name: 嗯呢~这次需要更高级的天使才行！!
value: Well, now we need more advanced angels!!

name: 啊?还有高级召唤？怎么不早说？
value: What? There are advanced summons? Why don't you say it earlier?

name: 咳咳，高级召唤，有机会获得高级天使。至于怎么做。。。还是我来教你吧~
value: Advanced Summon comes with higher chances to get high-level angels. Let me show you how to do it~

name: 好险啊，不过终于干掉BOSS了！
value: It is dangerous, but at last we killed that bastard!

name: 这片地区暂时安全了，我们赶紧去其他地区继续进行支援吧！
value: This area is safe for the moment. Let's go to other areas to help others.

name: 怪物越来越厉害了，再这样下去我们都会死在这里的！
value: The monster is getting more powerful. If it goes on like this, we will all die here!

name: 看来我们需要更加强大的神力！
value: It seems that we need stronger divine power!

name: 你忘了还有天使吗，她们体内隐藏着巨大的神力，只要觉醒就能释放！
value: Have you forgotten these angels? There is enormous divine power hidden in their bodies, which will be released by awakening!

name: 你不早说，快让她们觉醒吧！
value: You should say it earlier. Let's awake them!

name: 哪有那么容易？我们需要先去寻找天使觉醒需要的碎片，跟我来！
value: How can it be so easy? We need to find the Angel Shards first. Come with me!

name: 咦？我好像又召唤到一些命运女神的碎片，怎么使用呢？
value: Huh? It seems I’ve obtained a few Belldandy Shards again. What am I gonna do with it?

name: 已获得的天使，再次得到足够的碎片可以使她们觉醒，快拿这些碎片去觉醒天使吧！
value: Collect enough shards to awaken the Angels you’ve already owned. Quick, use these shards to awaken your angel!

name: 好！我马上试一试！
value: Well, I'll try it right away!

name: 获取了足够的女神碎片，现在可以觉醒女神了
value: You have enough Angel Shards and now you can <color=#FA931AFF>awake</color> the Angel

name: 点击选择觉醒目标
value: Select the Angel you want to <color=#FA931AFF>Awake</color>

name: 碎片数量足够，点击【觉醒】按钮进行觉醒
value: You have enough Angel Shards and click <color=#FA931AFF>[awaken]</color> to awaken the Angel

name: 现在之神，掌控一切！
value: God of Present! Take control of everything!

name: 好厉害，这就是觉醒的力量吗？
value: Great! Is that the power of awakening?

name: 走！我们继续清理日本的妖怪！
value: Go! Let's go on cleaning up the monsters in Japan!

name: 没错！我能感觉到她体内涌动的力量！
value: Sure. I can feel the power surging in her body!

name: 主人，有了这些女神之泪，就可以让天使们进阶了！！！
value: Master, Angels can be advanced with the tears of Angel!!!

name: 请你用心神感受与天使的联系，用神之力浇灌她。
value: Use your heart to feel your connection with Angels, and nurture her with your divine power.

name: 当前有免费召唤次数，召唤有几率直接获得女神~
value: Free <color=#FA931AFF>Summon</color> times remaining,<color=#FA931AFF>Summon</color> has the chance to get angels.

name: 在这里，每日都会刷新出不同星级的冒险，星级越高奖励越好
value: Daily <color=#FA931AFF>adventure</color> will refresh every day. Higher adventure stars means better reward.

name: 选择星级最高的冒险关卡，可获得最好的奖励
value: Select the highest star <color=#FA931AFF>adventure</color> to get the best reward.

name: 选择空闲的女神进行冒险
冒险已经开始，点击查看详细信息
value: <color=#FA931AFF>Adventure</color> has begun, tap to see details.

name: 每次冒险都会持续一段时间，但可以通过加速功能立即获得奖励（本次加速免费）
value: <color=#FA931AFF>Adventure</color> needs some time to finish, you can use <color=#6DCFF6FF>accelerate</color> to finish it right now!

name: 冒险已经完成，点击此处领取大量女神进阶的材料（本次冒险不计入每日次数限制）
value: <color=#FA931AFF>Adventure</color> finished, tap here to get the rewards.

name: 进入女神界面，用冒险得到的女神之泪，给女神送礼，使女神进阶
点击选择进阶目标
value: Select the angel you want to <color=#FA931AFF>promote</color>

name: 点击女神之泪，给女神送礼，提高女神好感度，好感度达到一定程度可以使女神进阶
value: Tap here to <color=#FA931AFF>send gift</color> to Angels to increase <color=#6DCFF6FF>Angel affinity</color>, Angels will be <color=#FA931AFF>promoted</color> when affinity reaches certain point.

name: 有“奇遇”冒险可参与，可获得大量升阶材料！赶快参与，过时不候！
先去更换装备，提高战斗力，然后再回来试试吧！
value: Can't beat the monsters? Try to <color=#FA931AFF>change gears</color> to get stronger!

name: 每天都可以进行BOSS扫荡，可获得大量稀有装备！
value: You can <color=#FA931AFF>Sweep Boss</color> every day to get powerful gears!

name: 扫荡前一副本的BOSS，获得更好装备的可能性更大！
value: <color=#FA931AFF>Sweep</color> the last Boss before current dungeon to get the best reward!

name: 有新的BOSS可以挑战了！快去战斗吧！
value: Challenge the new Boss! Fight now!

name: 女神有更好的装备，赶快换上吧！
MONTH_VIP_REFREASH_SHOP_TIPS
value: You have an extra free refresh, thanks to you are Monthly Card player.

value: Quick-combat finished! Following are the rewards

value: No longer show this reminder, automatically inherit. (You can rusume reminder in settings)

value: VIP LV.1 can claim rewards daily

立即获得80钻石\n以及价值988钻石的超值礼包

立即获得10钻石\n以及价值188钻石的超值礼包

value: You can sweep the story after first clearance

name: 给予敌人魔法属性的爆发伤害
value: Be careful of the high magic damage!

name: 隐藏在阴影的弓箭手
value: Shadow archers always appear in darkness.

name: 请注意敌人的魔法攻击
value: Be careful of the high magic damage!

name: 黑夜中的毒蛇
value: Shadow archers always appear in darkness.

name: 擅长使用法术对敌人造成伤害
value: Be careful of the high magic damage!

name: 注意躲避背后的暗箭
value: Shadow archers always appear in darkness.

name: 请注意敌人的武器攻击
从剧毒腐烂的泥土中钻出，他就是剧毒的化身。没有什么能抵挡住剧毒的入侵。请注意，剧毒术士的防御穿透极高。
value: Venomancers own ultra high DEF PEN

name: 具有丰富的狩猎经验，你会成为被狩猎的猎物吗？人面蛛魔有着超高的防御。
value: Man-faced Spiders have higher DEF than normal monsters.

name: 冰天雪地创造出的生命，跟随着暴风雪一同降临。冰魄雪女有着极致的命中和闪避，还有超幸运的暴击！
value: Incredible crit, much higher ACC and EVA. Ladies of Snow are dangers!

name: 以发为身，杀死无数少女；终身不老，浴血永驻青春。发鬼的血量超乎你的想象。
value: Hair Ghosts' HP are beyond your imagination!

name: 她是嫉妒的集合体，她敌视世上一切美好的实物。嫉妒之灵有着难以抵抗的攻击力。
value: Raccoon Spirits will make a very high level damage!

name: 蛇身九首，硕大无朋，所到之处均陷为沮泽！九头巨蟒拥有无尽的血量，超高的闪避，和极强的法术伤害。
value: Nine-heads snakes have endless hp, pretty high EVA and extremely high M.DMG!

name: 无视世俗眼光，探究禁忌的亡者魔法，没有什么可以阻止她得疯狂。死灵术士通晓禁忌魔法，一般的魔法可无法对她造成伤害。
value: Ordinary magic won't post any threat to Necromancers!

name: 带着对世界无尽的恨意从地狱中苏醒，破坏目之所及之物。返生木乃伊有着超高的暴击率和韧性。
value: Reborn Mummy has high level crit and FOR

name: 蛇组最强的守卫:“此处禁止通行！”蛇卫有着难以击穿的物理防御。
value: Snake Guards' P.RES is very troublesome!

name: 古墓仪式中最残忍的祭祀，她手上的人命不计其数。古墓祭祀有着令人害怕的伤害。
value: Tomb Priests will hit fritening damage!

name: 你能阻止僵尸的蔓延吗？狂暴的僵尸暴击率会大幅提升，并拥有很高的魔抗和物抗！
value: Can you resist the spread of zombies? Frenzy Zombies has extremely high crit, and very high P.DMG and M.DMG!

name: 她们的身体里流淌着犯罪的血液，满脑子只想着破坏，所以才被流放到极北之地。霜巨魔有着超高的物理防御穿透。
value: They are guilty of the blood of crime! Frenzy Zombies has suberb P.PEN!

name: 有可以觉醒的女神，觉醒可获得技能，并开启女神新形象，快来试试吧~
value: Angel Awakening available! <color=#FA931AFF>Awaken</color> an Angel to get a new skill!

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_1
value: Superb Killing Skills & Group HP recovery

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_2
value: High AOE M.DMG & Crowd Control Skill

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_3
value: High Magic AOE & Group HP Recovery

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_5
value: Superb AOE P.DMG & Double DMG with Ignite State

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_6
value: Superb AOE DMG & Continuous Ignite and Stun Debuff

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_7
value: Unstoppable Ultimate Skill & High Defence with Immune

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_8
value: Incredible DMG Absorption & High DMG Reflection

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_9
value: AOE P.DMG with True DMG & Stun State

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_10
value: Dominating Reaping Skill & AOE CRIT DMG

name: 弑神者！你打败了涅墨西斯？看来传言是真的！
value: God-killer! You actually defeated Nemesis? It seems that the rumor is true!

name: 还有一只虫子...受死吧！
value: You're just a bug… I'll kill you!

name: 不敢了不敢了...我不配做您的对手…
value: No… I'm no match for you…

name: 知道就好！我问你，你知道有什么办法能重回人间吗？
value: Finally got it, huh! Let me ask you, do you know any way to return to the Mortal Realm?

name: 逃出地狱啊...也许缪斯知道答案，虽然现在她疯掉了...呵呵呵呵…
value: Escape from hell… Maybe Muse knows the answer, but she's mad now… hah-hah…

name: 可以，不过你要先打倒这些怪物！
value: Well, I can tell you. But first, you have to defeat these monsters!

name: 这片峡谷是美杜莎的领地，非常危险！
value: This Canyon is Medusa's territory! It's quite dangerous!

name: 人首蛇身的恶魔，永远不要看她的眼睛，会被石化的！
value: A monster who has human's head and snake's body. Those who looked into hers eyes would turn to stone!

name: 不信你就去试试吧???反正我是不会进入峡谷的???如果你能活着的话，峡谷尽头有一片笼罩着迷雾的森林，飘荡着歌声的森林。
value: If you don't believe it, you can have a try. Anyway, I will not enter the canyon. If you can live after passing through the canyon, you can see a forest shrouded in mist at the end of canyon, where you can hear songs.

name: 循着歌声走，你就会找到缪斯的。祝你好运，我先溜了！
value: Follow the song and you'll find Muse. Good luck! I'll be taking my leave now!

name: 歌声啊...应该就是这里了吧…
value: The song… It should be here…

name: 是谁！竟敢打断我！是谁！！
value: Who is it? How dare you interrupt me! Who?!!

name: 人类~~~~，在这里的人类~~~~？你是~~~传说中的命运之子~~~~？
value: Human~~~~ human here~~~~？Are you~~~ the daughter of fate in legend~~~~？

name: ...命运之子是怎么回事？
value: … What is the daughter of fate?

name: 一个预言...流传已久的预言…~~~‘流淌着神之血脉的命运之子会战胜黑暗’?
value: A prophecy… a long-standing prophecy…~~~‘The daughter of fate with God's blood will defeat Dark Forces’?

name: 你知道如何逃离地狱吗？
value: Do you know how to escape from hell?

name: ~~~只有地狱的掌控者——路西法~~~，~~~才有办法?
value: ~~~ Only the master of hell—— Lucifer~~~,~~~ knows the way?

name: 路西法？他在哪里？
value: Lucifer? Where can I find her?

name: 那要等到什么时候！我现在就要见他！
value: When's that going to happen? I want to see her now!

name: ~~~命运如同指南针...要相信命运…
value: ~~~ The fate just like a compass…believe in the fate…

name: 比地狱更可怕的~~~，是我的歌声~~~（女神一展歌喉，唱出猪叫一样的歌声）
value: What is more terrible than hell~~~, is my songs~~~（The Angel starts singing like a pig）

name: 啦啦啦~~~，请告诉我~~~，去哪里找路西法~~~（女神在这一刻有如波澜哥附体）
value: Lalala~~~, please tell me~~~, where can we find Lucifer~~~

name: 哦~~~~我们伟大的领袖~~~~路西法~~~~~路西法~~~~~~！
就由我来为你唱，那神灵堕落的故事~~~~！
value: Let me sing for you about the story of goddesses' degradation~~~~！

name: 堕落的黑暗之神们~~~，偷了路西法的神器“黑弓”，他们准备用黑弓毁掉地球星核~~~！
value: The fallen Dark Goddesses~~~stole Lucifer's artifact [Black Bow], and they intended to use [Black Bow] to destroy the earth~~~!

name: 路西法非常生气~~~····如果你能带回被盗走黑弓的话，我想路西法会很高兴见你的~~~。
value: Lucifer was so angry~~~ If you can take the Black Bow back, I think she will be glad to see you~~~

name: 黑暗之神？这些邪恶的神在哪里？
value: Dark Goddesses? Where are these evil goddesses?

name: 血城堡~~~...他们躲藏在那里~~~…
value: Blood Castle~~~… they are hiding in there~~~…

name: 随后女神来到了血城堡，遇上了涅墨西斯和莉莉丝…
value: After that, the Angel came to Blood Castle and met with Nemesis and Lilith…

name: 只要拉动弓弦，属于黑暗的新世界就来临了！
value: Once the bowstring is pulled, the new world of darkness will come!

name: 哦？这里竟然有一个人类？
这不是那只碍手碍脚的虫子吗？！欢迎来到地狱！
value: Aren't you the bug that always gets in the way? Welcome to Hell!

name: 我绝不允许你们用黑弓做这种事！
value: I will never allow you to do this with Black Bow!

name: 哈！你，和你的世界，永远的在地狱中沉沦吧！！
value: Haha! You, and your world! Sink into hell forever!

name: 哟，原来你们在这啊。
value: Oh, so this is where you all are.

name: 在地狱尽头都能看到你们在打架。
value: I never dreamt that I'd see you all fighting at the edge of Hell.

name: 莉莉丝，涅墨西斯，你们是想用我的弓封印地球星核吗？
value: Lilith and Nemesis, do you want to use my bow to destroy the earth?

name: 咳咳...地球的毁灭已经开始了...路西法，你无法阻止！
value: (Cough)…The destruction of earth has begun… Lucifer, you can't stop it!

name: 讨厌的家伙！死到临头还嘴硬...
value: She's so annoying! To think she's still saying such things even when shes' dying!

name: 都结束了...路西法，请把我送回人间！
value: It's all over… Lucifer, please send me back to the earth!

name: 还没结束呢...虽然这两个家伙死了，但他们背后一定藏着某个庞然大物...而且，太阳之力依然很弱。革命尚未成功，少年们还需努力啊。
value: It's not over yet… Even though Lilith and Nemesis are dead, there must be something big concealed behind them… Also, the power of sun is still weak. It's not the time for you to rest now.

name: 闭上眼睛，要出发喽。
value: Close your eyes. We're about to set out!

name: 经过千辛万苦，女神终于来到了阿斯嘉德...为了得到永恒之枪的认可，女神通过了命运试炼?????就在太阳之力即将唤醒永恒之枪时，背叛奥丁的堕落之神出现了，念及亲族血脉而不忍心下杀手的奥丁被叛徒反弑而陨落??????
value: After undergoing many difficulties, the Angel finally arrived at Asgard… In order to obtain the Eternity Spear's approval, the Angel had to pass the Fate Trials…Just when the power of sun was about to awaken the Eternity Spear, the fallen Goddess who betrayed Odin appeared. Odin couldn't kill her because of family affection, and as a result, she struck down Odin...

name: 我，很高兴又见到你了！
value: I'm so happy to see you again!

name: 哦！重回人间的感觉真好！
value: Oh! It's great to come back to the earth!

name: 无论如何...我很高兴。
value: In any case, I'm very happy.

name: 这是哪里？怎么是一片废墟？
value: Where is this? Why is everything in ruins?

name: 你来了！我是奥丁！你的女神事迹已经广为流传！为了寻求你的帮助，我让路西法把你们传送到了这里！
value: Oh, you've come! I am Odin! Your Angelic deeds have been widely circulated! To obtain your help, I've asked Lucifer to send you here.

name: 堕落的黑暗之神涅墨西斯和莉莉丝想毁灭世界！
value: The fallen Dark Goddesses Nemesis and Lilith want to destroy the world!

name: 显然他们已经开始了，你在地狱的时候这里遭受了攻击。
value: Obviously they have already started. You were attacked in hell, after all.

name: 你曾沐浴在太阳神光中，就是使你燃烧坠入地狱的那种光。我需要你将太阳神光注入永恒之枪来唤醒枪灵！
value: You were once bathed in sun's divine light. It was that light that made you burn and fall into hell.I need you to pour the sun's divine light into the Eternity Spear to awaken the spear spirit!

name: 如何将光注入？握着它吗？
value: How do I do that? Do I just hold the spear?

name: 不不不！只用通过命运试炼的人才能触碰永恒之枪！
value: No! Only those who have passed the Fate Trials can touch the Eternity Spear!

name: 你已经通过了命运的试炼，永恒之枪已经苏醒，恭喜你，奥丁！
value: You have passed the Fate Trials and the Eternity Spear has reawakened! Congratulations, Odin!

name: 哈哈！快把永恒之枪给我！
啊！希芙！奥丁的女儿，你在干什么？
value: Sif?! Daughter of Odin, what are you doing?!

name: 我终于等到这一天了！永恒之枪是属于我的！
value: This day has finally come! The Eternity Spear is mine!

name: 希芙...我的女儿，你也要背叛我吗？
value: Sif…My daughter, are you going to betray me, too?

name: 背叛？呵呵...我从未忠于过你啊！
value: Betray you? I've never been loyal to you!

name: 伊顿！现在阿斯嘉德也是我们的了，对吗？
value: Idun! Now Asgard also belongs to us, right?

name: 哈哈！没错！我们可以用这把枪来征服整个世界！
value: Haha! That's right! We can use this spear to conquer the world!

name: 谁引诱你们堕落的？说出来，我可以饶你们不死！
value: Who seduced you to fall into degeneration? Tell me and I'll let you two live!

name: 呵呵呵...愚蠢遮住了你仅存的那只眼睛吗，奥丁？
value: Haha… Is it stupidity that covers your only remaining eye, Odin?

name: 我替他们回答吧...奥丁…
value: Let me answer for them… Odin…

name: 我们是神！不是愚蠢而又邪恶的人类的保姆！你早该放弃他们了！是你背叛了我们！
value: We are Goddesses! We're not babysitters to those foolish and evil humans! You should have given them up! You are the one who betrayed us!

name: 我不会放过你们的！！！
value: I will never let you all get away with this!

name: 瓦尔基里，我不会原谅你的…
value: Valkyrie, I will not forgive you, never!

name: 呵呵！当年纵横九界的神王奥丁去哪了？怎么弱到了这个地步？
value: Haha! Where is the powerful queen of Asgard, Odin? Why are you so weak now?

name: 瓦尔基里！你怎能这样...奥丁这么相信你…
value: Valkyrie! How can you do this… Odin trusted you so much…

name: 是啊，他相信我，所以呢？现在阿斯嘉德是我的了！这个世界也会属于我！去地狱和奥丁作伴吧！
value: Yes, she trusted me. So what? Now Asgard is mine! I will rule the world! Time for you to join Odin in Hell!

name: 我不推荐在地狱见面…
value: Hell is not a place I'd recommend to meet in…

name: 为了奥丁！瓦尔基里，我发誓会亲手杀死你！
value: For Odin! Valkyrie, I swear that I will kill you one day!

name: 那你要加油哟，我在阿斯嘉德的王座上等着你！现在我有要紧事去做，没空陪你们玩了，哈哈！
value: Then do try your very best. I'll be waiting for you while sitting on the throne of Asgard! Now, I have other urgent matters to attend to, so I won't be wasting more time entertaining you. Haha!

name: 我需要两位的帮助！请一定要保护好阿斯嘉德！
value: I need your help! Please, protect Asgard!

name: 咳咳...以为打败我就可以了吗？我的主人???请向这些卑微的蝼蚁展现真正的绝望与黑暗的力量！！
value: (Cough)…You think that everything will be fine once you beat me? My lord, please show the power of despair and darkness to these humble ants!

name: 小心脚下！阿斯嘉德在崩塌！小心！
value: Watch your step! Asgard is collapsing! Be careful!

name: 人类...愚昧无知的存在…
value: Human being… an existence of ignorance…

name: 黑暗之主...混乱之神...太古幽冥大君…
value: I am lord of darkness… goddess of chaos… queen of Nether world…

name: 阿斯嘉德的崩碎了，危急关头，创世之神女娲伸出援手，救下了女神。从女娲口中得知，唯有圣剑轩辕才能彻底消灭厄瑞玻斯，为此，女神走进了茫茫的昆仑山，踏上了寻剑之旅
value: Asgard was collapsing. In the critical moments, the Creation Goddess Nuwa saved Angel. From Nuwa, she knew that only Xuanyuan Sacred Sword could completely eradicate Erebus. For this reason, Angels walked into the vast Kunlun Mountains and embarked on a sword-seeking journey.

name: ...我是在做梦吗？你是谁？这是哪里？
value: …Am I in dream? Who are you? And where is this?

name: 我叫女娲，这里是我的神宫。我看到你从世界之喉跌下，就把你救了下来。
value: I am Nuwa and here is my shrine. I saw you fall from Throat of World and then saved you.

name: 世界之喉...你是说阿斯嘉德吗？
value: Throat of World… You mean Asgard?

name: 女娲大人，可以再说一遍您跟我说过的话吗？
value: Nuwa, could you please repeat what you said to me?

name: 创世之初，神分两极，阳者曰明，阴者曰暗，阴阳相合，万物生长，直到人类开始质疑神的权威…
value: At the beginning of the creation, the Goddesses were divided into two polarities: one was the Light, and the other was Darkness. With both Light and Darkness in balance, all in existence flourishes. Until one day, humans began to question the authority of the Goddesses...

name: ...所以世界是这个样子的…
value: …So this is why the world is like this…

name: 现在，能阻止厄瑞玻斯的只有你了，命运之子！
value: Now only you can stop Erebus, daughter of fate!

name: 有一个办法...找到曾经封印厄瑞玻斯的圣剑轩辕！
value: There is a way. That is to find Xuanyuan Sacred Sword which sealed Erebus in the past!

name: 在西王母的洞府昆仑山...不过西王母被厄瑞玻斯的力量腐蚀堕落了...但是我相信你，你一定能寻回轩辕剑的！
value: In Xiwangmu's shrine, Kunlun Mountain…Sadly, Xiwangmu was influenced by Erebus' power and has degenerated… Anyway, I trust you. I'm sure that you can find Xuanyuan Sword!

name: 可我不知道自己能不能行…
value: But I don't know whether I can do it or not…

name: 别担心...我从你眼中看到了力量与希望...经过神农、伏羲、祝融把守的关卡，你就能到达昆仑山。要记住，找到圣剑后要马上回来。
value: Don't worry… I see strength and hope in your eyes… After going through the Gates guarded by Shennong, Fuxi and Zhurong, you will arrive at Kunlun Mountain. Remember to come back soon once you find the Xuanyuan Sword.

name: 与女娲分开后，在昆仑天宫，遇见了神农…
value: After separating from Nuwa, the Angel met with Shennong in Kunlun Mountain….

name: 犯我境者，虽远必诛！
value: I will kill those who has invaded my territory, no matter how far they go!

name: 我只想过去...没办法了…
value: But I just want to pass by… Guess I've got no choice…

name: 太极生两仪，两仪生四象，四象生八卦！
value: Taiji generates two complementary forces, and two complementary forces generate four aggregates. Then the four aggregates generate eight trigrams!

name: 准备好进入火焰世界了吗？
value: Are you ready to enter the Realm of Fire?

name: ...我是来取轩辕剑的！
value: …I've come to take the Xuanyuan Sword!

name: 女娲大人！我找到轩辕剑了！
value: Nuwa, I've found the Xuanyuan Sword!

name: 干得好！听好，现在你的力量还不足以控制轩辕剑，从目前的状态来看，你只能使用一次，你必须把握好机会，给予厄瑞玻斯致命一击！
value: Well done! Now listen, you don't have enough power to control the sword at your present state. From what I can see, you can only use it once, so you must seize a good opportunity to strike a deadly blow to Erebus!

name: 快！现在使用轩辕剑！
value: Quick! Use the Xuanyuan Sword now!

name: 轩辕剑打歪了！厄瑞玻斯逃走了！
value: The Xuanyuan Sword missed! Erebus escaped!

name: 虽未击中命门，厄瑞玻斯还是受到了重创。在堕落天使的保护下，厄瑞玻斯遁入陨神峡谷，藏身其间修复创伤。女神紧随其后追至…
value: Although the attack missed the target, Erebus was still seriously injured. Protected by fallen Angels, she hid herself in Canyon of Fallen Goddesses to heal her wounds. The Angel gave pursuit…

name: 厄瑞玻斯逃走了！我们去追他吧！
value: Erebus escaped! Let's chase after her!

name: 你没事吧？是不是受伤了？
value: Are you ok? Have you been injured?

name: 你先休息，我去跟踪厄瑞玻斯！
value: Take a rest here. I'll follow Erebus!

name: 厄瑞玻斯被堕落的天使护卫着躲进了神之峡谷！
value: Protected by fallen Angel guards, Erebus entered the Canyon of Fallen Goddesses!

name: 我没事...现在是千载难逢的好机会...不能错过！
value: I'm fine… It's a rare opportunity… I can't miss it!

name: （我的能量波动好奇怪...好像混合着其他气息...）
value: (My power fluctuates strangely ... as if mixed with other things...)

name: （这种气息是...厄瑞玻斯的黑暗能量！）
肮脏的人类！我将净化你的灵魂！
value: Dirty human being! I will purify your soul!

name: 人类，接收命运的审判吧！
value: Human, accept the judgment of fate!

name: 聆听死亡的号角吧！放弃无谓的挣扎！
value: Listen to the horn of death! Give up the unnecessary struggle!

name: 你们不配称为神！
value: You are not worthy to be called Goddesses!

name: 大天使米迦勒！！到此为止吧！厄瑞玻斯在哪里？
value: Archangel Michael!! Let's put an end to this! Where is Erebus?

name: 神域怎允许卑鄙的人类涉足！离开！
value: Despicable human beings cannot enter the realm of Goddess! Go away!

name: 神？你们还自称为神？！你们是堕落的魔鬼！
value: Goddesses? You call yourselves goddesses?! You are fallen devils!

name: 人类竟然也敢冠冕堂皇的说堕落？！这一切都是因为你们！你们这些愚昧，贪婪，无耻，邪恶的蛀虫！只有黑暗才能彻底的净化世界！才能创造一个新的神国！没有人类！
value: How dare humans talk about degeneration?! All this is because of you! You are foolish, greedy, shameless and evil! Only darkness can completely purify the world! Only then can we create a new kingdom of goddesses! No humans in it!

name: 可人类是你们创造的啊！人类是你们的子民！
value: But humans are created by you! Humans are your people!

name: 这是我们唯一的污点！只有将你们抹去才能还世界清白！
value: This is our only stain! Only by eradicating humans can the world be innocent again!

name: 为了治愈轩辕剑带来的创伤，厄瑞玻斯找到了在地球核心休眠的万神之母盖亚，在杀死神母后，厄瑞玻斯吸收了盖亚的能量重生了……
value: To heal her wounds caused by Xuanyuan Sword, Erebus found Gaia, the mother of gods, who was dormant in the core of the earth. After killing her, Erebus absorbed Gaia's energy and was reborn…

name: 厄瑞玻斯回到母亲身边了，你是不可能阻止他的！
value: Erebus has returned to her mother's side. You cannot stop her!

name: 没错...他想要窃取母神之力来修复自己被轩辕剑打烂的身体。
value: Yes… She wants to steal Gaia's power to heal her body, which was hurt by Xuanyuan Sword.

name: 地球的深处...这将是一段漫长的旅途...
value: In the depths of the earth… It will be a long journey…

name: 住手！厄瑞玻斯！她可是你的母亲！
value: Stop! Erebus, she is your mother!

name: 只有你们人类才在乎所谓的亲情，被情感羁绊的你们是不可能成为永恒的神的！
value: Only humans care about the so-called family affection, and that's why you can not become eternal Gods!

name: 小心！！厄瑞玻斯吸收了盖亚全部的能量！
value: Watch out!! Erebus has absorbed all Gaia's energy!

name: 一切到此为止吧！
value: Let's put an end to this!

name: 不...为什么会是这样！为什么...母亲！！
终于...我们成功了！看，有光！光明正在回归！绝望的灵魂消失了！
value: Finally… we did it! Look, it's light! The Light is coming back! The desperate souls disappeared!

name: 嗯...太棒了...一切...都结束了...
不！发生了什么事！振作一点！不！
value: No! What's happening?! Pull yourself together! No!

name: 厄瑞玻斯释放了黑暗能量侵蚀了女神的神魂，黑暗妖女莉莉丝在女神精神世界中重生，女神意识中的七宗罪——傲慢’、‘嫉妒’、‘愤怒’、‘懒惰’、‘贪婪’、‘暴食’、‘淫欲’被无限放大。我们的女神，能战胜自己吗？
value: Erebus released a dark energy, eroding the Angel's soul, and the dark demoness Lilith was reborn in the Angel's spiritual world. Meanwhile, the seven deadly sins in her consciousness, 'Pride', 'Envy', 'Wrath', 'Sloth', 'Greed', 'Gluttony', and 'Lust' are infinitely magnified. Can the Angel defeat herself?

name: 这是哪...不是都已经结束了吗？巴里，巴里...你在哪？
value: Where is this...Isn't it all over? Bari, Bari…Where are you?

name: 咯咯！谢谢你还记得我！
value: Haha! Thank you for remembering me!

name: 死了对吗？呵呵呵，死亡只是人类世界才有的概念，神是不会死的！我们是永恒的存在！死亡？我们只不过是在物质世界暂时隐藏了痕迹而已。
value: Dead? Death is just a concept of human world. Goddesses will not die! We are eternal beings! Death? We just temporarily hide our traces from the physical world.

name: 莉莉丝...一阶都结束了...厄瑞玻斯已经烟消云散了，收手吧！
value: Lilith… everything is over… Erebus has vanished. Just stop.

name: 结束了？谁说的？呵呵呵，看看你现在的样子！不要再隐藏了，直面最真实的自己吧！
value: Everything is over? Says who? Haha, look at yourself! Stop hiding and be true to yourself!
