value: I used to feel helpless for losing my mighty divine power, but this is also the unpredictable nature of darkness.

name: 作为众神的信使与彩虹的化身，如闪电般的过人速度是我最自豪的优点。
value: As the messenger of the gods and the incarnation of the rainbow, lightning speed is my most proud advantage.

name: 我正在研究一种能够将绘画变为现实的魔法！你觉得怎么样？
value: I am working on magic that can turn painting into reality! What do you think?

name: 琵琶是一种优雅的东方乐器，它总能让人们得到心神上的安宁……
value: The Chinese lute is an elegant oriental musical instrument. It always makes people feel peaceful...

name: 战争带来痛苦，即使神明拥有永恒的生命，在末日中也只剩下空虚而已。
value: War brings suffering, and even if the gods have eternal life, there will only be emptiness in the end.

name: 啊啦……有兴趣和可爱又迷人的魅魔偶像签个新契约吗？
value: Hi! Are you interested in signing a new contract with the cute and charming succubus idol?

name: 喜欢我的熊吗？你怎么看待熊这种动物？
value: Do you like my bear? What do you think of animals like bears?

name: 我将来能成为一个拯救世界的英雄吗？
value: Will I be a hero who will save the world in the future?

name: 唉……神明之间打了几千年的战争，究竟有意义吗？
value: Alas... Does the war between the gods for thousands of years make sense?

name: 那个……如果我和巴里一样……穿巫女服……你觉得会是什么感觉？
value: Well... if I'm the same as Bari... and wear a witch costume... how do you think of it?

name: 你喜欢打棒球么？有没有兴趣和我较量较量？
value: Do you like playing baseball? Are you interested in competing with me?

name: 面对强大的魔物有时候也不得不使用弓箭去作战呐……怎样才能射得更准呢？
value: In the face of powerful monsters, sometimes I have to use bows and arrows to fight... How can I shoot more accurately?

name: 我很怀念在太阳炽热的夏天，痛快地打一场沙滩排球的日子。
value: I miss the days when I played a game of beach volleyball happily in the hot summer.

name: 死亡并不是谢幕，只是一次新的开始……你觉得呢？
value: Death is not an end, but a new beginning... What do you think?

name: 如果可以选择，你是想要永恒的生命，还是快乐的人生？
value: If you can choose, what do you want, eternal life or a happy life?

name: 你怎么看待英雄们背负的沉重命运？
value: What do you think of the heavy fate carried by the heroes?

name: 哼哼……猜猜看你今天的运气如何？
value: Hum... Guess what your luck is today?

name: 有喜欢的女孩子么？要不要本天才预言家帮你占卜一下和她的关系？
value: Is there a girl you like? Would you like me, a genius prophet, to help you predict your relationship with her?

name: 嘛……我已习惯因为不断预言灾厄，而被冷眼相看的命运了。
value: Well... I'm used to the fate of being treated with cold eyes because of constantly predicting disasters.

name: 啊啦……今天天气不错呢，有兴趣和我一块晒晒太阳吗？
value: Awww... The weather is nice today. Are you interested in basking with me?

name: 嗯……？我好像感受到了一阵炽热的目光在我身上游走呢……
value: Eh...? I feel a hot gaze on me...

name: 干涸的沙漠偶尔下一场倾盆大雨，真是让人感到舒畅！
value: The dry desert occasionally has a downpour, which is really refreshing!

name: （宁静）艺术之美，在于欣赏它的人是谁，你不这么认为吗？
value: The beauty of art lies in who appreciates it. Don't you think so?

name: （宁静）这个世界是最美的艺术品，愿它不要因战争而毁灭……
value: This world is the most beautiful artwork. May it not be destroyed by war...

name: （宁静）天地不仁，以万物为刍狗，你认同这句话的理念吗？
value: The universe is unconscious; it regards everyone as insignificant. Do you agree with ​​this sentence?

name: （宁静）你怎么看待我的音乐……以及我的性格？
value: What do you think of my music... and my character?

name: 你们这个时代真是够神秘的！我刚刚看见街边店铺的一个盒子里有人在说话！
value: Your age is really mysterious! I just saw someone talking in a box in a street shop!

name: 你晚上有空吗？有没有兴趣陪我去看一场烟火大会？
value: Are you free tonight? Are you interested in watching a fireworks display with me together?

name: 快来看！我捡到了好玩的东西！只要按这个按钮，就能记录下眼前的风景呢！
value: Come on! I found something fun! Just press this button, it can record the scenery in front of you!

name: 每个人都渴望预知自己的命运，然而他们有勇气去面对命运的残酷吗？
value: Everyone is eager to predict their own destiny, but do they have the courage to face the cruelty of fate?

name: 身为命运女神，我却无法记起自己的过去，也无法知晓自己的身份……
value: As the goddess of fate, I cannot remember my past, nor can I know who I am...

name: 你喜欢喝茶么？我很怀念世界末日没有到来前，每天平静的下午茶时刻……
value: Do you like drinking tea? I miss the peaceful afternoon tea time every day before the end of the world...

name: 即使我曾是大和神系的最强神明之一，也会失去神力，这实在令人遗憾……
value: Even though I was once one of the strongest gods of Yamato god pedigree, I would lose my divine power, which is really pitiful...

name: 人是什么，神又是什么，讨论这些无聊的称谓真的有意义吗？
value: What are mortals and what are gods? Does it really make sense to discuss these boring titles?

name: 其实，国家、王位、神权，这些在如今的我看来，早已一文不值了……
value: In fact, country, throne, and theocracy are all worthless to me nowadays...

name: 你觉得……这个世界上最有价值的东西是什么？
value: What do you think...is the most valuable thing in this world?

name: 你喜欢什么类型的女孩子？
value: What kind of girls do you like?

name: 你为什么最近和我聊天的时候总是走神？有什么心事吗？
value: Why are you always distracted when chatting with me recently? Is there anything on your mind?

name: 你喜欢小动物吗？小狗和小猫你更喜欢哪类？
value: Do you like small animals? Which kind do you prefer, puppies or kittens?

name: 同样作为掌管爱情、姻缘的神明，你觉得我和丘比特谁更优秀？
value: As a god in charge of love and marriage, who do you think is better, Cupid or me?

name: 战争也是缘分呢，命运没有交错的两个对手，是不会站在同一个战场上的。
value: War is also fate. Two opponents whose fate is not staggered will not stand on the same battlefield.

name: 即使想尽可能修复战争给大地带来的破坏，但失去神力的我终究难以做到。
value: Even if I want to repair the damage caused by the war as much as possible, it is difficult for me to do it after losing my divine power.

name: 果然还是晴天最棒了！在万里无云的晴空下晒太阳实在是很舒畅的事情。
value: Sure enough, sunny day is the best! It's really comfortable to bask in the sun under a cloudless sky.

name: 埃及很多寺庙里面都养猫，不仅是因为猫可爱，同时也是一种神圣的象征。
value: Cats are kept in many temples in Egypt, not only because they are cute, but also as a sacred symbol.

name: 不管什么时代，追随光明与正义的人，都会是最终的胜利者！
value: No matter in what era, those who follow the light and justice will be the final winner!

name: 你觉得我和天空之神努特谁更有魅力？
value: Who do you think is more attractive, me or the goddess of the sky, Nuit?

name: 即便是太阳，也有落下地平线的时刻，即便是神明，也有离开世界的那一天。
value: Even the sun has a moment falling behind the horizon; even a god has a day to leave.

name: 你喜欢埃及风格的服饰吗？
value: Do you like Egyptian style clothing?

name: 正义或邪恶只是一种说辞而已，决定世界的始终是力量的强弱罢了。
value: Justice or evil is just an excuse. It is the strength of the power that determines the world.

name: 无论世界遭遇了什么样的灾难，都不应放弃自己追求正义与光明的信念！
value: No matter what kind of disaster the world has encountered, one should never give up his belief in pursuing justice and light!

name: 我从不主张以战争的方式解决问题，但我也从不畏惧以战争的方式结束争端！
value: I never advocate solving problems by means of war, but I also never fear to end disputes by war!

name: 我一直在想，为了战胜更强大的敌人，与恶魔合作究竟是否是正确的行为。
value: I have been wondering whether it is right to cooperate with demons in order to defeat stronger enemies.

name: 和你相遇也有一段时间了，作为你的导师，见证你的成长也算是一种欣慰吧。
value: It's been a while since I met you. As your mentor, it's a relief to witness your growth.

name: 你问我为什么白天也一直提着灯笼？看来你不大了解我身为巫女的职责……
value: You ask me why I always carry a lantern during the day? It seems that you don't understand my duty as a witch...

name: 不管你的命运最终走上了怎样的道路，我都希望你不会犹豫自己的选择。
value: No matter what road you finally choose, I hope you will not hesitate to make your choice.

name: 其实我有时候也会想，我应该以什么样的身份来面对你……
value: In fact, sometimes I wondered, what kind of identity should I use to face you...

name: 大地是生命的源泉，即使我失去了大部分神力，大地也会重新赐予我力量。
value: The earth is the source of life, even if I lose most of my divine power, the earth will give me strength again.

name: 其实，我当初并不赞成天空之神努特参与这场末日之战……
value: Actually, I didn't approve of Nuit, the goddess of the sky, participating in this doomsday battle...

name: 王者始终是孤独的，这是我统治北欧众神这么长时间后，唯一真正的感受。
value: The king is always lonely. This is the only real feeling after I ruled the Nordic gods for so long.

name: 保护好世界树是北欧统治者义不容辞的责任，然而这并不是一件容易的事情。
value: It is the bounden duty of the rulers of Norse to protect the world tree, but this is not an easy task.

name: 我曾经在诸神的黄昏那场末日中战败，但我希望这种事不会再次发生。
value: I was defeated in the doomsday of Ragnarok. I hope that this kind of thing will never happen again.

name: 智慧是胜利的保障，战争需要无人能敌的勇者，也需要聪明过人的军师。
value: Wisdom is the guarantee of victory. We need not only unmatched brave men in the war, but also clever military counsellors.

name: 说实话，我在其他神明的眼中，曾经只是个不懂风情而冷漠的统治者罢了……
value: To be honest, in the eyes of other gods, I was just an unromantic and indifferent ruler...

name: 我所唱歌曲的魅力，真的强大到让人投海自尽吗……
value: Is the charm of the songs I sing really powerful enough to make people throw themselves into the sea...

name: 我很想去看看陆地上的景色，听说陆地上有美丽的草原，雄伟的山峰……
value: I really want to see the scenery on the land. I heard that there are beautiful grasslands and majestic mountains on the land...

name: 听说波塞冬大人苏醒在这个世界时，丢失了大部分的神力，这是真的吗？
value: I heard that Lord Poseidon lost most of her divine power when she woke up in this world. Is this true?

name: 我并不会对大地在战争中所受的灾难感到悲伤，这只是一场必要的考验而已。
value: I will not feel sad about the disasters that the earth has suffered in the war, this is just a necessary test.

name: 和你相处的这段时间里，相对于同伴的关系，我感觉自己更像是你的长辈。
value: During the time I got along with you, I felt more like your elders than companions.

name: 作为一个凡人，你却要背负解决这场灾难的重任，命运对你未免太苛刻了……
value: As a mortal, you have to carry the heavy responsibility of solving this disaster. Fate is too harsh on you...

name: 你喜欢花草还是树木？每次作战结束后，我总会在战场上种下各种植物。
value: Which do you like better, flowers or trees? After each battle, I always plant various plants on the battlefield.

name: 在被召唤到这个世界时，我丢失了绝大部分神力，这不得不说是一种遗憾……
value: When I was summoned into this world, I lost most of my divine power, which I have to say is a pity...

name: 弥诺陶洛斯的迷宫……真的这么容易走出来吗？
value: Minotaur's labyrinth... is it really so easy to get out of it?

name: 为了贯彻自己的理念而选择壮烈牺牲，你认为这值得吗？
value: In order to pursue your own ideas, one chooses to sacrifice. Do you think it is worthy?

name: 喂，你认为把现实世界和梦境合二为一的想法如何？
value: Hi, what do you think of the idea of combining the real world and dreams into one?

name: 你觉得……我能成为同伴们可以依赖的强者么？
value: Do you think... I can become a strong person that my companions can rely on?

name: 如果为了变强而不择手段，你认为是值得的吗？
value: Do you think it is worth doing whatever it takes, in order to become stronger?

name: 如果你有了读心的能力，会想去偷偷阅读中意之人的思绪吗？
value: If you have the ability to read people's mind, would you want to secretly read the thoughts of the person you like?

name: 真是有够无聊的！来打一架练练手吧！
value: It's so boring! How about fighting with me? It will be a good practice!

name: 火焰……你怎么看待这种美丽而危险的东西？
value: Flame... what do you think of this beautiful but dangerous thing?

name: 和人类讲道理真是麻烦！难道有什么事情不能打一架能解决吗？
value: It is really annoying to reason with humans! Is there anything that can't be solved in a fight?

name: 呐，你觉得这身木乃伊风格的装束如何？
value: Hi, what do you think of this mummy-style costume?

name: 你会像众神一样，期待拥有永恒的青春吗？
value: Are you looking forward to having eternal youth, like the gods?

name: 你觉得金苹果这件宝物……真的会引发神明间的战争吗？
value: Do you think the precious golden apple... will really trigger a war between the gods?

name: 如果我是凡人，容颜终将随时光一并流逝，还能够拥有爱情么？
value: If I were a mortal, my beauty would fade away by the passing time, can I still be in love?

name: 多彩的音乐和美妙的诗词，你更喜欢哪种艺术呢？
value: Abundant music and beautiful poetry, which art do you prefer?

name: 哼哼……咱闻到了喜欢的东西呢！你带了小鱼干对吧？！
value: Humph... I smell something I like! You brought fish, right? !

name: 人类不管见到什么妖怪……都会害怕吗？
value: Are human beings afraid of whatever monsters they see...?

name: 喂喂！人类都喜欢称自己是喵咪的主人吗？主人这个词是什么意思？
value: Hey! Do humans like to call themselves the master of cats? What does the word master mean?

name: 耳朵和尾巴可是难得一见的宝贝呐！想摸摸看吗？
value: Ears and tails are rare treasures! Do you want to touch it?

name: 呐……不管是神还是人，看上去都有自私的一面喵。
value: Ah... Whether it's a god or a human, everyone seems to have a selfish side.

name: 作为妖怪喵，你觉得我的力量强大吗？
value: As a demon cat, do you think my power is strong?

name: 没想到，曾经作为最强神明之一的我，也会如凡人般失去力量……
value: I have never expected that I, once one of the strongest gods, would lose power like a mortal...

name: 这场神明间的战争究竟什么时候才会结束呢……
value: When will this war between the gods end...

name: 在所有的花卉中，我格外喜欢荷花，你呢？
value: Of all the flowers, my favorite is the lotus. What's yours?

name: 你怎么看待亲人之间的血缘关系，你认为血缘真的那么重要吗？
value: What do you think about the bond between blood relatives? Do you think such relationships are more important than others?

name: 不仅仅是我自己，我也会背负整个大韩神系的使命，就和巫女巴里一样。
value: I will take on the mission of the entire Korean Divine. Just like Princess Bari, I will do my best to protect the people of Korea.

name: 这场浩劫毁灭了多少家庭，又让多少父母与孩子失散异地……
value: How many families have been destroyed by this catastrophe and how many parents and children have been separated...

name: 我其实想了很久，我和你究竟应该是怎样的关系……
value: What kind of relationship do you want with me? I've wanted to know for a long time.

name: 你相信神明真的能够回应人们的祈祷，帮助人们脱离困境吗？
value: Do you believe that the gods can really answer people's prayers and save them from trouble?

name: 嗯……似乎在所有的同伴中，只有我成功被召唤到这个世界了……
value: Hmm... It seems that among all my companions, only I have been successfully summoned into this world...

name: 你问我怎么看这场世界末日带来的灾难？其实我不太关心这些啦……
value: You ask me how I see the disaster brought by this end of the world? Actually, I don't care much about this...

name: 啊……你的名字可真难记……每次都要想很久才能记起来！
value: Ah... Your name is really hard to remember... It takes a long time to remember it every time!

name: 미노타우로스를 잘 아시나요? 저희 둘 중에 누가 힘이 더 강할까요?
value: Do you know Minotaur? Do you think who has the stronger strength if I compete with her?

name: 你问我的神力从何而来？据我所知道的来看，似乎源于人们的信仰？
value: You ask where my divine power comes from? As far as I know, it seems to be derived from people's beliefs?

name: 你想和谁约会？
value: Who do you want to date?

name: 祝您武运昌隆。
value: I wish you good luck and prosperity.

name: 你需要直面它。
value: You need to face it directly.

name: 放弃并不是坏事。
value: Giving up is not a bad thing.

name: 真理带来智慧。
value: Wisdom can only be found in truth.

name: 想看你的作品！
value: I want to see your works!

name: 战争总有原因。
value: There is always a reason for war.

name: 想试试看！
value: I want to give it a try!

name: 呃，我恐怕没空。
value: Uh, I'm afraid I have other things to do.

name: 我不太在意谎言。
value: I don't care much about lies.

name: 想听你唱一首。
value: I want to hear you sing.

name: 要我唱给你听吗？
value: Do you want me to sing it to you?

name: 你想守护的人是？
value: Who do you want to protect?

name: 勇者总有好运的。
value: The brave always have good luck.

name: 不应急于求成！
value: I don't like to rush for success!

name: 人不应纠结过去。
value: Do not tangle in the past.

name: 我会远离风暴。
value: I will stay away from the storm.

name: 下一场战斗你上？
value: Are you in the next battle?

name: 你想的太简单了。
value: What you think is too simple.

name: 没必要自责。
value: There is no need to blame yourself.

name: 人需要面对未来。
value: People need to face the future.

name: 这并不容易。
value: That sounds like a heavy burden.

name: 我认为没有分别。
value: I think there is no difference.

name: 我认为有此分别。
value: I think there is a difference.

name: 至少我认为重要。
value: At least I think it is.

name: 我毫无遗憾可言！
value: I have no regrets at all!

name: 我打赌有去无回。
value: I bet it's a mission with no return.

name: 您想找回神力吗？
value: Do you want to regain your divine power?

name: 我将与您共进退！
value: I will be always at your side.

name: 希望您赐我勇气。
value: Hope you can grant me courage.

name: 希望去那里看看。
value: Hope to go there and have a look.

name: 说服她为我效力。
value: I'll persuade her to work for me.

name: 你觉得该怎么做？
value: What do you think I should do?

name: 愿你武运昌隆。
value: Wish you good luck in the war.

name: 求之不得！
value: This is a most welcome opportunity.

name: 我愿听你说说看。
value: I would like to hear you talk about it.

name: 你挺适合当偶像。
value: You are quite suitable to be an idol.

name: 律法也有瑕疵。
value: There are imperfections in the law.

name: 我会尽力帮助你。
value: I will try my best to help you.

name: 对敌人很有效！
value: It's very effective against the enemy!

name: 你已经很个性啦！
value: You already have a strong personality!

name: 我还是习惯白天。
value: I'm still used to the daytime.

name: 的确，兵贵神速。
value: Indeed, speed is precious in war..

name: 总感觉会撞上啥。
value: I feel like you will hit something.

name: 您能教我演奏吗？
value: Can you teach me to play?

name: 您想演奏一曲吗？
value: Do you want to play it?

name: 昨天不刚签过吗？
value: Didn't you just sign it yesterday?

name: 总感觉有阴谋……
value: I feel that there is a conspiracy...

name: 戴副不错的眼镜？
value: Wear a good pair of glasses?

name: 打伞有些麻烦……
value: Holding an umbrella is a bit troublesome...

name: 我不太懂艺术。
value: I don't know much about art.

name: 至少我有勇气。
value: At least I have the courage.

name: 不是很喜欢……
value: I don't like it very much...

name: 我想应该是爱？
value: I think it should be love?

name: 我想应该是你。
value: I presume you are the one.

name: 我将全力帮助你。
value: I will do my best to help you.

name: 看来你心情不错。
value: You seem to be in a good mood.

name: 你在自言自语啥？
value: What are you talking to yourself?

name: 很少见你失落……
value: It's rare to see you lost...

name: 这并不容易做到。
value: This is not easy to do.

name: 想取回神力吗？
value: Do you want to regain the divine power?

name: 我并不在意孤独。
value: I don't care about being lonely.

name: 我会全力帮助您。
value: I will try my best to help you.

name: 智者难成……
value: It's hard to be a wise man...

name: 至少传说如此……
value: At least the legend said it is...

name: 其实我想听听看！
value: Actually I want to hear it!

name: 我以为你能上岸。
value: I thought you could come ashore.

name: 你想恶作剧啦？
value: Do you want to play a prank?

name: 至少在梦里可以。
value: At least in dreams you can.

name: 好像有人叫我！
value: It seems someone is calling me!

name: 至少在希腊会。
value: At least in Greece it will.

name: 至少在我这里能。
value: At least I can give you love.

name: 你鼻子可真灵……
value: Your have such a sensitive nose...

name: 你自我感觉呢？
value: How do you feel about yourself?

name: 你想取回力量吗？
value: Do you want to regain power?

name: 我很擅长冲浪！
value: I am very good at surfing!

name: 呃，我遇水即沉。
value: Eh, I will be drowning in water.

name: 我会尽快结束它！
value: I will end it as soon as possible!

name: 悲伤并没有意义。
value: Feeling sorry for them can't change anything.

name: 灾难必有终结。
value: This disaster must have an end.

name: 嗯……同伴？
value: I see you as a companion.

name: 嗯……家人？
value: Thoughts of family come to mind when I think of you.

name: 恐怕不见得。
value: No, the gods don't care about us.

name: 可你回应了召唤。
value: But you responded to the summon.

name: 牛记性都这样么……
value: Do all bulls have such a good memory...

name: 呃，我不想回答……
value: Uh, I don't want to answer...

name: 令人振奋的回答呢！爱情不正是因为重重磨难而显得珍贵吗？
value: Good answer! Doesn't love appear precious because of many hardships?

name: 没必要用那么沉重的语气回答我！有我在的话，至少你不会在爱情的问题上倒霉。
value: There is no need to answer me in such a heavy tone! Because I'm here, at least you won't be unlucky on the issue of love.

name: 就是说嘛 ！如果神与人的身份会阻止伟大的爱情，我宁愿不当神明了！
value: Exactly! If the identity of gods and humans will prevent great love, I would rather not be a god!

name: 唉……或许你是正确的吧，毕竟这样的爱情终将随着人类短暂的生命而消逝。
value: Well, perhaps you are right. After all, this kind of love will eventually disappear with the short life of mankind.

name: 啊啦……你要是不告诉我，我就把你的名字写在箭上，闭着眼睛射出去啦！
value: Aah, if you don't tell me, I will write your name on the arrow and shoot it out with my eyes closed!

name: 那么你想给哪个幸运的女孩子来一箭呢？等等？！你为什么要把箭对着我？！
value: So which lucky girl do you want to give an arrow? Wait, why is the arrow pointing at me?!

name: 所以你永远会和我一起，去击碎那些虚伪的爱情，对吧？！
value: So you will always be with me to crush those false love, right? !

name: 当你遇到连统治世界这样的权力，也肯为她而放弃的女孩子后，你就明白了。
value: When you meet a girl who will make you be willing to give up even the power to rule the world, you will understand that.

name: 真的？！那太好了！我最近当爱神有些倦怠了，正想找个人替我一阵子呢！
value: Really? That's great! I'm a bit tired of being a god of love recently, and I'm looking for someone to replace me for a while!

name: 要我亲自来教你吗？抓住我的手慢慢拉开弓……哎呀，你在碰哪儿呢！
value: Do you want me to teach you in person? Grab my hand and slowly pull the bow away...Oh, where are you touching!

name: 哎呀……你……你怎么这么突然……我一点心理准备都没做好……
value: Oh, why you so suddenly ask me? I'm not mentally prepared at all...

name: 谁……谁都行……我的意思是 ……和你约会也是可以的哦……
value: Anyone is ok...I mean, it's okay to date with you...

name: 本……本来就是这样！就算你话说得再好听，我也不会对凡人的赞美感到欣喜的！
value: That's just the way it is! No matter how pleasant your words are, I won't be happy with the praise from mortals!

name: 和那些喜爱拥有惊艳花色的人不同……你倒是挺让我感到意外的。
value: You are different from those who love flowers with beautiful colors, which surprised me a lot..

name: 看来你是个不相信命运的人呢，很久没有凡人敢于对抗命运了……
value: It seems that you are a person who does not believe in fate. It has been a long time since no mortal dared to fight against fate.

name: 那个人最好别是你，不然你可就有苦头要吃了……呵呵……
value: You'd better wish that person is not you, otherwise you will have to suffer a lot in the future.

name: 这里又没有其他人，没必要这么拘谨地回应我啦……
value: There is no one else here, you don't need to feel stiff to respond to me.

name: 虽然只有我们两人！但这只是个私人的邀请罢了！不要多想！
value: Although there are only two of us! But this is just a personal invitation, don't think too much!

name: 哼，战场上我从不手软，但你若希望我仁慈对待敌人，我……我也并不反对就是……
value: I'm never soft on the battlefield. But if you want me to treat the enemy with kindness, I don't object to it.

name: 呵呵……已经有很多人和我说过这句话，并跟随我上战场了，想知道他们的故事吗？
value: Haha... Many people have already said this to me and followed me on the battlefield. Would you like to know their stories?

name: 你说……说什么呢！我……我可不在乎一个凡人对我的仰慕！
value: What are you talking about! I don't ...don't care what a mortal admires for me!

name: 呵呵……是啊，这个世界看重的是力量，在此之前，你愿意成为我的剑与盾吗？
value: Haha...Yes, what this world prizes ​​is power. Before that, would you be willing to be my sword and shield?

name: 你……你和其他人不同！你可是我亲自挑选的，亲自认可的人！
value: You are different from everyone else! You are the one I personally selected and personally recognized!

name: 神明向来各自为战，但你却能让敌对的神明团结起来，这也是我感到惊讶的。
value: The gods always fight in their own way, but you can unite the opposing gods, which is also a surprise to me.

name: 你说的没错，我会重新让自己摆脱恐惧的，向往自由的心比什么都最重要。
value: You are right, I will get rid of my fear again. The desire to be free is more important than anything else.

name: 虽然有些不甘心，但每次见到你的时候，能否飞翔仿佛也变得不再重要了……
value: Although a little unwilling, every time I see you, it doesn't seem to matter whether I can fly or not...

name: 我也这么觉得，战场上的英雄如果知道他可能失败，那么他是无法冲锋陷阵的。
value: I think so. If a hero knows that he might fail in the battlefield, then he cannot charge.

name: 有些时候的确如此，而且这种鲁莽所带来的代价也是沉重的……
value: Sometimes this is true, and the cost of such recklessness is also heavy.

name: 我一直认为自己是个勇敢的人，但谨慎地思考问题好像不是我的长处……
value: I have always considered myself a brave person, but it seems that it is not my advantage to think carefully about problems...

name: 有些事情，想的越多反而越让人感到迷茫，简单地思考其实也不错。
value: For some things, the more you think about it, the more confused you will be. It is also good to simply think about it.

name: 所以优秀的艺术家也应该是优秀的发明家，成为这样的人一直是我的理想呢！
value: Therefore, a good artist should also be a good inventor. I always dream to be such a person!

name: 我这双人造的翅膀就是一件奇特的发明！它难道不是艺术与创造的完美结合吗？
value: My artificial wings are a peculiar invention! Isn't it a perfect combination of art and creation?

name: 我的作品都是以自己为原型的人体艺术……但是给你看的话……我倒也不介意……
value: My works are all body art based on myself...But if it is you, I don't mind showing you that.

name: 雕塑只能自己感悟啦，不过如果你有兴趣的话，我很乐意当你的模特！
value: Sculpture can only be understood by yourself, but if you are interested, I would be happy to be your model!

name: 未必，我在希腊见过很多人类英雄，他们完全有能力在战场上和神明一较高下！
value: Not necessarily, I have seen many human heroes in Greece. They are fully strong enough to compete with gods on the battlefield!

name: 有很多妖怪或是魔物也具有接近永恒的生命……可它们好像也不算是神……
value: There are many monsters and demons whose lifespan close to eternity, but they don't seem to be gods either.

name: 寒冷往往能带给智者们冷静和理性的心，我很欣慰你能喜欢这个季节。
value: Cold can often bring calm and rational hearts to the wise. I am very pleased that you can like this season.

name: 虽然人们往往把寒冷和死亡想到一起，但冰雪在世界万物中，却是永恒的象征……
value: Although people often think of cold and death together, ice and snow are eternal symbols in the world...

name: 很多伟大的人类英雄都是如此，他们簇拥无数的荣耀 ，但却从不被他人理解。
value: Many great human heroes have faced like this. They are surrounded by countless glory, but they are never understood by others.

name: 我从没想过自己会对一个人类感兴趣，不过和你相处的日子好像也挺有意思……
value: I never thought I would be interested in a human being, but the days with you seem to be quite interesting.

name: 很庆幸你也这么想，这个世界需要的是理性和秩序，而非混乱和破坏。
value: Fortunately you think so. What the world needs is rationality and order, not chaos and destruction.

name: 但大多数的原因都很无理，我希望你能和我一样，冷静思考每一次战斗的意义。
value: But most of the reasons are unreasonable. I hope you can calmly think about the meaning of every battle like me.

name: 她是我们三姐妹中脾气最糟的，性子很急但处事热情爽快，但和人类的关系还不错。
value: She is the worst-tempered of our three sisters. She is very anxious but enthusiastic and refreshing, and she has a good relationship with humans.

name: 他是我们三姐妹中头脑最好的，曾有很多赏金猎人去讨伐她，但一个都没回来过……
value: She has the brightest mind of our three sisters. There have been many bounty hunters to fight against her, but none of them have come back...

name: 方法很简单，把你冰冻起来，你就能和我一样拥有永恒的青春了，这不是很美妙么？
value: The method is very simple. Freeze yourself, then you can have eternal youth like me. Isn't this wonderful?

name: 明智的决定，人类或许能获得永恒的生命，但却可能为此付出更大的代价……
value: Wise decision. Mankind may be able to obtain eternal life, but it may pay a greater price for it...

name: 奇怪的家伙呐……或许这也是为什么我愿意在你面前敞开心扉的原因吧……
value: Strange guy... Maybe this is why I am willing to open my heart in front of you...

name: 我不知道……但至今为止，没有人会像你这样无时不刻地陪伴我……
value: I don't know...but so far, no one will accompany me like you all the time...

name: 啊啦！真是个坦率的家伙呢！希望今晚我们能有个愉快的回忆。
value: Oh! What a frank guy! Hope we can have a pleasant memory tonight.

name: 喔？让我猜猜……难道是要去见其他的女孩子？
value: Well, let me guess... Are you going to meet other girls?

name: 可惜的是我自创世之初到现在为止，并没有见过多少人类愿意说真话……
value: It's a pity that I haven't seen many human beings willing to tell the truth from the beginning of my creation until now...

name: 呵呵……是吗？那么猜猜看，我现在说的这句“我爱你”是真的还是假的？
value: Oh, really? Then guess, I am saying I love you, is that truth or a lie?

name: 作为神明，我挺羡慕人类能享受在午后的太阳下，和恋人逛街约会的时光。
value: As a god, I am quite envious that humans can enjoy the time shopping and dating with lovers in the afternoon sun.

name: 黑夜总是充满神秘和暧昧的气氛，很适合二人独处呢……话说回来，你今晚有空吗？
value: The night is always full of mystery and an ambiguous atmosphere, which is quite suitable for two to be alone… Anyway, are you free tonight?

name: 有意思，那么就让我看看你的善良是否真的能拯救这场灾难吧。
value: That's interesting. Then let me see if your kindness can really save this disaster.

name: 我很欣慰你认识到了这一点，不管如何，我只喜欢强者……
value: I'm very pleased that you realize this. Whatever happens, I only like the strong...

name: 啊啦！那么用你的直觉猜猜看，今晚你和我在房间里会发生点啥“麻烦”呢？
value: Well, then use your instinct to guess, what trouble will happen to you and me in the room tonight?

name: 呵呵……是个冷静的家伙，不过在我的魅力下，你的冷静又能坚持多久呢……
value: Haha! You are a calm guy, but under my charm, how long can you stay calm...

name: 意料之内的答案呢，现实中的悲剧已经够多了，希望你能为这场灾难带来转机……
value: The answer is to be expected. There are enough tragedies in reality. I hope you can bring a turn for this disaster...

name: 真是出乎我的意料，我可不希望你变成一个性格悲观灰暗的家伙！
value: What a surprise, I don't want you to become a pessimistic guy!

name: 从今往后我都会怀念今天和你一起看过的月亮，希望你也不要忘却今日的约定……
value: From now on I will miss the moon that we saw today, and I hope you will not forget today's promise...

name: 你没有必要这么快给我答复……我会一直等，直到你完成自己的使命后……
value: You don't need to answer me so quickly. I will wait until you complete your mission.

name: 感谢你一直以来对我的信任，我会在最激烈的战场上保护好你的身后。
value: Thank you for your trust in me all the time, and I will protect your back on the deadly battlefield.

name: 那么请至少允许我在战争结束前，每晚向月亮祈求你的平安。
value: Then at least allow me to pray to the moon for your safety every night before the war is over.

name: 它们非常喜欢和人类亲近，是一群很讨人喜爱的家伙呢……
value: They like to get close to humans very much. They are so lovable guys...

name: 嗯……以你的性格，或许会更喜欢一些凶猛而野性的家伙，我猜的没错吧？
value: Hmm... With your personality, you might prefer some fierce and wild guys, right?

name: 等这场战争结束后，我们便一起回我的故乡吧，那里永远没有末日和灾难。
value: After this war is over, let's go back to my hometown together, where there will never be apocalypse and disaster.

name: 我明白……你在这个世界上，或许有永远也不能舍弃的事物吧……
value: I understand that you are in this world, maybe there are things you can never give up...

name: 我应该感谢能够与你相遇，这或许是命运给我这个孤独的人最大的安慰了。
value: I should be grateful for meeting you. Maybe this is the greatest comfort that fate has given a lonely person.

name: 凡人们叹息短暂的生命，但他们又怎么会明白永恒的寂寞……
value: Mortal people sigh for the short life. How can they understand the eternal loneliness...

name: 那么在我的膝上躺下，闭上你的眼睛静静地听吧，祝你一夜好梦……
value: Then lie down on my lap, close your eyes and listen quietly. Wish you a good night...

name: 嗯，如果是你的话，我很乐意……
value: Well, if it were you, I would be happy to listen.

name: 呵……下次让我看看你在战场上的勇猛吧。
value: Well, next time show me your bravery on the battlefield.

name: 当你的家园被入侵时，你会明白这种感受的。
value: Only those who have had their homeland invaded would understand.

name: 哼……你确实也是个能让人安心的家伙……
至今为止，我从未让北欧的同伴们失望过。
value: So far, I have never let my Nordic companions down.

name: 我拒绝回答，但……但以后你会知道的……
value: I refuse to answer, but... you will know in the future…

name: 那……那你呢？你希望守护的人是谁？
value: Then, what about you? Who do you want to protect?

name: 我发誓……绝不会让这种事再次发生在这个世界。
value: I swear... Never let this happen again in this world.

name: 也好，你不会想知道那场灾难有多惨烈……
value: Well, that's ok, you don't want to know how tragic the disaster was...

name: 我……我才没担心！我只是……只是随便说说罢了！
value: I wasn't worried. I was just... pointing it out.

name: 下次如果没有我的保护，不要再这样冒险了！
value: If you don't have my protection next time, then don't take risks like that again!

name: 你的意思是……你愿意和我一起找回我的力量吗？
value: What do you mean... Are you willing to regain my strength with me?

name: 不错的意志！你让我看到了我年轻时的影子……
value: Nice will! You let me see my old time when I was young...

name: 看来你不像我一样是个急性子的家伙，或许你比我更适合当一个统帅。
value: It seems that you are not a short temper guy like me, maybe you are more suitable to be a commander than me.

name: 所以人类只要不断地磨练自己，终有一天能够达到神明的强大境界！
value: Therefore, as long as human beings continuously hone themselves, one day they will be able to reach the mighty state of gods!

name: 即使是永恒的生命，人类也能够通过魔法与神祈做到，我自己就是一个成功的例子！
value: Even for eternal life, human beings can do it through magic and praying. I am a successful example of that!

name: 我宁愿在战场上为自己的理念而牺牲，人活着的意义不就是为了贯彻自己的理念吗？
value: I would rather sacrifice for my own ideas on the battlefield. Isn't the meaning of a person's life to implement their own ideas?

name: 希望你也能够在战场上找到自己活着的意义和价值，并为自己的理念而战！
value: I hope you can also find the meaning and value of your life on the battlefield, and fight for your own ideas!

name: 我也这么想，什么样的装束不是重点，关键是你是否具备巫女的智慧与武士的意志！
value: I think so too. What kind of costume is not the point, the key is whether you have the wisdom of a witch and the will of a samurai!

name: 哼！很快我就会在战场上向你证明，我也是一名拥有不屈意志的合格武者！
value: Well, soon I will prove to you on the battlefield that I am also a qualified warrior with an indomitable will!

name: 我就知道我可以信任你！我很期待你作为统治者的才能和勇气！
value: I knew I could trust you! I look forward to your talent and courage as a ruler!

name: 如果是别人这样对我说，我绝不会认同，但不知为什么，我总觉得你说的没错……
value: If someone else said to me like this, I would never agree. But I don't know why, I always think you're right...

name: 和我想的一样呢！就算女孩子也有坚强和威严的一面嘛！
value: Same as I thought! Even girls have a strong and commanding side!

name: 在你的面前，我多多少少还是会在意一点的了……
value: In front of you, I would care more about it...

name: 和大部分人类不同，你比我想象中更为理性，或许和你合作是一个正确的决定。
value: Unlike most humans, you are more rational than I thought, and maybe it is a correct decision to cooperate with you.

name: 是么？你是第147位说出这句话的人类，猜猜看前146个家伙的命运如何？
value: Really? You are the 147th human to say this. Guess the fate of the last 146 guys?

name: 很欣慰听到你认同我的观点，或许你真的有能力成为众神的领导者。
value: I am very pleased to hear that you agree with my point of view, maybe you really have the ability to become the leader of the gods.

name: 愤怒只会让人头脑发热罢了，但如果能驾驭自己的愤怒，或许也能拥有强大的力量。
value: Anger will only make your head hot, but if you can control your own anger, you may also have powerful power.

name: 某种角度上你没说错，在击败来讨伐我的那群笨蛋后，我的力量确实提升了不少。
value: In a way, you are right. After defeating the group of idiots who came to crusade against me, my strength has indeed improved a lot.

name: 所以你还需要多长时间，才能结束这场神明间的世界大战？
value: So how long will it take you to end this world war between the gods?

name: 这个脾气暴躁的家伙醒过来可不是什么好事，意外的是她和人类相处得还不错……
value: It's not a good thing for this grumpy guy to wake up. Surprisingly, she gets along well with humans...

name: 你没事最好别去惹她，她要是心情不好，你可能就要被冻在冰块里度过余生了……
value: If you're fine, don't mess with her. If she is in a bad mood, you may be frozen in ice for the rest of your life...

name: 神也有诞生和毁灭，也需要遵循世间的规则，神并非真理，只是很强的存在罢了。
value: God also has birth and destruction, and he also needs to follow the rules of the world. God is not the truth, but just a strong existence.

name: 在我观念中，只有想成为神的人才会这么说，看来你也是个有野心的家伙呢……
value: In my opinion, only those who want to become gods would say this. It seems that you are also an ambitious guy...

name: 除了竞争对手外。我很期待和你之后的关系，那个……更深入一点的关系也可以……
value: In addition to competitors. I am looking forward to the relationship with you in the future, that... a deeper relationship can also be...

name: 你太迟钝了！我们合作了这么久，你都没有察觉出来吗……
value: You are too slow! We have been working together for so long, haven't you noticed it...

name: 没问题！这次我可不会像上回那样，因为大意输给你了！
value: no problem! This time I won't be like the last time, because I lost to you carelessly!

name: 终于轮到我出场了吗？！等着看我把敌人烧成烤肉吧！哈哈哈！
value: Is it finally my turn to play? ! Wait to see me burn the enemy into a barbecue! Hahaha!

name: 我看上去像是会手下留情的人吗？！没有比击败敌人更让我兴奋的了！
value: Do I look like a merciful person? ! Nothing excites me more than defeating an enemy!

name: 就算是魔物，也要给一个和平解决问题的机会嘛，虽然大部分时候都没用就是了。
value: Even if it is a monster, it must be given a chance to solve the problem peacefully, although it is useless most of the time.

name: 作为你的同伴，我挺高兴听到你这个统帅认同我的看法，哼哼……
value: As your companion, I am very happy to hear you, the commander-in-chief, agree with me, hum...

name: 没什么奇怪的，踏上这个世界的战场时，我早就没有任何对生命的留恋了。
value: It's no surprise that when I stepped onto the battlefield of this world, I had no longer any nostalgia for life.

name: 她是个满口智慧、战略的家伙，不过要真论打架的话，她肯定打不过我！
value: She is a wise and strategic guy, but if you really want to fight, she will definitely not be able to beat me!

name: 那个冷冰冰的家伙太无趣了，在她身边我可一秒钟都呆不下去！
value: That cold guy is so boring, I can't stay by her side for a second!

name: 所以，你作为众神的统帅，必须要具备比他们还强大的勇气！
value: Therefore, as the commander of the gods, you must have courage stronger than them!

name: 想得太复杂反而没意义，没有勇气，你如何在成神的途中直面困难和恐惧？
value: Thinking too complicated is meaningless. Without courage, how do you face the difficulties and fears on the way to becoming a god?

name: 没想到吧？！我的手艺可一点也不逊于你们人类的顶级厨师！
value: Didn't expect it? ! My craftsmanship is not inferior to your top human chefs!

name: 嗯……我想想……大多数的料理我都喜欢，不过最喜欢的当然还是烤肉！！
value: Hmm... let me think... I like most of the dishes, but of course, the roast meats are my favorite! !

name: 确实，自责没有任何意义，作为光明与希望的象征，我需要重新振作起来！
value: Indeed. Self-blame has no significance. As a symbol of light and hope, I need to cheer up again!

name: 你说的没错……即使曾经身为太阳的主宰，现在也需要与同伴一起面对这世界末日。
value: You are right...Even if you were once the ruler of the sun, you still need to face the end of the world with your companions.

name: 抱歉，我似乎有些过度沉湎于以前的时光了，希望没有给你带来困扰。
value: Sorry, I seem to be over-indulged in the passing time. I hope it didn't bother you.

name: 如你所言，人们都期望找回过去的和平，我们必须终结这场灾难！
value: As you said, people expect to find a peaceful life like in the past, so we must end this disaster!

name: 不管如何，我始终相信理念的差异可以通过和平，而非战争的方式得到统一。
value: Anyway, I always believe that differences in ideas can be unified in a more peaceful way, not war.

name: 我能理解危急关头需要立刻解决的困境，但我依旧希望你慎重对待任何一场战争。
value: I can understand the dilemma that needs to be resolved immediately in a crisis, but I still hope that you treat every war with caution.

name: 到那时，大和神明将承担起维护众神间和平的职责，世界将永远不再有矛盾和争执。
value: At that time, the Yamato gods will take the responsibility of maintaining peace, so the re will be no disputes anymore.

name: 但我一定会完成这个使命，你没感受到吗，命运让我降临在这个世界就是为此。
value: But I will definitely complete this mission. Do you feel it? That's why destiny made me come to this world.

name: 虽然我和你所处的时代不同，但我对自己纺织和设计服装的技巧可是很有自信的！
value: Although I live in a different era from you, I am very confident in my skills in spinning and designing clothes!

name: 虽然在帮您量身高和三围时……要麻烦您“坦诚相见”，但我们的关系应该无碍……
value: Although when I measure your height and measurements, you need to be frank with me, I think our relationship should be fine for that...

name: 呵呵，当一个人连死亡也不再畏惧时，他将不再有任何弱点，你很快就会明白的……
value: Haha, when a person feels no fear of death, he will no longer have any weaknesses. You will soon understand...

name: 你是我见到的最理性的凡人了，我们今后的合作或许会比较有趣……
value: You are the most rational mortal I have ever met. Our future cooperation may become more interesting...

name: 所以无论人类或神明，都应在活着时遵循既定的命运，为自己的死亡做好准备……
value: Therefore, no matter it is mortal or gods, they should follow fate while they are alive and prepare for death...

name: 喔？是吗？我很乐意看看作为死亡的代言人，你能不能逃得出我的手掌心……
value: Oh, really? I would like to see if you, as the spokesperson of death, can escape from me...

name: 明智的回答，计谋就是计谋，善良与邪恶不过都是一种说辞和借口罢了。
value: A wise answer. A strategy is just a strategy, to differ them as good or evil is just a kind of rhetoric and excuse.

name: 看来和我不同，你更愿意用拳头和力量来解决矛盾……我该赞扬你的荣耀感么？
value: It seems that you are different from me. You are more willing to use your fists and strength to resolve conflicts... Should I praise your sense of glory?

name: 你没说错，但遗憾的是，这句话只在这个强者活着的时候有效……
value: You are right, but unfortunately, this sentence is only valid when the strong man is alive...

name: 啊，难以相信我会从凡人嘴里听到这话，没错，其实你会发现死亡是最公平的规则。
value: Oh, it's hard to believe that I would hear this from mortals. That's right, you will find that death is the fairest rule in the world.

name: 是啊……多少英雄们为荣耀而献出生命，这样迎来死亡倒也是一种艺术……
value: Yes...see how many heroes lost their lives for glory. Death in this way is also an art...

name: 死亡会抹去一切，再伟大的英雄所创造的荣耀，也会随崇拜者的逝去而消散吧……
value: Death will erase everything. Whatever how great the glory was made by the hero, it will fade away with the passing of admirers...

name: 从你的表情看来……是不是觉得人生中最大的遗憾是少了女孩子的陪伴？
value: Look at your reaction...do you think that the biggest regret in life is the lack of a girl's company?

name: 啧啧……看看你身边那些对你崇拜到家的女孩子们，你的人生确实没什么遗憾的了。
value: Well, look at the girls around you, see how they admire you. You really have no regrets in your life.

name: 以你强大的战斗力，再危险的地方也能回来，当然，站着还是躺着另当别论……
value: With your strong power, you will return from any dangerous place. Of course, it is another matter of which way you come back, whether it is standing or lying down...

name: 嗯……出发之前你最好穿上最厚的盔甲，不然我不保证你能“完整”地回来……
value: Hmm... you'd better put on the thickest armor before you leave, otherwise I don't guarantee that you will come back completely...

name: 明智之举！当你死后接受我的审判时，我保证你会长个心眼……
value: You made a sensible choice! When you go on my trial after you die, I promise you will know more...

name: 放心，比你想象中好玩得多……尤其是你亲自把讨厌的家伙踹下深渊的时候……
value: Don't worry, it's much more fun than you think...especially when you kick the nasty guy down the abyss...

name: 我倒不反感战争，一场战争带来的亡者，能让我冷清的宫殿热闹好几个月……
value: I don't feel repulsion for war. The dead people caused by war can make my lonely palace bustling for months...

name: 喔？我们打个赌吧，看看这场世界末日能不能结束于你所引导的战争。
value: Well, let's make a bet and see if this doomsday can end with the war you lead.

name: 啊啦，那今晚你有空么？有无兴趣来我的房间体验一下死神“有魅力”的一面……？
value: Uh-hum, are you free tonight? Are you interested in experiencing the charming side of the god of death in my room?

name: 真是让我失望，看来今天晚上我有必要惩罚一下你这个不懂情调的家伙了……
value: It really disappoints me. It seems that I need to punish you tonight who doesn't understand the romance...

name: 大自然有时候确实会带来灾难，但这是上天指示的命运，并非人为的灾祸。
value: Nature does sometimes bring disasters, but this is a destiny directed by heaven, not a man-made disaster.

name: 虽然你时常在战场上拼杀，但我很清楚，你所做的一切也是为了尽快终结战争。
value: Although you often fight on the battlefield, I know that everything you do is to end the war as soon as possible.

name: 希望你和女孩子相处的时候别太急躁，女孩子生气起来可比天漏了还可怕……
value: I hope you don't get too impatient when you get along with girls. Girls get angry even more terrible than the heaven cracks...

name: 喔，是吗？那么你一定很擅长追女孩子了，和女孩子相处可需要不少耐心……
value: Oh, is it? Then you must be very good at chasing girls. It takes a lot of patience to get along with girls...

name: 我很欣慰你能认同，万事万物都有既定的命运，而自然无时不刻掌控着它们。
value: I am very pleased that you can agree. Everything has a destiny, and nature controls them all the time.

name: 其他人我一定不觉得能成功，不过如果是你的话……或许有小小的可能性吧。
value: I certainly don't think other people can succeed, but if it is you... maybe there is a small possibility.

name: 你的好意我心领了，然而没有必要这样做，因为这是大自然要我面对的命运。
value: I appreciate your kindness, but there is no need to do so, because this is the destiny that nature wants me to face.

name: 嘻嘻……还从没有凡人对我说过这样的话……你知道这意味着什么吗？
value: Haha... No mortal has ever said something like this to me...Do you know what it means?

name: 相信我，在经历了无数的冒险和刺激过后，你会觉得平淡的日子是一种享受的。
value: Believe me, after experiencing countless adventures and excitement, you will feel that dull life is a kind of enjoyment.

name: 你也这么认为吗？！今晚有没有兴趣来我的花园看看我亲手种植的盆栽？
value: Do you think so too?! Would you be interested in coming to my garden tonight to see the potted plants I plant?

name: 哼……希望你确实能有这个觉悟，毕竟正义之举需要超凡的勇气。
value: Humph... Hope you can really have this consciousness. After all, justice requires extraordinary courage.

name: 勇气源自于你的理念，当你的理念坚不可摧时，战场上将没有敌人能够阻挡你。
value: Courage comes from your consciousness. When your consciousness is unassailable, nothing can stop you on the battlefield.

name: 我现在就可以送你去天堂，不过有去无回，想试试么？
value: I can send you to heaven right now, but there is no return. Do you want to have a try?

name: 这我可不清楚，但从地狱硫磺火坑每天传出的惨叫声来看，应该是个挺刺激的地方。
value: I don't know, but judging from the screams from the sulfur fiery pits of hell every day, it should be a very exciting place.

name: 你觉得毁灭这个世界的真的是恶魔吗？还是潜藏在人或神心中的邪念呢？
value: Do you think it is really the devil who destroys this world? Or it is the evil thoughts hidden in the hearts of people or gods?

name: 我也不知道，倒不如说我希望看到有一天你能解决这个问题。
value: I don't know either, but I'd rather say that I hope you can solve this problem one day.

name: 你在开玩笑么？！如果是真的话，我一定要给你几拳确认你不是在做梦！
value: Are you kidding me? ! If it is true, I must give you a few punches to confirm that you are not dreaming!

name: 我很乐意找个唱诗班每天对她唱圣歌，唱上个几百年，直到她受不了认罪悔过为止。
value: I would be happy to find a choir to sing hymns to her every day for hundreds of years, until she can't stand then pleads guilty and repents.

name: 作为众神的统帅，果敢与理性缺一不可，但理性是一切正确判断的前提！
value: As a commander of the gods, courage and rationality are all needed, but rationality is the prerequisite for all correct judgments!

name: 你……你要做什么？！周围的人……都在看着我们呐！再……再不放手我要生气了！
value: What... what are you going to do? ! The people around us.. They are watching us! I'm going to be angry if you don't let go!

name: 所以，下一场战斗是什么时候？我很期待与强敌在战场上拼杀的时刻。
value: So, when is the next battle? I am looking forward to fighting against powerful enemies on the battlefield.

name: 一切荣耀归于英灵殿，希望在您的指挥下我们能够战无不胜！
value: All the glory belongs to Valhalla. We hope that we can be invincible under your command!

name: 其实由于我体内集合了众多女武神们的灵魂，所以我能运用她们每个人的作战技巧。
value: In fact, because I have gathered the souls of many Valkyries in my body, I can use the combat techniques of each of them.

name: 没问题！以指挥官您的资质和悟性，学会这些技巧并不是什么难事！
value: No problem! With you- commander's aptitude and perception, it is not difficult to master these skills!

name: 我也不清楚原因，但在顺应您的召唤而降临时，似乎所有的姐妹们都产生了共鸣。
value: I don't know, but when I arrived in response to your summon, it seemed that all the sisters resonated.

name: 当然会，但遇到争执的时候，我们会在冥想中打一架，谁赢了就听谁的。
value: Of course we will, but when we encounter disputes, we will fight in meditation, and we will listen to whoever wins.

name: 我们女武神是优秀的战士，但很可惜，我们并不是优秀的军师。
value: Our Valkyries is an excellent warrior, but unfortunately we are not good military counsellors.

name: 毋庸置疑，从我们之前胜利中，已经证明了您策略的合理性。
value: Undoubtedly, from our previous victories, you have proven the rationality of your strategy.

name: 是的！那是一座拥有无比魅力的壮观建筑，也是北欧所有女武神所在的圣殿。
value: Yes! It is a spectacular building with great charming, and it is also the sanctuary of all the Nordic Valkyries.

name: 是啊！如果想体验的话，可以今晚来我的房间……我保证您会喜欢上这段时光的……
value: Yep! If you want to experience it, you can come to my room tonight...I promise you will enjoy...

name: 喔对了，打造的时间会有些漫长，你可能得耐着性子等上两三百年……
value: Well, it may take a long time to craft, maybe for two or three hundred years...

name: 如果运气不好，神器会带有诅咒，不过放心，死不了人的，顶多让你做几天噩梦……
value: If you are unlucky, the artifact may bring curses. But don't worry, it won't kill you. At most, you will have nightmares for a few days...

name: 但如果没有武器，善良之人又如何抵御邪恶的入侵呢？
value: But if there are no weapons, how can a kind person resist the invasion of evil?

name: 或许你是对的，武器应当用于保卫家园，而非入侵和掠夺弱者。
value: Perhaps you are right. Weapons should be used to defend our homeland, not to invade and pillage the weak.

name: 和你勇猛善战的性格很像，兵贵神速，没有比快速突击敌方弱点更有效的战术了。
value: It is very similar to your brave and skillful character. Speed is precious in war. There is no more effective tactic than to quickly assault the enemies' weaknesses.

name: 挺让我惊讶的，我一直没发现你射箭的水平有如此之高！
value: It surprised me. I never realized that your archery level is so high!

name: 我可以自夸地说，至今为止我所制作的武器，可从来没有出过任何问题！
value: I can boast to say that there have never been any problems with the weapons I have made so far!

name: 是的，一名工匠往往要拥有打造成百上千件装备的经验后，才能成为一代名师。
value: Yes, a craftsman often needs to have the experience of building hundreds of equipment before he can become a master of a generation.

name: 我就知道你从来都不会让我失望，没有比世界末日更容易创造一个新秩序的机会了。
value: I know you never let me down. There is no better opportunity to create a new order in doomsday.

name: 啊啦……你瞒不住我，你早就有将各大神系神明收入麾下的野心了，对吧？
value: Well, You can't shield it from me. You already have ambitions to command all the gods, right?

name: 真的么？你不是在安慰我吧？不过就算你只是安慰我，我也挺高兴的就是了……
value: Really? Are you comforting me? But even if you just simply comfort me, I'm pretty happy...

name: 啊啦，统治世界之后，就算我是恶魔，不也可以名正言顺地和你每天呆在一块了么？
value: Ah, after rule the world, even if I am a devil, I can stay with you justifiably every day, can't I?

name: 是么，小可爱？那么为什么现在和你在这里亲密交谈的是我，而不是别的女孩子呢？
value: Really, my little one? So why is it me that is talking to you intimately here, not other girls?

name: 啊啦……真是个诚实的家伙呢，今晚有兴趣来我的房间，陪我度过漫漫长夜么？
value: Ah...what an honest guy, are you interested in coming to my room tonight and spending a long night with me?

name: 是啊，我很有兴趣和她们好好亲热亲热，比如她们中那个叫米迦勒的家伙……
value: Yes, I'm very interested in making friends with them, such as the guy named Michael...

name: 真让我惊讶！我可从没想过你真的能接受这么极端但明智的建议呢！
value: It surprised me! I never thought you could really accept such extreme but wise advice!

name: 嗯……你的身材也很适合跳舞呢！有兴趣让我教教你吗？
value: Hmm...your figure is also suitable for dancing! Are you interested in learning from me?

name: 哼哼……舞蹈可不仅是表演，如果搭配上武器的运用，可是非常致命的进攻手段！
value: Hum...Dance is not only performance. If it is combined with the use of weapons, it can become a very deadly offensive method!

name: 你运气不错呢！这枚特殊的硬币送给你作为纪念吧！别小瞧它，带着可会有好运喔！
value: You are lucky! Give this special coin to you as a souvenir! Don't despise it, you will have good luck with it!

name: 太遗憾了是正面，看来作为胜利女神，哪怕是猜硬币，我也从来不会输给任何人呢！
value: Unfortunately, it came down heads. It seems that as the goddess of victory, even if tossing a coin, I will never lose!

name: 我会以此为荣的，我很期待能够在未来的战斗中，继续尽力地支持同伴们。
value: I will be proud of this. I look forward to supporting my companions as best as I can in future battles.

name: 我……我其实很早就有这样的想法了……只是……只是不好意思和大家说……
value: I... I actually had this idea a long time ago... I just...just too shy to tell others...

name: 我并不反对你这样说，但如果没有律法，世间的万事万物都将失去原则和公平。
value: I do not oppose you saying this, but if there is no law, everything in the world will lose principle and fairness.

name: 我很欣慰您作为众神的指挥官，能够明白律法对于军团的重要性。
value: I am very pleased that you, as the commander of the gods, are aware of the importance of the law to the army.

name: 审判永远跟随着为恶者的命运，他们永远无法逃脱复仇女神的脚步。
value: The trial always follows the fate of the evil ones. They can never escape from the goddess of vengeance.

name: 人类是我见过的最狂妄的种族，但或许正是这样，才让人类拥有了改变命运的机会。
value: Humans are the most unbridled and conceited race I have ever seen, but perhaps it is this that allows humans to change their fate.

name: 自古正义难成，但我绝不会因此而退缩，罪恶不尽，复仇不止。
value: Justice has been difficult to reach since ancient times, but I will never flinch from it. As far as the crime is endless, the revenge is endless.

name: 我并不希望你背负和我的命运，复仇和正义都太沉重了，我更愿意看到你的微笑。
value: I don't want you to bear the destiny with me, because revenge and justice are too heavy. I would rather see your smile.

name: 我倒想去掉这能力，因为相对于提升战斗力，我更在意不能与中意的人四目相对……
value: I want to get rid of this ability, because instead of improving combat power, I care more about not being able to face the person I like...

name: 看来你已经有喜欢的女孩子了啊，如果拥有这样的力量，就不能好好欣赏她了。
value: It seems that you already have a girl you like. If you have such skill, you can't look at her well.

name: 嗯……这样啊……那么下一个问题是，你会介意人类与蛇发女妖之间的恋情么……
value: Hmm...well...then the next question is, do you mind the love between humans and the Gorgon...

name: 啊……但这样好像反而让我对这种禁断之恋更憧憬了呢……
value: Ah... but this seems to make me even more yearning for this forbidden love...

name: 是么？！那么我想知道，这个时代年轻的人类女孩子喜欢穿什么样的时装？
value: Are they? ! Then I want to know, what kind of fashion do young human girls like to wear at this time?

name: 啊……你这么说我还挺不好意思的！看来内在和性格才是最大的魅力吗……
value: Ah... I'm embarrassed to hear that! It seems that inner and personality is the greatest charm...

name: 今晚有兴趣陪我聊聊么？或许克里特岛的葡萄酒可以让我们享受一个美妙的夜晚。
value: Are you interested in chatting with me tonight? Perhaps the wines from Crete can make us enjoy a wonderful evening.

name: 人类于黑暗中诞生，却向往光明，这实在是一件有趣的事情……
value: Human beings were born in the dark, but yearn for the light. This is really an interesting thing...

name: 是啊，或许命运也希望我不要过多干涉这个世界的纷争……
value: Yes, maybe destiny also hopes that I will not interfere too much in the disputes in this world...

name: 啊啦……至今还没有人类对我说过这句话，但若你愿意，我很期待和你共度的时光。
value: Ahh.. no human beings have said this to me yet, but if you want, I am looking forward to spending time with you.

name: 就是说嘛！虽然我的战斗力并非最强，但战争最重要的可是侦察和通信呐！
value: Yes, you are right! Although my combat power is not the strongest, the most important thing in war is reconnaissance and communication!

name: 不会发生这种事的！如果不信的话我可以抱着你一块飞，让你亲眼见识一下！
value: It will never happen! If you don't believe me, I can fly with you and let you see it with your own eyes!

name: 下次我来画一张你的写生！这样我们的战斗力就可以增加一倍啦！
value: Next time I will draw a sketch of you! In this way, our combat power can be doubled!

name: 有兴趣学吗？！我也可以教你哟！不过我得先确认你的绘画技巧不会太糟……
value: Are you interested in learning? I can teach you! But I have to make sure that your drawing skills are not too bad...

name: 等这场灾难结束后，我很乐意在余下的时光中和你研究琵琶与乐理。
value: After this disaster is over, I will be happy to study the Chinese lute and music theory with you for the rest of the time.

name: 乐器的演奏需要宁静的心与优雅的氛围，如果你想听的话，晚上来我的房间好了……
value: The performance of musical instruments requires a tranquil heart and an elegant atmosphere. If you want to listen, come to my room at night...

name: 如果是由你来统领众神，平息战争的话，这一天或许能尽早到来……
value: If it is you to lead the gods and quell the war, this day might come as soon as possible...

name: 你说得对，消沉只会埋没希望和决心，与其叹息，不如向这末日的命运抗争。
value: You are right. Depression will only bury hope and determination. Instead of sighing, it is better to fight this doomsday destiny.

name: 啊……作为地狱的头号偶像和路西法的首席先锋，莉莉丝最近的业绩又不够啦！
value: Well... As hell's number one idol and Lucifer's leading pioneer, Lilith's recent performance is not enough!

name: 别多疑啦！如果你愿意签的话，莉莉丝很乐意给你开一场单独的演出喔！
value: Stop being suspicious! If you are willing to sign, Lilith is happy to give you a solo show!

name: 大自然的力量总是值得信任和依靠的，在战场上她可比我更能打呢！
value: The power of nature is always worthy of trust and reliance. She can fight better than me on the battlefield!

name: 啊啦……在战场上，不少敌人在被她拍晕前也是这么说的呢！
value: Well, on the battlefield, many enemies said the same before being stunned by her!

name: 哼哼……看看这逐渐觉醒的力量，我迟早会成为同伴们认可的领袖！
value: Hum...Look at this awakening power. Sooner or later I will become the leader recognized by my companions!

name: 怎么感觉你对我没什么信心，要我给你一拳证明一下吗？！
value: Why I feel that you have no confidence in me. Do you want me to give you a punch to prove it? !

name: 看来神与人确实没什么差别，英雄也会为贯彻正确的理念而战斗的。
value: It seems that there is no difference between gods and humans. Heroes will also fight to implement the correct ideas.

name: 我也这么想，有时间天天打架，不如坐下来喝杯红茶，玩一局扑克。
value: I think so too. Instead of wasting time fighting every day, I'd rather sit down and have a cup of black tea and play poker games.

name: 你在说什么呢！等……等等！你在看哪里？！我要生气了！！
value: What are you talking about! Wait, where are you looking at? ! I'm going to be angry! !

name: 我也这么觉得！巫女服可是正义与高雅的象征呐！
value: I think so too! The witch costume is a symbol of justice and elegance!

name: 哼！等解决眼下魔物的麻烦后，我很期待和你在球场上过几招！
value: Humph! After solving the monster's troubles at the moment, I am looking forward to competing with you on the court!

name: 至少击打方面你肯定没我强，教室碎掉的窗户可都是我本垒打的杰作呐！
value: At least you are definitely not as strong as me in hitting. The broken windows in the classroom are all my masterpieces of home runs!

name: 你……你为什么盯着我的胸部看？！这可没影响我拉弓！
value: You... why are you staring at my breasts? ! That does not affect my bow!

name: 哼！我眼神可一点也不差，至少十米内用小刀丢中苹果不成问题！
value: Humph! My eyes are not bad at all. It is not a problem to throw an apple with a knife within ten meters!

name: 嗯！青春可是得在赛场和沙滩上挥霍才有价值呢！
value: Haha! Youth are valuable on the field and on the beach!

name: 你这话真是直接……嘛，虽然我对自己的身材很有自信就是了……
value: What you said is really direct... Well, though I am confident about my figure...

name: 没必要怀疑，每个从世上离去的人，总会以另一种方式再次相遇的。
value: There is no need to doubt that everyone who has left the world will always meet again in another way.

name: 呵呵……等你离开这个世界的时候，或许你会理解吧……
value: Haha...When you leave this world, maybe you will understand...

name: 这也是我曾经的选择，但在见证无数离别后，我剩下的却只有孤独……
value: This was also my choice, but after witnessing countless farewells, all I have left is loneliness...

name: 有趣的回答呢，作为人类，如烟花一般的生命，短暂而灿烂。
value: That is quite an interesting answer. As human beings, life is like fireworks-short but brilliant.

name: 哟，感觉你我有那么点相似呢，难道你在我命运中也有一丝羁绊？
value: Oh, it feels like you and I are so similar. Maybe you also have a little string in my fate?

name: 哼……观赏人类在不可改变的命运前无奈挣扎，倒也是种乐趣呢……
value: Huh... It's fun to watch human beings struggle helplessly in front of an unchangeable destiny...

name: 嘻嘻……和我这个掌管厄运的少女呆在一块，至少能保护你不倒霉吧。
value: Heehee... Staying with me, a girl in charge of bad luck, can at least protect you from bad luck.

name: 嘻嘻……如果你吃完香蕉不乱丢香蕉皮的话，应该能躲掉一劫……
value: Heehee...If you don't throw away the banana skin after eating the banana, you should be able to dodge a bullet...

name: 让我来看看你喜欢的人是谁……什……什么呀！你真是个大胆的人呢！
value: Let me see who you like...Wow! You are such a bold person!

name: 啊，命运告诉我，你会喜欢上长着猫耳，爱睡懒觉的可爱女孩子呢……
value: Ah, destiny tells me that you will like a cute girl with cat ears and she likes sleeping late...

name: 我可没这么软弱！但……但你想安慰我的话，就破例让你抱一下好了！
value: I am not so feeble! But... But if you want to comfort me, I'll make a change to let you hug me!

name: 哟……难得你能说出这么有艺术感的话呢，真是让我惊讶……
value: Wow... it's rare that you can say such artistic words, it surprised me...

name: 我知道一个晒太阳的好地方！不过我得先问问，你……有恐高症吗？
value: I know a good place to bask in the sun! But I have to ask first, are you... scared of heights?

name: 多晒几次就习惯啦！不想拥有一身小麦色的健康肌肤吗？
value: Get used to it a few more times! Don't you want to have healthy tan skin?

name: 啊啦，别这么害羞嘛……欣赏埃及女孩子的美妙身姿可是一种享受呢！
value: Come on, don't be so shy... Appreciating the beautiful figure of Egyptian girls is a kind of enjoyment!

name: 真的？！努特自己也这么认为！作为回报给你一个kiss吧！Chu！
value: Really? ! Nuit thinks so too! In return, give you a kiss! Chu!

name: 我的“沙漠”今晚也渴求一场温柔的雨滋润呢……所以……今晚你有空吗？
value: My desert also longs for a gentle rain tonight...so...are you free tonight?

name: 打伞可太没情调了！你不觉得雨中浑身湿透的女孩子是一种美吗？
value: Umbrellas are too boring! Don't you think that a girl soaked in the rain is a kind of beauty?

name: 千金易得，知己难求，或许我的艺术就是为你而存在的也说不定……
value: It's easy to get thousands of money but hard to find a truly friend. Maybe my art exists for you...

name: 若你愿一直陪伴我的话，你迟早会懂的……
value: If you are willing to stay with me forever, you will understand sooner or later...

name: 或许是吧，阴阳万变，没有战争的残酷，何来和平的美好呢……
value: Perhaps it is, the good and bad are ever-changing. Without the cruelty of war, how can the peace come...

name: 等这场灾难结束后，我会和你一起去世界各地，好好修复这件艺术品。
value: After this disaster is over, I will go around the world with you to restore this artwork.

name: 有时我感叹天地的无情，但这也是大自然的规则，难以违抗……
value: Sometimes I sigh for the mercilessness of heaven and earth, but this is also the rule of nature and it is hard to break...

name: 虽然我并不想这么说，但没有力量的善良，或许只是软弱而已。
value: Although I don't want to say that, kindness without power may just be weakness.

name: 看来我们确实心有灵犀，我一直希望自己能够如大地般温柔。
value: It seems that we are heart to heart. I always hope that I can be as gentle as the earth.

name: 看来你能看到我内心中对艺术的那份热忱，很少有人会这样理解我。
value: It seems that you can see the enthusiasm for art in my heart. Few people understand me like this.

name: 是吗？那作为整个大和神系最强射手的我，就更有和你一较高下的价值了！
value: Are you? As the best archery of the Yamato god pedigree, it becomes more worthy to compete with you!

name: 掌握技巧之后还是很简单的，如果你有兴趣的话，我可以亲自教你哦！
value: After mastering the skills, it is very simple. If you are interested, I can teach you personally!

name: 那玩意叫“电视”么？到底是什么魔法可以做到把人关进盒子里的……
value: Is that thing called TV? What kind of magic can lock people in boxes...

name: 我以为是魔物，就一箭把它射爆了……你为什么看着我笑！我是不是做了什么蠢事？
value: I thought it was a monster, so I shot it with one arrow... Why did you look at me and laugh! Did I do something stupid?

name: 那真是太让人期待了！晚上见！对了，要我帮你准备浴衣吗？！
value: That's really exciting! See you tonight! By the way, do you want me to prepare a yukata for you? !

name: 哼哼……是要去和别的女孩子约会么？你的脸很红呢……
value: Humph... Are you going to date other girls? Your face is very red...

name: 原来这东西叫照相机啊……在绘画和记录方面，这东西可比魔法好用多啦！
value: Ah! So this thing is called a camera... In terms of painting and recording, this thing is much useful than the magic!

name: 你怎么忽然对着我……这太突然了！等……等等！我需要换一件漂亮些的和服！
value: Why are you suddenly facing me... It's too sudden! Wait wait wait! I need to change into a more beautiful kimono!

name: 真的吗？但可惜的是你并非凡人或是普通的神明，即使是我也预测不出你的将来。
value: Really? But it's a pity that you are not an ordinary mortal or an ordinary god, even I can't predict your future.

name: 其实不管是凡人还是神明，知道自己的命运未必是一件好事。
value: In fact, whether you are a mortal or a god, knowing your own destiny is not necessarily a good thing.

name: 你指的是北欧的诺伦三姐妹吗？有可能，我感到身体里有她们的灵魂碎片存在……
value: Are you referring to the three sisters of Nornir in Norse? Possibly, I feel that there are fragments of their souls in my body...

name: 希腊的摩伊拉三姐妹？或许吧……我感到有时在梦境里她们会出现……
value: The three sisters of Moirai in Greece? Maybe...I feel that sometimes they appear in dreams...

name: 这场灾难结束之后，我很希望能有机会，和你一起享受茶和点心的午后……
value: After this disaster is over, I really hope to have the opportunity to enjoy the afternoon tea and snacks with you...

name: 看来相比于安宁的和平时期，你或许更适合这个战争四起的冒险年代……
value: It seems that you might be more suitable for this adventurous age when there are wars than a peaceful period...

name: 从古至今，凡人大多只会向我寻求帮助，我也从未想过会有需要凡人帮助的一天……
value: From ancient times to the present, most mortals would only ask me for help, and I never thought that there would be a day when I need help from a mortal...

name: 啊啦……是吗？那么你的命运就是负责和我一起找回我失去的神力。
value: Ah...Really? Then your fate is responsible for retrieving my lost divine power with me.

name: 真的？我倒觉得这些所谓的称呼和身份，除了引发神系战争外，没起到什么作用……
value: Really? I feel that these so-called titles and identities have no effect other than triggering a war between the gods...

name: 就是，有讨论这些的时间不如做一些有意义的事，例如……和中意之人来一场约会？
value: Yes. It is better to do something meaningful when you have time to discuss these things, such as... have a date with someone you like?

name: 因为最终这些世俗的东西都将迎来死亡，黄泉之国是唯一永恒的归宿。
value: Because eventually these worldly things will usher in death, and the netherworld is the only eternal destination.

name: 喔？那么如果有一天，我希望你为了我放弃凡尘的一切，你会作何选择呢？
value: Oh? So if one day, I hope you give up everything that is mundane for me, what choice would you make?

name: 你或许没说错，我很中意强者，尤其是比我更强、让我能有安全感的家伙……
value: Maybe you are right. I like the strong, especially those who are stronger than me and make me feel safe...

name: 爱是大多数人随口说说的浪漫谎言罢了，但你却让我感受到了一种不曾有过的温暖。
value: Love is a romantic lie that most people talk casually, but you make me feel a warmth that I have never had before.

name: 喔哟……需要考虑这么久吗？还是说……我在你的眼中还不够有魅力？
value: Hey...does it take so long to think about it? Or... I am not attractive enough in your eyes?

name: 哎呀呀呀……你是在说我吗？虽然我喜欢直白的人，但太直白就不够浪漫了呢！
value: Oh dear... are you talking about me? Although I like straightforward people, being too straightforward is not romantic enough!

name: 是吗？让我来猜猜看吧，嗯……你得了一种名为“爱情”的病，已经无药可救啦！
value: Really? Let me guess, um... you have a virus called love, and there is no cure for it!

name: 那……那个……难不成你在想喜欢的女孩子？
value: Emmm...is...is it a girl you like?

name: 我原以为你对狗狗更感兴趣呢！我也很喜欢猫，只是拿它们多变的性格有些没辙……
value: I thought you were more interested in dogs! I also like cats very much, but I am weak to their changeable personality...

name: 是吗？！我尤其喜欢柴犬呢！温驯、聪明、活泼，和它在一起你心情总会变得很棒！
value: Really? ! I especially like Shiba Inu! They are gentle, smart, and lively, you will always be in a great mood with them!

name: 哼哼！我想也是！丘比特在对待人和人的缘分上太随性啦！恋情可不能开玩笑！
value: Aha! I think so too! Cupid is too casual in her treatment of people and their fate! Love can't be a joke!

name: 哎呀呀呀……没想到你挺温柔的嘛，即使你认为丘比特更优秀，我也不会生气的喔！
value: Awwwwww... I didn't expect that you are so gentle. Even if you think Cupid is better, I won't be angry!

name: 并不，我见过很多在战场上的对决，也见过这些对决过后诞生的恋情……
value: No,I don't hate. I have seen a lot of duels on the battlefield, and have also seen romances born after these duels...

name: 哼哼，我看见你与女孩子们羁绊的丝线……复杂得都快成一张网了……哎呀呀呀……
value: Hmph, I see the thread that binds you to the girls... It's so complicated that it's almost forming a net..oh my gosh...

name: 这可是趟不短的旅程，不过我很乐意有你的陪伴。
value: This is a long journey, but I would love to have your company.

name: 你说得没错，对于大地而言，无论多重的伤，都会随着时间的流转慢慢愈合。
value: You are right. As far as the earth is concerned, no matter how many injuries it is, it will slowly heal over time.

name: 是啊，和自己中意的人一块享受午后的阳光，还有比这更让人更期待的吗？
value: Yes, enjoying the afternoon sun with someone you like, is there anything more to look forward to than this?

name: 啊啦……你的意思难道是……希望我在晒太阳时穿得更“凉爽”些？
value: Mmmm...do you mean you want me to dress more cooler when basking?

name: 哼哼，等这次战争结束后，我们一起去开一家猫主题咖啡厅怎么样？
value: Hum, how about opening a cat concept cafe together after this war is over?

name: 是啊，在埃及的一些传说中，猫是神明的使者，不少还能变成可爱的女孩子呢！
value: Yes, in some Egyptian legends, cats are messengers of gods, and some can also become cute girls!

name: 啊！你什么时候在那儿的！我……我只是在练习演话剧要背的台词而已！
value: Oops! When did you come! I...I was just practicing the lines in a drama!

name: 啊啦……这台词真是太帅啦！很适合在击败魔物首领之后作为胜利者大声喊出来呢！
value: Ah...This line is so goooood! It is very suitable to shout out loudly as the winner after defeating the monster boss!

name: 哼哼，努特在埃及众神中无论是神能还是魅力确实都很优秀，但我还是略胜一筹呢！
value: Humph, Nuit is indeed very good in terms of power and charm among the Egyptian gods, but I am still a notch above her!

name: 啊啦……难得看到你这么犹豫呢！要不要今天晚上来我房间，让我告诉你正确答案？
value: Well... It's rare to see you hesitate! How about coming to my room tonight and let me tell you the correct answer?

name: 作为埃及的主神不应在同伴面前表现出任何软弱，我也只能和你感叹命运的残酷了。
value: As the main god of Egypt, I should not show any weakness in front of my companions. I can only sigh the cruelty of fate with you.

name: 嗯……偶尔在日落时分和你静静地拥抱一会，也是一种难得的安慰……
value: Hhm...hugging you quietly at sunset sometimes, is also a luxury comfort...

name: 是吗？的确，这种风格相对于其他服装，更容易展现出女孩子的肌肤和身材呢……
value: Really? Indeed, compared to other clothing, this style is easier to show the girl's skin and figure...

name: 啊啦……我可猜不出来，不过每次从你身边经过时，你火热的眼神可不会说谎喔……
value: Well...I can't guess it, but every time you pass by, your fiery eyes won't lie...

name: 其实……我还挺认同你当我的指挥官，至少你是一个足够强的统帅！
value: Actually... I quite agree with you as my commander, at least you are a strong enough commander!

name: 其他人这么回答的话，我肯定会把他揍飞，但至少你用行动证明了你对正义的坚持。
value: If others answer this way, I will definitely beat him up, but at least you have proved your insistence on justice with your actions.

name: 这正是作为众神统帅所需要的优秀素质！作为你的同伴，我以你为荣。
value: This is the excellent quality needed as a commander of the gods! As your companion, I am proud of you.

name: 没有必要质疑自己，即使你真的坠入深渊，我也始终与你同在。
value: There is no need to doubt yourself, even if you really fall into the abyss, I will always be with you.

name: 并非如此，没有力量的正义是无法对抗黑暗的，宽容也不意味着没有原则的纵容。
value: Well, it isn't. Justice without power cannot fight against darkness, and tolerance does not mean indulging without principles.

name: 作为一个凡人，你能意识到这个道理我还是挺意外的，你的智慧值得欣赏。
value: As a mortal, I am quite surprised that you can realize this truth, and your wisdom is worthy of appreciation.

name: 我在战场上曾和路西法有过接触，她的行为虽然没有正义可言，但意外地挺讲原则。
value: I had met with Lucifer on the battlefield once. Although her behavior was not justified, she was unexpectedly principled.

name: 你说得没错，至少米迦勒、拉斐尔和加百列不会那么轻易地同意这件事。
value: You are right, at least Michael, Raphael, and Gabriel will not agree to this easily.

name: 呵呵……至少我们在一起的这段时间，比我过去独自一人时有趣得多。
value: Haha... At least the time we were together was much more interesting than when I was alone.

name: 那当然，我可不希望在战场上看见你像个菜鸟一样，被敌人打飞几十米……
value: Of course, I don't want to see you on the battlefield like a rookie, being beaten by the enemy then fly away tens of meters...

name: 掌管生与死的巫女除了引导生灵之外，也需要照亮亡者们的道路喔。
value: As a witch who is in charge of life and death, I not only guide the living creatures, but also need to illuminate the path for the dead.

name: 这盏灯笼照亮的是冥界之路，我们能避掉很多魔物，少惹很多麻烦可都是拜它所赐。
value: This lantern illuminates the road to the underworld. Thanks to it, we can avoid a lot of monsters and troubles.

name: 喔？不管是否能做到，至少你现在的气势还挺足，我打赌你至少能坚持……一个月？
value: Oh? Regardless of whether you can do or not, at least your current momentum is quite strong, I bet you can at least hold on for... a month?

name: 犹豫就会败北，这话出自一名传说中的日本剑客，嘛……我猜你说不定也听过……
value: If you hesitate, you will lose. This is from a legendary Japanese swordsman. Well... I guess you might have heard it...

name: 啊啦……真是让我有一点点小失落呢，我原以为你会给我个更大胆些的答案……
value: Ah...It really made me feel a little bit disappointed. I thought you would give me a bolder answer...

name: 啊啦……如果直接告诉你就太没情调和气氛了，今晚来我的房间再告诉你怎么样？
value: Ahhhhh...it would be too unromantic to tell you directly. How about coming to my room tonight?

name: 时间是治愈大地最好的良药，我只希望这场战争能够尽快结束。
value: Time is the best medicine to cure the earth. I only hope that this war can end as soon as possible.

name: 其实无所谓，大地总会将从我这里取走的东西，馈赠给更适合的人。
value: In fact, it doesn't matter. The earth will always give something that it takes from me to a more suitable person.

name: 她的性格大多数时候过于随性，在埃及她惹的麻烦比她解决的还多……
value: Her character is too casual most of the time, and she caused more troubles in Egypt than she solved...

name: 她实力确实不错，但作为统帅，你很快就会认识到，她不大理解什么叫做命令……
value: She is indeed good at strength, but as the commander, you will soon realize that she doesn't quite understand what a command is...

name: 你还是太年轻了，当成为众神都认同的主宰者时，你才真正算理解孤独的意义。
value: You are still too young. Only when you become the ruler recognized by the gods can you truly understand the meaning of loneliness.

name: 有趣，我见过无数的王者，还从没有人这样说过，你确实是一名独特的统帅。
value: Interesting. I have seen countless kings, and no one has ever said that. You are indeed a unique commander.

name: 它是这个北欧的支柱，作为曾经的王者，我很怀念站在树顶俯视一切的感觉……
value: It is the pillar of this Nordic country. As a former king, I miss the feeling of standing on the top of a tree and looking down on everything...

name: 很少有人类会给我这么坚定的回答，或许你真的能成为众神的领袖。
value: Few humans will give me such a firm answer, maybe you can really become the leader of the gods.

name: 哼……其他人说出这样的话，我只会认为他是个愚者，但我认同你的能力和智慧。
value: Hmph...If other people say this, I will only think that he is a fool, but I agree with your ability and wisdom.

name: 这是一场要拼上性命的赌局，但我相信有你在的话，没有什么敌人能让我们畏惧。
value: This is a bet that risking life, but I believe that with you, there is no enemy that can make us fear.

name: 我曾为了获得智慧而甘愿付出一只眼睛的代价，但我明白智者将永远立于不败之地。
value: I was willing to pay the price of one eye in order to gain wisdom, but I understand that the wise man will always be invincible.

name: 我曾经是众神的统治者，但你才是众神的将来，我希望你能替我执掌这份荣耀。
value: I used to be the ruler of the gods, but you are the future of the gods. I hope you can hold this glory for me.

name: 看来时代变了，如今我作为众神的同伴，确实比作为众神的统帅更容易亲近他人。
value: It seems that the times have changed. Now, as a companion of the gods, it is indeed easier for me to get close to others than as the commander of the gods.

name: 真的？看来有人值得让我花上一晚的时间，和一瓶上等的蜂蜜酒好好招待了。
value: Really? It seems that someone deserves to spend a night on me and entertain him with a good bottle of mead.

name: 这可真让人苦恼呢！我的理想可是当一名偶像啊！
value: This is really distressing! My ideal is to be an idol!

name: 真的吗？！为了防止意外，要不要我先找根绳子把你困在桅杆上？
value: Oh, really? ! To prevent accidents, should I find a rope to trap you on the mast?

name: 是啊，末日还没结束，我可不想去看喷发的火山和满是尘埃的废墟。
value: Yes, doomsday is not over yet, I don't want to see erupting volcanoes and dusty ruins.

name: 我当然能够上岸，前提是你抱得动我的话，嘻嘻……
value: Of course I can go ashore, the premise is that you can hold me, haha...

name: 原来真的是这样啊！这实在是令人兴奋……啊不不不！令人遗憾的事情呢……
value: So that's true! This is so exciting...ah no no no.. so regrettable...

name: 噗哧！怎么会呢？我只是想看看，曾经威严无比的海皇大人如今的尊容而已……
value: Haha! How could I? I just want to see the face of the god of the sea who is majestic in the past...

name: 万事万物都遵循自然的规则，命运没有必要回避，磨难会让大地变得更坚实。
value: Everything follows the rules of nature. There is no need to avoid fate. The tribulation will make the earth more solid.

name: 并不会，万物生生不息、循环往复，即便一时沉寂，也终会在大地的怀抱中重生。
value: No, I won't. Everything is endless and cyclical. Even if it is silent for a while, it will eventually be reborn on the earth.

name: 所以不管遇到任何麻烦，请一定要告诉我，至少我应当和你共同面对。
value: So no matter what trouble you encounter, please tell me. At least I should face it with you.

name: 嗯……看来在你的眼里，我比想象中要年轻很多呢……
value: Hmm... It seems that in your eyes, I am much younger than I thought...

name: 你有着和我一样坚强的意志和灵魂，希望众神能在你的统率下度过这场浩劫……
value: You have the same strong will and soul like mine. I hope that the gods can survive this calamity under your command...

name: 的确，即使一个人拥有再强的力量，也未必有众多可以信赖的同伴可靠。
value: Indeed. No matter how strong a person is, he may not have enough reliable companions.

name: 即使是最朴素的花朵也能用它独特的芬芳，驱散战争的阴云。
value: Even the simplest flower can use its unique fragrance to dispel the dark clouds of war.

name: 树木是万象复苏的征兆，即使没有花草的艳丽，但却能缓慢治愈大地的伤痕。
value: Trees are a sign of recovery. Even they are not beautiful as flowers, they can slowly heal the scars of the earth.

name: 当然，如果让我恢复到神力的鼎盛时期，终结这场世界末日……恐怕只需要几天。
value: Of course, if I were to return to the heyday of divine power, then end this doomsday... I am afraid it will only take a few days.

name: 安心吧，我并不会因此而消沉，在见证你的成长后，我已经看见了新的希望。
value: Don't worry, I will not be depressed because of this. After witnessing your growth, I have fresh hope.

name: 啊啦……真的吗？！我明天就把你丢进迷宫中心，看看是不是这样。
value: Ah...really? ! I will throw you into the center of the labyrinth tomorrow to see if this is true.

name: 其实，如果你有兽人强大的力量，见墙就拆，迟早你能出去。
value: In fact, if you have the power as orc, you can destroy walls when you face them, and sooner or later you can get out.

name: 去寻找值得为之牺牲的理念吧，无论你迷惘或恐惧，我始终会守护你。
value: Find an idea worthy of sacrifice. Whether you are confused or fearful, I will always guard you.

name: 呵呵……永远沉浸在梦中，梦就是真实，还有比这更美妙的事吗……
value: Haha...Always immersed in dreams, dreams are reality, is there anything more wonderful than this...

name: 哼，真是个没情调的家伙，至少我也算是个有梦想的人啊。
value: Hmph, what an unromantic guy, at least I have dreams.

name: 对我来说这真是不容易的事情呢……不过有你在，或许我也能有所改变。
value: For me, this is really not easy...but with you, maybe I can change myself.

name: 看来为了达成这个心愿，只好让全世界的人永远都醒不过来了。
value: Then in order to make this dream come true, it seems that people all over the world will never be able to wake up.

name: 嗯？是么？但只有强者能够掌控自己和世界的命运，这难道不对吗？
value: Ok, is it? But only the strong can control the destiny of himself and the world, is that right?

name: 世间本无善恶之分，善良或许也只是强者所定义的呢……
value: There is no difference between good and evil in the world. Maybe kindness is only defined by the strong...

name: 说的也是，靠这种能力得到的感情，又有什么意义呢？
value: You're right. What's the point if gained love by this kind of ability?

name: 是个诚实而可爱的家伙呢！那么老实告诉我……你现在在想什么？
value: Oh, what an honest and cute guy! Then tell me honestly...what are you thinking about now?

name: 哼哼！可别以为我还会像上次那样输给你！接招吧！
value: Haha! Don't think I will lose to you like last time! Take it!

name: 喂！你这个借口已经用了三次了！啊……算了，我还是去打木桩吧……
value: Hey! You have used this excuse three times! Ah...Forget it, I'll practice on the timber pile...

name: 的确如此，智慧始于火种，文明也是靠这小小的火苗而兴盛的。
value: Exactly. Wisdom begins with fire, and civilization also thrives on this little fire.

name: 或许吧，火焰带来了智慧，却也点燃了王国的争端和掠夺的欲望……
value: Perhaps. The flame brings wisdom, but it also ignites disputes in the kingdom and the desire to plunder...

name: 就是嘛！解决麻烦的家伙只需要一拳，如果不够……呃……那就两拳！
value: Exactly! The troublesome people only need one punch, if it is not enough...uh... then two punches!

name: 我天生就不是个擅长讲道理的人，不过你每次总有办法让我冷静下来。
value: I am not born to be good at reasoning, but you always have a way to calm me down every time.

name: 没什么比上战场前，来一大碗满是辣椒和烤肉的炒饭更给力的了！
value: There is nothing better than a big bowl of rice full of chili and roast meat before going to the battlefield!

name: 嗯哼……然而喜欢火辣的女孩子总是受欢迎喔！不管是性格，还是身材……
value: Hmm... But girls who like hot are always popular! Whether it's character or figure...

name: 你很有眼光呢！要不要来我的房间……让我教教你怎样穿……？
value: You have really good taste! Do you want to come to my room and...let me teach you how to dress...?

name: 缠的时候是挺麻烦的，不过脱下来却很方便呢！想试试看吗？
value: It's troublesome to wrap it around, but it's very convenient to take it off! Do you want to try it?

name: 青春是无价的财富呢，无论外貌、活力还是激情，都伴随着青春才有意义！
value: Youth is an invaluable wealth. No matter appearance, vitality or passion, it is meaningful with youth!

name: 不会吧？！我还从来没有见过一个凡人不渴求青春永驻的呢！
value: No way? ! I have never seen a mortal who does not long for eternal youth!

name: 哈哈，我听说女神雅典娜、赫拉和阿芙罗狄忒她们为此打得不可开交呢！
value: Haha, I heard that the goddesses Athena, Hera, and Aphrodite are fighting hard for this!

name: 你觉得不会？！来打个赌吧？我想到一个好玩的恶作剧，嘻嘻……
value: You think it won't? ! Let's make a bet. I think of a funny prank, hee hee...

name: 你……没骗我吧？如果骗我的话，我一辈子都不会放过你的！
value: You didn't lie to me, did you? If you lie to me, I will never forgive you!

name: 说得也是呢 ……凡人们的爱情，很多时候都会随着青春的逝去而消散吧。
value: That's right... Most often mortals' love will disappear with the passing of youth.

name: 音乐是一首歌曲的灵魂呐，有兴趣静静听我演唱一段吗？
value: Music is the soul of a song. Are you interested in listening to me sing a song?

name: 诗词总是能很好地传达人们的情感，要看看我新写的作品吗？
value: Poetry can always express people's emotions well. Would you like to see my new poetry?

name: 如果你愿意和咱换的话，咱就送你一件意想不到的礼物喵！
value: If you are willing to exchange with me, I will give you an extraordinary gift!

name: 哎呀呀呀，你可真是个不会说谎的人呢！不给我的话我就要挠你啦！
value: Awww, you are such a liar! If you don't give it to me, I will scratch you!

name: 呀！！你在说我很可爱喵？是吧？！一定是这样的吧！！
value: Oh! ! Did you say I'm so cute, right? ! It must be so! !

name: 哼哼哼……我今天晚上就会偷偷潜进你的卧室把你吃掉，小心喵……
value: Hum, I will sneak into your bedroom tonight and eat you, be careful miaow...

name: 真的？！咱下次请你去参加动物妖怪朋友们的聚会怎么样？！
value: Really? ! How about next time I invite you to a party with animal monster friends? !

name: 喵……是那种让人脸红心跳的羞羞的关系吗……你可真是直接喵……
value: Miaow...Is it the kind of shy relationship that makes people blush...You are really direct meow...

name: 哎呀呀，如果你肯用小鱼干来交换的话，那就让你摸一下喵！
value: Well, if you are willing to give me fish, then I'll allow you to touch meow!

name: 没想到竟然有人能忍住咱的毛茸茸诱惑攻击！你真的是人类喵？！
value: I never thought who could hold back our furry temptation strikes! Are you really a human meow? !

name: 真的吗？虽然咱在变成妖怪前，确实也见过不少好人喵……
value: Really? Although I did see a lot of good people before I became a monster...

name: 唉……有小鱼干却不懂得分享给朋友，是多么遗憾的事情喵……
value: Alas...it's a shame to have fish but don't know how to share it with friends miaow...

name: 是吗？！哼哼！我一定会成为你最可靠的战友喵！！
value: Is it? ! Humph! I will definitely become your most reliable comrade miaow! !

name: 我感觉自己很强大了喵！那么大的石头只要一喵爪就能击碎了呢！
value: I think I'm strong miaow. Such a big stone can be crushed with just one paw!

name: 我一定要和你一起结束这场浩劫，取回原本属于我自己的神权！
value: I must end this catastrophe with you and regain the divine power that originally belonged to me!

name: 我也应该感谢这命运吧，如果不是这样，我也不会与你相遇了……
value: I should also be grateful for this destiny. If it weren't like this, I wouldn't meet you...

name: 是吗？我还从来没见过能赢我的人类，有机会一定要和你较量较量！
value: Really? I have never seen a human being able to beat me, and I must compete with you if I have a chance!

name: 要我来教你冲浪吗？我会好好抱紧你的，至少你不用担心一沉到底……
value: Do you want me to teach you surfing? I will hold you tight, at least you don't have to worry about sinking to the bottom...

name: 在奥林匹斯众神的那个年代，战争就没有尽头，但我早已厌倦……
value: In the days of Olympus, the wars are endless. I was already tired of wars...

name: 如果真的有战争结束的一天，我就带你一块回海底宫殿生活怎么样？
value: If there is a day when the war is over, how about taking you to the underwater palace and living with me?

name: 荷花生于污泥却一尘不染，如同这个灾难不断的世界中诞生的正义一样。
value: You have good taste. The lotus flower is born in the mud but emerges spotless, just as rightful justice is born from a world of constant strife.

name: 平凡其实是一种伟大，我们原本都是凡人，却因自己的信念而胜过神明。
value: In my perspective, blood is the inheritance of the family. Even if the bonds are fragile, it is an unbreakable reality bestowed by the gods.

name: 没错，血缘是家族的传承，即使再脆弱，这也是一种不可斩断的羁绊与命运。
value: In my percepective, blood is the inheritance of the family. Even if the bonds are fragile, it is an unbreakable reality bestowed by the gods.

name: 或许你是正确的吧，至少我们之间的羁绊证明了这一点。
value: Maybe you are right, for the bond we share proves that other types of relationshps may be even stronger.

name: 我明白，从一开始，你和我的命运就始终连在一起，只要你在我就无所畏惧。
value: Well, you are right. Grief should be used as a driving force to prevent disaster.

name: 巴里在这个世界神力比我弱很多，但她依旧不放弃与末日抗争，我岂能在此退却？
value: Princess Bari may be much weaker than me, but she never stops fighting. And neither shall I.

name: 嗯，你说得没错，悲伤应当化为阻止灾难的力量，而非恐惧末日的枷锁。
value: Well, you are right. Grief should be turned into a drive to prevent disaster.

name: 末日的结束或许还要很久吧，希望我们能够挽回更多的生命。
value: I don't know when the war will end. In the meantime, I hope we can save more lives.

name: 只是同伴么？我……我觉得你对我的感情似乎没有这么单纯呢……
value: A companion? I... I thought we are much more than that.

name: 那个……家人也有很多种，例如长辈、恋人等等……我们应该算是哪类呢？
value: Well... there are many kinds of family members, such as siblings, lovers, etc... What kind of family should we be?

name: 我曾经认为这只是一种安慰，直到我被召唤到这个世界上，自己成为神明为止。
value: I used to think prayers were simply a way for mortals to comfort ourselves. But then the gods saved me and transformed me into what I am today.

name: 是啊，也有不少麻烦是神明弄出来，最后由人类解决的呢！
value: Yes, the gods have caused many problems in the world, leaving humans to clean up behind them.

name: 是啊，我的同伴还有十一个，不过她们好像被某种不同时空的力量封印住了。
value: Yes, I have eleven more companions, but they seem to be sealed by power from a different time and space.

name: 你这么做没啥意义，因为我的同伴中并不是所有人都像我这么能打……
value: It doesn't make sense for you to do this, because not all of my companions are good at fighting like me...
