name: 哼哼……其实我只是冲着有架可打才回应你的喔！
value: Hum...Actually, I only responded to you when there is a fight!

name: 其实在被召唤来这里之前，我每天的生活都很单纯，因为只要把贡品吃光就行啦！
value: In fact, before I was summoned to this place, I lived a simple life, because I just need to eat up the tribute!

name: 那得看记什么东西啦！如果是好吃的美食，我能把整本菜谱都记下来！
value: It depends on the things! If it is delicious food, I can memorize the entire recipe!

name: 这样太没亲近感啦！人家可不希望在约会的时候叫这么没情调的称呼呢！
value: This is too alienated! I don't want to call such an unromantic name when we are dating!

name: 哎呀……是么？可力气太大的话，会不会太没有女孩子的气质了……？
value: Ah...Really? But if there is too much strength, will it be too lack of girly...?

name: 哟……你好像在质疑我的力量？要不要今晚来我的房间……和我比试比试？
value: Well... You seem to be questioning my power? Do you want to come to my room tonight to...compare with me?

name: 信仰确实是可以汇聚成神力的呢！强大的神明不也是这样才诞生的吗？
value: Beliefs can indeed converge into divine power! Isn't it the same way that powerful gods were born?

name: 怎么会！看看你的同伴，你就是他们的信仰，这种信仰的力量可是无人能挡的呢！
value: It is! Look at your companions, you are their belief. The power of this belief is unstoppable!

name: 我从来没想过自己也有和别人签订爱之契约的那一天呢！事先说明，我可绝对没有偷偷朝你射箭喔，这一切都是命运的安排！
value: I never thought I'd see the day when I would give my heart to another! I swear I never shot one of my arrows at you. It was fate, and fate alone!

name: 哼……看在你这么真诚的份上，我就收下你这束结缘的百合花好了……等等！你……你这满脸的得意算什么啊！我们的身份还是有高低的！
value: Hmph... Because of your sincerity, I accept these flowers. ... Wait! I see that proud look on your face! Don't forget that I still retain my independence!

name: 诗人们常说“我们都是一只翅膀的天使，只有相互拥抱着才能飞翔”，今天我总算明白这句诗的含义了，今后我将与你面对共同的命运！
value: A poet once wrote: We are all angels with only one wing, we can only fly by embracing each other. Today, I finally understand what they mean. From now on, we will face our destiny together.

name: 我曾以为越是拥有寒冰般坚硬的内心，就能够变得越加强大。但你让我明白了真正的强大实际是彼此信赖的感情，以及不可斩断的羁绊。
value: I used to think that having a cold, hard heart made me stronger. But you helped me see the true strength of a mutual and unbreakable bond.

name: 啊啦……你终于无法抗拒混沌的魅力，而向我渴求这份象征永恒的誓约了吗？真是个性急的家伙，但这份直率也是你最大的优点呢！
value: Ahh... I see you can't resist the charm of chaos. You seem eager for this eternal vow and what it represents. You are so direct and eager, but these are also great strengths!

name: 今晚月色格外地美，不是么？能和你在满月的日子交换彼此的誓约，实在是一件值得在永恒时光中，慢慢回忆的幸事……
value: The moonlight is really beautiful tonight, isn't it? Exchanging vows with you on the night of a full moon is a blessing that will always be worth remembering.

name: 如同坚守彩虹桥那样，我必将坚守彼此所许下的诺言，以北欧众神的荣耀起誓，此生我会与你共同面对一切命运的考验！
value: Just like my devotion to Bifrost, I will not waiver in my vow to you. I swear by the glory of the Nordic gods that from henceforth, we shall face all the trials of destiny together!

name: 作为与我结下永恒誓约、我唯一认可的强者而言，你还是太年轻了，但我挺乐意在以后漫长的日子里，好好和你分享作为统治者的经验。
value: I recognize your courage. Despite your youth, you are the only person brave enough to make an eternal vow with me. In the years ahead, I will happily share my experience as a ruler with you.

name: 人类在在待彼此羁绊的时候还真有仪式感……观察你这么长时间后我不得不承认，对你的感情……确实是一种难以用理性去分析的东西。
value: You humans really do make a ritual of marriage. After observing you for so long, I've found that I have feelings for you that are difficult to analyze rationally.

name: 这份誓约指的是一辈子和你在一起么？我倒是挺乐意的，不过……我希望你不会介意每顿饭都吃烤肉的日子，哼哼……
value: Does this vow mean we will be together for our entire lives? That's wonderful, but... I hope you like eating barbecue for every meal.

name: 没有什么比这份永恒的誓约更让我感到高兴的了，我会作为光明的化身，一直为你驱散黑暗，直至太阳不再升起的那一天到来……
value: Nothing makes me happier than this eternal vow. As the incarnation of light, I promise to drive away the darkness for you until the day the sun no longer rises.

name: 连接灵魂的永恒誓约喵？那是什么喵？可以吃喵？你说只要签了这份契约就有吃不完的小鱼干喵？！主人你真是太温柔了喵！爱死你了喵！
value: An eternal vow to bind our souls? *meow* What is that? Is it edible? If I accept, will there be plenty of dried fish? *meow* But you are so kind and gentle, I believe what you do is good for me. *meow*

name: 即使没有这份誓约，我也早已把你当作家人般看待了，但我很欣慰你愿意与我建立起这永恒的羁绊，愿水神护佑我最重要的家人……
value: Even before this vow, you were like family to me. I am very grateful for this eternal bond between us. May the Goddess of Water protect you, the most important member of my family.

name: 我与你的誓约也是一种魔法，但这种魔法除了用爱与信任作为魔力外，没有任何方式能够启动……你知道这意味着什么吗？
value: My vow with you is also a kind of magic which only the sacred power of love and trust can activate. Do you understand?

name: 每天夕阳落下之时，我都在期待将来会是谁在这里和我签下永恒的誓约，而如今命运已有了结果，在今后相处的日子里，请多多指教……
value: Every day at sunset, I dreamed of finding the one who would make an eternal vow with me. Now destiny has brought you to me. I hope we can live happily together in the days to come.

name: 回报：与我共享永恒的生命，代价：你的灵魂将永远在深不见底的冥界陪伴我。呵呵……你明白这份契约的内容……意味着什么吧？
value: You will now spend all eternity with me, but at a cost: We shall reside together in the underworld. Haha! Did you know these details before you made your vow?

name: 作为敢和我这名死神签定永恒誓约的人类来说，你胆子真是够大。但不可否认，我会很期待今后每一晚和你相拥而眠的时光……
value: You are a very brave human to make an eternal vow with me--the god of death. I look forward to sleeping each night in your arms.

name: 万象离合是大自然的循环，彼此灵魂的结合也同样是大自然最珍贵的祝福，不管这场末日持续多久，我与你的誓约都将如磐石般永恒。
value: Partings and reunions are part of nature's cycle, and spiritual bonds are its most precious blessing. I will not let this apocalypse weather my commitment. My vow to you will be as eternal as stone.

name: 我早已习惯伴随着正义而来的孤独，但你的灵魂却让我感受到了一种亲切，或许在将来的命运之路上，有你的陪伴也是个不错的选择。
value: I am accustomed to the loneliness imposed by justice. I am grateful for the kindness you bring to my life. Perhaps, I made a good choice with you.

name: 在订立誓约的这一刻，我可以感受到你灵魂的光辉，你的勇气足以胜过英灵殿任何一位英雄，能够永远在战场上伴随你是我无上的荣耀！
value: I could feel the radiance of your soul the moment you made your vow. You are more courageous than any hero in Valhalla. It is my eternal honor and joy to accompany you on the battlefield.

name: 你真是太坏了……以前从没有说过愿意和我结下誓约的话……但身为缘结神，直到今天才明白你的感情，我也是个迟钝的家伙呢……
value: You are so sly! You never hinted that you might want to make a vow with me. All this time I misunderstood your intentions. I'm so bad at these things.

name: 誓约？嗯……我原本并不特别在意言语或是仪式上的誓言，但我至少能向你保证，我会一直守护你，直至诸神的黄昏再次降临。
value: A vow? Hmm... I'm not one for romance or rituals, but I promise to continue guarding you until Ragnarök comes.

name: 哎？你说一旦签下这份契约，我就永远回不去自己的世界了？嗯……其实我觉得和你相处这么长时间后……留在这个世界陪你也挺高兴……
value: Once we make this vow to each other, will I never be able to return to my own world? Hmm... We have gotten along well together. I probably wouldn't mind staying here in your world with you.

name: 你知道吗？我倾听过无数的愿望，送出过无数件礼物，但这份与你所定的誓约，在我看来却比世界上任何一件礼物都珍贵！
value: I have listened to countless wishes and sent countless gifts, but this vow with you is more precious to me than any gift in the world! Did you know that?

name: 嗯……愿意和我这名普通的妖怪签下这么重要的誓约，我还是挺意外的，愿大和的神明降下幸福的恩赐，愿我们的默契守护彼此的灵魂。
value: I'm shocked that you were willing to make a sacred vow with me, an ordinary monster. May the Yamato gods bless us with happiness and protect our souls.

name: 签订契约与打造武器一样，都需要灌注信任与心血，尽力去达成彼此的理念，我的誓言将化为最锋利的剑与最坚固的盾，始终为你而战！
value: Making our vows is like crafting equipment. It requires hard work and determination. I vow henceforth to be your sharpest sword and your strongest shield!

name: 呵呵……你知道么？无数的恶魔、邪神甚至天使，都曾经将这份誓约书送到我面前，但你是唯一让我真心愿意在上面签下真名的人类……
value: Ha! Did you know that countless demons, devils, and angels have offered their vows to me? But you are the only human to make me genuinely willing to accept?

name: 什……什么呀！我才不是因为喜欢你才和你定下这份誓约的呢！我只是觉得你这个家伙运气太差，要是没有我帮忙就会倒霉透顶而已！
value: You should know that I made this vow with you only because you seem very unlucky. Without my help, your luck will only get worse!

name: 从古至今我很少立誓言，但每当我们在一起时，我却总希望时间能流逝得再慢一些，这种对你的期待，或许已经超过最坚定的誓言了吧。
value: From ancient times to the present, I seldom make vows. But whenever we're together, I find myself wanting time to pass more slowly. I have never been so firm in my vows before.

name: 即使来自不同的时空，神明的机缘依旧让我们相遇，这实在是幸福的事情……啊，对了！如果不介意的话，我能拍张照片留念吗？
value: We come from entirely different worlds. I can't believe the gods allowed us to meet! Oh, by the way, would you mind if we took a picture as a souvenir?

name: 没有什么比誓约更让我感到安心，无论是神界还是黄泉，能和值得依靠的人共同面对这永恒的时光，身为神明的我也毫无遗憾了。
value: Nothing makes me feel more at ease than an eternal vow. Whether it is in heaven or the netherworld, I, as a god, have no regrets about spending eternity with someone worthy of my trust.

name: 啊啦……这么渴求和我定下这份誓约……是觉得彼此作为导师与学生的关系已经不能满足你了吗？看来你也是个耐不住寂寞的家伙呢……
value: You seem very eager to make this vow with me. Are you no longer satisfied with our mentor-student relationship? You seem like someone who can't handle being alone.

name: 我很庆幸能够与你定下这份永恒的誓约，我永远会在你需要我时，与你共同面对一切，愿你能一如既往地信赖大地赐予的力量。
value: I am grateful for this eternal vow. I will always be there for you when you need me. Always trust in the power bestowed by the earth.

name: 哼哼！在定下这份誓约后，每天我都会用拳头好好地训练你的战斗技巧！毕竟，我还是希望能够在战场上守护好彼此的身后。
value: Humph! This vow won't excuse you from our daily training sessions and the fury of my fists. After all, we must be prepared to guard each other's backs on the battlefield.

name: 即使身为胜利女神，我也有过恐惧和不安，但在与你立下的誓约中，我能感受到你灵魂深处的勇气，愿我们二人能够永远引领同伴的胜利。
value: Even the goddess of victory suffers from fear and anxiety. But with this vow, I feel courage in the depths of my soul. From now on, we will lead our companions to victory together.

name: 契约是公正的象征，我在你的灵魂中能够感受到正义的光芒，却没有感受到复仇的晦暗，或许我们彼此结合，才能带来真正的秩序。
value: Our vow is a symbol of justice. I sense the light of justice in your soul instead of the darkness of revenge. Perhaps we can work together to bring true order.

name: 和我立下永恒誓约？呃……你的意思是想被变成石头吗？等……等下！我开玩笑的！其实我只是想看看你惊慌失措的样子而已，嘻嘻……
value: Make an eternal vow with me? Uh... do you mean you want to be turned into stone? Wait...wait! I'm just kidding! Actually, I just wanted to watch you panic.

name: 我等这一天很久啦！哎？你怎么一直盯着我看？是在等着我给你一个誓约之吻吗？啊啦……我还是头一次见你的脸红成这样……
value: I have been waiting for this day for a long time! Hey? Why are you staring at me? Are you hoping for a kiss? Haha... This is the first time I've seen you blush.

name: 这份永恒誓约意味着彼此灵魂与信仰的结合，我曾经经历过无数危难与考验，而如今你与我同在，这场末日浩劫必将在我们手中结束！
value: This eternal vow is a union of our souls and beliefs. I have experienced countless dangers and trials, and now that you are with me, we will surely end this apocalyptic catastrophe.

name: 签订誓约时为对方献上美妙的歌曲是海妖一族的传统，不过我担心在这里唱的话你会幸福得晕过去……还是晚上我们独处时再唱给你听吧！
value: Traditionally, sirens sing when making their vows. But I am worried you would faint from happiness if I were to sing here and now. I should wait until the evening when we are alone.

name: 好吧……虽然作为掌管梦境的女神，我曾在梦里幻想过很多次这样的场景，但没想到在现实中，你会真的愿意和我签定这份永恒的誓约……
value: As the goddess of dreams, I have dreamt of this many times before. But I never imagined that you would be so willing to make an eternal vow with me in reality.

name: 每次在见到你时我总会想到，随着生命的流逝我们终将人神两隔，但签下誓约的这一刻我无比欣慰，因为你的青春将永远与我同在。
value: I know that someday the end of your life will separate us. You are but a mere mortal. Yet I am still happy to make this vow. You will remain young in my heart forever.

name: 虽然我的力量至今仍沉睡在深海的某个角落，但当你我共同定下这份永恒的誓约时，是否能够找回那份力量，似乎也变得不那么重要了呢。
value: I worry that I may never regain my powers, which sleep in the depths of the sea. But when sharing this vow with you, that concern seems far less important.

name: 黑夜曾经是人类最恐惧的存在之一，但你我彼此定下这份誓约之后，黑夜将不再是封闭你目光的枷锁，而是守护你身影的坚盾。
value: Humans used to fear the darkness of night. But now that we have made our vow, the night will no longer cause you to cower in fear. Instead, it will serve as a shield to protect you.

name: 虽然作为众神信使，任何事情上我都希望能快人一步，但你不觉得我们关系的发展……快得有些离谱了吗？我兴奋得心脏都快跳出来了……
value: As a messenger for the gods, I like to be one step ahead of everything. But don't you think our relationship is moving... too fast? I'm so excited that my heart is jumping out of my chest!

name: 我曾经并不认为誓约有什么意义，因为时间终将带走一切，但我在你灵魂的音律中，听见了希望与我一起面对永恒的承诺……
value: I used to think vows were nonsense because everything fades with time. However, your soul resonates with mine, for you hope to face eternity with me.

name: 与我定下永恒的誓约么？呵呵……真是个奇怪的人类呢……不过我挺高兴能有人分担审判亡者的工作，以及陪我打发无聊的午后……
value: An eternal vow with me? Haha... What a strange human... But I would appreciate spending our time together judging the dead. It's such a boring task, and I would love to share the work.

name: 从与你相遇的那天，我就已经预见到了与你定下誓约的这一刻，既定的命运总是让人感到无趣，但与你命运的交汇，却给了我不少的惊喜。
value: I have foreseen this moment since the day I met you. Destiny can be so boring, but you bring a lot of surprises.

name: 如同繁茂的大树与坚实的泥土一般，我们的誓约是彼此灵魂最紧密的依靠，无论何时我都会像大地一样尽全力保护你。
value: Our vows create a dependence between our souls, much like that between lush trees and nourishing soil. I will always do my best to protect you like the earth.

name: 啊……如果和你签定这份契约的话，不就意味着莉莉丝以后只能当你一个人的偶像了吗？！真是令人头痛的选择呢！
value: Ah... If I make this vow, does it mean that I only belong to you? But I want to be everyone's sweet heart!

name: 通过誓约而连接的灵魂，其实和药物调制是一样的道理，即使只是两种寻常的药材，在调配到一起的时候，也是能混合出不小的奇迹呢。
value: The union of two souls through a vow is like preparing medicine. When blended, two ingredients, no matter how common, can create a miracle.

name: 即使是一片树叶，一丛花朵也能给自然带来属于自己的能量，即使我失去了掌控大地的能力，但我依旧会在战场上为你而全力以赴。
value: Even a leaf or a bunch of flowers can release nature's energy. Although my ability to control the earth fades, I will still do my best to support you in battle.

name: 哼……虽然我对和正义阵营的家伙定誓约没什么兴趣，不过与你相处的这些时间里，至少你能证明自己的强大，以及……对我的好感……
value: Hmph... I am not interested in making a vow with someone aligned with justice. However, you have proven your strength, and that interests me...

name: 与人类定下誓约，确保她们不堕入邪道，是天使们的职责，愿我与你灵魂的融合带来勇气与智慧，愿我对你的爱驱散末日带来的恐惧。
value: Angels must make vows with humans to ensure they do not stray down an evil path. May our spiritual bond bring you courage and wisdom, and may my love for you dispel your fear.

name: 哼哼！你竟然选择了我作为誓约对象，我还是挺惊讶的呢！虽然我不能带给你永恒的生命，但我保证会把你做成全世界最漂亮的木乃伊！
value: Wow! I'm surprised that you chose to make a vow with me! Although I cannot give you eternal life, I promise to make you the most beautiful mummy in the world!

name: 啊啦……能够得到你的认同，与你定下永恒的誓约，我很开心呢！不过我身边的这头小可爱似乎对这件事……呃……有点意见……
value: Awwww...I am very happy to earn your approval and make an eternal vow with you! But this little cutie next to me seems...er.. not pleased about this...

name: 誓约？我们种族对这些没什么概念……不过从和你定下誓约后，我们在战斗时能默契地把敌人打飞这件事来说，还是挺方便的呢！
value: Vows? My race does not make these. But if I make one with you, we can fight together to defeat our enemies in battle. How convenient!

name: 定不定誓约或许对我们并没有什么太大的影响，因为我们对彼此早已无比信任了。但我还是为那份从你灵魂深处传来的温柔而感到欣慰……
value: We have already placed our trust in each other, so a vow is irrelevant. Still, I am pleased with the gentleness that comes from the depths of your soul.

name: “愿誓约连接彼此的命运 ，愿我们的灵魂永不分离，直至世界尽头的永恒。”你看这段誓词写得怎么样？！我可足足想了一整晚呢！！
value: May our vows unite our destinies. May our souls stay united until the end of the world. ... What do you think of that vow? I wrote it last night!

name: 我还记得在末日降临时，自己是第一次回应一名凡人的召唤，或许神明注定要我们相遇，共同背负解决这场末日浩劫的使命。
value: I still remember when this apocalypse began and, for the first time, I answered the call of a mortal. Perhaps we were meant to resolve this catastrophe together.

name: 嗯……我其实想知道当初你第一次召唤天使时，看到我之后的感受？
value: Hmm... I actually wonder how you felt when you saw me after you first summoned an angel?

name: 啊……身为鱼类这个种族，陆地上的生活让人家很不适应呢！
value: Ah...As a species of fish, life on land is very uncomfortable for me!

name: 当我能化身为人形的时候，还挺担心自己的身材是不是会太胖呢！
value: When I was able to incarnate into a human form, I was worried about whether my figure would be too fat!

name: 有兴趣陪我晒晒太阳吗？
value: Are you interested in basking with me?

name: 战争是最愚蠢的一种行为了……无论哪里只要一开战，生灵都要遭殃。
value: War is the most stupid thing... No matter where, as long as a war starts, all creatures will suffer.

name: 嗯……你觉得神与妖怪有何不同呢？
value: Hmm...what do you think is the difference between gods and monsters?

name: 爱情是世界上最神秘的存在，很多战争开始于它，也结束于它……
value: Love is the most mysterious existence in the world. Many wars begin with it, and end with it...

name: 你喜欢猫这种动物么？你觉得猫的性格怎么样？
value: Do you like animals like cats? What do you think of the cat's character?

name: 坦白地说，我并不反感战争，它带来了破坏和杀戮，但也带来了勇气与荣耀。
value: Frankly speaking, I am not disgusted with war. It brings destruction and killing, but it also brings courage and glory.

name: 战争或许会让自然遭受短暂的痛楚，但却能让新生的生命重新焕发光芒。
value: War may cause nature to suffer short-term pain, but it can bring brightness to new life.

name: 神明与人类的最大区别是勇气与责任感，你不这么认为吗？
value: The biggest difference between gods and humans is courage and responsibility, don't you think so?

name: 带领战死的北欧英雄们去往英灵殿，这是一种使命，也是一种艺术。
value: Leading the Nordic heroes who died in battle to Valhalla is a mission as well as an art.

name: 礼物其实是很神圣的东西呢，你觉得礼物能够给人们带来什么？
value: Gifts are actually very holy things. What do you think gifts can bring to people?

name: 我其实并不认为神明和人类在身份上应该有高低之别，你觉得呢？
value: Actually, I don't think that gods and humans should be different in terms of their identities. What do you think?

name: 我其实挺喜欢小孩子的，他们总会用天真单纯的心思去面对事物。
value: I actually like children very much. They always face things with simple and naive minds.

name: 呵……对于这个战争四起的末日，或许和平就是最好的礼物了吧？
value: Alas...for this doomsday with wars, perhaps peace is the best gift, right?

name: 你有想要的礼物吗？圣诞节的时候要不要我送你一个惊喜？
value: What kind of gift do you like to receive? Would you like me to give you a surprise at Christmas?

name: 其实，礼物送出去前，我自己也不知道礼物袋子里拿出来的会是什么东西……
value: Actually, before the gift is given out, I don't know what things will be taken out from the gift bag either...

name: 其实你身材很棒！
value: Actually you have a perfect figure!

name: 我恐怕没空……
value: I'm afraid I have no time...

name: 战争是和平之母。
value: War is the mother of peace.

name: 我认为没有区别。
value: I think there is no difference.

name: 这是一种重生。
value: This is a kind of rebirth.

name: 但战争代价很大。
value: But the price of war is high.

name: 单纯未必是好事。
value: Being simple is not necessarily a good thing.

name: 我忽然有点慌……
value: I feel a bit scared suddenly...

name: 人类尝试新事物的时候总是伴随着一丝喜悦和一丝害怕，在天使看来其实挺有趣的。
value: When humans try new things, they are always a bit happy and a bit fearful. In angels' view, it is actually quite interesting.

name: 所幸回应你召唤的是我，而不是米迦勒或是路西法之类的，不然你就有苦头吃了……
value: Fortunately, it was me who responded to your summon, not Michael or Lucifer, otherwise you would suffer...

name: 是啊，就算我穿泳装在沙滩上走过的时候，也能感到无数炽热的目光呢！
value: Yeah, even when I walk on the beach in a swimsuit, I can feel countless hot gazes!

name: 也算是吧，但我可不奢求在这个魔物横行的时代，每天都能洗上热水澡。
value: That's right, but I don't have the luxury of asking for a hot bath every day in this era of rampant monsters.

name: 哎呀……看来你比我想象中更懂怎么让女孩子开心呢……这话不是对谁都可以说的喔！
value: Oops... It seems that you know how to make girls happy more than I expected... Don't say this to anyone please~

name: 不会吧！你是在开玩笑的吧？！如果是真的话我今天就开始减肥！今天就开始！
value: No way! Are you kidding me? ! If it is true, I will start losing weight today! Now!

name: 那么一会儿见！我知道一个非常不错的海滩，可以好好享受一下二人时光呢！
value: See you soon! I know a very nice beach where we can enjoy our time!

name: 哼哼……是和其他的女孩子有约会吗？看来我来迟一步了呢……
value: Hum...do you have dates with other girls? It seems that I am a step late...

name: 所以尽快结束这场战争是很重要的事情，我一定会尽全力帮你！
value: So it is very important to end this war as soon as possible, and I will definitely do my best to help you!

name: 或许我们妖怪的想法比较单纯吧，我并不理解你说这句话的内涵……
value: Maybe our monster's mind is simple, I don't understand the connotation of what you said...

name: 不知道就别想啦！至少我更愿意当妖怪，因为从来都不用像神那样担心那么多麻烦事！
value: Then stop thinking if you don't know! At least I prefer to be a monster, because I never have to worry about so many troubles like a god!

name: 呼……我也这么想，大家都是从平凡之身不断磨练，从而获取强大的力量罢了。
value: Aha... I think so too, everyone is constantly tempering from the ordinary body to gain powerful strength.

name: 希腊众神当年指使的特洛伊战争，在凡人看来不也是因为一场爱情的缘故吗？
value: Wasn't the Trojan war that the Greek gods instigated, in the eyes of mortals, also because of love?

name: 当你有了心上人，且愿意为她对抗这个世界的时候，或许你才能明白吧……
value: When you have a sweetheart and are willing to fight the world for her, maybe you can understand...

name: 的确，猫看似优雅温顺，但自尊心丝毫不逊于那些猛兽，惹恼它们可就大事不妙了。
value: Indeed, cats seem elegant and docile, but their self-esteem is not inferior to those beasts, and it is a bad thing to annoy them.

name: 看来你很懂得如何取得这些小家伙的认同呢，能让它们变得乖巧可不是容易事！
value: It seems that you know how to get the approval of these little cuties. It's not easy to make them docile!

name: 是啊，人们只看见战争灰暗的一面，却很少看到鲜血与刀锋背后的高尚与圣洁。
value: Well, people only see the dark side of war, but rarely see the nobility and holiness behind the blood and the blade.

name: 人终有一死，北欧的战士们很多都宁愿光荣地为理想而牺牲，而非平庸地度过一世。
value: Though death befalls all men alike, many Nordic warriors would rather sacrifice their lives honorably for their ideals than living their lives in mediocrity.

name: 生与死都是一种轮回，命运也是，爱情也是，战争更是，万事万物都是无常的。
value: Life and death are a kind of reincarnation, so is destiny, so is love, and so is war. Everything is impermanent.

name: 其实战争的代价会让人们更珍惜来之不易的和平，不是吗？
value: In fact, the price of war will make people cherish the hard-earned peace even more, don't they?

name: 所以并非什么人都能成为众神的统治者，毕竟统治者所要背负的责任难以言喻。
value: Therefore, not everyone can become the ruler of the gods. After all, the responsibility that the ruler has to bear is beyond expression.

name: 你说的其实没错，如果你仔细观察，会发现实力强大的人往往也是勇敢而负责的存在。
value: You are right. If you observe carefully, you will find that powerful people are often brave and responsible.

name: 是的，无论是我还是英灵殿的女武神们都以此为自己的荣耀！
value: Yes, both I and the Valkyries in Valhalla take this as their glory!

name: 目前没有，至少你在战场上英勇牺牲前不行，但……我可不希望看到这一天的到来……
value: Not at the moment, at least you can't go until you die on the battlefield, but...I don't want to see this day come...

name: 是啊，没有比在失落或伤心之时，收到一份温暖的爱更让人振奋的事情了。
value: Yep, there is nothing more exciting than receiving a warm love when you are upset or sad.

name: 的确如此，我没见过有哪个孩子，在见到一大堆的糖果后不开心到满地打滚的。
value: Indeed. I have never seen a child who doesn't roll all over the floor happily after receiving a lot of candies.

name: 所以，不管你是凡人还是神明，我们都不必过于拘谨地对待彼此，你说呢？
value: So, whether you are a mortal or a god, we don't have to treat each other too rigidly, right?

name: 对于我来说没什么区别，因为在我送礼物时，可不会因为身份的高低而偏心喔！
value: It doesn't make a difference to me, because when I give gifts, I won't be biased because of status!

name: 我倒觉得想太多烦恼也多，在这个末日降临的世界，或许单纯地过好每一天也不错。
value: I think worries will increase when thinking more, in this doomsday world, maybe it's not bad to simply live each day well.

name: 一点没错！孩子们从来不去想明天会不会就是世界末日，他们总是乐观看待一切。
value: That's right! Children never think about whether tomorrow will be the end of the world. They always look at everything optimistically.

name: 我可以感受到你的决心，如果你真的能做到，我就送你一件全世界最珍贵的礼物。
value: I can feel your determination. If you can really do it, I will give you the most precious gift in the world.

name: 不用过于悲观，和平总是诞生在人们的希望和期待中，哪怕降临的很慢……
value: Don't be too pessimistic, peace is always born in people's hopes and expectations, even if it comes slowly...

name: 啊啦……你……你的意思是想让我把自己当作礼物送给你吗？
value: Ahhhhh...do you mean...you want me, as a gift?

name: 满足你啦！只要让我每次和你一起出战，就已经是最强大的组合了呢!
value: Ok, will satisfy you! As long as I go with you for battle every time, it is already the most powerful combination!

name: 就是这样！满怀期待地享受在拆开礼物盒前的那份惊喜，也是一种乐趣！
value: That's it! It is also a pleasure to enjoy the surprise before opening the gift box!

name: 啊啦……你的表情让我很想欺负一下呢！猜猜看，这个盒子里是什么恶作剧……？
value: Ahhh... your expression makes me want to bully you! Guess what prank is in this box...?

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_41
value: Received the baptism of life in the flames, rebirth from the fire

name: 火焰标记，每层怒焰标记会增加透体灼弹50%的伤害
value: Mark with fire, each fire mark will increase ATK by 50% of Penetrating Bomb

name: 对敌方3名敌人造成400%的物理伤害，使其进入【燃烧】状态，每回合损失8%的当前生命值，持续4回合；并给自己添加【火盾】，魔抗提高100%，在受到伤害时使目标进入【灼烧】状态，每回合损失灰烬龙女攻击力20%的真实伤害，【灼烧】和【火盾】持续2回合，【灼烧】最多叠加3层。
value: Deals 400% P.DMG to 3 random enemies, inflict [Ignite] state which causes enemies to lose 8% of current HP for 4 rounds; add a [Fire Shield] to herself, which increases M.RES by 100%, and when she receives DMG taken, apply [Scorch] to the enemy, which will cause real DMG of 20% of Ember Dragon's ATK, [Scorch] and [Fire Shield] last for 2 rounds, and [Scorch] can stack, up to 3 times.

name: 对敌方随机发出6枚炎弹，每次造成90%的物理伤害，如果目标处于【燃烧】或【灼烧】状态，则伤害转化为真实伤害，每一枚炎弹会给敌方施加一层【怒焰】标记（无视异常免疫，可以叠加），每层标记会使目标受到的炎弹伤害提高50%，【怒焰】标记持续1回合。
value: Throws up 6 firebombs randomly to enemies, each attack causing 90% P.DMG. If the enemy is in [Ignite] or [Scorch] state, the damage will be converted into True Damage. Each firebomb will add one [Infuriation] mark (ignoring Debuff RES, can stack), each mark will cause enemies' DMG taken from the firebomb increased by 50%. (The max DMG of one firebomb is 1215%) [Infuriation] mark lasts for 1 round.

name: 4回合【燃烧】状态，每回合损失敌人当前生命值8%的血量
value: [Ignite] state for 4 rounds, enemy’s current HP loses 8% in each round

name: 2回合火盾状态，魔抗增加100%，受到伤害反弹给敌人【灼烧】效果。
value: [Fire Shield] state for 2 rounds, which increases M.RES by 100%, and when receiving DMG, apply [Scorch] to the enemy

name: 2回合将受到灰烬龙女（20%*层数）真实伤害
value: Causes real DMG equals to 20%*amount of mark

name: 只可上阵战士职业女神
value: Only warrior angels can be deployed

value: Only mage angels can be deployed

value: Only archer angels can be deployed

value: Open to get an advanced gift

value: Open to get a deluxe gift

value: Use it in give away screen, increase 10 favorability points

value: Use it in give away screen, increase 20 favorability points

value: Use it in give away screen, increase 50 favorability points

value: Angel's nickname can only be changed once every 30 days.

name: 对敌方随机发出6枚炎弹，每次造成90%的物理伤害，如果目标处于【燃烧】或【灼烧】状态，则伤害转化为真实伤害，每一枚炎弹会给敌方施加一层【怒焰】标记（无视异常免疫，可以叠加），每层标记会使目标受到的炎弹伤害提高50%（单体总伤害最高为1215%），【怒焰】标记持续1回合。
value: Throws up 6 firebombs randomly to enemies, each attack causing 90% P.DMG. If the enemy is in [Ignite] or [Scorch] state, the damage will be converted into True Damage. Each firebomb will add one [Infuriation] mark (ignoring Debuff RES, can stack), each mark will increase the firebomb's ATK by 50%. ( The max ATK of one firebomb is 1215%) [Infuriation] mark lasts for 1 round.

name: 是否使用一枚幻想星戒与女神誓约
value: Are you sure you want to use a Magic Star Ring to vow to the angel?

name: 呐，姐姐！我发现自己的火焰忽然比以前炽热了好几倍！
value: Hey, sister! I found that my flame was suddenly hotter several times than before!

name: 从魔力的变化看来，你应该获得了和我类似的力量。
value: Judging from the change in magic power, you should have gained power similar to mine.

name: 全新的觉醒之力么？天哪……你这眼神让我有不好的预感……
value: A new power of awakening? OMG... Look at your eyes, that makes me have a bad feeling...

name: 姐姐你猜对啦！我早就想试试新的力量了！来打一架吧！
value: Sister, you are right! I have long wanted to try new powers! Let's fight!

name: 不会吧？！我才刚刚做完热身运动而已！
value: No way? ! I just finished warming up!

name: 我感到你的力量需要不断与强者战斗，才能完全被唤醒。
value: I feel that your power needs to constantly fight the strong to be fully awakened.

name: 这可真是一件让人兴奋的事情！
value: This is really an exciting thing!

name: 等一下！我的意思不是让你到别的神明那里去惹麻烦！
value: Wait! I don't mean to let you in trouble with other gods!

name: 哎？我听说女娲神殿门口有魔物入侵……怎么是你？
value: Uh, I heard that there is a monster invading at the gate of Nuwa temple...Why it's you?

name: 啊……说我是魔物我也不在意啦，来打架吧！
value: Well... I don't care if I am described as a monster. Let's fight!

name: 喔哟？我最近拳头发痒，正愁没什么惹事的家伙可以揍呐！
value: Huh? I just want to use my fists, wondering if there is someone who caused trouble to let me beat!

name: 那就不要废话啦！痛快地打一场比什么都重要！
value: Then stop speaking rubbish! A good fight is more important than anything else!

name: 咳咳……没想到身为火神的我，竟然会输给你的烈焰。
value: Ahem... I didn't expect that as the god of fire, I would lose to your flames.

name: 真是太无趣了！我原以为要打上好几天才能分出胜负！
value: It's so boring! I thought it would take several days to know who is the winner!

name: 依我来看，或许只有主神级的强者或许才能和你一战。
value: In my opinion, perhaps only the powerhouse of the main god-level be able to fight you.

name: 真的？！那我去找奥丁老大较量较量！回头见！
value: Really? ! Then I'll go to boss Odin and fight with her! See you later!

name: 喔哟，她竟然真的相信了，这下有戏看喽，哈哈……
value: Oh, she actually believed it. There will be funny things, haha...

name: 老大！我来找你打架啦！哎？太阳神大人也在啊……
value: Hi, boss! I'm coming to fight with you! Oh, you are here too, sun god...

name: 啊啦……这不是奥丁最宠爱的那只脾气火爆的小可爱么？
value: Ah... Isn't this the hot-tempered cutie that Odin loves the most?

name: 北欧龙族也能拥有如此强大的潜力，倒是挺让我意外的……
value: I am surprised that the Nordic dragons can also have such a strong potential...

name: 看你满脸兴奋，是不是想让太阳神姐姐好好疼爱你一番了？
value: Look at your exciting face. Do you want the sun god to fight with you?

name: 那真是求之不得的事情呢！
value: That's really a most welcome thing!

name: 哼……看来你觉醒了不得了的力量啊……
value: Huh... It seems that you have awakened an incredible power...

name: 太阳的光辉似乎都无法遮盖你的烈焰，这非比寻常……
value: The brilliance from sun seems to be unable to cover your flames, this is extraordinary...

name: 我也没想到能爆发出这种力量，但我也快接近极限了……
value: I didn't expect I can burst this strong power, but I am also approaching the limit...

name: 不过在刚才的战斗中，我似乎察觉到了创世神的魔力。
value: But in the battle just now, I seemed to be aware of the magic power of creator goddess.

name: 喔？这可真是个有意思的发现，我会好好调查一下的……
value: Oh? This is really interesting discovery, I will investigate it carefully...

name: 女神誓约所需的珍贵材料
value: Precious material which is needed for vowing to your angels

name: 点击女神查看详细
value: Click the angel to view the detail

value: <size=22>Favorability points can be increased by interact with the Angel on the screen, giving gifts and sending them on adventures.</size>

value: Giving gifts to Angels can increase favorability points.

value: Use it on angel page, can increase favorability points

name: 天空派对活动期间战场挂机掉落，可以在活动界面兑换道具。
value: During the Celestial Party event, the battlefield will drop off items and you can exchange items at the event.

name: 主角和女神都将获得属性加成
value: Both main character and angel will get attributes bonus

name: 好感度上限突破至3000
value: The upper limit of favorability points increased to 3000

name: 主角加成会随着结婚次数动态变化
value: Main character bonus will be changed after vowed

name: 与三位女神誓约后，解锁主角婚纱
value: MC's Wedding Dress will be unlocked after vowing to 3 angels

name: 对生命值最低的1名敌人造成650%物理伤害，并使其进入【破甲】状态，防御力降低80%，持续4回合；如果目标阵亡，则额外对敌方全体造成120%的物理伤害，并且进入4回合【破甲】状态，并将造成伤害的30%转化为【风盾】，持续1回合。
value: Deals 650% P.DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP, and make the enemy into [Sunder Armor] state which reduce the enemy's DEF by 80% for 4 rounds; If the enemy is killed, deal additional 120% P.DMG to all the enemies, and make them into [Sunder Armor] state for 4 rounds.

name: 龙女彻底释放雷龙血脉的力量，进入狂乱状态，无视任何异常效果，持续3回合。并使自身攻击力提高350%，普通攻击必定暴击，持续2回合（无法被驱散）。并对敌方施加3回合【电】效果，拥有【电】效果的敌人受到普通攻击后，将触发一次雷暴，敌方全体将受到风暴龙20%的物理伤害。
value: The Storm dragon completely releases the power of the Thunder Dragon bloodline and enters a [Frenzy] state for 3 rounds, in which she ignores all abnormal effects. Also it increases her ATK by 350% and is guaranteed to crit when she releases basic attack, lasts for 2 rounds (cannot be dispelled). And she will apply [Electric] state which will last for 3 rounds to the enemies. The enemies who are in [Electric] state will trigger a thunderstorm when receiving basic attack from any angels, which will causes all the enemies to receive 20% P.DMG from Storm Dragon.

name: 因{SKILL_NAME}的效果，{TARGET_NAME}进入【狂乱】状态，增加350%攻击力，无视任何异常效果，普通攻击必定暴击，持续2回合。
value: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} enters [Frenzy] state, increasing ATK by 350%, ignoring all abnormal effects and guaranteed to crit when releasing basic attack, lasts for 2 rounds.

name: 1回合不可驱散护盾
value: Add a non-dispellable shield for 1 round

name: 3回合【电】效果，受到普攻后，将触发雷暴受到风暴龙20%的物理伤害
value: [Electric] state for 3 rounds, when receiving basic attack, will trigger a thunderstorm then receive 20% P.DMG from Storm Dragon

name: 2回合内普通攻击必暴击且免疫一切不良效果，攻击力提高350%
value: In 2 rounds, guaranteed to crit when releasing basic attack, ignore all abnormal effects,and increase ATK by 350%

value: Darkness will have nowhere to hide beneth the blazing sun!

name: 国战任务/排名奖励获得
喔！姐姐你看上去好像觉醒了全新的力量？！
value: Wow, it seems like you have awakened a new power!

name: 我……只感觉浑身上下都充满了闪电的狂怒……
value: I feel like..my body is full of furious lightning...

name: 哦？亲爱的，你终于因为没命地研究魔力而发疯了吗？
value: Oh? Honey, are you finally mad for studying magic powers desperately?

name: 看来只有打一架，才能知道这闪电的力量究竟有多大了！
value: It seems that only a fight can prove the power of the lightning!

name: 那就没有必要多说什么了！来吧 ！
value: Then there is no need to say anything more! Come on!

name: 难以置信，你雷电的破坏力似乎和之前相比大幅提升！
value: It shocks me that the destructive power of your lightning seems to be greatly improved compared to before!

name: 而且无论是冰还是烈焰，似乎都无法对你造成影响。
value: And probably neither the ice nor the flames can affect you.

name: 在战斗的时候，我好像感觉到雷电帮我形成了一道屏障。
value: I think that the lightning made a shield for me during the battle.

name: 而这道屏障，应该可以免除所有对你不利的状态。
value: And this shield should be able to avoid all unfavorable conditions for you.

name: 我还想到了一个能击穿对方防御的新招，或许也可以试试。
value: I also thought of a new skill that can penetrate the opponent's defense, maybe I can have a try.

name: 敢挑战我们三位高阶防御者的力量，我应该称赞你的勇气。
value: Dare to challenge us three high-level defenders, I should praise your courage.

name: 哼……我可不希望你们认为我还是之前那个不成熟的学者。
value: Humph...I don't want you to think that I am the immature scholar before.

name: 是吗？那么就让稳重的大地，来领教一下你的闪电吧。
value: Are you? Then let the steady earth come to confront your lightning.

name: 还没有谁的攻击，能洞穿我号称北欧最强守护者的防御。
value: No one's attack can penetrate the defense of what I claim to be the strongest guardian in Norse.

name: 是吗？！那么就让你们见识一下，击溃一切的雷暴吧！
value: Really? ! Then let you guys see the thunderstorm that crush everything!

name: 令人惊讶，这雷电竟然能让人浑身颤抖，无法专注防御……
value: Surprisingly, this thunderstorm can make people tremble all over, unable to focus on defense...

name: 呵……看来强大的盔甲在面对这种雷暴时，也无能为力。
value: Hum... It seems that the powerful armor is powerless when facing this kind of thunderstorm.

name: 在我看来，这种雷暴还能够形成大范围的爆炸。
value: In my opinion, this kind of thunderstorm can also form a large-scale explosion.

name: 的确，相比过去的自己，我感到攻守兼备是最佳的策略。
value: Indeed, compared to my past self, I feel that having both attacking and defense is the best strategy.

name: 哼……我会好好善用觉醒之力，去解决这场末日危机的。
value: Hmph... I will make good use of the awakening power, to solve this doomsday crisis.

name: 重铸40次可激活一次属性自选
value: Reforging every 10 times will activate a chance to select one attribute.

name: 对生命值最低的1名敌人造成650%物理伤害，并使其进入【破甲】状态，防御力降低80%，持续4回合；如果目标阵亡，则额外对敌方全体造成120%的物理伤害，并且进入4回合【破甲】状态；并将造成伤害的30%转化为【护盾】，持续至战斗结束。
value: Deals 650% P.DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP, and make the enemy into [Sunder Armor] state which reduce the enemy's DEF by 80% for 4 rounds; If the enemy is killed, deal additional 120% P.DMG to all the enemies, and make them into [Sunder Armor] state for 4 round

value: Congratulations, your guild has reached No.{0} in Gods Twilight this season, you have earned the following rewards:

name: 对生命值最低的1名敌人造成650%物理伤害，并使其进入【破甲】状态，防御力降低80%，持续4回合；如果目标阵亡，则额外对敌方全体造成120%的物理伤害，并且进入4回合【破甲】状态。风暴之龙造成所有伤害的30%将转化为【护盾】，持续至战斗结束。
value: Deals 650% P.DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP, and make the enemy into [Sunder Armor] state which reduce the enemy's DEF by 80% for 4 rounds; If the enemy is killed, deal additional 120% P.DMG to all the enemies, and make them into [Sunder Armor] state for 4 round

name: 龙女彻底释放雷龙血脉的力量，进入狂乱状态，无视任何异常效果，持续3回合。并使自身攻击力提高350%，普通攻击必定暴击，持续2回合（无法被驱散）。并对敌方施加3回合【电】效果，拥有【电】效果的敌人受到普通攻击伤害后，将触发一次雷暴，敌方全体将受到风暴龙20%的物理伤害。
value: The Storm dragon completely releases the power of the Thunder Dragon bloodline and enters a [Frenzy] state for 3 rounds, in which she ignores all abnormal effects. Also it increases her ATK by 350% and is guaranteed to crit when she releases basic attack, lasts for 2 rounds (cannot be dispelled). And she will apply [Electric] state which will last for 3 rounds to the enemies. The enemies who are in [Electric] state will trigger a thunderstorm when receiving DMG from basic attack by opponents, which will causes all the enemies to receive 20% P.DMG from Storm Dragon.

name: 对生命值最低的1名敌人造成650%物理伤害，并使其进入【破甲】状态，防御力降低80%，持续4回合；如果目标阵亡，则额外对敌方全体造成120%的物理伤害，并且进入4回合【破甲】状态。风暴之龙使用风之力量将为自己施加【庇护】，韧性提升50%，持续1回合。
value: Deals 650% P.DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP, and make the enemy into [Sunder Armor] state which reduce the enemy's DEF by 80% for 4 rounds; If the enemy is killed, deal additional 120% P.DMG to all the enemies, and make them into [Sunder Armor] state for 4 rounds.

name: 龙女彻底释放雷龙血脉的力量，进入狂乱状态，无视任何异常效果，持续3回合。并使自身攻击力提高350%，普通攻击必定暴击，持续2回合（无法被驱散）。并对敌方施加3回合【电】效果（无视异常抵抗），拥有【电】效果的敌人受到普通攻击伤害后，将触发一次雷暴，敌方全体将受到风暴之龙10%的物理伤害。
value: The Storm dragon enters a [Frenzy] state for 3 rounds, in which she ignores all abnormal effects. Also it increases her ATK by 350% and is guaranteed to crit when she releases basic attack, lasts for 2 rounds (cannot be dispelled). And she will apply [Electric] state which will last for 3 rounds to the enemies (ignore Debuff RES). The enemies who are in [Electric] state will trigger a thunderstorm when receiving basic attack from opponents, which will causes all the enemies to receive 10% P.DMG from Storm Dragon.

name: 3回合【电】效果，受到普攻后，将触发雷暴受到风暴之龙10%的物理伤害
value: [Electric] state for 3 rounds, when receiving basic attack, will trigger a thunderstorm then receive 10% P.DMG from Storm Dragon

name: HDRES_DOWNLOAD_NOTICE
value: Are you sure you want to download HD texture pack of [{0}] to improve angel's image quality? (If there is lag or crash after downloading, you can return to the original one in this interface)

name: 通关新西伯利亚全部关卡
通关圣彼得堡全部关卡
value: Clear all levels in Saint Petersburg

name: 通关贝加尔湖全部关卡
value: Clear all levels in Lake Baikal

name: 通关叶卡捷琳堡全部关卡
对前排3名敌人造成400%的物理伤害，并且进入【挑衅】状态使敌人优先攻击自己，同时自身收到伤害降低60%，伤害反弹增加80%，并且将【链接】除了自己外攻击力最高的友军，双方将平摊受到的所有伤害，持续2回合
value:
Deals 400% P.DMG to 3 enemies in front row, and enters [Taunt UR]  and [Link] state for 2 rounds, linking Heimdall to the ally with the highest ATK.

[Taunt UR]: Increases DMG Reduction by 60% and DMG Reflection by 80%.
[Link]: The damage received on this angel will split 50% to Heimdall.

name: 对敌方全体造成350%的物理伤害，并且将伤害的30%转化为自身血量，若自身血量低于50%，则必定暴击，并且将会施加2回合【流血】，无法回复生命值。
value: Deals 350% P.DMG to all enemies. Heimdall's HP will be restored by 30% of the damage inflicted. If her HP is less than 50%, she will definitely land a critical hit and apply [Bleed] to enemies for 2 rounds.\n\n[Bleed]: Unable to recover HP.

name: 2回合【挑衅】，自身收到伤害降低60%，伤害反弹增加80%
value: Increases DMG Reduction by 60% and DMG Reflection by 80%.

name: 链接方将会平摊受到的所有伤害
value: The damage received on this angel will split 50% to Heimdall.

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_43
value: Team Guardian & Frontline Tank & Prevent Healing

name: 希腊的入侵者？！给我站住！彩虹桥只为北欧众神所开启！
value: The invaders of Greece? ! Stop it! The Rainbow Bridge is only opened by the Nordic gods!

name: （没有回答？这太反常了……但我决不会让入侵者通过！）
value: (No one answers? This is too abnormal...but I will never let intruders pass!)

name: 呼……好强的压迫力……这就是希腊主神的力量吗……
value: Phew... What a strong oppressive force... Is this the power of the main Greek god...

name: 等等！为什么他们的身影开始消失了？！这是幻象？！
value: What! Why did their figure begin to disappear? ! Is this an illusion? !

name: 哟，不但防守滴水不漏，还能让对方彻底失去恢复能力……
value: Oh, not only is the defense drip-proof, but it can also completely lose the ability of the opponent to recover...

name: 什么人？！我可没兴趣和躲起来的懦夫说话！
value: who are you? ! I'm not interested in talking to a coward who is hiding!

name: 嘻嘻，你比诸神黄昏时更强了，给你一个更大的挑战吧……
value: Haha, you are stronger than the gods at dusk, there is a bigger challenge for you...

name: 呵……能把奥丁老大的幻象召唤出来的家伙，只有你了吧？
value: Heh...Are you the only one who can summon the illusion of Odin's, right?

name: 哎呀，没想到我这么出名吗？要不要给你签个名？
value: Oh, didn’t you expect me to be so famous? Do you want to sign your name?

name: 没人对你那肮脏的名字感兴趣，邪神洛基。
value: No one is interested in your dirty name, Cthulhu Loki.

name: 嘴硬的家伙，让我看看你的战术是否像你的防御一样可靠！
value: Hard-mouthed guy, let me see if your tactics are as reliable as your defense!

name: 这怎么可能，奥丁强大的攻击竟然没有击倒任何一人？！
value: How is this possible that Odin's powerful attack didn't knock down anyone? !

name: 让你意外了？是不是觉得自己的脑子不大可靠了？
value: Is this out of your guess? Do you think your brain is unreliable anymore?

name: 没想到你能用号角链接同伴的灵魂，替他们承担攻击……
value: Unexpectedly, you can use the horn to link the souls of your companions and take the attack on their behalf...

name: 你永远也别想在我倒下前，击倒我的同伴！
value: You never want to knock down my companions before I fall down!

name: 很好……我很乐意让你体验一下北欧最强破坏者的狂怒！
value: Very good... I would love to let you experience the fury of the strongest saboteur in Northern Europe!

name: 见鬼……觉醒的风暴之龙？
value: Damn... is this the awakened storm dragon?

name: 至今为止，还无人能抵挡北欧龙族中进攻如此凶狠的角色！
value: So far, no one can resist such a fierce attacking role among the Nordic dragons!

name: 你麻烦大了，我倒要见识见识运气是否总站在你那边！
value: You are in big trouble, but I want to see if luck is always on your side!

name: 所有人保持阵型！不要慌乱！
value: Everyone stays in formation! Don't panic!

name: 这没可能……你的力量以前从来没有如此强大过……
value: This is impossible... Your power has never been so strong before...

name: 神也是会成长的呐，我很期待把你打趴下的那一刻。
value: God will grow up and I look forward to the moment when I beat you down.

name: 哼！别得意太早！这次的失败只是我计划的一次实验罢了！
value: This failure is just an experiment I planned! I will be succussful!

name: 在我看来你的计划恐怕要提前破产了，只要我还活着。
value: In my opinion, your plan may be bankrupt in advance, as long as I am still alive.

name: 计划实施的那天，我会好好享受你的恐惧，走着瞧吧！
value: When the plan is implemented, I will enjoy your fears, let’s just take a look!

name: 对前排3名敌人造成400%的物理伤害，并且进入【挑衅】状态使敌人优先攻击自己，同时自身收到伤害降低60%，伤害反弹增加80%，并且将【链接】除了自己外攻击力最高的友军，此友军受到的伤害将会分摊50%给海姆达尔（不超过海姆达尔当前生命值），持续2回合
value:
Deals 400% P.DMG to 3 enemies in front row, and enters [Taunt UR]  and [Link] state for 2 rounds.

[Taunt UR]: Increases DMG Reduction by 60% and DMG Reflection by 80%.
[Link]: Links Heimdall to the ally with the highest ATK. The damage received on this angel will split 50% to Heimdall. (Not exceeding the current HP of Heimdall)

name: 奥林匹斯之战最高排名：
当进驻晶石之泉时，提升晶石的产量。
value: When stationed at spar spring,increasing the productivity of spar

name: 伊薇特是最早一批从沉睡中醒来的半人马贤者，也是最早发现晶石矿在建筑上能发挥奇特功效的幻兽。她非常熟悉大自然，能够根据丰富的经验和对大地魔法的掌控，让泉水中所产的晶石矿藏更为富饶。她很反感战争，但并不意味着自己不善于战斗，不过她还是很庆幸幻兽们能享受难得的和平。
value: Yvette was one of the first among the group of centaur sages to wake up from their deep sleep, and the first to discover that the crystal mine had a special architectural effect. She is very familiar with nature, and can make crystals produced in the spring water richer based on her rich experience and mastery of earth magic. She is very disgusted with war, but it does not mean that she is not good at fighting. After all, she feels very fortunate that the Eudemons can enjoy the rare peace.

name: 当进驻熔岩池时，提升强化精华的产量。
value: When stationed at lava lake, increasing the productivity of Enhance Essence

name: 作为不死鸟的家族成员之一，妮菲塔莉是少有的不畏惧火焰的种族。正是因为这种能力，只有她能从火山口炽热的熔岩中提炼出额外的强化精华，她也一直以此为傲。虽然看上去很年幼，但没人知道她活了多久，据说她大部分时间都在沉睡，所以心理年龄更像孩子。
value: As a member of the Phoenix family, Nefertari is among one of the few races that is not afraid of flames. It is precisely because of this ability that only she can extract extra Enhance Essence from the hot lava of the volcano, and she has always been proud of it. Although she looks very young, no one knows how long she has lived. It is said that she has been asleep most of the time, so her mental age is more like a child.

name: 当进驻神核祭坛时，提升神核的产量。
value: When staioned at holy core altar, increasing the productivity of holy core

name: 艾琳诺本身就拥有接近神明的可怕力量，正是这一点让她能够做到很多神明都无法企及的事。例如，她可以通过强大的魔力，向更高位的神明祈祷，从而创造出无比珍贵的神核。艾琳诺虽然出身于黑暗无比的深渊，但对任何人都非常温柔，有着大姐姐一般的成熟魅力。
value: Eleanor herself has the terrifying near-divine power, and this allows her to do things that many gods can't match. For example, she can pray to higher gods through powerful magic power, thereby creating extremely precious holy cores. Although Eleanor was born in a dark abyss, she is very gentle to anyone and has the mature charm of a big sister.

name: 当进驻宝石矿山时，提升宝石的产量。
value: When staioned at gem mine, increasing the productivity of gem

name: 芬妮尔性格虽然看上去粗枝大叶，但对钻石这种艺术品的熟悉程度却远超其他人，她总能找到更好的钻石矿。除了精于寻找矿脉外，她还很擅长于钻石的切割与制作，尤其是使用自己锐利的爪子进行这项工作时。她沿用了北欧先祖的名号，是个不折不扣的好战分子，同时，她也是个容易满足于酒宴和派对的家伙。
value: Although Fenrir's character looks careless, she is far more familiar with diamonds than others, and she can always find better diamonds. In addition to being good at finding ore veins, she is also very good at cutting and making diamonds, especially when using her sharp claws for this work. She inherited the name of the Nordic ancestors. She was an out-and-out militant, but also could easily indulge in banquets and parties.

name: 当进驻炼金工房时，提升钻石的产量。
value: When staioned at Atelier, increasing the productivity of diamond

name: 只有雪樱这样已经生存了几千年的妖怪，才能运用不为人知的炼金技巧，从普通矿石中精炼出宝石。作为高贵的九尾狐一族，雪樱并不在意自己的身份，她很乐意看到自己的成果得到认可，并派上用场。和其他热衷于战争的族人不同，雪樱对战争很反感，她会毫不犹豫地与追求和平的人达成同盟。
value: Only monsters like Yukizakura, who have survived for thousands of years, can use unknown alchemy techniques to refine gems from ordinary ore. As a member of the noble nine-tailed foxes family, Yukizakura doesn't care about her identity. She is happy to see her achievements being recognized and put to use. Unlike others who are keen on war, Yukizakura is very disgusted with war, and she will not hesitate to form an alliance with those who pursue peace.

name: 一种生长于异界的大个果实，能够快速填饱肚子，幻兽们格外喜爱。
value: Big fruits that grow in another world, which can fill up stomach quickly, Eudemons' favourite.

name: 富含魔力，外表晶莹剔透，如宝石般漂亮的水果，果香浓郁口感清爽，即使是肉食性的幻兽也很喜欢。
value: Full of magic power, crystal clear in appearance, beautiful gems-liked fruits. Rich in fruity flavor and refreshing, even carnivorous monsters like it very much.

name: 以龙血浇灌的奇特果实，食用后能够显著提升力量，因无法大量栽种而倍显珍贵。
value: The peculiar fruit watered with dragon blood can significantly increase the strength after eating, and it is more precious because it cannot be planted in large quantities.

name: 只生长在第七神域的创世神树上，据说能够大幅提升食用者的寿命，是无价之宝。
value: It only grows on the Divine Tree of Creation in the Seventh domain, and it is said to be a priceless treasure that can greatly increase the lifespan of the eater.

name: 鸟类羽毛制作的精美小玩意，挠痒惩罚效果一流，但据幻兽们说，挠多了会上瘾……
value: Exquisite gadget made of bird feathers, it has a outstanding effect on tickling, but according to Eudemons, too much tickling will be addictive...

name: 精巧而结实的粉色丝带，用来系在宠物身上当作装饰，至于系在身体的什么位置上，就得看主人的情调了……
value: The delicate and strong pink ribbon is used to tie the pet as a decoration. As for the position on the body, it depends on the master's sentiment...

name: 点燃后会产生让幻兽恍惚而愉悦的香气，不知是什么原因，此物经常被当作贡品献给创世神……
value: After being ignited, it will produce a scent that makes the Eudemons trance and pleasant. For unknown reasons, this thing is often presented as a tribute to the creator…

name: 有流言称这是创世神亲自发明的宝物，用途不详，但据幻兽们说这东西有一击入魂的快感……
value: There are rumors that this is a treasure invented by the creator himself, and its use is unknown, but according to the eudemons, this thing has the pleasure of hitting the soul...

value: Eudemon owned, favorability converted to experience
