value: Continuous High DMG & Target Vulnerable Enemies

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_46
value: Greet the coming of Moon God under the blessing of moonlight

name: 集齐55个嫦娥碎片可以召唤嫦娥
value: Collect 55 Chang'e Shards to summon Chang'e

name: 对敌方全体造成120%的法术伤害，如目标处于【破甲】状态，则伤害翻倍；技能释放后如果有目标阵亡，则会再次发动技能，总段数最多为6段，且芙蕾雅的天光神罚将会贯穿护盾的防御，造成无视护盾的伤害。
value: Deals 120% M.DMG to all enemies. If the enemy is in [Sunder Armor] state, DMG will be doubled. If the enemy is killed, releases this skill again, up to 6 times.Besides, Freyja's Divine retribution will penetrate the defense, causing damage that ignores the shie

name: 对敌方全体造成150%-1050%的法术伤害，敌方队伍中每缺少1人（按上阵6人计算），伤害增加180%且无视敌方20%的法术抗性，最高造成1050%的无视敌方全部法术抗性的伤害。
value: Deals 150%-1050% M.DMG to all enemies. For every empty slot in line-up (as 6 enemies deployed), M.DMG is increased by 180% and ignoring 20% M.RES, stacked up to 1050% and ignoring all M.RES.

name: 嫦娥将发射12段月光，每段月光将造成50%的物理伤害并给予敌人1层持续无限回合的【月光】标记（最多叠加12层、无视抵抗、无法驱散），将优先攻击生命值最低的敌人，如敌人死亡将会给敌人全队叠加1层【月光】标记。
value: Chang'e shoots 12 moonbeams at the enemy with the lowest HP. Each beam causes 50% P.DMG and gives the enemy 1 [Moonlight] mark (lasts for unlimited rounds, stacks up to 12 times, ignoring RES, non-dispellable). If the target dies, gives 1 [Moonlight] mark to all enemies.

name: 月兔将敌方全体残留的【月光】标记揉碎在梦境中，随机进行6次单体月兔攻击，区分敌方【月光】层数来造成伤害，0-5层的敌人将受到100%的物理伤害；6-11层的敌人将受到150%的物理伤害；12层的敌人将受到180%物理伤害。(标记不会被清除)
value: The Jade Hare shreds all the remaining [Moonlight] marks on the enemy, and randomly performs 6 single attacks. Enemies receive DMG according to [Moonlight] marks on them. Enemies with 0-5 marks receive 100% P.DMG; enemies with 6-11 marks receive 150% P.DMG; enemies with 12 marks receive 180% P.DMG. (Marks won't be reset)

name: 嫦娥将发射15段月光，每段月光将造成50%的物理伤害并给予敌人1层持续无限回合的【月光】标记（最多叠加18层、无视抵抗、无法驱散），将优先攻击生命值最低的敌人，如敌人死亡将会给敌人全队叠加1层【月光】标记，每段攻击也会有20%概率获得【月神】加成（无限回合、不可驱散），5%的攻击力和5%的暴击值，最多叠加6层。
value: Chang'e shoots 15 moonbeams at the enemy with the lowest HP. Each beam causes 50% P.DMG, gives the enemy 1 [Moonlight] mark (stacks up to 18 times, ignoring RES), and has a 20% chance of putting Chang'e in [Moon God] state (stacks up to 6 times). (Both states last for unlimited rounds and are non-dispellable.) If the target dies, all enemies receive 1 [Moonlight] mark.\n\n[Moon God]: Increases Chang'e's ATK and CRIT by 5%.

name: 月兔将敌人全队残留的【月光】标记揉碎在梦境中，随机进行6次单体月兔攻击，区分敌方【月光】层数来造成伤害，0-5层的敌人将受到120%的物理伤害；6-11层的敌人将受到180%的物理伤害；12-17层的敌人将受到200%的物理伤害；18层的敌人将受到200%的物理伤害和20%的真实伤害。(标记不会被清除)
value: The Jade Hare shreds all the remaining [Moonlight] marks on the enemy, and randomly performs 6 single attacks. Enemies receive DMG according to [Moonlight] marks on them. Enemies with 0-5 marks receive 120% P.DMG; enemies with 6-11 marks receive 180% P.DMG; enemies with 12-17 marks receive 200% P.DMG;  enemies with 18 marks receive 200% P.DMG and an extra 20% True DMG. (Marks won't be reset)

name: 广寒孤月所提供的【月光】标记
明月共赏所提供的【月光】标记
【月神】增益，每层提供5%的攻击力和5%的暴击值
WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_22
value: In the white world off the beaten track, lone travelers will eventually get lost.

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_23
value: The eruptions of volcanos are just sneezes of the nature, but will annihilate insignificant creatures.

name: 哎？巴里，这是一扇传送门吧？你知道怎么激活它吗？
value: Huh? Bari, is this a portal? Do you know how to activate it?

name: 啊啦，我怎么会知道，没准你大喊一声“芝麻开门”就成了？
value: How would I know? Why don't you try yelling Open Sesame?

name: 芝麻开门！！！好吧……我其实早料到你在耍我……
value: Open Sesame!!! Alright, I knew you were just pulling my leg…

name: 然而你还是上当了……等等！为什么这门开始发光了？！
value: But you still fell for it- Wait! Why is the portal starting to glow!?

name: 有人吗？太好了……没想到几百年后终于能联系到结界外面……
value: Is anyone there? Thank goodness… To think I've finally managed to contact the world outside the barrier after hundreds of years…

name: 如果有人在另一边……请尽快修复传送门……
value: If someone is on the other side... please fix the portal as soon as possible…

name: 你听到了吗？！只要修好它就可以知道门那边的秘密了呢！
value: Did you hear that?! As long as we fix it, we'll be able to discover the secret at the other side of the portal!

name: 你为什么眼巴巴地盯着我看！你不会指望我来修这破门吧！
value: Why are you staring at me so eagerly!? You don't expect me to fix this broken portal, do you?!

name: 满足一下我的好奇心嘛，亲爱的，我知道你能把它修好的！
value: C'mon, honey. Please fix it for me? I'm dying to know! I know you can do it!

name: 天哪……为什么我堂堂巫女要替你来做这种事……
value: Oh my god… How could I, a grand and magnificent Shrine Maiden, be reduced to doing this for you…

name: 巴里……门修好了吗？你都修一个星期了，要不要我帮忙？
value: Bari...has the portal been fixed? You have been fixing it for a week, would you like me to help?

name: 不用！如果让你来“帮忙”，这门恐怕几秒后就会散架！
value: No need! If I ask you for help, this portal will fall apart in seconds!

name: 我有这么笨么……等等？门里好像有动静？！
value: I'm not that stupid, am I...? Wait! There seems to be movement in the portal? !

name: 好像接通了，比上次清楚呢！听得到吗？测试！测试！
value: It seems to be connected, it's clearer than last time! Can you hear me? Testing! Testing!

name: 喂喂！巴里，你知道对面是谁吗？！
value: Hello? Hello?! Bari, do you know who is that on the other side?!

name: 不知道，但至少不是魔物，否则你现在已经是个死人了……
value: I don’t know, but at least it’s not a monster, otherwise you would be dead by now…

name: 不用担心，这里是混沌外域，魔物不敢来这里……
value: Don't worry, this is Chaos Realm, and the monsters dare not come here...

name: 混沌外域？巴里你知道这个地方吗？
value: Chaos Realm? Bari, do you know this place?

name: 好像是位于神界之外，一个连创世神也管不着的地方……
value: It seems to be located outside the realm of God, a place that even the God of Creation can't control…

name: 啊，你说对了一半，其实这地方只是个……
value: Ah, you are half right, in fact this place is just…

name: 只是个什么？啊啊啊！怎么断开了！巴里！！快修门！！！
value: Just what? Ah ah ah! It's disconnected! Bari! ! Hurry! Fix the portal! ! !

name: 巴里……已经半个月了，我做梦都在想门后面是什么……
value: Bari... It's been half a month, I'm dreaming about what's behind the portal…

name: 别急，虽然没完全修复，但也多多少少可以顺利开启了。
value: Don't worry, although it hasn't been completely fixed, it can be opened more or less smoothly.

name: 这扇门好像只会响应你的命令，你把手放在门上就能激活。
value: This portal seems to only respond to your commands, and you can activate it by putting your hand on the door.

name: 只响应我的命令？还真挺奇怪的……试试看好了，开启吧！！
value: Only respond to my orders? It's really weird... Try it, let's turn it on! !

name: 哟……两个人就能完成修复传送门这件事，真是让人意外呢。
value: Yo... It's really surprising that two people can complete the repair of the portal.

name: 你没有神明气息但却具有神格……我明白了，你是幻兽吧？
value: You don't have the temperament of a god but you have a godhead...I see, you are an Eudemon, right?

name: 的确如您所言，我们是幻兽，被神明流放的存在……
value: Indeed, as you said, we are Eudemons, exiled by the gods…

name: 神明们的仆从，或是传说中的生物吧？我其实也不大清楚。
value: Servants of the gods, or legendary creatures? I actually don't know much.

name: 不管如何，我们都希望能找到从这里出去的方法……因为……
value: No matter what, we all hope to find a way out from here…since...

name: 噢不……连接又断了，看来我们必须把门彻底修好才行。
value: Oh no... the connection is broken again. It seems that we have to fix the portal thoroughly.

name: 啊……门又坏了，明明之前还能见到门那边的景象……
value: Ah... the door is broken again. Previously, we could still see the scene on the other side of the door...

name: 巴里竟然也偷懒摸鱼去了！真让人生气！开门！开门啊！！
value: Bari is also lazy too! It's so irritating! Open it! Open it! !

name: 吵死啦！谁在门那边大喊大叫的！是想打架吗？！
value: It's so noisy! Who is yelling out there! Do you want to fight? !

name: 抱歉……我……我只是想激活传送门，到对面去看看……
value: Sorry... I... I just want to activate the portal and go to the other side to have a look...

name: 别做梦了！这扇门由于下了阻止进出的结界，没人能通过！
value: Stop dreaming! No one can pass this portal because of the enchantment that prevents crossing!

name: 阻止进出的结界？你的意思是外人没法通过传送门进去？
value: Enchantment that prevents crossing? Do you mean that outsiders can't get in through the portal?

name: 是啊！而且门里面的幻兽也没法出来，明白了没？
value: Yes! And the Eudemons inside the door can't come out, do you understand?

name: 你知道是谁下的结界吗？或许我们可以想想办法……
value: Do you know who created the enchantment? Maybe we can think of a way...

name: 有传闻说是创世神下的，但我觉得没人说得准。
value: There are rumors that it was created by the God of Creation, but I think no one can say for sure.

name: 另外！下次开门如果你再大喊大叫……我就把你的头咬下来！
value: Besides! Next time if you yell again... I'll bite your head off!

name: 你不是刚说这门没法进出吗……
value: Didn’t you just say that the portal cannot be crossed...

name: 啊！你真够烦的！我不管了啦！我要继续睡午觉了！再见！
value: Whatever! You are so annoying! I'm going to continue napping! Adiós!

name: 巴里！你看！我成功穿过传送门了呢！
value: Bari! look! I successfully passed through the portal!

name: 天哪，我觉得你这不要命的性格竟然能活到现在，简直是奇迹。
value: My God, I think it's a miracle that you, with that desperate character can survive till now.

name: 确实是奇迹呢，这女孩子是几百年来第一个穿过传送门的人类。
value: It’s a miracle indeed, this girl is the first human to pass through the portal in hundreds of years.

name: 看吧！而且我记得你的同伴说过，这扇门任何人都无法穿越。
value: See! And I remember your companion said that no one can pass through this portal.

name: 其实并非不可穿越，只是穿越时会承受巨大的结界能量。
value: In fact, it is not impervious to pass, but it will endure huge enchantment energy when passing through.

name: 令我惊讶的是，你竟然没有像其他人那样被这种能量烧成灰……
value: What surprises me is that you have not been burnt to ashes by this energy like others…

name: 的确，在我的研究中，这种能量会伤害所有穿过结界的人……
value: Indeed, in my research, this kind of energy will hurt everyone who crosses the enchantment…

name: 除非此人是结界的制造者，但你不可能和这件事有任何关系……
value: Unless this person is the creator of the enchantment, but you can't have anything to do with this matter...

name: 别管那么多啦！我决定了！就算被烧成灰我也要去门那边看看！
value: Don't worry about so much! I've made my mind! Even if it is burnt to ashes, I have to go to the otherside to have a look!

name: 嗯……你准备好就行，我和我的幻兽朋友们会好好招待你的。
value: Hmm…As long as you're ready, me and my Eudemon friends and I will treat you well.

name: 真是让我惊讶，我从来没想过这扇门后竟然有个世外桃源。
value: It really surprised me. I never thought that there was a paradise behind this door.

name: 哟……原来你已经到了啊，我以为你不会来得这么快。
value: Yo... So you have already arrived, I thought you wouldn't come so soon.

name: 奴家是此处幻兽们的管理者雪樱，九尾一族的长女，幸会。
value: I am Yukizakura, the leader of the Eudemons here, the eldest daughter of the Nine-Tailed clan, pleased to meet you.

name: 幸会！你是上次见面的那位幻兽姐姐啊，哎？只有您一人在？
value: Nice to meet you too! You are the Eudemons sister that you met last time, eh? Are you alone?

name: 嘻嘻……是觉得欢迎你的队伍太短了吗？
value: Hehe... Do you think the line that welcomes you is too short?

name: 怎么会！只是好奇而已，之前我和很多幻兽们都说过话呢。
value: How come! Just curious, I have spoken to many Eudemons before.

name: 那么让我来带路吧，让我把另一位同伴介绍给你。
value: Then let me lead the way, and let me introduce another companion to you.

name: 顺便也可以让你熟悉一下这里的环境，我相信你会感兴趣的……
value: By the way, I can also familiarize you with this place, I believe you will be interested...

name: 话说回来，伊薇特，这里好像有很多遗迹一样的建筑。
value: By the way, Yvette, there seems to be many ruins-like buildings here.

name: 是的，这就是我之前和你说过的矿物产地，我们正在逐个开启。
value: Yes, this is the mine that I told you before, and we are unlocking them one by one.

name: 你看见山顶泉水处的那个遗迹吗？我前几天刚解开它的封印。
value: Do you see the ruins at the spring on the top of the mountain? I just unlocked it the other day.

name: 它周围的泉水里富含一种晶石矿，是建筑用的重要资源。
value: The spring around it is rich in a kind of spar mine, which is an important resource for construction.

name: 很漂亮的遗迹呢！我们去看看吧！
value: Very beautiful ruins! Let's go check it out!

name: 你看，将晶矿放入遗迹的祭坛上，就可以让遗迹的产能提升。
value: You see, putting spar on the altar of the ruins can increase the production capacity of the ruins.

name: 我已经迫不及待想要试试了！
value: I can't wait to try out!

name: 对了，除了升级遗迹本身外，很多幻兽对遗迹有着独特的知识。
value: By the way, in addition to upgrading the ruins themselves, many Eudemons have unique knowledge of the ruins.

name: 如果让她们进驻遗迹之内，也能让遗迹的开采效率更进一步。
value: If they are dispatched into the ruins, the mining efficiency of the ruins can be further improved.

name: 例如我，对于晶石之泉已经研究了很久，清楚它的运作原理。
value: For example, I have been studying the Spar Spring for a long time, and I know how it works.

name: 嗯，我会尽力寻求其他幻兽们的帮助。
value: Well, I will try my best to seek help from other Eudemons.

name: 好啦，剩下的事情以后再说吧，我要去遗迹里开工了，回头见！
value: Okay, let's talk about the rest later, I'm going to start work in the ruins, see you later!

name: 雪樱，这也是传送门吗？看上去和我来时的那扇不大一样……
value: Yukizakura, is this also a portal? It looks different from the one I had when I came…

name: 其实原理差不多，它叫做“寻觅之门”，是我们常用的移动工具。
value: In fact, the principle is similar, it is called Gate of seeking, it is our common means of transportation.

name: 你只要思考你想做的事或想见的人，门就会打开合适的通道。
value: You just need to think about what you want to do or who you want to meet, and the gate will open the right passage.

name: 这么神奇吗？！这可实在太方便了！
value: Is it so amazing? ! This is so convenient!

name: 其实并非如此，因为门的能量有限，每天只能开启几次而已。
value: In fact, this is not the case, because the energy of the gate is limited and it can only be opened a few times a day.

name: 而且有时候会开错门，可能会把你送到一个莫名其妙的地方。
value: And sometimes it will open the wrong passage and may send you to an unexplainable place.

name: 我决定先试试，我想找第一次开门时见到的人马姐姐可以吗？
value: I decided to try first. I want to find the Centaur sister I saw when I opened the portal for the first time, can I?

name: 我也不清楚你能不能找到她，看看你的运气如何吧。
value: I don't know if you can find her. Let's see how lucky you are.

name: 这可真是神明的恩典！没想到第一个穿越结界的竟然是你！
value: This is really the grace of the gods! Unexpectedly, you were the first to cross the enchantment!

name: 既然伊薇特你来了，我就先去忙炼金了，剩下的交给你如何？
value: Now that you are here, Yvette, I will go and work on alchemy. How about you leave the rest to you?

name: 我建议带我们的客人去幻兽之森转转，艾琳诺刚把住处建好。
value: I suggest to take our guests to the Forest of Eudemons, Elena has just built the residence.

name: 幻兽之森？那是什么地方？
value: Forest of Eudemons? What is that place?

name: 是幻兽们的巢穴，等我们到那里了后就明白了。
value: It is the lair of the Eudemons, we will understand when we get there.

name: 幻兽之森是我们休息的场所，每一名幻兽都有自己私人的房间。
value: The Forest of Eudemons is our resting place, and each Eudemon has its own private room.

name: 挺有趣的，和我们人类的学校宿舍一样？
value: Quite interesting, the same as our human school dormitory?

name: 是的，更重要的是，关系足够好的幻兽是会邀请你进入房间的。
value: Yes, more importantly, Eudemons who have good enough relationships with you will invite you into their room

name: 她们还会与你签订一份同盟契约，帮你做些力所能及的事。
value: They will also sign an alliance contract with you to help you do what they can.

name: 真的？！我应该如何去和大家处好关系？
value: For real? ! How should I have a good relationship with everyone?

name: 嗯……通过寻觅之门多找她们聊聊吧，人类是善于沟通的种族。
value: Hmm... Let’s talk to them more through Gate of seeking. Humans are a race that is good at communicating.

name: 呼，我也有些累了，带你去我的房间喝杯茶吧？
value: Phew, I'm also a little tired. Shall I take you to my room for a cup of tea?

name: 这是……你与我定下的契约吗？
value: Is this... the contract you made with me?

name: 是的，希望我们能够尽力帮助彼此。
value: Yes, I hope we can try our best to help each other.

name: 对了，我一直都没问，你们有什么需要我帮助的吗？
value: By the way, I haven't asked, do you need any of my help?

name: 幻兽们被困在这个结界内已经很久了，一直找不到出去的方式。
value: The Eudemons have been trapped in this enchantment for a long time, and they have not been able to find a way out.

name: 我希望你能找到破除这个世界结界的办法，让我们获得自由。
value: I hope you can find a way to break the enchantment of this world and let us be free.

name: 我明白了，那么你们在哪些事情上能帮助我呢？
value: I see, so what can you do to help me?

name: 我们可以将力量传导给你们世界的神明，助她们一臂之力。
value: We can channel our powers to the gods of your world and help them.

name: 此外，虽然结界限制了我们的行动，但对非生命体却毫无影响。
value: In addition, although the enchantment restricts our actions, it has no effect on non-living bodies.

name: 而这里有很多珍贵矿物可开采，每名幻兽都有独特的开采能力。
value: And there are many precious minerals that can be mined, and each Eudemon has a unique mining ability.

name: 天哪……我想我明白这意味着什么了……
value: OMG...I think I understand what this means…

name: 对了，伊薇特！我想起来有个小礼物忘了送你。
value: By the way, Yvette! I remembered that there was a small gift that I forgot to give you.

name: 喔？是什么？幻兽们总会对礼物感到高兴的。
value: Oh? What is it? Eudemons are always happy with gifts.

name: 是在森林里摘的果实，雪樱似乎很爱吃，我想你应该也会喜欢。
value: It is the fruit picked in the forest. Yukizakura seems to like it very much. I think you will like it too.

name: 啊……这种果实名为灵气之果，确实是幻兽们非常钟爱的食物。
value: Ah... this kind of fruit is called Reiki fruit, and it is indeed a favorite food for Eudemons.

name: 我就不客气收下了，感谢你带来神明的恩惠。
value: I will accept it, thank you for taking me the grace of the gods.

name: 味道看来不错？我甚至都产生了你吃完后精神百倍的错觉。
value: Does it taste good? I even had the illusion that you were full of energy after eating.

name: 其实你没说错，这种果实的确可以提升我们的力量！
value: In fact, you are right, this kind of fruit can indeed enhance our strength!

name: 有一些果实甚至拥有非常强大的魔力，能让幻兽们长生不死。
value: Some fruits even possess very powerful magical powers, which can make Eudemons immortal.

name: 不会吧！真有这样的事？那我可得好好收集它们。
value: No way! Is there such a thing? Then I have to collect them well.

name: 哎？！我是在做梦吗？！你是修好传送门的那个人类吧？
value: Hey? ! Am I dreaming? ! Are you the human who repaired the portal?

name: 啊，原来是你，我正检查晶石之泉的状态，请不要打扰我。
value: Ah, it turned out to be you, I was checking the status of Spar spring, please don't disturb me.

name: 嗯？找我有事吗？如果有什么想聊的话，可以去我的房间。
value: Um? how can I help you? If you want to talk, you can go to my room.

name: 这片森林我曾经来过很多次，但还有很多地方没有探索过。
value: I have been to this forest many times, but there are still many places that I haven't explored.

name: 你是之前那个人类？！我是不死鸟妮菲塔莉，请多关照啦！
value: Are you the human before? ! I’m the phoenix Nifitari, nice to meet you!

name: 你说想让我帮你去火山开采资源？嗯……让我再考虑一下吧。
value: You said you want me to help you go to the volcano to mine resources? Hmm... let me think about it.

name: 是你啊，我也会偶尔出来走走，天天呆在火山口可太闷了。
value: It's you, I also go out occasionally, it's too boring to stay in the crater every day.

name: 我打算让火山喷发一次！这样可以带来更多有价值的资源！
value: I plan to let the volcano erupt once! This can bring more valuable resources!

name: 和其他怕火的人类不同，你好像很喜欢来火山这边呢！
value: Unlike other humans who are afraid of fire, you seem to like coming to the volcano!

name: 哟，没想到在这会遇到你，我是北海巨妖艾琳诺，请多指教了。
value: Yo, I didn't expect to meet you here, I am Eleanore the Kraken, pleased to meet you.

name: 我正在恢复神核祭坛的力量，完成后应该可以帮你不少忙。
value: I'm restoring the power of Holy core altar, and should be able to help you a lot after completion.

name: 我理解你急需我帮助，但我还没准备好，恐怕你得再等等。
value: I understand that you need my help urgently, but I am not ready yet, I am afraid you will have to wait.

name: 我偶尔会来山脚的瀑布处休息，毕竟我还是喜欢呆在水里。
value: I occasionally come to rest at the waterfall at the foot of the mountain, after all, I still like to stay in the water.

name: 啊！你吓到我了，请不要在做祷告的时候打扰我喔……
value: Ah! You scared me, please don’t bother me when I am praying...

name: 你是来巡视的吗？祭坛一切正常，今天的收获也很丰富。
value: Are you here for patrol? Everything is normal at the altar, and today's harvest is very rich.

name: 啊！你是之前打扰我午睡的家伙！我芬妮尔今天非咬掉你的头！
value: Ah! You are the one who interrupted my nap before! I, Fenrir, must bite off your head today!

name: 要我帮你开发钻石矿？那下次见面最好带几块美味的肉排给我。
value: Want me to help you to dig a diamond mine? Then you'd better bring me some delicious steaks when we meet next time.

name: 其实我可不想天天睡觉，如果你雇佣我工作的话我或许会考虑。
value: Actually, I don't want to sleep every day. If you hire me to work, I might consider it.

name: 又是你啊，有美味的肉排吗？有的话我就去帮你打理矿坑喔！
value: It's you again, do you have any delicious steaks? If so, I will help you take care of the mine!

name: 看看这块切割精美的钻石！这可是我的得意之作！
value: Look at this beautifully cut diamond! This is my masterpiece!

name: 嗯……我好像发现了新的矿脉，等着我的好消息吧！
value: Hmm... I seem to have discovered a new vein, waiting for my good news!

name: ZZZ……啊！是你！别看着我发笑！我……我才没偷懒睡午觉呢！
value: ZZZ... Ah! It's you! Don't look at me adn laugh! I... I didn't slack off and take a nap!

name: 之前都没来得及自我介绍，奴家名为雪樱，九尾的长女，幸会。
value: Oh... isn't this the human cutie? What a coincidence I met you.

name: 嗯，感谢你对我的信任，但我还没想好是否要与你达成同盟。
value: Well, thank you for your trust in me, but I haven't figured out whether to form an alliance with you.

name: 是你啊，我刚寻找完炼金所需的材料，要一块散散步吗？
value: It's you, I just finished searching for the materials needed for alchemy. Would you like to take a walk together?

name: 用炼金术合成宝石的技巧还是非常困难的，请再给我一点时间。
value: The technique of using alchemy to synthesize gems is still very difficult. Please give me some more time.

name: 今天的炼金也很成功，希望宝石的产量也能让您满意。
value: Today's alchemy is also very successful, and I hope that the output of gems will also satisfy you.

name: 啊啦，您今天只是单纯来看望我的？这可真让我受宠若惊了……
value: Ah, you just came to visit me today? This really flattered me…

name: 啊！是您啊，有兴趣今晚陪我去赏樱吗？今晚是个好时间呢！
value: what! It's you, are you interested in accompany me to enjoy the sakura blossoms tonight? Tonight is a good time!

name: 你能穿越结界来到这里，必是神明的恩惠，愿我们的情谊永在。
value: You can cross the enchantment to come here, it must be the grace of the gods, may our friendship be forever.

name: 那座火山确实让我感觉不错，顺便帮你管理熔岩池也没问题啦！
value: That volcano really makes me feel good, and it’s okay to help you manage Lava lake by the way!

name: 啊啦，看你如此诚心地请我帮你忙，我可就不好意思拒绝了呢……
value: Ah, seeing you so sincerely asking me to help you, I am embarrassed to refuse…

name: 看在你给我提供美味肉排的份上，我就帮你运营钻石工坊吧！
value: Seeing that you provide me with delicious steaks, I will help you run the Diamond Workshop!

name: 看来还是只有我这样出色的炼金术士，才配得上您的野心呢。
value: It seems that only an excellent alchemist like me is worthy of your ambition.

name: 外域入口已开放
value: The entrance of Chaotic Realm is opened

name: 85%概率增加幻兽150点经验值
value: 85% chance of increasing Eudemon experience by 150

name: 90%概率增加幻兽300点经验值
value: 90% chance of increasing Eudemon experience by 300

name: 95%概率增加幻兽500点经验值
value: 95% chance of increasing Eudemon experience by 500

name: 100%概率增加幻兽1000点经验值
value: 100% chance of increasing Eudemon experience by 1000

name: 核心汇聚兽娘的属性，对上阵女神提供属性加成
value: The core gathers the attributes of Eudemons, and provides attribute bonuses to the angels on line-up

name: 增加妮菲塔丽50点好感度
嫦娥孤独的守在这月亮上，遥望着对面的繁华、喧闹的蓝色星球，很难不有万千思绪涌上心头。\n直到玉兔来到她的身边，带给嫦娥的不仅仅是陪伴，还有萦绕在这广寒宫的欢声笑语。
value: Chang'e once lived alone on the moon, only able to admire our bustling blue planet from a lonely distance.\nShe remained alone with her thoughts until the Jade Hare joined her, providing companionship and helping to fill Guanghan Palace with the goddess's laughter.

name: 嫦娥原本是个凡人，然而机缘巧合，她服食过西王母所赐予的仙药，具备了神格。\n随后她在月宫进行了长达几千年的修行，末日降临让她察觉到异样，并最终决定帮助同伴解决这次危机。
value: Chang'e was born a mortal but later stole from Xiwangmu the Pill of Immortality, which transformed her into a goddess. \nShe then fled to the Guanghan Palace on the moon and spent millennia in solitude. And now that the world is ending, she has decided to help to resolve the crisis.

name: 哼哼！你似乎也很喜欢兔子呢！至少喜欢小动物的家伙不会是坏人，看在这件事的份上，我就和你签下这份誓约吧！
value: You like rabbits, too!? Then you must be a good person. That's reason enough for me to make this vow with you!

name: 你觉得这个世界变化大吗？没想到几千年来发生了这么多有趣的事！
value: Do you think the world has changed a lot? So much has happened in the last few thousand years.

name: 你问我怎么看待战争？我是个和平主义者，不过你似乎是个……好战分子？
value: You wanted to know what I thought of war? I am a pacifist, but you seem to be... a militant?

name: 即使在月宫修行的千年时间里，我有时也会怀念自己和同伴们过去的生活……
value: After a thousand years at Guanghan Palace, I sometimes miss my past life and my former companions.

name: 说起来，你知道我的身世吗？几千年的修行，让我早已忘了自己的过去。
value: Do you know of my past? After thousands of years on the moon, I have forgotten almost everything.

name: 月宫修行时每天只有成群的兔子相伴，一个说话的人也没有，很是无趣呢……
value: I spend my years alone in Guanghan Palace with the Jade Hare. I wish I had someone to talk to…

name: 变化的确不小。
value: The change is indeed not small.

name: 呃……我不清楚。
value: Hmm... It doesn't seem like much has changed.

name: 我读过你的传说。
value: Your story is a legend, and I know it well.

name: 要我陪你聊聊么？
value: Do you want me to chat with you?

name: 其实你很健谈……
value: Is that why you're so talkative?

name: 那么你要不要养养看？！我在月宫养了几百只，正愁一个人照顾不过来呢！
value: Do you want to help me raise them? I have kept hundreds of them in the Guanghan Palace, and I am worried that one person can't take care of all of them!

name: 不会吧！竟然会有人对毛茸茸的小可爱不动心？！这可真让我意外！
value: No way! I can't believe these furry little cuties don't excite you. I'm shocked!

name: 看来从月宫回来的选择是正确的呢！我早就想大闹一番了！
value: I'm glad I chose to return from Guanghan Palace! I've been wanting to get involved in the action for a long time.

name: 哎？！这样吗？不过也是，你好象只活了十多年而已……
value: Eh? Is that so? ... But then again, you are still very young. You have not seen much of the world and its history.

name: 哎？不是吗？不过虽然你作战勇猛，却能让我从心里面感受到一种温柔。
value: Huh? It isn't? Yet you fight so bravely... It causes my heart to stir.

name: 我虽然不喜欢和人争斗，不过战争在我看来，至少比一个人在月宫修行要有意思。
value: Although I don't like fighting with people, in my opinion, war is more interesting than practicing alone in the Guanghan Palace.

name: 确实，每次我想到自己能够回到她们身边时，修行好像也变得不那么枯燥了……
value: Indeed, every time I thought about returning, my practice routine felt more invigorating.

name: 看来你对未来会发生什么更感兴趣，这点上倒是和我很像呢……
value: It seems that you are more interested in what will happen in the future. I'm the same way.

name: 嗯，算了，我在这个世界的传说现在才要真正开始呢！
value: Forget about it. I am about to create a new legend as we fight to save the world!

name: 哎？！原来几千年后，人们已经把我当成这么传奇的存在了吗？！
value: Eh? People recorded my story in legend and still remember it after thousands of years?

name: 哎？！可以吗？！如果你方便的话今晚能来我的房间么？！我有很多话想和你说……
value: May I? If it's convenient for you, would you come to my room tonight? I have so much I want to tell you...

name: 那个……其实我不是对谁都这么多话……因为没有多少人愿意听我长篇大论……
value: Yes, I can be a bit long-winded, and that can be a bit off-putting. Therefore I'm trying to learn to hold my tongue and listen.

name: 中秋节活动专属兑换道具，可通过活动和日常挂机获取
value: Exclusive redemption items for Full-Moon events, which can be obtained through events and daily idling

name: 东方的神明似乎很喜欢独自一人过日子，是这样么？
value: The goddes of the East seem to like to live alone, right?

name: 哎？！有这种事吗？！我怎么不觉得？
value: Eh? ! Is there such a thing? ! Why don't I think so?

name: 至少在月宫里过了几千年的你，让我们产生了这种错觉。
value: At least you, who have been in the Guanghan Palace for several thousand years, gave us this illusion.

name: 其实只是东方的神明在修行时……不大喜欢被打扰而已了。
value: In fact, it’s just that the Eastern goddes don’t like being disturbed when they are practicing.

name: 喔？是吗？那么就让我们来看看你修行的成果吧！
value: Oh? Yeah? Then let us take a look at the results of your practice!

name: 你的兔子比你本人打起架来还凶……这可真让我意外……
value: Your rabbit is more fierce than you in a fight... This really surprised me...

name: 先在对手身上积蓄魔力，再让月兔引爆，不错的战术呢。
value: It is a good tactic to accumulate magic power on the opponent first, and then let the Jade hare detonate.

name: 嗯……相对于持久对抗，我更喜欢配合月兔一波击溃对手。
value: Hmm...I prefer to cooperate with Jade hare to defeat opponents rather than protracted confrontation.

name: 有月兔这么强大的“同伴”，你甚至可以和女娲较量较量。
value: With such a powerful companion like Jade hare, you can even compete with Nuwa.

name: 不错的提醒！这么久没回昆仑山，我也该去打个招呼了。
value: Nice reminder! I haven't returned to Kunlun Mountain for so long, and I should also go and say hello.

name: 嫦娥？是你？！自从你离开昆仑山后，已经几千年没见了！
value: Chang'e? It's you? ! Since you left Kunlun Mountain, we haven't seen each other for thousands of years!

name: 难道是在月宫太无聊，想回来帮助我们结束这场末日了？
value: Is it too boring in the Guanghan palace, so you want to come back to help us end this doomsday?

name: 我确实有这个想法，但不清楚自己究竟做不做得到……
value: I do have this idea, but I don’t know if I can do it…

name: 凡事无定数，修行千年之后，你的能力或许早已超乎想象。
value: Everything is uncertain, after a thousand years of practice, your abilities may have been beyond imagination.

name: 我想，一场试炼应该能成为最好的证明。
value: I think a trial should be the best proof.

name: 啊！停手停手！认输了！这强大的爆发力让人难以招架……
value: Ah! Stop it! I give up! This powerful explosive force makes me hard to resist...

name: 唔……先积蓄后爆发，看来阴阳相合的力量确实了得……
value: Hmm…Accumulate first and then explode. It seems that the power of Yin and Yang is really powerful...

name: 你的修行让人刮目相看，希望这份力量能为世界带来安宁。
value: Your practice is impressive, and I hope this power can bring peace to the world.

name: 我会尽力的，能够回到昆仑山来，其实我已经很开心了。
value: I will try my best. I am actually very happy to be able to come back to Kunlun Mountain.

name: 毕竟在月宫几千年，只能与月兔相伴，实在闷得慌。
value: After all, for thusands of years, my only accompanion in the Guanghan Palace is Jade hare, which is really frustrating.

name: 芙蕾雅，你看上去心神不宁，与希腊的战事又遇到麻烦了？
value: Freyja, you look restless, and you are in trouble again in the war with Greece?

name: 恰恰相反，希腊众神在战场上遇到我后，一直有意回避。
value: On the contrary, the Greek gods have been deliberately avoiding me after they met me on the battlefield.

name: 赫拉甚至私下邀请我加入希腊神系，这倒让我挺感兴趣……
value: Hera even privately invited me to join the Greek gods, which interested me…

name: 有意思了呢！我大概明白怎么回事了，老大，您怎么看？
value: Interesting! I probably understand what's going on, boss, what do you think?

name: 如果过得了我们这关，我不介意芙蕾雅你去希腊见见世面。
value: If you can pass me, I don't mind you, Freyja, to go to Greece to meet the world.

name: 快停手！之前只是开玩笑而已！我可没打算背叛同伴！
value: Stop it! It was just a joke before! I didn't intend to betray my companions!

name: 别紧张，亲爱的，北欧的各位从不质疑你的忠诚。
value: Don't be nervous, dear, everyone from Northern Europe never questions your loyalty.

name: 这杀伤力对于护甲被破坏的对手……真是如同噩梦一般……
value: This lethality is like a nightmare for opponents whose armor is broken...

name: 你很懂得趁胜追击的道理，敌人越少你的能力越占优势……
value: You know how to take advantage of the victory, the less the enemy, the more you have the advantage…

name: 去见见赫拉吧，我挺期待她见到你完全觉醒后的表情。
value: Go and see Hera, I'm looking forward to her expression when she sees you fully awakened.

name: 北欧的芙蕾雅吗……我们知道你会来，但没想到这么快……
value: Freyja from Northern Europe... We knew you would come, but we didn't expect to be so soon...

name: 希腊的主神，赫拉阁下曾邀请过我，我可没打算失约。
value: Your Excellency Hera, main god of Greece once invited me. I did not intend to miss the appointment.

name: 等你很久了，我一直想试试以一敌百的英雄究竟有多强。
value: I have been waiting for you for a long time, and I have always wanted to find out how strong a heroine with overwhileming power is.

name: 如我胜了，我希望暂停彼此因争夺人类信仰而产生的冲突。
value: If I win, I hope to suspend the conflict between each other due to the struggle for human faith.

name: 没问题，但如果你输了，就必须成为我赫拉最忠诚的护卫！
value: No problem, but if you lose, you must be my most loyal guard!

name: 唔……我们大意了吗……真是令人遗憾的结果……
value: Hmm…We've been careless... It's a regrettable result...

name: 胜负已分，赫拉阁下，希望您能守约，我会铭记此约定。
value: The outcome is obvious, your excellency Hera, I hope you can fulfill the promise, and I will keep this promise in mind.

name: 北欧有芙蕾雅这把利剑和海姆达尔这面盾牌，毫无破绽。
value: Northern Europe has the sword of Freyja and the shield of Heimdall, and there is no flaw.

name: 至少我很清楚，这个战争与爱情的化身和我不是一类人……
value: At least I know very well that this incarnation of war and love is not the same kind of person as me...

name: 呵……战争与爱情吗……终究是我可望而不可及的事物呢……
value: Heh... War and love... After all, it is something I can't reach…

name: 此物只应天上有，宝箱已藏不住里面闪闪的物品了
value: Holy moly! the treasure chest can no longer hide the shiny treasure in it

name: 玉兔总是将此宝箱藏在隐秘的角落，里面有啥呢
value: Jade hare always hides this kind of chest in a secret corner, what's in it

name: 外表质朴的中秋宝箱，但是宝物的光芒却出卖了它的外表
value: A simple Mid-Autumn Festival chest, but the light of the treasure contrasts with its appearance

name: 在炽烈的阳光下！黑暗将无所遁形！
value: Darkness will have nowhere to hide beneth the blazing sun!

name: ACTIVITY_HOLIDAY_DROP_SUMMON_SHOP
value: Points will be cleared automatically after the event

name: EVENT_ANIMALS_NOT_ENOUGH
value: Already owned the Eudemon, converted to 5 DragonBlood Fruits and 5 Divine Fruits automatically

name: OUTLAND_VISIT_LIKE_MAX
value: Your daily like limit has been reached

name: OUTLAND_VISIT_ASSIST_MAX
value: Your daily assist limit has been reached

name: OUTLAND_VISIT_BE_ASSISTED_MAX
value: This player has reached the maximum times of assistances received today

name: OUTLAND_VISIT_OUTLAND_NOT_UNLOCK
value: The player’s Chaotic Realm feature has not yet enabled

name: OUTLAND_VISIT_NONE_BUILDING_UNLOCK
value: The target player has not unlocked any Chaotic Realm building

name: 幻兽已满级，自动转化为晶石
value: Eudemon is at full level, automatically converted into {0} spar

name: 是你啊！有兴趣帮我找一只从月亮上来的兔子么？把她抓来给我，我就帮你去开采新的钻石矿。
value: Oh, it's you! Are you interested in helping me finding a rabbit from the moon? Catch her to me, and I will help you mine new diamond mine.

name: 好吧，我猜熙玉那只兔子又找你告我的状了。别总怀疑我！我可没兴趣拿她当晚餐！
value: Alright, I guess that rabbit Xiyu has spoken ill of me agian. Don't doubt me! I'm not interested in eating her for dinner!

name: 咦？你是人类吗？！除了嫦娥姐姐外我还是第一次遇到别的人类呢！
value: Huh? Are you human? ! Except Sister Chang'e, this is the first time I have encountered other human beings!

name: 难道是这条路吗……啊！是你啊，我好像迷路了，能带我回幻兽之森吗？
value: Could it be this way...Ah! It's you, I seem to be lost, can you take me back to the Forest of Eudemons?

name: 呃……抱歉，我只是想试试是否能通过传送门回到月宫，没想到连接到了这里……
value: Uh...Sorry, I just want to try if I can go back to the Guanghan Palace through the portal, but I didn't expect to be connected here...

name: 能让我躲一下吗？有只自称芬妮尔的狼，一直在矿山那边找我，我感觉不大妙……
value: Can you hide me for a while? There is a wolf who calls herself Fenrir, who has been looking for me over the gem mine. I don’t feel good...

name: 主人，那个……您最近喂过芬妮尔吗？我总感觉她在用一种观赏美食的眼神盯着我……
value: Master, well... have you fed Fenrir recently? I always feel that she is staring at me with a look of staring at food...

name: 主人，和我去矿山看看如何？我和芬妮尔又发现一大片新矿脉呢！
value: Master, how about going to the mine with me? Fenrir and I have discovered a large new vein!

name: 哼哼！主人您来得正好，要见识一下雪樱姐姐新教我的宝石炼金技巧吗？
value: Humph! Master, you came right in time. Would you like to see the gem cutting skills that Sister Yukizakura taught me?

name: 熙玉原本是月宫所有的兔子总管，嫦娥对她青睐有加，所以赋予了她过人的智慧和精巧的手艺。嫦娥很喜欢美丽而价值连城的宝石，所以她也就理所当然地成为了月宫里技巧最高的宝石匠。嫦娥离开月宫后，熙玉曾经想通过传送门寻找，但不知为何传送门连接到了幻兽之森……
value: Xiyu was originally the head of all the rabbits in the Guanghan Palace, and Chang'e liked her very much, so she gave her extraordinary wisdom and exquisite craftsmanship.Chang'e likes beautiful and priceless gems, so Xiyu naturally became the most skilled jeweler in the Guanghan Palace.After Chang'e left the Guanghan palace, Xiyu once wanted to find her through the portal, but somehow the portal was connected to the Forest of Eudemons...

name: 那个……看在你对我这么关心的份上，在回到嫦娥姐姐身边之前，我就接受你做我的主人吧。
value: Well... For the sake of your caring of me, before returning to Sister Chang'e, I will accept you as my master.

name: COUNTRY_WAR_SIGN_UP_CONFIRM_TIPS
value: Are you sure you want to register {0}? After confirmation, the registration can not be changed.

name: 已拥有该幻兽，自动转换为5个龙血果实、5个神界果实
value: Already owned the Eudemon, converted to 5 DragonBlood Fruits and 5 Divine Fruits automatically

name: 中秋赏月 兑换女神
OUTLAND_VISIT_NOT_FRIEND
value: You are not a friend of the player, cannot assist

value: Chaotic Realm feature has not yet enabled

name: 目标玩家外域没有开启
value: The player’s Chaotic Realm feature has not yet enabled

name: 今天已经点赞过这个玩家了
今天已经协助过这个玩家了
点击拜访其他玩家外域
value: Click to visit the player’s Chaotic Realm

name: 集齐55个阿修罗碎片可以召唤阿修罗
value: Collect 55 Asura Shards to summon Asura

name: 阿修罗易怒好斗、骁勇善战，在修罗场中不断战斗，不断磨练着战斗意志。\n在传闻中，阿修罗凶神恶煞，让敌人胆寒；但在另一种传闻中，阿修罗端正美貌；即使是敌人也为之倾倒。
value: Asura is a strong fighter, known for being irritable, combative, and brave. She constantly hones her fighting skill by battling with Shuraba.\nAccording to rumors, Asura is fierce and terrible, always filling her enemies with fear. But others say Asura is so gorgeous that even her enemies fall for her beauty.

name: 敢找我搭话，你难道不畏惧我吗？
value: Dare to talk to me, don't you fear me?

name: 战斗中的修罗场对于我不过小场面，感情中的修罗场才是真正的磨炼！
value: The Shuraba of battles is nothing but a small scene for me; the Shuraba of love is the real tempering!

name: 我可是会千变万化的，啥时候惹我不高兴了，就变化一个吓吓你！
value: I'm a shape-shifter. Whenever you upset me,  I will change and scare you!

name: 我这恐怖的外表下，潜藏着特别的灵魂。
value: Under my terrifying appearance,  there is a special soul hidden.

name: 你应该也爱美食的，啥时候尝尝我做的，这方面我可是拿手的。
value: You should have loved food. Taste the food I cooked sometimes; I am good at cooking.

name: 有时心中也会感慨万千，从前无人倾诉，还好遇见了你。
value: Sometimes I feel a lot of emotions in my heart,  no one talked to me before,  but fortunately I met you.

name: 你也有害怕的事呢。
value: You are also afraid of things.

name: 相见恨晚的感觉。
value: The feeling of seeing each other late.

name: 勇气可嘉，还好我今日心情不错，以后可不要随随便便去和危险的人去搭话。
value: Very courageous. Fortunately,  I am in a good mood today,  so don't just go and talk to dangerous people in the future.

name: 我倒没有，但是我却窥探过很多凡人们的曲折感情经历，从而有感而发。
value: I don’t have one, but I have spied on many mortal people’s tortuous and emotional experiences,  so I feel inspired.

name: 知道怕啦？知道怕就好，可得想着法让我开心了。
value: Scared? Good,  then you will have to find ways to make me happy.

name: 你咋这么会开玩笑呢，小心我这恐怖的灵魂这就把你吃了。
value: Why are you so good at joking,  be careful that my terrifying soul will eat you up.

name: 害怕啥，人不能貌相，你被刻板印象束缚了，来尝一下改变你的想法。
value: Why so scared,  you can't judge a person by her appearance. You are bound by stereotypes,  let's try to change your mind.

name: 果然真正的感情都是双向奔赴的，以后你有啥苦恼也要告诉我呀，可不能瞒着。
value: The true relationship is mutual,  so you have to tell me if you have any troubles in the future,  don't hide it.

name: 看来自身有力量说话就是硬气，我这么强大的气场都劝退不了你。
value: Seems like a powerful person like you can speak powerful words,  even I who have strong aura can't persuade you.

name: 哈哈，我的软肋可不能乱和别人说哦，只能作为我们两人的秘密。
value: Haha,  you can’t talk to others about my weakness,  it's a secret for the two of us.

name: 嘿，还傲娇起来了，可别到时候把你吓哭了，我可不忍心你哭呢。
value: Sooooo pretentious! Don't be scared to cry then,  I can't bear you crying.

name: 哇！你平时也这样吗？这么会说话，以后我可得用新的姿态跟你说话了。
value: Wow! Do you usually do the same? If you are so good at witty words,  I will have to talk to you in the future with a new way.

name: 看在你如此信任我的份上，就看我为你收集天地之精华，为你烹饪一顿绝世佳肴。
value: For the sake of you trusting me so much, I'm gonna collecting the essence of heaven and earth and cooking a peculiar meal for you.

name: 在宇宙中、在神明的观念里，这段等待的时间不过沧海之一粟，遇见了终归是值得！
value: In the universe, in the concept of the gods,  this waiting time is nothing but a drop in the ocean,  and it is worth it if eventually meet!

name: 和我达成誓约，梦中都难以想象的场景竟然实现了！今后的日子我将更加细致照顾你，守护你的未来，还能给你做好吃的哦。
value: I never imagined that my dream would come true. Of course, I will make a vow with you! From now on, I promise to protect you... and cook you amazingly delicious food.

name: 阿修罗创造一个修罗场结界，队友将获得阿修罗属性10%的属性加成（暴击值、暴击伤害、韧性、物抗、魔抗），持续1回合；敌人全体将得到来自阿修罗10%的属性减益（暴击值、暴击伤害、韧性、物抗、魔抗），持续1回合，此环境型减益将无视敌人异常抗性且不可驱散。
value: Asura creates an Shuraba field, the whole team will receive 10% of Asura’s attributes bonus (Critical Value, Crit DMG, FOR, P.RES M.RES) for 1 round; all enemies will receive 10% of Asura's attributes reduction (Critical Value, Crit DMG, FOR, P.RES,  M.RES) for 1 round. This environmental debuff will ignore the enemy's Debuff RES and cannot be dispelled.

name: 阿修罗将驱散敌方后排3人的一个增益，并造成250%的物理伤害和30%的真实伤害。
value: Asura will dispell a buff for each of the 3 enemies in the back row, and cause them 250% P.DMG and 30% true DMG.

name: 阿修罗创造一个修罗场结界，队友将获得阿修罗属性12%的属性加成（暴击值、暴击伤害、韧性、物抗、魔抗），持续2回合；敌人全体将得到来自阿修罗12%的属性减益（暴击值、暴击伤害、韧性、物抗、魔抗），持续2回合，此环境型减益将无视敌人异常抗性且不可驱散。
value: Asura creates an Shuraba field, the whole team will receive 12% of Asura’s attributes bonus (Critical Value, Crit DMG, FOR, P.RES, M.RES) for 2 round; all enemies will receive 12% of Asura's attributes reduction (Critical Value, Crit DMG, FOR, P.RES, M.RES) for 2 round. This environmental debuff will ignore the enemy's Debuff RES and cannot be dispelled.

name: 阿修罗将驱散敌方后排3人的全部增益，并造成300%的物理伤害和40%的真实伤害。
value: Asura will dispel all buffs of 3 enemies in the back row, and cause them 300% P.DMG and 40% true DMG.

value: Three heads and six arms EX

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_48
value: Experienced one Shuraba by another, rebirth from the ashes!

name: 誓约女神的羁绊不需要其他女神上阵就可以激活
value: Fates of a vowed Angel's will be activated without conditions.

name: 羁绊不需要其他女神上阵就可以激活！
value: Fate can be activated without other angels on line up!

name: 在这条孤独的道路上，总归需要有个指引，不论它是否是心中所想的那道光。\n阿修罗对待的敌人的灵魂貌似也没那么残忍，对于修罗场上遍体鳞伤的肉体也算是一点藉慰。
value: On this lonely road, there is always a need for guidance, no matter whether it is the light in her heart. \nAsura didn't seem to treated the enemies' souls so cruel, and it was a bit of comfort for the bruised fleshes in Shuraba.

name: 版本更新，需要下载更新。\n（点击跳过仍可进行游戏，部分功能会出现异常）
value: The version is updated, update downloading needed. \n(Click skip to still play the game, some functions may be abnormal)

name: 这强大的气场是怎么回事，月兔竟然被吓成这样……
value: What is going on with this powerful aura, Moon Rabbit was so scared ...

name: 东方的修行者吗……你们不是我要较量的人，让我过去。
value: Eastern practitioners... You are not the one that I want to beat, let me pass here.

name: 你是谁？月宫可不是外人能够随意出入的地方！
value: Who are you? The Moon Palace is not a place where outsiders can enterl!

name: 我乃六道战争之神，炼狱之主阿修罗……
value: I'm the god of six wars - asura the lord of purgatory...

name: 你散发的黑暗斗气危险无比，恐怕我不能让你继续前进了！
value: The dark vindictiveness you exude is extremely dangerous, I'm afraid that I can't stop you!

name: 恐怖的气场……即使是再强的人也难免心生畏惧……
value: Terrifying aura...Even the strongest people are inevitably afraid of...

name: 她的战意如同一道结界，仿佛紧紧地锁住了我们的力量……
value: Her intent to fight is like a barrier, as if it tightly locks our strength...

name: 难以置信，她的同伴却能利用这种结界变得强大……
value: Unbelievably, her companion can use this kind of enchantment to become powerful...

name: 看来人界的最强者并不在此，真是令人遗憾。
value: It seems that the strongest in the human world is not here, which is really regrettable.

name: 她的力量太危险了！我们最好通知六大神系的其他神明！
value: Her power is too dangerous! We better inform the other gods of the six gods!

name: 来了吗？她就是沈青儿、嫦娥还有卑弥呼所说的那个家伙？
value: OMG! Is she the guy that Sim Cheong, Chang'e and Himiko said?

name: 你散发的斗气让人感到不安，可以告诉我你来此的原因吗？
value: The vindictiveness you exude makes people feel uneasy. Can you tell me why you are here?

name: 我为纷争与审判而生，挑战人界最强者是我的唯一目的……
value: I was born for disputes and judgments. My purpose is challenging the strongest in the human world...

name: 你们的战意让我兴奋，我会好好体会这场较量的快感……
value: Your fighting spirit excites me, and I will enjoy the pleasure of this contest...

name: 真是个爱挑衅的家伙，作为战争之神，我可不会手下留情！
value: What a provocative guy, as the god of war, I will not show mercy!

name: 呵……看来，和你战斗确实是一件让人上瘾的事情。
value: Heh... It seems that fighting with you is indeed an addictive thing.

name: 是我大意了，你主宰战斗意志的能力，的确非同小可……
value: I'm taking care of it, your ability to dominate the will to fight is indeed not trivial...

name: 真是令人满足的战斗，可惜你们也并非我理想中的最强者。
value: What a satisfying battle, but unfortunately you are not the strongest in my ideals.

name: 有个人我想你会感兴趣的，她算是众神明的指挥官和统领。
value: There is someone I think you will be interested in. She is the commander and leader of the gods.

name: 传闻中的那个人类女孩么？我应该会很享受和她的战斗……
value: Is that the human girl in the rumor? I should enjoy fighting with her...

name: 每次协助可获得好友15分钟的生产奖励，是否协助？
value: Assisting this friend will grant you a <color=#00ff00>15 minutes</color> production reward. Comfirm to Assist?

value: Brand new silver chest, looks very valuable

name: 尘封已久的破旧宝箱，隐约透露处宝物的光芒

name: NWHC_GUIDE_TIPS_2

name: 恢复合成女巫活动中50点体力
没人知道悠妮丝究竟在混沌外域的迷宫里呆了多久，但从她对迷宫了如指掌的熟悉程度来看，时间恐怕不会短。只有米诺陶洛斯一族才能在深邃的迷宫里搜寻宝藏而不迷路，探险本领上悠妮丝更是同族中的精英。她天赋禀异，是唯一能凭借良好的方向感和敏锐的洞察力，找到隐藏在迷宫深处钻石矿脉的幻兽。
value: No one knows how long Eunice has stayed in the maze of Chaotic Realm, but judging from her familiarity with the maze, the time may not be short.Only the Minotaurs clan can search for treasures in the deep maze without getting lost, and Eunice is the elite of the clan in terms of exploration skills.She is talented, and she is the only Eudemon that can find diamond veins hidden in the depths of the maze with her good sense of direction and keen insight.

name: 在过去一段时间里，悠妮丝受了不少照顾呢……那个……如果可以的话……您愿意和我订下契约吗……？
value: In the past period of time, Eunice have received a lot of care... Well... If could... Would you like to seal the pact with me...?

name: 哎？这道传送门是你开的吗？呼……太好了，悠妮丝正愁在迷宫里找不到出去的路呢……
value: Hey? Did you open this portal? Phew... Great, Eunice is worried that she can't find a way out in the maze...

name: 是你啊，那个……悠妮丝正准备把钻石原矿送到工坊去，如果方便的话，能帮我一块搬吗……？
value: It's you, well... Eunice is about to send the diamond ore to the workshop. If it is convenient, can you help me move it...?

name: 嗯？你是上次见到的那个人类啊……看来世界比悠妮丝想象得要小呢……
value: Um? You are the human you saw last time... It seems that the world is smaller than Eunice imagined...

name: 唔，有话请一会儿再说，悠妮丝刚刚发现一大片新的钻石矿脉呢……
value: Um, please say something later, Eunice has just discovered a large new diamond vein...

name: 那个……您最好去工坊看看，我听说狼人芬妮尔饿得够呛，正抓熙玉那只兔子当午餐呐……
value: Um... you'd better go to the workshop. I heard that the werewolf Fenrir was so starving that she's gonna catching Xiyu the rabbit for lunch…

name: 呜……搬运矿石的推车好像坏了，如果您不赶时间的话，能帮悠妮丝修一下吗？
value: Woo... the cart that carries the diamonds seems to be broken, if you are not in a hurry, could you possibbly fix it for Eunice?

name: 哎？您是专门来找悠妮丝的吗？别担心……就算迷宫再复杂，我也能分清方向呢……
value: Hey? Are you here specifically for Eunice? Don't worry... No matter how complicated the maze is, I can tell the direction...

name: 你问我和那个叫悠妮丝的家伙关系如何？她火辣的身材很合我口味喔！不过看见我就会脸红着跑开让我很不爽！
value: You ask me how I am related to that one named Eunice? Her hot figure suits my taste!But she blushes and runs away when she sees me, which makes me very upset!

name: 听说来了一位名叫悠妮丝的米诺陶洛斯族幻兽呢！这下可不用怕芬妮尔欺负我了！
value: I heard that a Minotaurs Eudemon named Eunice came! I no longer need to worry about Fenrir bullying me now!

name: 施加【中毒】持续至战斗结束，每回合损失最大生命值10%生命值，【中毒】可叠加，最多5层。
value: Apply [poison] until the battle ends, lose 10% of max HP every round. [Poison] can stack, up to 5 times.

name: 施加【中毒】持续至战斗结束，每回合损失最大生命值10%生命值，【中毒】可叠加不可驱散，最多5层。
value: Apply [poison] until the battle ends, lose 10% of max HP every round. [Poison] can stack and undispellable, up to 5 times.

name: 对1名敌人造成320%的伤害，并且有30%的几率使其【晕眩】1回合
value: Deals 320% P.DMG to 1 enemy, has 30% chance to [Stun] enemy for 1 round.

name: 对1名敌人造成360%的伤害，并且有40%的几率使其【晕眩】1回合
value: Deals 360% P.DMG to 1 enemy, has 40% chance to [Stun] enemy for 1 round.

name: 对1名敌人造成400%的伤害，并且有50%的几率使其【晕眩】1回合；并且使目标进入【虚弱】状态，攻击力降低20%，持续2回合
value: Deals 400% P.DMG to 1 enemy, has 50% chance to [Stun] enemy for 1 round and make enemy enter [Weakened] state that decreased the ATK by 20% for 2 rounds.

name: 对1名敌人造成450%的伤害，并且有60%的几率使其【晕眩】1回合；并且使目标进入【虚弱】状态，攻击力降低30%，持续2回合
value: Deals 450% P.DMG to 1 enemy, has 60% chance to [Stun] enemy for 1 round and make enemy enter [Weakened] state that decreased the ATK by 30% for 2 rounds.

name: 对1名敌人造成550%的伤害，并且有70%的几率使其【晕眩】1回合；并且使目标进入【虚弱】【破甲】状态，攻击力、防御力降低40%，持续2回合
value: Deals 550% P.DMG to 1 enemy,has 70% chance to [Stun] enemy for 1 round, and enemy will enter [Weaken][Sunder Armor]stats which decreased the ATK,DEF by 40% for 2 rounds.

name: 对1名敌人造成600%的伤害，并且有80%的几率使其【晕眩】1回合；并且使目标进入【虚弱】【破甲】状态，攻击力、防御力降低50%，持续2回合
value: Deals 600% P.DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP and inflict [Sunder Armor] state, which reduces defense by 80% for 4 rounds. If the enemy is killed, deal an additional 100% P.DMG to all enemies and inflict them with [Sunder Armor] state.

name: 对攻击力最高的1名敌人造成650%的伤害，并使其【晕眩】1回合；并且使目标进入【粉碎】【虚弱】状态，防御力、物抗和魔抗、攻击力降低50%，持续2回合。
value: Deals 650% DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK, [Stun] the enemy for 1 round and giving [Smash] [Weaken] to the enemy,which decrease enemy's DEF, P.RES, M.RES and ATK by 50% for 2 rounds

name: 使3名队友进入【奋发】状态，增加50%的伤害，50%的防御力，30%暴击值，持续3回合，并且恢复主角攻击力80%的血量
value: Bestows 3 allied angels [Excited] state, increasing their DMG and DEF by 50%, Crit by 30% for 3 rounds, and recovering their HP equal to 80% of the MC's ATK.

name: 使3名队友进入【奋发】状态，增加60%的伤害，60%的防御力，40%暴击值，持续3回合，并且恢复主角攻击力90%的血量
value: Bestows 3 allied angels [Excited] state, increasing their DMG and DEF by 60%, Crit by 40% for 3 rounds, and recovering their HP equal to 90% of the MC's ATK.

name: 对后排3名敌人造成220%的法术伤害，并使其进入【虚弱】状态，攻击降低30%，持续1回合
value: Deals 220% M.DMG to 3 enemies in back row and make enemy enter [Weaken] state that reduces their ATK by 30% for 1 round.

name: 对3名敌人造成180%的法术伤害，若目标处于【中毒】状态，则【眩晕】1回合
value: Deals 180% M.DMG to 3 enemies. If the target is under [Poison], they will receive [Stun] for 1 round.

name: 对1名敌人造成230%的物理伤害，并使敌人进入【燃烧】状态，每回合损失敌人当前生命值4%的血量，持续2回合
value: Deals 230% P.DMG to 1 enemy and inflicts [Ignite], causes the enemy to lose 4% of current HP for 2 rounds.

name: 对1名敌人造成160%的物理伤害，并使其【眩晕】1回合
value: Deals 160% P.DMG to 1 enemy and [stun] the enemy for 1 round.

name: 进入【挑衅】状态2回合，强迫敌人单体伤害攻击自己，且2回合内所受到的伤害减少65%
value: Enters [Taunt] state, reduces 65% DMG taken and forces enemies to attack her when using basic attacks for 2 rounds.

name: 对6名敌人造成150%的物理伤害，并使自己进入【残影】状态，增加30%的闪避值，持续3回合
value: Deals 150% P.DMG to 6 enemies and applies [Afterimage] state on self, increases 30% EVA for 3 rounds.

name: 对1名敌人造成200%的物理伤害，并在攻击后进入【奋发】状态，增加自身防御力50%，增加攻击力25%，持续3回合
value: Deals 200% P.DMG to 1 enemy and enters [Excite] state, increases 50% self DEF and 25% self ATK in 3 rounds.

name: 对1名敌人造成340%的物理伤害，并随机附加【中毒】/【冰冻】/【燃烧】状态，中毒每回合损失敌人当前生命值3%的血量，燃烧每回合损失敌人当前生命值4%的血量，持续2回合
value: Deals 340% P.DMG to 1 enemy and inflicts randomly [Poison]/[Freeze]/[Ignite]. Poisoning loses 3% of the enemy’s current HP per round, and Ignite loses 4% of the enemy’s current HP per round for 2 rounds.

name: 随机进行3次攻击，每次造成200%的伤害，若目标处于【燃烧】状态，则伤害加倍
value: Attacks 3 times randomly, each dealing 200% P.DMG. and causing double DMG to [Ignite] target.

name: 对4名敌人造成190%的物理伤害，并使自己进入【专注】状态，增加自身40%的暴击伤害，持续2回合
value: Deals 190% P.DMG to 4 enemies and enter [Focus] state that increases self Crit DMG by 40% for 2 rounds.

name: 对攻击最高的1名敌人造成450%的物理伤害，并对目标施加【印记】，成为射手最优先的攻击目标，持续2回合
value: Deal 450% P.DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK and apply [Mark] on the target. The target will be forced to be attacked for 2 rounds.

name: 对1名敌人造成80%的法术伤害，如目标没有死亡，会再次发动攻击（最多8次）。3次攻击内击杀该目标，拉神进入2回合【狂乱】状态，普通攻击必定暴击，且不受不良状态影响。
value: Deals 80% M.DMG to 1 enemy. If the enemy is not killed, Ra will release this skill again (up to 8 times). If enemy is killed within the first three hits, Ra enters [Frenzy] state, in which she will not be affected by any debuff.

name: 对6名敌人造成200%的法术伤害，并有50%的几率使敌人进入3回合的【燃烧】状态，每回合损失4%的当前生命值。如敌人已经处于【燃烧】状态，则眩晕1回合
value: Deals 200% M.DMG to 6 enemies and has 50% chance to [Ignite] them for 3 rounds. The targets will be stunned for 1 round if they are [Ignite].

name: 驱散我方攻击力最高2名女神的所有不良状态，然后使我方全体进入【鼓舞】状态，防御力增加赫拉防御力的100%，攻击力增加赫拉攻击力的60%，持续3回合。
value: Dispels all debuffs on 2 angels with the highest ATK and inflicts a [Encourage] state to all team, increasing their DEF by [100%*Hera's DEF] and their ATK by [60%*Hera's ATK] for 3 rounds.

name: 驱散我方攻击力最高2名女神的所有不良状态，然后使我方全体进入【鼓舞】状态，防御力增加赫拉防御力的100%，攻击力增加赫拉攻击力的70%，物抗和魔抗增加赫拉的物抗和魔抗的30%，持续3回合。
value: Dispels all debuffs on 2 angels with the highest ATK and inflicts a [Encourage] state to all team, increasing their DEF by [100%*Hera's DEF], their ATK by [70%*Hera's ATK], and their P.RES&M.RES by [30%*Hera's P.RES&M.RES] for 3 rounds.

name: 对敌方6名造成160%的法术伤害，如果敌方最大攻击力低于赫拉，则伤害翻倍，且友方全体受到至高荣光的【照耀】，治疗量增加20%，持续1回合。随后对我方血量比例值最低的2名女神回复赫拉攻击力65%的血量，同时驱散我方所有不良状态。
value: Deals 160% M.DMG to 6 enemies. If the enemy' s ATK is lower than Hera, DMG will be doubled. All teammates will be [Illuminated] by the Supreme Glory, increase 20% of HP healing for 1 round. Then healing 2 angels with lowest HP by 65% of Hera' s ATK and dispel all debuffs on team.

name: 解除敌方攻击力最高女神的所有有益状态，对其造成300%的物理伤害，并使其进入【流血】状态，不能回复血量，持续3回合。
value: Deals 300% P.DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK , dispel all positive buffs, and inflict [Bleed] effect, which prevents all healing for 3 rounds.

name: 使敌方血量百分比最高的女神进入【击破】状态，魔抗和物抗降低80%，持续3回合，并对其造成280%的物理伤害，若发生暴击则追加攻击（最多再发动2次）。
value: Deals 280% P.DMG to the enemy with the highest HP percentage and inflict [Break] effect, which decreases enemy's P.RES and M.RES by 80% for 3 rounds. Attack again if it crits (additional attack is up to 2 times)

name: 对后排3名敌人造成220%的物理伤害，若目标处于【中毒】状态，则必定暴击；并且目标进入【流血】状态，不能回复生命，持续3回合。
value: Deals 220% P.DMG to 3 enemies in back row and inflict [Bleed] effect, which prevents all healing for 3 rounds. The attack is guaranteed to crit if the enemy is in [Poison] state.

name: 使我方全体恢复丘比特攻击力90%的血量，并且【守护】队友，使受到的伤害降低30%，异常抵抗增加30%，持续2回合
value: Heals the whole team by 90% of the Cupid's ATK and [Guard] all team members, reduces DMG taken by 30% and Debuff RES increase by 30% for 2 rounds

name: 使我方全体恢复丘比特攻击力100%的血量，附加丘比特最大攻击力50%的不可驱散护盾，护盾持续1回合，并且【守护】队友，使受到的伤害降低30%，异常抵抗增加40%，持续2回合
value: Heals the whole team HP by 100% of Cupid's ATK. Each angel obtains non-dispellable shield of Cupid's 50% Max ATK and recieves [Guard] that reduce DMG taken by 30%,and increase Debuff RES by 40% for 2 rounds

name: 对敌方攻击力最高的1名敌人造成600%的物理伤害，使其进入【虚弱】状态，攻击力降低60%，对友方攻击力最高的1名赋予爱神的【祝福】，攻击力增加25%，持续2回合；如果敌人处于【冰冻】状态，则必定暴击。
value: Deals 600% P.DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK, then inflict [Weaken] effect which decreases ememy's ATK by 60%. Gives the teammate with the highest ATK Cupid's [Blessing], ATK+25% for 2 rounds and is guaranteed to crit enemies who are already in [Freeze] state.

name: 驱散6名敌人身上所有增益状态，并造成150%的物理伤害；如果目标处于【流血】状态，则必伤害翻倍。
value: Dispels all 6 enemies’ buffs and deals 150% P.DMG.  If targets are effected by [Bleed], then the attack must be critical.

name: 对敌方6名造成200%的物理伤害，如果目标生命高于50%，则伤害加倍；攻击后如果目标生命值低于50%，则使其进入【燃烧】状态，每回合损失4%的当前生命值，持续2回合
value: Deals 200% P.DMG to 6 enemies, if target's HP is higher than 50%, then causes double DMG to target; After attack if targets'HP is lower than 50%,then it will be affected by [Ignite] for 2 rounds

name: 对敌方6名造成200%的物理伤害，如果目标生命值低于50%，则伤害翻倍；如果攻击后目标生命值高于50%，则使其进入【击破】状态，魔抗、物抗降低50%，持续2回合
value: Deals 200% P.DMG to 6 enemies, if target's HP is lower than 50%, then causes double DMG to target; After attack if targets'HP is still higher than 50%, then they will suffer [Pierce], rendering their P.RES and M.RES decreased by 50% for 2 rounds

name: 对敌方6名造成220%的物理伤害，如果目标生命值高于50%，则伤害加倍；攻击后如果目标生命值低于50%，则使其进入【燃烧】状态，每回合损失4%的当前生命值，持续2回合。此技能杀死敌人，伊卡璐斯进入【初神】状态，攻击力增加50%，暴击伤害增加50%，持续2回合。（不可驱散）
value: Deals 220% P.DMG to 6 enemies. If enemy's HP is higher than 50%, then causes double DMG to enemy; If the enemy's HP is lower than 50% after the attack, then the target will suffer [Ignite] for 2 rounds. If an enemy is killed, Icarus enters [Original God] state, which increase ATK by 50% and Crit DMG by 50% for 2 rounds ( can not be dispelled).

name: 对敌方6名造成220%的物理伤害，如果目标生命值低于50%，则伤害翻倍；如果攻击后目标生命值高于50%，则使其进入【击破】状态，魔抗、物抗降低50%，持续2回合。此技能未杀死敌人，伊卡璐斯触发【神怒】，对敌方生命值最低1名敌人额外造成300%物理伤害。
value: Deals 220% P.DMG to 6 enemies, if enemy's HP is lower than 50%, then causes double DMG to enemy; After attack if enemy's HP is still higher than 50%, then they will suffer [Pierce], rendering their P.RES and M.RES decreased by 50% for 2 rounds. If there is no enemy killed, Icarus becomes [God's Fury], which deals additional 300% P.DMG to 1 enemy with lowest HP.

name: 对6个敌人造成160%的物理伤害，如果目标最大生命低于卡俄斯，则使其【晕眩】1回合
value: Deals 160% P.DMG to 6 enemies, if target's Max HP is lower than Chaos, then [Stun] the target for 1 round

name: 对6个敌人造成200%的物理伤害，并使敌人进入【易动】状态，异常抵抗-20%，持续2回合，如果目标最大生命低于卡俄斯，则使其晕眩1回合
value: Deals 200% P.DMG to 6 enemies, and make enemies enter [Unsteady] state that decreases their Debuff RES by 20% for 2 rounds. If enemy's Max HP is lower than Chaos, then [Stun] the enemy for 1 round.

name: 使前排3个敌人进入【粉碎】状态，防御力、魔抗和物抗降低50%，持续3回合；并对其造成250%的法术伤害。
value: Make 3 enemies in front row enter [Smash] state. Their DEF, P.RES,and M.RES are decreased by 50% for 3 rounds and deals 250% M.DMG to them

name: 卑弥呼利用吸魂刃，释放魂天斩吸收神秘力量，对敌方6名敌人进行3次斩击，每次造成70%的物理伤害。每次暴击时有50%基础概率吸收吸人魂魄，进入【魂体】状态，提升30%的攻击力，10%的吸血效果，持续2回合
value: Himiko's soul blade absorbs a mysterious power as it slashes 6 enemies 3 times, dealing 70% P.DMG per slash. Each crit has a 50% chance to enter [Soul Mode] for 2 rounds.\n\n[Soul Mode]: Increase ATK by 30% and Leech by 10%. (cannot be dispelled)

name: 鬼道教宗师级剑技，集神秘力量于刀刃上对敌方攻击力最高的敌人进行6次斩击，每段造成100%的物理伤害，且附加【流血】效果，持续1回合。每次暴击时有40%概率触发神秘力量，额外造成卑弥呼攻击力50%的真实伤害，并回复所造成真实伤害的等额血量。
value: Combines mysterious power on the blade to perform 6 slashes on the enemy with the highest ATK. Each slash inflicts 100% P.DMG, plus a [Bleeding] effect for 1 round. Every critical hit has a 40% chance of triggering the mysterious power, causing additional True DMG of 50% of Himiko's ATK and healing herself the same HP equal to the damage caused.

name: 卑弥呼使用奥义，释放极天斩吸收神秘力量，对敌方6名敌人进行3次斩击，每次造成90%的物理伤害。每次暴击时有60%基础概率吸收吸人魂魄，进入【魂体】状态，提升30%的攻击力，10%的吸血效果，每次斩击有60%概率增加卑弥呼10%的暴击值，持续2回合。(无法被驱散)
value: Himiko's blade absorbs a mysterious power as it slashes 6 enemies 3 times, dealing 90% P.DMG per slash. Each crit has a 60% chance to enter [Soul Mode] for 2 rounds. Each slash has a 60% chance to enter Zanshin state, increasing her CRIT by 10% for 2 rounds.\n\n[Soul Mode]: Increase ATK by 30% and Leech by 10%.

name: 鬼道教奥义级剑技，集神秘力量于刀刃上对敌方攻击力最高的敌人进行6次斩击，每段造成120%的物理伤害，且附加【流血】效果，持续1回合。每次暴击时有50%概率触发神秘力量，额外造成卑弥呼攻击力50%的真实伤害，并回复所造成真实伤害的等额血量。击杀敌人后进入2回合【狂乱】状态，不受异常状态影响。
value: Combines mysterious power on the blade to perform 6 slashes on the enemy with the highest ATK. Each slash causes 120% P.DMG, plus a [Bleeding] effect for 1 round. Every critical hit has a 50% chance of triggering the mysterious power, causing additional True DMG of 50% of Himiko's ATK and healing herself the same HP equal to the damage caused. If the enemy is killed, Himiko enters [Frenzy] state for 2 rounds, in which she will not affected by any debuff.

name: 缘结神迫不及待的想让队友找到属于自己的幸福，给队友加上美好的【祝福】，每种祝福有50%基础概率给到6名队友，5种祝福：速度+50、暴击值+50%、暴击伤害+50%、异常抵抗+20%、额外伤害减免+20%。持续2回合；阵法中最后一名队友每有一个祝福生效，全队回复缘结神最大攻击力20%的血量。
value: Enmusubi will give teammates [Blessing]. Each blessing has a 50% basic probability to 6 teammates. 5 blessings: speed +50, crit value +50%, Crit DMG +50%, RES +20%, DMG reduction +20% for 2 rounds; All team will restore HP by 20% of Enmusubi's Max ATK if the last position angel in your team takes buff effect from Enmusubi.

name: 缘结神也会对讨厌的敌方释放属于爱情中的【困惑】，让敌人晕头转向，每种困惑有50%的基础概率给到6名敌人，5种困惑：【击破】、【中毒】、【燃烧】、【流血】、【虚弱】，持续2回合，如果敌人已有此类DEBUFF，则会受到75%的法术伤害。
value: Enmusubi will also release the confusion that belongs to love to the hated enemy, making the enemy [Dizzy]. Each type of confusion has a 50% basic probability to 6 enemies, and 5 types of confusion: [Pierce], [Poisoned], [Ignite] ], [Leech], [Weaken] for 2 rounds, if the enemy has same debuff, it will suffer 75% P.DMG.

name: 给我方全体施加2回合【冰甲】状态，使其物抗增加100%，伤害反弹增加30%，并且受到普通攻击时有50%的几率冻结攻击者2回合。
value: Apply [Ice Armor] to all of us for 2 rounds, which increases the physical resistance by 100% and the damage rebound by 30%. In addition, it has a 50% chance to freeze the attacker for 2 rounds when under normal attack.

name: 给我方全体施加2回合【冰甲】状态，使其物抗增加100%，伤害反弹增加40%，并且受到普通攻击时有55%的几率冻结攻击者2回合。技能释放后，冰霜龙母进入【冬眠】状态，【冻结】自己并无法行动，同时受到的所有伤害降低90%，每回合治疗自己攻击力100%的生命值，持续2回合。（冬眠不可驱散）
value: Apply [Ice Armor] to all teammates for 2 rounds, which increases P.RES by 100% and the damage rebound by 40% and it has a 55% chance to freeze the attacker for 2 rounds when receiving basic attack. When the skill is released, Frost Dragon enters [hibernation] state which she can not release skills.Under this state, Frost Dragon reduces DMG taken by 90% and heals HP equals to her 100% ATK every round, lasts for 2 rounds. ([Hibernation] can not be dispelled)

name: 对生命值最低的1名敌人造成600%物理伤害，并使其进入【破甲】状态，防御力降低80%，持续4回合；如果目标阵亡，则额外对敌方全体造成100%的物理伤害，并且进入【破甲】状态。
value: Deals 600% P.DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP and inflict [Pierce] state, which reduces defense by 80% for 4 rounds. If the enemy is killed, deal an additional 100% P.DMG to all enemies and inflict them with [Pierce] state.

name: 龙女彻底释放雷龙血脉的力量，进入【雷暴】状态，无视任何异常效果，持续3回合。并使自身攻击力提高300%，普通攻击必定暴击，持续2回合。（无法被驱散）
value: The Storm dragon completely releases the power of the Thunder Dragon bloodline and enters a [Storm] state for 3 rounds, ignoring all abnormal effects. Also it increases her ATK by 300% and her normal attack must be Crit for 2 rounds.(Cannot be dispelled)

name: 龙女彻底释放雷龙血脉的力量，进入【雷暴】状态，无视任何异常效果，持续3回合。并使自身攻击力提高350%，普通攻击必定暴击，持续2回合（无法被驱散）。并对敌方施加3回合【电】效果（无视异常抵抗），拥有【电】效果的敌人受到普通攻击伤害后，将触发一次雷暴，敌方全体将受到风暴之龙10%的物理伤害。
value: The Storm dragon enters a [Storm] state for 3 rounds, in which she ignores all abnormal effects. Also it increases her ATK by 350% and is guaranteed to crit when she releases basic attack, lasts for 2 rounds (cannot be dispelled). And she will apply [Electric] state which will last for 3 rounds to the enemies (ignore Debuff RES). The enemies who are in [Electric] state will trigger a thunderstorm when receiving damage from basic attack, which will causes all the enemies to receive 10% P.DMG from Storm Dragon.

name: 对待敌人时猫爪会变成可怕的武器，对敌方攻击力最高的1名女神造成580%的攻击，并且使其进入【流血】状态不能回复血量，持续2回合。
value: Nekomata's paws become horrible weapons while against enemies, deal 580% ATK to 1 enemy with the highest ATK, inflicts [Bleed] effect, which prevents all healing for 2 rounds.

name: 对敌方1人造成300%的法术伤害，并造成【粉碎】状态，防御、物抗、魔抗降低60%，持续3回合，并为友方全体赋予竹林的祝福生成辉夜姬最大攻击力50%的1回合不可驱散护盾。
value: Deals 300% M.DMG to 1 enemy and the enemy enters [Break] state, which decreases DEF, P.RES and M.RES by 60% for 3 rounds. All teammates receive the blessing of the bamboo and obtain a non-dispellable shield of Princess Kaguya's 50% Max ATK.

name: 阿修罗创造一个【修罗】结界，队友将获得阿修罗属性10%的属性加成（暴击值、暴击伤害、韧性、物抗、魔抗），持续1回合；敌人全体将得到来自阿修罗10%的属性减益（暴击值、暴击伤害、韧性、物抗、魔抗），持续1回合，此环境型减益将无视敌人异常抗性且不可驱散。

If the angel in last position receives a buff in this way, Enmusubi gains a shield equal to 15% of her ATK for 1 round.

name: 缘结神也会对讨厌的敌方释放属于爱情中的【困惑】，让敌人晕头转向，每种困惑有60%的基础概率给到6名敌人，5种困惑：【击破】、【中毒】、【燃烧】、【流血】、【虚弱】，持续2回合，如果敌人已有此类DEBUFF，则会受到85%的法术伤害。此技能会以同样的效果施放两次。

Each type of confusion has a 60% basic probability to 6 enemies, and 5 types of confusion: [Break], [Poisoned], [Ignite] ], [Bleed], [Weaken] for 2 rounds, if the enemy has same debuff, it will suffer 85% M.DMG. This skill will be cast twice with the same effect.

name: 缘结神？我错觉了吗？你的神格强大了好几倍？！
value: Enmusubi? Is it my illusion? Your godhead is much more powerful than before? !

name: 的确如此，倒不如说我正是为此来找你们询问原因的。
value: Indeed, it is better to say that I am here to ask you why.

name: 与其说是强大的神格……不如说是强大的信仰之力……
value: It's not so much a powerful godhead... it's the power of faith...

name: 难道是人们对缘分的信念凝聚在一起后，所诞生的力量？
value: So, this is the power that is born from people's believes in destiny?

name: 光猜是没有结论的，或许一场战斗能够解释很多问题。
value: There is no conclusion by just guessing. Perhaps a battle can explain many problems.

name: 看来这力量能给与同伴强大的鼓舞，并让对手心境混乱。
value: It seems that this power can give a strong encouragement to the friendly and mess up hostile's minds.

name: 你的新神格并非来源于大众的信仰……而是某个独特的人。
value: Your new godhead is not derived from popular belief...but a unique person.

name: 某个独特的人？您的意思是……
value: Someone unique? what do you mean……

name: 身为掌控羁绊的神明，竟也会诞生属于自己的羁绊？
value: As the god who controls fate, she has had her own fate?

name: 我想，同为掌控因缘的赫拉或许能给你一个完美的解释……
value: I think Hera, who is also in control of fate, may be able to give you a perfect explanation……

name: 于是……大和的羁绊之神怎么有兴趣来希腊闲逛了？
value: So... why is the god of fate of Yamato interested in visiting Greece?

name: 我应天照大神引导，来找赫拉阁下寻求一个问题的解释。
value: Under the guidance of Amaterasu, I came to Hera for an explanation of a problem.

name: 不行，没有事先准备的聚会可没法让赫拉大人开心得起来。
value: No, a party without proper preparation would not amuse Lord Hera

name: 别那么认真，伊卡璐斯，我知道她来这里的原因。
value: Don't be so serious, Icarus, I know why she is here.

name: 但在告诉她答案前，我想先看看她觉醒的力量有多强大。
value: But before revealing the answer, I want to see how powerful her awakening power is.

name: 你的能力似乎现在变得更加强大了……真是难以理解……
value: So confused...Your abilities seem to be stronger now…

name: 天照大神说我的能力觉醒于某种强烈的思念，真的如此吗？
value: Amaterasu said that my ability was awakened by some kind of strong longing, is it so?

name: 哼，真是让我嫉妒的说法，直白讲，就是某人喜欢上你了。
value: Humph, it’s a statement that makes me jealous. To put it bluntly, someone fall in love with you.

name: 哎？！我从来没有想过有人会对我……
value: Ah? ! I never thought that someone would...

name: 去寻找那个对你动心的家伙吧，他现在正满脑子想着你呐。
value: Go find the guy who is tempted by you, his head is full of you now.

name: 2回合无法行动，每回合回复20%自身最大生命值，获得90%伤害减免
value: For 2 rounds, cannot act, gain 90% DMG Reduction and restore 20% of Max HP per round

name: 1回合火焰标记，每层怒焰标记会增加透体灼弹50%的伤害
value: 1 round of Mark with fire, each fire mark will increase ATK by 50% of Penetrating Bomb

value: Infinite rounds, [Moonlight] Mark caused by moonlight sigil

value: 1 round, receive 10% of Asura’s attributes bonus (CRIT, Crit DMG, FOR, P.RES, M.RES)

value: 1 round, receive 10% of Asura's attributes reduction (CRIT, Crit DMG, FOR, P.RES, M.RES)

value: 2 rounds, receive 12% of Asura’s attributes bonus (CRIT, Crit DMG, FOR, P.RES, M.RES)

name: 2回合，获得阿修罗12%的属性减益（暴击值、暴击伤害、韧性、物抗、法抗）
value: 2 rounds, receive 12% of Asura's attributes reduction (CRIT, Crit DMG, FOR, P.RES, M.RES)

name: 1回合，降低双子座攻击力100%的攻击力
value: For 1 round, ATK decreased by 100% of Gemini's ATK

name: 集齐55个双子座碎片可以召唤双子座
value: Collect 55 Gemini Shards to summon Gemini

name: 见过无数各不相同的未来，喜怒哀乐在各个平行世界中交替。\n双子座总是在默默的观测，不断寻找着宇宙的奥秘，那个潜藏在你我中的终极答案。
value: Seeing countless different futures, joy, anger, sorrow, and joy alternate in various parallel worlds. \nGemini is always observing silently, constantly searching for the mystery of the universe and the ultimate answer hidden among us.

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_51
value: Breaking the dimensional barrier, causing unimaginable fusion

name: 黄道十二星座之一幻化而来的特殊神明，原本不具备神力，但众神无休止的战争让其神格化。\n由象征秩序的“白”与象征混乱的“黑”组成，同时拥有正反两种力量的她们非常强大，但性格也非常极端、多变。
value: Gemini is a special goddess transformed from one of the zodiac constellations. Originally lacking divine power, she was granted deification for her valor in endless wars. Both black and white sides of Gemini possess powerful and contrasting skills. The white embodies order, while the black unleashes chaos. Both personalities are extreme and changeable.

name: 相比于看着残酷的现实，我更愿意与镜中的自己度过每日的时光……
value: Rather than looking at the cruel reality, I am more willing to spend my daily time with myself in the mirror…

name: 每个人的心中，都有另一个截然相反的自己，你能感觉到吗？
value: There is another diametrically opposite self in everyone's heart. Can you feel it?

name: 你在我的这面镜子中，看到了什么？
value: What do you see in my mirror?

name: 你喜欢穿黑色衣服的我，还是白色的？
value: Do you like me in black, or white?

name: 我时常也会苦恼，我和镜子里的自己，到底哪一个才是真实的我？
value: I am also distressed from time to time. If the me in the mirror is the real me?

name: 你说的也对……我们和你在一起的这段时间，确实体验到了不曾有过的温暖……
value: What you said is right... During the time we were together with you, we did experience a warmth we never had before…

name: 这样吗？或许只是你内心的另一个自己还未觉醒而已吧？
value: Is that so? Maybe another self in your heart hasn't been awakened yet?

name: 很少人能看见我镜中的另一个身影……看来这也是你我命运交织的证明……
value: Few people can see another figure in my mirror... It seems to be the proof of the intertwined fate of you and me...

name: 啊啦……黑色代表着神秘与性感，原来你喜欢成熟而有魅力的女孩子呢……
value: Ara...Black represents mystery and sexy, so you like mature and attractive girls...

name: 我也这么想，但有时候我们心意相通，有时候却同床异梦呢……
value: I think so, but sometimes we share the same feelings, and sometimes we have different thoughts...

name: 嘻嘻……你的意思是自己一个人感到寂寞了？那么……今晚要我们陪你吗？
value: Heehee...You mean you feel lonely alone? So... do you want us to accompany you tonight?

name: 她是什么样的人呢？会是你的知己吗？还是说……会是你的敌人呢？
value: What kind of person is she? Will she be your confidant? Or... will she be your enemy?

name: 喔？是吗？相对于你的谎言，你的表情可是很诚实呢……嘻嘻……
value: Oh? Yeah? Compared to your lies, your expression is very honest... hee hee…

name: 嗯……白色代表着纯洁和温柔，看来你喜欢清纯可爱的女孩子呀！
value: Hmm...White represents purity and tenderness. It seems that you like pure and cute girls!

name: 或许确实没什么意义，毕竟我们都是真实存在的，何必分出彼此呢？
value: Maybe it really doesn't make much sense. After all, we are all real, so why separate each other?

name: 礼包已经购买完!
value: The Package has been sold out

name: 话说，自从流落到东方大陆后，我们一直记不起过去的事。
value: Well well, ever since we were exiled to the Eastern Continent, we have never remembered the past.

name: 啊啦？东方众神最宠爱的两个孩子，也到叛逆期了吗？
value: Ara? Are the two children most beloved by the Eastern goddesses also in the rebellious period?

name: 我们只是很想知道，自己究竟是何处的神明而已……
value: We just want to know where exactly we were from...

name: 我记得天照大神你……似乎知道她们的来历？
value: I remember Amaterasu, you... seem to know their origins?

name: 是的，但我希望看看，你们是否已经拥有面对回忆的资格。
value: Yes, but I want to see if you already have the qualifications to face the memories.

name: 真令我意外，我以为你们会像以前那样毫无配合胡乱进攻。
value: It really surprised me, I thought you would attack indiscriminately and uncooperatively as before.

name: 没想到如今，你们的默契程度已经令人刮目相看了。
value: Unexpectedly, now, the degree of your tacit understanding has been impressive.

name: 我们自己也很吃惊，仿佛两个灵魂合二为一了似的。
value: We were also surprised, as if the two souls were merged into one.

name: 能够兼顾攻守，将彼此的优势与战术结合，很了不起呢！
value: Being able to take into account both offense and defense, combining each other's strengths with tactics, impressive!

name: 看来你们到触碰自己记忆的时刻了，去北欧问问芙蕾雅吧。
value: It seems that it’s time for you to touch your own memories. Go to Northern Europe and ask Freyja.

name: 我预见了你们的到来，但我并不能让你们通过。
value: I foresee your arrival, but I cannot let you pass.

name: 我们只是来寻找自己过去的记忆而已，您对此有所知晓吗？
value: We are just here to find our own past memories. Do you know anything about it?

name: 没有感情的冰霜女王，是你们要寻找的命运之源……
value: The Frost Queen, who has no emotions, is the source of fate that you are looking for...

name: 她是封印你们记忆，以及将你们放逐到东方之人。
value: She is the one who sealed your memory and banished you to the east.

name: 冰霜龙母？好吧，不管如何我们必须见到她，请让开吧！
value: Frost Dragon? Well, we must see her no matter what, please step aside!

name: 哼哼……两个有趣的少女呢……
没想到曾经的仇人，现在成了默契无比的同伴……
value: Unexpectedly, the former enemies have now become tacit companions...

name: 您并没有拿出全部的力量阻止我们……
value: You did not use all your strength to stop us...

name: 我即使全力应战，或许也无法胜过现在你们之间的羁绊。
value: Even if I fight with all my strength, I may not be able to overcome the fetters between you now.

name: 去见你们的创造者吧，她会告诉你们过去的一切……
value: Go meet your creator, she will tell you everything...

name: 你们是……当年北欧的永恒之冰所幻化的那面双子之镜？
value: Are you... the twins who transformed from the eternal ice of Northern Europe?

name: 我们并不知道自己是谁，倒不如说我们正是为此而来。
value: We don't know who we are, it's better to say that's what we are here for.

name: 你们的存在会给世界带来灾难……我不能让你们再次离开……
value: Your existence will bring disaster to the world...I can't let you leave again...

name: 但如今你们的命运似乎产生了变化，如果你们胜得过我……
value: But now your destiny seems to have changed, if you beat me...

name: 我就告诉你们一切的真相，和你们的过往吧……
value: I will tell you all the truth, and your past...

name: 告诉我们吧，我们究竟有着怎样的过去……
value: Tell us, what kind of past we have...

name: 镜中双子，爱上了同一个照镜者，嫉妒让二人反目成仇。
value: The twins in the mirror fell in love with the same person who looked into the mirror, and their jealousy turned them into enemies.

name: 诅咒在镜中凝聚，记忆在她们的脑海中消散无踪……
value: The curse is condensed in the mirror, and the memory disappears in their minds...

name: 而如今，镜外之人早已不在，姐妹们找回了曾经的羁绊……
value: Now, the person outside the mirror is no longer there, and the sisters have recovered the fetters they once had...

name: 命运向来晦涩，自己理解吧，总有一天你们会明白的。
value: Fate has always been obscure, think about it by yourself, you will understand it one day.

name: 双子座生命值高于50%，释放技能【表】，对敌方全体造成200%法术伤害，此伤害将无视敌方全部法术抗性和护盾。双子座生命值低于50%，转为释放【里】，对敌方全体造成150%的法术伤害，造成的全部伤害的100%转化为生命值。
value: If Gemini's HP is higher than 50%, release [Outward], and cause 200% M.DMG that ignores all M.RES and shield to all enemies. If Gemini's HP is below 50%, release [Inward], causing 150% of M.DMG to all enemies, and 100% of damage caused will be converted into HP.

name: 双子座攻击敌方攻击力最高敌人造成500%的法术伤害，双子座攻击力高于敌方时触发【阳】，对敌方造成500%的追加法术伤害，此追加伤害将无视护盾。双子座攻击力低于敌方时触发【阴】，对敌方施加1回合【虚弱】，攻击力减少双子座同等的攻击力，如虚弱未成功追加250%的法术伤害。（敌方已被击败将无法触发追加伤害）
value: Gemini attacks enemy with the highest ATK, causing 500% M.DMG. When Gemini's ATK is higher than enemy's, [Yang] is triggered, causing 500% additional M.DMG that ignores the shield. When Gemini's ATK is lower than enemy's, [Yin] is triggered, and applies [Weaken] to enemy for 1 round, enemy's ATK will be reduced by the same ATK of Gemini. If fail to apply [Weaken], 250% M.DMG would be added . (Won't trigger additional dmg if enemy dead)

name: 【表】【里】同时释放，对敌方全体造成220%的法术伤害，此伤害将无视敌人全部法术抗性和护盾，并将造成的全部伤害的100%转化为生命值。
value: [Outward] [Inward] release at the same time, causing 220% M.DMG that ignores M.RES and shield to all enemies, and convert 100% of all damage caused into HP.

name: 【阴】【阳】同时释放，对敌方最高攻击力敌人造成600%法术伤害，并造成1回合【虚弱】，攻击力减少双子座同等的攻击力，对敌方造成600%的追加法术伤害，追加伤害将无视敌方护盾。（敌方已被击败将无法触发追加伤害）
value: [Yin] [Yang] released at the same time, causing 600% M.DMG to the enemy with highest ATK, and causing 1 round of [Weaken], reducing the ATK by the same ATK of Gemini, causing 600% additional M.DMG that ignores shield. (The enemy will not be able to trigger additional damage after being defeated)

name: 沙滩、阳光和羽翼的三重奏!!!
value: The trio of beach, sunshine and pinion

name: 感恩节盛宴餐具，可通过活动和日常挂机获取，快去分享美食吧。
value: Thanksgiving feast tableware, which can be obtained through events and daily idling, go and share the food.

name: 使用刀叉餐具分享美食，可获得钻石和积分
value: Use tableware to share food to get diamonds and points

value: Signed up for PVE, unable to register again

value: Signed up for PVP, please wait for event to start

name: 已报名PVE，等待活动开启
value: Signed up for PVE, please wait for event to start

name: 啊啦……每每想到签定誓约时，另一个我都能听到只会对你说的……那些脸红心跳的话……真是令人感到害羞呢……
value: Whenever I've thought of making a vow to you, the other me could sense those private thoughts. I blush when I think she knows how I feel about you.

name: 对敌方6名造成200%的物理伤害，并使其进入【虚弱】状态，降低50%的攻击力，持续2回合；如果目标处于不良状态，则必定暴击。
value: Deals 200% P.DMG to 6 enemies and inflicts [Weaken] for 2 rounds. If the target is afflicted with a debuff, crit is guaranteed.\n\n[Weaken]: Decrease ATK by 50%

name: 对随机3名敌人造成350%的物理伤害，如果目标处于不良状态，则会【冰冻】目标1回合，敌人将无法行动。
value: Deals 350% P.DMG to 3 random enemies. If the target is afflicted with a debuff, inflicts [Frozen] for 1 round.\n\n[Frozen]: Unable to act.

name: 圣诞节拐杖糖，可通过活动和日常挂机获取，快去享受圣诞狂欢吧。
value: Christmas Candy Cane, which can be obtained through events and daily idling, go and enjoy Christmas carnival.

name: 使用此兑换券可用用来开启盲盒获取奖励
value: Use lucky scroll to open gift box and obtain rewards

name: 你怎么看待战争的意义？
value: What do you think of the meaning of the war?

name: 希腊的主神，宙斯与赫拉二人，你更欣赏哪一位呢？
value: Zeus and Hera, two Greek gods, which one do you prefer?

name: 面对即将到来的战斗，你认为军队的实力和精妙的策略哪个更重要？
value: Facing the coming war, which do you think is more important, the strength of the army or the ingenious strategy?

name: 你觉得这场神明之间的战争浩劫，会是某个幕后黑手所为吗？
value: Do you think that some evil force is behind the catastrophe?

name: 我并非命运女神，但依旧有很多人类渴望来我这里倾听自己的未来。
value: I’m not the goddess of fate, but countless people still come here and eager to predict their futures.

name: 如果为了追寻一段完美的爱情，你愿意付出失去智慧的代价吗？
value: If you have chance to pursuit a perfect love, are you willing to pay the price of losing your wisdom?

name: 其实我也想听听。
value: I also want to do the same.

name: 我想我会愿意的。
value: I presume I will do it.

name: 这或许不大值得。
value: It may not be worth it.

name: 是的，不管你是否相信，虽然我司掌战争，但却是最期待和平降临的神明。
value: Yes. Believe it or not, I’m in charge of war, but I’m the one who expect peace the most.

name: 如果她能够收敛几分嫉妒，增添几分谦逊与智慧的话，或许会更有魅力。
value: She might be more attractive if she could temper her jealousy and be a little more humble and intelligent.

name: 嗯，看来你也认为利用强大的战斗力正面进攻，反而是最合适的策略……
value: Well, you agree that the most appropriate strategy is to attack directly with the powerful force...

name: 如果确实如此，那这场世界末日恐怕会比我们想象中麻烦很多。
value: If so, there must be much more troubles than we thought.

name: 喔，是吗？但我并不能告诉你有关你的将来，不然命运女神该找我麻烦了。
value: Oh, yeah? But I cannot tell you anything about your future or else I’ll get in trouble.

name: 是么……？那么，你认为什么样的女性……才算完美呢？
value: Right...? Well, which kind of female... do you think is perfect?

name: 确实如此，但这种荣耀却建立在杀戮与死亡之上，有些让我难以接受……
value: Indeed, but this glory is just founded on the base of killing and death, which is unacceptable for me...

name: 呵呵……从某些兴趣与爱好上来说，你和宙斯大人的确有很多相似之处呢……
value: Haha...You do have a lot in common with Lord Zeus, in terms of certain interests and preferences

name: 看来和我所想的一样，你也是一位擅长以头脑制胜的指挥者。
value: It seems like you are, as I thought, a mastermind.

name: 我会继续调查这件事的真相，毕竟还有太多让人想不通的疑点和巧合。
value: I'll continue to investigate the truth, after all, there are remaining lots of puzzles and coincidences.

name: 而智慧决定眼界，不是吗？有我在你身边的话，你一定能够掌控自己的命运。
value: And wisdom determines vision, doesn't it? With me by your side, you can control your own destiny.

name: 我挺欣慰的，看来至少在你的心目中，智慧依旧是最宝贵的东西……
value: I'm glad to know that, in your mind at least, wisdom is still the most precious thing

name: 这份誓约象征着你我意志的结合，愿我的智慧能够带给你面对敌人的勇气，愿我的力量能够引导你通向胜利的路途。
value: Our vow unites us. Allow my wisdom and strength to help you find the courage to face your enemies and defeat them in battle.

name: 希腊掌控战争、智慧与艺术的著名女神，宙斯和第一代智慧女神墨提斯的女儿。\n她是兼勇敢、美貌、智慧于一身的神明，神能极为强大，是战术与战略上的大师。哪怕在绝境中，她也能找到一丝通向胜利的曙光。
value: Athena is the goddess of war, wisdom, and art in Greek mythology. She is the daughter of Zeus and Metis, the first angel of wisdom.\nShe is the angel of bravery, beauty and wisdom with great divine power. Meanwhile, she is the master of tactics and strategy. Even trapped in an impasse, she could find the ray of light leading to victory.

name: 集齐55个雅典娜碎片可以召唤雅典娜
value: Collect 55 Athena Shards to summon Athena

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_53
value: Dominating Dispel Skill & High DMG Single Target Skill

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_54
value: The angel of war coming back with the belief of defeating all enemies

name: 这里并非奥林匹斯山，难道我传送的地点产生了偏差……
value: This isn’t Olympus. It seems like I have been sent to a wrong place...

name: 嗯？据我们所观察……你好像是希腊的……智慧女神？
value: Um? From what we’ve seen...you must be...the angel of wisdom in Greece.

name: 我感到你们的神格非常强大，但你们不是正统的神明吧？
value: I can feel that your godhead is very powerful, but you’re not the orthodox gods.

name: 是不是正统神明不重要，但我们是这片神域边境的守卫。
value: It’s not important whether we are orthodox or not, but we are the border guards of this sanctuary.

name: 而作为守护者，恐怕我们得把你“安全”地送出边境……
value: So as the guards, it's our duty to see you off safely from here...

name: 看来你们的手段不够“安全”，不是么？
value: But actually, your methods are not safe enough, are you?

name: 你在战场上的战斗力和战术安排，确实令人惊叹。
value: Indeed, your combat power and tactics on the battle is extremely impressive.

name: 击溃对手的团队核心总是最有效的，身为指挥者我很清楚。
value: It's always best to break the core of your opponent's team, and I know that clearly as a commander.

name: 对了，你似乎在找希腊的同伴？作为刚才失礼的歉意……
value: By the way, I guess that you’re looking for the Greek companions. I would like to apologize for my impoliteness...

name: 我们就帮你个忙好了，例如开个传送门之类的怎么样？
value: Just let us do you a favor. Do you think opening a portal could help you?

name: 雅典娜……？！天哪，宙斯在上，我是不是在做梦？！
value: Athena...?! Gosh, Lord Zeus, am I just dreaming?!

name: 真令我失望，你这个讨厌的家伙竟然没被永远困在神界。
value: I’m so disappointed that you’re not stuck in the divine realm forever.

name: 时间真是太残酷了，看来我的智慧已经不再被众神所青睐。
value: Time is cruel. Obviously, my wisdom has fallen out of the favor with the gods.

name: 别这么说，或许战场的较量能让我们重新认识你，亲爱的。
value: No, please. Perhaps we can know you again on the battle, dear.

name: 来吧，作为希腊主神，我也想看看你如今的实力究竟如何。
value: Come on, as the Greek lord god, I cannot wait to see how powerful you are now.

name: 扭转对手给自己带来的不利局面，再加以更猛烈的反击……
value: Reverse the adverse situation brought by the opponent, and then fiercely lash back at the enemy.

name: 不觉得熟悉么？这正是我在战场上最有效的战术策略。
value: Don't you feel familiar? It was my most effective tactical strategy on the battle.

name: 几百年前那个温文尔雅的小姑娘，现在可真够暴力的……
value: Hundreds of years ago, the little girl was debonair, but nowadays, she is quite violent...

name: 值得庆幸的是，她是希腊众神的同伴，而不是敌人。
value: Fortunately, she is the companion of Greek gods, not the enemy.

name: 欢迎回来，亲爱的，你或许比想象中更适合活跃在战场上。
value: Welcome back, dear. You might be more suited to active on the battle than you thought.

name: 战神EX-纯洁圣体
