value: <size=16>Athena entered [God of War] state, purge all debuffs (include ‘cannot be dispelled’ debuffs) on herself and gain immunity to any debuff for 2 rounds and cannot be dispelled; Deal 600% P.DMG to the individual enemy. When enemy HP is over 50%, which must cause crit. If the target is still alive, then Athena will enter [God of War EX] state, increasing self DMG by 20% and the effects last until the battle ends(These effects can be superimposed and can’t dispel). </size>

name: 对1名敌人造成600%的物理伤害，雅典娜汇集队友的能量，除自己外友方每一位存活的在场的女神，将会增加一段50%的物理伤害（此追击伤害无视敌人物理抗性，最多250%）。
value: Deal 600% P.DMG to 1 enemy, Athena can gather the powers of team members. For each angel except herself alive in our lineup, add an extra 50% P.DMG. (This damage will ignore the P.RES of the enemy and the upper limit is 250%.)

name: 雅典娜进入【战神】状态，净化自身所有不良状态（包含不可驱散类型），并且免疫任何异常状态，持续2回合；并且对敌方单体造成840%的物理伤害，敌人血量大于50%则必定暴击，如果目标未阵亡，则雅典娜进入【战神EX】状态，使自身造成的伤害提高20%，持续到战斗结束（该效果可以叠加，且不可驱散）；如果目标被击杀，则将溢出伤害的10%以真实伤害传导到给全体敌方。
value: <size=16>Athena entered [God of War] state, purge all debuffs (include ‘cannot be dispelled’ debuffs) on herself and gain immunity to any debuff for 2 rounds and cannot be dispelled; Deal 840% P.DMG to the individual enemy. When enemy HP is over 50%, which must cause crit. If the target is still alive, then Athena will enter [God of War EX] state, increasing self DMG by 20%, and the effects last until the battle ends(These effects can be superimposed and can’t dispel). If the target is killed, 10% exceeding damage will be converted into true damage on all enemies.</size>

name: 对1名敌人造成720%的物理伤害，雅典娜汇集队友的能量，除自己外友方每一位存活的在场的女神，将会增加一段50%的真实伤害（最多250%）。
value: Deals 720% P.DMG to 1 enemy. Deals an additional 50% True DMG (up to 250%) for each teammate alive in the lineup (except Athena).

name: 就像光芒射穿黑暗，像春风融化积雪，圣枪带来了力量，带来了希望。\n战争总是残酷的，我不愿参与战争，但是也最好别试图激怒我。
value: As light shines through the darkness, as spring winds melt snow, the lance brings strength and hope.\nThe war is always cruel. I'm not willing to be involved in any war, but don’t try to provoke me.

name: 对前排3名敌人造成250%的物理伤害，使其进入【破甲】状态，防御力降低50%，持续2回合，并有50%概率【眩晕】敌方1回合。

name: 使我方全体进入【奋发】状态，攻击力增加25%，暴击值增加25%，暴击伤害增加25%，持续3回合。

name: 3回合攻击力、暴击、暴击伤害增加25%
value: Increase ATK, Crit, Crit DMG by 25% for 3 rounds

name: 呐，我说，只谈力气的话，你觉得我和丑牛谁更大些？
value: Well, listen up, do you think who is stronger, Zodiac Ox or me?

name: 你对神明之间的战争怎么看？
value: What do you think of the wars among gods?

name: 勇气与智慧你觉得哪个更强大？
value: Which one do you think is more powerful, courage or wisdom?

name: 话说回来，你知道我和丑牛是怎样被召唤到这个世界来的么？
value: Anyway, are you curious about how Zodiac Ox and I were summoned into this world?

name: 喂！你有中意的女孩子么？觉得我怎么样？
value: Hey! Is there any girl you like? How about me?

name: 我已经有喜欢的人了。
value: I do get a crush on someone.

name: 哼哼！我就知道你会这么说，拼力气我还从来没输过谁。
value: Humph! I know the answer because I've never lost in terms of strength.

name: 我也这么认为，在来到这个世界之前，我觉得你们打仗简直像小孩子过家家一般。
value: I think so. Before I came to this world, I just thought those wars were as childish as kids' games.

name: 嗯，勇敢的人往往能在磨练中变得睿智，但缺乏勇气的智慧在我看来只是小聪明罢了。
value: Yeah, brave persons will tend to be wise after experiencing the trials, but the wisdom without courage seems like a petty trick.

name: 虽然我还有想回去的念头，但我觉得这个世界更有意思……
value: Although sometimes I still want to go back, this world is more interesting than the original land...

name: 哼哼！是吗？我对有竞争对手的恋爱可是一点也不讨厌呢！
value: Aha! Right? I'm not averse to competing with others for romance.

name: 哼！看来你对我很没有信心啊！要我给你一拳，让你体验一下吗？！
value: Humph! It seems that you have no confidence in me! My punch will make you clear.

name: 哼哼！等着瞧吧，这场众神大战真正劲爆的时刻，现在才刚刚开始！
value: Humph! Just you wait, the climax of the wars among gods is coming sooner!

name: 是么？哼哼，我很有兴趣用拳头在你的脑袋上测试一下勇气和智慧哪个更强……
value: Right? Well, I cannot wait to punch you on the head to test that which one is powerful, courage or wisdom...

name: 我觉得相对于猜，我更偏好用拳头得到答案呢，看招啦！！
value: I prefer knowing the answer with my punch to guessing something. Watch this!

name: 我就知道你会这么说！我对自己的魅力还是很有自信的！
value: I knew you were gonna say that! I'm really confident of my charming!

name: 啊……誓约真是一个很麻烦的仪式呢！有时间说这些誓词，不如早点回到战场上去把敌人打飞吧！
value: Uh... What a hassle! It's better to fight against rivals rather than make vows!

name: 集齐50个寅虎碎片可以召唤寅虎
value: Collect 50 Zodiac Tiger Shards to summon Zodiac Tiger

name: 原出自于华夏神系“十二地支”中第三位的“虎”，其本身并非神明，但不知什么原因具备了异常恐怖的神能。\n与丑牛一样，在众神战争中经历了无数的磨练，使其力量足以和各大神系的主神级人物一较高下。
value: Originally from the third Tiger in the Twelve Earthly Branches of the Chinese God. She was not a god but for some reason, she possessed an extremely terrifying power.\nJust like Zodiac Ox, she has experienced countless trials in the wars among gods so that she qualified to fight against the main gods.

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_57
value: Aiming at Front Row & Team Buff

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_61
value: Super Team Buff  Unique Continuous Healing

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_62
value: Everything cannot defeat us will make us more powerful

name: 使我方全体进入【激昂】状态，增加30%的伤害、治疗效果、物抗、魔抗，持续3回合；同时摩羯座进入【奉献】状态（不可驱散），持续2回合。受到攻击后将治疗除自己外所有友军，使其恢复摩羯座攻击力10%的生命值。
value: The whole team enters [Ablaze] state, increasing DMG, healing effect, P.RES, M.RES by 30% for 3 rounds; Meanwhile, Capricornus enters [Selfless] state (cannot be dispelled) for 2 round, healing the whole team except herself after receiving damage, and recovering their HP by 10% of Capricornus’s ATK

name: 使我方全体恢复摩羯座攻击力80%的生命值，如果摩羯座生命值低于50%，则治疗翻倍；同时使我方全体进入【愈合】状态，每回合恢复摩羯座攻击力20%的血量，持续2回合。
value: Restores HP to all team angels equal to 80% of Capricornus’s ATK, if Capricornus’s HP is lower than 50%, healing will be doubled; Meanwhile, all team enter [Heal] state, recover HP by 20% of Capricornus’s ATK in each round for 2 rounds.

name: 使我方全体进入【激昂】状态，增加40%的伤害、治疗效果、物抗、魔抗，持续3回合；同时摩羯座进入【奉献】状态（不可驱散），自身韧性提高100%，持续3回合。受到攻击后将治疗除自己外所有友军，使其恢复摩羯座攻击力20%的生命值。
value: The whole team enters [Ablaze] state, increasing DMG, healing effect, P.RES, M.RES by 40% for 3 rounds; Meanwhile, Capricornus enters [Selfless] state (cannot be dispelled) for 3 rounds, increasing FOR by 100%, healing the whole team except herself after receiving damage, and recovering their HP by 20% ATK

name: 使我方全体恢复摩羯座攻击力100%的生命值，如果摩羯座生命值低于50%，则治疗翻倍；同时使我方全体进入【愈合】状态，每回合恢复摩羯座攻击力30%的血量，持续3回合；并且驱散敌方每名女神2个增益状态。
value: Restores HP to all team angels equal to 100% of Capricornus's ATK, if Capricornus's HP is lower than 50%, healing will be doubled; Meanwhile, all team enter [Heal] state, recover HP by 30% of Capricornus's ATK for 3 rounds; And dispel 2 buffs on each enemy

name: 3回合伤害、治疗效果、物抗、魔抗增加30%
value: Increase DMG, healing effect, P.RES, M.RES by 30% for 3 rounds

name: 受到攻击后治疗除自己外所有友军
value: Heals all teammates except for herself after receiving damage

name: 每回合恢复一定血量
value: Recovers some HP in each round

name: 3回合伤害、治疗效果、物抗、魔抗增加40%
value: Increase DMG, healing effect, P.RES, M.RES by 40% for 3 rounds

name: 这是什么地方……我为什么会被传送到这里来？！
value: Where is it... Why am I here?!

name: 你是谁？！这场战斗不应该有陌生人插手才对……
value: Who are you?! This battle will not be related to any stranger.

name: 看来你运气不好，亲爱的，偏偏此时出现在众神交战之地。
value: You’re out of luck, dear, you happened to appear on the gods' battle land.

name: 是召唤咒文出错的结果么，最近怎么总发生这种事……
value: Anything wrong with summon spell, why is this happening all the time...

name: 呵，新来的家伙么？正好，我正觉得这场混战不够激烈呐！
value: Hum, the new guy? Alright, I just think that this battle is not fierce enough.

name: 哎……？打完了？我感觉自己还没出手你们就倒下了……
value: Eh...? It’s over, right? It didn’t take me any strength to defeat you...

name: 你确实没怎么出手，但你的同伴在疯狂地向我们进攻……
value: You didn’t attack us, but your fellows came at us like crazy...

name: 牺牲自己的生命从而提高团队的作战能力吗……
value: Sacrifice your own life to improve your team’s combat power...

name: 哼，仅凭我自己的力量终究难以和形如一体的团队对抗……
value: Humph, it’s really hard for me to defeat a united team...

name: 啊啦，看上去是个有趣的家伙呢，我记住你了，亲爱的。
value: Ah, an interesting guy, I will remember you, dear.

name: 黄道十二星座之一幻化而来的特殊神明，原本不具备神力，但众神无休止的战争让其神格化。\n她是所有星座中心地最仁慈的一个，对众神之间的战争非常反感，但其强大的信念和神力却让同伴安心。
value: Capricornus is a special goddess transformed from one of the zodiac constellations. Originally lacking divine power, she was granted deification for her valor in endless wars.\nShe is the most merciful among the constellations. She has a strong aversion to the wars among gods, but her powerful faith and divine power can comfort fellows.

name: 这个世界似乎比我想象中更危险，人类和众神就这么喜欢战争吗？
value: This world is more dangerous than I thought. Are human beings and gods fond of wars?

name: 据说除了我以外，好像还有别的星座因为这次众神战争而被召唤而来？
value: It’s said that other constellations besides me have been summoned to this world because of the gods' war.

name: 对战争感到厌倦的我，偏偏获得了如此强大的力量，这也是命运的玩笑吗？
value: I’m indeed tired of wars, but I own this great power. That’s totally a joke of fate.

name: 那个……你有喜欢的女孩子么？
value: Well... Do you fancy any girl?

name: 占卜是我最擅长的了，需要我帮你预测一下未来吗？
value: I extremely excel at divination. Do you need me to predict your future?

name: 如果有一天，你必须要在输掉一场战争和牺牲我之间做出选择，你会怎么做？
value: If one day you have to choose between losing a war or sacrificing me, what will you do?

name: 战争是一种修行。
value: The war is also a kind of cultivation.

name: 力量也能终结战争。
value: The power also can end the wars.

name: 我想预测战况。
value: I wanna predict the battle progress.

name: 我不会让这事发生。
value: I'm not gonna let that happen.

name: 那么我就更有必要和你一起去阻止这些无意义的争斗了，你觉得呢？
value: Well, it’s necessary to work with you to stop the meaningless wars. What do you think?

name: 我始终期待着和平，虽然我承认在战场上和你经历生死一线的感觉挺不错的。
value: I’m always eager about peace, though I admit that it’s pretty good to go through thick and thin together on the battlefront.

name: 看来我有很长时间会挺孤独的，如果可以的话，希望您能多陪伴我一会儿……
value: It seems that I will be lonely for a long time. If possible, I really hope that you can accompany me longer.

name: 嗯……我觉得不管如何，多几个同伴总是好事。
value: Hmm... It’s good to have several friends no matter what happened.

name: 或许是这样吧，至少命运让我遇见了你，在我心中没有比这更重要的事情了。
value: Maybe you’re right. At least, thanks for the fate that I met you. No one can be more important than you in my mind.

name: 你说的没错，我会好好使用命运所赐给我的力量，带给这个世界救赎的。
value: Yeah, I will use my innate power in a proper way and bring salvation to the whole world.

name: 你为什么一直盯着我看……你……你是在暗示什么吗……
value: Why are you always staring at me...Hmm...Are you hinting at me something?

name: 真的？那么告诉我……你喜欢什么样的女孩子呢？
value: Really? So tell me please... What kind of girl do you fancy?

name: 嗯，有结果啦！你会爱上长着羊角和鱼尾的……等……等下！我算错了！不是这样的！
value: Ah, here’s the result! You’ll fall in love with someone who has the horn and the fishtail... Wait...wait a moment! That’s wrong! That’s not true.

name: 嗯……结果显示……“自己才是自己最大的敌人”？这是什么意思？我的占卜出错了吗？
value: Hmm... The result shows that... “You are your own worst enemy” ? What’s the meaning? What’s wrong with my divination?

name: 你不需要做出选择，因为到那时，我会替你做出选择的……
value: You don’t need to choose any of them. At that moment, I will choose for you...

name: 是啊……我相信你，如果是你的话，一定有能力避免这种纠结的命运！
value: Yeah... I believe in you. You have the ability to avoid the tangled fate！

name: 你知道么？誓约是一种牺牲 ，一种为彼此信念的牺牲。愿我的力量能与你结合，开创出我们所期待的世界。
value: A vow is a kind of sacrifice, which means that from now on, we will live by one faith. I hope that our powers combine so that we can create a world worth fighting for.

name: 集齐55个摩羯座碎片可以召唤摩羯座
value: Collect 55 Capricornus Shards to summon Capricornus

name: 仁慈不代表软弱，牺牲的代价换来的往往是令对手胆寒的力量，在以自我为祭品的献祭仪式完成之时，也是战场上的敌人陷入修罗炼狱之刻。
value: Mercy doesn’t mean weakness. The individual sacrifice is for the daunting strength of the team to defeat the opponent. When the sacrificial ceremony with self sacrifice is completed, the enemy on the battlefield will be plunged into purgatory.

name: 让爱神的箭矢，为你指引恋情的方向吧！
value: Let the Cupid's arrow guide your romance！

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_25
value: They represent white, the symbol of order, and black, the symbol of chaos. In possession of two distinct powers, they are very strong, but extreme and capricious.

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_24
value: She is a brave, gorgeous and intelligent angel and the master of strategies and tactics who can find silver linings to victory even in hopeless time.

name: CUSTOM_GIFT_NEED_SELECT
value: Please select items in the package at first.

name: 天使硬币可以用来购买游戏内付费商品
value: Angel coins can be used to purchase the in-game paying items.

name: ANGEL_COIN_COST
value: Are you sure you want to spend {0}AC on this item? \n Current balance {1}AC

name: 火神祝融限定时装信物
皮肤界面使用，可以兑换丘比特限定时装。
value: Can redeem Cupid Limited Fashion in Angel Fashion interface.

name: 皮肤界面使用，可以兑换火神祝融限定时装。
value: Can redeem Zhu Rong Limited Fashion in Angel Fashion interface.

name: 虽然我不一定能永远驻留于你所在的时空，但我以天使之名发誓，无论在何时何地，我与你的约定都会散发出永不消逝的光芒。
value: I may not be stay by your side all the time, but I swear by the angel that our vow will shine forever, anywhere and anytime.

name: 这个世界的米迦勒在做什么？她还在致力于解决与路西法以及魔物的争端吗？
value: What's Michael of this world doing? Is she still working on the dispute with Lucifer and monsters?

name: 我始终不确定是否该解除与路西法的敌对关系，专注于维护平行时空的稳定。
value: I cannot still figure out if I should give up the hostile relationship between Lucifer and me. I'd better focus on maitaining the stability of the parallel universe.

name: 我很庆幸能够成为第七神域的代言人之一，去解决各个平行时空的灾难。
value: I'm so glad to be one of the spokespersons belonging to the seventh domain to solve disasters in every parallel universe.

name: 嗯……据我所知，你应该还没有了解过“第七神域”这个概念吧？
value: Well, as I know, you have not figured out the concept of the seventh domain.

name: 你相信象征正义的末日审判……终将在某个时刻到来么？
value: Do you believe that the doomsday judgement representing justice will come at some point.

name: 当其他平行世界遭受灭顶之灾时，你能允许我离开你，去那里解决危机吗？
value: When other parallel universes get into the catastrophe, would you allow me to leave here and solve the crisis?

name: 我认为应该这么做。
value: I suppose it should be like that.

name: 的确，和我说说看吧？
value: So would you like to tell me more about it?

name: 会，这是一种荣耀。
value: Yep, it's a kind of glory.

name: 什么是第七神域代言人？
value: What's the spokesperson of the seventh domain?

name: 不，我已经听你说过了。
value: Nope, I have heard it from you.

name: 希望不要，好像挺可怕。
value: I don't want that to happen. It seems horrible.

name: 我或许会有些不舍。
value: Maybe I cannot bear to part with you.

name: 嗯……也挺正常的，毕竟她和路西法可是水火不容的关系——至少在这个世界如此。
value: Hmm...It's usual. After all, she and Lucifer are enemies like water and fire at least in this world.

name: 你说的没错，毕竟我和她都即将要面对一个能够毁灭所有时空的、更强大的敌人……
value: You are right. We will face the more powerful enemy who can destroy the whole space time together.

name: 嗯……你能想象一个和这里差不多的世界么？那个世界也有一个你，也在问我这个问题。
value: Hmm...Maybe you cannot image that there is another you in the similar world asking me the same question.

name: 简单说，那里是所有平行世界的连接点，以及致力解决平行世界灾变的英雄所在之处。
value: In a simple word, it is the junction where all parallel universes join together and it's also the place trying to arrange heroes to solve the catastrophe.

name: 看来你已经做好了誓死对抗命运与灾厄的觉悟了呢，愿众天使的光芒与你同在。
value: It seems that you have gotten ready to resist the fate and the disaster. May the light of the angels be with you.

name: 至少我向你承诺，不管我去哪个世界，都不会忘记和你在一起的这段时光。
value: At least, I promise that I will never forget all the time staying with you wherever I am.

name: 真让人意外！我还以为她会像当初那样，贯彻不把路西法亲手丢回地狱不罢休的理念。
value: What a surprise! I thought that she was gonna stick to her principle of throwing Lucifer into the hell, like she always did before.

name: 或许你是正确的吧，天使与恶魔结成同盟的可能性，恐怕比太阳从西边出来还小。
value: Maybe you are right. An alliance between angels and demons is less likely than the sun rising from the west.

name: 维护所有平行世界的稳定，消灭可能引发时空混乱的危险因素，这就是代言人的职责。
value: Maintaining the stability of all the parallel universes and eliminating all risk factors that will cause the space time chaos, which are the responsibility of the spokesperson.

name: 嗯？奇怪，难道我把你和另一个平行世界的相同存在弄混了？
value: Eh? So weird. Did I confuse you with an identical being in another parallel universe?

name: 审判来临时，你只会听见“BOOM！”的一声巨响，然后魔物就从这个世界上全部消失啦。
value: When the doomsday judgement comes, all you'll hear a loud bang that sounds like BOOM! And then all the monsters will vanish forever.

name: 如果终有一天我们分隔在两个时空，而你希望我回到身边时，我一定会回应你的呼唤。
value: If one day we are separated into two parallel universes, I will do answer your call when you come back again.

name: 使6名敌人损失10%当前生命值，该伤害为真实伤害且不超过SP加百列攻击力的2倍，并造成220%的物理伤害。
value: Causes 6 enemies to lose 10% of the current HP, which is True DMG less than double SP Gabriel's ATK, deals 220% P.DMG

name: 对一名敌人进行多次攻击，每次攻击使该敌人损失10%当前生命值，该伤害为真实伤害且不会超过SP加百列攻击力的2倍，并额外造成560%的物理伤害。物理伤害暴击时有100%的概率追加一次攻击，每追加一次攻击，该概率降低35%。
value: Attacks 1 enemy multiple times and each time causing the enemy to lose 10% of current HP, which is True DMG less than double SP Gabriel's ATK, and deals extra 560% P.DMG.  The P.DMG critical hit causes a 100% chance of an extra attack, and each extra attack reduces the chance by 35%

name: 可以在幻兽狩猎活动中兑换物品。
value: Can redeem items in Eudemons hunting event

name: 击败怪物，换取强力幻兽
value: Defeat monsters to gain powerful eudemons

name: 使用箭矢射击怪物，获得狩猎积分兑换奖励
value: Use arrows to defeat monsters and gain hunting points

name: 在幻兽狩猎活动中使用，用来对怪物造成伤害
value: Used in Eudemons hunting event and attack monsters

name: 在上古卷轴中使用，用于元素精灵系列幻兽的合成。
value: Used to synthesize the elementals series in elder scrolls

name: 未消耗的狩猎积分自动保存，可在下次活动使用
value: Unconsumed hunting point is auto-saved and can be used at the next event

name: 晶矿大师：当进驻晶石之泉时，提升晶石的产量。
value: Spar Mine Master: When stationed at spar spring, increasing the productivity of spar

name: 生命之源：提升所有上阵女神的生命值。
value: Origin of Life: Increase HP of all line-up angels

name: 她是自然界四大元素中象征“宁静之水”的精灵，在经过祝祷的神圣泉水中，往往会见到她的诞生。她拥有着同族中最高的智慧和最冷静的性格，再大的麻烦对于她来说也不过是能够轻松解决的小事罢了。水元素的力量让她非常熟悉晶石的开发过程。此外，她还能为战场上的女神同伴提供强大的生命魔法支持。
value: As one of the four major natural elementals, she represents tranquil water. Anyone who passes holy spring has the chance to witness her birth.She is the most intelligent and calmest one of her kindred, and no matter how big the trouble is, it is only a small case for her.Because of owning the power of water elemental, she is familiar with the spar development process. In addition, she can provide strong HP magic support for the angels on the battle.

name: 幸会，吾乃水之精灵温蒂妮，遵从命运而被召唤而来。希望宁静之水能够给你带来众神的慈爱与恩惠。
value: Nice to meet you. I'm water elemental, Undine, following the call of fate. May tranquil water bring you the gods' benevolent affections and grace.

name: 需要为你做个祷告吗？虽然不能一同面对敌人，但作为水之精灵，我所带来的生命之力将始终与你同在。
value: Do you need me to pray for you? We cannot face enemies together, but the life power I brough to you will always be with you.

name: 你也会对大自然萌生喜爱之心么？我以为人类只会对自己同类抱持这样的情感呢……
value: Do you favor nature as well? I presumed human beings only care about their own fellows.

name: 水虽然显得柔弱，但其实是非常难以征服的存在，不信的话，你可以试试用拳头重击水面是什么感觉。
value: Water seems delicate, but in fact, it's really hard to conquer. If you don't believe it, just try to pound the water with your fist.

name: 火焰亲和：当进驻熔岩池时，提升强化精华的产量。
value: Flame Affinity: When stationed at the Lava Lake, increasing the productivity of Enhance Essence

name: 愤怒之源：提升所有上阵女神的攻击力。
value: Essence of Anger: Increase ATK of all line-up angels

name: 她是自然界四大元素中象征“炽烈之火”的精灵，火山、熔岩池是她最常诞生的地方，但据说她也会从壁炉中出现。相对于冷静地思考解决问题的方法，她更倾向于用直白、单纯的手段——如果暴力能解决问题的话。她擅长从熔岩池中提炼出强化精华。同时她也擅长于将自身源于火焰的愤怒转化为能量，提供给战场上的众神。
value: As one of the four major natural elementals, she represents blazing fire. Not only does she come from the volcano and lava, but also she may come from the fireplace. Instead of thinking calmly about how to solve the problems, she prefers to take the direct and simple measures—violence. She's good at extracting enhance essence from lava lake. Meanwhile, she does well in converting her flaming anger into energy provided for angels on the battle.

name: 啊啦？没想到区区人类……竟然敢召唤我这位象征大自然愤怒的火元素精灵，挺有胆量的嘛……
value: Aha? I still cannot believe that as the fire elemental, I will be summoned by the human being one day. How dare you!

name: 能感受到烈焰带来的能量吗？可惜我没办法离开结界，不然我只要动动手指，就能替你把敌人烧成灰。
value: Can you feel the energy from the flame?  Unfortunately, I cannot leave the enchantment, or I just move my fingers then the enemies will be incinerated.

name: 相对于潮湿而凉爽的森林，或许还是炽热的熔岩地带更适合我，你觉得呢？
value: Compared with damp and cool forest, the broiling lava is a better place for me. what do you think?

name: 火元素精灵都是天生的工匠，给我一个火山口，我就能帮你提炼出价值连城的火焰精华。
value: The fire elemental is a born craftsman. Give me a volcanic crater, I will return you the priceless flame essence.

name: 宝石炼金术：当进驻宝石研究室时，提升宝石的产量。
value: Gem Alchemy: When stationed at gem lab, increasing the productivity of gem

name: 坚毅之源：提升所有上阵女神的防御力。
value: Unswerving Core: Increase DEF of all line-up angels

name: 她是自然界四大元素中象征“永恒之土”的精灵，一切山脉、土壤以及森林中都可能诞生她。她性格稳重、成熟而有魅力，平时会很友善且平和地对待其他种族，但这并不意味着她们对战斗的技巧一无所知。由于对土壤的了解和亲和度非常高，她能够轻易找到宝石矿脉的所在，也能够为同伴们提供优秀的防护魔法。
value: As one of the four major natural elementals, she represents eternal earth and may be born in any mountain, soil and forest.She is not only calm, mature and charming, but also always friendly and gentle with other races, which doesn't mean that she knows nothing about the combat skills.Because of her affinity with the earth, it's quite easy for her to find the gem mine and protect fellows with her excellent protection spells.

name: 哟……幸会，旅行者，感谢众神指引我们命运的交汇，愿大地之灵赐予您胜利与荣耀。
value: Hey...traveller, glad to see you. Thank the gods for guiding our fates together. May the spirit of earth grant you victory and glory.

name: 您为什么一直盯着我看？难道是……希望我给您一个充实而满足的拥抱么？呵呵……
value: Why do you always stare at me? You're looking forward a full and satisfied hug from me, aren't you? Haha...

name: 大地的力量代表着坚固而永恒，哪怕面对最强力的进攻，也将赐予你滴水不漏的保护！
value: The power of earth represents firmness and eternity. Even facing the strongest attack, it will offer a unassailable protection to you.

name: 作为土元素的精灵，诺姆也是大地丰饶的象征。喂……今晚有兴趣来我的房间，好好“开垦”一下我的身体吗？
value: As the earth elemental, Gnome is also the symbol of rich and fertile resource. Hey...do you want to come to my bedroom tonight? I guess you'll be interested in exploring my body.

name: 神核祷文：当进驻神核祭坛时，提升神核的产量。
value: Holy Core Prayer: When placed in the Holy Core Shrine, increasing the production of Holy Core

name: 灵动之源：提升所有上阵女神的破防等级。
value: Ehereal Origin: Incease DEF.PEN level of all line-up angels

name: 她是自然界四大元素中象征“飘渺之风”的精灵，一切花丛、草原等季风时常吹拂的地方，都会有她的身影。她性格活泼而自我，对文明社会中没有接触过的人和事都怀有非常重的好奇心，但也常常因此而惹出事端。她与天空的连接非常紧密，很多传闻中风精灵是神明与人类之间传递神谕的使者。
value: As one of the four major natural elementals, she represents ethereal wind. She appears in all flowers and meadows where the monsoon blows.She is lively, egotistical and curious about anything that she has never met in the civilized society. But for this reason, she's always involved in troubles.She is close to the sky. It's said that the water elemental is the messager of sending orcales between human beings and gods.

name: 哼哼！人类，看来你的运气不错呢！召唤伟大的风之精灵希尔弗有什么事吗？
value: Aha! Human, it seems that you're fortunate enough! What's the matter? Why did you summon the great winter elemental Sylva?

name: 在自然界的四大精灵中，只有伟大的希尔弗能够和神明直接对话呢！是不是很了不起啊？
value: Among the four major elementals in nature, only the great Stlva is qualifed to talk with gods! It's terrific, isn't it?

name: 我……我才没有因为你一直盯着我看而不好意思呢！反正你也只会对土元素诺姆那样的身材感兴趣吧，哼！
value: I...I'm not shy that you keep staring at me! Anyway, you're just interested in the Gnome's figure. Humph!

name: 伟大的风之精灵希尔弗的速度可没人能追得上……等等！你坏笑什么呐？！你是不是在想我逃跑时候的样子？！
value: No one can chase up the great Sylva... Wait! Why are you smiling inexpressibly?! Are you imaging the scene of escape?

name: ACTIVITY_HUNTING_SCORE_RANK_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT
value: Congrats on reaching No. {0} on Eudemons Hunting Ranking. Please check out your rewards.

name: 双鱼座催眠敌方全体，每名敌人有50%几率进入【睡眠】状态，持续2回合。睡眠状态无法行动，受到伤害后将会解除睡眠状态。随后对未进入睡眠状态的敌人造成150%的法术伤害。
value: Pisces hypnotizes all enemies and inflicts [Slumber] effect on each enemy with a 50% chance for 2 rounds. Enemies in the state of [Slumber] cannot attack. After receiving damage, the enemy can remove the state of [Slumber]. Then deals 150% M.DMG to the enemy who is not in the state of [Slumber].

name: 对1名敌人造成6次100%的法术伤害，该攻击不会解除敌方的睡眠状态。
value: Deals 100% M.DMG to 1 enemy 6 times, which will not remove the state of [Slumber] from the enemy.

name: 双鱼座催眠敌方全体，每名敌人有100%几率进入【睡眠】状态，持续2回合。睡眠状态无法行动，受到伤害后将会解除睡眠状态。随后对未进入睡眠状态的敌人造成200%的法术伤害。
value: Pisces hypnotizes all enemies and inflicts [Slumber] effect on each enemy with a 100% chance for 2 rounds. Enemies in the state of [Slumber] cannot attack. After receiving damage, the enemy can remove the state of [Slumber]. Then deals 200% M.DMG to the enemy who is not in the state of [Slumber].

name: 对1名敌人造成6次130%的法术伤害，每次攻击有100%概率使敌人进入【睡眠】状态1回合，击杀目标后，追击其他敌人，直至6次攻击结束。该攻击不会解除敌方的睡眠状态，且攻击【睡眠】状态的敌人会额外造成5%的真实伤害。
value: Deals 130% M.DMG to 1 enemy 6 times and inflicts [Slumber] effect on each enemy with a 100% chance for 1 round. After the target is killed, Pisces will continue to attack other enemies until 6 attacks end. The attack cannot remove the state of [Slumber] from the enemy. Deals additional 5% True DMG to the enemy who is under the state of [Slumber].

name: 无法行动，受到伤害后将会解除
value: Cannot attack. After being attacked, the enemy can remove the state of [Slumber].

name: 请仔细地看着我的眼睛……嗯……现在有没有一种想睡觉的感觉？
value: Please look into my eyes carefully...Um...Do you feel sleepy right now?

name: 在你眼中，我掌控梦境的幻术究竟是怎样一种存在呢？
value: What do you think of my magic, the power of controlling dreams?

name: 哎，好像除了我之外，还有其他的星座化身也降临到了这个世界？
value: Eh, it seems that besides me, another constellation embodiment also comes to this world.

name: 你游泳的技巧如何？等这场灾难结束后，一起去海边游泳怎么样？
value: Are you good at swimming? When the disaster is over, would you like to swim together?

name: 你怎么看待这场神界之间冲突而导致的末日战争？
value: What's your opinion about the apocalyptic conflict among gods?

name: 你喜欢养宠物吗？有没有兴趣养一条可爱的宠物鱼？
value: Are you fond of pets? Do you like keeping a lovely pet fish?

name: 击倒敌人的武器！
value: Be the weapon to knock down the enemy!

name: 我必须要终结它！
value: I must put an end to it!

name: 带来幸福的魔法。
value: The magic will bring us happiness.

name: 我很期待和你的较量！
value: I'm looking forward to competing with you!

name: 感觉很需要耐心和技巧。
哎？难道催眠术成功了？！太好了！那个……老实告诉我，你最喜欢的人是谁……
value: Eh? Did the hypnosis work?! Great! Well...tell me honestly who your favorite person is.

name: 好吧……看来对手陷入噩梦、动弹不得的场面确实挺让你印象深刻的……
value: All right...the scene that your enemy is trapped in the nightmare and cannot move indeed impresses you a lot.

name: 真的？！我已经迫不及待想要去见见她们了呢！
value: Really?! I cannot wait to see them again!

name: 你……你在说什么啊，真是的！原来相对于游泳，你更关注我的泳装吗？！
value: What...what the hell are you saying! So you’re more interested in my swimsuit than swimming.

name: 哎？我宁愿选择沉入海底好好睡一觉，几百年后再浮上来看看世界毁灭了没。
value: Eh? I prefer to sink into the sea to fall asleep. after hundreds of years, I will awake and witness what the world is going.

name: 我就知道你会这么说……哎？！等等！你一直把我当作宠物看待的么？！
value: I knew you were gonna say that...Eh?! Wait! Have you always treated me as a pet?!

name: 奇怪，难道我的催眠术失败了？不对……等一下！你刚才在盯着哪儿看呐？！
value: So weird. Is my hypnosis ineffective? No way...Wait a minute! Where are you staring at?

name: 真是个浪漫的回答呢！那个……要不要今晚来我的房间，让你做个美梦？
value: It’s literally a romantic answer! So...would you like to come to my room tonight? It gonna be a sweet dream.

name: 嗯？没有骗我吗？如果不好好回答我就要用催眠术让你说真话啦！
value: Uh? Are you cheating? Tell me the truth or I’ll hypnotize you.

name: 哼哼！这么有自信的吗？如果你输了的话，就得陪我在海滩约会一整天哦！
value: Hump! Why are you so confident? If you are failed, you need to date me on the beach all day.

name: 是么？但我觉得只要催眠全世界所有麻烦的家伙，这场灾难就结束啦！
value: Right? But I think that only hypnotizing all troublemakers will the disaster end.

name: 别担心！有我帮忙的话，无论饲养可爱的海豚还是帅气的鲨鱼，都是易如反掌的事呢！
value: Don’t worry! It’s just a piece of cake to breed cute dolphins and handsome sharks with my help.

name: 哎？！这份契约原来是我们羁绊的证明吗？让我看看写了些什么……啊……真是麻烦！古代神明的文字太难懂啦！
value: Eh?! This contract can prove our relationships. Let me see what’s on it...Uh...what a hassle! It’s difficult to understand the ancient script.

name: 大海给与恩泽，也暗藏危险，没有人知道深渊中闪耀的诱人光辉是价值连城的宝藏，还是等待无知小鱼上钩的狩猎者目光。
value: Both blessings and countless dangers are hiding in the ocean. No one knows what is under the abyss, dazzling treasures or the hunters waiting for the innocent little fish.

name: 集齐55个双鱼座碎片可以召唤双鱼座
value: Collect 55 Pisces Shards to summon Pisces

name: 黄道十二星座之一幻化而来的特殊神明，原本不具备神力，但众神无休止的战争让其神格化。\n她是个爱幻想也非常天真的存在，擅长使用源于深海的幻术力量，迅捷而优雅地击破眼前的敌人。
value: Pisces is a special goddess transformed from one of the zodiac constellations. Originally lacking divine power, she was granted deification for her valor in endless wars.\nPisces is dreamy and innocent. Using her abyssal sea magic, she can defeat enemies rapidly and graciously.

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_63
value: Unique Two Rounds Control  Deafeat Enemies One By One

name: 哎？难道我走错了？这里应该是雅典的圣域才对……
value: Eh? Did I lose my way? This is should be the holy domain of Athens.

name: 啊啦，又是个迷路的小可爱么？这可不是外人能来的地方。
value: Aha, another lost kiddy? It is no place for an outsider.

name: 等等，我记得你是……北欧三圣龙之一的风暴之龙？！
value: Hold on, I remember you... You are Storm Dragon, one of the sacred dragons in Northern Europe.

name: 抱歉！打搅了！我只是路过的而已！
value: Sorry to interrupt, I was just passing by!

name: 站住！阿斯加德不是想来就来，想走就走的！看招啦！
value: Halt! Asgard is not the place where you can come and leave as your wish! Watch this!

name: 抱歉啦！看来是我赢了呢，请二位好好睡一觉吧，晚安！
value: Sorry, I’m the winner. You guys just have a rest and wish you a good night.

name: 阿斯加德竟然这么大？我应该没走错才对……
value: How vast Asgard is! It seems like the right route...

name: 希腊的星座使徒？我的天……守门的那三只龙又在睡觉么……
value: Constellation apostle of Greece? Jesus...the three dragons are sleeping again...

name: 呃……他们确实中催眠术睡着了，但我发誓我不是故意的！
value: Um...They are indeed sleeping because I hypnotized them. But I swear I’m didn’t mean to!

name: 看来有新的客人要招待了呢......
value: It seems that a new guest will come here...

name: 等等……等一下！她只是和我一样迷路至此的！快停手！
value: Wait...wait a moment! She was just lost like me! Stop!

name: 你怎么这么冲动……这下事情麻烦了……
value: Why are you so impulsive... We will get into trouble...

name: 哎？有这么严重吗？我只是用催眠术让她们睡几天而已……
value: Eh? Is it serious? I just hypnotize them for a few days...

name: 睡几天而已？几天后我们就准备面对奥丁的怒火吧。
value: A few days? We’d better get ready for Odin’s wrath.

name: 安心，别太紧张，到时候我再让奥丁做个美梦就行啦！
value: Calm down. Don’t be nervous. I will prepare a fond dream for Odin!

name: 最少上阵一个女神
value: At least 1 angel in the line-up

name: 以达到誓约条件，需完成誓约后才能继续送礼物
value: Please make the vow and then send gifts.

name: 体验女神不能下阵
value: The trial angel cannot be off the line-up

name: 积累许愿次数，获取许愿积分
value: Accumulate the number of praying to get blessing crystal

name: 许愿次数会在活动结束后重置
value: The number of praying will be rest after the event is over

name: 在许愿池中使用，用于幻石兑换。
value: Use in wishing well event to redeem magic stone

name: 放入要参与合成的幻石
value: Put the low-level magic stone to synthesize the advanced magic stone

name: 放入要进行置换的幻石
value: Place a Magic Stone here, and it will be randomly transformed into a Magic Stone of other slots

name: 海洋折扣 现时促销
hcnw_switch_consume_mode
value: Are you sure you want to switch the mode of costing {0} times more energy?

name: 在此界面强制关闭游戏，可能会导致进度回退
value: Please do not force quit the game on this interface, otherwise the current progress may not be saved.

name: 恢复烘焙屋活动中50点体力
value: Restore 50 points of energy in bakery event

name: 可以在烘焙屋活动中进行一次排序操作
value: Can perform a sorting operation in bakery event

name: 可以在烘焙屋活动中消除任意一个幽灵
value: Eliminate a food in Bakery Event

name: 维纳斯魅惑敌方全体，每名敌人有50%概率进入【魅惑】状态（不可驱散，状态持续到行动后消失），维纳斯受到伤害时，处于【魅惑】状态下的敌人根据维纳斯损失血量分摊伤害量，每名敌人分摊伤害量上限为35%（无视【链接】效果），且回复生命效果降低30%，持续2回合。
value: <size=16>Venus enchants all the enemy and inflicts [Enchant] on each enemy with a 50% chance (The state cannot be dispelled and persists during the action round). When Venus receives the damage, the damage will be divided equally based on the lost HP of Venus among the enemies who is under the state of [Enchant], up to 35% per target (ignoring [Link] effect) and their recovering HP effect will be reduced by 30% for 2 rounds</size>

name: 对一名敌方女神造成600%的物理伤害，并驱散我方攻击力最高的女神所有负面状态。
value: Deals 600% P.DMG to 1 enemy and dispels all debuffs on our angel who owns the highest ATK

name: 维纳斯魅惑敌方全体，每名敌人有60%概率进入【魅惑】状态（不可驱散，状态持续到行动后消失），维纳斯受到伤害时，处于【魅惑】状态下的敌人根据维纳斯损失血量分摊伤害量，每名敌人分摊伤害量上限为35%（无视【链接】效果），且回复生命效果降低75%，持续2回合。
value: <size=16>Venus enchants all the enemy and inflicts [Enchant] on each enemy with a 60% chance (The state cannot be dispelled and persists during the action round). When Venus receives the damage, the damage will be divided equally based on the lost HP of Venus among the enemies who is under the state of [Enchant], up to 35% per target (ignoring [Link] effect) and their recovering HP effect will be reduced by 75% for 2 rounds</size>

name: 对一名敌方女神造成700%的物理伤害，并驱散我方攻击力最高的女神所有负面状态，然后使其获得【神眷】状态，持续1回合。该状态下免疫异常效果，并免疫伤害一次（不超过维纳斯最大攻击力的10倍）。
value: Deals 700% P.DMG to 1 enemy. Dispels all debuffs on teammate with the highest ATK and bestows [Mercy] for 1 round.\n\n[Mercy]: Immune to Debuff or DMG once (up to 1000% of Venus' Max ATK).

name: 分摊伤害，回复生命效果降低
value: Damage divided equally, reduce recovering HP effect

name: 那些为追求爱情而牺牲一切的人，你会怎么看待他们呢？
value: What do you think of people who sacrifice everything for love?

name: 在人类看来，爱情终究是一种可以用金钱来衡量的存在吗？
value: From the human standpoint, love is something that they can put a price on, isn't it?

name: 无论是恋爱还是战争，先发制人都是明智之举，你觉得呢？
value: In love or war, it's wise to strike first. Don't you think so?

name: 这个时代神与人之间的爱，因为身份有别，好像依旧难以被世人所接受……
value: At this time, it's still difficult for the world to accept the fact that god and humans would fall in love, just because the identity of god is different from that of humans.

name: 在我没有降临世界前，丘比特那个孩子有好好忠于自己的神职吗？
value: Was the kid, Cupid, faithful to her obligation before I came to this world?

name: 喜欢艺术品么？觉得雕塑这门艺术怎么样？
value: Are you fond of artwork? How do you like sculptures?

name: 她还挺认真的。
value: She really did a great job.

name: 不是很懂雕塑……
value: I know nothing about the sculpture...

name: 至少我不这么认为。
value: At least, I don't think so.

name: 我其实习惯静观其变……
value: Actually, I get used to taking a wait-and-see approach.

name: 我并不在意身份的差别。
value: I don't care about identity differences.

name: 她好像有些偷懒……
value: She doesn't seem to do well.

name: 如你所言，即便他只是凡人，我也会为他的勇气，而毫不吝啬地降下爱与力量的恩赐。
value: As you say, if he were only mortal, I would bestow the gifts of love and strength upon him for his courage

name: 好吧，看来我要解决的麻烦又多了一个——让人们重新认识爱情的价值。
value: Well, it seems that another trouble needs to handle. Let me reshape people's view of love.

name: 哦？那么要不要今晚来我的房间，让我感受一下你有多“主动”？
value: Really? Would you like to come to my bedroom tonight? It's a great opportunity to show your initiative.

name: 不管如何，我都会期待所有人抛弃身份枷锁，追求自己所爱之人的那一天到来。
value: Anyway, I still look forward to one day when we all throw off our identity and pursue our true love.

name: 真是挺让我意外呢！我原以为她的性格只会把这个世界的恋情弄得一团糟……
value: I'm so surprised! I thought that she would screw up affection affairs in this world with her personality.

name: 我听说无数人类的艺术家都曾为我立过雕像，但我最希望看到的……还是你的作品。
value: I've heard that countless artists made sculptures of me, but your artwork is the one that I'm most looking forward to.

name: 是吗？我很有兴趣看看，将来有一天你遇到中意的人时，会天真到什么程度呢……
value: Really? It will be interesting to see how naive you will be when you meet the right person someday.

name: 嗯，我想……这也是为什么我最终会选择降临在你身边的原因吧。
value: Well, I presume...that's why I choose to be with you in the end.

name: 让我猜猜……你是希望从我这里听到令人期待的告白吗，亲爱的？
value: Let me guess...Are you eager to hear my self-revealing words, dear?

name: 你比我想象中要乐观呢……愿你能够改变这个陈旧的世界，重新塑造人与神的关系。
value: You are more optimistic than I thought...May you be able to change this old world and reshape the relationship between humans and God.

name: 啊……这并不奇怪，如果她是个称职的爱神，我也就不会被这个世界召唤到此了。
value: Aha...It's met my expectations. If she was qualified enough, I won't be summoned to this world.

name: 那么你有兴趣以我为题材创作一件作品吗？呵呵……告诉我，你喜欢怎样的姿势呢？
value: So would you like to make a piece about me? Tell me, what kind of pose do you like?

name: 这份誓约签下之时，我们的思想也彼此交融了呢！让我看看你在想什么……啊啦，原来你一直对我有这么刺激而大胆的欲望吗……亲爱的？
value: When we made this vow, our minds mingled, and I could read your thoughts. Have you always had such wild and daring desires for me, my dear?

name: 无名艺术家所创造的金色冠冕，蕴含着对美的无限遐想，以及对爱神如痴似醉的迷恋，其中灌注着由感情升华而来的、无与伦比的魔力。
value: The golden crown made by the unknown artist contains the infinite fantasy of beauty and the infatuation with the goddess of love, which is infused with the inimitable magic from the sublimation of emotion.

name: 集齐55个维纳斯碎片可以召唤维纳斯
value: Collect 55 Venus Shards to summon Venus

name: 神话中的爱与情欲之神，传闻丘比特是她的后代，两位神明共同主宰世间的姻缘。\n她几乎在所有文明中都受到尊敬，这也给她带来了不可想象的神能。她虽然反感因权力而起的战乱，却赞扬为爱而做出的牺牲。
value: Venus is the mythological goddess of love and lust and Cupid is said to be her offspring. The two goddesses jointly rule the marriage of the world.\nShe is respected in almost all the civilizations, which grants her unimaginable divine power. Although she opposes the war caused by power conflicts, she praises the sacrifices made for love.

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_65
value: DMG Reflection  Reduce Healing HP  Guard Ally

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_66
value: Praise the sacrifices made for love

name: 你总算来了，再迟几天这个世界会发生什么我可真不敢想。
value: Here you are, finally. I cannot imagine how the world will be going without you.

name: 真令人感动，才几个世纪不见，你就已经这么想念我了？
value: So touching. Have you missed me so much that we were just apart for a few centuries?

name: 其实是我们遇到麻烦了，不得已才召唤前辈您来帮忙。
value: Actually, we met the trouble. So we had summoned you to do us a favor.

name: 详细的事之后再说，眼下或许要先帮爱神姐姐“热热身”？
value: Why don't we warm up first and catch up later?

name: 我刚降临这个世界，就要做这么刺激的事情吗，亲爱的？
value: I've just been here for a few seconds. Are we about to do something thrilling, my dear?

name: 对爱的化身暴力相向，大多数结果都会变成自讨苦吃……
value: Most of the time, the person pays the penalty for their violence against the embodiment of love...

name: 你的力量没有丝毫削弱，看来这次的麻烦还有办法解决。
value: Your strength is not weakened, so it seems there is a way out of this trouble.

name: 让我猜猜……难道是丘比特这孩子惹出什么事了？
value: Let me guess...Did Cupid make some trouble?

name: 前辈猜对啦，她好像不小心挑起了北欧与希腊的众神战争。
value: You're right. She accidentally provoked the war of gods between Northern Europe and Greece.

name: 好吧……一点也不意外，毕竟她几个世纪前就是这性格……
value: Well, that's not surprising...She is still as same as what she was centuries ago.

name: 等……等一下，您为什么会被召唤到这个世界来……
value: Gosh...Why were you here, your highness?

name: 你玩的挺开心嘛，见到我是不是很惊讶，亲爱的？
value: You're having fun, aren't you? Surprised to see me again, honey?

name: 听说北欧和希腊的神明关系被你弄砸了，差点大打出手？
value: It's said that you messed up the relationships among the gods from Northern Europe and Greece and almost got them into the fight.

name: 不是这样的！其实我只是和众神开了个小玩笑而已！
value: Absolutely not! I just play a joke on them.

name: “开了个小玩笑”是吗？看来坏孩子需要教训一下呢。
value: A joke Right? I'm gonna teach you a lesson, little rascal.

name: 不打啦，再打下去你都快哭了，老实交代你的恶作剧如何？
value: It seems that you gonna cry. Well, I will stop, if you tell me about the prank honestly.

name: 呜……我只想试试，自己的箭能否影响最强大的神明而已。
value: Oww...I just wanna see whether my arrows can influence the most powerful goddess or not.

name: 喔？所以赫拉大人就荣幸地成为了你的实验品，是吗？
value: Oh? So Lord Hera was unfortunate to be your guinea pig, wasn't she?

name: 我发誓这只是个意外，我从没想让事情发展成这样。
value: I swear it was an accident. I never meant for it to go this way.

name: 这种意外不会再有了，因为从今往后我会好好盯着你的……
value: It won't happen again, because from now on I will keep my eyes on you.

name: OUTLAND_PRACTICE_SLOT_OPEN_REQUEST
value: Are you sure you want to spend {0} Trial crystal to unlock a Trial slot? Currently owned: {1}

value: Dispatching angels gives attribute bonuses to main lineup

name: 女神等级培养.品质星级越高，加成越高
value: Higher angel's levels, training and quality will grants you greater bonus

name: 太让人惊讶了！没想到你的成长如此之快，完成升阶你便将踏入神的领域。
value: Unbelievable! You have been growing so fast! After upgrading your ranks, you will enter ther Realm of Godness.

name: 解锁当前战令总计可以获得以下奖励
value: Unlock this battlepass to get the following rewards

name: GIFT_NOT_BUY
value: You have Ranks gifts unpurchased, which will be refreshed after upgrading, are you sure you want to upgrade?

name: 消耗试炼水晶解锁试炼位
value: Use Trial crystals to unlock Trial slots

name: 点击进行试炼女神配置
选择协助试炼的女神（女神星级品质、等级、培养越高，效果越好）
value: <size=24>Choose Assist Trial Angels (Higher Angels' levels, training, and quality grant a greater bonus)</size>

name: 购买任意付费封神礼包
钻石豪礼 感恩回馈
春节折扣 现时促销
刀斩妖魔，舞唤鬼神
value: Slay demons with blade, summon ghosts by dancing

name: 对6名敌人造成100%的法术伤害，并使自身获得3回合【神王】（不可驱散）。【神王】状态下，每次轮到宙斯回合时，对6名敌人造成100%的法术伤害。
value: Deals 100% M.DMG to 6 enemies, and grants [Zeus' Rule]（non-dispellable） for 3 rounds. Under the state of  [Zeus' Rule], deals 100% M.DMG to 6 enemies in Zeus' action round

name: 宙斯以消耗自身当前30%生命值为代价，对敌方全体造成160%的法术伤害，自身每损失1%的血量，伤害结果提高2%。
value: Zeus deals 160% M.DMG to all enemies at the cost of 30% of her current HP. For every 1% HP lost, the M.DMG increases by 2%.

name: 对6名敌人造成120%的法术伤害，并使自身获得3回合【神王】和4回合【雷盾】（不可驱散）。【神王】状态下，每次轮到宙斯回合时，对6名敌人造成120%的法术伤害。【雷盾】状态下，宙斯每次受到伤害都会反击敌人，对目标造成30%的法术伤害，该伤害不会触发敌人的反击效果和伤害反弹。
value: Deals 120% M.DMG to 6 enemies, and grants [Zeus' Rule](non-dispellable) for 3 rounds and [Thunder Shield](non-dispellable) for 4 rounds. Under the state of  [Zeus' Rule], deals 120% M.DMG to 6 enemies in Zeus' action round. Under the state of [Thunder Shield], the enemy who attacks Zeus takes 30% M.DMG, which will not trigger DMG reflection and Retaliate effect.

name: 宙斯以消耗自身当前30%生命值为代价，对敌方全体造成180%的法术伤害，自身每损失1%的血量，伤害结果提高3%，击杀敌人后宙斯回复该敌人最大生命值20%的血量。
value: Zeus deals 180% M.DMG to all enemies at the cost of 30% of her current HP. For every 1% HP lost, the M.DMG increases by 3%. If the targeted enemy is killed, Zeus will restore HP by 20% of the target's Max HP.

name: 每回合自动攻击全体敌人
value: Auto attack all enemies in each round

name: 受到伤害反击敌人
value: retaliate against enemy when taking DMG

name: 我听说奥丁已经被召唤到这个世界很长时间了？
value: I heard that Odin has been summoned to this world for a long time

name: 话说回来，赫拉最近怎么样？我猜这个世界应该不会让她感到无聊……
value: By the way, how's Hera, I don't think she will kill her time in this world…

name: 原以为没有我的希腊众神只会是一盘散沙，没想到你的指挥能力远在我之上。
value: I thought the Greek Gods will be in a state of disunity, but I didn't expect your excellent command ability.

name: 你觉得神与人之间，终究隔着难以逾越的距离吗？
value: Do you think there is an insurmountable distance between God and man after all?

name: 战争在我看来，只不过是强者之间的消遣罢了，你怎么看？
value: From where I stand, warfare is a recreational activity between the strong, do you think so?

name: 众神之王这个头衔，在你的眼里有多重的分量呢？
value: How important it is to become the Supreme Deity

name: 战争是一场灾难……
value: War is a disaster for all of us.

name: 我想是时候去“拜访”一下了，少了我这个对手，她应该已经快无聊到爆炸了。
value: I guess it's time to visit her. Without me as an opponent, life would bore her to death.

name: 是吗？看来她的嫉妒心一点没减，这个世界没被她炸了可真是个奇迹……
value: Is that so? It seems that she is as jealous as she used to be. It's literally a miracle that she has not exploded the world.

name: 我从没想过一个凡人出身的存在能有这么高的智慧和个人魅力，真是让我惊讶。
value: I'm impressed by the man with such wisdom and charisma, which is beyond my cognition.

name: 或许是吧，如果真的人神有别，我大不了放弃神格，当个和你一样的凡人也挺不错的。
value: Maybe it is what it is. If there's any difference between human and God, it won't be bad for me to abandon the God identity and become a human like you.

name: 你的回答让我想起了成为希腊主神之前的那段战争时期，很有挑战，但也挺有趣。
value: Your answer reminds me of the wartime before I became the Supreme Deity in Greek. Challenging yet interesting.

name: 我很高兴你能如此看重这份荣耀，它凝聚了我作为神明的尊严与责任。
value: I'm glad that you regard this glory as something important, which embodies my responsibility and dignity as a goddess.

name: 嗯？我好像闻到了谎言的味道，以我的洞察力而言，她化成灰我也找得到在哪，呵呵……
value: emm? Lies are showing up. My insight can guide me to where she is even she's turned into ashes. Haha…

name: 哈哈……看起来你比我更懂如何和她相处，不是么？
value: Haha, you seem to be better at going along with her than me, is that so?

name: 倒也没错，不然我也不会认同你作为希腊众神的最高统帅。
value: Right, otherwise I won't acknowledge you as the chief ruler of all Gods in Greek.

name: 喔？呵呵……那么今晚有没有兴趣到我的房间……看看我和你的距离能近到什么程度？
value: oh? What do you think about coming over my room tonight and seeing how intimate we really are?

name: 那么你打算怎样结束这场灾难呢，我的英雄？
value: Then what's your plan for ending the disaster, my hero?

name: 那么你一定找到了比这个头衔更珍贵的事物吧？能告诉我是什么吗？
value: You must have found something more cherishable then the title? Could you tell me what it is?

name: 从神话时代起就没有任何人有资格与我签订这个誓约，但不管怎么说，幸运的家伙，你是我唯一的例外。
value: You are the first person in ages to be worthy of making a vow with me.

name: 由独眼巨人打造，即便是再强悍的神明也会为其力量所惊叹，闪电是希腊王权的象征，这柄权杖曾帮助宙斯获得了无数场象征荣耀与尊严的胜利。
value: Crafted by the Cyclops, even the most powerful gods will be amazed by its power. Lightning is a symbol of Greek royalty, and this scepter has helped Zeus win countless victories that symbolize glory and dignity.

name: 集齐55个宙斯碎片可以召唤宙斯
value: Collect 55 Zeus Shards to summon Zeus

name: 宙斯被称为“奥林匹斯之王”，同时也是天空与雷电之神，强大程度几乎位于各大神系的顶峰。\n据说是为了与奥丁争夺众神之王的位置而被召唤到这个世界的，但没人知道她真正的目的和意图。
value: Zeus, known as the Ruler of Olympus, is the goddess of the sky and thunder, and her power is almost at the peak of the major gods. \nIt is said that she was summoned to this world to compete with Odin for the position of ruler of the gods, but no one knows her real purpose and intentions.

name: 嗯？神话时代我好像都没有见过这么大的欢迎场面……
value: Ok? I don't think I've ever be welcomed like this in the age of mythology…

name: 呐，亲爱的，你为什么会觉得我们的阵势是在欢迎你呢？
value: Now, dear, what makes you feel that you are welcomed?

name: 有些过去的旧账，我觉得可能要和宙斯阁下您算算……
value: Some old grudges from the past, I think you may have to settle with you…

name: 比如重新决定众神之王的位置，以及海、地、冥界的归属。
value: For example, re-determining who's the ruler of the gods, and the ownership of the sea, the earth, and the underworld.

name: 我也正好有些无趣，或许是时候测试一下新觉醒的力量了。
value: I just happened to be a little bored, maybe it's time to test the power of the new awakening.

name: 真是太令人遗憾了，竟然没有一个人能和我打上十回合……
value: It's such a shame that all of you are defeated in 10 rounds...

name: 看来我觉醒的雷霆之力还够统治希腊众神几个世纪。
value: It seems that the power of thunder I have awakened is enough to rule the Greek gods for centuries.

name: 真是难以理解，这么长时间，您的力量也丝毫没有减弱……
value: It's insane that your power has not weakened in the slightest...

name: 很快，我猜这个世界的格局和命运应该会有新的变化……
value: Soon, I guess there would be new changes in the landscape and destiny of this world...

name: 你猜对啦，那么接下来回答我一个问题吧：奥丁在哪？
value: You are right, answer me: where is Odin?

name: 宙斯？！这不可能，我没有观测到你降临这个世界的命运！
value: Zeus? ! This is impossible, I did not observe the fate of your coming to this world!

name: 看来你的眼神比以前糟糕了啊，奥丁。
value: It seems your eyesight are worse than before, Odin.

name: 这么久没见，不觉得你众神之王的称号少了些挑战吗？
value: Haven't seen you for so long, don't you think your title of Ruler of the Gods is a little less challenging?

name: 这名头确实让我有些腻了，不过得看你有没有本事取回去。
value: This title kinda bores me, you want it back? Come and defeat me.

name: 很快就会有答案了，我相信你会怀念震耳欲聋的雷电声的。
value: There will be an answer soon, and I'm sure you'll miss the deafening sound of thunder.

name: 你觉醒的力量比几千年前更强大了，真让我惊讶……
value: Shocking, Your awakening power is stronger than it was thousands of years ago...

name: 我也挺意外，不过获得这份力量大概也是命运的安排吧。
value: I was surprised too, but I guess it's my fate to own the power.

name: 看来潘多拉那个家伙预言得没错，这个世界有麻烦了。
value: It seems that Pandora's prediction is right, the world is in trouble.

name: 是吗？我希望给世界带来麻烦的人最好别是我。
value: Yeah? I hope it's better not me who's causing trouble for the world.

name: 谁知道，你顺应召唤而降临，或许是救世主也说不定……
value: Who knows, you follow the call and come, maybe it is the savior of the world...

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_67
value: Terrific AOE ATK & Lower HP grants Greater DMG

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_68
value: The Goddess of the sky, thunder and lightning.

name: 呵呵……众神的引导者，欢迎挑战深渊
value: hehe…the ruler of all angels, welcome to the Fear Abyss

name: 深渊的尽头等着你再次前行，勇士
value: The end of the abyss awaits you once again, challenger.

name: 这力量让人难以置信，你确实是天选之人
value: The power is incredible, you are indeed the Chosen One

name: 前进吧，深渊正在等待着你
value: Go forth, the abyss awaits you

name: 你能突破到怎样的境界呢？我很期待
value: How far will you go? I'm looking forward to it.

name: 我期待看到你再次突破自己的极限之时
value: I look forward to seeing when you push your limits again.

name: 我很好奇你肯付出多少代价呢，呵呵
value: I wonder how much you'll pay, huh?

name: 交出你的灵魂吧，你会变得更强大的
value: Give up on your soul, and you will become even more powerful.

name: 勇者，深渊主宰给你带来了新的恩赐
value: Guts, the Lord of the Abyss has brought you a new gift

name: 深渊的禁忌之力在渴求你的灵魂

value: Use cards to redeem your favorite rewards

name: 女神全部卡池限时开放
value: All angels will be available in limited time

name: 未来的一切也会充满希望！战斗吧！
value: Life is full of hope! Go for it!

name: 周卡连续14天，每日登录后奖励通过邮件发放
value: The cards event lasts for <color=#00ff00>14</color> days, which will be sent to you via email after login

name: ACTIVITY_HOLIDAY_DROP_SUMMON_TIPS
value: Consume Smelt Potion to get the resonance gem. Every <color=#00ff00>10</color> potion consumed guarantees the reward of Arcane Dust and other mysterious gifts.

name: 冰火之歌
value: A Song of Ice and Fire

name: 不会被单体技能选中，闪避率增加
value: Immune from individual skills, increase EVA probability

name: 我不想独自度过那漆黑的长夜，所以，你会陪着我的，是吗？
value: I don't want to spend that long dark night alone, so you'll be by my side, right?

name: 越危险的，越迷人！你也这么认为吗？
value: Danger is always accompanied by charm! Don't you think so?

name: 我是不是和其他的神明不太一样？
value: Am I different from other deities?

name: 为人处世不必太严肃，身为神明，最重要的就是及时行乐！你觉得呢？
value: There's no need to be too serious. As a deity, the most important thing is to seize the day! What do you think?

name: 作为众神之主的妹妹可真是麻烦，奥丁的掌控欲太强了！
value: As the sister of Supreme Deity, Odin is a real trouble. She wants to control everything!

name: 战斗对我而言就是一场游戏，反正到最后胜利的一方，都会是我！
value: The battle is a game to me, and in the end, I'll be the one who wins anyway!

name: 我也不喜欢被管控的感觉。
value: I don't like the feeling of being controlled either.

name: 这……我还有其它事情要做。
value: This ...... I have other things to do.

name: 我不这么觉得
value: We do not see eye to eye.

name: 我觉得凡事还是较真点好！
value: I think it's better to be serious about everything!

name: 有个姐姐挺好的。
value: It's good to have a sister.

name: 战斗还是需要认真一点。
我就知道，你一定会陪着我的。那我也，还你一个美妙的夜晚吧！
value: I know that you would be there for me.Then you'll be granted a wonderful night!

name: 哦！你在害怕什么呢？是担心会沦陷于我的美色之中吗？
value: Oh! What scares you?Is it the fear of being allured by my beauty?

name: 与众不同才是我的原则！你一定也喜欢这样的我吧？
value: Being unique is my motto! You must like me, right?

name: 总算有一个和我想法相同的人了！我想我们之间会相处得很愉快的。
value: Finally, I find someone who just has the same thoughts as me! I think we'll get along very well.

name: 看来我们是同一种人，都喜欢自由自在的生活。
value: I guess we're the same kind of people, we both enjoy freedom.

name: 没错！我对于自己的实力，就像对自己的美貌一样自信！
value: That's right! I'm as confident in my strength as I am in my beauty!

name: 居然拒绝了我的邀约，你果然跟其他人不一样，我对你更加感兴趣了！
value: How dare you refuse my invitation, no one has ever turned down my invitation! I'm interested in you even more.

name: 那就不要犹豫了，快过来大胆地拥抱我吧！
value: Then don't hesitate, come and hug me!

name: 难道你不觉得，我比其他女神更美吗？
value: Don't you think that I'm uncomparable in appearance?

name: 原来你是个严肃的人啊？那我希望，你在和我相处的时候，可以轻松愉快一点。
value: So you're a serious person, huh? Then I hope that you can be a little more relaxed when you're with me.

name: 那既然这样的话，我来做你最亲爱的姐姐怎么样？
value: In that case, how about I becoming your sister?

name: 哦！你是在担心我吗？放心，我可不忍心让你为我伤心的。
value: Oh! Are you worried about me? Don't worry, I can't bear to let you down.

name: 我总是想让所有人都为我的魅力所折服，却没想到，自己有一天会折服在你的魅力之下。你可真是我最大的意外啊！
value: I enjoy making everyone fall under my charm, but I never imagined that I would fall under yours. You are full of surprises!

name: 阿萨神域的禁忌神器，据说其中蕴含着改变神族命运的力量。是生存，还是毁灭，一切都隐藏在这枚神骰之中。
value: The forbidden artifact of the Asa Divine Realm, which is said to be powerful enough to change the fate of deities. Whether it is survival, or destruction, everything is hidden in this divine dice.

name: 集齐55个洛基碎片可以召唤洛基
value: Collect 55 Loki Shards to summon Loki!

name: 北欧神话中的恶作剧与诡计之神，亦是火神。原本是巨人族出身，因与奥丁交好而加入阿萨神族。\n她生性狡诈，要捉弄其他神祇，因此与众神交恶，是引发诸神黄昏的重要人物之一。
value: The deity of mischief and trickery in Norse mythology, as well as  the deity of fire. Originally a giant, she joined Asa because of her friendship with Odin.\nBy her cunning nature, she wanted to play tricks on other deities, while being excluded by other deities. She was one of the important figures who triggered the twilight of the deities.

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_69
value: Dodge & Dispel Enemies' Buffs & Bursts Attacks

name: 哎呀呀！居然有这么多人在欢迎我的到来吗？
value: Oops! Are there so many people welcoming me?

name: 为什么连这家伙也被召唤过来了，见到他我就感到非常的生气！
value: Why was this guy summoned here? I hate him!

name: 总算有一个和我一样，被世人冠以恶名的家伙出现了吗？
value: Finally, a guy who has been given a bad name by the world, just like me, has appeared?

name: 我亲爱的姐妹！这个世界并不友好，没有足够的力量是无法被认可的！
value: My dear sister! This world is not friendly, and you won't be welcomed without supreme power!

name: 你们这些家伙，可真是不念旧情啊！那我就展示一下我全新的力量，用实力让你们来认可我吧！
value: You guys, you are so ungrateful! Then I'll upturn your prejudice and use my strength to make me myself acknowledged!

name: 北欧神族的阵营又加入了新的成员吗？让我来见识一下你的力量，看看你能为北欧神族提升多少战力！
value: A new member in the camp of the Nordic Deities? Let me see your power and see how much you can boost the Nordic Gods' power!

name: 连希腊神族的主神都亲自来欢迎我了，我的面子还真大啊！
value: Even the Supreme Greek Deity has come to welcome me personally, I've got a lot of face!

name: 世人都将我们称之为“邪恶的神”，那就看看我们两个之间，谁的力量更加强大吧！
value: The world calls us evil deities, we'll see who's more powerful!

name: 第一邪神的名头你拿去好了！不过这场战斗我一定要赢！
value: You can take the title of the number one evil god! I will win the battle!

name: 洛基，没想到连你被召唤过来了，那正好可以了结我们往日的恩怨了。
value: Loki, I didn't expect that even you were summoned here, and it's time to end our old grudge.

name: 你可真是个记仇的家伙，千年前的恩怨还记得这么清楚！那我就陪你痛快地打一架，了结往日的恩怨吧！
value: You're a vengeful guy, you still remember the grudge from a thousand years ago so clearly! Then I will fight with you to settle the old grudge!

name: 我愚蠢的妹妹啊！这个世界有着太多的危险存在！如果你还是抱着游戏人生的态度，我劝你还是赶紧返回阿萨神域去吧！
value: My stupid sister! World's been dangerous! If you still want to slack off your life, you'd better return to the Asa domain!

name: 你还是这么古板啊！我的姐姐，跟千年前相比，你一点都没变，可是我却已经变得跟你一样强大了！
value: You are still so old-fashioned! My sister, you  aren exactly who you've been a thousand years ago, but I've become as powerful as you!

name: 那就让我好好见识一下，你这一千年来的改变吧！
value: Then let me see how much you've changed in the past thousand years!

name: 对攻击力最高的1名敌人造成500%的物理伤害，并【致盲】2回合，命中值降低50%洛基的命中值。然后洛基获得【隐身】（不可驱散）状态2回合，【隐身】状态下，队友存在时，洛基不会被单体技能选中。
value: Deals 500% P.DMG to 1 enemy with the highest attack and inflicts [Blind] for 2 rounds, reducing the enemy's ACC value by 50% of Loki's ACC value. Loki gains [Invisibility](non-dispellable) for 2 rounds. If Loki is under the state of [Invisibility] and there's another teammate alive, she is immune from individual skills

name: 洛基掷出一个骰子决定敌人的命运。对敌方全体造成骰子点数*75%的物理伤害，并随机驱散1名敌人的全部有益状态。
value: Loki rolls a dice to decide the fate of the enemy. Deals dice points*75% P.DMG to all enemies and dispel all bonus effects of 1 random enemy.

name: 对攻击力最高的1名敌人造成650%的物理伤害，并【致盲】（不可驱散）2回合，命中值降低100%洛基的命中值。然后洛基获得【隐身】（不可驱散）状态2回合，【隐身】状态下，闪避率增加20%，队友存在时，洛基不会被单体技能选中。
value: Deals 650% P.DMG to 1 enemy with the highest attack and inflicts [Blind](non-dispellable) for 2 rounds, reducing the enemy's ACC value by 100% of Loki's ACC value. Loki gains [Invisibility](non-dispellable) for 2 rounds, increase EVA probability by 20% . If Loki is under the state of [Invisibility] and there's another teammate alive, she is immune from individual skills

name: 洛基掷出一个骰子决定敌人的命运。对敌方全体造成骰子点数*100%的物理伤害，并随机驱散骰子点数*1名敌人的全部有益状态。
value: Loki rolls a dice to decide the fate of the enemy. Deals dice points*100% P.DMG to all enemies and dispel all buffs on a number of randomly chosen enemies equal to the value on the dice roll.

name: 物理伤害系数增加50%，【致盲】命中概率额外提升30%
value: Increase the coefficient of P.DMG by 50%, additionally increase hit probability of [Blind] by 30%
