name: 攻击一列敌人，造成300%的物理伤害，如果索尔的速度大于敌人的速度，则伤害翻倍。
value: Deals 300% P.DMG to enemy on the same column. If the speed of Thor is higher than that of enemy, the DMG will double.

name: 释放雷电攻击六名敌人，造成200%的物理伤害，如果索尔的速度大于敌人的速度，则对敌人再次释放雷电，造成200%的物理伤害。
value: Deals 200% P.DMG to 6 enemies.If the speed of Thor is higher than that of enemy, deals an extra 200% P.DMG to that enemy.

name: 攻击一列敌人，造成380%的物理伤害，如果索尔的速度大于敌人的速度，则伤害翻倍。如果击杀敌人，则索尔获得【神力】（不可驱散）效果，持续6回合。【神力】效果增加30%攻击力，50%异常抵抗，300点防御穿透。
value: Deals 380% P.DMG to enemy on the same column. If the speed of Thor is higher than that of enemy, the DMG will double. If the enemy is killed, Thor will enter the state of [Mighty Power](non-dispellable) for 6 rounds. [Mighty Power] state increases the ATK by 30%, debuff RES by 50% and DEF PEN by 300 points.

name: 释放雷电攻击六名敌人，造成220%的物理伤害，并对六名敌人造成索尔速度*0.01%的真实伤害。如果索尔的速度大于敌人的速度，则对敌人再次释放雷电，造成220%的物理伤害。
value: Deals 220% P.DMG and an extra True DMG of 0.01% Thor's speed to 6 enemies. If the speed of Thor is higher than that of enemy, deals an extra 220% P.DMG to that enemy.

name: 物理伤害系数增加60%
value: Increase the coefficient of P.DMG by 60%

name: 每次雷电攻击使敌人获得【感电】效果（不可叠加），持续2回合。【感电】状态下，受到伤害增加50%，回复生命效果降低50%
value: Every thunder-related attack will apply [Charged] state for 2 rounds (cannot stack). Enemies who are under the state of [Charged] increases DMG taken by 50% and their recovering HP effect will be reduced by 50%

name: 增加30%攻击力，50%异常抵抗，300点防御穿透
value: Increase the ATK by 30%, Debuff RES by 50% and DEF PEN by 300 points

name: 受到伤害增加50%，回复生命效果降低50%
value: Increases DMG taken by 50% and reduces recovering HP effect by 50%

name: 肩负重任的感觉，有时也会很沉重！
value: Sometimes the responsibilities feel heavy on me.

name: 在追求最强力量的道路上，我永远不会停歇。
value: I will never stop pursuing the greatest power.

name: 只要有我在，邪恶的巨人就永远别想踏入阿斯加德神域一步！
value: Never will an evil giant set foot in Asgard as long as I am alive.

name: 雷神之锤给我带来了强大的力量，但这种力量有时就连我自己也感到害怕。
value: My Mjolnir brought mighty power to me, but I also fear its powerfulness sometimes.

name: 我北欧神族第一战士的威名，难道只是用敌人的鲜血来铸造的吗？
value: It is not only because I killed so many that made me the number one warrior of Nordic Deities.

name: 我一直在想，赢得战斗的关键，是在于强大的力量，还是高超的智慧？
value: I am always wondering what the key to winning a battle is? Strong body or great mind?

name: 但那是一份无与伦比的荣耀。
value: But it is an exceptional glory.

name: 你已经是最强的战士了！
value: You are already the strongest warrior!

name: 让巨人们颤抖吧！
value: Let the giants tremble under my mighty power!

name: 这股力量只有你能掌控。
value: You are the only one who can control this power.

name: 那是敌人对你的认可。
value: That's the best recognition you can get from your enemies.

name: 最重要的还是力量。
value: Power is the most important thing to have.

name: 我想帮你分担压力。
value: I want to share your burden.

name: 也要注意劳逸结合。
value: You must keep the balance between work and rest.

name: 如果可以和平解决那更好了。
value: That will be wonderful if we can have a peaceful settlement.

name: 不！那是你强大神力的体现。
value: No! It is, in fact, the reflection of your mighty power.

name: 最关键的还是智慧。
value: The key is to have a great mind.

name: 你说的没错，对于我而言，没有什么比荣耀更重要。
value: You are right. For me, nothing is more important than glory.

name: 能够获得你的认可，对于我而言，是最大的荣耀。
value: To be recognized by you is the greatest glory of all.

name: 总有一天，我会将它们全部驱逐干净！
value: Some day, I will eliminate them altogether!

name: 但愿这种力量，不会有失控的一天。
value: I hope I will not lose control of my power one day.

name: 对于这种认可我很欣慰，不过我不希望在别人的眼里，我是一个嗜杀的人。
value: I am so glad with your recognition. However, I don't want to be seen as a bloodthirsty goddess.

name: 我对于自己现在的力量，很有自信！
value: I am confident in the strength I possess.

name: 谢谢你！跟你在一起，我觉得一下子轻松了很多。
value: I appreciate your presence. Being with you really takes my edge off.

name: 或许你说的没错，偶尔的休息，是为了到达更远的地方。
value: Maybe you are right. Taking a break every now and then is a must to reach further away.

name: 如果可以和平解决，那自然是再好不过！只是想跟那群邪恶的巨人谈判，这根本做不到。
value: It couldn't be better if we could settle it peacefully. However, it is impossible to negotiate with those evil and irrational giants.

name: 所以我从出生以来，也肩负着来自上天的使命。
value: Since I was born, I was granted missions of gods.

name: 你说的对！我更希望，我的威名是建立在我自身的力量之上。
value: You are right. I would much like to build my prestige on my own power.

name: 你说的有道理！不管是在力量方面，还是在智慧方面，我都要做到最强！
value: That's a good point! I have to be strong in both mind and body!

name: 在其他人面前，我展现的都是无比强大的力量，但只有在你面前，我才会展现自己温柔的一面。希望我们能携手并肩，一起为这个世界带来安宁与和平！
value: In the presence of others, I demonstrate only my mighty power. But only before you will I show my gentleness. I hope we can join hands and bring peace to this world!

name: 雷神之锤是阿萨神族威力最为强大的武器。它的锤头是由阿斯加德神域最坚硬的钢铁所打造，握柄部分则是以世界之树的木材作成。它可以砸碎任何东西，将其扔出去，击中目标之后还会自动飞回持有者的手中。
value: Mjolnir is the strongest weapon of all weapons in Aesir. Its hammerhead is forged with the hardest steel in Asgard, and its handle is made of the body of Yggdrasil. It can smash anything with one strike. No matter how far it flies, it would always find its way back to the holder's hand.

name: 集齐55个索尔碎片可以召唤索尔
value: Collect 55 Thor Shards to summon Thor

name: 北欧神话中的雷电与力量之神，同时还司掌风暴、战争、农业。\n她是阿萨神族最强的战士，其主要职责是保护阿斯加德的安全，使巨人无法入侵。\n同时，她还守护着人界的安全，常作为凡人的保护神现身。
value: The goddess of thunder and power in the Norse mythology and also in control of storms, war, and agriculture.\nShe is the greatest warrior in Aesir with the primary responsibility of protecting Asgard from giants' invasion.\nAlso, She is associated with the protection of mankind, as she often appears as the protector of the mortals.

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_71
value: High AoE Strike in one Column

name: 太好了，连索尔也被召唤过来了！以后我们可以继续并肩作战，也可以相互切磋，磨砺自己的实力了。
value: Great! Now that Thor is summoned here, we could fight alongside and learn from one another to improve our power.

name: 我的姐妹，欢迎你的到来！我们北欧神族的实力又得到了巨大的提升。
value: My dear sister, I give you my warmest welcome. The power of Nordic Deities will definitely reach another level.

name: 哎！没想到这家伙也跟着来了，以后的日子怕是没那么潇洒了！
value: Geez! I didn't expect her to be here. I guess my days of fun have officially ended.

name: 全新的力量并没有那么容易掌控！索尔，你准备好接受我们的历练了吗？
value: This new power is a little hard to control. Thor, are you ready to take this quest?

name: 接受历练是掌控全新力量的必要流程，我早已做好准备，开始吧！你们不用手下留情！
value: I knew if you want to master a new kind of power, you must go through a trial. I am ready. Let's get started! Don't go easy on me.

name: 我很好奇，做为北欧神族的第一战士，你究竟觉醒了何种全新的力量！
value: I am curious, as the number one warrior of the Nordic Deities, what kind of new power you have awakened.

name: 那就让你见识一下，这无与伦比的神力吧！
value: Then let me show you how strong this mighty power is.

name: 我们已经好久没有切磋过了！如果战胜不了我的话，你北欧神族第一战士的名头可要归我了！
value: It has been long since our last fight. I will take your title if you lose!

name: 嘿！想夺走我第一战士的名号，可没那么容易！
value: Humph, you want to take my title? Bring it!

name: 你以前就经常坏我好事，没想到我们在这个世界又相遇了！这一次，你可别再跟我过不去了！
value: You used to spoil my plan all the time. I am surprised to meet you again here. You better not bother me this time!

name: 洛基！收起你的恶作剧，我们还可以做朋友。不然的话，以后我照样会阻止你。
value: Loki! Stop your pranking things, and then we can be friends. Or you will taste the fruit of standing against me in the future.

name: 真是个无趣的家伙！看来我们只能再较量一场了，要是你输了的话，那就赶紧返回阿斯加德神域去吧！
value: What a dull guy! It seems we have to rematch once. If you lose, pack your things and get back to Asgard.

name: 索尔！做为北欧神族最强的战力，我对你寄予着最高的期望。所以，我对你的考验，也会是前所未有的严厉！
value: Thor! As the most powerful Nordic Deities, I have high hopes for you. So, as the test assigned by me, this will be an unprecedented challenge.

name: 来吧！我所期待的，正是最严厉的考验！
value: Come on! What I am expecting will always be the toughest trial!

name: USER_BACK_NEW_ENTRY_GIFT_MAIL_CONTENT_LOW_LEVEL
value: Welcome back to Idle Angels! To improve your game experience, we have prepared a welcoming gift for your comeback. You can also switch back to the original server by clicking the Change Server. Have fun!

name: ACTIVITY_HOLIDAY_COPY_WEEK_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT
value: Here are today's rewards of the Spring Festival Souvenir Card. Enjoy your treat!

name: 花嫁典礼活动期间战场挂机掉落，可以在活动界面兑换道具。
value: Drop in the Wedding Ceremony event. It can be used to redeem items in the event interface.

name: 用于在每日福利活动的幸运棋盘中投掷骰子前进，获得奖励
value: It can be used to move forward and get rewards in the Lucky Board of the Daily Gift event.

name: 攻击方无派遣，防守方胜
value: No dispatch by the Attack side, so the Defense side wins.

name: DAILY_GIFT_TODAY_TISHI
value: All available daily package claimed, remaining {0} days to claim

name: NOTICE_10010003
value: The chosen one！<color=#25c1e9>{0}</color> has awaken <color=#FF3838FF>UR+-{1}</color> to <color=#25c1e9>{2}</color> star(s)！

name: NOTICE_10010004
value: The fortune's favorite has turned up!  <color=#25c1e9>{0}</color>  synthesized  <color=#FF3838FF>UR+-{1}</color> ！

name: 试炼使者：当进驻试炼场时，提升试炼晶石的产量。
value: Trial Emissary: When stationed in the Trial Ground, increasing the production of Trial Crystal

name: NEED_ADVANCE_FIRST
value: Awaken Divine Power first  to waken Wonder Power.

name: SUPER_AWAKE_UNLOCK_TIPS
value: Activate when wakening Wonder Power to {0}-star

name: ACTIVITY_UR_PLUS_HERO_RELIC_AWAKE
value: Unlock when improving Relic's quality to {0}

name: ACTIVITY_UR_PLUS_HERO_AWAKE
value: Unlock when wakening UR+ angel to {0}-star

name: THIS_HERO_SUPER_AWAKE_NOT_OPEN
value: UR Summon for this angel is not available.

name: HERO_SUPER_AWAKE_NEED_GOD_AWAKE_LEVEL_CONTENT
value: Only UR angel reaches a certain star level, can the same UR+ angel advance the star level.

name: 需要集齐N个UR+碎片可以突破
需要集齐N个UR+碎片可以神性觉醒到N星
value: Collect {0} UR+ Shards to waken Wonder to {1}-star

name: ACTIVITY_UR_PLUS_HERO_NOT_GET_REWARD_CONTENT
value: The event is over. Your unclaimed rewards have been sent to you via in-game mail.

name: ACTIVITY_UR_PLUS_HERO_RANK_REWARD_MAIL_TITLE
value: Wonder Trial Boss Challenge Ranking Rewards

name: ACTIVITY_UR_PLUS_HERO_RANK_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT
value: You've ranked No. {0} in Boss Challenge of Wonder Trial. This are your rewards!

name: 破灭之爪：提升所有上阵女神的抗性穿透能力。
value: Smashing Crawl: Increase the RES PEN of all Line-up angels

name: 哈提和斯库尔是巨狼族首领的两个女儿，也是一对双生子。她们从出生之时起，就在进行着最残酷的试炼——追逐太阳和月亮，吸收日之力和月之力，强化自身力量，从而成为族群里最巅峰的强者。而哈提和斯库尔也不负众望，她们天赋异禀，在年复一年的试炼当中，实力飞速成长，已然成为种族中的佼佼者。
value: Hati and Sköll are the twin daughters of the leader of the Giant Wolf clan. From the day they were born, they were sent to the most formidable trial—chasing the sun and the moon to absorb their energy so as to strengthen their power.\nHati, and Sköll had lived up to the expectations. They are not only gifted but also grow more and more potent in the trial years after years. Finally, they have become the strongest of their clan.

name: 哈提：我追逐了那么多年的月亮，但直到今天，哈提才追逐到了自己真正的主人。\n斯库尔：以后，你就是我的主人，我心目中真正的太阳！
value: Hati: I have been chasing the moon for so long. But today, I have met my true master.\nSköll: From now on, you are my master, the true sun of my mind.

name: 每到下雨天，我就感觉做什么事都不起劲，我还是喜欢在灿烂的阳光下，放肆奔跑的感觉。
value: I can't pull myself together in the raining day. I would enjoy the feeling of running under sunshine much more.

name: 圆圆的满月看起来真美丽，可是弯弯的弦月也特别可爱！哎，好难选择啊！
value: The full moon looks so beautiful, while the crescent moon looks so cute. Why I must make a choice!?

name: 哈提：我喜欢跟芬妮尔姐姐在一起，她给我一种很亲切的感觉。\n斯库尔：我就喜欢和熙玉妹妹一起玩耍，她也看着很亲切，而且看着还很美味（流口水）。\n哈提：……
value: Hati: I love spend time with Fenrir. I feel I can really relate to her.\nSköll: I love playing with Xiyu. She seems so nice and also... tasteful... (slobbering)

name: 火焰亲和：当进驻熔岩池时，提升强化精华的产量。
value: Flame Affinity: When placed in the Lava Lake, increasing the productivity of Enhance Essence

name: 抑魔之鳞：提升所有上阵女神的魔抗。
value: Magi-repressed Scale: Increase the M.RES of all Line-up angels

name: 尼德霍格是黑龙一族的女王，她们一族从古至今生活在世界树的树下，以世界树的根部和枝叶为食。但随着世界树的养分被不断吸食，这颗大树也面临着枯萎和倒塌的危险。为了救治世界树，保护族人赖以生存的依靠，尼德霍格穿越异世界，来到了幻兽之森。据说在这里，可以找到治好世界树的神药。
value: Nidhogg is the queen of Black Dragon. They have lived under the World Tree since ancient times and feed on the root and branches of the World Tree. However, with the World Tree's nutrition consistently consumed, this giant tree is at the edge of withering and falling. \nTo save the World Tree and protect the only home they have, Nidhogg risked going to the otherworld and coming here, the Forest of Eudemons. It is said that the magic cure of the World Tree lay in the depth of the forest.

name: 做为黑龙一族的女王，我一直是族人们的依靠！但从今以后，我也有了自己可以依靠的主人。
value: As the queen of Black Dragon, I have always trusted by my people! However, from now on, I have a master that I can trust.

name: 我不喜欢奥丁那个家伙，她总是固执地将世界树认定为是她的东西。
value: I don't like Odin. She is so stubborn and always believes that World Tree is her's.

name: 人们总是认为黑龙一族是邪恶的种族，但那只是世人的偏见而已。
value: People always thought Black Dragon is an evil creature, but it is just their prejudice.

name: 我一定会找到救治世界树的神药，这是我向族人们所做出的承诺。
value: I must find the magic cure for the World Tree. It is the promise I made to our people.

name: 刚毅之鳞：提升所有上阵女神的物抗。
value: Firm Scale: Increase P.RES of all line-up angels

name: 相传，生活在无底深海中的尘世巨蟒一族，都是寄生于黑暗中的存在。但耶梦加得却不同，相比于黑暗，她却更向往光明。因此，在她成年之后，她便离开了深海，决心游历尘世，结交各族朋友，度过一个不一样的人生。
value: It is said that the Midgard Serpent in the bottomless sea lives in the darkness and never leaves. However, it is not the case for Jormungand. Compared to darkness, her heart wants more of the bright side.\nAfter growing up, she is determined to live a much different life. So, she leaves the deep sea and travels all over Midgard, making friends with other races.

name: 离开深海，来到尘世是我所做出的最正确的决心。因为，我在尘世间遇到了你——我最重要的主人！
value: Leaving the deep sea and coming to the Midgard lands is the best choice I have ever made! Because of that, I met you here—my master, the most important person to me.

name: 族人们总觉得我是个异类，但正因为我的特殊，我才能获得如此多的快乐。
value: My people always think I am a deviant. But how much fun they have lost just because of that conformity.

name: 蛇其实是一种很温柔的动物！不信的话，你们可以问问我的主人。
value: We are actually a very gentle race! Don't believe me? Ask my master.

name: 遇到我的主人之后，我才知道，人生原来可以这么的快乐。
value: I have found the melody of my life ever since I met my master.

name: 在上古卷轴中使用，用于诸神黄昏系列幻兽的合成。
value: Used in elder scrolls and synthesize the Ragnarok series

name: COMPENSATE_BOUNTY_SOCIETY_REWARD_DESC
value: Dear Players: \nThe redemptions of the Supply House are attached below. Thanks for you support.

name: 在上古卷轴中使用，用于元素精灵、诸神黄昏系列幻兽的合成。
value: Used in elder scrolls and synthesize the Elementals Series and Ragnarok series Eudemons

name: 解锁圣物需到达等级{0}
value: Reach Lv. {0} to unlock the Relic

name: 集齐55个卡俄斯碎片可以召唤卡俄斯
value: Collect 55 Chaos Shards to summon Chaos

name: LIMIT_SUMMON_UR_PLUS_TIPS
value: UR Angel is required to achieve UR+

name: 我在做梦吗？这里是……
value: Am I dreaming? Where am I...

name: 这里是梦境的深渊、欲望的迷宫，赫拉大人。
value: My Lord Hera, this is the abyss of the dream, the maze of desire.

name: 潘多拉？等等，这一切到底是怎么回事？！
看来您朝思暮想的某个愿望，指引您打开了我的魔盒呢，嘻嘻……
value: It seems one of your long-cherished wishes has led you to open my Box, hehe...

name: 啊……我好像感到所有的记忆都消失了一般。
value: Argh... Why I can't remember anything...

name: 没错，魔盒在打开之时会取走您最珍贵的回忆，但也会赋予您新的力量。
value: Indeed, the Box will take away your memory, the most precious thing one can have. But... it will also give you a new power.

name: 力量的种子已经埋在了您的心里，激发您的战意，让它成长起来。
value: Now you have the potential inside you. To grow it, you must fight.

name: 因为在魔盒赋予的梦境里，战斗是引导您命运的唯一方式……
value: Because in the dreamland created by the Box, the only way out is through battles.

name: 你说的没错，潘多拉，我仿佛能感受到一种奇特力量的萌芽。
value: You are right, Pandora. I do have the feeling that something is growing inside me.

name: 一种强大，却很危险的力量……它会让您的神格突破到难以想象的程度。
value: A mighty but dangerous power... It will wake your godhood in a way that you can't imagine.

name: 但梦境也会让您直面自己真实的欲望，如果控制不住这种欲望的话……
value: Be careful. The dream will also force you to face your true desire, and once you lose control of yourself...

name: 会发生什么可怕的事情吗？
强大的力量和失控的欲望，会彻底让您迷失在梦境中，永远不会醒来。
value: The mighty power and uncontrollable desire will obsess you. You will be lost in the dreamland forever and never wake up.

name: 我绝不会让这种事发生。
value: I will not let that happen.

name: 您好像很有自信呢，但我从您的眼神中，也看到了一丝不安。
value: You seem so confident. But that anxious look can't get by me.

name: 我会作为同伴，跟随您见证这梦境中的一切，尽可能地找到出口吧，嘻嘻……
value: Anyway, I will be your accompany and witness your experiences here. I suggest you try your best to find the way out, hehe...

name: 明智的决定……有我在的话，或许赫拉大人不会坠入黑暗的深渊吧，嘻嘻……
value: Wise choice... I guess you will not fall into the dark abyss as I am by your side, hehe...

name: 梦境还很长，我期待您找到出口的那一刻……
value: There is still a long way to go. I am looking forward to seeing the day you find the exit...

name: 赫拉，你为何会出现在梦境之地，这里可不是作为天后该来的地方。
value: Hera, why are you here, the dreamland? This is not the place for the Queen of Olympus.

name: 夜之女神倪克斯？我可没想到会在这种地方遇到你。
value: Nyx, the goddess of the night? I didn't expect to meet you here.

name: 幻境中所遇到的人，都与你的命运交错重叠，她们的出现并不奇怪。
value: In the dreamland, you will meet those who have tangled with your fate. I am not surprised you met her here.

name: 看来你和我一样，是对力量的渴望而迷失至此的。
value: It seems you are lost out of the desire for power, just like me.

name: 为了挽回末日降临以来失去的神力，我恐怕不能在这里输给你。
value: I am afraid we will have to fight to save all the power I lost after the doomsday.

name: 倪克斯的神力已经丢失了大半，为什么还会有如此惊人的战斗力……
value: I remember Nyx has lost most of her power. Why does she still have such strong combat power...

name: 在梦境里，大家初始的神格都是平等的，纯粹的力量是唯一的武器。
value: In the dreamland, all of our godhood is equal. The pure source of power is from the weapon.

name: 我为什么会在这里……赫拉？发生了什么事，我在做梦吗？
value: Why am I here... Hera? What happened? Am I dreaming?

name: 夜之女神大人看来输给了欲望，成了梦境迷宫的牺牲者之一呐，嘻嘻……
value: It seems the goddess of the night has lost to her desire and become the victim of the dreamland, hehe...

name: 哼……潘多拉，这想必这也是你的恶作剧所为吧？
value: Humph, Pandora, that must be your doing!

name: 非常遗憾，并不是这样，只有碰过魔盒但欲望失控之人，才会徘徊于此。
value: Unfortunately, it is not. One who touched the Box and lost to one's desire will end like that.

name: 倪克斯女神，丢失的神力可以再度获得，但深陷于欲望的深渊，将永远迷失。
value: Angel Nyx, the lost power can be regained, but the lost mind will be lost forever.

name: 我们即使在过去有过冲突和争端，但眼下找到梦境出口才是最重要的，不是吗？
value: Even if we have conflicts in the past, it is more important to find the way out, right?

name: ……你说的没错，我们尽快离开这里吧！
value: ...You are right. Let's get the hell out of here!

name: 站住！正义与审判的代行者将阻止你们继续前行！
value: Stop! The hand of justice and judge command you to stop there.

name: 涅墨西斯？没有合适的理由就冒犯天后的权威，是一种无礼的行为！
value: Nemesis? It is rude to offend the Queen if you don't have any right cause.

name: 自创世以来，诸神就一直因为各种私欲而犯下众多罪行。
value: Ever since the creation, all gods have committed countless crimes out of their own desires.

name: 就连你成为天后的路上，也留下了无数无辜者的悲叹……不是么？
value: Even your way to the queendom is built with the bodies of the innocents... Am I right?

name: 我不否认指控，但只有力量能带来秩序！
value: I cannot deny it. But only power can bring order.

name: 很好，如果你希望用力量来证明这一点，那么战斗将是唯一的选择！
value: Fair enough. If you want to prove your point, we have no choice but to fight!

name: 权力的争斗中，没有人是无辜者！
value: No one is innocent in the struggle for power!

name: 那么公平和正义也将不再宽恕你，让审判开始吧……
value: Then, equity and justice will no longer stand by your side. Let the trial begin...

name: 好强大的力量……我可以感受到你内心的执着，你并非是一名纯粹的暴君……
value: Your power is so strong... I can sense the persistence in your mind. I guess you are not a tyrant at all...

name: 我从不后悔当初自己所选择的道路，而我也不准备逃避责任！
value: I never regret the way I step onto, and I am not afraid to take responsibility!

name: 哼……或许你的所作所为也是为了某种意义上的公正吧，这次我便不为难你了。
value: Humph, I guess you're doing it for the good of justice. I will not make things difficult for you this time.

name: 但是请你记住，如果有一天你抛弃了自己的信念和原则，审判会再度降临。
value: But remember, if you betray your faith and principles one day, I will find you and bring my trial.

name: 她消失了？进入梦境的人都不能自行离开才对，难道她……
value: She just disappears!? I thought no one could leave the dreamland of their own will... Is she...

name: 您没发现吗？她并不是真实存在的，而只是您梦境中的一个幻影而已。
value: Have you noticed? She is not real, but only a phantom in your dream.

name: 之所以会梦到她，应该是您心中还存有对神权争斗中牺牲者的愧疚吧。
value: The only reason you met here is that, in the deep of your mind, you still have the guilt for the innocents who died in the struggle for power.

name: ……你说得没错，而这份愧疚如今已随着刚才的战斗消散了。
value: ...I guess you are right. I feel this guilt has gone after the battle.

name: 梦境会帮助您消除心中的犹豫，新的力量也正是诞生于此。
value: The dreamland helps you to dispel the anxiety in your mind. After that, power can be born.

name: 我感到身体里的那份力量已经开始成长了。
value: I feel the power inside me has begun to grow.

name: 但伴随这份力量而来的，却是一种不安，仿佛自己的欲望正在吞噬灵魂一般……
value: However, there is also another anxious feeling that follows. I feel my desire is devouring my soul...

name: 很久没见了，赫拉，没想到会在这里遇到你。
value: It has been a long time, Hera. I didn't expect to meet you here.

name: 大地之母盖亚吗……我还清晰地记得您沉睡前的那一刻。
value: Gaia, the goddess of the Earth... I remember the moment vividly before you fall asleep.

name: 我沉睡了如此之久，也算等来了唤醒我的人。
value: I have been asleep for so long and finally have someone to wake me up.

name: 您知道如何离开这个梦境吗？
value: Do you know how to leave the dreamland?

name: 触碰潘多拉魔盒的人，必然有强烈的渴求，或者说……未达成的心愿。
value: The one who touches the Box must have some strong desires or...unfulfilled wishes.

name: 而这份心愿达成之时，就能找到梦境的出口。
value: Once you have fulfilled them, you can find the exit of the dreamland.

name: 那么，我们应该要怎么办？
value: So, what are we gonna do now?

name: 让我在战斗中窥探一下你内心深处的渴望吧，这或许会为你指明道路。
value: Let me take a look at your inner desire. Maybe it will be helpful.

name: 一场不错的战斗，虽然只在刹那间，但我窥见了你内心深处的世界。
value: It is a good fight. Although it was just a spur of one moment, I saw the inner world of your mind.

name: 作为天后，你渴望所有人的尊敬，但事情并不能如你所愿。
value: As a queen, you desire the respect of everyone. However, it does not always go your way.

name: 而你的身份却让你无法接受这个现实，最终开始渴望权力，寻求力量，没错吧？
value: Your place makes you incapable of accepting the truth. So you become power-hungry and turn to seek more power. Am I right?

name: 你已经开始放下心中那个高傲的自己了，说实话，比我想象中要快。
value: So you have already let go of that condescending self. To be honest, it is much quicker than I thought.

name: 如果高傲的心会阻碍我的前进，我并不介意抛弃这份负担。
value: I will reduce any burden if that stands in my way.

name: 你终究没有让我失望，就让我与你共同面对之后的麻烦吧。
value: I guess you didn't fail me at all. Let me stand by you and face all troubles ahead together.

name: 不，并不是这样！
value: No, I am not like that!

name: 嗯……真的吗？平息你内心的高傲，才能看到真实的自己。
value: Hmm... Is that true? Let go of that condescending self so you can see the true self.

name: 你还没有我想象中那么成熟，在这场梦境结束前，就让我照顾好你的安全吧。
value: You are not mature enough to take care of this. Before this ends, let me take care of you.

name: 赫拉，你也是来阻止我的吗？看来我们两个人的战斗还没有结束！
value: Hera, are you going to stop me? I guess the thing between us is not over yet.

name: 雅典娜？！等等！我和你之间的争端已随特洛伊战争的落幕而平息了。
value: Athena?! Wait! Our conflict is resolved as the Trojan War has ended.

name: 很遗憾，在我看来事实并不是这样，你会出现在这梦境中就是证明。
value: Unfortunately, it is not true as we are both in the dreamland.

name: 我们都曾为争夺金苹果而付出了太多牺牲，真的有必要这样吗？
value: We have paid so much to compete for the Golden Apple. It is not necessary to resort to violence.

name: 这些话没有意义，我们之间必须决出最终的胜者！
value: Your words mean nothing to me. There can be only one winner between us!

name: 够了，雅典娜！一切都结束了，我们的分歧只会给希腊神系带来更多灾难！
value: Enough, Athena! It is all ended. Our conflicts can only bring more disasters to the Greek gods!

name: 还没有……只要我还没有倒下……
value: It is not enough... as long as I am alive...

name: 身为战争女神，你应该明白你我力量的差距！
value: As the goddess of war, you should know that we are mismatched!

name: ……你说的没错，战争的胜负永远以力量来决定，而你的力量确实在我之上。
value: ...You are right. The outcome of a war is always determined by power. And you are indeed more powerful than me.

name: 你作为这场争斗最后的胜利者，理应得到我的尊敬和追随。
value: As the winner of this battle, you deserve my respect, and I will follow your lead.

name: 那将是我的荣幸，请相信我会善用你的力量。
value: It is my honor too. Believe me. I will make good use of your power.

name: 身为智慧女神，你应该明白和平才是终点。
value: As the goddess of wisdom, you should know that peace matters most.

name: ……你说的没错，换不来和平与团结的战争，不会有真正的赢家。
value: ...You are right. The outcome of the war has to be peace and unity. If that is not the case, there will be no winner.

name: 你我最终的目的都是离开这里，或许同盟会是更明智的选择。
value: We share the same goal of leaving here. Maybe allying with you will be a wise choice.

name: 如你所言，我的枪将为你迎敌。
value: As you say, I will fight for you.

name: 别来无恙，亲爱的，我早该料到会面对你这个让我头疼的家伙。
value: How have you been, my dear? I should have known that I gonna meet you here.

name: 宙斯？你会出现在这里，意味着你也有心愿未了吧？
value: Zeus? Since you are here, I guess you also have unfinished wishes.

name: 猜对了，不过幸运女神看来没怎么眷顾你，让你在梦境中徘徊到现在还没出去。
value: You are right! But it seems Lady Luck hasn't been on your side, as you are still trapped here.

name: 我并不意外，亲爱的，不用猜也知道你所渴求的是什么。
value: I am not surprised, my love. I know exactly what you want.

name: 你希望得到其他神明的尊敬，尤其是作为众神之王的我的尊敬，不是吗？
value: You want to be respected by other gods, especially me, the King of Gods. Am I right?

name: 我不会否认你的话，神权只有一个顶点，只有战斗能解决这个问题。
value: I would not deny it. There can be only one who has the strongest divine power. Let's settle it with power.

name: 你比以前强了很多呢，亲爱的，会输给你真让我意外。
value: You are much stronger than before, my dear. I am surprised to lose to you.

name: 神权之争落下帷幕了，看来我终究是最后的胜利者。
value: The war of divine power has ended, and I am the winner.

name: 我更好奇的是你会如何运用神权带来的强大力量。
value: I wonder how you gonna use the Wonder power it brings.

name: 重新树立希腊众神的秩序。
value: To rebuild the order of the Greek Gods.

name: 如果是以前，我认为你这么做只会给所有人带来麻烦……
value: If it is in the old days, I would believe that you are causing trouble to everyone...

name: 但现在把神权交给你，或许也不是坏事，希腊众神会期待你所创造的新秩序。
value: However, I am not worried about handing it to you now. Greek Gods will look forward to the new order you built.

name: 呵呵……有趣的想法，我以为只有自己才会具备这样的野心。
value: Hehe, interesting thoughts. I guess I am not the only one capable of having such ambitions.

name: 我会一直跟随你，并为你见证这一切的。
value: I will follow you till the end.

name: 赫拉，虽然宙斯已经将神权交付于你，但并不意味着我和哈迪斯也认可此行为。
value: Hera, although Zeus has given you divine power, it doesn't mean that Hades and I approve of that.

name: 我会用实力证明这是一个正确的决定。
value: I will prove myself with my power.

name: 希腊众神需要一个新秩序，波塞冬，不觉得这是一次机会吗？
value: The Greek God really need a new order, Poseidon. Don't you think it is a great opportunity?

name: 说实话，我早已厌倦了那些多余的争端，以这次战斗来做个了结，我也不反对。
value: To be honest, I am tired of all these conflicts long ago. It might be good to end this with a fight.

name: 不得不说，如今的你或许确实具备了统领希腊众神的能力。
value: I have to say you've been competent in leading Greek gods.

name: 统领众神是一个漫长的过程，但我不会容许自己失败。
value: It's a long process, but I won't allow myself to fail.

name: 我选择交出掌管大海的神权，希望你能够好好使用这份力量。
value: I will hand over the ocean theocracy, and I hope you can utilize this power properly.

name: 至于选择和你们争来争去打个没完，我更有兴趣选择和这个世界的人类去冲浪。
value: Instead of fighting against you, I'd prefer to surf with mortals.

name: 哈迪斯，希腊神系需要面对新的命运，我需要你的力量来改变这一切。
value: Hades, the Greek gods, are facing a new fate. I need your power to help me change everything.

name: ……我倒是有点兴趣，但我从来不会和弱者合作，让我见识一下你的力量吧。
value: ... I'm sort of got interested in it. But I never cooperate with the weak. Show me your power, and I will then decide.

name: 还真是符合你的原则，哈迪斯。
value: It's really in line with your principle, Hades.

name: 如果新的神权秩序有助于冥界的势力，我并没有反对的必要。
value: I will not object if the new theocratic establishment can bring significant benefits to Underworld.

name: 哼……你会见识到的，那么让我们开始吧。
value: Humph... You'll see it! I'm ready.

name: 呵呵……看来命运确实站在了你这一边呐。
value: Huh... It seems that destiny stands by your side for this time.

name: 兑现你的承诺吧，我向你保证，冥界在我的统治下，不会让你失望的。
value: Make good on your promise. And I assure you I won't let you down.

name: 欢迎来到欲望和权力的深渊，赫拉。
value: Welcome to the abyss of desire and power, Hera.

name: 创世神卡俄斯？看来连你也彻底迷失在梦境中了……
value: The creator, Chaos? It seems you're also lost in the dreamland.

name: 你错了，赫拉，作为秩序与混沌的双重化身，欲望和权力都无法束缚住我。
value: Not really, Hera. As the embodiment of order and chaos, neither desire nor power can bind me.

name: 反倒是你的处境更有意思呢，现在你已经具备了足以与我抗衡的强大力量……
value: Instead, your situation is more interesting because you've owned the power to fight against me.

name: 我开始明白为什么会在梦境中见到你了……我只是渴望获得最强者的认同而已。
value: Now I see why I met you in the dreamland... I just want to be acknowledged by the most powerful one.

name: 如果不击败你，我恐怕永远无法离开这场梦。
value: I can't leave here unless I defeat you.

name: 呵呵……有趣，那么就让我陪你们玩玩吧……
value: Huh... Interesting. Well, let me show you my power.

name: 好强……这就是创世神的力量吗？但胜负已定，最终的胜利依旧是属于我的……
value: Incredible... The creator's power is indeed strong. But it is all over. The final victory belongs to mine.

name: 赫拉，凭你现在的力量能胜过我，我并不感到意外。
value: Hera, I'm not surprised that you can defeat me with your current power.

name: 你这是什么意思？你想说这一切都在预料之中？
value: What do you mean? You have expected it?

name: 按照创世律法，你可以夺走我作为创世神的神权。
value: According to the Genesis Order, you can take away my divine power.

name: 这神权强大无比，一旦取得，整个希腊将没有任何存在会是你的对手。
value: This divine power is mighty. Once acquired, no one in Greece will be your opponent.

name: 但这强大的力量是你神格无法掌控的，你迟早会失去灵魂，沦为它的傀儡。
value: But it's not easy to control it with your current godhood. You will lose your soul and become its puppet.

name: 信不信由你，做出不会让你后悔的选择吧，天后赫拉。
value: Believe it or not, make a decision you'll not regret, my Queen Hera.

name: 呵呵……和我所想的一样，强大无比的力量依旧是欲望的终点……
value: Huh... I've already known that incomparable power is still the end of desire.

name: 我有掌控这份力量的决心和信念，卡俄斯，请不用为我担心。
value: Don't worry, Chaos. I have the determination and faith to control this divine power.

name: 希望如此吧，愿决心和信念引导你将来的命运。
value: I hope so. May your determination and faith guide your future destiny.

name: 我绝不会为了力量抛弃灵魂！
value: I never give up my soul for power.

name: 这么多次在梦境中轮回，你终于找到了迷宫的出口……
value: After countless circles in the dreamland, you finally find your way out of the maze.

name: 但在你醒来之前，还需要越过最后的一个阻碍。
value: But before you wake up, you need to overcome the last obstacle.

name: 呵呵……你很快就会遇到她的，那个徘徊于此梦境迷宫中的噩梦之源……
value: Huh... You'll meet her soon. The evil spirit who create their place...

name: 终于见面了呢，另一个我……
天哪……是我眼花了吗？！你究竟是谁？！
value: Jesus... I can't believe my eyes! Who on earth are you?!

name: 在她的身上我感受到了卡俄斯的创世神力，我有不好的预感……
value: I can feel the divine power of Chaos in her body. I have a bad feeling about this...

name: 作为智慧女神的我竟然看不穿她的真名！
value: As the goddess of wisdom, I can't even see through her mind.

name: 神明的复制体吗……？不，它是徘徊于梦境的无魂梦魇。
value: Is it a duplicate? No, it's an evil spirit wandering in the dreamland.

name: 呵呵……拒绝压倒一切的力量与权力，你终究只会沦为徒有天后之名的弱者罢了。
value: Huh... Suppose you are unwilling to accept the power that can overwhelm everything. In that case, you'll eventually become the weak who only owns a deceptive reputation of Queen.

name: 众神依旧会看不起你，宙斯也终将离你而去，迎接你的永远是失落与悲哀。
value: The gods will still look down upon you. Zeus will eventually leave you. All you have will be disappointment and depression.

name: 身为冒牌货，废话可真是不少，亲爱的，别和它浪费时间了。
value: Imposter, you're talking absolute nonsense. My dear, don't waste your time with her.

name: 以天后赫拉之名！全军突击！
value: In the name of Queen, Hera! At my signal, attack!

name: 赫……拉……你这个胆小鬼……不要以为这就是结束……
value: Hera... You coward... This is not the end...

name: 只要你心中……还有自负……嫉妒……我迟早会取代你的神格……给我记住……
value: As long as you hide conceit... and jealousy... in your mind, I will take your place one day... Remember it...

name: 终于消失了吗，真是个难缠的家伙。
value: Is it finally gone? What a hot potato!

name: 赫拉大人，您还因为刚才的战斗而感到畏惧吗？
value: Lord Hera, are you still concerned about the battle?

name: 如果我还是过去那个孤独的自己，或许在战斗前我就会放弃抵抗吧。
value: If I were as lonely as the self I used to be, I would have given up before the battle.

name: 但如今我与你们牢固的羁绊，早已驱散了心中嫉妒和自负的阴影。
value: But now, I've formed a strong bond with you all, which has dispelled the shadows brought by my conceit and jealousy.

name: 所以，即使我不是最勇猛的战士，但我绝无理由向这种没有灵魂的傀儡低头。
value: So, even though I'm not the most intrepid warrior, there's no reason for me to submit to a soulless puppet.

name: 亲爱的，这场梦境让你成长了不少，不是吗？
value: Dear, this dreamland experience really helped you to grow up.

name: 如你所言，我会永远记住这场梦的，走吧，梦境的出口已经在眼前了。
value: As you said, I'll never forget it. Let's go. The exit is close.

name: ur+日常副本描述
value: Complete the journey in Angels' Dreamland and get their Shards for free.

name: 重复挑战可获得少量奖励
value: Rechallenge the stage to get some Memory Crystal

name: 打开宝箱选择赫拉任意品质的碎片
value: Open the box and choose Hera's Shards of any quality

name: 记忆宝珠加成所有女神共享
value: The bonus from Memoria Orb is shared with all angels

name: 记忆属性仅在女神梦境中生效
value: Memoria Attributes are only effective in this Angel's dream

name: 用于提升赫拉的梦境中记忆宝珠的等级
value: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Hera's Dreamland

name: 轮到自身行动前，提升我方全体5%攻击力，持续1回合

name: 轮到自身行动前，有50%概率驱散自身一种不良状态

name: 轮到自身行动前，为自身增加存活队友数量*5%的攻击力，持续1回合

name: 自身处于不良状态时，受到伤害降低20%

name: 自身受到伤害提升30%，伤害增加20%

name: 受到致命伤害时，免疫本次伤害，该效果每场战斗只能触发一次
value: When receive a fatal blow, protect herself with damage immunity for this blow (can be activated once per battle).

name: 死亡时对全体敌方造成晕眩1回合
value: When killed, stuns all enemies for 1 round

name: 死亡时对全体敌方造成该女神最大生命值10%的真实伤害
value: When killed, deals True DMG equal to 10% of her Max HP to all enemies

name: 轮到自身行动前，如果当前生命大于等于30%，提升自身50%暴击伤害，如果当前生命小于30%，提升30%吸血，持续1回合
value: When in her action, if her HP is higher than or equal to 30%, increases her Crit DMG by 50%; if not, increases her Leech effect by 30% for 1 round.

name: OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_BUY_SALY_TOAST
value: <size=24>Using the Discount Chance, you can get a random discount on current items and packages. Do you confirm to use?\n\nCurrent Discount Available Item:{0} Package:{1}</size>

name: 是否要通知该成员进行派遣？
OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_SHANGREN_DUIHUA1
value: Welcome to my Airship, Meow. I bet no one in this world is better than me at finding the most precious goods!

name: OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_SHANGREN_DUIHUA2
value: Meow, nice to see you again. Look at all the good stuff I got for you this time!

name: OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_SHANGREN_DUIHUA3
value: If you can find one store with a lower price and better goods, I will ... will ... stop eating fish for three straight days, meow!

name: OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_SHANGREN_DUIHUA4
value: Meow, I would not worry about no one appreciating my goods, as they stand up well by comparison.

name: OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_SHANGREN_BUYED_DUIHUA1
value: I can see why you'd be interested in that, meow. You really have an eye for quality!

name: OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_SHANGREN_BUYED_DUIHUA2
value: Since you are so generous, I will tell you a secret. Come closer, meow! It is said there is a hidden place filled with treasures somewhere in the Chaotic Realm.

name: OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_SHANGREN_BUYED_DUIHUA3
value: I will give you a mystery gift if you buy more things from me.

name: OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_SHANGREN_BUYED_DUIHUA4
value: Been a pleasure doing business with you, meow! I would like to have a drink with you.

name: OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_SHANGREN_FIRST_DUIHUA
value: Welcome to my Airship, meow! In my store, you can find treasures from all over the world. You are sure to find something new now and then. If you buying in bulk, I can even get you a discount!

name: OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_SHANGREN_SALE_DUIHUA
value: You should know I am not a stingy business-cat, meow. To thank you for your consistent patronage, all goods will be on sale today!

name: 设置完成
value: Setting applied. Takes effect after a reboot.

name: 对3名敌人造成100%的真实伤害，并使目标进入【石化】状态，敌人将无法行动，持续4秒
value: Deals 100% True DMG to 3 enemies and inflicts [Petrified] state, rendering them unable to move for 4 sec.

name: 对3名敌人造成120%的法术伤害，并使目标进入【减速】状态，移动速度降低50%，持续3秒
value: Deals 120% M.DMG to 3 enemies and inflicts [Speed Impair] state, reducing their SPD by 50% for 3 sec.

name: 对3名敌人造成120%的真实伤害，若目标处于【燃烧】状态，则必定暴击。
value: Deals 120% True DMG to 3 enemies; If the target is under [Ignite] state, ensure a critical hit.

name: 对3名敌人造成120%的法术伤害，并使目标进入【中毒】状态，每秒损失敌人当前生命值4%的血量，持续3秒
value: Deals 120% M.DMG to 3 enemies and inflicts [Poisoned] state, reducing 4% of their current HP per sec for 3 sec.

name: 对4名敌人造成80%的法术伤害，并使目标进入【破魔】状态，减少60%的魔抗，持续3秒
value: Deals 80% M.DMG to 4 enemies and inflicts [Spellbreaker] state, reducing their M.RES by 60% for 3 sec.

name: 对血量最低的1名敌人造成300%的物理伤害，若敌人当前HP在50%以下则必定暴击
value: Deals 300% P.DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP; If that target's HP is less than 50%, ensure a critical hit.

name: 对3名敌人造成120%的物理伤害，并使目标进入【燃烧】状态，每秒受到60%攻击力的魔法伤害，持续3秒
value: Deals 120% P.DMG to 3 enemies and inflicts [Ignite] state, receiving M.DMG equals to 60% ATK per sec for 3 sec.

name: 使我方3名女神进入【攻击提升】状态，增加150%的攻击力，持续5秒
value: Inflicts [ATK Increase] state to 3 teammates, increasing their ATK by 150% for 5 sec.

name: 使我方3名女神进入【攻速提升】状态，攻击速度提升150%，持续5秒
value: Inflicts [SPD Increase] state to 3 teammates, increasing their SPD by 150% for 5 sec.

name: 对3名敌人造成140%的法术伤害，并使目标进入【减速】状态，移动速度降低60%，持续4秒
value: Deals 140% M.DMG to 3 enemies and inflicts [Speed Impair]] state, reducing their SPD by 60% for 4 sec.

name: 对1名敌人造成400%的物理伤害，并使目标进入【中毒】状态，每秒损失当前生命值7%的血量，持续4秒
value: Deals 400% P.DMG to 1 enemy and inflicts [Poisoned] state, reducing 3% of the target's current HP per sec for 4 sec.

name: 对4名敌人造成80%的法术伤害，并使目标进入【眩晕】状态，持续4秒
value: Deals 80% M.DMG to 4 enemies and inflicts [Stunned] state that last 4 sec

name: 对6名敌人造成60%的物理伤害，并使目标进入【燃烧】状态，每秒受到60%攻击力的魔法伤害，持续4秒
value: Deals 60% P.DMG to 6 enemies and inflicts [Ignite] state, dealing M.DMG equals to 60% ATK per sec for 4 sec.

name: 对3名敌人造成120%的物理伤害，并使目标进入【破甲】状态，减少60%的物抗，持续4秒
value: Deals 120% P.DMG and inflicts [Sunder Armor] state to 3 enemies, reducing their P.RES by 60% for 4 sec.

name: 对6名敌人造成60%的真实伤害，若目标处于【燃烧】状态，则必定暴击。
value: Deals 60% True DMG to 6 enemies; If the target is under [Ignite] state, ensure a critical hit.

name: 对6名敌人造成60%的物理伤害，并使目标进入【中毒】状态，每秒损失当前生命值5%的血量，持续4秒
value: Deals 60% P.DMG to 6 enemies and inflicts [Poisoned] state, reducing 5% of the target's current HP per sec for 4 sec.

name: 对血量最高的1名敌人造成300%的物理伤害，并使目标进入【击破】状态，魔抗和物抗降低60%，持续5秒
value: Deals 300% P.DMG to the enemy with the highest HP and inflicts [Break] state, reducing the target's M.RES and P.RES by 60% for 5 sec.

name: 新的秘境关卡开放啦，快去看看吧\n
value: New map in Wonderland is open. Go and take a look!

name: 选择本次需要的女神后开始战斗
value: Choose angels and enter the battle

name: 购买相同女神后可以提升星级
value: Purchase the same angel to level up her star

name: 消耗经验值提升女神等级（等级跟随栏位保留）
value: Consume EXP to level up the angel

name: 增加一点寻觅之门能量值（购买后即刻生效）
value: Add 1 energy in the Gate of Seeking (immediately take effect after purchase)

name: OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_SHANGREN_ALL_BUY
value: Wow, all sold out? That makes me feel wonderful, meow! I will go and look for more new things for you. See ya!

name: 折扣值已满，再次购买会溢出，确认继续购买？
value: Discount is full. Your next purchase will exceed the upper limit. Continue?

name: 飞艇正在飞离
value: The Airship has departed. Please come back another time.

name: 飞艇已离开
value: The Airship has departed. Please come back another time.

name: 天边飞来一个飞艇，快去看看
value: The Airship arrived. Go and check it now

name: 点击飞艇，快看看里面有些什么
value: Tap the Airship to check what's new

name: Loading设置重启游戏后生效
value: The settings will take effect after a reboot

name: 好吧，我以后只在你面前，适当地收敛光芒！
value: Alright. I will hide my light a little in front of you!

name: 没关系，我可以当你的老师，教你唱歌。
value: It is okay. I can be your teacher and teach you how to sing.

name: 我虽然璀璨夺目，但在你面前，一向都很温柔。
value: I might be glorious in front of others, but always gentle with you.

name: 我的优雅早已刻入灵魂，不用像其他女人一样，竭力去维持。
value: My elegance is in my bone. There is no need to emphasize it.

name: 真的吗？我的那个人，难道会是你？
value: Really? You are the one for me?

name: 在与你签订契约之前，我曾希望我璀璨的光芒能照射进所有人的心里，但从今以后，我的光芒只为你一个人而绽放！
value: I once hoped that my radiance could shine up everyone. But now that we have made this vow, my glowing light will belong to you alone.

name: 散发着璀璨光芒的金色轮盘，上面附着来自太阳之神的力量，被其光芒照射者，皆会被太阳之火燃烧成灰烬。
value: A glorious golden wheel possessed by the god of the sun. One who was exposed to it will be burned by the firing sunlight.

name: 集齐55个阿波罗碎片可以召唤阿波罗
value: Collect 55 Apollo Shards to summon Apollo

name: 古希腊神话中光明、预言、音乐和医药之神，同时也是文明迁徙者和航海者的保护神。她被称为弓箭之王、远射神、金剑王，有着超强神力的同时，也有着无与伦比的美貌和才华，这让她在诸神之中广受欢迎。
value: She is an Ancient Greek deity, the god of sunlight, oracles, music, and healing, and the protector of refugees and seafarers. Called the king of archery, she is welcomed by all goddesses because of her strong power, incomparable beauty, and talents.

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_74
value: A sure-hit Blaze deals True DMG to all enemies Unique immediate-detonation DMG

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_75
value: Nothing can hide under my glowing light!

name: 希腊神话中的太阳神也被召唤过来了吗？这个世界的太阳，未免有些过多了！
value: Oh, is she the god of the sun in Greek? Too many suns in this world...

name: 欢迎你的到来！以后，我们希腊神话阵营就有两位弓箭之神了。
value: Welcome! Now the Greek side has two masters of archery.

name: 阿波罗，你的到来会为诸神阵营提供更强大的战力，但在此之前，你必须经过众神的历练！
value: Apollo, your coming brings greater power to all gods. However, you must go through our trial first!

name: 我察觉到了，在你体内蕴含着强大的光之力量！这股力量一旦觉醒，必能照耀世间的一切黑暗！
value: I sense that mighty light power inside you. I bet once it is awakened, all darkness will be dispelled!

name: 驱逐邪恶和黑暗是我的使命，不管是在原来的那个世界，还是现在的这个世界，我都义不容辞！
value: My duty is to drive out all evils. No matter where I am, I will fulfill it with my whole heart.

name: 传说中的光明之神终于来了！我等你很久了，跟我来一场光与火的较量吧！
value: You must be the famous god of light! I have been waiting for you for so long. Let's see whose power is stronger, your light or my fire?

name: 我也是第一次见到如此强大的火之力量，期待与你的战斗！
value: I have never seen such powerful strength of fire. I am looking forward to our battle.

name: 想要在这个世界随心所欲的使用神力，必须要经过特殊的训练！就让我的弓箭来指引你找到新的方向吧！
value: If you want to use your power at your own will, special training is what you need now. Let my arrow guides you to the new way out!

name: 有你的指引，我相信自己很快就能觉醒新的力量。
value: With your guidance, I believe a new power will be awakened soon!

name: 阿波罗，你作为希腊神话阵营中，唯一的光明之神，我对你抱有极高的期望！希望你的光芒照射到这个世界的每一个角落！
value: Apollo, as the only god of light on the Greek side, I have high hopes for you! Hope your glows will reach every corner of the world.

name: 我会为这个世界，带来更光明的未来的！在此之前，我将接受您的考验。
value: I will bring a brighter future to this world! And before that, I will accept your challenge.

name: 我是拉，埃及神话中的太阳之神！就让我代表这个世界的太阳，对你进行最终的考验吧！
value: I am Ra, the god of the sun in Egyptian. Let me represent the sun of this world and start this trial for you.

name: 为了这一刻，我早已准备多时，我一定会获得所有太阳神的认可！
value: I have been waiting for this moment to come for so long. I am ready to get approval from all sun gods.

name: 每回合造成一定伤害，持续4回合
value: Deals a certain amount of DMG for 4 rounds

name: 每回合造成一定伤害，持续6回合
value: Deals a certain amount of DMG for 6 rounds

name: 每回合造成一定伤害，不可驱散，持续2回合
value: Deals a certain amount of DMG for 2 rounds, undispellable

name: 我与丘比特都是著名的弓箭手，你觉得谁的箭术更甚一筹呢？
value: Cupid and I are all famous archers. Who do you think is better?

name: 我身上的光芒，会不会太过耀眼，而让人不敢直视了？
value: Is my glows too blinding that no one dares to stare at me?

name: 我的歌声是世界上最美妙的，你想与我一起，高歌一曲吗？
value: I have the most beautiful voice in the world. Do you want to sing with me?

name: 你更喜欢太阳的璀璨，还是月亮的温柔？
value: Which one do you prefer? The glory of the sun or the tenderness of the moon.

name: 做为最美的女神，我必须在任何时候都要保持优雅！
value: I must stay elegant as I am the most beautiful goddess!

name: 真希望我的弓箭也能拥有爱情的魔力，这样就可以收获属于我的爱情了。
value: I wish my arrow could possess the magic of affection so that I can find love of my own.

name: 你很适合这种光芒。
value: I think this kind of glow fits you well.

name: 当然想啊！
value: Sure! It will be my pleasure.

name: 我喜欢璀璨的太阳。
value: I prefer the glory of the sun.

name: 你原本就是最美、最优雅的女神！
value: There is no need to do that. You are already the most beautiful and elegant goddess!

name: 你的弓箭有更大的作用！
value: Your arrow is much better than that.

name: 是会有一点刺眼。
value: It is a little bit blinding.

name: 我不太会唱歌。
value: I am not a good singer.

name: 我喜欢温柔的月亮。
value: I prefer the tenderness of the moon.

name: 这样会不会很辛苦？
value: Don't be too hard on yourself.

name: 你马上就会遇到属于你的爱情的。
value: Don't worry. The love you wish for must be on the way.

name: 看来，在你心里，还是我比较重要！
value: Looks like I have more place in your heart!

name: 多谢你的夸奖，我会一直绽放光芒的。
value: I appreciate your compliment. I am gonna be the one who shine till the end.

name: 来吧，让我们一起唱出心中最大的渴望！
value: Come! Let's sing for our biggest craving.

name: 那，我会一直做你的太阳！
value: Then, I will be your sun forever!

name: 有你的认可我很开心，我会一直保持下去的。
value: I am glad to have your approval!

name: 多谢你的提醒！我会牢记我的使命，用我的弓箭来驱散世间的邪恶！
value: Thanks for reminding me of that. I will continue my mission to dispel all evils in the world!

name: 我知道了，你现在一定很希望谈一场轰轰烈烈的恋爱啊。
value: I know. You must be eager to have a dramatic romance with someone.

name: 中秋节活动期间战场挂机掉落，可以在活动界面兑换道具。
value: Drops in the Full-Moon event. It can be used to redeem items in the event interface.

name: 钻石豪礼 中秋回馈
中秋折扣 限时促销
恭喜您在中秋排行榜活动中获得第{0}名，以下为您的奖励：
value: Congratulations on ranking {0} in the Full-Moon Ranking event. You will get the following rewards:

name: 此物品已经兑换过，无需再次兑换
value: You have already redeemed this item.

name: ACTIVITY_HOLIDAY_COPY_DROP_SUMMON_BY_DROP_TIPS
value: Floats the Spring Sky Lantern to get diamonds and points.

name: 将会按照公会战斗力高低赋予公会国战编号
value: Gods Twilight No. will be given out based on the guild's CR

name: 对敌方全体造成200%物理伤害，然后使敌方全体进入4回合【烈焰】状态（无视异常抵抗），每回合造成阿波罗60%攻击力的真实伤害（该伤害不能暴击）。
value: Deals 200% P.DMG to all enemies and inflicts [Blaze] state for 4 rounds (ignore Debuff RES), dealing True DMG equal to 60% of Apollo's ATK each round (cannot be a critical strike).

name: 对血量最低的敌人造成600%物理伤害，并立即结算【烈焰】【燃烧】（使debuff提前生效，生效次数为该debuff剩余回合数），如果击杀该敌人，继续对血量最低的敌人攻击，最多攻击3次。
value: Deals 600% P.DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP and immediately detonates all damage of [Blaze] and [Ignite] (their effect DMG will be dealt at once based on effect remaining rounds). If this enemy is killed, transfer the remaining effect DMG to the next enemy with the lowest HP (can only be triggered 2 times)

name: 对敌方全体造成220%物理伤害，然后使敌方全体进入4回合【烈焰】状态（无视异常抵抗），每回合造成阿波罗80%攻击力的真实伤害（该伤害不能暴击）。阿波罗获得自身200%攻击力的护盾，持续1回合。
value: Deals 220% P.DMG to all enemies and inflicts [Blaze] state for 4 rounds (ignore Debuff RES), dealing True DMG equal to 80% of Apollo's ATK each round (cannot be a critical strike). Also, imposes a shield that equals 200% of her ATK to Apollo that lasts 1 round.

name: 对血量最低的敌人造成650%物理伤害，并立即结算【烈焰】【燃烧】（使debuff提前生效，生效次数为该debuff剩余回合数），如果击杀该敌人，继续对血量最低的敌人攻击，最多攻击12次。
value: Deals 650% P.DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP and immediately detonates all damage of [Blaze] and [Ignite] (their effect DMG will be dealt at once based on effect remaining rounds). If this enemy is killed, transfer the remaining effect DMG to the next enemy with the lowest HP (can only be triggered 11 times)

name: 【烈焰】状态持续时间增加2回合
未击杀敌人则使该敌人获得【烈焰】状态2回合（无视异常抵抗，不可驱散）
value: If the enemy is not killed, inflicts [Blaze] state for 2 rounds to that enemy (ignore Debuff RES, undispellable)

name: 啊啦？这里是梦境深渊吗？看来又有淘气的家伙在恶作剧呐。
value: Alas, is this the dreamland abyss? Looks like someone has been naughty.

name: 出来吧潘多拉，这梦境是你造的吧？你可以瞒得过其他神，不过别想瞒得过我。
value: Come on, Pandora. This is your realm, right? Other gods may have believed your little trick, but not me.

name: 不愧是创世神的洞察力，但遗憾的是您只猜对了一半。
value: You truly have a great perception as a Creator, Lord Chaos. But unfortunately, you are only half right.

name: 那么不妨告诉我没猜对的另一半是什么，小猫咪？
value: So why don't you tell me what the other half is? My little kitty.

name: 另一半嘛，就是并非我引导您至此，而是当您有愿望想实现时，梦境才会打开。
value: The other half is that I am not the one who lead you here. This dreamland will only open to those who have strong desires.

name: 有意思，不过遗憾的是，我没察觉到自己有什么愿望需要实现。
value: Interesting. But I don't sense any desire of mine.

name: 嘻嘻，欲求是不会写在脸上的呢，不妨自己猜猜看呐，创世神大人。
value: Hehe, obviously, the desire cannot reveal itself. Why don't you ask yourself what you want most in the world? My dear Creator.

name: 嗯……这么说来，眼下好像确实有件可以让我找找乐子的事情呢，呵呵……
value: Well... However, I do think there is one thing I would desire to do, hehe...

name: 哎？您为什么一直盯着我，等等……等下！您要做什么？！
value: Geez, why do you stare at me like that? Wait... What're you doing!?

name: 你瞧，通往别处的门不是开了吗？看来好好疼爱你一番是正确的选择呢！
value: Look, the door to other places has opened. It seems that to have fun with you is a good choice~

name: 老实交代吧，小猫咪，到底是怎么回事？
value: To be honest with me, little kitty, what is going on?

name: 呜……如果您不是主动进入梦境的话，就只可能是其他人召唤您了。
value: Waah... If you do not come here by your own will, then maybe others have summoned you here.

name: 嗯？那么你知道这个人是谁吗？
value: Well... Do you know who it is?

name: 我也不知道，但梦境是靠意念相连的，如果召唤您的人意志非常坚定，彼此迟早会相遇。
value: I don't know. However, the dreamland is connected by will. If the one who summoned you has a strong will, you will meet him or her sooner or later.

name: 啊啦……我的魅力有这么大吗？看来有必要抓你一块去见见这个家伙呢，我们走吧。
value: Alas... I don't know that I have such charm. Looks like we have to meet this guy together. Let's hit the road!

name: 我对这些没什么兴趣，带我离开这里就行。
value: I don't care about all these. Just take me out of here.

name: 真是意外，好奇心一向很重的卡俄斯竟然没兴趣，难道是创世神独有的第六感……
value: What a surprise. Chaos, the embodiment of curiosity, doesn't care about it? Is that the sixth sense of the Creator has worked?

name: 没……没什么！我说我们最好尽快离开这里！
value: No...Nothing! I said we'd better go as soon as possible!

name: 卡俄斯大人？好吧，看来您也被困在梦境里了。
value: Lord Chaos? Well, it seems you have been trapped here too.

name: 嗯……？光明圣徒伊卡璐斯？我感觉你不像是会召唤我这位秩序与混沌之神的家伙。
value: Hmm? You are Icarus, the saint of light. I don't think you are the one who summoned me.

name: 如您所言，我并没有召唤您的到来，但我一直在寻求离开这个梦境的方法。
value: Just as you said, it is not me. And I am also finding my way out.

name: 原来是这样，你有什么发现吗？
value: I see. Did you find anything?

name: 战斗似乎是这里唯一的法则，你总会遇到希望较量的对手，或是曾经恐惧的敌人。
value: It seems the only rule here is to battle. You are gonna battle with a serious rival or enemies that you once feared.

name: 呵呵……我明白你的意思了。
坦然地说，您确实是我想挑战的人之一，来吧。
value: To be honest, I have dreamed of the day competing with you. Come on, fight me.

name: 看来创世神的力量，比我想象中更加深不可测。
value: That is the power of the Creator... More unfathomable than I imagine...

name: 并非如此，进入梦境后我感到大部分力量都消失了，但每次击败对手，就会恢复一部分。
value: I don't think I have fully used my power since most of it seems lost when I enter here. However, I can sense its recovery after defeating the enemy.

name: 也就是说，其实整个梦境……是一场试炼？
value: So, is that mean this whole dream is actually... a trial?

name: 我目前没有证据可以证明，不过继续前进的话，应该会有答案。
value: We don't know that for sure. Maybe the answer will reveal itself if we continue our journey.

name: 但愿如此，我们尽快前进吧，通往下一层梦境的传送门已经打开了。
value: I hope so. Let's go. The portal to the next level is open.

name: 赫拉？等等……好像有些不对劲！我可以感觉到她身上弥漫着强大但扭曲的力量。
value: Hera? Wait... Something is wrong. I can sense the mighty but somehow twisted power within her body...

name: 啊啦……看来我们的天后大人在这个梦境里遇到了些麻烦。
value: Alas... It seems our queen has encountered some troubles here.

name: 这是被梦境的深渊之力侵袭所造成的，唔……硬拼的话，我们有把握能取胜吗？
value: I guess the power of the abyss has something to do with that... Do you think we stand a chance if we throw caution to the wind?

name: 这我可不知道，但最好的方式就是亲自试试看！
value: I have no idea. But, at least we can try!

name: 总算是解决了，拥有深渊之力的上位神明真是难对付！
value: Finally... I guess that's the power of a high-level god with the blessing of the abyss.

name: 看来有不少被这种力量侵蚀后产生的幻影，在梦境里游荡，最好小心一些。
value: We'd better be careful. Looks like there are more of these phantoms influenced by the power of the abyss.

name: 无论如何，我都不会认同由你们继承希腊的最高神权。
value: I will never agree to let you take the supreme divine power of greek.

name: 然而希腊的统治权只归于强者，就算再来一次神界战争，我也没什么可畏惧的。
value: It is not up to you. Only the survivor of the battle can decide. I don't mind having another war to see who is the strongest.

name: 虽然我对于权力这种东西已经没什么兴趣了，但我很乐意重新和你较量较量，宙斯……
value: Although I am not interested in the struggle for power, I don't mind having a contest with you, Zeus...

name: 看来希腊神系几千年来没什么改变呐，我以为众神的争端迟早会结束的。
value: Thousands of years have passed. And you Greek gods are still the same, always fighting for power.

name: 卡俄斯？最高神权由强者所掌控，这是上古时期的法则，没有修改和否认的余地。
value: Chaos? Only the strongest can handle the supreme divine power. There is no room to change this ancient rule.

name: 啊啦……别误会，这项法则由我所定，我可没有否认它的意思。
value: Ah... Don't get me wrong. I am the one who made this rule. I would not deny it.

name: 您不会是要……
value: Then, I suppose you want to...

name: 猜对了呢，这么久都没有决出一位真正的强者，看来我要亲自给你们上一课了，呵呵……
value: You are right. What took you so long to decide who is the strongest? I should give you all a lesson now, hehe...

name: 这就是创世神的力量吗……这种程度即使是宙斯恐怕也无法对抗……
value: That's the strength of the Creator... I guess even Zeus cannot compete with her...

name: 真是遗憾……看来后辈们没有我想象中那么强。
value: What a pity... It seems you are not as strong as I thought.

name: 唉，或许命运还没有允许我成为希腊神系的掌控者。
value: Alas, maybe fate has not granted me to become the master of Greek gods...

name: 然而和你的战斗依旧让我挺兴奋，我好像明白一直以来自己期待的是什么了……
value: However, I enjoy the fight with you. Maybe that's what I have been waiting for...

name: 另外，如果你不介意的话，和我一起离开这个梦境，再考虑挑战宙斯她们如何？
value: Also, if you don't mind, what about joining my team? You can think about rechallenging Zeus after we get out.

name: 我也这么想，毕竟很难找到更好的选择了。
value: I think so. I don't have any better options, right?

name: 卡俄斯，混沌与秩序的创造者，呵呵……我对于你出现在梦境深渊并不感到意外。
value: Chaos, the Creator of chaos and order... I am not surprised to see you here.

name: 令人惊讶，你的能力在梦境中变强了很多，去和宙斯争夺最高神权，也并非没有机会。
value: It is surprising to see you become more powerful in this dreamland. I think now you can stand a chance to fight with Zeus.

name: 最高神权曾是我最渴望得到的东西，但现在只不过是无聊的虚荣而已。
value: I have once dreamed of that, to compete for the supreme divine power. However, it now all feels like empty vanity to me.

name: 啊啦……这话可真够意外，我很好奇什么玩意能让嗜权如命的冥王如此着迷。
value: Ah... I am surprised to hear that. I wonder what has changed your mind, the once power-lusting King of Death.

name: 如果想知道这个秘密的话，就用实力让我开口吧，呵呵。
value: If you want to know, you need to beat me first, hehe.

name: 看来即使梦境深渊封印了创世之力，在战斗经验上我依旧不是你的对手……
value: Why... Your genesis power is already sealed by this place, but I still can't defeat you...

name: 那么亲爱的，可以告诉我你的秘密了吗？
value: So my darling, can you tell me your secret now?

name: 这个秘密……和潘多拉魔盒的梦境深渊有关，我听说你是被召唤至此的？
value: This secret... is related to Pandora's box. I heard that someone summoned you here.

name: 据潘多拉的话而言是这样，我本来还挺期待能从召唤我的人手里，收到一张漂亮的邀请函。
value: Pandora has said it too. I thought I would receive a fancy invitation letter from him or her.

name: 如果你感兴趣的话告诉你也无妨，召唤者……听说是个人类。
value: If you are interested, I heard that the summoner is... a human being.

name: 喔，是吗？但是我印象里的哈迪斯，可不会这么大方地给我如此重要的消息。
value: Oh, is that so? I don't remember you being so kind as to give me such important intel.

name: 因为我也很想知道她召唤你的原因，和某个梦境深渊的法则，呵呵……
value: Because I am also interested in knowing why she summoned you and how this place works.

name: 如果想知道的话，不如和我一块去问问她怎么样？
value: If you want to know, why don't you join me and we can ask her together?

name: 我还在想为什么波塞冬和哈迪斯没有追上来，原来她们已经被击败了。
value: I was wondering why Poseidon and Hades didn't catch up with me. Now I see that they were all defeated and joined you.

name: 啊啦……感到压力了吗，亲爱的？
value: Ah... My dear, does that make you anxious?

name: 你在开玩笑？即使是面对创世神，我也不会有任何畏惧，我必须要证明自己的实力。
value: Are you kidding? I will not have any fear even facing you, the mighty Creator.

name: 你的气势我挺中意的，如果能击败我，那么获得波塞冬和哈迪斯的认同，也并不是难事。
value: I appreciate your courage. If you defeat me, I guess they will recognize your position as always.

name: 那么没有必要多说什么了，来吧！
value: Then we have nothing more to say. Come on!

name: 呵呵……我秩序与混沌的掌控者卡俄斯，将亲自测试你的能力。
value: Hehe, I, Chaos, the master of order and chaos, will test your ability myself.

name: 看来我远远低估了创世神的力量。
value: I guess... I have underestimated your power...

name: 一场让人兴奋的较量不是吗，我感到越和强大的对手战斗，力量回归得也越快……
value: What an exciting contest, isn't it? I feel that the stronger my opponent is, the quicker my strength will recover...

name: 在梦境深渊内，所有人原本的力量都会失去，不断挑战强大的对手，这些力量才能回归。
value: In this dreamland, all original power will be lost. Only by challenging more and more powerful foes can those power be recovered.

name: 而这份力量，据说最终将帮你实现内心中的愿望。
value: And that, it is said that this power can make your wish come true.

name: 原来如此……但遗憾的是，我依旧还是没察觉有什么真正想要的东西。
value: Well... Unfortunately, I still don't know what I want.

name: 这可不好说，没准穿过下一扇梦境之门时，你就会看到答案了。
value: It's too early to say that. Maybe you can find the answer through the door to the next dreamland.

name: 啊啦……好吧，在这一连串让人疲倦的战斗之后，我希望答案是个豪华而舒适的浴缸……
value: Ah... Well, I hope the answer will be a luxury and comfortable bathtub...

name: 哟，创世神卡俄斯……看看你身后众神的阵势可真够吓人的，这是打算毁灭世界？
value: Yo, isn't this the Creator, Chaos? Look at all those goddesses behind you. Are you preparing to destroy the world?

name: 别开玩笑了，距离上次见面已经过去了几万年，我可没想到在梦境还有机会遇见你。
value: Stop kidding, Erebus. It has been tens of thousands of years... I wasn't expecting to meet you here.

name: 不过你的出现，也意味着召唤咒文成功了，哼……
value: Seeing you here, I guess the summoning has succeeded...

name: 说到召唤咒文，你好像知道些内情嘛，亲爱的，召唤创世神的代价可是很大的。
value: Speaking of the summoning, it seems you know something about it. You know the price to summon the Creator, right?

name: 的确是这样，然而告诉你内情之前，不该和老朋友先打个招呼、叙叙旧吗？呵呵……
value: Indeed. But as an old friend, don't you think we should first warm up a little?

name: 啊啦……几万年没亲热，觉得寂寞了？那就让我好好疼爱疼爱你再说吧。
value: Someone feels lonely when I am not around, huh? Then, let me give you some entertainment...

name: 哎？这就吃不消了？我还打算玩点更刺激的呐。
value: Ahh, is that too much for you? I am gonna bring something more exciting... hehe...

name: 不打了……你的战斗方式和以前一样那么暴力……
value: Stop, stop... You just won't get out of your fighting way, so violent!

name: 那么回到正题，我被召唤的原因究竟是什么？
value: So, let's get back to the point. Why was I summoned?

name: 潘多拉魔盒内的梦境，只要怀有强大执念就能够进入这里，这你已经知道了。
value: If you have an intense obsession, then you can enter this dreamland in Pandora's box, right?

name: 不久前我听说一个人类进入了梦境，而这个家伙的身份，我相信你并不陌生。
value: Not long ago, I heard a human being had entered here. And I am sure you know her well...

name: 让我印象深刻的人类只有一个，难道……
value: A human being I knew... You mean...

name: 呵呵……她在现实世界中，并不至于强大到让我们神明感到压力。
value: Hehe... Although she is not that powerful in the real world,

name: 但在这里，她已经强到让众神无奈的地步了，我们都很惊讶人类竟然有如此恐怖的潜能。
value: but in here, she is now more powerful than any gods... We are surprised to see that potential lives in a human being.

name: 还真是个麻烦的家伙，她在哪？
value: What a problem... Where is she?

name: 别急，再穿过两扇梦境之门，你就会见到她了，我们出发吧。
value: Calm down. You will meet her in no time. Let's go.

name: 您总算来了，创世神，我们等您很久了。
value: Finally, you came, the Creator. We have been waiting for you for so long.

name: 倪克丝？你为什么会出现在梦境里？你也有希望实现的愿望吗？
value: Nyx? Why are you here? What wish could you have?

name: 我、厄瑞玻斯和盖亚三大原始神有着共同的愿望，就是寻回原本失去的神力。
value: Erebus, Gaia, and I, the three origin gods, all have the same wish: to find our lost divine power.

name: 然而糟糕的是，我们遇到了不小的麻烦，不得不暂时放弃。
value: But we then get into troubles...

name: 啊啦……麻烦的原因，和那个人类有关吧？
value: Alas... the trouble, I guess, has something to do with that human being, right?

name: 是啊，那个天真但可怕的家伙守在梦境深渊的最后一道门前，所有人都出不去了。
value: Yes. That innocent but terrible being guards the final door of this dreamland so that no one can get out of here.

name: 有意思，我有兴趣好好和她较量一番了。
value: Interesting. I cannot wait to fight with her.

name: 梦境深渊的法则是力量的争夺，战胜我的话，我的力量也会融入您的灵魂，助您一臂之力。
value: The rule of the dreamland is all about the fight over power. My power will become part of your strength if you have defeated me. That might be helpful.

name: 相对地，如果我彻底认输的话，你也将获得我的力量，没错吧？
value: Also, if you beat me, you would acquire my power. Am I right?

name: 呵呵……从古至今，我可从没见过您向谁认输过，不是吗？
value: Hehe... But I haven't seen you yield to anyone, right?

name: 如何，倪克丝？即使暂时失去创世之力，我的战斗也没让你失望吧？
value: How about this, Nyx? Even if I lost my genesis power, this kind of battle didn't let you down, right?

name: 在获得我的力量后，您应该能和那个人类一较高下了。
value: I think you may stand a chance to beat that human being after getting my power.

name: 我欠你个人情，如果不介意的话，离开梦境后我会好好请你喝一杯。
value: I owe you one. I will buy you a drink after all this if you don't mind.

name: 许久没见了，秩序与混沌之主，卡俄斯。
value: Long time no see Chaos, the Lord of order and chaos.

name: 盖亚，你败给那个人类我挺惊讶的，身为原始神，你的力量几乎与我不相上下。
value: Gaia, I am surprised a human defeated you since you and I all share comparable power as the origin god.

name: 我们原本的力量在这个梦境里没有多少意义，战斗意志和执念才是最重要的力量来源。
value: Our original strength means nothing here. The will and obsession in the battle is the primary source of the power.

name: 虽然您自认为没有想实现的愿望，但我感受到了您享受战斗的喜悦。
value: Although you think you don't have any wish, I do sense your bliss for continuous battles.

name: 啊啦……你猜的没错，我并不否认这一点。
value: Alas... I guess you are right.

name: 身为创世神，在现实世界中无敌于天下的您，或许最大的愿望就是挑战更强的对手。
value: As a Creator, you are more powerful than anyone in the real world. Maybe your biggest wish is to find one opponent that is stronger than you.

name: 而这也是我与那个人类产生的召唤咒文产生共鸣，来到这个梦境的原因吧？
value: And that is why I find resonance with that summon spell cast by that human...

name: 您终于意识到了，而那个人类的愿望，也正是“挑战众神中最强的存在”。
value: Indeed. And her wish is precisely the opposite of yours: to challenge the most powerful god.

name: 呵……这也是一种宿命，不是吗？既然如此，就让这场派对更热闹些吧！
value: Heh... I guess it is meant to be like that. In that case, why don't we bring more fun to this party?

name: 看来没有再战斗下去的必要了，您的战斗力已经远远在我之上，我认输。
value: I think there is no need to continue our battle. I surrender. Your power is way stronger than mine.

name: 在获得你的力量后，我感到创世之力已经回到了自己的灵魂中，而且……比以前还要强大。
value: After getting your strength, I sense that genesis power is returning to me. And... it is more powerful than any time.

name: 没错，以您现在的力量甚至足以改变梦境深渊的规则，直接带领我们从这里离开。
value: That's right. Now, your power is so strong that you can even change the rule of this place, which means you can take us away right now.

name: 这确实是一个稳妥的方式，但这样做会有什么后果吗？
value: This is a quick fix, but what is the consequence?

name: 一旦改变规则，那个人类将因为愿望无法实现，而独自一人在梦境中徘徊，直至永远。
value: Once the rule has changed, that human will be alone in this dreamland, wandering forever because her wish can not come true.

name: 对于她来说，这未免太残酷了……
value: It seems so cruel to let her be trapped here.

name: 但如果您选择满足她的愿望，接受挑战的话，一旦失败，创世之力也将会被她夺走。
value: But if you choose to fulfill her wish and accept the challenge, there is a chance you will lose everything, including your genesis power.

name: 这意味着我将失去一切，是吗……？以刚才和你的战斗来看，盖亚，你认为我有几分胜算？
value: Lose everything... Gaia, based on our battle, what are the chances if I am against her?

name: 她很强，强到让众神畏惧的程度，如果说我认为胜算仅有50%，您会作何选择呢？
value: She is strong, strong enough to frighten most of the gods. If I say it is fifty-fifty, what would you choose?

name: 我依旧会享受这场最后的战斗。
value: I will still enjoy this last battle.

name: 您依旧和以前一样从不服输呢，希腊众神将共同见证这场战斗，愿您武运昌隆……
value: Hmm, you are still the same, so competitive. All Greek gods will witness this battle together. Wish you good luck.

name: 为了希腊神系的未来，我不应冒这个险。
value: I will not take chances on the future of the Greek gods.

name: 希腊神系的未来确实无比重要，但我也为那个人类感到惋惜。
value: The future of the Greek gods is indeed important. But that poor thing...

name: 这份永恒的孤独，也是她需要面对的命运，就如同我创世前那漫长的混沌时代。
value: This ultimate loneliness is the fate she needs to face, just like me in the chaos time before I create the world.

name: 愿命运引导她的灵魂，梦境出口已经打开，事不宜迟，我们离开这里吧。
value: Wish that fate could lead her soul. The exit of the dreamland is open. Let's get out of this place.

name: 你终于来了，我等待这一刻已经很久了……
value: You finally came. I have been waiting for this moment for so long...

name: 啊啦……果然是你呢，不得不说，你现在的这身打扮，比学生装要帅气多了。
value: Alas... I thought it would be you. I have to say you look more charming in that suit.

name: 哼哼，如果你认为我有所改变的只是外貌，接下来恐怕就得吃苦头了。
value: Hmmm... If you think the only thing that has changed is my appearance, maybe you gotta pay for that later.

name: 是吗，亲爱的？我一直不觉得自己有理由输给你……等等！这难道是……！
value: Is that so, my dear? I don't think I have a reason to lose to you... Wait! Is that...

name: 你能感受到吧？我灵魂中那与你极为相似的力量……
value: You can feel it, right? The similar power in my soul...

name: 创世之力？！不可能！没有神明血统的你，怎么可能继承这种力量？！
value: The genesis power!? It is impossible! You don't even have the blood of a god. Why can you have such power in your soul?

name: 不要小看人类的可能性，希腊的创世神卡俄斯，准备好迎接派对最后的高潮了吗？
value: Never underestimate a human being, the origin god of Greek, Chaos. Are you ready to face the prime of this party?

name: 来吧，我保证这场游戏不会让你感到无趣的。
value: Come on. l assure you this will be fun.

name: 我终究是输了吗……看来我太天真了……
value: I lose... It seems I'm only flesh and blood after all...

name: 我很好奇，你为什么这么执着于战胜我……
value: I am curious why you are obsessed with defeating me...

name: 呵……现实中的我，虽然身为你们所有神明的指挥官……
value: Well... In the real world, although I am the commander of all gods...

name: 但同伴们真的认为我是值得追随的人吗？我真的能给她们带来信念与荣耀吗？
value: I don't think these gods truly believe I am the one worth following. I doubt myself whether I can bring faith and honor to my followers.

name: 我原本想通过这场战斗的胜利，去证明自己是一名真正的领袖，哪怕我只是人类。
value: I thought by deleting you, I could prove that even though I am a human being, I can be a true leader.

name: 但没想到，即使拥有和你一样的创世之力，我却依旧以失败告终……
value: I did not expect this failure... Why do I lose to you even though I possess the genesis power same as you...

name: 现实中的你，的确没有众神中最强的战斗技巧。
value: In reality, you indeed don't have the best fighting skills.

name: 然而你却拥有着众神难以具备的无私、团结、智慧、以及勇气之心。
value: However, what you have is more precious: selflessness, unity value, wisdom, and bravery. Those are the gods' lack.

name: 即使没有取得胜利，但在我心中你依旧是众神的领袖，从这场战斗起，至世界毁灭之时。
value: Even if you lose, you are still the leader of all gods till the end of the world.

name: ……我明白了，有你这番话，或许能让我斩断心中的那分犹豫。
value: ... I see. Your words... means a lot to me... It relieves me from my doubt.

name: 哼，这才像我认识的勇者！走吧，如此激烈的战斗过后，我已经等不及要泡进浴缸了……
value: Humph, that's the person I know! Let's get the hell out of here. I can't wait to soak in the bathtub...

name: 祈祷女神的祝福可以增加每日使用次数，是否前往祈祷？
value: Purchase the Angel Blessings can add Quick Combat times, confirm to check?

name: ACTIVITY_NEW_PLAYER_WISH_SUMMON_NOT_GET_REWARD_CONTENT
value: The Beginner's Luck summon event is ended. The unclaimed rewards is sent by mail.

name: FAST_FIGHT_MONTH_TIPS
value: You can gain 2 hours of Idle Rewards for every Quick Combat (You have Mostly Card, so this time of Quick Combat is free, and it is not counted to Quick Combat purchase)

name: 用于提升卡俄斯的梦境中记忆宝珠的等级
value: Used to upgrade the level of the Memoria Orb in Chaos' Dreamland

name: 卡俄斯女神碎片自选箱
打开宝箱选择卡俄斯任意品质的碎片
value: Open the box and choose Chaos' Shards of any quality

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_76
value: My genesis power can rule order and chaos!

name: 玩家等级主要通过挂机提高
提高战斗力，通过跟多副本关卡
value: Increases  CR to complete more dungeons

name: 提高战斗力，在天空塔上攀登高峰
value: Increases CR to clear more stories

name: 购买后可一键领取
value: Purchase to one-tap claim all rewards

name: 解锁可立即获得以下奖励
value: Unlock to get the following rewards

value: Unlock the Advance Supply to get the following rewards

name: 开通月卡可额外获得免费快速挂机次数

value: The Airship will reappear after the countdown ends.

name: 每天只能点赞一次
value: You can only LIKE once per day

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_29
value: The goddess of thunder and power in the Norse mythology and also in control of storms, war, and agriculture.

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_28
value: The deity of mischief and trickery in Norse mythology, as well as  the deity of fire. Originally a giant, she joined Asa because of her friendship with Odin.

name: ABYSS_FAST_BATTLE_MAX
value: You can only quick-explore once per day

name: 今天已经扫荡过了
value: You can only quick-explore once per day

value: {0} Merchant(s) appear in this time's quick-explore

name: 恭喜您已经通过最高副本，后续更新敬请期待
value: Congratulations, you have passed the highest level! Stay tuned for future updates~

name: 只能购买1种商品，购买后商人会离开。
value: You can only buy 1 item and the Merchant will leave after the purchase.

name: 只有相同的圣物可以继承品质，只有女神限定圣物可以继承觉醒
value: Relic Quality Inherit only applies to the same Relic, Relic Awaken Inherit only applies to Angel's Limited Relic

name: 仅继承品质，不改变圣物随机属性
value: Inherit the Relic's quality only and its attributes will not be changed.

name: 通关墨西哥城全部关卡
每次行动时，对敌方全体造成卡俄斯最大生命值2%的真实伤害
value: When Chaos is in action, deals True Damage equal to 2% of Chaos' Max HP to all enemies.

name: 品质相同，请重新选择
value: Relics have the same quality; please choose another relic

name: 觉醒等级相同，请重新选择
value: Relics have the same awaken level; please choose another relic

用于提升丘比特梦境中记忆宝珠的等级

打开宝箱选择丘比特任意品质的碎片
value: Open the chest and choose Cupid's Shards of any quality

value: The Scary Journey event is ended. All the Bat and Pumpkin Head are automatically converted to diamonds.

name: 挑战公会boss1次
value: Participated in the guild boss 1 times
