value: Consume {0} Pumpkin Head to unlock this level

name: 进入战斗时，丘比特自身异常抵抗提升100%，持续1回合（不可驱散）。每回合行动时，使我方全体获得【坚定】状态（不可驱散），每层【坚定】提升5%异常抵抗，持续2回合（提升效果可叠加，回合数可刷新但不叠加）。
value: When entering the battle, increases Cupid's Debuff RES by 100% for 1 round (cannot be dispelled). When in action, inflicits a [Staunch] to all allies (cannot be dispelled). Each stacks of [Staunch] will increase the Debuff RES by 5% for 2 rounds (This effect can stack but the duration will only be refreshed when activated again).

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_77
value: An Angel is falling in love and desperate for someone's response.

name: 头好痛……我在做梦吗？以及……潘多拉？你为什么会在这里？
value: Aah, my head... Am I dreaming... Pandora? Why are you here?

name: 嘻嘻……看来如我所料的一样，你也误入梦境深渊了呐。
value: Hehe... Just as I expected. You had strayed into a dreamland abyss.

name: 等下！你是不是在耍什么花招？你的表情让我嗅到了恶作剧的气息！
value: Wait! What are you planning? I have a sense that you are pranking me now.

name: 别这么说，爱神大小姐，只有抱持难以释怀的愿望之人，才会来到这里。
value: Why do you say that? My dear Love Lady. This is the place for those who hold strong wishes.

name: 啊！我想起来了！我每天晚上都发誓，要成为全世界最伟大的爱情使者！
value: If you say so... okay... Is it because I swear every night that I will become the most excellent Ambassador of love?

name: ……好吧，你的愿望还真够离谱的，那么祝你好运。
value: ...Well. That's pretty much a big wish. Good luck with achieving that.

name: 哎？你不是来帮我达成愿望的吗？
value: Alas? I thought you were here to help me with that.

name: 当然不是！我只是个引路人罢了，可没兴趣照顾你。
value: Me? Of course NOT! I am only a guide. I don't have the time to take care of you.

name: 真是不负责任！像你这样的坏孩子要好好地教训一下呢！
value: How irresponsible! I guess someone needs a lesson from me.

name: 喂！等……等下！你要做什么？！
value: What? Wait... stop! What are you doing?!

name: 我认输了，快停手！
value: I yield. I yield! Stop that.

name: 咦？我的力量好像下降了很多呢……老实交代，这是你恶作剧的结果吗？！
value: Gee, I sense my power is not as strong as before... Tell me, is that your doing?!

name: 呃……很明显不是这样，你的力量遗失在梦境的各处，只有自己才能找回来。
value: Well... Definitely not me! Your power is scattered in this dreamland, and you need to find them by yourself.

name: 哎呀，现在这话是不是应该改成“我会帮你一块找回来”更合适呢？
value: You'd better add I will help you to find them at the end.

name: 时间不早啦，亲爱的，告诉我接下来要去哪儿？
value: It's late now. My dear, where will we be going?

name: 真糟糕，我发现自己的脑海里已经忘了“爱情”是什么了……
value: How terrible. I found that I have forgotten what love really is...

name: 嗯？这有什么关系吗？
value: Huh? What does this have anything to do with our trip?

name: 当然有关系啦！爱神的力量可是来自于对爱情的理念，如果连这个都忘了……
value: It sure does! The power of a love angel comes from the belief in love. If I already forget that...

name: 呵呵……或许这是件好事，你以前对爱情那套死板的规则，可把人类整得够惨。
value: Hehe... Maybe that's a good thing. Your stupid rule of love really f**ked those human beings.

name: 请问这里是……哎？！你们是……潘多拉和丘比特？
value: Hello there... Alas?! Pandora and Cupid?

name: 哎？！你为什么会在梦境里，难道你也有想实现的愿望吗？
value: You... Why are you here? For an unachieved wish?

name: 呃……确切说是的，我忘了自己真正的名字，好像只有回想起来后才能离开梦境。
value: Ugh... Yes? I forget my real name... I guess if I want to leave here, I need to recall my name.

name: 这可真够滑稽的……我们来打一场如何？如果你赢了的话，我就告诉你原本的名字。
value: Funny... What about a fight? If you win, I will tell you your name.

name: 如果你输了，就要告诉我爱情在你心中的含义，如何？
value: If you lose, you gonna tell me what love means to you. How about that?

name: 哟，这主意不错，来吧！
value: That's a good idea. Come on!

name: 啊……你比我想象中难对付得多……
value: Ah... You are tougher than I expected.

name: 哼哼，那么遵守约定，告诉我你对爱情的看法吧。
value: Humph. So, tell me your opinion about love.

name: 呃……我也说不上来，但或许爱情……是一种朦胧的期待？
value: Ugh... I really can't tell. But maybe, love is a hazy expectation.

name: 朦胧地期待……吗？一个有趣的答案，我会好好记下来的。
value: Hazy expectation... Well, that is an interesting answer.

name: 等下！你真的不打算说出我的真名吗？我还指望着能离开这里呢！
value: Wait! You really do not intend to tell me my real name? I want to get out!

name: 别担心，亲爱的，我可不是这么无情的家伙，在取回力量之后，我会告诉你的，回头见！
value: Don't worry, my love. I am not such a cruel angel. I will tell you... after I retrieve my power! See you later~

name: 我感觉到自己的一部分力量就在附近，看来没走错路呢。
value: I sense that some part of my power is around here. We have come to the right place.

name: 嗯？罗马的小爱神丘比特？难不成你来这里，是为了找回自己丢失的力量？
value: Humph? Isn't this Cupid, the little love angel of Rome? Let me guess. You are here to get back your lost power.

name: 猜得未免太准了些！那份力量在你手上吧？
value: That's right! Don't tell me you laid your dirty hands into my power.

name: 没错，而且我并不打算还给你哟。
value: Indeed. And I am not going to hand it over to you.

name: 那恐怕就要让你吃点苦头啦！
value: Then, I guess you are about to suffer a bit!

name: 你这张可爱的脸，和你打架时的暴力程度可真不相称……
value: Does anyone tell you that your cute face looks so inconsistent with your fighting style?

name: 哎，为什么你会对爱神的力量这么执着？
value: You tell me why you are so obsessed with the power of love first.

name: 喔唷……看来你很难理解，在月亮上一个人呆几千年是什么感觉。
value: Mmm... You don't know what it feels like to live alone on the moon for thousands of years...

name: 你不会是想使用我的力量去……召唤某个人？
value: So, you are going to use my power to summon someone to... be with you?

name: 是啊，她和你一样精于弓箭，是我的故友……然而遗憾的是，她并没有降临这个世界。
value: Yeah. She has good archery skills, just like you. My old friends... However, she didn't come here.

name: 我挺想见见这个人的，哪怕只能在梦里。
value: I really wish to meet her here, even just in this dream.

name: 在我看来沉醉于梦境，只会带给人更多失望罢了，亲爱的。
value: But you will always wake up in the end. The dream only brings out more frustration.

name: 或许如你所言，但至少爱情对于我来说，意味着一种思念。
value: Maybe yes, maybe no. But at least I can feel love through these longing feelings.

name: 思念么？感觉挺沉重的，但又有那么一丝温馨……
value: Longing? It sounds a little bit strong but somewhat sweet...

name: 你会继续寻找自己遗失的力量吧？让我也来帮帮你好了……
value: You are about to continue to find your lost power, right? Let me help you then...

name: 丘比特，来打一场吧！我很期待爱神的力量能让我的火焰变强多少！
value: Cupid, come and fight with me! I am very curious about how the power of love can enhance my fire!

name: 天哪……我早该料到自己的力量，有可能会落到某些性格糟糕的家伙手上……
value: Gosh... I should know that my power may end up in someone like her...

name: 我们不能坐下来好好谈谈吗？比如说你把力量还给我，我请你吃烤肉？
value: Can we just sit down and talk? I can take you to the barbecue if you are willing to give my power back.

name: 想法不错！让我们开始餐前运动吧！
value: Good idea! Let's take a before-meal exercise!

name: 等一下！你是不是没听明白我说的话？！
value: Wait! Do you even understand what I said before?!

name: 真够呛，衣服差点被烧光，我这辈子再也不想和火龙打交道了……
value: I am this close to getting all my clothes burnt. Never and ever will I talk to anyone who can play with fire.

name: 太可惜了，没想到即使获得了这么强的力量，竟然还会输给你。
value: It's a shame to lose to you after getting such great power.

name: 我的力量可没这么容易驾驭，如果你对爱情没什么深刻的理念，是发挥不出来的。
value: You really underestimate my power. If you don't have deep insights into love, I don't think you can master it.

name: 深刻的理念？爱情不就是用如火焰般炽热的拥抱和亲吻，把你喜欢的家伙淹没么？
value: Deep insights? To me, love is overwhelming hugs and hot kisses, burning yourself and the one you love with fire, right?

name: 如果这个家伙不答应和你交往，就把他打晕带回巢穴里，直到他同意为止。
value: If someone does not accept your courting, just knock her out and take her back to your crib. She will agree eventually.

name: 你为什么摆出这么一副惊讶的表情？爱情在我看来就这么简单。
value: What? Why do you look so surprised? That's what love means to me!

name: 在我发疯之前，我还是快点去下一个梦境比较好……
value: Before I go mad and knock you out, you'd better get out of my sight...

name: 喂！把我带上！力量还给你了！你还欠我一顿烤肉！
value: Wait! Bring me with you! I give back your power, and you owe me one barbecue!

name: 冻死我了……这个梦境简直比北极还寒冷……
value: It's freezing... Where is this place...

name: 一点也不奇怪，这个梦境是冰霜龙母的意志所诞生的。
value: I am not impressed since this dream is the product of that Frost Dragon.

name: 千万别告诉我是你那个没有任何感情、冷得像块万年坚冰的北欧龙族姐妹。
value: Frost Dragon? Do you mean that cold as hell b***h?

name: 别担心，我们人多，等会要是打起来胜算肯定不会小。
小爱神丘比特吗？我知道你是来寻找自己丢失的力量。
value: You are Cupid, the angel of love. I know you come here to find your power.

name: 还好您是个通情达理的人，既然您已经知道了我的来意，那么……
value: Finally, understanding beings. Since you know why I am here, why don't you...

name: 非常遗憾，然而我并不打算把这份力量还给你。
value: I am sorry. I will not give it back.

name: 你看，我就说没必要废话吧，想说服她把力量还给你基本等于做白日梦，开打啦！
value: See, I know there is no need to talk with her. Let's just fight!

name: 真是难对付！我这辈子也不会再想和冰龙打交道了！
value: This is tougher than I thought! You are really good with your ice skill.

name: 看来，这份力量终究不属于我……
value: I guess this power is just not mine...

name: 唉……我原以为像您这样存在，已经不在意爱情这种东西了。
value: I thought you didn't care about love since you have seen so many of it.

name: 呵呵，恰恰相反，无论是人或神，都看重自己没有，或是难以得到的东西。
value: Hehe, on the contrary. God or human, they all put more emphasis on things they don't have or are difficult to get.

name: 虽然时间很短，但你的力量让我体验到了一种不曾有过的温暖，仿佛某个人的陪伴一样。
value: Though the time is short, your power gives me a sense of warmth. It's just like I am with someone.

name: 或许这就是所谓爱情的感觉吧，稍纵即逝，但让人无比珍惜。
value: Maybe that's what love feels like. Fleeting but precious.

name: 听您这么说，多少让我多了一丝安慰。
value: I feel comforted by hearing you say that.

name: 那么，作为给你带来麻烦的歉意，我就帮你一同取回丢失的力量吧。
value: So, as an apology for your trouble, I will help you to retrieve your lost power.

name: 在经历前两个梦境后，遇见你我一点也不感到意外。
value: I am not surprised to meet you here after what I have experienced.

name: 而我也很清楚你迟早会站在我的面前。
value: And I am pretty sure I will see you here, standing right behind me.

name: 所以我猜，在我把遗失在你这里的力量取回来前，一场战斗是在所难免的，你说呢？
value: I guess you and I have to fight before I can take my power from you, right?

name: 啊啦，我喜欢和说话直接而聪明的家伙打交道。
value: Hehe, that's why I like to talk with smart people.

name: 那么让我们开始吧，哼哼！
你比以前强大了很多！相较于其他人，你很擅长运用从我这里得到的力量！
value: You are much more powerful than before! And your mastery of my power... much better than my two previous opponents!

name: 雷电、风暴本身就和爱情一样多变而随性，你不觉得吗？
value: Maybe it is because the thunder is just as random and free as love.

name: 正是如此，我才能将这份力量协调得这么完美。
你这副性格我倒是一点也不讨厌呢，哼哼……
value: Humph, I found your disposition quite attractive...

name: 哟，你这话是在暗示什么吗，亲爱的？
value: What are you implying, my dear?

name: 啊啦，原来小爱神脸红的样子也很可爱呢。
value: Alas, you look pretty when you blush.

name: 让我加入你寻找力量的旅程如何？我挺想看看这件事发展到最后会多有趣。
value: Let me join your trip to gather your lost power. I would like to see how all these will end.

name: 啊……我这辈子最不想见到的麻烦家伙出现了……
value: Ah... The last guy in the world I wanted to see is here...

name: 哼，作为响应我召唤而来的爱情使者，这是什么失礼的话！
value: Humph, you are just a little angel of love. How rude are you!

name: 希腊的天后赫拉阁下，您在爱情上有着自己的命运，即使是爱神也并不能扭转。
value: Lady Hera, my dear queen. Love has its own path. Even I can't change it.

name: 为了得到我心目中完美的爱情，我实在太需要你的帮助了。
value: I really need your help in getting the perfect love on my mind.

name: 如果你不愿帮我，那么我只能依照梦境深渊的规则，夺取你全部的力量，独自去改变一切！
value: Suppose you are not willing to help me. Then, I will take all your power and change the rule by myself!

name: 唉，即使拼尽全力，我最终还是输了，爱情已经彻底抛弃我了吗……
value: I have tried my best, but I lost... Is love already abandoned me?

name: 我其实很想知道，您是怎么看待爱情本身的。
value: I wonder what love means to you.

name: 还有什么比忠诚于彼此更重要的呢？即使贵为天后，爱情依旧是两个人的游戏。
value: Loyalty. It means everything to me. Even though I am the queen of all gods, love is something that only can be shared through two beings.

name: 而我的爱情却始终要面对众神的猜疑，经历各种磨难和考验，这未免太不公平了。
value: But my love has to face the suspect by all gods, wanting through all the difficulties... It is not fair!

name: 和您所想的恰恰相反，风平浪静的爱情是不存在的。
value: On the contrary, there is no love without trials.

name: 爱情经历的曲折让它更有价值，如同钻石也需要打磨之后，才能焕发光辉一样。
value: The troubles you meet when you are in love make love more precious. Just like diamonds, if you want it to shine, you must polish it first.

name: 您对于爱情的忠诚，也始终是最珍贵的宝物，它最终是不会让您失望的。
value: Your loyalty to love is precious too. It will reward you eventually in someday.

name: ……好吧，如果真的是这样，我或许也并不需要爱神的力量，来改变这一切。
value: ...Well. Maybe I don't need your power to change everything if that's the case.

name: 祝您好运，天后阁下。
value: Good luck with finding your love, my lady.

name: 嗯？看来有只调皮的小猫眯嗅到了爱情的气味，闯入我的梦境了呢。
value: Well, is that a cute kitty who smells love and breaks into my dream?

name: 北欧爱神芙蕾雅！把我遗失在你这里的力量交出来！不然我的箭就要落到你的头顶啦！
value: Freyja! Hands over my power, or I will shoot your head!

name: 哎呀呀，同为爱情女神，不觉得如果我立刻答应的话，就太无趣了吗？
value: Alas, we are all goddesses of love. No need to act like that. Would it be boring if I just agreed to hand it over?

name: 那么一场较量应该会让你提起兴趣吧，哼哼……
value: Fight me, then. That will be more interesting.

name: 挺有自信的嘛，然而，你似乎忘了我的另一个身份呢……
value: You are confident. But... you have forgotten something...

name: 北欧女武神统领者，英灵殿战争领主，在此向你挑战，来吧！
value: I am also the Commander of Norse Valkyrie, Lord of the War of Valhalla. Come on! Let's fight!

name: 一场精彩的战斗，不是吗？
value: That is a brilliant fight, isn't it?

name: 哼，很让我尽兴呢，我以为你只是个不谙世事的孩子罢了。
value: I enjoy it very much. I used to think you were just an inexperienced child.

name: 小瞧我可是要吃大亏的呐。
value: You will suffer if you underestimate my power.

name: 你的实力很让我青睐呢，要不要放弃罗马神系的神格，到北欧的英灵殿来？
value: By the way, is there any chance you can join our Valhalla and give up your Rome deity?

name: 我向你保证，在北欧有更大的舞台，能让你好好发挥自己的实力。
value: I assure you that, in our Nordic area, there will be a lot of opportunities for you.

name: 如果有一天我玩腻了，想认真干点大事的时候，我会考虑的，哼哼。
value: Maybe. I will consider your offer if I get bored of all these and want to do something serious.

name: 我感到只剩最后一块力量碎片没有找到了，会在哪儿呢……
value: There seems only one part of my power is out there. Where is it...

name: 嗯……你的感觉没错呢，前辈。
value: Hmm... You do have good instincts.

name: 大和的爱情使者，缘结神？好吧，这可真是命运的安排。
value: Enmusubi, the love angel of Yamato? All right, that's the fate that plays tricks on me.

name: 您遗失的最后一份力量，现在在我手上，但我并不想占为己有。
value: Your last lost power is in my hand. And I do not want to keep it to myself.

name: 哎？！这是太阳从西边出来了吗？我可真没想过事情会解决得如此简单！
value: Really?! That's unusual. I never thought this could be solved so easily.

name: 但我希望您答应我一件事，就是在得到完整的力量后，能全力与我一战。
value: But I hope you promise one thing. Don't go easy on me when you can fight with me with your full power.

name: 看来你和我一样，对潘多拉魔盒许下过相同的愿望，对吧？
value: I guess you have wished the same thing as I am, right?

name: 前辈对于爱情、缘分的理念，从千年前就和我有着巨大的分歧……
value: Your ideas about love and destiny are much different from mine thousands of years ago...

name: 而所有爱神的力量，都源于这些理念，现在不正是证明谁的理念更有价值的时刻吗？
value: But our power is all coming from that ideas. So, now is the perfect moment to prove who is right!

name: 有趣，那么就让我看看，我们彼此谁更能胜任“最强大的爱情使者”这一名号吧！
value: Interesting. Let's see who can win the title of the most powerful angel of love!

name: 到此为止吧，我认输了，虽然已经拼上了所有的神力，但还是你略胜一筹。
呼……找回力量的感觉真是让我兴奋，仿佛重生了一般。
value: Phew... I feel wonderful to have all my power back. Like I have been reborn.

name: 那么，前辈在经历这么多麻烦后，依旧会坚持自己对爱情的理念才是正确的吗？
value: So, are you still trust in your belief in love after all this?

name: 是，我会坚持自己的道路！
value: Yes, I will insist on going on my path.

name: 那我就破例为您打开特别的梦境之门吧，让我看看前辈的“坚持”能否战胜更强大的对手。
value: Then, I will open a special gate for you. Let's see how far your persistence can hold you.

name: 哼，我可没那么容易退缩，倒不如说，我很期待面对更强的挑战！
value: Humph, I will not easily be cowed. The challenge only excites my nerve.

name: 呵呵……我相信前辈是不会后悔的，祝您武运昌隆。
value: Hehe... I know you will not regret it. Come on. I am looking forward to it.

name: 不，对于爱情，每个人都有自己的答案。
value: No. Love cannot easily be defined. We all have an answer.

name: 这个回答……呵呵，前辈似乎变得更成熟了呢。
value: It seems you have learned a lot on this trip.

name: 与其强求一个答案，不如让人们自己慢慢体会，爱情的魅力不也正是如此吗？
value: You can't force everyone to have the same answer, but let them feel on their own. And that's what is fascinating about love.

name: 我会期待人们亲自向所爱之人，射出爱情箭矢的那一天到来……
value: I will look forward to the day when people can send their own love arrow by themselves.

name: 我不在的这段时间，你玩得挺开心嘛，小捣蛋？
value: You seem to enjoy yourself much when I am not around, my naughty girl.

name: 母……母亲大人？！您怎么会在这儿？！
value: Ma... Mother?! Why are you here?!

name: 我在听完你激昂的胜利宣言后，决定亲自进入梦境，试试你的力量。
value: I heard your speech on love. And maybe, I owe you a lesson about it.

name: 告诉我，亲爱的，什么是爱情？
value: Tell me, my love. What is love, really?

name: 一点朦胧的期待，伴随着长久的思念，炽热如火但又温馨如蜜，时而随性但却终将永恒。
value: A bit of hazy expectation with longing; It burns like fire but sweet as honey; It feels random and selfish but will last forever.

name: 虽然这说法并不让人觉得惊天动地，但这就是我现在对爱情的理念。
value: Maybe that sounds a lit bit corny. But this is my idea of love now.

name: 很好……你和以前有了不小的变化呢，现在你或许能够担当真正意义上爱神的名号了。
value: Very well... You have changed a lot. Maybe it is time to give you the title of goddess of love.

name: 但前提是，先过我这一关！
value: But... You have to beat me first!

name: 哼，是我赢了呢，母亲大人。
呵呵……意料之中的结果吗？你的成长比我想象中大得多。
value: Hehe... That's what I have expected from you. You have grown fast, faster than I thought.

name: 至少没让您失望就好……我一直期望着您的认同。
value: At least I haven't let you down... I am always looking for your recognition.

name: 等你能够独挡一面时，我会让你继承罗马正统的爱神之位。
value: When you can stand on your own, I will grant you the peace of Rome's goddess of love.

name: 呃……这是不是意味着众神的爱情都会由我来引导？
value: Hmm... Does that mean I have to manage all the love affairs of gods?

name: 天哪，我可不想整天面对一大堆众神的麻烦事！
value: Holy... I don't want to sit here all day worrying about their private life!

name: 啊啦，到时候你就知道了……
value: Alas, you will find out then...

name: 消耗蝙蝠获得南瓜，完成连线可获得额外大奖
value: Flip the card to get Pumpkin Head; Connect 3 flipped cards to get multiple rewards

name: 可解锁万圣节系列表情包
幽灵之夜活动期间战场挂机掉落，可以在活动界面兑换道具。
value: Drops in the Spooky Night event. It can be used to redeem items in the event interface.

name: 兑换后自动解锁8个2022万圣节限定表情
value: Unlock 8 emotes of 2022 Hallo-Scream after redeem

name: 用于提升丘比特的梦境中记忆宝珠的等级
value: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Cupid's Dreamland

name: 在惊魂之旅活动中使用，用于翻牌获得南瓜道具奖励。(活动结束后会被回收)
value: Place it in the card to flip it in the Spooky Night event (Auto-recycled after the event ends)

name: 在惊魂之旅活动中使用，用于在商店中兑换物品。(活动结束后会被回收)
value: Used to redeem Store items in the Spooky Night event (Auto-recycled after the event ends)

name: 单轮抽奖奖励必不重复
value: <size=16>Summon in special pool to get a spin chance</size>

name: #HALLOWEEN_LOTTERY_DRAW_CONTENT
value: The unused spin has been auto-recycled to diamonds.

name: 1回合无法行动，防御降低40%
value: In 1 round, cannot perform actions and DEF decrease by 40%

name: 每层提升5%异常抵抗
value: Each stack increases Debuff RES by 5%

name: 战力对比提示
value: The ratings of each system are irrelevant to the CR, and for reference only.

name: 全体女神总加成百分比2
全体女神总加成固定值2
这是什么地方？我不记得我有入睡，是谁把我拉入了梦境之中？
value: Where am I? Is this a dream? I don't remember falling asleep. Did somebody draw me to this place?

name: 我是潘多拉，秘密与求知的女神，这个梦境，是我的神力所形成的领域。
value: Hey there. I am Pandora, the goddess of secrets and curiosity. Since you asked, this is a dreamland. This realm is built by my power.

name: 亲爱的小猫咪，你将我拉入你的领域有何目的？
value: Oh kitty, why did you bring me here?

name: 不，您是自己自愿且主动落入这个梦境的，它正是您即将面对的命运的具象化。
value: It wasn't me! You were lured here when I opened my box. Its magic is forcing you to confront your fate.

name: 命运怎么可能束缚我？潘多拉，你的小把戏可真是胆大妄为呐……
value: Fate? I haven't cared about that for a long time. And you think I will take your word for it? Pandora, your actions are bold and foolish.

name: 哼……看来这梦境的结界确实不是你所控制的，否则在我击败你之后，你不可能继续维持梦境的魔法。
value: Humph... Your weakness proves you can't control this place. Otherwise, this dreamland would have broken down when I defeated you.

name: 为什么每次我都要被莫名其妙挨一顿揍……
value: I told you so! Why does everyone always insult me for no reason?

name: 这个梦境本身就和您的命运以及意志联系在一起，击败我也并不能使您摆脱它。
value: This dreamland is connected to your fate and will. Defeating me won't change anything.

name: 只有您亲自进入这段梦境，化解这一切，才能离开这里。
value: It's like a maze in your mind. Only you can find your way out.

name: 我的命运与意志？姑且相信你，带路吧亲爱的。
value: My fate and will? For now, I will assume you are telling the truth. You can lead the way, kitty.

name: 奇怪，前面的火光是……？
value: That's strange! Do you see the fire ahead?

name: 创世火种的余温，这么重要的东西怎么会出现在这儿？有趣……
value: That is the Flame of Origin! Why is something so important here? Interesting...

name: 希腊神系的伊卡璐斯？你是从哪里得到这一团创世火种的？
value: Icarus? Why do you hold this sacred flame?

name: 这是世界上最后一丝光明了，我要守护它直至找到传承者为止，不能让吞噬一切的黑暗染指它的光芒。
value: This is the last light of our world. I will protect it until I find someone who can take my responsibility. No one with darkness in their heart may approach.

name: 那么恭喜你找对人了，来吧，是时候把它交给我了。
value: In that case, I'm the right person to hold that for you. You may hand that to me.

name: 然而非常遗憾，埃及的太阳神，在我的眼中你看上去并非是最佳人选。
value: No, I disagree. Though you are the Egyptian god of the sun, you are not the best person to protect it.

name: 啊啦，是吗？那么在接下来的战斗中，我会好好解除你的疑惑……
value: Is that so? Then maybe I can convince you by proving myself in combat.

name: 呼……您身上竟然也有与创世火种相似的光芒……
value: Hoo... I am surprised to see that the flame inside you is like the one I hold!

name: 再怎么说，我也是埃及的创世者之一，亲爱的。
value: My dear, I am the god of sun, the world's greatest flame.

name: 好吧，至少这团火焰在您手里，会比在我这儿更安全些。
value: Fine. At least this flame will be safer in your hands.

name: 伊卡璐斯，我欣赏你直面烈日的勇气，和我一起离开这个虚无之地怎么样？
value: Icarus, I admire your courage in facing the blazing light alone. How about joining us?

name: 明智的决定，我们出发吧。
value: I would be honored. Now let's get going.

name: 埃及的太阳神拉，我早已预料到你会来到这里，同为太阳的化身，我很有兴趣看看谁的光芒更耀眼。
value: Ra, I have been expecting you. Since we are all embodiments of the sun, are you interested in seeing who shines brighter?

name: 特洛伊的守护者，奥林匹斯山上的光明之主，阿波罗吗？
value: Apollo? The Guardian of Troy and the Lord of Light on Mount Olympus.

name: 我是点燃宇宙的火焰，驱赶黑暗的明灯，而你我的相遇也正是命运的安排。
value: I am the fire that lit the universe and the light to drive away the darkness. And I believe that fate brings us together.

name: 要想赢得我的认同，除非让我相信你的光芒更胜一筹。
value: If you want to win my approval, you must prove that your light shines brighter than mine.

name: 和传闻一样，你有着艺术家般的气质与高傲呢，那么就让我好好看看你的实力吧！
value: You're as proud as they say. Let's see your stuff. Bring it!

name: 这就是你的力量吗，看来比我想象中强得多……
value: Your power... is much stronger than I thought...

name: 然而并没有什么意义，如今我们都身陷梦境，离开这里才是最重要的。
value: Our match doesn't mean anything since we are all stuck here. More importantly, we need to find a way out.

name: 即使这里不属于太阳神领域，但以你的能力来说，突破梦境的结界不会是件麻烦事。
value: This is not the place for a God of the Sun to stay. I think you have enough power to break the enchantment of this dreamland now.

name: 有你和我同行或许会轻松点，你不这么认为吗？
value: It will be easier if you join us. Don't you think so?

name: 呵呵，一个天空可难以容纳两个太阳，而且我还有些私事没解决，暂时还不能离开这里。
value: Heh! I don't think there is enough room for two suns in one sky. Besides, I have some private matters to deal with.

name: 那太遗憾了，回头见，祝你好运。
value: That's a shame. See you then, and... good luck!

name: 这里有股熟悉的能量气息，潘多拉，在我认识的众神中，还有谁掉入了你的梦境里？
value: I sense other familiar gods nearby... Pandora, among the gods I know, who else has been trapped in your dreamland?

name: 嗯……我很难分辨具体是谁，但他们的神格能量，好像都是埃及的神明。
value: Hmm... I don't know exactly who else... But, their divine energy indicates that some of them are from Egypt.

name: 盖布，埃及的大地守护者……你为何会落入梦境，你也有希望实现的愿望么？
value: Geb? Why are you here? Has fate drawn you here as well?

name: 并非如此，我和天空之神努特来到这里，只是为了保证您能安全离开而已。
value: It's not like that. Nuit and I are here to protect you. We need to ensure that you can leave this place safely.

name: 不错的想法，糟糕的方法。因为在这个梦境中，除了战斗外，无法打开通往别处的门。
value: Despite your good intentions, it is a foolish idea. The only way to open the door to the next dreamland is for Ra to defeat you in battle.

name: 也就是说，战斗将是解决问题的唯一选择……？
value: I see. So the only way forward is for you to fight against me?

name: 你猜对了，虽然我不介意作为侍奉者的你们对我刀剑相向。
value: Yes. And for that reason, I will not be offended by your challenge

name: 那么请恕我无礼了……
value: Then, forgive me, my lord... Let us do this!

name: 你的能力比现实中强大了很多……
而您的神力好像丢失了不少，看来梦境内无论是谁，都需要通过战斗，重新获得神力。
value: But by defeating me in battle, you have taken some of my strength. It seems that you can only grow stronger by draining the power of the other gods.

name: 如你所言，这也是一次考验，无论对谁。
value: I see. It seems that this is a trial for all of us.

name: 我们出发吧，天空之神努特在前面的梦境中等着我们，她可没什么耐性。
value: We'd better get going. Nuit is waiting for us, and she doesn't have much patience.

name: 盖布你为什么会出现在这里？在没有找到主神之前，我们不是应该呆在自己的梦境中吗？
value: Geb, why are you here? We are supposed to stay in our dreamland until our lord, Ra, arrives.

name: 睁大你的眼睛看看就知道了，事情比我们想象中要快。
value: Open your eyes, honey. She is right here.

name: 努特，在你看来，呆在梦境里的感觉似乎挺不错的？
value: Hello, Nuit. You look rather comfortable sitting here. Why didn't you seek me out?

name: 呀！原来盖布已经找到您了！害我白担心……
value: Sorry! I was worried about you earlier... I see that Geb has found you. So, we can go now!

name: 事情没这么顺利，亲爱的，你我之间免不了一场战斗才能打开下一扇梦境之门。
value: My dear, things are not that simple. We have to fight against each other to open the gate of the next dreamland.

name: 哎？！只要打一架就行了？！那太简单了，我可是会全力以赴的！
value: What? A fight? That's simple enough for me. I will prove myself a worthy guardian to you!

name: 你这家伙下手还真重……
value: Why did you do that? Was it necessary to attack with your full strength?

name: 挺奇怪的，我的力量好像比平常更强了。
value: Strange. I sense my power has grown stronger than before.

name: 没必要感到惊讶，这份强大的力量也是离开梦境所必需的。
value: I think this place has released our hidden power. That's good! The stronger we get, the better chance we have to escape.

name: 这样呐……那么我们接下来要去哪儿？
value: I see... Then, where to next?

name: 在梦境之门后，我感受到了第三个埃及神明的气息，除了你们外还有人吗？
value: I sense another Egyptian god behind that door. Who else has come there besides you two?

name: 好像阿努比斯也进入了梦境，但她似乎是响应另一个召唤者而来。
value: It may be Anubis. She is not with us. She came at someone else's request.

name: 另一个召唤者？呵呵……看来有麻烦了。
value: Another god? I think that we've got a problem...

name: 太阳神大人，我在此恭候多时了。
value: My lord, the God of the Sun, I have been waiting a long time for you.

name: 阿努比斯？你不看守冥界，来这里做什么？
value: Anubis, you are supposed to guard the underworld. Why are you here?

name: 因为新的秩序就要来临了，太阳神大人，我将为更伟大的存在而收纳世间的灵魂。
value: Because the new order is coming, my lord. Now, I am serving another great being.

name: “更伟大的存在”……这称呼可让我感觉不大妙。
value: Another great being? No one can be greater than the Sun God, Ra.

name: 太阳神大人，您可曾思考过自己灵魂的重量吗？
value: We shall see about that. Have you ever thought about the weight of your own soul, my lord?

name: 我觉得或许让你亲自体会一下我灵魂的重量会更合适，亲爱的。
value: My soul is powerful, and it can only be judged through battle.

name: 好啦，审判的时刻到了，亲爱的，告诉我是谁召唤你来到这个梦境？
value: Well, it is time to speak the truth. Tell me, my dear, who summoned you to this place?

name: 看来您忘了自己曾经的对手，那个象征亘古混沌，原初黑暗的野心家。
value: Have you already forgotten her? Your former opponent, the God of Ambition, the symbol of eternal chaos.

name: ……阿佩普？这没可能，她可没有那个神力能冲破我的封印，回到这个世界上。
value: ...Apep? That's impossible. I sealed her away thousands of years ago. How did she escape?

name: 她原本没有，但在潘多拉之盒所产生的梦境深渊里，她有这样的机会。
value: When Pandora opened her box, its magic began luring gods into dreamlands like this one. Sensing Apep's desire to break free and defeat you, it drew her here for that purpose.

name: 你指的是她如果彻底击败我，获得了我的力量……
value: And she wants to destroy me and steal my power for herself?

name: 啊，看来您终于意识到了，不管怎么说，我认同的是纯粹的力量与秩序。
value: Well, I see. I now realize why this is so important.

name: 所以无论最后是她夺取了埃及神系的统治权，还是您粉碎了她的野心，我都会追随强者。
value: However, I don't care if she steals your seat of power or whether you crush her ambitions. I only will follow the the strongest leader.

name: 我尊重你的意愿，阿努比斯，你很快就会看到答案的。
value: I will respect your choice, Anubis. You shall see who wins soon enough.

name: 就快到达梦境的终点了，小心。
value: Be careful. We are nearing the final door.

name: 奈芙蒂斯？天哪，我可不希望听到你也是应阿佩普的召唤，前来阻挡我的麻烦之一。
value: Nephthys? Gosh, I really wish Apep hadn't summoned you to be on her side.

name: 嗯哼，看来她已经失去了知觉，灵魂彻底迷失在梦境里了。
value: Hmm, I think her soul is lost in this dreamland.

name: 但是请小心，即使灵魂已经迷失，但她依旧非常危险，梦境会引导她的战斗本能。
value: Please, be careful, for she is still dangerous. The dreamland will compel her to attack anyone who approaches.

name: 看来只有通过战斗唤醒她的意志了……
value: Then we will bring her to her senses by defeating and subduing her.

name: 啊……头好痛，我差一点就没能控制住自己，幸好您的出现及时阻止了这一切。
value: Ah... My head. I was so close to losing myself entirely. I'm glad you came along and stopped this from happening.

name: 在梦境中迷失灵魂并不常见，看来你遇到麻烦了？
我在进入梦境前感到一阵强大的黑暗之力，这种力量在不停召唤我。
value: The last thing I recall is a strong, dark power luring me to open Pandora's box.

name: 当我打开眼前的潘多拉魔盒时，一团黑色的雾气瞬间就占据了我的意志。
value: When I opened it, a dense dark fog clouded my mind, and I blacked out.

name: 阿佩普的魔咒吗？呵……看来我要找她算的账又多了一笔。
value: That sounds like one of Apep's spells. Yet another reason to find her and bring this to an end.

name: 埃及的太阳神拉？阁下能来到这里真是出乎我的意料。
value: Ra? I am surprised to see you here.

name: 天照吗？你的出现倒是没让我感到惊讶。
value: Amaterasu? I have to say that I am not surprised to see the Japanese Sun God here.

name: 如果我没猜错的话，前面散发强大黑暗之力的地方，就是阿佩普所在的梦境吧？
value: If my guess is correct, Apep is waiting just ahead. The place will be filled with her dark power.

name: 精准的判断，我猜阁下是为了阻止阿佩普获得全部力量而来的？
value: You guessed correctly. Are you here to stop her from stealing your power?

name: 既然你已经知道了我的来意，那么为何还要阻挡我的去路？
value: Yes. Why? Are you planning to stop us?

name: 折返吧，我不想让你们进去送命，已经有不少试图阻止她的神明被她吞噬，成为了她的食粮。
value: You need to go back. Many gods have tried to stop her, but they all failed. I don't want you to die for nothing.

name: 这是我和阿佩普的私人恩怨，不管结果如何，还是需要我去了结。
value: This is a personal matter between Apep and me. I need to end this with my own hands.

name: 如果你坚持要过去，那我必须测试你们的力量，即便作为主神的你，也要过我这一关。
value: Apep has grown too strong. I fear that if you lose, she will become too powerful. If you insist, let me test your strength first.

name: 你很强大，天照，我不得不承认同为太阳神，你拥有和我旗鼓相当的力量。
value: You are strong, Amaterasu. I will give you that.

name: 看来你决心已定，那么请务必谨慎行事，如果身为主神的你，力量被阿佩普所获得……
value: You seem very determined. Remember, you must be careful. You can't lose to her...

name: 那么所有神系都可能会面临灭顶之灾。
value: If your power is absorbed by her... The world will face a fatal catastrophe, and all the gods will suffer too.

name: 我必然不会让你失望的。
value: Trust me. I will not let you down.

name: 呵呵……姐姐，自从我的神力丢失之后，还从来没想过会有这样的机会重新向你发起挑战。
value: Hehe... My sister, I have dreamed of the day when I could get my revenge for when you robbed me of my power.

name: 好久没有听到你这让人不安的声音了，阿佩普，看来你的野心一点也没有消退。
value: Long time no see, Apep. Your annoying voice hasn't changed, just like your unrealistic ambition.

name: 你已经忘了吗？我生于黑暗，本就是要为吞噬一切而存在的。
value: Did you forget that I am born from the darkness and supposed to consume everything?

name: 光可以创造一切，却也留下阴影，只有光明而没有黑暗的世界是不存在的。
value: Light can create everything, but it leaves shadows behind. It's impossible to have a world without my darkness.

name: 我没有忘记你的神权，但这个世界弥漫的黑暗已经够糟了，或许你保持沉默是最好的选择。
value: Of course I remember that. But this world has suffered enough from your darkness. You'd better step aside and stay silent now.

name: 然而潘多拉之盒的梦境给了我这个机会，现在的你根本不是我的对手。
value: No! Pandora's Box has given me a chance I've been dreaming of for thousands of years. With all the power I've absorbed, you are no match for me!

name: 然而即使你现在已经非常强大，也要直面我这个最后的阻碍不是吗？
value: So you think! I shall show you how little power you have.

name: 让我们开始吧，呵呵……
value: Then, no more talking. Let's fight!

name: 哼……没想到即使拥有这样的力量，你最终还是败给了你……
value: No! Why?! I possessed so much power... How did you still beat me?

name: 回去吧，阿佩普，回到你应该待的地方。
value: Go, Apep. Go back to where you came from and stay there forever.

name: 我会回来的，在那无光的未来，我会回来结束你的神权……
value: One day, I will be back for you, and I will end you with my own strength!

name: 危机已经解除了，光明重回了天空，或许我们也该离开了。
value: We did it! The light is returning to the sky! I think it's time for us to leave this place.

name: 有些不对劲，我感到阿佩普所带来的黑暗已经消散，但还有一丝黑暗似乎潜藏在梦境的更深处。
value: I still feel something is wrong... Although the darkness brought by Apep has been dispelled, something dangerous is hiding deeper in this dreamland.

name: 我也有这种感觉……
value: I have the same feeling too...

name: 前面好像还有一扇隐藏的梦境之门，如果要去调查的话，阁下请务必小心。
value: There might be a hidden door ahead. You must be careful.

name: 应该只是阿佩普残留的力量而已。
value: I suspect that it's the lingering remnants of Apep's power.

name: 或许是我多心了吧，阁下准备离开梦境了吗？
value: Then maybe I'm wrong. Are you ready to leave this place?

name: 嗯，我想尽快回到现实，这件事之后，我应该好好提升一下自己的警戒心。
value: Yes, I want to leave here as soon as possible. After all of this, I need to be more alert in the future. I can't let this happen again.

name: 而这在梦境中获得的新力量，希望也能让太阳神的信念更加深入人心。
value: And as for this new power I gained here, I will use it to spread more light and restore people's faith in the sun.

name: 能发现幕后的隐藏者，您可真出乎我的意料，看来黑暗无论如何隐藏，都躲不掉光明的探知。
value: I'm surprised you found me. I should have known that darkness cannot hide from the light.

name: 奥丁……？等等！不……你的灵魂中透出的是黑暗的气息，你并不是奥丁！
value: Odin...? Wait! Your soul feels so evil... You can't be Odin!

name: 呵呵……那么，您猜猜看我是谁。
哼，我可没心思猜，直接用实力让你告诉我不是更合适吗？！
value: Don't waste my time. Let's fight and settle this.

name: 我受够了你的小把戏，奥丁……不，洛基！
value: I am tired of your little tricks, Odin. ... No, wait! Loki is known for her tricks. You're Loki in disguise!

name: 阿佩普是你引诱至此的？不，你没这个能耐，即便奥丁本人也做不到。
value: Was it you who lured Apep here?

name: 呵呵……您就继续猜吧，从潘多拉魔盒打开的那一刻，众神的命运就已经开始变化了。
value: Hehe... Keeping guessing, and you may find the truth~

name: 很好，很快我会亲临阿斯加德，然后亲手把你揪出来问个明白。
value: Fine! I will go to Asgard and learn the truth for myself.

name: 事情可没你想的那么简单，太阳神大人，不过今天我已经没心情和你们玩了，再见。
value: But I'm not going to stick around and give you any hints. Goodbye for now.

name: 跑得可真快，不过在梦境里我也没有办法阻拦她……
value: Wow! She's fast and slippery. It's a shame I couldn't stop her from escaping this dreamland.

name: 潘多拉魔盒的梦境究竟是怎么回事，为什么我感到一场阴谋正在酝酿……
value: What's really going on with this place? Why do I feel there is more behind all these...

name: 呼……希望是我多想了，不管如何，先回到现实再说吧……
value: Hoo... I hope I am overreacting. Let's return to the reality so that I can figure out my next step.

value: Use to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Ra's Dreamland

value: The fog ahead will dissipate after {0}

name: 通过20关后，可领取漂流宝藏中的奖励。领取前奖励可以任意修改。
value: After passing 20 instances (3 Stars not required), you can choose rewards among the Divine Treasure. You can change anytime before claiming.

name: 是谁说，主宰圣诞夜的必须是个白胡子老头？她可不一样，她是热情美丽，人见人爱的圣诞女神！在这个平静的夜里，她会披着鹅毛大雪，赶着叮叮当当的鹿车，前来为你助阵！顺便还会悄悄地，把满满一袋礼物，塞进你的口袋里。
value: Who says only an older man with white bread would appear on Christmas Eve? Look at her. The passionate, beautiful, and everyone’s favorite Xmas Angel! On that peaceful night, she drives the Christmas Reindeer in the snowy sky, lending support to people in need. Remember to check your pockets when she leaves. You will be amazed to see how many gifts she managed to stuff with that little space.

name: ACTIVITY_DDMC_RANK_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT
value: Congratulations on ranking {0} in the Underground Labyrinth. You will get the following rewards:

name: ACTIVITY_DDMC_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT
value: The Underground Labyrinth event has ended, and your unclaimed rewards have been sent by mail.

name: DRIFTING_DUNGEON_ASSIST_REQUEST_NOT_EXIST
value: This request is being accepted by other players

name: 称号会根据配置在左侧的勋章显示
value: According titles will be displayed in the left as settings

name: 暂未获得过其他玩家的协助
暂未有其他玩家请求协助
刷新过快，请稍后再试
value: Refresh too often. Please try again later

name: 需通关此关卡才能协助
value: You have to pass this instance first

name: DRIFTING_DUNGEON_ASSIST_ALREADY_EXIST
value: Please refresh the event interface and try again

name: DRIFTING_DUNGEON_DUNGEON_BE_ASSISTED
value: Please refresh the event interface and try again

name: 真是稀客啊，我这里，可是好久都没开张了呢。
value: What a wonderful surprise. I haven't seen anyone for a long time.

name: 你是谁？我这是在什么地方？
value: Who are you? What is this place?

name: 我是潘多拉，你可以叫我求知与秘密之神。
value: I am Pandora, the god of knowledge and mystery.

name: 只有渴求未知或者寻求答案的人才会落入我的梦境，呵呵，小妹妹，你是为了什么而来呢？
value: This is a place for people looking for an answer to the unsolved questions deep in their minds. Little girl, why did you come here?

name: 我在渴求什么……吗？
value: Hmm... an answer to the unsolved questions...

name: 我在寻找一对不畏风暴，不惧烈焰的光芒之翼！
value: I think I am looking for a pair of wings that could carry me over the storms and the flames!

name: 哦呵呵呵，哎呀，这可不是件容易的事呢，尤其对于你这样神格不全的人来说。
value: I am surprised that you have come to the answer so quickly. But this is not easy, especially for a half-god like you.

name: 不过嘛，我有几位客人，或许能够帮你找到答案，但她们非常傲慢。
value: However, I happen to know a few residents here who can help you.

name: 我想，我得先测试测试你有没有资格去见她们。
value: I can introduce you to them, but first, I want to know whether you are worthy of my help.

name: 停手，停手！你把我打痛了，笨丫头！
value: Stop! Stop!!! You hit me, and it hurts, you stupid girl!

name: 那么，你认输了吗？
value: So am I worthy of your help?

name: 我承认之前确实小看了你，但真想让我给你认输可没这么简单，这一次就算你赢了吧。
value: I admit that I underestimated you. You have my respect for now.

name: 那么，劳烦你给我带路了，潘多拉。
我可以帮你，不过你要记住了。
value: I will do this for you. But remember, as soon as you have what you want and leave the dreamland, please encourage others to come here as well.

name: 等你找到你想要的，别忘了出去后多帮我揽揽生意，宣传宣传求知与秘密女神的名号。
value: Tell them that I welcome everyone to this dreamland, and this is an excellent place to make your dream come true. Will you?

name: 呐，前面唱歌的就是海妖。她知道关于你要的光明之翼的消息，你要不先上去问问？
value: Look, the one singing in front is Siren. She knows everything about your dream wings. Go and ask her.

name: 我的爱人啊，低头看一看，在这无尽海洋上，我就是那汪甘泉……
value: ♫My love, please look around. In the endless sea, find me by my sound...♫

name: 这位姐姐，你唱的是什么歌，真好听。
value: Hey sister, what song are you singing? It sounds lovely.

name: 妹妹，你长得真美，过来，过来，让姐姐，教你点好玩的东西。
value: Oh, thank you. What a beautiful girl you are. Come. Come closer. I can teach you how to sing.

name: 可别怪我没提醒你，小姑娘，这海妖歌声的吸引力，无论男女，都是致命的。
value: Stop! She is trying to lure you. The singing voice of Siren is deadly to both men and women, humans and gods.

name: 呀，好险，我差一点就被她迷过去了。
value: I was so close to believing her words.

name: 她是伊卡璐斯，一只迷途的小凤凰，想要寻找一幅传说中神才能拥有的翅膀。
value: She is Icarus, a phoenix who has lost her way. She is looking for to a pair of wings only a god can possess.

name: 海妖，我正在寻找一对不畏风暴和烈焰的光芒之翼，你知道在哪可以找到它吗？
value: Siren, I want these wings so I can fly across the storm and flames.

name: 啊哈哈哈，你这样的人类，也妄想获得神明的翅膀吗？
value: Haha, a human who desires the holy wings; I haven't seen something so crazy thing in ages.

name: 不说我不知道，就算我知道，我为什么不自己独吞，而非要等到现在告诉你呢？
value: Even if I knew where the wings were hidden, I wouldn't share them with you. I'd keep them for myself.

name: 那好吧，你不愿意告诉我，我也没办法。潘多拉，麻烦你带我去你的其他朋友那吧。
value: Fine. If you are not willing to tell me, it is your choice. Pandora, let's keep moving.

name: 站住！你觉得不留下点什么就能从我这离开吗？
value: Wait! I don't think I can let you leave so easily.

name: 你身上的气息很好闻，是那种凡人追求神格的气息，来吧，让我吸一口。
value: You smell good, a scent of a doomed ambition. Come, let me take a bite.

name: 我不想和你打，但你非要这样的话，我也不是好惹的！
value: I don't want to fight you. But if you insist on insulting me like that, I have no choice but to defend my honor.

name: 怎么样，现在知道我的厉害了吗？
value: Is that what you want? Have you surrendered?

name: 你一介凡人，为什么会有这样的力量？
value: How did a human obtain such power?

name: 只要坚信光明，就没有什么能够难到我！
value: If you believe in the light, nothing is impossible!

name: 好了，海妖，你还记得我们的赌局吗？
value: Alright, Siren, you lose. Are you going to continue crying like a baby, or do you want to come with us?

name: 愿赌服输，我会帮助你们渡过接下来的难关的。
value: Take me! I want to join you on your trip and watch these events unfold!

name: 这里是瓦尔基里的地盘，留意天空，她们一般会趁你不注意，从上方发起进攻。
value: We are entering the territory of Valkyrie. Be careful of the sky. She will attack you from above while you're not paying attention.

name: 我看到她了，是瓦尔基里！
value: I see her. Valkyrie is right there!

name: 你们几个，在我的领空下面干什么？
瓦尔基里，我来这里只是想向你请教一个问题。
value: Valkyrie, I am here to ask you to give me some guidance.

name: 我在寻找一对不畏风暴，不惧烈焰的光芒之翼，你有看见过它吗？
value: I am looking for a pair of wings to help me cross the storms and the flames. Have you ever heard of it?

name: 那也正是我一直在追寻的翅膀，你和我打一场吧，你赢了，我就帮你去找它。
value: I have also craved such wings for a long time... It looks like we'll have to fight each other to decide who has the right to own it! The one who loses must help the winner to find it.

name: 虽然我不喜欢战斗，但假如我不得不面对挑战的话，我也会严阵以待的！
value: I don't enjoy fighting. But if I must, then I accept your challenge

name: 够了！你证明了你自己，现在，我愿意跟随在你身边，寻找那传说中的双翼。
value: Enough! You have proven yourself... I am willing to follow you and help you find the wings.

name: 那就拜托你了，瓦尔基里。
我接下来要指引你去天使的领地，如果想获得传说之翼，就必须要得到她们的祝福。
value: I will now take us to the Land of the Angels. If you want to get those wings, you must win their approval first.

name: 天啦，来了好多好多漂亮的姐姐，你们是来找丘比特，询问爱情的吗？
value: Gosh, so many lovely girls here. Do you three plan to ask me about your destined love?

name: 不，丘比特，我正在找一对光芒之翼。
value: No, Cupid. I am looking for a particular pair of wings.

name: 哦……你是说，你要找祝福之翼？
value: Hmm... Do you mean the Wings of Light?

name: 据说，如果有凡人想要获得神格，那么她必须先得到天使的祝福。
value: It is said that the one who owns this pair of wings and is blessed by three angels can have the chance to become a goddess.

name: 那么丘比特，你能给我祝福吗？
value: So, Cupid, can you give me the blessing?

name: 不行。除非，你能接住我的爱情之箭！
value: No, I don't bestow my blessings freely. First you must... prove that you are faster than my arrow of love in combat. Fight me!

name: 好的，我会接住你的箭证明给你看的！
value: Well, I will prove I am worth it.

name: 伊卡璐斯，你赢得了胜利。
谢谢你，丘比特，你本来有机会击败我的。
value: Thank you, Cupid. This was a fair fight. I won only through luck.

name: 嘻嘻，没关系，告诉我，伊卡璐斯，得到祝福之后，你会怎样去使用它呢？
value: That's fine. I can live with the occasional failure. But, tell me, Icarus. What would you do after I give you my blessing?

name: 你会谈开始一场热烈的爱情吗？
好了，快别闹了，给我们赐福，然后带我们去你的姐姐们哪里吧。
value: Alright, stop teasing her. Bless her and take us to your sisters!

name: 如你们所愿，我以爱情之名，赐予你祝福，伊卡璐斯！
value: As you wish. I, Cupid, bless you, Icarus, in the name of love.

name: 快点，前面就是米迦勒的圣堂了，她人很好的，我和她说说，她应该就会把祝福给你们了。
value: Come on! Michael's holy church is just steps away. She is a lovely angel. I will talk to her about the blessing.

name: 你说谁的圣堂来着，小家伙。
value: Whose holy church are you talking about?

name: 路，路西法？你，你怎么会在这里？
value: Lu... Lucifer? What are you doing here?

name: 有意思，我好像记得，我并没有邀请你来我的梦境做客。
value: Interesting. I don't remember inviting you here.

name: 的确，不过你们这有团微小但刺眼的光，让我十分在意。
value: Indeed. I saw a bright ball of light in the distance..

name: 我就想来看看，这团追逐天空的微光，究竟是个什么样的东西。
value: So I came here to see what kind of light it was.

name: 我现在就在你面前，路西法。
value: I guess you are looking for me, Lucifer.

name: 哦……不错嘛。那我们开始吧，如果你能让我满意，我就代替米迦勒，降下天使的祝福。
value: Right... Then, I claim the right to a challenge! If you win, I will give you a blessing on behalf of Michael.

name: 我不会退缩的，地狱之王，我会让你见识一下我的勇气，我的信念！
value: King of Hell, I will not hold back. I will show you my strength and my faith!

name: 不错不错，你确实配得上勇气天使的祝福。
value: Yes, I yield. You are indeed worthy of the blessing.

name: 我就代替米迦勒，为你送上勇气的赐福！
不得不说，伊卡璐斯，你看起来变得更坚定，也更自信了。
value: I must say, Icarus. You look more determined and confident after the blessing.

name: 真，真的吗？我真的有变得坚定吗？
每一段追求，都是使人成长的过程，要想拥有神一样的双翼，这是你的必经之路。
value: Yeah. It seems that your pursuit of the wings has made you grow.

name: 圣光，已经预示了你的到来，伊卡璐斯。
value: Icarus, welcome. The light of fate has foretold your arrival.

name: 那么，智慧天使，你愿意给予我你的祝福吗？
value: Raphael, the angel of wisdom, are you willing to bestow your blessing on me?

name: 我当然愿意，但对于你来说，这智慧太过沉重，我必须考验你，看你有没有资格承担它。
value: Sure. But I worry the wisdom in my blessing will be too much for you to handle. You must pass my trial first.

name: 来吧，智慧天使，我已经做好准备了！
value: Come. I am more than ready now!

name: 现在，我有资格接受这份祝福了吗？
value: Now, am I qualified for your blessing?

name: 你的智慧毋庸置疑，做好准备，我将开悟你的思维。
value: I am surprised by your potential. I will now widen your mind with my blessing.

name: 有了三位天使的祝福，现在我应该有资格得到那对光芒之翼了。
value: I think I am now qualified to get the Wings of Light with the blessing of three angels.

name: 伊卡璐斯，获得我们的祝福并不是终点，你还需要面对那曾经的天空主宰——巨龙的考验。
value: Icarus, our blessings are just the ticket to the next destination. You have to face the dragons, the former champions of the sky.

name: 我明白了，拉斐尔，请你送我到达她们身边吧！
value: I see. Raphael, please take us to them!

name: 快看，姐妹，有人闯入了我们的天空！
value: I sense someone trespassing on our territory.

name: 很好，很好！我要让她们尝尝，被火焰炙烤的滋味！
value: Well, I have to say that I can't wait to set something on fire!

name: 不要急，让我先去会会她们。
value: Don't rush, my sister. Let me discover their intentions first.

name: 停下！你们来到我们的领空，意为何图？
value: Stop there. Who are you? Why are you here?

name: 冰霜龙母，我是伊卡璐斯。
伊卡璐斯？我听说过你，天空和海洋，曾经提起过你的名字。
value: Icarus? I have heard of you from the spirits of the sky and sea.

name: 她们说，你为追求天空，最终被烈日烧尽了羽翼，坠入了大海。
value: They say your ambition led you to fly towards the sun, and it burned your wings, sending you crashing into the sea.

name: 上天给了我神格，给了我力量，让我免受死亡。我要用这新的生命，飞得更高，更远！
value: But the spirits of the sea and sky helped me evade death. Now I want to use my new life to fly even higher. To achieve that, I must find the Wings of Light!

name: 所以，你想寻求龙族的考验？
value: So, are you here to ask about the Trial of Dragons?

name: 是的，请你们为我指明道路。
value: Yes, please light the way for me.

name: 很好，那就看你的双翼，能不能跟得上我的速度！
value: Great. Then, I will see whether you can keep up with me!

name: 你通过了我的考验，你的双翼经受了冰霜与风暴，去吧，准备好迎接下一场挑战。
value: Since you have passed my trial, your wings have been strengthened by both frost and storm. Go. My sister is waiting for you.

name: 既然我的姐妹没有让你退缩，那就让我来感受一下，巨龙的怒火！
value: I will let you feel the anger of fire!

name: 我已经准备好了接受你的试炼了，灰烬女王！
value: Queen of Embers, I am ready to accept your trial!

name: 我已经击败你了，灰烬龙女！
value: I have just defeated you, Ember Dragon!

name: 不，刚才只是个小小的失误，我还没有输！再和我打一次！
value: No, it was only luck. I haven't lost yet!

name: 没这个必要，姐妹，她已经通过了考验。
value: That won't be necessary, my sister. By luck or not, she has passed your trial.

name: 我们将会为你打开一扇直接通向你灵魂深处的门，你将在那里遇到你最大的考验。
value: We will open a gate that goes all the way to the deepest depths of your soul. In there, you will find your final trial.

name: 只有击败它，你才能获得真正的胜利。
value: Only by defeating it can you leave here.

name: 看来，我们终于到了这场梦境的终末。
value: It seems we have come to the end of our journey.

name: 向前走吧，伊卡璐斯，那道光，就是你苦苦寻求的东西。
哦……瞧瞧这是谁来了，一个妄想飞越太阳的无知少女！
value: Look who it is! An innocent girl who dreams of flying towards the sun!

name: 怎么，还没吸取教训，还想尝试一下双翼被烤焦的痛苦吗？
value: So you haven't learned your lesson?

name: 我已经不是当初那个弱不禁风的我了，我的信念，我的勇气，都得到了天使的祝福！
value: I am no longer the girl I was. I have the blessings of angels.

name: 我，通过了巨龙的考验，我，必将飞越太阳，飞越你！
value: And I have passed the trial of dragons. I will defeat you!

name: 哈，那就来吧！
value: Then come on and fight me!

name: 我赢了，我终于做到了！我超越了你，阿波罗！
value: I win! I finally made it!

name: 她消失了。当然了，她只不过是你心中无法越过的阴影。
value: She's gone. She was just a projection of your mind, a shadow of the real Apollo.

name: 当你战胜了她，就是战胜了你自己的内心。
value: When you defeated her, you beat your inner demon.

name: 好了，上前去吧，阿波罗的幻影消失时留下的那道光，就是你所追求的光芒之翼。
value: Those are the Wings of Light that you sought.

name: 伊卡璐斯，我就是你的光芒之翼。你现在拥有了我，但我还需要问你最后一个问题。
value: Icarus, I am the Wings of Light. Before you become my master, I have one question for you.

name: 这世上有许许多多身体残疾的人，他们没有了手，或者没有腿，甚至没有了眼睛。
value: There are lots of disabled people in the world. Some are missing hands or legs, and some don't even have eyes.

name: 假如我告诉你，你将我献出去，便能给他们光明，给他们希望；
value: If you give me to them, then they will be healed. But if you take me all to yourself, you will have the chance to become a real goddess.

name: 而你将我占据，你则拥有完整的神格，得到晋升为正式女神的资格，你会怎么选呢？
我会献出你，因为我追求的光明，就是这个世界的光明！
value: I will give you to them.

name: 你的回答我很满意，你的高尚让你赢得了这次晋升。
value: I am satisfied with your answer. Your nobility has won you the chance of becoming a goddess.

name: 接受这份力量吧，你将成为新的光明女神，去为世界带来希望！
value: Take this power, and you will become the new God of Light, bringing hope to the world!

name: 我不会辜负你的期望。
value: I will not let you down.

name: 我会占有你，我追求光芒之翼，就是为了成为真正的女神！
value: I will take you all to myself.

name: 你追求的，仅仅只是完整的神格吗？
value: So you are chasing glory, not righteousness?

name: 那么按照规则，你要面对另一位和你同时追求这次晋升机会的人一教高下！
value: Then, by the rules, you must fight someone else who shares your ambition.

name: 顺应召唤而来吧，圣女贞德！
伊卡璐斯！让我们公平决斗吧！
value: Icarus, let's have a fair fight!

name: 我接受你的挑战，贞德，我要让你明白，什么样的人才真正有资格成为女神！
value: Sure. Jeanne d'Arc, I will let you see what kind of power it takes to become a real goddess.

name: 我……失败了，胜利……属于你。
value: I... failed. Victory belongs to you...

name: 好了，光芒的双翼，臣服于我，成为我登天的力量吧！
value: Alright! Wings of Light, obey me and take me to the sky!

name: 遵命，新晋女神，赐予你理应所得的力量与权威。
value: Yes, my goddess. I will grant you the power you deserve.

name: ……哼哼哼，当然还有不可或缺的……傲慢。
value: Hmmm… You forgot to mention that you will also boost her arrogance!

name: 没有比翩翩起舞的樱花雨更美的景色了……你懂樱花的花语吗？
value: Nothing can be compare to the senery of cherry blossom rain… do you what cherry blossom symbolizes?

name: 其实呢，我一直在想。跳舞的时候拿把更大的扇子会比较好吗？
value: Actually, I’ve been thinking. Would it be better to take a bigger fan while dancing?

name: 那个……明天晚上你会跟我一起去赏花吧？
value: That… will you go with me tomorrow night to enjoy the flowers?

name: 猜猜我会不会去呢。
value: Maybe I will come. Maybe not.

name: 那必须还是大的漂亮！
value: The bigger one will be much prettier.

name: 嗯，就像你说的，春天，象征着绽放的鲜花，苏生的生命……还有爱情。
value: Well, as you said, spring symbolizes blooming flowers, the life that comes back... and love.

name: 好啊好啊！我可会跳舞了，你想和我跳哪一段呢？
value: Sure! I am a great dancer, which part do you want to dance with me?

name: 粉色……那是樱花的颜色！说不定有什么深刻的意义呢
value: Pink... that's the color of the sakura! What are you suggesting...

name: 是的，无论身在何方，樱花总代表着游子心中最殷切的思念。
value: Yes, wherever they are, cherry blossoms always represent the longing thoughts of the wanderers.

name: 我也是这么想的。扇子小，轻巧灵活，太大了话，连展开都变得困难了。
value: I think so too. Little fan is more flexible.

name: 讨厌，我才不猜！反正明晚你不来我就再也不跟你说话了
value: Humph! If you don't come tomorrow night, I won't talk to you anymore.

name: 和爱慕的对象打伞在街上散步……不觉得很浪漫吗？
value: Walking in the street under an umbrella with your loved one... So romantic!

name: 好像相当有自信哦！那输了可不要哭鼻子！
value: You seems quite confident. If I beat you, don't become a crybaby.

name: 喜欢热烈活泼的红色吗？嗯！我也要努力变得更加鲜艳呢！
value: The warm and lively red? I think I have to try my best to became brighter from now on!

name: 啊，美好的爱情，就像书上说的那样……可我也没体会过呢。
value: Oh, beautiful love in the story... where I can find one for myself?

name: 是啊，大扇子还可以用来打人，想想那呼啦呼啦的样子，就觉得好厉害呢。
value: Yeah! And you can slap someone with that. So funny!

name: 说好了哦，到时候我会穿上最漂亮的和服等你。
value: Then we have a deal! I will wear my most beautiful kimono and wait for you there.

name: 集齐55个樱花妖碎片可以召唤樱花妖
value: Collect 55 Sakura Spirit Shards to summon Sakura Spirit

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_79
value: Group Protection & Group Recovery & DMG Increase

name: 我终于等到这一天的到来，小樱真的太幸福了！从今往后，愿我这朵樱花，永远只为你一个人而盛开……
value: This day finally come. I am so happy! From now on, I will only bloom for you till the end of my life.

name: 她原本并非大和神话中的传统神明，但源自于人类对她的信仰和崇拜，使得她具有了强大的神格与力量。\n她的诞生与过往一直是个迷，但她总是能给人们带来美好的祝福，让人沉醉。
value: Sakura Spirit is not a traditional god in Yamato mythology. Her divinity and power are born from the human admiration of cherry blossoms offered during a springtime custom known as hanami.\nHer past has always been a mystery. Yet people still believe in her power to bring happiness.

name: 我方全体恢复樱花妖攻击力20%的血量，附加樱花妖最大攻击力100%的不可驱散护盾，护盾持续1回合，并有50%概率驱散敌方全体1个增益效果。
value: Restores whole team’s HP by 20% of Sakura Spirit's ATK and adds a non-dispellable shield of 100% her Max ATK that lasts for 1 round. Also, it has 50% chance to dispel 1 buff from all enemies.

name: 我方全体恢复樱花妖攻击力50%的血量，附加樱花妖最大攻击力70%的不可驱散护盾，护盾持续1回合，使友方攻击力最高的队友增加樱花妖攻击力50%的攻击力，持续2回合。
value: Restores whole team’s HP by 50% of Sakura Spirit's ATK and adds a non-dispellable shield of 70% her Max ATK that lasts for 1 round. Also, increases the ATK of the teammate with the highest ATK by 50% of Sakura Spirit's ATK for 2 rounds.

name: 进入战斗时，伊卡璐斯获得100%自身最大生命值的护盾（不可驱散），持续2回合。每次行动时，伤害增加20%*当前回合数，持续1回合，最多增加200%
value: When entering battle, Icarus receives a shield (non-dispellable) that is 100% of her Max HP for 2 rounds. When in action, increases her DMG by [20%*current number of rounds] (up to 200%) for 1 round.

name: 2回合内【蓄力】，攻击力增加樱花妖攻击力的50%
value: [Charge] increases target's ATK by 50% of Sakura Spirit’s ATK for 2 rounds.

name: 一年中最让人开心的季节是春天吧！说起春天你会想到什么？
value: The happiest season of the year is spring! What comes to mind when you think of spring?

name: 既然闲着，不如做点有趣的事情吧！
value: Since you are idle, why not do something fun!

name: 说起来，你喜欢什么颜色的衣服呢？
value: Speaking of which, what color clothes do you like?

name: 麋鹿诞生自爱尔兰荒凉的苔原上，她最初只是一个流浪在荒原上的小鹿，因为保护同伴不被人类偷猎而牺牲。圣诞女神在经过苔原时，发现了她，感叹于她的牺牲和勇气，于是将自己的神格分享给了这头小鹿，令她复活，并得到了一幅少女的美貌，让她为自己驱使雪橇。
value: Finette was born in the desolate tundra of Ireland. As a fawn, she sacrificed herself to protect her herd from human poaching. Xmas Angel witnessed the tragedy while passing through the tundra and marveled at Finette's courage. She rescued Finette and shared her godhood with the fawn. As a result, Finette can now take human form, though she often remains a reindeer to pull a sleigh for the maiden who saved her life.

name: 哎？！你怎么找到这来了？已经到圣诞节了吗？
value: What? How did you find this place? Is it Christmas already?

name: 啊，原来是你啊。你有看到一个盒子吗？嗯……方方的，上面缠着彩丝带。
value: Ah, it's you. Did you see a box? Um, it's square, and it's wrapped with colorful ribbons.

name: 啊啊啊啊！下面的人小心！我要掉下来啦！
value: Aah!!!! Watch out down there! I'm falling!

name: 糟了，我把雪橇给弄丢了，这下子又要罚站了……要不你陪我一起站吧！
value: Oh no, I lost my sledge again. Lady Xmas will punish me for that... What about you take the punishment for me?

name: 主人，人家的角又开始痒痒了，能让人家在你身上蹭蹭吗？
value: Master, my horns are itch again. Can you let me rub on your body?

name: 主人，主人，今年圣诞节你想要什么礼物呢？姜饼，巧克力，还，是，我？
value: Master, what would you like for Christmas this year? Gingerbread? Chocolates? or... me?

name: 雪下得好大……今晚什么时候出门呢主人？孩子们一定都等不及了。
value: It's snowing heavily. What time will you go out tonight, master? The kids are gonna be so excited.

name: 又见面了，今后，你就是我的主人了。快坐上来，让我用雪橇，载着你周游世界吧。
value: Hello again, from now on, you are my master. Hop in, and I'll take you around the world in my sleigh.

name: 主人，我……我还是感觉床……有点太小了，我的脚……老是会伸出床边。
value: Master, I think I still feel my bed is too small... My feet always stick out of the bed.

name: 主人，主人，快让我躲躲，那只小兔子，又吵着要礼物了！
value: Master, please let me hide there. That annoying rabbit is clamoring for gifts again!

name: 啊，主人，能再借你的腿我睡一会吗？我真的很喜欢这种感觉，睡在你身边的感觉……很安全。
value: Ah, master, can I borrow your leg again and let me sleep there for a while? I really like this feeling. Sleeping beside you feels very safe.
