name: 进入战斗时，卑弥呼获得2层【招架】（无法驱散），每次受到超过自身最大生命值40%的伤害时，消耗1层【招架】，将伤害降低至自身最大生命值40%。卑弥呼必定暴击，且根据暴击值获得伤害增加，持续2回合。
value: When entering the battle, Himiko gains 2 layers of [Parry] (cannot be dispelled). Each time she receives DMG exceeding 40% of her Max HP, consume 1 layer of [Parry] to reduce the DMG to 40% of her Max HP. Himiko must have a critical hit and the DMG is increased according to her Crit. It lasts for 2 rounds.

name: 降低一次高额伤害
value: Reduce one hit with high DMG

name: 我还没有和十二地支的姐妹见过面呢，听说有很凶悍的家伙，不会欺负我吧？
value: I haven't met any of my sisters of twelve earthly branches. I heard that some of them are quite aggressive. Will they bully me?

name: 当一位地支神非常忙，要是碰到本命年，整年都得值班……
value: Being a god of the Twelve Earthly Branches is not easy. If it is your year in the zodiac, you are on duty all year round.

name: 你好像把我和月宫的小兔子弄混了呢。
value: You seem to have me confused with that bunny on the moon.

name: 我想和你在一起，就这样一直下去，直到世界末日降临……
value: I want to be with you, just like this, until the end of the world.

name: 寅虎和我，你更喜欢谁？
value: Who do you prefer, Zodiac Tiger or me?

name: 你对赛跑感兴趣吗？不如我们来比赛吧！
value: Are you interested in running? Let's have a race!

name: 其实也就那样……
value: Well... I have to work every year too.

name: 已经世界末日啦！
value: But this is the end of the world.

name: 才不要和兔子比赛跑！
value: Racing with you? A rabbit? A big no!

name: 这我可不大清楚……
value: I barely know any of them.

name: 你可以摸鱼呀。
value: I think you can slack off from your work from time to time.

name: 我还是能分清的。
value: I sure can tell the difference!

name: 这个嘛……你猜猜？
value: Hmm... want to take a guess?

name: 好啊，要赌一局吗？
value: Sure. Want to take a bet?

name: 我怎么感觉你满脸坏笑的表情，你好像有非常糟糕的期待啊……
value: What are you thinking? Your expression betrays your wicked thoughts.

name: 哼，要不你来替我做一天事情看看？
value: humph, why don't you do my job for a day and see how hard it is?

name: 当然不是！你好好看看，月兔的身材，有我这么火辣吗！
value: Of course not! She doesn't have such good figure.

name: 那就索性让我再抱一会吧……
value: Then hold me a little longer...

name: 比起大大咧咧的家伙，大家还是喜欢温柔的女孩多一点哦。
value: I think everyone prefers a tender girl like me.

name: 论赛跑，我说第二，可没人敢说第一！哼哼……
value: Of course you wouldn't dare to race with me, since I am the fastest of the fast.

name: 没关系，我可是一直有锻炼的哟，她们不一定打得过我呢！咻！咻咻！
value: It's okay. I have grown a lot stronger. They stand no chance of bullying me!

name: 那可不行，要是我算错了时间，一定会被教训的很惨的……
value: Haha, I can't do that. If I stopped paying attention and I lost count of the days, I'd be doomed.

name: 是吗？我还以为你们人类，会把所有的兔子都看成一样的呢。
value: Yeah?  I thought you human think all the rabbits are the same.

name: 蹭蹭，再蹭蹭，真舒服……
value: (Rubbing) I like to stay with you.

name: 哎呀……看来肯定是我了，你的表情已经透露了一切！
value: I am sure it's me! I can see it in your eyes.

name: 好啊，如果你输了，就得陪我出去约会一整天！
value: Well, if you lose, you gotta to take me to a date.

name: 你就是与我签订誓约的人类吗？哼哼，从今天开始，就会由小兔陪伴在你左右了，还请多多关照呢！
value: Are you the human who wish to vow to me? I will accompanied by your side from now on. Remember to come and see me if you got the time!

name: 集齐50个卯兔碎片可以召唤卯兔
value: Collect 50 Zodiac Rabbit Shards to summon Zodiac Rabbit

name: 原出自于华夏神系“十二地支”中第四位的“兔”。\n原本只是天上的药童，无意中吃了上神的金丹，获得了强大神力。为罚卯兔擅服金丹之罪，上神谴她下凡救世，用神力驱散凡间疫病。
value: Zodiac Rabbit is placed the fourth of the Twelve Earthly Branches.\nIn Chinese myth, she was originally a medicine girl in Heaven, but accidentally consumed God's golden elixir, which granted her great power. As punishment, she was sent down to Earth to use her divine power to save others by dispelling their diseases.

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_81
value: The unknown queen of heaven and earth!

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_82
value: Enhance Team DPS & Attack Enemy DPS

name: 这份只属于你的春节贺礼，是否触动心弦？
value: A look that represents the new beginning of a year.

name: 战争，鲜血……死亡，我子民的……挣扎。我是谁？我在哪？
value: ... Who am I? Where am I?

name: 锵锵！看看这是谁醒过来了！
value: Well, well, well, look who it is.

name: 欢迎来到潘多拉的魔女占卜店，有什么可以让我效劳的吗？
value: Himiko, welcome to my territory. Is there anything I can do for you?

name: 我……我想不起自己是谁了，一合上眼，就看到满河的尸体，破损的战船和……血。
value: I... I can't remember who I am. When I close my eyes, horrible images fill my mind. Dead bodies, broken ships, and... blood.

name: 看来我们伟大的日出国女皇，丢失了一半灵魂呢。
value: It seems that by witnessing something terrible, you have lost half of your soul. And you won't be able to remember who you are with only a few memories.

name: 我不知道你是怎么飘到我这里来的，既然来了，不如就和我做个交易如何？我保证帮你找到失去的东西。
value: I don't know how you got here. But since you are here, I can offer you a deal. I promise to help you restore your memories, but you must listen to me and do what I say. Do we have a deal?

name: 我……我答应你，反正现在的我，也没有什么可以失去的了。
value: I... Okay... I have nothing to lose anyway.

name: 看来你对你当前的处境，还是相当了解呢。不过我先要测试测试你的实力。
value: But... I have to test your ability first. Come! I challenge you to a duel.

name: 唔……看来你还没有忘记如何战斗。
value: Hmm... It seems your body still retains both its power and at least some of its skill.

name: 我也不知道，只是感觉拿上了刀，身体就自己动起来了，就像是本能反应一样。
value: I don't know how I did it. When I draw my blade out, my body just moves with it, like I have a natural fighting instinct.

name: 我猜的不错，战斗的记忆依旧保存在你残缺的灵魂里，这样就好，至少我不用分心保护你了。
value: This is good. At least I don't have to worry about protecting you.

name: 要找回你失去的另一半，首先得找到那些认识你的人，比如你曾经的子民，或者你的追随者。
value: To find your lost soul, you must first find people you know, like the people you used to rule or the followers you once had.

name: 总之，让我们先去你的家乡看看吧。
value: Anyway, let's head to your hometown and see who we can find.

name: 冷静，猫又，我是潘多拉，我带了个人来见你。
value: Calm down, Nekomata. I am Pandora. Look at who I brought.

name: ！！！女皇大人！您是卑弥呼女皇大人！
不可能的，卑弥呼大人早就辞世升天了，连本喵都只是在画像上见过，你是个冒牌货，吃我一爪！
value: It's impossible. Queen Himiko died a long time ago. You must be an imposter!

name: 看起来得打一架了。
value: I think we have no choice but to show her the power and strength of Queen Himiko.

name: 那把刀……就是传说中的天丛云剑喵？您真的是卑弥呼大人？
value: That blade... Is that the famous blade of Murakumo? So you really are Queen Himiko!?

name: 你的女皇大人失去了自己的过往，所以需要你们这些熟知她命运的人来告诉她，她究竟是个什么样的人。
value: Your queen has almost entirely forgotten her past. To restore those memories, former subjects such as you must remind her of her former glory.

name: 好了，我会把你们的记忆连接在一起，这样她就能从你的记忆里看到她原本的样子了……
value: So, I will now connect your minds together. Then she can see who she is in your memories.

name: 卑弥呼女皇大人是日出之地最伟大的女皇，是一位非常非常非常了不起的人喵！
value: Queen Himiko is the greatest queen of our land, a wonderful queen that cares for her people!

name: 现在，你看到她认知中你的样子了，感觉怎么样？
value: Now, seeing how she perceives you, how do you feel?

name: 我……我不知道，我还是不敢相信。
value: I... I don't know. I still can't believe that is me.

name: 没关系，咱们先去看一样东西。
value: Give yourself some time. Let's head out to our next destination.

name: 看看这阵风把咱们带到了哪。咦，这不是热田神宫嘛。
value: Look where we are! This is the Atsuta Shrine.

name: 我认得这里，我曾经好像……是这里的管理者。
value: I... I think I know this place. I used to... be in charge here.

name: 站住！此乃御神器供奉之所，闲杂人等，不得靠近！
value: Stop there! This is a sacred place, and thus a restricted area.

name: 哎呀哎呀，别急，小丫头，你看看这是谁。
value: Look at this woman standing before you. Don't you recognize her?

name: 卑弥……怎么可能？
value: Queen Himi... No, it is impossible!

name: 你们居然敢冒充女皇大人，不可原谅！
value: You dare to pose as our beloved queen! This is unforgivable!

name: 那段剑舞……是邪马台的古代舞蹈，你，你究竟是谁？
value: That blade technique... It's from the ancient Yamatai. Who are you?

name: 那还用说吗？这位便是你们的女皇，卑弥呼大人。
value: Isn't it obvious? This is your regent, Queen Himiko.

name: 这怎么会，卑弥呼大人可是千年前的人，怎么会出现在这里。
value: How is this possible. She died thousands of years ago...

name: 我作为传说中的魔女潘多拉，这不也活生生见到你面前了？
value: Then how do you explain me? I, Pandora, a mythical being also stand before you.

name: 好啦，不要再疑神疑鬼了，带我们进入神宫吧，咱们的女皇还有一段记忆要恢复呢。
value: Your duty, first and foremost, is to serve your queen. Take us into the shrine. Your queen hopes that it might trigger more of her lost memories.

name: 跟我来吧，我知道卑弥呼大人的八咫镜保存在什么地方。
value: Follow me. I know exactly what you need to see—the Yata no Kagami.

name: 好了，让我们来看看，这面镜子，和这小丫头的脑袋里，有些什么关于你的记忆。
value: Alright, let's see what this sacred mirror can do.

name: 卑弥呼大人，是改变日出之国的人，是让我们走出岛屿，让世界都知道我们存在的人。
value: Queen Himiko is the one who opened our small, isolated island to the wider world. She helped us grow and make new connections with other tribes.

name: 我……我真的有做出这样的功绩吗？
value: I... I did all of this?

name: 这面铜镜，是您的遗物，它记录了您生前的一切。
value: This mirror is your possession. It records your life.

name: 尊贵的女皇陛下，请快一点，咱们该见下一位客人了。
value: My dear queen, let's not waste time. We have another guest to see.

name: 女皇大人，有个人听说您归来了，非要来见您，我就自作主张，把她带来了。
value: Queen Himiko, someone has asked to see you.

name: 我们又见面了，现世的女皇啊。
value: Here we are again, Queen Himiko.

name: 我是月夜见尊，月住之处的主神。
value: I am Tsukuyomi, the moon god.

name: 不必多说，我已经知晓了你等处境。我之所以在此，就是要将属于你的那份力量，奉还于你。
value: Say no more. I have already heard of your situation. I came because I want to give you my power to help you recover your memory. But...

name: 我猜，您的馈赠，应该不是平白无故的吧。
value: But there is a price behind it?

name: 没错，我需要你，卑弥呼，邪马台的女皇，继续履行你旧日的职责——镇压黄泉女神！
value: Yes, I need you, Queen Himiko. I need you to perform your duty as a queen to beat Izanami. If she breaks free of her seal, people will suffer.

name: 我明白，我已经隐约记起了我的职责所在。
value: I understand. I think my memory is gradually coming back...

name: 很好，按照邪马台的传统，我会代替天照神给予你试炼，准备好了就来吧。
value: Good, then, as part of the Yamatai tradition, I must give you a trial. Come when you are ready!

name: 你做的很好，这份力量归还给你了。
value: You did great. My power is now yours.

name: 在你的人民的心目中，你就是母亲，你给他们带来和平，带来米粮，还有希望。
value: In the eyes of your people, you are their great mother. You bring food, peace, and hope to the lands.

name: 我……我辜负了我的子民，我将他们带上了战场，在战火中……燃烧殆尽。
value: But... I failed them. I led them into war, and they all died because of me.

name: 这是日出之国的命运。去吧，辉夜姬会给你最后的指引。
value: This is the fate of our people. There is nothing you can do to change it. I will call Princess Kaguya here. She will give you more guidance.

name: 辉夜姬，把那块勾玉带上来。
value: Princess Kaguya, bring that Magatama up here.

name: 这块八尺琼勾玉，上面残留着你的信念，卑弥呼，你就凭你的实力赢取它吧。
value: This precious jade artifact, the Yasakani no Magatama, stores part of your spirit. As you may recall, you must fight for it.

name: 请务必倾尽实力，卑弥呼大人。
value: I'd be honored to fight you!

name: 卑弥呼大人的力量，果然名不虚传，勾玉现在也算物归原主了。
value: Our dear queen really lives up to her reputation. What power!

name: 子民们称你为太阳的女儿，天照神的化身，因你炽热的信念，是指引他们战斗的信心。
value: Your people call you the daughter of the sun because your faith is like fire. I now see why. It is inspiring.

name: 我的……信念。我想我知道以前的我，是个什么样的人了。
value: My faith...I used to have that kind of faith? I vaguely remember...

name: 很好，继续前进吧，去追寻你的宿命。
value: Good, let's keep moving. Your fate awaits.

name: 巴里？抱歉，我们的行程里好像没有和你会面的计划。
value: Bari? I don't remember planning this meeting

name: 我建议你，哪凉快哪待着去！
value: I strongly suggest you step aside and don't bother us.

name: 巴里，我听说过你的事迹，你挡在我的必经之路上，意为何事？
value: Princess Bari, I have heard a lot about you. Why are you here?

name: 有人拉我入伙，想让我干掉你。但我有个新主意。
value: Someone asked me to defeat you. But I have a proposal for you.

name: 新主意？说实话我挺有兴趣的。
不如你们和我打一场，打赢了我，我就“被迫”向你们透露点信息。如果输了的话，您恐怕就得跟我走了。
value: Let's fight. If you win, then I will have to tell you the truth about who sent me.. But if you lose, you have to come with me.

name: 求之不得，来吧！
value: That sounds fair. Let's do it!

name: 啊……你居然寻回了三神器？
value: What? That blade... the sacred mirror and the jade artifact... How did you manage to find these three artifacts?

name: 承认吧，你不是我的对手。
value: Just admit it. You are no match for me.

name: 呼……好吧，这次算你赢，我期待着再次和你决战！
value: Fine, you win. But I will not stop challenging you in the future!

name: 好啦，亲爱的，你答应过我们，要“被迫”透露一点信息的，是时候兑现你的承诺了。
value: Now, darling, you promised. You must tell the truth. Who is behind this and why?

name: 黄泉女神，伊邪那美回归了，她正在酝酿着降临现世的计划。
value: Izanami sent me. She is planning her return.

name: 我担心的事情，终于还是发生了……
value: I knew it! Why can't she stop coming back?

name: 放心吧，我会封印她，就像过去一样！
value: Relax, I will defeat her and seal her away, just as I have done in the past.

name: 天呐，不是吧，真是哪里有麻烦哪里就有她。
value: Oh my gosh! Why do I keep running into you?

name: 你们的路到头了，离开，或者死亡！
value: The road you are on ends here. Leave, or die!

name: 巨龙，我手中的刀，斩杀过你无数的同类，在它的面前，你毫无胜算！
value: This blade I hold has killed many dragons. You stand no chance against me.

name: 那就试试吧，让我看看这把传说中的神剑，究竟是不是徒有虚名！
value: Then try. Let's see if that blade is as mighty as you say.

name: 看来你比我想象中难对付得多！
value: You are much tougher than I thought.

name: 哼，彼此彼此，这场对决确实让我热血沸腾。
value: And your technique with that blade really impressed me.

name: 你赢得了我的尊敬，不介意的话，我愿指引你梦境中接下来的方向。
value: You have won my respect. If you don't mind, let's team up, and I will help you to get out of this place.

name: 啊，一份可口的晚餐……
value: Ah, what have I found here? A delicious dinner.

name: 阿佩普？作为埃及毁灭之神，为什么会跑到这里来？
value: Apep? Why are you here? What evil plot are you a part of this time?

name: 伊邪那美向我许诺，会将整个黄泉比良坂的灵魂都交予我掌控，只要我能帮助她降临。
value: Shush! Don't cut me off. I am here becasue Izanami promised to let me take charge of all souls in this land if I helped her.

name: 她不会得逞的，而你恐怕也无法阻拦我。
value: She will not succeed, and I am afraid you are no match for me either.

name: 我很乐意赌一把试试看。
value: I am willing to take the chance.

name: 她消失了？看来这不是她的本体，只是个分身而已。
value: Did she just disappear? It seems like she was just an illusion.

name: 我已经感受到了伊邪那美的气息，古老而深邃……走吧，我们要赶在她降临之前阻止她。
value: I sense that Izanami is about to come. Let's hurry up. We have to stop her before it is too late.

name: 很久都没有见你了呢……那时你和天照刚诞生不久……
value: I haven't seen you for a long time...

name: 不要妄图蛊惑我，你不是我母亲，她已经死了，你只是有着她面容的可憎幻影！
value: Don't try to trick me. You are no mother to me. My mother is dead.

name: 你不愧为天照亲手创造的复制品，你的每一个动作，都和她一模一样。
value: As the creation of Amaterasu, you are just like her, so irrational.

name: 我已经取回了三神器，我会再次将你封印，一如既往！
value: I have collected the three artifacts, and I will use them to seal your power!

name: 来吧，让你们感受我这千万年的怨恨，和……恐惧……
value: I dare you to try! I spent all these years in darkness, and no one cared about how I felt. You shall feel my wrath!

name: 我不会消失，我将永远存在，只要世上还有怨恨，我就会存在……
value: I will not disappear as long as there is hatred in the world!

name: ……她说得没错，她不会被真正的消灭，只要人世还存在恩怨情仇，她就还会回来。
value: ……She is right. She will not be destroyed completely. One day she will return.

name: 这大概就是我被召回人世的原因。
value: I think that's why I came back to life.

name: 我的身体……似乎正在消失，我到底怎么了？为什么会这样？
value: My body.... feels different... What is happening?

name: 伊邪娜美消失的地方，好像残留着什么！
卑弥呼，我来找你了。
value: Himiko, I am coming for you!

name: 你……你浑身充满恶念，你究竟是……
我是你丢失的那一半，我是你内心深处黑暗渴望，我就是你，带领你的子民走向毁灭之人。
value: I am the other half of your soul, your darkest desires come to life. I am the one who leads our people to ruin.

name: 不，我不信，你不可能是我，我不会有你身上那种邪恶。
value: No! I don't believe it. You can't be me.

name: 不管你信不信，我就是你，是你摒弃的那一半，只有拥抱我，你才能会变成完整的存在。
value: Whether you believe me or not, I am the part of you that you so often cast aside. Only when you embrace me will you become whole.

name: 我会终结这个轮回，与你共赴黄泉！
我会与你同归于尽！
value: I will end this and perish with you.

name: 看来这是我们的天命……
value: This is our destiny, and there is no way to escape it.

name: 也许你是对的，没人能摒弃自己的另一面活着。我接受你。
来吧，我等这一天已经很久了。
value: Come. I've been waiting a long time for this day.

name: 你不能这样做！如果你离开了，将无人守护日出之国！
value: You can't do this! If you leave, there will be no one to protect our land!

name: 月读阁下，没有权力会有永恒，但始终会有人继承我的信念……
value: Tsukuyomi, no power will last forever. Someday, someone else will assume my responsibility.

name: 真是让人费解，在我看来，如同日月一样，人都有自己黑暗的另一面，没有人可以舍弃。
value: No one can shed their dark side. They are bound together, just like the sun and moon.

name: 不，她只是脱离了这场梦境的轮回，看来她最终寻找到了自己存在的价值。
value: No, she has just left this dreamland. I think she finally knows what needs to be done.

name: 而我们要做的，只是祈祷她经历这场梦境后，能够在现实世界坚持自己的信念而已。
value: And the only thing we can do is pray that she will continue to adhere to her faith back in the real world.

name: 祝她好运吧，我们也应该离开了。
这里是什么地方？我明明是在彩虹桥口，为什么突然到这里来了？
value: What is this place? I thought I was guarding the Rainbow Bridge leading to Asgard. Why am I here?

name: 你的身体依旧还守在彩虹桥上，只是你的意识被彩虹桥送到了这里。
value: Your body is still there, but your mind has made its way to this place.

name: 所以，你来此有何贵干？换句话说，你在寻找什么？海姆达尔，阿斯加德仙宫的守望者。
value: So, Heimdall, what draws you to my dreamland? Or should I ask, what is the guard of the Rainbow Bridge searching for?

name: 我，我看到了诸神的黄昏……
value: As I was drifting off to sleep, I was thinking about Ragnarok, and the death of all gods.

name: 在那一天，所有的神族的敌人都冲上了彩虹桥，和我们展开决战，最后……
value: It's foretold that our enemies will rush the Rainbow Bridge on that day. It's the scene of the final fight...

name: 我们的世界在火巨人苏特尔的剑下，化为了灰烬。
value: In the end, our home will be burnt to ashes by the sword of Surtr, the Fire Giant.

name: 所以你才想寻遍九界，寻找破解你们族人命运的方法。
value: So you are looking for a way to stop this from happening?

name: 或许这是既定的命运呢？或许这是无法改变的未来呢？
我相信一定有办法可以挽救阿斯加德，即便那是命运，我也要将它打碎！
value: There must be a way to save Asgard. I can't stand to see it destroyed.

name: 很好。我是潘多拉，就我先试试你的力量，看你有没有资格担当这份重任。
value: Well, then, you have come to the right place! I can help you with that. I am Pandora, the creator of this dreamland. But first, I must test you to see if you're strong enough to survive the journey.

name: 不错，仙宫的守望者，果然名不虚传。
value: Hmm, not bad. Your reputation as the guardian of Asgard is well merited.

name: 跟我走吧，我这前段日子刚好来了位客人，她也许能给你解答。
value: Follow me. I may know someone here who has a solution to your problem.

name: 蜂蜜蜂蜜，哪里有蜂……找到你就吃顿饱，哼~哼~
value: Where is my honey? I was promised lots of honey!

name: 啊……你是谁？我可没记着邀请过你这号人物来我这做客，我的客人呢，在哪？
value: Who are you??? I don't remember inviting you here. And where is my guest? I invited Belldandy to join us.

name: 啊这，这难道不是洛基的花园吗？是她邀请我过来的，说藏着几罐好蜜，送给我吃。
value: Eh? I thought this garden belongs to Loki. She invited me here, promising plenty of honey.

name: 洛基？她在这里？这是她的作风。
value: Loki? Is she here? It was a probably a trick. This is what Loki likes to do.

name: 不，她是我的敌人……最大的敌人！
value: No, she is my enemy... The greatest one!

name: 看来，咱们要找的人一定是被她藏起来了，咱们只能先找到她。
value: I see. I see. It seems that Loki has kidnapped the person we're looking for. Let's go find her.

name: 喂，你们到底想怎么样啊，突然出现还吵吵闹闹的，让我怎么吃饭啊？
value: Stop making so much noise, and give me the honey I was promised!

name: 说了多少遍了这是我的地盘！该离开的是你才对。
value: This is my garden. And I never promised you any honey.

name: 告诉我洛基她现在在哪？
value: You need to tell us where Loki is now.

name: 哼哼！有本事就来打一架，只要你们打得赢我，我就告诉你们。
value: Humph! You expect me to answer your questions when you won't give me any honey? Defeat me in combat, if you have the courage, and maybe I'll tell you where she is.

name: 她……她哭了，是我下手太重了吗？
value: She... she crying. Did I go too far?

name: 放心吧，她这身熊皮厚着呢，你刚才那几下，也就给她造成了点皮外伤。
value: Don't worry. Her bearskin is thick and strong. Those wounds will be gone within a day or two.

name: 好了，别哭了，打之前你说什么来着？
value: Stop your crying! *sigh* And you think we lack courage? Hmph! Now tell us, where is Loki?

name: 我知道了，我这就带你们去找她，哼哼！
value: Alright, alright. I will take you to her!

name: 到啦，就是这里。
value: This is it. We are here.

name: 你们看，那个站在楼顶上的人，就是她。
value: See that shadow standing there? It's Loki.

name: 洛基！洛基！我在这！这里有人在找你！
value: Loki! Loki! It's me, Ungnyeo. There's someone here to see you.

name: 那不是洛基，那是个女武神。
value: She is not Loki. The angel standing here is Valkyrie.

name: 你们是什么人？咦，海姆达尔？
value: Who are you? And why is Heimdall here?

name: 瓦尔基里，你在这里干什么？
value: I have the same question for you, Valkyrie.

name: 不对，你们一定是她创造出的幻象。给我现出原型吧！
value: You must be an illusion created by Loki! Show me who you really are!

name: 现在你清醒了？好好看看，我们究竟是不是幻象。
value: We are not illusions. Do you believe your eyes now?

name: 你确实是真正的海姆达尔……我还以为你是洛基创造出来的幻象。
value: I thought Loki was trying to trick me again.

name: 说说，你为什么会在这里？
value: So tell me, why are you here?

name: 洛基骗了我，让我在这里寻找我姐妹们的踪迹，然后又派来一波波幻象怪物偷袭，想要除掉我。
value: Loki deceived me! She said I could find clues here about where my sisters had gone. Since I arrived, she's sent waves of monsters and illusions to attack me.

name: 你知道她朝哪个方向去了吗？
value: Do you know where she was headed?

name: 哦呀？我不认识你，你怎么会知道我的名字？
value: Oh? Who are you? Why do you know my name?

name: 我是海姆达尔，这是瓦尔基里，你不认识我们了？
value: I am Heimdall, and this is Valkyrie. Don't you remember us?

name: 我好像不认识什么海姆达尔，把我的头发还给我吧，我就放你们走。
value: I don't know anyone by that name. But if you give back my hair, I will let you pass.

name: 头发？什么头发？
value: Hair? What are you talking about?

name: 哇哦，你看她的头发，好像被人剪了一大截，简直就像小羊啃过的草坪。
value: Wow, what happened to her hair? It looks like a lawn eaten by a flock of hungry sheep.

name: 一定又是洛基干的好事！
希芙，我们好好谈谈，可以吗？你以前可是一位温柔的人。
value: Sif, can you tell us what happened?

name: 废话少说！如果不交出我的头发，我就从你们头上拔，直到我满意为止。
value: Cut your nonsense. If you don't give back my hair, then I will take yours instead.

name: 我的头……好痛，我这是在哪？海姆达尔？瓦尔基里？你们怎么在这里？
value: My head... where has my beautiful hair gone?! Heimdall and Valkyrie? What are you doing here?

name: 这也是我想问的话，希芙，你是怎么来到这个地方的？
value: It's a long story. Let's not talk about this now. Why are you here, Sif?

name: 洛基，这个家伙偷走了我的头发，还用魔法迷惑了我。
value: Loki, that horrible piece of sh-. She took my hair and bewildered me with her magic!

name: 姐妹们，帮我打败洛基，抢回我的头发。
value: Sisters, I need to find her and get my hair back!

name: 那正好，我们也在找她，就劳烦你带路吧。
value: Good, we are also looking for her. Come, follow us.

name: 哇！好大的一片花园呀，这里一定有不少蜜蜂！小蜜蜂啊小蜜蜂，哼哼……
value: Wow! What a big garden. There must be lots of bees and honey...

name: 哎呀，这是芙蕾雅的榭寄生花园，她怎么也在这里？
value: This must be Freyja's Secret Garden. What is she doing here?

name: 你们是谁，竟敢闯入我的花园！
value: Who dares to enter my garden?

name: 芙蕾雅，我是海姆达尔……你忠实的姐妹。
你就是那个害死我的孩子巴德尔的人？
value: Heimdall? You were the one who strangled my son, Baldr!

name: 你也被魔法迷惑了吗？可恶的洛基！
value: I am no killer... Wait. Are you also bewildered by Loki's magic?

name: 等等，我这是在哪？你们是谁？呀！！
value: Wait... Who am I? Where am I...

name: 哎呀，我……我都说了些什么呀，有没有不小心说出有失礼节的话呢？
芙蕾雅，你的举止一直优雅绝伦，即便受到了洛基迷惑。究竟发生了什么？
value: Freyja, don't worry. Everything is fine.

name: 我在追踪她的过程中了她的魔法，她突然转身对我邪魅一笑，我迷迷糊糊就来到了这里。
value: I was tracking her, and I was so close to catching her... I remember she turned around and smiled at me. And then... That's all I can remember.

name: 如果你们正在找洛基，请带上我，我嘛，要好好教育教育……这个调皮的小坏蛋。
value: If you are looking for Loki, take me with you. I need to teach her a lesson!

name: 有了你的帮助，我们会更加强大，姐妹。
value: With your help, we will have a better chance of beating her.

name: 这是……耶梦加得之台。
value: This looks like the realm of the Midgard Serpent.

name: 这不是耶梦加得之台，只不过是洛基那拙劣的幻象而已。
value: No, that's also an illusion created by Loki.

name: 这都是些什么阿猫阿狗……我真是越来越搞不明白了，这到底是我的梦境领域，还是洛基的……
value: Who are you??? I am so confused. Is this my dreamland or Loki's?

name: 我在九界中看到过你的模样，你是美杜莎，蛇发女妖，石之国的女王！
value: I have seen you before. You are Medusa, one of the three Gorgon sisters.

name: 看来洛基说的没错，这个世界上，还真没有你海姆达尔不知晓的事情呢。
value: It looks like Loki was right about you. There is nothing you don't know...

name: 你这么聪明，不如你猜猜，我在这里干什么。
value: Since you are so smart, why don't you guess what I'm doing here?

name: 洛基一定许诺将耶梦加得的力量赐予你，然后你就借着这个力量，回去找雅典娜复仇。
value: Loki must have promised you the power of the Midgard Serpent, and with that power, you plan to beat Athena.

name: 哎呀呀，不得不说，你洞察人心的能力，还真是……嗯，别具一格。
洛基从来都不会履行自己的承诺，你被她骗了。
value: You should know that Loki never honors her commitments. She lied to you.

name: 那就让我们拭目以待吧。
value: Is that right? Or do you just want me to tell you where she is? Take this!

name: 这儿不属于你，离开吧，回到你的世界去！
value: This is not your world. Leave now!

name: 洛基这家伙，真是越来越胆大妄为了，居然联合其他国度的神来对付我们。
value: Loki, that audacious swindler... She managed to pull in helpers from another realm!

name: 没关系，希芙，我们会抓到她的，到时候再把她锁起来，好好教育教育她阿斯加德的礼仪。
value: Don't worry, Sif. We will catch her and lock her in the dungeon of Asgard.

name: 约顿海姆？我们怎么到了冰霜巨人的国度？潘多拉，这是怎么回事？我还在你的梦境里吗？
value: Why are we in the land of Frost Giants? Pandora, what happened? Are we still in your dreamland?

name: 当然还在，这个世界显然不是我制造出来的，是你们那位叫做洛基的朋友。
value: Yes, but I didn't create this place. Loki did.

name: 我能感受到她的气息，洛基……
难道你们不知道，未经许可造访他人宅邸是一件失礼的事情吗？我可不记得有给你们发邀请函。
value: Don't you know that you are all trespassing? I don't remember inviting any of you here.

name: 一头冰龙？你该不会是想把这儿当巢穴了吧？真是的……这可是我大名鼎鼎的魔女潘多拉的地盘！
value: An ice dragon? Do you take this as your home? This is my place.

name: 潘多拉？呵呵呵呵，就是那个连自己盒子里装的什么都不知道的笨蛋？
value: Pandora? If it isn't the stupid angel that doesn't even know what's in her magical little box.

name: 居然敢说我是笨蛋？海姆达尔，干掉这只小蜥蜴，我就带你去找洛基。
value: How dare you call me stupid! Heimdall, let's kill that annoying little lizard.

name: 可恶！这次算你们人多，下次我会在你落单的时候，来和你一战。我记住了你们了！
value: Damn! There are so many of you. That wasn't a fair fight! I will come after you when you are alone.

name: 可算是走了，我可不喜欢家里来太多奇奇怪怪的客人，弄得一团糟。
value: Finally! She left. Look what a mess she made to my dreamland!

name: 欢迎各位来到我的剧场，接下来我将为各位带来阿斯加德最凄美，最壮烈的史诗巨作——巴德尔的葬礼！
value: Welcome to my theater! Now I will present the most magnificent masterpiece——Baldr's funeral!

name: 是奥丁，她怎么会在这儿？
value: Is that Odin? What's she doing here?

name: 奥丁？不，这可不是奥丁，这是洛基。我隔这么远都能闻到她身上的那股邪魔外道的气息。
value: Odin? No, you're Loki! I can even smell the vileness of this place! Only she would treat my son's death like a twisted joke.

name: 洛基，你骗不了我们！
value: Loki, you can not trick us!

name: 我乃独眼之奥丁！我要好好教训一下你们，让你们明白你们该尊敬谁！
value: I am Odin, the Queen of Asgard. You dare to question my authority?

name: 哼，本来就是洛基的幻影。
value: I told you she was Loki in disguise.

name: 姐妹们，洛基就在这不远了，我能感受到她。
value: Sisters, Loki is around. Be careful.

name: 可恶，居然变成我的样子来愚弄我，真是不可饶恕！
value: How dare you pretend to be me?

name: 洛基，你把我的客人——命运女神，弄到哪去了？
value: Loki, what have you done to my guest?

name: 别急，魔女，我只不过变成了你的样子，暂时把她骗到一旁欣赏风景去了。
value: Oh, do you mean Belldandy? Don't worry. I tricked her and led her somewhere else. She's safe there.

name: 哎呀哎呀，我那野蛮粗暴的海姆达尔，你又要动不动就对我挥动武器了吗？大可不必大可不必。
你不是想要知道破解诸神黄昏的方法吗？来吧，让我开心一下，或许我就会告诉你。
value: Don't you want to know how to avoid Ragnarok? Let's play a game, and then maybe I'll tell you how.

name: 既然你那么想挨揍，那么这一次也让你如愿。
value: Since you're so desperate for a fight, I'll give you one.

name: 怎么样，和镜子里的自己打架，是不是很好玩呢？
value: Is it fun to fight yourself?

name: 快变回你自己的样子，否则我就再打你一顿！
value: Change back to your true form, or I will beat you again.

name: 不不不，我才刚喜欢上你的样子呢……至少让我再快乐一阵子。
value: I just fell in love with your look. At least let me use it for a while.

name: 随便你，快把命运女神交出来。
value: Ugh... Whatever! Tell us where Belldandy is!

name: 糟糕，我也不记得把她藏在哪了，是北边那个洞呢，还是西边那个……
value: Oh damn, I don't remember where I hid her. Was it the mountains in the North or the forest to the West...

name: 休想再愚弄我，狡猾的家伙！
value: Stop playing us! You filthy trickster!

name: 停停停停！你就不想听听破解诸神黄昏的方法吗？我可是知道的哟。
value: Okay, okay. Do you want to know how to avoid Ragnarok? I can tell you.

name: 你说的话我一个字也不信，把女神交出来，然后你就可以离开了。
value: I don't trust a word coming from your mouth. Tell us where Belldandy is!

name: 好好好，这可是你自己要见她的啊。哎呀呀，有人想和命运打交道呢，真是难以置信。
value: Alright, alright. But remember, you asked to see the goddess of fate yourself. No one forced that on you.

name: 好了，命运女神来了，你自己和她玩吧，我就不在这里扫兴了。
value: Well, there she is. I'm leaving now. Until next time.

name: 那你告诉我，如何才能拯救阿斯加德？
你把耳朵靠过来，我只说给你一个人听。
value: Come closer, I will only tell this to you.

name: 姐妹们，返回阿斯加德吧，我知道如何拯救我们的国度了。
value: Sisters, let's go back to Asgard. I know how to save our world.

name: 不，不对劲，洛基和你说了些什么？
命运之轮，转动不止，它揭示一切，以及你的到来。你不必开口，我以及知晓了你的疑问。
value: The wheel of destiny turns round and round like a spindle. It reveals everything, including your arrival. You don't have to speak. I know why you are here.

name: 那么请告诉我破解诸神黄昏，解救阿斯加德的方法。
value: Then, please tell me how to save Asgard from Ragnarok.

name: 命运之所以是命运，是因为它本身就是注定会发生的，它本身就是在未来发生过的事实。
value: Fate is absolute and immutable. That is why it is called fate.

name: 如果我偏要修改这段命运呢？
value: What if I have to change it?

name: 我会阻止你……
value: As the goddess of fate, I will stop you...

name: 住手！修改命运，会带来无法预计的后果，有可能会为所有世界都带来毁灭！
value: Stop! If you change fate, the consequences will be devasting. The world will be destroyed!

name: 我的家园都没了，我还需要诸界干什么？
value: Why should I care about the rest of the world if I've lost my homeland?

name: 如今我终于看到了命运修改后的世界……诸神黄昏危机解除了……等等！那是什么？！
value: I... I can see what happens if I change the world's fate... There will be no Ragnarok... Wait! What is that?

name: 一个巨大的黑影遮住的世界……那是什么，我看不清，洪水……冰川，整个世界都陷入了冰冻。
value: A giant shadow is covering the world... What is that? I can't see through it... Wait, it is ice... The world is frozen!

name: 你看到了吗，这就是命运被改变后的世界。
value: Now you see what the world would be like if you changed your fate.

name: 难道真的……没有办法了吗？
女孩，家园从来不是一个地方，只要你们还有血脉尚存，就会有未来。
value: My girl, nothing can destroy your homeland, including Ragnarok. As long as your people survive, there is always a chance to rebuild.

name: 怎么说？就这么……结束了？
value: So what happened? Is it over?

name: 结束了。接下来我会回到彩虹桥，去迎接诸神黄昏的到来，以及……将我们的知识与文明，传承下去。
value: It is over. I will return to my station to face fate. I will try to pass down our knowledge and culture to my people so that Asgard will be reborn one day.

name: 用于提升海姆达尔的梦境中记忆宝珠的等级
value: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Heimdall's Dreamland

name: 海姆达尔女神碎片自选箱
打开宝箱选择海姆达尔任意品质的碎片
value: Open the box and choose Heimdall's Shards of any quality

name: VALENTINES_LUXURY_TIPS
value: {0} Sweet Pt,{1} Favor. Pt. and items

name: VALENTINES_NORMAL_TIPS
value: {0} Sweet Pt,{1} Favor. Pt. and items

name: 金笼怜香-海姆达尔
value: Bird of the Golden Cage - Heimdall

name: 进入战斗时，使前排友方女神获得海姆达尔生命值2%的物抗，后排友方女神获得海姆达尔生命值1%的防御力和魔抗，持续1回合（无法驱散）。海姆达尔每次行动时，选择当前血量百分比最低的一名友军进行【链接】，代替其承受全部攻击，持续1回合（无法驱散）
value:
When entering battle, front row allies receive a P.RES boost equal to 2% of Heimdall's HP, while the back row's DEF and M.RES increase by 1% of her HP. Effect last 1 turn (cannot be dispelled).
When Heimdall is in action, bestows a [Link UR+] to one ally with the lowest percentage of HP for 1 round.

[Link UR+]: All DMG targeting this angel will be received by Heimdall. This effect cannot be dispelled.

name: 增加海姆达尔生命值1%的防御力
value: Increases DEF by 1% of Heimdall’s HP

name: 增加海姆达尔生命值2%的物抗
value: Increases P.RES by 2% of Heimdall’s HP

name: 增加海姆达尔生命值1%的魔抗
value: Increases M.RES by 1% of Heimdall’s HP

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_83
value: The eternal guardian of the Rainbow Bridge!

name: 情人节活动期间挂机掉落，用于进行女神邀约，活动结束后自动回收
value: Drops during the Valentine's Day event. You can use it to ask the angel out. (Auto-recycled after the event ends)

name: 浪漫折扣 限时促销
value: Discount for Love with Time Limit

name: 浪漫赠礼活动排行榜奖励
恭喜您在浪漫赠礼活动排行榜活动中获得第{0}名，以下为您的奖励：
value: Congratulations on ranking {0} in the Romantic Giving event. You will get the following rewards:

name: 请选择邀约女神
value: Please invite an angel for the date.

name: 用于甜蜜商店兑换道具
value: Used to redeem items in the Love Store

name: 浪漫赠礼限定道具回收
本次浪漫赠礼活动已结束，活动道具已自动回收成钻石！
value: The Romantic Giving event is ended. All event items are recycled into diamonds.

name: 该女神好感度已满
value: Favorability Point of that angel reaches max limit

name: VALENTINES_HERO_FAVOR_MAX
value: Favorability Point of that angel reaches max limit. Are you sure you want to give gifts?

name: 活动结束后清空甜蜜积分
value: All Sweet Points will be reset after the event ends.

name: 我接待过不少客人，但像你这样从天上掉下来的，还真是罕见呢。
value: I have met many angels who accidentally came here, none of them fell from the sky like you.

name: 你是谁？这是什么地方？我这是怎么了？
value: Who are you? What is this place?

name: 是的，巨龙，每个来我这的，都问过一模一样的问题。
value: Yeah, yeah. I am tired of answering the same question again and again.

name: 我是潘多拉，秘密与探究之神，这是我的梦境，在这里，你尽情追求你想要的。
value: I'll only say this once, so listen carefully. I am Pandora, the goddess of mystery. This is my dreamland where you can get what you desire the most.

name: 我……我想找回我失去的力量，重新飞向那片天空。
value: I... I want to recover my lost power and be able to fly again.

name: 来我这试图寻找力量的神可不少，你得先过我这关，让我评估评估你有没有这个资格。
value: I am not surprised. Plenty of angels came here for power. But before you continue your quest, I have a test for you.

name: 这就是风暴巨龙的力量吗？看来你还有点厉害，即便是在这样虚弱的情况下。
value: Hmm, this is the power of the storm. It is strong and overpowering.

name: 这样是不是就代表我够格了？
value: Does this mean I passed your test?

name: 唔，至少不会被一下子击溃了。咳咳，我可是对你留手了哦。
value: Ye...Yes... But remember, I went easy on you this time.

name: 我感受到了……风的气息。
value: The wind is telling me someone is nearby...

name: 喵！本喵才不是普通的猫！本喵可是大名鼎鼎的猫又！
value: I am not just a cat, Meow! I am the Nekomata!

name: 你身上有我正在寻找的风之力，请把它交给我。
value: I think you have the power of the wind that I am looking for. Hand that to me now if you know what's good for you.

name: 喵？你要这颗珠子？这可是本喵好不容易得来的，哪有你说给你就给你的啊？
value: Do you mean that Bead of the Wind? No, I will not give you that! That's my precious.

name: 这是你无法掌控的力量，只有风暴龙族才能使用。
value: This bead contains power you can't control. Only the dragon of the storm can use it to its fullest potential.

name: 那就过来抢啊喵！你打得过我我就把它交给你喵！
value: Humph, I don't believe you. If you want it, come and get it yourself.

name: 呼……呼……别打了别打了，本喵认输。
给，这是你要的风之宝珠，喵。
value: Take this Bead of the Wind.

name: 我感觉力量得到了恢复……虽然只有一部分。
value: I think my power is partly restored...

name: 你太虚弱了，也许还需要继续寻找更多力量，才能让你获得重回天空的机会。
value: This won't give you enough power to fly again. Let's find the rest of them.

name: 那就请继续带路吧，潘多拉。
等一下喵！你们要去冒险吗？请带上本喵！本喵会在路上给你们不少帮助的喵！
value: Wait, are you going on an adventure? Please take me with you!

name: 看来也是个渴求力量的宝宝呢，那就跟上吧。
value: Just stop crawling all over me and get off me!

name: 喵！前面的那个家伙好像在吃东西，不如我们趁她不注意……
value: Meow! I think someone over there is eating something... Let's ambush her!

name: 我感受到了，她身上有我在寻找的雷霆之力。
value: I can feel the thunder power that I am looking for.

name: 哎？！你们，你们是从哪里冒出来的？
value: What!? Where did you come from?

name: 你身上带着雷霆之力感应到了我的存在。
value: You have one of my Beads of power. That's how I found you.

name: 哼哼，在我的地方偷吃了这么多，是该还一点回来了。
value: Why are you always eating when I meet you? Do you know you have devoured all the honey in my dreamland?

name: 你们是来抢我的蜂蜜的吗？
value: Are you here to take my honey from me?

name: 我们……算了算了，你手里那个带电的罐子，对，就是装蜂蜜的那个，拿来给我们。
value: We are not... Never mind. Hand me that jar that's creating sparks in the air. Yes, that one with honey in it.

name: 我，我不明白……你，你们干嘛非要这个罐子不可。
value: I, I don't understand... Why do you want that jar?

name: 这个罐子，是过去用来储存雷电的容器，叫做雷霆圣杯，我需要它上面残留的雷霆之力。
value: This jar is used to store thunder, it is called Thunder Grail. I need its power.

name: 原来是这样，我说怎么老有股麻麻的触电感觉，等我把里面的蜂蜜吃完就给你。
value: That's what it is... No wonder why I sometimes felt like lightning was hitting me. Wait a second. Let me finish the rest of the honey, and I will give it back to you. Here.

name: 我能感受到，雷电的力量正在涌入我的身体。
value: I can feel the power of thunder rumbling through my body.

name: 但这还不够，我还需要更多。
你们是要去找好吃的吗？请带上我一个！
value: Are you going to find delicious food to eat?

name: 吃的？你脑子里除了吃还有其他东西吗？
value: Is there anything else you care about beside food?

name: 呵呵，据说，雨水是天下最纯净的水，如果用它来煮茶，一定能煮出绝佳的风味……
value: It is said that rain is the purest water and that it makes the best tea.

name: 所以这就是你占有雨水之力的原因？
value: That's why you took my power of rain as your own?

name: 不对不对，我可没“占有”它，我只是找一个自称“日出处女王”的家伙那取来的。
value: I didn't steal that. I took part of it from the Queen of Yamatai, Himiko.

name: 她在哪？带我去见她。
value: Where is she? Please take me to her.

name: 那可不行，她可是我重要的合作伙伴……除非你能打赢我，证明你有能力取代她的位置。
value: What? No, I will not betray her. She is an important ally. Unless... you prove your worth by defeating me.

name: 你输了，现在你可以带我们去见她了。
value: You lost. Now take us to her.

name: 好吧好吧，我带你去见她……真是不识雅性呢。
value: Well, well, well... What's the rush?

name: 哎呀，一不小心，迷路了呢……
尊客，在下记得没有邀请过诸位来到在下的领域……诸位来此是有何见教吗？
value: I don't remember inviting any of you here... What do you want from me?

name: 抱歉，我们只是路过……
value: I am sorry. We are just passing by...

name: 你身上，散发着强者的气息呢。
哦？龙神大人，您似乎在追求着什么。
value: Hmm? What? Are you interested in fighting me?

name: 力量……以及强大的对手。
value: Yes, you are a good opponent.

name: 等等，你不会是想和她打吧？
value: Wait! Why don't you all calm down?

name: 既然龙神大人有意，在下不介意与您比试比试。
在下输了，龙神大人，真的是武力充沛呢。
value: I lost. You are indeed powerful...

name: 与其认输，不如跟着我，和我一同寻找力量吧。
value: Why don't you follow me, and we can become more powerful together?

name: 这要求会不会显得有些失礼？
value: What? It isn't polite to say that bluntly.

name: 无妨，在下将辅佐龙神大人布武世间。
value: There is no need to be subtle about that. I accept your offer.

name: 呼……找到了，这就是你要追寻的雨水之力所有者。
吾乃日出之国的女皇，汝等是何人……月神大人，您怎么……
value: I am the Queen of Yamatai. Who are you? Goddess of the moon, why are you with them?

name: 在下答应龙神大人要助她寻回昔日力量。
value: I promised to help Storm Dragon take back her power.

name: 卑弥呼，你持有求雨之盘，那么在下将不得不与你为敌了。
value: Himiko, you have the Plate of Rain. It contains the power of the rain.

name: 这盘子，对吾，对吾之子民，有着大用，恕吾不能交与汝等。
value: This plate means a lot to my people. I can't give that to you.

name: 看来这份力量，始终不属于吾。
value: It seems this power doesn't serve me after all...

name: 即便你得到了，也无法使用它，倒不如还给我，等我力量恢复，就为你的国家带去风调雨顺。
value: Even if you own it, you can't make full use of it. But if you give it back to me, I will use it to bestow favorable weather to your land once my power is restored

name: 既然如此，吾便追随在汝左右，亲眼见证这一刻的到来。
value: Then, I will help you to recover it.

name: 你已经恢复了风、雷、雨的力量了，风暴之龙，下一步你准备要做什么？
value: So, we have the wind, the thunder, and the rain... What's next?

name: 按照我族的传统，应该行飞升之礼了。要飞升，必须得到西王母的试炼……
value: By tradition, we must undergo the Trial of Ascension? To start the trial, we must first pay a visit to Xiwangmu.

name: 西王母？那可巧得很呢，我刚好知道她在哪，就让我带你去吧。
value: Xiwangmu? I happen to know where she is. Let me take you to her.

name: 你们似乎迷路了呢，居然来到这彼岸之地……
别怪我没提醒你们，在这里待久了，可就回不去了哦。
value: I need to remind you. This is no place for fun and games. If you stay here for a long time, you will not be able to return to the world of living.

name: 是月读吗？好一阵子没见，你越长越美了呢。所以你们来这黄泉彼岸有什么事情？
value: Tsukuyomi? Long time no see. You look more beautiful than ever. What are you doing here?

name: 我要觐见西王母，准备行飞升之礼。
value: I am going to meet Xiwangmu and start the Trial of Ascending.

name: 哦呵呵呵，原来是有一条小龙准备飞升啊……不对，你已经是一头成熟巨龙了。
value: Hmm, a grown-up dragon wanting to start the Trial...

name: 我猜，你一定是失去力量了，想靠着飞升重获过去的力量。
value: You must hope to regain your power by passing the trial. Am I right?

name: 怎么，你想拦住我飞升的脚步吗？
value: Do you want to stop me?

name: 像你这种失去力量重新飞升的龙可不多见，史上仅有的几例都在飞升时得到了晋阶。
value: It's rare for a dragon to lose her power, yet come prepared for the Trial of Ascension so quickly.

name: 如果在你飞升之前，夺取你的力量，一定会让我变得更加强大，这可是难得的机会。
value: If I take your power before that trial, I would become more powerful than ever.

name: 那就要看你有没有这个能力了，哼！
看来我低估了你。
value: It seems that I have underestimated your power.

name: 好吧，既然你过了我这关，那就顺着这条冥河而上吧，你会找到想见之人的。
value: If you want to start your trial, follow the river to the end. And you will find Xiwangmu there.

name: 去吧，呵呵，下次见到天照，记得让她别那么恨我了。
value: Go, and say hello to Amaterasu for me if you meet her.

name: 风暴之龙，王母命我在这里等候你们。
value: Storm Dragon, Xiwangmu told me to wait for you here.

name: 我听说过你，嫦娥仙子，月宫的守望者，你就是我的第二场试炼吗？
value: I have heard of you, the goddess living in the moon palace. Are you here to test me?

name: 是的，只有通过我的考验，你才能见到王母。
value: Yes, if you want to meet her, you must defeat me first.

name: 纯净的月光，照亮了你的内心，让我看到了你的坚定。
value: I can sense your determination through the moonlight.

name: 仙子，能和你打上一场，是我的荣幸。
value: It's my honor to fight with you.

name: 呵呵，来吧，我这就带你们去见王母。
value: Come. I will take you to Xiwangmu.

name: 王母，我已经按照您的吩咐，将风暴之龙带来了。
你可以去歇息了，嫦娥仙子，接下来的事就让我来吧。
value: You may rest now. I will take it from here.

name: 王母，我已经准备好开始飞升仪式了。
value: Wangmu, I am ready to take the trial.

name: 很好，风暴之龙，那就上前来吧。
value: Very well, Storm Dragon. Come closer.

name: 我身后这扇大门，便是巨龙飞升的地方，你如果能击败我，飞入门中，就能完成仪式。
value: This door behind me is where a dragon begins its flight. If you defeat me, you can pass the trial and fly through the door.

name: 我做到了，我通过了你的考验。
value: I did it! I passed the trial.

name: 没错，你越过了龙门，你可以开始你的飞升之路了。
value: Yes, you have proven your power.

name: 但我这里还有一个晋阶的机会，看你愿不愿意冒这个风险了。
value: But I have another opportunity for you to move further. Are you willing to take a risk?

name: 追逐力量，击败强敌，是我毕生所求，我接受这个挑战！
这个晋升机会只有一个，你需要与另外一位前来寻求晋升的强者一同争夺这个机会。
value: This opportunity is only available to a strong dragon. You will be competing against another of your kind.

name: 而这个强者，我想你应该挺熟的……
value: I think you know who she is...

name: 能够重回天空，我已经满足了。
既然如此，那你就继续踏上飞升之路吧。
value: Hmm, then go. It is time for the dragon to return to the sky!

name: 我带来了你的毁灭，风暴族裔！
value: I will bring about your demise, my dear Storm Dragon.

name: 许久不见，你还是这么爱吹嘘。你引以为豪的双翼，在我看来，就像羊皮纸一样薄弱。
value: I haven't seen you for a long time. You still love to boast. To me, your wings look as weak as parchment.

name: 哈！你是不是忘记了，是谁将你打落天空的。
value: Did you forget who it was that defeated you, knocking you from the sky?

name: 你只是个喜欢偷袭的胆小鬼，这一次我一定会让你明白，谁才是天空的王者！
value: You are just a coward who loves sneak attacks. I will show you who is the queen of the sky.

name: 我已经给过你机会了，灰烬龙裔，但是你没把握住。
哼！我是不会永远输给你的！等我回来，我会讨回我所失去的一切！
value: I will defeat you one day! And on that day, I will take everything from you!

name: 我已经不在乎你了，灰烬龙裔，我只是为了成为了更高位的存在。
value: I don't care what you say. Now I am the greatest dragon of all.

name: 我无所畏惧，也无可匹敌！
破坏周围的水晶可削弱BOSS实力
value: Destroying the surrounding crystals to weaken the boss

name: 当前幻兽已达到最大觉醒星级
value: This Eudemons has reached its maximum awakening star

name: 是否消耗{0}个{0}，将幻兽{0}觉醒为
value: Do you confirm to consume {0} {0} to awaken the Eudemons to {0}

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_84
value: When the wind rises, I will be coming for you!

name: 打开宝箱选择风暴之龙任意品质的碎片
value: Open the box and choose Storm Dragon's Shards of any quality

name: 用于提升风暴之龙的梦境中记忆宝珠的等级
value: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Storm Dragon's Dreamland

name: 风暴之龙女神碎片自选箱
HIGH_LEVEL_GIFT_LIMIT_4
value: The above packages are only available for Rank 4 players

name: HIGH_LEVEL_GIFT_LIMIT_5
value: The above packages are only available for Rank 5 players

name: HIGH_LEVEL_GIFT_LIMIT_6
value: The above packages are only available for Rank 6 players

name: HIGH_LEVEL_NOT_ENOUGH_LEVEL_UP
value: Failed. You don’t have enough Apotheosis Exp to destroy the crystal.

name: 1回合攻击力增加100%，免疫不良状态
value: Increases ATK by 100% and immunes to all debuffs.

name: 每次普攻攻击2次
value: Each normal attack can strike twice.

name: 进入战斗时，风暴之龙进入【雷暴】状态，无视任何异常效果，并使自身攻击力提高100%，持续1回合（不可驱散）。风暴之龙每次行动时，使所有友方女神获得【风怒】状态，每次普通攻击会攻击2次，持续1回合（不可驱散）。
value:
When entering the battle, the Storm Dragon enters the [Thunderstorm] state for 1 round (cannot be dispelled). When Storm Dragon is in action, bestows all allied angels with [Windfury] that lasts for 1 round (cannot be dispelled).

[Thunderstorm]: Increases ATK by 100% and is immune to debuffs. 
[Windfury]: Each normal attack can strike twice.

name: HIGH_LEVEL_BOSS_ENTRANCE_EXP_TIPS
value: Are you sure you want to open the Trials of Promotion by consuming Apotheosis Exp?

name: 主人，只要打败恶魔之王就可以晋升四阶天使了。
value: Master, you will be promoted to Rank 4 after defeating the King of Devils.

name: 可是这恶魔之王看起来好厉害呀！
不用担心，主人，恶魔之王正在吸取周围水晶的能量，只要破坏水晶就能削弱恶魔之王的实力了，破坏的越多，恶魔之王也就越虚弱。
value: Don't worry, my master. The King of Devils is absorbing the energy of the surrounding crystal. If you can destroy the Empowering Crystal, he will be weaker. The more crystal you destroy, the weaker he will be.

name: 点击水晶
value: Tap the Crystal to check the quest; Completing the quest  to destroy it.

name: ANIMAL_AWAKE_TIPS
value: Awaken the Eudemon when reaches Lv.{0} (Current Level: Lv.{1})

name: ANIMAL_AWAKE_CONFIRM_TIPS_1
value: Do you confirm to consume {0} <color=green>【{1}】</color> to awaken <color=red>【{2}】</color> to

name: ANIMAL_AWAKE_CONFIRM_TIPS_2
value: Do you confirm to consume {0} <color=green>【{1}】</color> and {2} <color=green>【{3}】</color> and to awaken <color=red>【{4}】</color> to

name: ANIMAL_AWAKE_STAR_IS_MAX
value: Eudemon has reached max awaken level

name: ANIMAL_UP_LEVEL_TIPS
value: After using, the EXP gained for the eudemon will exceed the limit by {0}. Continue to use?

name: ANIMAL_REACH_CUR_STAR_MAX_LEVEL
value: Max Level Reached. Awakening the Eudemon to increase its level cap.

name: 对1名敌人造成90%的法术伤害，如果目标身上无任何增益效果，则额外附带8%的真实伤害，如目标没有死亡，会再次发动攻击（最多8次）。攻击击杀该目标，拉神进入2回合【狂乱】状态，普通攻击必定暴击，且不受异常状态影响。
value: Deals 90% M.DMG to an enemy. If there is no buff on the target, an additional 8% Real DMG will be added. If the enemy is not killed, Ra will attack again (up to 8 times). If the enemy is killed, Ra enters [Frenzy] state for 2 rounds. \n\n[Frenzy - Star Gaze]: Ra will not be affected by any debuff and her normal attack is guaranteed to crit.

name: 通关阿尔及尔全部关卡
潘多拉，出来吧，鼎鼎大名的灰烬龙女来了！
value: Pandora, come out. The most famous Dragon is here.

name: 哎……我以为会是谁呢，原来又是一只跌入梦境的龙。
少来这套！我知道你在凡间到处晃来晃去，和不少神做着一些不光彩的交易。
value: Oh, give it a rest. We all know that you help everyone who comes here.

name: 呵呵，你这说的是什么话，即使如此，你不还是来找我了吗？
value: Fine! You don't have to be rude about it. So what do you want from me?

name: 哼……潘多拉，我来是寻求力量的，我知道你能满足我的需求。
value: Hmm... I know many angels were here before me, seeking their heart's desire. Mine thirsts for power, and I want you to give that to me.

name: 哦？你就这么肯定？但交易是对等的，首先你得有我想要的东西。
value: Oh? Are you sure I will give that to you? Let's make a deal. You give me what I want, and then I will give you what you want.

name: 和我打一架再说吧，如果你赢了，就证明你有资格和我做交易。
value: But first, prove your worth by fighting me. If you win, then it's a deal.

name: 哼，也就只有一身蛮力而已。
value: All you got is brute strength, humph!

name: 好吧，我带你去寻找你想要的力量，至于你呢……也赶紧想想吧，准备用什么代价来和我换。
value: Okay, I will take you to find the power you desire. And you... you need to think about what you will give me in return for my favor.

name: 喂，你怎么停下了，你不是急着要寻找力量吗？
value: Hey, why did you suddenly stop?

name: 打架也是获得力量的一种途径……
value: It just occurred to me that fighting would be be a good way to gain strength...

name: 潘多拉？你身边的这个家伙是谁？她为什么用一种看食物的眼神盯着我？
value: Pandora? Who are you with? Why is she looking at me like I'm her prey?

name: 我不知道，但我觉得你麻烦大了……
value: I think... you may be in trouble now.

name: 等……等下！你们在想什么呢？！我可没准备和她比试！
value: Wa... wait! What are you thinking? I don't want to fight you!

name: 好烫好烫！快停手！我认输了！
果然如我所想，即使是魔物，在梦境中也能有这么巨大的力量……
value: Interesting. Even a weak monster like you can be a source of such strong power in this dreamland.

name: 这倒确实如此，这场战斗后，你的气息好像变强了。
value: Yeah, this place is like an amplifier. And if you take advantage of it, you can become more and more powerful.

name: 必然，只要不停挑战强者，自己就会变强，这便是所谓的巨龙之道！
value: I see. In that case, I will challenge many strong opponents.

name: 而我要做的，无非是在这条道路上前进而已。
value: Such is the Way of the Dragon!

name: 是谁闯入了我的神殿？一头龙？你来这里干什么？
value: Who broke into my temple? A dragon? What are you doing here?

name: 我看到第二个对手了，你的力量并不一般嘛……
value: I think I have found my second opponent. I sense extraordinary power inside you.

name: 当心，这家伙能把人变成石头，别盯着她的眼睛看。
value: Watch out! Don't meet her eyes. Her gaze turns living things to stone.

name: 我这身龙鳞可不是白长的，石化术不会对我起效果。
value: I am not called a dragon just for show. Her petty tricks won't work on me.

name: 是吗？说起来我的石雕中还没收藏过龙呢。
value: You think so? Let's find out. A dragon statue would be a perfect addition to my garden of stone.

name: 哼，口气倒是不小，好吧，我就让你见识见识龙族的力量！
value: Big words for a lowly snake. Let me show you how mighty a dragon can be.

name: 没想到，我的魔法和剧毒对你确实不奏效。
value: Why does my magic and poison not work on you?

name: 我可是货真价实的巨龙，要知道，不少巨龙对魔法的抗性，远超过你的想象。
value: Real dragons like me have resistance to magic.

name: 对于魔法的抗性……好吧，这也正是我一直在寻求的东西。
value: I've never heard of anyone having resistance to magic...

name: 如果你不介意，我愿意做为你的侍卫跟随你，直至找到这种力量为止。
value: If you don't mind, I'd like to follow you so I can try to understand how this works.

name: 嗯……我没意见，至少接下来的战斗能多一些乐子。
value: That's fine by me. I'm sure we'll have lots of fun together.

name: 嗯？人类女性，是你在喊我吗？
value: A human? What do you want with me?

name: 我终于找到你了，准备迎接被审判的命运吧，你这个灾难与战争的根源！
value: I finally found you. Prepare to face my trial for the disasters and wars you caused!

name: 喂，你可别瞎冤枉好人！不错，我确实是个打架狂，但我只对强者感兴趣！
value: Don't go dragging my reputation through the mud. I may love to fight, but I have never done what you are accusing me of.

name: 你不像是个能记起自己焚毁了多少城镇的家伙，对吧？
value: What about all the towns you burnt? Were those not disasters?!

name: 哼，我只是在践行大自然淘汰弱者的规则罢了，要战便战！
value: Hah! That is simply me living by the law of nature - survival of the fittest. But if you think you are a warrior of justice, then let us see if your 'justice' can beat me in a fight.

name: 真是强大的力量……看来我也依旧无法阻止你的暴行。
value: What a great power you have...

name: 人类，我对弱者可没有什么兴趣，如果你想阻止我的话，强大的力量是不可或缺的。
value: I have no interest in the weak, puny human. Challenge me again when you actually have the strength to stop me.

name: 哼……这话可真不象是你这种家伙 能说出的。
但我不能让你就这么离开，像你这么危险的家伙……
value: I can't just let you walk away!

name: 哈哈哈……你想跟着就跟着吧，作为我不断变强的见证人吧！
value: Haha! Then follow me if you wish. I don't care. You can be another witness to my great power... Perhaps you'll even learn something by watching me fight.

name: 末日火山的巨龙？你来得可真不是地方，这可没有你想要的东西。
value: A dragon from Mount Doom? Why have you come here?

name: 别这么说，北欧的青春女神，你的苹果我想要很久了。
value: Don't you know, Idun? I've been eyeing your Golden Apples for a long time.

name: 这可真让人意外，你什么时候改吃素了？
value: How surprising. When did you become a vegetarian?

name: 我最近打算换换口味而已，毕竟永葆青春是强者必然想要追求的力量。
value: It is just a craving. After all, who could resist the temptation of eternal youth?

name: 那就得看你有没有本事拿到了。
value: Let's see if you're skilled enough to take a bite out of my apple.

name: 快停手，我给你一个苹果就是了！你这头笨龙，把我裙子都烧焦了……
value: Stop! Stop!!! You can have a bite of the apple. You didn't need to burn my skirt, you stupid dragon.

name: 啊，这充满活力的感觉真让人心情愉悦……但还不够，我还需要挑战更强的对手！，
value: Ah, how wonderful to feel the energy filling my body. But... This is not enough. I need to find a stronger opponent to fight.

name: 凭你的力量，或许已经足以横扫北欧众神。
value: No other Nordic Goddesses can stand as your equal now.

name: 你也是个不错的对手，有没有兴趣加入我，看看最后一层梦境藏着什么？
value: You were an excellent opponent. Do you want to join me and watch as I become the strongest in the world?

name: 听起来挺有意思，就算上我一个吧。
多么炽热的光，前面一定有一个强大的对手存在！
value: That light is blinding. Who is there?

name: 巨龙，你是来这里追求光明的吗？
value: Are you seeking the power of light, dragon?

name: 光明？呃……我不太明白，我只追求强大，绝对的强大！
我能感受的到，你身上有着强大而炽热的力量，来和我一战吧！
value: But I can sense the strong power inside you. Come and fight with me!

name: 如果你确实想较量较量的话，那好吧……愿伟大的光明赐予我力量！
好吧，我真没看出来你追求光明是为了什么，野蛮而粗鲁的家伙……
value: Well... I don't know what you are seeking, but I am now certain it has nothing to do with the light. Your brutal way of fighting is nothing like the elegance of the light!

name: 别多想，亲爱的，作为灰烬与毁灭的化身，我只是为纯粹的强大而已。
value: I am the embodiment of flame and destruction. I seek only power.

name: 即使如此，我也希望你能善用这份得倒的力量，强大源自于掌控，而非愤怒。
value: I wish you would learn to use your power properly. Strength comes from self-control, not anger.

name: 喵，怎么有股烧焦的味道啊，哎？！我的尾巴好像烧着了！
value: Meow! I smell something burning. ...Ahh! Why is my tail on fire?!?

name: 大和的妖怪？具备看守这层梦境的存在，你的力量我很感兴趣……
value: Monster of Japan? Even a little monster like you can be in this dreamland.... I am intrigued.

name: 然而你烧了我的尾巴！难道不道歉就想走吗？
value: You burnt my precious tail!!! It was my loveliest feature. Apologize to me. Now!

name: 哦？是吗？小可爱，你想让我怎样道歉呢？
value: Oh yeah? And how are you going to make me do that, little cutie?

name: 气死我了！我非挠你不可！
value: Hisssss!! I'm so furious! Feel the wrath of my claws!

name: 嗯哼，或许打一架解决这个问题是最合适的方法呢。
value: Bad kitty! If you try to scratch me like that, then you're going to be in trouble.

name: 哎……居然被打哭了，我发誓没下这么重的手。
value: Oops... I made her cry. I swear I didn't mean it.

name: 你这个大坏蛋！我要去向大和的众神告状！
value: You are a big bad dragon! I am going to tell the other goddesses of Japan. They will be coming for you!

name: 跑吧，小猫咪，我很期待遇上一个能打的强者，哈哈……
value: Run, little kitten, run and go tell them. I look forward to another fight, haha.

name: 这月光中，蕴含着强大的力量……我们似乎开始进入东方诸神所塑造的梦境了。
不过我可没兴趣欣赏这些。
value: I don't have the time to admire this kind of thing.

name: 你还真是不解风情呢，满脑子只想着打架，可会错过不少有意思的事。
value: So all you care about is fighting?

name: 风情是什么？能带给我力量吗？
value: Yes and no. What I care about is becoming stronger.

name: 你……就是那只把猫又打到气得挠墙的火龙吗？
value: You! Are you the dragon who beat Nekomata?

name: 我很荣幸自己的名声能传得这么快。
value: That didn't take long. She's not a good fighter, but she's certainly a fast runner.

name: 呵呵……虽然我不大喜欢粗鲁的家伙，但我可一点也不讨厌强者。
value: Humph! I don't care for rude people, but a strong dragon? You are totally my type.

name: 所以对于我来说，打架或许是迎接客人最好的礼仪。
value: If you can appreciate the beauty of strength, then I guess you are also worth fighting.

name: 和文静优雅的外貌不同，你是个强大的对手。
value: You are a strong opponent. I was fooled by your soft elegance.

name: 东方有句古语叫“人不可貌相”……
value: You know there is a saying that appearances can be deceiving, right?

name: 我会留意你这句告诫的，哼哼……
value: I will keep your words in mind.

name: 东方也有操控火焰的强者么，看来会是一场令人期待的战斗呢。
value: Hmm... You also have the power to control fire.

name: 火龙么？能够冲入最后由东方神明把守的三层梦境，你看起来并不简单。
value: Ember Dragon? You have come a long way.

name: 没错，我正为你的力量而来，华夏的火神。
value: Yes, and I am coming for you!

name: 火焰象征着争斗与吞噬，我想你明白这意味着什么。
value: Fire is a dangerous power that could devour all living beings. Are you sure you want to fight with me? This will not end well.

name: 我很乐意看到愿意用拳头说话的家伙，来吧！
value: Since we both understand the risk of fighting fire with fire, bring it on!

name: 呼……在现实中你不可能有现在这么强，看来梦境确实能够大幅提升能力。
value: You can't be that powerful in the real world... It seems this place really boosts your power.

name: 是你赢了，你还有一战之力，而我的力量已经耗尽了。
奇怪，我……虽然击败了你，但似乎并没有获得新的力量。
value: Even though I defeated you, I don't feel like this victory has made me any more powerful, unlike my previous ones.

name: 你的力量已经超过了大部分神明，神界已经暂时没有能让你挑战的神了。
value: Your power has already surpassed most of the goddesses. That's why you can't grow stronger.

name: 不，我感到自己还有变强的潜力，有什么办法吗？
value: But I know I can be more powerful! Are there any other ways?

name: 有一个办法，就是挑战梦境的掌控着！但是风险太高了。
value: There is one way. And only one goddess knows how to do it.

name: 因为一旦失败，你将很可能会被永远困在梦境中。
value: But if you fail, you will be trapped here forever.

name: 如果畏惧，那我的追求就毫无意义！
value: My pursuit of power means nothing if I retreat.

name: 我将让你与东方的主神之一——伏羲相见，在她的引导下，你会明白什么是力量。
value: I will introduce you to one of the Main goddesses of the East, Fuxi. She will tell you the secret of surpassing your limit.

name: 火焰与战意的化身，我已经预见了你的到来。
value: The incarnation of flame and war, I have foreseen your arrival.

name: 哦？我还什么都没说，你就猜到我的来意了？
value: Oh? Then do you know why I am here?

name: 你所追求的力量源于愤怒和冲动，作为宁静的化身，你无法从我这里获得力量。
value: The power you chased originated from anger and impulse. I am afraid you still have a lesson to learn.

name: 但我可以给你一场试炼，这或许能够让你从中得到感悟。
value: But the trial I offer may provide some insight.

name: 呼……这真让人难以相信，我应该已经击倒你好几次了……
value: Unbelievable. Even though I have defeated you many times, here you are, still standing unharmed.

name: 我感到自己的力量已经接近极限，但你却仿佛永远不会疲倦似的。
value: I feel I have reached my limit.

name: 这便是你需要领悟的力量，爆发的火焰虽然强大，却不持久。
value: This is the lesson you need to learn. An intense flame burns out fast.

name: 就如同我被击倒几百次，只要火种没有熄灭，就能够再次回复，最终赢得胜利。
value: I still stand because, unlike you, I save my power for regeneration. I am like the grass. Although fire destroys it, it will always shoot up again later.

name: ……似乎有道理，但又没有那么容易弄明白……
value: …This seems reasonable. But I am still a little bit confused.

name: 你在之后的战斗中，会明白这个道理的，梦境已经给予了你足够的启发。
value: You will understand it eventually. It takes time.

name: ……我明白了，不管如何，我会尽力去理解的。
你说得没错，我不应过于冲动。
value: You are right. I shouldn't act on impulse.

name: 你的实力已经在整个龙族名列前茅了，相信未来的你还会变得更强。
value: I believe you will become more powerful in the future.

name: 灰烬龙女女神碎片自选箱
打开宝箱选择灰烬龙女任意品质的碎片
value: Open the box and choose Ember Dragon's Shards of any quality

name: 进入战斗时，标记敌方攻击力最高的女神，使目标优先被攻击，持续3回合，若目标攻击力低于灰烬龙女，则使目标攻击力降低50%，持续1回合。每次行动时，灰烬龙女使敌方全体进入【业火】状态（无视异常抵抗），每回合损失8%的最大生命值（不超过灰烬龙女攻击力的10倍），受到治疗效果降低50%，持续1回合。
value:
When entering the battle, inflict a [Nova Mark] to the enemy with the highest ATK for 3 turns. If the marked enemy's ATK is lower than Ember Dragon's ATK, decreases the target's ATK by 50% for 1 round. When she is in action, inflict [Justice Fire] on all enemies and decrease their Healing Effect by 50% for 1 round. 

[Nova Mark]: Enemies with the state will be attacked first. 
[Justice Fire]: Enemies with the state will lose 8% of their Max HP (not exceeding 10 times that of Ember Dragon's ATK) This effect will bypass any Debuff RES.

name: 优先被攻击
value: Enemies with the state will be attacked first.

name: 每回合损失8%的最大生命值
value: Enemies with the state will lose 8% of their Max HP. This effect will bypass any Debuff RES.

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_85
value: Come and prove yourself a place of defeating me!

name: 进入战斗时，使前排友方女神获得海姆达尔生命值2%的物抗，后排友方女神获得海姆达尔生命值1%的防御力和魔抗，持续1回合（无法驱散）。海姆达尔每次行动时，选择当前血量百分比最低的一名友军进行【链接】，代替其承受全部攻击（不超过海姆达尔当前生命值），持续1回合（无法驱散）
value:
When entering battle, front-row allies receive a P.RES boost equal to 2% of Heimdall's HP, while the back row's DEF and M.RES increase by 1% of her HP. The effect lasts 1 turn (cannot be dispelled). 
When Heimdall is in action, bestows a [Link UR+] to one ally with the lowest percentage of HP for 1 round.

[Link UR+]: All DMG targeting this angel will be received by Heimdall (not exceeding the current HP of Heimdall). This effect cannot be dispelled.

name: 你身上有着雨水之力的气息。
value: I sense the power of rain in you.

name: 你想挑战我？可以，不过作为你冒犯龙威的代价，挑战的筹码得增加。
value: Do you want to challenge me? But if you lose, you gonna give me a taste of something else.

name: 如果你赢了，风之力归你；如果你输了，除了归还风之力之外，你还必须要成为我的仆人。
value: If you win, I will give you the power of the wind, and I will be your maid. But if you lose, you have to be my maid forever.

name: 哼喵！答应你又怎么样喵！
看来要不了多久，你就能恢复到曾经的实力了。走吧，我们该去下一处了，对吧，喵女仆。
唉喵！当仆人就当仆人吧，只要小鱼干管够。
value: Fine! But you have to feed me! Did I ever tell you what my favorite foods are? Listen, they are dried fish, and fried fish and...

name: 你是指这块可以招来雨水的玉盘？
value: Do you mean this Fine Jade?

name: 那就用武力来见分晓吧！
value: Let's see who will have the last laugh!

name: 钻石豪礼 浪漫回馈
value: Diamond Gift for your Romantic Move

name: 黑五折扣 限时促销
这是今日的浪漫纪念卡奖励，感谢支持！
value: Here're today's rewards of the Romantic Souvenir Card. Thanks for your support, and we wish you a sweet Valentine's Day.

name: 用于提升灰烬龙女的梦境中记忆宝珠的等级
value: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Ember Dragon's Dreamland

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_32
value: The Queen has returned at last! All gods must pay her homage!

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_33
value: The eternal guardian of the Rainbow Bridge!

name: MAIN_HERO_SUPER_AWAKE_TIPS
value: Wonder Waken requires <color=#00FF00FF>{0}</color> UR+ Angels (You owned: <color=#FF0909FF>{1}</color>）

name: COMBINE_ZONE_ACTIVITY_WEEK_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT
value: Here are today's rewards for the Neo-zone Souvenir Card. Enjoy your treat!
