value: Your guild ranked {0} in yesterday's Power Clash and has received the following rewards.

name: COMBINE_ZONE_ACTIVITY_BOSS_REWARD_MAIL_TITLE
value: Reissue of the Dealt DMG Rewards in Power Clash

name: COMBINE_ZONE_ACTIVITY_BOSS_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT
value: The DMG rewards that you did not claim yesterday has been sent via this email.

name: COMBINE_ZONE_ACTIVITY_RANK_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT
value: You ranked {0} in yesterday's Power Clash and has received the following rewards.

name: 世界频道发言{0}次
value: Send {0} message(s) in the World Channel

name: OUTLAND_BOSS_DIFFICULT_1
value: The monster exhibits a powerful oppressive force, but clearly it is holding back a little.

name: OUTLAND_BOSS_DIFFICULT_2
value: The monster takes half a step back, begins to go berserk, and uses all its strength to try to escape.

name: 虚空裂缝打开了，我的兄弟们！烧光一切，夺取战利品！
value: The rift has opened, my brothers! Burn everything and take the spoils!

name: 站住，你这怪物！只要有我在，你就休想在往前一步！
value: Stop, monsters! As long as I'm here, you can't take another step forward!

name: 虚空的裂缝开启，你们的世界岌岌可危，拜服吧，投降吧，哈哈哈哈！
value: Now that the rift has opened, nothing can stop us! Bow down and surrender. Haha!!!

name: 别痴心妄想了，我会打败你，然后把你踹回你的世界去！
value: Not a chance! I'll beat you and kick you back to your filthy world!

name: 虚空降临了，你们的抵抗毫无意义，这个可悲世界终将会陷入熊熊燃烧！
value: The Void will eventually consume all of you, along with this pathetic world. It's pointless to resist.

name: 也许会有那么一天，但绝不是今天！
value: Maybe you are right, the void will eventually come. But I won't let it happen today...

name: 魔物展示出了强大的压迫力，但显然它还有所保留。
value: The monster exhibits a powerful oppressive force, but clearly it is holding back a little.

name: 这家伙是什么人，居然这么厉害？
我是谁不重要，重要的是你马上就要完蛋了！
value: It doesn't matter who I am. What matters is that you're going down!

name: 不过就是个说夸夸其谈的小女孩而已，你以为你能拦得住我？
value: You think you can stop me, huh? You talk big for a little girl.

name: 你是什么人，竟敢打断我的计划？
我是这个世界的守护者，有我在，你是不会得逞的！
value: I'm the guardian of this world. You will not get what you want under my watch!

name: 哈哈哈哈，狂妄的小东西，我会让你见识见识我真正的力量！
value: Arrogant little thing. I'll show you what real strength looks like.

name: 不，虚空从不失败，你究竟是谁？
value: No, the Void never fails. Who are you?

name: 我是你们这些魔物的克星！看我怎么让你们打回虚空去！
value: I'm the bane of all monsters!

name: 虚空会吞噬你，吞噬一切！
value: The void will devour you, and everything else!

name: 魔物退缩了半步，它开始狂暴化，并使出全部的力量想要逃跑。
value: The monster takes half a step back, begins to go berserk, and uses all its strength to try to escape.

name: 这次就先放过你，再让我碰见，你就完蛋了！
value: I'll spare you this time. If I see you again, you will be doomed!

name: 你不会嚣张太久的，会有其他人来收拾你的。
value: Don't get too arrogant, someone else will come and put you in your place.

name: 给我拦住她！别让她追上来！
value: Stop her! Don't let her catch up!

name: 你阻止不了我，就像你阻止不了虚空。
value: You can't stop me, just like you can't stop the void.

name: 虚空消散了，但总有一天，还会重新凝聚。
value: The void has dissipated, but eventually it will gather again.

name: 当前回合为第1回合、第3回合等奇数回合，且轮到主角行动时，主角随机对敌人发起3次攻击，每次攻击造成主角攻击力100%的真实伤害，并驱散一个有益状态
value: Every odd-numbered round, when the MC is in action, randomly attacks an enemy 3 times. Each attack deals True DMG equal to 100% MC’s ATK and dispels one buff on the target.

name: 进入战斗时，立即使我方所有友军恢复主角当前生命值100%的血量，溢出治疗量的10%转化为护盾，护盾持续2回合
value: When entering battle, all allies recover HP equal to 100% of MC’s Current HP. 10% of the healing in excess of the target's maximum HP is instead converted to a shield.

name: 进入战斗时，主角获得【主角光环】状态（无法驱散），持续到战斗结束。主角的攻击力、防御、物抗、魔抗、异常抵抗分别提升[友方全体女神（包含替补）对应属性]的5%
value: When entering battle, MC gains [MC Halo] state (cannot be dispelled), increasing her ATK, DEF, P.RES, M.RES, and Debuff RES by 5% of [the sum of all allies' corresponding attributes (including substitutes)] until the end of the battle.

name: 进入战斗时，冰霜龙母使每名敌人有50%的几率速度降低50点，持续2回合（无视异常抵抗、无法驱散）。每次行动时，冰霜龙母使全体友军获得【寒冰守护】状态2回合（无法驱散），拥有此状态的女神每次受到伤害时，造成伤害的那名敌人伤害降低3%，每名敌人最多叠加10层【伤害降低】效果，【伤害降低】持续2回合。
value:
When entering the battle, Frost Dragon has a 50% chance to decrease each enemy’s SPD by 50 for 2 rounds (ignores Debuff RES, cannot be dispelled). When she is in action, bestows all allies with a [Glacial Shield] state that lasts for 2 rounds (cannot be dispelled). 

[Glacial Shield]: When receiving DMG, inflicts a [DMG Decrease] state on the attacker. 
[DMG Decrease]: Each layer of that state decreases the bearer's DMG Increase by 3% (Up to 10 layers) that lasts for 2 rounds.

name: 攻击力、防御、物抗、魔抗、异常抵抗提升
value: Respectively increases ATK, DEF, P.RES, M.RES and Debuff RES.

name: 对6名敌人造成60%最大生命值的伤害，50%几率使敌人【眩晕】，持续1回合
value: Deals DMG to 6 enemies equal to 60% of their Max HP and has 50% chance to [Stun] the enemies for 1 round.

name: 对前排3名敌人造成50%最大生命值的伤害，并使自身伤害反弹增加70%，持续2回合
value: Deals DMG to 3 enemies in the front row equal to 50% of their Max HP and increases your DMG Reflection by 70% for 2 rounds.

name: 对6名敌人造成60%最大生命值的伤害，并使敌人进入3回合的【燃烧】状态，每回合损失6%的最大生命值
value: Deals DMG to 6 enemies equal to 60% of their Max HP and inflicts [Ignite] state to them for 3 rounds. \n\n[Ignite]: Enemies with the state will lose 8% of their Max HP in each round.

name: 对6名敌人造成60%最大生命值的伤害，并使自身免疫所有负面状态，持续2回合
value: Deals DMG to 6 enemies equal to 60% of their Max HP and become immune to all debuffs for 2 rounds.

name: 对1名敌人攻击6次，每次造成30%最大生命值的伤害
value: Attacks an enemy 6 times. Each attack deals DMG equal to 30% of target’s Max HP.

name: 对6名敌人造成80%最大生命值的伤害
value: Deals DMG to 6 enemies equal to 80% of their Max HP.

name: 对攻击力最高的敌人攻击2次，每次造成40%最大生命值的伤害
value: Attacks the enemy with the highest ATK twice, dealing DMG equal to 40% of target’s Max HP for each hit.

name: 攻击2次，每次对随机3名敌人造成60%最大生命值的伤害
value: Attacks 2 times, dealing DMG to 3 random enemies equal to 60% of target’s Max HP each hit.

name: 用于提升冰霜龙母的梦境中记忆宝珠的等级
value: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Frost Dragon's Dreamland

name: 冰霜龙母女神碎片自选箱
打开宝箱选择冰霜龙母任意品质的碎片
value: Open the box and choose Frost Dragon's Shards of any quality.

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_86
value: Can your warm embrace melt my heart?

name: ……看来某人迟到了呢。
value: ... Where is she? She said she'd be here.

name: 非常抱歉，刚刚出了点……小小的岔子。
value: I'm sorry for being late. I was dealing with something else.

name: 无碍，只要你能按照约定，帮我找到想要的东西就行。
value: I hope it's taken care of because I need your help. You once promised to help find whatever I want. I'm here to cash in on that promise.

name: 冰霜女士，或许您有必要告知我一下，您的愿望是什么？
value: Lady Frost, perhaps you should tell me what it is you seek. I don't read minds.

name: 并非什么麻烦事，我的王座被盗宝者偷了，需要找回来而已。
value: I have a problem. A thief stole my throne, and I need to reclaim it.

name: 好吧……这愿望实现的难度还不小，恐怕要与好几个有头有脸的大人物较量了。
value: Hmm... Stealing your throne must not have been easy. Whoever did it must be very powerful.

name: 在这之前，我最好试试您的实力，以确保……不会发生任何意外。
value: Before we begin our search, I must test your strength. I need to be sure you can handle what lies ahead.

name: 来吧，我相信不会让你失望。
value: Try me. I'm sure you won't be disappointed.

name: 怎么样，亲爱的小猫，你还满意吗？
value: How was that, kitten? Are you satisfied?

name: 快把我从冰里放出来……我感觉整个腰以下都动不了了……
value: Get me out of this ice! I can't feel my legs!

name: 有一个人也许知道，在哪里能找到你想要的东西，让我带你去见见她。
value: Finally, I can feel my legs again! All right... So, I know an angel who may know where to find your throne. Let's go see her.

name: 努特，埃及的天空之神，宝藏的守护者，在这里遇到你一点也不意外。
value: Nuit! Nuit! Do you have a moment?

name: 潘多拉？你找我所为何事？
我的新客户……正在寻找她丢失的王座，
value: My new client is looking for her lost throne. I was wondering whether you know something about it.

name: 她？我很抱歉，以她这样的身份，恐怕只能去抢主神们的御座了。
value: Frost Dragon? Hah! Does she even deserve a throne?

name: 呃……我想你应该可以这么认为。
value: I think she wants you to prove your strength first.

name: 这事情我挺感兴趣的，不过我想知道合作者的本事如何。
value: Hehe, I am sure one of the arrogant Ruling Gods took it. I am willing to help you to take it back. But I need to test your power first. I don't want to be on the losing side in this conflict.

name: 我没意见，与其让我告诉你，不如你亲自体验一下冰霜巨龙的战斗力比较好。
value: One more helper would be nice. Come on. Let me show you the true power of an ice queen.

name: 看来是一位强而有力的寒冰掌控者呢……
value: I am impressed. You have mastered the art of controlling ice.

name: 这份力量是否有能力和那些主神较量？
value: Now do you think I'm strong enough to challenge even the Ruling Gods?

name: 这么说，你是同意了？
value: I think so. Don't you agree, Nuit?

name: 当然了，要是有这样强大的盟友帮助，会比预期的更顺利。
value: Of course. But with my help, things would go even more smoothly.

name: 你们是在找龙族王座的下落？我预见了你们的到来。
value: Are you the ones looking for the Dragon Throne?

name: 预言天使果然还是名不虚传的呢，要我给你颁奖吗？
value: Let me guess. You 'foresaw it?' I know you're the angel of prophecy, but do you have to show off your skill every time we meet?

name: 我还预见到，你们的成功，离不开我的帮助。
value: Well, there is something else important that I saw foresaw. You won't find that throne without my help.

name: 这说法可真有趣，但我们凭什么相信你？
value: That's funny. Why should we trust you?

name: 然而实力比命运更能说明一切，你不觉得？
value: I trust my own power more than the words coming out of your mouth.

name: 承蒙所愿，一场战斗或许能改变你们的想法。
value: Are you challenging me? Then what are you waiting for?

name: 真是惊人，看来我低估了北欧巨龙的实力。
value: Your power is... incredible. It seems that I underestimated the strength of a Nordic Dragon.

name: 但这次失败，也在命运意料之中。
value: But I also foresaw this failure.

name: 喂喂，失败者可没资格说这样的话。
value: Just what we'd expect to hear from a loser.

name: 不，我们刚刚所有的战术，其实都被提前预判到了，一对一的话，她并不见得会输。
value: No, Nuit. If you had paid attention, she anticipated all of our tactics. If we had battled her one-on-one instead of as a team, then we would have lost.

name: 嗯哼？所以我们最重要的“客户”对于这次胜负怎么看？
value: Hmm... What do you think, Frost Dragon?

name: 天使的能力并没有让人失望。
value: ... It wouldn't hurt to bring her along to help.

name: 嗯，多一个同伴始终不会是坏事。
哟，这么快就不行了，我还有好些手段没使出来呢。
value: Hail, sister! What are you doing here? You still owe me a fight. Do you remember?

name: 这是什么蠢话……你没发现风暴正在你身边汇聚吗？
value: Ember? Are you stalking me? I told you to leave me alone!

name: ……你们俩还真是没完没了，停止这场没有意义的争斗，我需要你们的帮助。
value: Stop, both of you. I need your help. It's for the future of our kind.

name: 除非有新的参战者，否则别想让龙族之间的战斗停下来！
value: Don't try to tell me what to do. You are not my mother.

name: ……乐意奉陪，如果我胜了，你们就暂且停手，帮我去完成此行的目的怎么样？
value: ... Ember, you know we are not supposed to talk about HER. We made promises to each other.

name: 没问题，来吧！
value: So? Who put you in charge? I don't care what you think, and I don't give a shit about you. Come fight me if you dare.

name: 嗯？再不认输，我可就要把你整个都冻成冰块了。
value: Who's in charge now? Answer me within 3 seconds or I will freeze you solid.

name: 哼，你的冰雪和寒风还是这么难缠。
value: Stop, stop! It's you. I yield!

name: 论战斗经验，我比任何一个北欧的龙族都要丰富。
value: Don't talk back to me again. If you do it again, I will not hesitate to put you in the ice hole for thousands of years.

name: 话别说得这么早，你还有一个对手没有倒下。
value: Stop. You have scared her, Frost. Don't forget that she's still your sister.

name: 那么，让我来猜猜你能坚持几秒种吧，呵呵。
value: Are you also questioning my authority?

name: 让我见识一下吧，是你的冰霜厉害，还是我的风暴更强！
value: Ember lost because she was still young. But you and I, we trained together.

name: 即使你在梦境中获得了新的力量，但论战术，你依旧不是我的对手。
value: I know you've been here before and gained new power. But your tactical blunders when we sparred together make me question how much you could've improved.

name: 是吗？三姐妹之中，我的头脑可从来没有输给过你们。
value: I've changed because I learn from my mistakes. Besides, I hold my temper better than the two of you.

name: 你们俩废话真多，到底还要不要打？我都不耐烦了！
value: Don't bore me. Stop talking and let's get this battle started!

name: 强大的寒气，仿佛连风都能冻住一般……
认输了吗？
value: Are you throwing in the towel?

name: 我……好吧我认输……暂时的。
value: I...... Well, I admit my defeat... for now.

name: 虽然不想承认，但你打的还不赖，至少比我多坚持了几秒钟，哈哈。
value: Though I don't want to admit it, your performance isn't bad. You lasted a few minutes longer than me, haha.

name: 哼，没时间开玩笑了，我们最好尽快离开这个梦境。
value: Hmph! It seems we have no choice but to stop challenging Frost and listen to her if we want to get the hell out of here.

name: 我闻到了熟悉的气息……潘多拉，是你？你来我的地盘做什么？
value: Stop, Pandora. I see you trying to sneak around my domain. What are you up to?

name: 你的地盘？你也不想想现在待着的梦境，究竟归谁管！
value: Your domain? This is my dreamland. I can go wherever I want.

name: 即便这你是这梦境的掌控者，在没得到我允许之前，也不能进入吧？
value: Did you forget you promised I could keep a part of it for myself?

name: 这么说你是不想让路了？在你做这个决定前，要不要先问问我身后的三位？
value: ... Never mind. We just want to pass through quietly. You're happy with that, right?

name: 哼哼。
value: Uh oh. Someone's about to lose their temper.

name: 哎呀呀……
value: Shh! Do you want her to freeze you again?

name: 是吗，我很乐意在花园里多放上三座石雕。
value: I see. Trying to avoid looking at me, huh? But maybe I'd like to keep you as stone statues to decorate my domain.

name: 你麻烦大了。
value: Not unless you can beat our combined might.

name: 看来，你的石化魔法还是没有巨龙的冰霜好用啊，你就在这儿好好呆一阵子吧。
value: It seems that your petrification magic is still not as good as the dragon's frost.

name: 也该到了处理正事的时间了，前面应该是主神的领域了吧？
value: Let's go. We don't have time to waste on this. Are we close to the realm of the Ruling Gods?

name: 如您所想，冰霜女士，以我们的速度很快就能抵达。
value: Yes, Lady Frost. It's just a bit further.

name: 小心点，这是波塞冬的梦境，她脾气很差，连我都要忌惮她几分。
value: Be careful. This is Poseidon's place. She has a bad temper. Even I don't dare to mess with her.

name: 而她手上，可能有你想要的东西。
value: But she may have the thing that you want...

name: 潘多拉，你带这些人来到我统治的海域，是什么意思？
value: Pandora! Are you talking about me? You dare accuse me of having a bad temper?

name: 别生气亲爱的，我们只是到这里来，向你寻求一件宝物的。
value: I... I... No! You must have heard wrong. The dragons and I are just here looking for something. That's why I've brought them to see you. The mighty god of the sea must know where we can find it.

name: 遗憾的是，我这里没有什么值得你们抢的。
value: What are you looking for? Would it be the Dragon Throne? I haven't seen it. Wait... Are you thinking of stealing mine instead?

name: “抢”这个字我不喜欢，不如用“送”吧，你“送”给我们。
value: Stealing? Haha... No, no... That's such a strong choice of words. 'Asking' is a better word. We're asking you to give it to us.

name: 很好，在把你们打到站不起来后，我会有兴趣问问你们想要什么。
你们最好别太得意，总有一天，我会回来和你讨回这笔账的……
value: You better watch your back from now on. You filthy dragons! I will return for payback!

name: 看起来是这样，当一个人的愿望无法被满足时，就会被梦境驱逐。
value: If one fails to get what one wants, one will immediately return to reality.

name: 说实话，她比我想象中要强。
value: To be honest, she was stronger than I thought.

name: 不过她再强，也不是我们龙族三姐妹联手的对手。
虽然波塞冬的王座足够华丽，但这并非是我丢失的宝物。
value: Look at her throne. It is not the one we lost.

name: 那不妨我们往东走看看，提到收集宝物，那个家伙可能也会对你的王座感兴趣……
value: Then let's go east. There might be another angel who may have a motive to take your throne.

name: 欢迎来到东方的亡者国度黄泉比良坂，当然，这里只是梦境的幻象所化。
value: Welcome to the dreamland version of the Land of the Dead, called Yomotsu Hirazaka.

name: 我可以感受到强大的存在。
value: I can feel that someone powerful is around.

name: 传说中的黄泉之主——伊邪那美。
value: Yes, that is the legendary lord of the Yellow Springs, Izanami.

name: 嗯？是何人在称呼我的真名？
……北欧的冰霜巨龙，来此寻找丢失的宝物。
value: ... It is me, Frost Dragon, and my sisters. We are looking for the Dragon Throne.

name: 宝物？虽然我身为黄泉统治者，没有搜寻异宝的兴趣……
value: I have no interest in exotic treasures or status symbols.

name: 但我在这梦境待了几千年，都快无聊死了，要是能陪我玩玩，也许……
value: But after thousands of years in this dream, I'm dying of boredom. I'll tell you what... Play with me a little and I might consider offering some clues.

name: ……也许你会告诉我们宝物的下落？
value: What do you mean by 'play a little'?

name: 好提议，但前提是你们能让我尽兴才行。
value: ... Come, let me see if you know how to wield that spear you hold.

name: 呵呵……真是没让我失望，好久没有这样的乐子了。
至于宝物，就在我的神社中随便拿吧，我对那些放了几千年的东西早就不感兴趣了。
value: You can look around in my shrine. If you find anything you like, just take it.

name: 遗憾的是，这里并没有我丢失的王座。
value: You look way too excited, Pandora. Unfortunately, the throne is not here.

name: 你是北欧的神明，如果丢了东西，不是应该到奥丁那儿去问问吗？
value: Hey, you guys are from Scandinavia, right? Why don't you go ask the Norse god, Odin?

name: ……不错的主意，你提醒我了。
value: That's a great idea! Sisters, we'd better get going!

name: 这里是北欧众神的神域，宏伟的阿斯加德王宫。
value: Here we are, the domain of the Nordic Angels, the Asgard dreamland.

name: 这梦境有几分我熟悉的凉意，宫殿上雕刻着我族的花纹，还堆积着雪……
value: Odin sure enjoys a comfortable home.

name: ……奥丁的日子看上去过得挺舒服。
value: Look at all those beautiful palaces...

name: 北欧的三大龙族？是什么风把你们吹到我这来了。
value: The dragon family? What are you doing here?

name: 我的巢穴遇上了些麻烦，神王奥丁，我来这里为了找一件宝物。
value: I'm here to find my stolen throne.

name: 那么代价呢？
value: And what does it have to do with me?

name: 一场让你满意的战斗，应该能让你认可北欧龙族的力量。
value: You are the queen of Nordic Angels. I bet you know where my throne is.

name: 呵，让我们开始吧。
value: How dare you accuse me of stealing it! I'll teach you a lesson!

name: 不错，你的力量超乎我的想象，你的族裔在我的神殿中，能有一席之地的荣耀。
value: Your strength is beyond my imagination. I would be honored if your kind accepted a place within my palace.

name: 那么问题来了，你所求的宝物是什么？
value: Back to the throne you are talking about, I know where it is.

name: 王座，真正属于龙族的王座。
有意思，所以你愿意找回丢失的那尊王座，还是说……希望得到更珍贵的恩赐？
value: But I know of something far better than a throne. Do you want to know what it is? I'll give you a hint: It's far more valuable.

name: 如果你不介意的话，我更期待后者。
value: I am interested. What is it?

name: 你们龙族的勇气一向让我敬佩，进入面前的传送门吧。
value: The courage of your kind has always impressed me. Now, enter the portal in front of you.

name: 传送门后的梦境，应该能让你得到比王座更珍贵的东西。
value: I am sure you will find something more valuable than your throne.

name: ……这是什么地方，我感到混沌与黑暗的气息弥漫在四周。
value: What is this place? I feel like I'm surrounded by chaos and darkness.

name: 奥丁，你又想逃跑吗？这一次，我要把你和你那可笑的宫殿一起吞入黑暗！
value: Odin, is that you? I'm going to make this darkness swallow both you and your ridiculous palace.

name: 阿佩普……天哪，这鬼地方应该是北欧神王的噩梦。
value: Apep... I knew we couldn't trust that despicable Odin.

name: 奥丁与埃及的破坏神在几千年前就一直争斗，这场恶梦也延续了几千年。
value: She and Apep have been fighting for thousands of years in my dreamland!

name: ……我们要如何出去？
value: ... How are we going to get out?

name: 结束这场恶梦，除了击败阿佩普的梦魇，没有别的办法。
value: There is only one way to end this nightmare. We must defeat Apep.

name: 不管如何，有架打啦。
value: Sounds like we have a fight to win.

name: 让开，北欧的龙族，这是我和奥丁的战争！
value: Get out of my way, Nordic Dragons. This is between Odin and me!

name: ……抱歉了，按照我和奥丁刚签的协议，她的战争就是我的战争。
阿斯加德……我复仇的怒火迟早会重新燃起的……
value: Ahhh! Asgard... Sooner or later, my vengeful anger will be reborn...

name: 即使现实中她并不强，但在梦境也能变成如此可怕的对手……
value: I didn't realize that she could be such a difficult foe.

name: 在与她战斗之后，我仿佛也能感受到自己的力量，有了不可想象的提升。
value: After fighting her, it seems my strength has greatly improved.

name: 呵……相对于那个无聊的王座，力量与权力才是你渴求的东西吧？
value: Does your dull throne seem so wonderful now? Or is it power that you truly crave?

name: ……不错的问题，我会在离开梦境后好好寻找答案的。
物归原主即可。
value: I don't care. All I care is to take back my throne!

name: 阿斯加德的时光门，能够寻回任何原本属于你的东西。
value: Fine. This is Asgard's Time Gate.

name: 去取回你丢失的宝物吧，那尊王座就在里面。
value: Think of the last time you saw your throne and this gate will take you there.

name: 点击虚空裂缝
value: Look, a rift appeared out of nowhere. Let’s go and check out what happened.

name: 暂未加入公会
value: You are not in a Guild.

name: 古埃及神话中法老的守护神，王权的象征，同时她也是复仇之神，掌管着法律和秩序！\n她曾为父报仇，击败埃及残暴的统治者赛特，成为新一代的埃及统治神。
value: In ancient Egyptian mythology, Horus is the guardian angel of pharaohs, a symbol of royal authority. She is also the goddess of revenge, presiding over law and order.\nShe defeated Set, the cruel ruler of Egypt, and avenged her father. She then became the new ruling god of Egypt. It is said she loved her people more than herself.

name: 我曾经很坚定的认为，这个世界上不会有人能让我为之心动，直到你的出现，让我曾经的坚定化作了泡影。
value: I used to believe that no one in this world could make my heart flutter, until I met you.

name: 埃及神话中至高无上的神器，它代表着神明的庇佑与至高无上的君权，也代表着最为真实的目光。
value: This supreme artifact from Egyptian mythology represents the divine protection and ultimate sovereignty of the gods. It is said no one can lie while under the gaze of The Eye of Horus.

name: 为什么总有人觉得，我是一个危险的女人呢？
value: Why does everybody think I am a dangerous woman?

name: 这世界上最美妙的东西，到底是权力还是爱情？
value: What is the most wonderful thing in the world? Power or Love?

name: 我一直都认为，仇恨的力量会使人更加强大！
value: I have always believed that hatred makes one more powerful.

name: 做为古埃及的统治者，我一直都将自己的一切奉献给我的子民，从不敢懈怠！
value: As the ruler of ancient Egypt, I always put my people first.

name: 你觉得，古埃及的神明，给人的第一印象是什么样的？
value: What is your first impression of the God of ancient Egypt?

name: 为什么总有人觉得，魅力不能与力量共存呢？
value: Why do people always feel that charm cannot coexist with power?

name: 因为你拥有强大的力量！
仇恨确实能激发潜能。
value: Hatred can indeed stimulate power inside one's body.

name: 仇恨容易让人丧失理智。
value: But hatred can easily make people lose their rationality.

name: 你也该多为自己着想。
value: You should think about yourself more.

name: 你是一个令人敬佩的女王！
或许是人们畏惧强大的力量。
value: Maybe it's because they fear the one who has it all.

name: 你就是魅力与力量共存的女神。
value: Because they haven't met you, the embodiment of both charm and power.

name: 看来大家都觉得，越迷人的女人越危险！
value: It seems that everyone thinks the more charming a woman is, the more dangerous she is!

name: 是这样么！但我更希望人们对我的感觉是崇拜和仰慕。
value: But I would prefer for people to feel admiration towards me, rather than fear.

name: 我曾经拥有无上的权力，可为什么我并不觉得开心呢？
value: I had supreme power over the whole of Egypt a long time ago, but I never felt happy back then.

name: 是么！那我也想品尝一下，爱情的滋味。
value: Then I want a taste of love.

name: 你也这么认为吗？那我更加坚定，我当初为父报仇是正确的选择！
value: Then I am more certain that avenging my father was the right choice!

name: 谢谢你的提醒，我会时刻保持理智，不会让仇恨吞噬自己的。
value: Thank you for reminding me of that. I will try not to let hatred consume me.

name: 你是第一个叫我为自己着想的人，这种感觉，真奇妙。
value: You are the first person to tell me that. Thank you.

name: 我很喜欢这种，被人认可的感觉。
value: Being recognized like that makes me happy.

name: 保持神秘才会让敌人猜不透你！不过在你面前，我倒是可以揭开神秘的面纱。
value: Being mysterious will prevent the enemy from knowing your next moves! But I don't have to hide in front of you, right?

name: 这是一个很高的评价，我很喜欢。
value: This is a very high compliment, and I like it.

name: 是这样吗？但我的力量，却是用来保护我的人民的。
value: Is that so? Then they are being narrowminded. My power is used to protect my people.

name: 哈哈……是的！我对自己的魅力和力量，都很有自信。
value: Is that so? Well I am confident in both my charm and my power.

name: 你就是传闻中的，守护秘密与知识的女神潘多拉？
value: Are you the goddess Pandora, who guards secrets and knowledge?

name: 没错，那么金字塔王权的守护者，荷鲁斯，是什么风把你给吹来了？
value: And what brings the guardian of the pyramid and the king's power, the mighty Horus, to my domain?

name: 拉神失踪了，埃及众神一片混乱，吞噬者阿佩普无人约束……黑暗即将降临。
value: Ra has gone missing, and chaos has engulfed the Egyptian gods. The Devourer Apep is unrestrained, and darkness is imminent.

name: 我需要找到拉神的权杖，替代她执行维护埃及秩序的职责。
value: I need to find Ra's scepter and take up her responsibility of maintaining order in Egypt.

name: 哦？你现在的力量还不足以掌控埃及神系，所以才需要拉神的权杖，对吗？
value: Oh? Your power is not enough to control the Egyptian pantheon. Is that why you need her scepter?

name: 它是件强大的神器，能够聚集太阳的力量，驱散一切黑暗。
value: It is a powerful artifact that can harness the power of the sun and dispel all darkness.

name: 是吗？既然它这么有价值，那么我为何要把它交给你，而不是自己留下呢？
value: Is that so? Since it is so valuable, why should I give it to you instead of keeping it for myself?

name: 理由很简单，你的力量可无法驱动它，潘多拉。
value: The reason is simple. Your power is insufficient to activate it, Pandora.

name: 呵呵，口气真大，不如用实力来证明一下吧。
value: Ha, you're quite confident. Why don't we prove it with a show of strength?

name: 怎么样，这下你该相信我的话了？
value: So, do you believe me now?

name: 呼……好吧，我就不打它主意了……暂时的。
value: Alright, I will accept it... for now.

name: 嗯哼，那就请你开始这场交易吧。
别着急，亲爱的，让咱们先好好谈谈价格……
value: Hold on, dear. Let's talk about the details first...

name: 我这里虽说是梦境，但有梦往往是通往现实目的的最佳途径。
value: Although this place is a dreamland created by my Box, it is the best way to achieve what you wish for in reality.

name: 当然，梦境有时也是充满危险的。
value: Of course, dreams can also be very, very dangerous.

name: 它会倒影出你心中最深的恐惧，小心……你的梦魇来了。
value: They can reflect your deepest fears. Be careful... One such nightmare is here now.

name: 荷鲁斯，我已经等你多时了。
value: Horus, I've been waiting for you for a long time.

name: 呵……阿努比斯？她可谈不上是我的梦魇……顶多淘气的时候有点麻烦而已。
value: Heh...Anubis? She's hardly my nightmare... at most, she's a nuisance.

name: 拉神让我在这里等你，如果你想要取得她的权杖，必须经受我的考验。
value: Ra has asked me to wait for you here. If you want to obtain her scepter, you must pass my test.

name: 你的考验是什么？找我打一架吗？
value: What is your test? Do you want to fight me?

name: 这只是首先要做的事。
value: Yes, but that is just the beginning of my test.

name: 你认可我的力量吗？阿努比斯。
value: Do you acknowledge my strength, Anubis?

name: 只有强大的力量是不够的……
value: Hmph, great power on its own is not enough.

name: 怎么，你该不会还想称一称我灵魂的重量吧？
value: What, are you going to weigh my soul too?

name: 那倒不必，你的高尚无容置疑。
value: That's not necessary. Your nobility is beyond doubt.

name: 但我必须跟在你身边，见证你度过一个个难关。
value: But I must follow you and witness you overcome each difficulty.

name: 好吧，看来死神大人也有偷窥他人梦境的情调。
value: Alright, it seems that even the Goddess of Death has a penchant for peeping into others' dreams.

name: 别这么说，旅途中有强大的伙伴加入并不是什么坏事。
value: Don't be like that. It is not a bad thing to have powerful companions join you on this journey.

name: 你可千万别这么想！她要是捣起蛋来，还是很让人头疼的。
value: If she causes trouble, it will be a headache for us.

name: 奈芙蒂斯，你怎么在这里？
value: Nephthys, what are you doing here?

name: 这儿可是我的领域，这句话不该我来问你吗？
value: This is my realm, shouldn't I be asking you that?

name: 呃，从这阵势来看……你们应该不是来欣赏我制作木乃伊的吧？
value: Well, looking at this situation... I guess you're not here to admire my mummification skills, are you?

name: 你暂时被我邀请到了梦境里，成为荷鲁斯试炼的一环。
value: Actually, you've been invited to this dreamland to be a part of Horus' trial.

name: 是吗？那正好，我刚想试试梦境里自己是不是能变得更强。
value: Is that so? Perfect timing, I was just about to test if I can become stronger in a dream.

name: 那么没必要多说了，来吧！
别打了别打了，虽然是梦境，但是挨揍还是一样痛……
value: Wait! Wait! Hold on. Even though we are in a dream, it still hurts to get hit...

name: 你比现实世界强得多，难道在梦境中的成长速度会更快？
value: You've become much stronger in this dreamland. Interesting, does one grow faster here than in the real world?

name: 我的意思是加入你们的队伍，看看到底怎么回事。
value: I am suggesting that I join your team and fight alongside you.

name: 看起来有些我没有邀请的家伙也来这里做客了呢，你的对头还真不少啊。
value: It looks like some uninvited guests have arrived. You sure do have a lot of enemies.

name: 看来天使们还在为当年的事情斤斤计较呢，只要有机会她们准会掺和进来。
value: It seems that they are still holding a grudge over the past. They will meddle any chance they get.

name: 如果你还是在用过去的思维审视我等，那就太遗憾了。
value: Don't give us that look. We are not the same as back then.

name: 拉神的太阳权杖不仅决定埃及众神的命运，对天使们来说也是至关重要。
value: The Scepter of Ra not only decides the fate of the Egyptian gods, but is also crucial for us angels.

name: 我们不能放任它落到邪恶的家伙手中！
value: We can't let it fall into the wrong hands!

name: 你曾经以复仇之神著称，我不敢保证你是否还留有那段糟糕的记忆和性格。
value: You were once known as the God of Vengeance. I can't be sure that you don't still have that terrible personality.

name: 太阳权杖的归属是我们埃及神明的事情，这事不用你们担心。
value: The Scepter of Ra is the business of us Egyptian gods. It is none of your concern.

name: 况且，我的复仇实际上意味着节制与公平，而非疯狂。
value: Besides, my vengeance was exacted with restraint and fairness, not madness.

name: 如果你坚持的话，那就必须通过我的考验。
value: If you insist on going after the Scepter, you must first pass my test.

name: 呵呵，我不介意接受你的考验。
你输了，加百列，以你的力量，恐怕阻止不了我。
value: Your strength is not enough to stop me.

name: 荷鲁斯，你变强了不少，确实让我有些出乎意料。
value: Horus, you've become much stronger than I expected.

name: 我虽然阻止不了你，但我会跟着你，确保你不会变成我想象中的那样。
value: I may not be able to stop you, but I can follow you to make sure you don't become what I fear you will.

name: 呼……监视我吗？好吧，如果你能在危急时刻帮我一把，我倒也没意见。
value: So you mean to keep an eye on me, huh? Well, if you can lend a hand when I'm in trouble, I don't mind.

name: 努特，你怎么也在这里？
value: Nuit, what are you doing here?

name: 我的姐妹，盖布，被一个神秘的家伙拉入了梦中，我是追寻她来到这里的。
value: My sister Geb was kidnapped by Ra. I came here to find her.

name: 努特，你怎么了？
value: Nuit, what's the matter with you?

name: 她似乎被人操控了……糟糕，我怎么没想到呢，是那个家伙。
value: It seems she's being controlled by someone... Oh no, I should have thought of this. It must be her.

name: 方塔苏斯，和我一样可以操控梦境的女神。但这个家伙是恶梦的缔造者。
value: Phantasos, a goddess who can manipulate dreams like me. But... she is also the creator of nightmares.

name: 没错，而且糟糕的是，你们现在已经脱离了潘多拉的梦境，到了我的领域……
value: Indeed I am. And unfortunately for you, you're no longer in Pandora's dreamland... You're in my realm. The realm of Nightmares.

name: 潘多拉，你我还有一笔账没算完呢。
value: Pandora, I believe you and I have some unfinished business.

name: 我不管你们有什么恩怨，先把努特放了。
value: I don't care about that... Just release Nuit first!

name: 差点忘记你们的存在，去吧，天空之神努特，让他们见识见识你的力量。
value: Oh, do you mean this Goddess of the Sky? Nuit, show them your power!

name: 荷鲁斯？我，我这是怎么了？
方塔苏斯控制了你，盖布应该也在她的控制之中。
value: Phantasos had taken control of your mind. Geb is probably also under her control

name: 没错，我为你们姐妹俩都做了安排。不过你脱离控制这件事，在我的意料之外。
value: That's right, I made both sisters into my puppets. But to think you could escape my control like this... I did not expect that.

name: 盖布呢？你把她怎么了？
value: What have you done to Geb? Where is she?

name: 想知道的话，就到更深层的梦境中来吧，呵呵……
value: If you want to know, follow me deeper into my realm, hehe.

name: 你们想见的人就在这里，只不过她还认不认识你们，就是另外一回事了。
value: Here she is. But I don't think she will recognize any of you, hehe. Not even her own sister.

name: 任何打乱主人计划的人，都要付出代价。
value: Anyone who disrupts the master's plan will have to pay the price.

name: 方塔苏斯，埃及的众神似乎并没有得罪过你吧？
value: Phantasos, the gods of Egypt have not offended you, have they?

name: 我的确与你们无冤无仇，但为了太阳权杖……你们明白的。
value: It is true that I have no grievances with you, but for Ra's Sun Scepter... Well, you understand.

name: 有了太阳权杖，我就能摆脱哈迪斯的掌控，成为冥界的新主人。
value: With that scepter, I can finally break free from Hades' control and become the new master of the underworld.

name: 所以说，你也是为了太阳权杖而来。
value: So you're doing this to get the Sun Scepter. Keep dreaming!

name: 只有埃及神能够激活太阳权杖的力量，我需要一个傀儡，成为我使用它的替身。
value: It is said that only an Egyptian god can activate the power of the Scepter. So I made one into my puppet to use it for me.

name: 话说够了，开始你们的战斗吧！
盖布，你清醒过来了吗？
value: Geb, can you hear me? Geb?

name: 我的身体好痛，发生什么了？
value: Ow, my body hurts. What happened?

name: 方塔苏斯那个家伙居然逃跑了，见鬼。
value: We let Phantasos escaped. Damn it.

name: 别急，我相信她会主动找上我们的。
value: Don't worry, I believe she will eventually come to us.

name: 方塔苏斯鬼鬼祟祟的，原来就是躲着你们这几个家伙啊。
value: I was wondering why Phantasos is being so sneaky. It turns out she is hiding from you lot.

name: 阿波罗？怎么，连你也想要来抢太阳权杖吗？
value: Apollo? Are you also here for the Scepter?

name: 我？抱歉，我对这玩意没有兴趣，因为我本身就可以使用太阳的力量。
value: Me? I have no interest in that thing. I am capable of using the power of the sun on my own.

name: 但我对其他能够动用太阳之力的人都不太放心，我可以信任拉，但无法信任她之外的人。
value: But I don't trust anyone other than myself and Ra to wield the power of the sun properly.

name: 你想要阻止我？
value: So you want to stop me from getting it?

name: 或者说是考验？看看你有没有肩负太阳的气量。
value: More like a test. Let me see if you're worthy of such power.

name: 你的力量超乎我的想象。
value: Your strength is beyond my imagination.

name: 你也不赖，阿波罗，我差一点点就输了——如果没有伙伴帮助的话。
value: You're not bad either, Apollo. I almost lost. If not for my allies' help, I would have lost.

name: 好吧，我姑且认可你有资格掌握太阳之力，不过你要小心……
value: Alright, I will acknowledge your capability for now. But be careful...

name: 因为当我认为你没资格的时候，我还会回来取回太阳权杖的。
value: Because the moment I think you are no longer worthy of it, I will take the Scepter from you.

name: 真让人失望，我还以为阿波罗能多坚持一会呢。
value: What a disappointment! I thought Apollo would hold out longer than that.

name: 真让人失望，我知道你迟早会回来找我，但没想到这么快。
value: I am also disappointed to see you again so soon.

name: 别太得意了，你现在可是在我梦境领域之中。
value: Don't get too cocky. You know you're still in my realm, right? I can summon anything here.

name: 在我的梦境中，我可以召唤出任何存在！让我看看你们该如何对付太阳本身！
value: Let's see how you deal with the Sun itself!

name: 谁在呼唤我？荷鲁斯？你们怎么会在这里？
value: Who's calling me? Horus? What are you doing here?

name: ……拉神，不，这只是方塔苏斯创造的幻影。
value: … Ra? No, this is only an illusion created by Phantasos.

name: 的确，然而即使是这样在，她也会发挥出在你心目中应有的力量！
value: Indeed, but even so, she will be as powerful as you think she should be!

name: 我们击败拉神了？这简直难以置信……
value: We defeated Ra? This is unbelievable...

name: 和拉交战让我感觉……很不好受。
value: Fighting Ra made me feel... uncomfortable.

name: 毕竟只是创造出来的幻影，你不用太过意不去。
value: It's just an illusion. Don't dwell on it.

name: 方塔苏斯，你会为此付出代价的！
value: Phantasos, you will pay for this!

name: 看来我不得不在这里和你们开战了，这可真让人感到刺激。
value: It looks like I get to fight you again. How exhilarating.

name: 你都到了走投无路的时候了，还这么乐观的吗？
小心说话，潘多拉，这里可是我的梦境，我的力量依旧占据上风。
value: Watch your tongue, Pandora. This is my realm, and my power still reigns supreme.

name: 嗯哼？我倒是想要见识见识。
value: Hmm? I'm curious to see what you can do.

name: 啊，你们这群……这群家伙！我迟早会回来的……
value: Ah, you... You! The scepter is mine! Sooner or later, I will have it.

name: 住手吧，方塔苏斯，这场闹剧该结束了。
value: Stop, Phantasos. This farce has gone on long enough.

name: 拉？你……你不是我创造出来的幻影吗？
value: Ra? Aren't you just an illusion that I created?

name: 我的神威无处不在，即便是在你的领域，我也仍旧能借助这幻影现身。
value: My divine power is omnipresent, even in your realm. Thus I can manifest through this illusion you created.

name: 你想干什么？
value: What do you want from me?

name: 我对你这样的小角色没什么兴趣，但你的梦境挺有意思……
value: Nothing. I have no interest in such a small and pitiful goddess. But your dreamland on the other hand...

name: 我感受到了你对埃及众神的信念，我也的确想要看看你是否能够成为众神的引导者。
value: I sense your faith in the Egyptian gods. I want to see if you are capable of becoming their leader.

name: 如你真的够格，我便允许让你指掌太阳权杖。
value: And if you prove your worth through my test, I will allow you to wield my scepter.

name: 我对太阳的神权并无觊觎之心，我只想让众神少一些争端罢了。
value: I have no desire for the divine power of the Sun. I just want there to be less conflict among the gods.

name: 无论如何，你都将面对自己的噩梦，你愿意接受挑战吗？
value: So do you want to take my test?

name: 我愿意接受挑战！
value: I am up for the challenge!

name: 做好准备，你将会遭遇我千百年来所面对的敌人。
value: Be ready, for you will face the biggest enemy that I have faced for thousands of years.

name: 混乱之主阿佩普……天哪，我做梦也不想看见她……
value: The Lord of Chaos, Apep... I wanted never to see her, not even in my dreams...

name: 真让我惊讶，你通过了考验，或许这柄太阳权杖交给你是命运的选择。
value: I'm surprised, you have passed the test. It's time to hand over this scepter to you.

name: 我将面对自己的责任。
value: I will face my responsibilities with confidence.

name: 接下来的一百年内，你将代替我行使掌控埃及众神的职能，愿太阳庇佑你。
value: During the next hundred years, you will act as the leader of the Egyptian gods on my behalf. May the sun bless you.

name: 抱歉……我还没准备好。
value: Sorry, I don't think I am ready for that.

name: 好吧，或许有一天，你依旧能接下掌控埃及神权的责任。
value: Alright, perhaps someday you will be able to bear that responsibility.

name: 集齐55个荷鲁斯碎片可以召唤荷鲁斯
value: Collect 55 Horus Shards to summon Horus

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_88
value: Everywhere the sun shines is the kingdom I promised you.

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_89
value: Dusk has come, and I have an appointment with my destined one.

name: 用于提升荷鲁斯的梦境中记忆宝珠的等级
value: Used to upgrade the level of the Memoria Orb in Horus's Dreamland

name: 荷鲁斯女神碎片自选箱
打开宝箱选择荷鲁斯任意品质的碎片
value: Open the box and choose Horus's Shards of any quality

name: 驱散一名敌人1个有益状态，并造成500%的物理伤害
value: Deals 500% P.DMG to one enemy and dispels 1 buff.

name: 宝物猎人：外域寻宝时可获得额外的宝物碎片。
value: Treasure Instinct: Found extra treasure fragments in Treasure Hunting.

name: 星辰护盾：所有上阵女神的防御增加10%。
value: Star Shield: Increases DEF of all line-up angels by 10%.

name: 伊娃诞生自群星之间的虚幻花园，在一颗流星的包裹下，坠落在了这个世界。她固执地认为，在未来的某刻，日月将会颠倒，群星陷入混乱，而只有人类才有能力扭转这一危机。她懂得如何通过星星的移动预知未来，她的预言中，有位来自另外一片星空的天命之人将会拯救这个世界，而伊娃则一直在等待此人的到来。
value: Eva was born from the illusory garden among the stars, and fell to this world in a meteor. She stubbornly believes that at some point in the future, the sun and moon will turn upside down and the stars will fall into chaos, and only one human has the ability to avert this crisis. She knows how to predict the future through the movement of the stars. In her prophecy, a human of destiny from another world will save the universe. Eva has been patiently waiting for her arrival.

name: 星辰指引着我来到你身边，愿命运赐予你勇气与信念。
value: The stars guide me to your side. May fate grant you courage and faith.

name: 我的角又长长了一公分！
喂，你一直都躲在远处偷偷地盯着我看吧？是又想我了吗？
value: Hey, you've been hiding in the distance and secretly staring at me, haven't you? Did you miss me again?

name: 魔法的力量能够移动星星，改变昼夜，可有时候想变出一块香喷喷的面包都做不到。
value: My magic can move the stars and change the day and night, but it is impossible to conjure a piece of delicious bread!

name: 太阳祭司：所有上阵女神的生命值提升300000。
value: Sun Priest: Increases HP of all line-up angels by 300,000.

name: 据说羽蛇是太阳的后代，身上永远保留着神性，因此，羽蛇世世代代都被训练成为太阳的祭司。凡蒂丝也是如此，她居住在被遗忘的古老庙宇，虽然早已无人参拜，但她依旧相信祷告能让这个世界风调雨顺。直到某天，在她祷告时，冥冥之中的声音在她耳边响起：一位带着重要使命的人类将会出现……
value: It is said that the Feathered Serpents are descendants of the sun and will retain their divinity forever. Therefore, they have been trained as priests of the sun god for generations. The same is true for Vandis. She lives in an ancient temple that has been forgotten. Although no one has visited it for a long time, she still believes that prayer can make the world a better place. Until one day, when she was praying, a mysterious voice sounded in her ears: a human being with an important mission will appear...

name: 我因听见你的祈祷而降临，愿太阳的恩赐与我的祝福常伴于你身边。
value: I came to hear your prayer. May the gift of the sun and my blessing always be with you.

name: 多看看我，你就会发现，即便是高高在上的祭司，也有少女的一面。
value: You know, even though I'm a high priest, I still have my girlish side.

name: 狮鹫？在人类看来，长着翅膀的蛇就够奇怪了，想不到还有长着翅膀的猫……
value: Griffon? In the eyes of humans, snakes with wings are strange enough, but there are cats with wings...

name: 你好像对我的尾巴挺感兴趣……要摸摸看吗？手感很不错的哦！
value: You seem to be very interested in my tail... Do you want to pet it? It feels very good!

name: 外域寻宝时可获得额外的宝物碎片。
value: Treasure Instinct: Found extra treasure fragments in Treasure Hunting.

name: 所有上阵女神的破防等级提升10%。
value: Wings of Courage: Inceases DEF.PEN level of all line-up angels by 10%

name: 蕾傲妮与其他的狮鹫一样，在刚成年时就离开了父母，在山崖上搭建了属于自己的小房子，过着离群索居的生活——一个人捕猎，一个人烹饪美食。直到那个人类的到来，她的光辉让蕾傲妮无法挪开双眼。很快，蕾傲妮就选择离开了悬崖上的家，跟随着那个人的足迹，希望某天能为她效命。
value: Like other griffons, Leonie left her parents when she reached adulthood, built her own small house on the cliff, and lived a life of isolation—hunting and cooking alone. One day, a human being arrived, and her brilliance caught Leonie's eyes. The young griffon then chose to leave her home on the cliff and follow in that person's footsteps, hoping to serve her one day.

name: 请让我翱翔在你左右，直到拂晓与黄昏的尽头。
value: Please let me soar by your side until the end of time.

name: 有兴趣让我在你身边睡一会吗？我挺喜欢这样……
value: Interested in letting me sleep next to you for a while? I would like that...

name: 又到了脱毛的季节了，每当这个时候，我都会担心我的翅膀会秃掉。
value: It's the season when our feathers molt. I always used to worry that my wings might fall off as well and never grow back.

name: 幻兽的种类还真是多得让我惊讶，在离开家乡前，我可没见过这么多彩的世界。
value: I'm amazed to be surrounded by so many other kinds of Eudemons. Before I left my hometown, I had never imagined such stunning diversity.

name: 复活节活动期间战场掉落，可以在活动界面兑换道具
value: Drops in the Easter event. It can be used to redeem items in the event interface.

name: 复活节活动期间挂机掉落，用于复活节活动孵化彩蛋，获得钻石和道具奖励
value: Drops in the Easter event. It can be used to redeem items in the event interface.

name: 活动结束时按照到达的孵蛋等级发放奖励
value: At the end of the event, rewards will be issued according to the hatching level reached by the player.

name: 照料复活节彩蛋能获得钻石及积分
value: Earn diamonds and points by caring for Easter Eggs.

name: EASTER_END_SUMMON_TIPS
value: Do you want to open the Lv. {0} Easter Egg?

name: ACTIVITY_HOLIDAY_EASTER_TIPS
value: ({0}-{1})Quick-Combat to get event item,to nurture your Easter Egg.

name: 已领取孵蛋大奖
value: Your Easter Egg rewards have been claimed

name: 当前还有道具剩余，请先前往使用
value: You have unused hatching items. Please use them first.

name: 当前孵蛋积分不足，无法开启复活彩蛋
ACTIVITY_HOLIDAY_EASTER_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT
value: This is your unopened Easter Egg Reward. Thanks for your support!

name: ACTIVITY_HOLIDAY_EASTER_RECYCLE_MAIL_CONTENT
value: This time's Easter event is ended. All event items are recycled into diamonds.

name: {0}可根据孵化等级开启复活节彩蛋
value: Hatch to level up the Easter Egg and and open it in {0}

name: 对敌方全体造成200%的物理伤害，并使敌方全体伤害降低30%，持续2回合。然后使己方所有女神获得【审判】状态2回合，拥有【审判】状态的女神被击杀时使击杀者攻击力降低荷鲁斯最大攻击力的15%（无视异常抵抗、无法驱散，最多叠加3层，持续至战斗结束）
value: Deals 200% P.DMG to all enemies, decreasing their DMG Increase by 30%. At the same time, bestows [Judgment] to all allies (Both effects last for 2 rounds).\n[Judgment]: When defeated, the enemy who defeated the bearer becomes the target. Reduces the target's ATK by 15% of Horus's Max ATK until the end of the battle (Ignores Debuff RES; cannot be dispelled). This state can stack, up to 3 layers.

name: 对敌方全体造成220%的物理伤害，并使敌方全体伤害降低50%（无法驱散），持续2回合。然后使己方所有女神获得【审判】状态2回合，拥有【审判】状态的女神被击杀时使击杀者攻击力降低荷鲁斯最大攻击力的20%（无视异常抵抗、无法驱散，最多叠加5层，持续至战斗结束）
value: Deals 220% P.DMG to all enemies, decreasing their DMG Increase by 50%. At the same time, bestows [UR Judgement] to all allies (Both effects cannot be dispelled and last for 2 rounds).\n[UR Judgment]: When defeated, the enemy who defeated the bearer becomes the target. Reduces the target's ATK by 20% of Horus's Max ATK until the end of the battle (Ignores Debuff RES). This state can stack, up to 5 layers.

name: 驱散一名敌人所有有益状态，造成600%的物理伤害，并将造成伤害的100%转化为自身护盾，护盾持续2回合（不可驱散）
value: Deals 600% P.DMG to one enemy, dispels all buffs on the target, and converts that dealt DMG to a shield that lasts for 2 rounds (cannot be dispelled).

name: 拥有【审判】状态的女神被击杀时额外使击杀者的攻击力降低5%
value: When the bearer of [Judgment] is defeated, the enemy who defeated her becomes the target. Reduces the target’s ATK by extra 5%.

name: 额外使全体友方女神获得荷鲁斯攻击力200%的护盾，护盾持续2回合（不可驱散）
value: All allies receive a extra shield equal to 200% of Horus's ATK that lasts for 2 rounds (cannot be dispelled).

name: 进入战斗时，使我方全体女神获得【复仇】状态（不可驱散），拥有该状态的女神死亡时，会进入灵魂状态，保留1点生命值且无法再恢复生命值，同时获得荷鲁斯1000%最大攻击力的护盾（无法驱散，护盾最大不超过荷鲁斯最大生命值的2倍），然后使全体友方女神提升荷鲁斯当前攻击力40%的攻击力、荷鲁斯当前防御40%的防御，持续4回合（无法驱散，不可叠加），该效果每名女神只能触发一次。（灵魂状态死亡后才视为被击杀）
value: When entering the battle, bestows [Vengeance] to all allies (cannot be dispelled). When [Vengeance] is triggered, increases all allies' ATK and DEF by 40% of Horus's current ATK and DEF for 4 rounds (each angel can only trigger this effect once; cannot be dispelled; cannot stack).\n[Vengeance]: When receiving fatal damage, the bearer continues to act in the state of a soul (doesn't count as killed), remaining 1 HP (cannot be healed afterward). At the same time, she receives a shield equal to 1000% of Horus's Max ATK (cannot be dispelled; the shield cannot exceed twice the Max HP of Horus).

name: 被击杀时使击杀者攻击力降低荷鲁斯最大攻击力的15%
value: When defeated, decreases the target's ATK by 15% of Horus's Max ATK.

name: 攻击力降低荷鲁斯攻击力的15%
value: ATK reduced by 15% of Horus's ATK

name: 被击杀时使击杀者攻击力降低荷鲁斯最大攻击力的20%
value: When defeated, decreases the target's ATK by 20% of Horus's Max ATK.

name: 攻击力降低荷鲁斯攻击力的20%
value: ATK reduced by 20% of Horus's ATK

name: 被击杀时使击杀者攻击力降低荷鲁斯最大攻击力的15%和自身攻击力的5%
value: When defeated, decreases the target's ATK by 15% of Horus's Max ATK and 5% of the target's current ATK.

name: 攻击力降低荷鲁斯攻击力的15%和自身攻击力5%
value: ATK reduced by 15% of Horus's ATK and 5% of self ATK

name: 被击杀时使击杀者攻击力降低荷鲁斯最大攻击力的20%和自身攻击力的5%
value: When defeated, decreases the target's ATK by 20% of Horus's Max ATK and 5% of the target's current ATK.

name: 攻击力降低荷鲁斯攻击力的20%和自身攻击力的5%
value: ATK reduced by 20% of Horus's ATK and 5% of self ATK

name: 死亡时，会进入灵魂状态
value: When defeated, enters the soul state.

name: 女巫合成限时头像框，持续时间7天
value: Bakery  Limited Avatar Frame (exprie after 7 days)

name: DRIFTING_DUNGEON_DEFEAT_TIPS
value: Challenge failed. Do you want to ask for help from your friends?

name: 请问你是潘多拉女士吗？
猜对啦！倒是你……从外表看来，是东方人吧？让我来看看你的真名……
value: Yeah, who are you? Based on how you're dressed, I'd say you're from the East.

name: 嗯……如果我没猜错的话，你是大韩的沈青儿？来找我这名灾厄的掌控者，所为何事？
value: Hmm... If my guess is right, you are Sim Cheong, the Korean peasant girl turned empress from Korean folklore. What do you want from me?

name: 我的子民们得了一种加速衰老的病，我到处找医治的方法，但都没效果。
value: My people have contracted a disease that accelerates aging. I have searched everywhere for a cure, but nothing works.

name: 我听人说，你可以帮人实现愿望，所以我……想来找你帮帮忙。
value: I heard that you can help people fulfill their wishes, so I… came to ask for your help.

name: 我又不是圣诞老人，怎么可能帮人实现愿望？何况，找我帮忙可都是需要代价的。
value: I'm not a genie, so how could I possibly grant people's wishes? Besides, my help comes at a price.

name: 为了大韩的子民，我愿意付出任何代价！
value: For the sake of my people, I am willing to pay any price!

name: 喔！你身上的珍贵之物可真不少……确实值得我帮你解决这个麻烦。
value: I admire your selfless nature and your willingness to sacrifice for the sake of others. You are certainly worthy of my help.

name: 然而梦境领域可不是游乐场，里面充满了各种危险，你的实力能应对吗？
value: However, the dream realm is a dangerous place and what happens here affects your body in the waking realm. Are you strong enough to handle it?

name: 很遗憾，我……并不太擅长打架。
value: Unfortunately, I… am not very good at fighting.

name: 看来你需要个小小的测试呢，不过放心吧，我会留一手的。
value: How about a little test then? Don't worry, I will hold back.

name: 哎哟……你确定自己……不怎么会打架？
value: Ouch… Are you sure you… are not very good at fighting?

name: 呃……我可能下手有些不知道轻重，请千万不要见怪……
value: Uh… I may have been a bit too heavy-handed. I'm really sorry. I didn't mean to hurt you.

name: 不过你的能力，大多数都倾向于和同伴的配合，或许我们应该去找几个帮手……
value: You know... your greatest strength seems to be your shields, so maybe we should find you a few companions. That way you can focus on supporting them while they do the fighting.

name: 嗯，我想到两个合适的同伴了！
value: And I have two in mind who would be perfect!

name: 熊女，快出来！我们需要你的帮助。
value: Ungnyeo, come out! We need your help.

name: 哎？！又要帮忙啊，可我不想再去那些危险的梦境里了。
value: Again?! But this dream world is so dangerous. I really don't want to do this again.

name: 上次闯入其他梦境时，被坏家伙们揍得够呛，我再也不会相信你了。
value: Last time, we stumbled into a nightmare, and I got beaten up. I don't trust you anymore.

name: 安心啦，这次的同伴我想你不会陌生，是个很可靠的人。
value: Don't worry. Didn't you notice my companion? It's Sim Cheong! She's very reliable.

name: 真的？
value: Sim Cheong...? Hmm that name sounds vaguely familiar, but I can't quite place it.

name: 看来只有打一架才能让你的熊脑袋开开窍啦。
value: Maybe a good bop on the head will awaken your memories, you sluggish, grumpy bear.

name: 不打了不打了，认输了！我可没想到会直接面对如此铜墙铁壁般的防守。
value: No more fighting. I yield! How is your shield so strong?

name: 虽然我并不擅长进攻，但对于保护好同伴这件事，还是很有信心的……
value: Instead of offense, I channel everything into protecting my companions. ... By the way, Ungnyeo, are you also from Korea?

name: 嗯……看在沈青儿同为大韩神明，而且实力不俗的前提下，我就帮你们一次吧。
value: Yes! So that's why I recognized your name. We come from the same place! In that case, I'll help you out this time.

name: 谢谢你，一路上还请你多关照。
value: Great, I'd love to have you on my team.

name: 这不是沈青儿吗？你怎么会徘徊在潘多拉的梦境里？
value: Aren't you Sim Cheong? What brings you to Pandora's realm?

name: 巴里？！我真没想到能在这儿遇上你。
value: Bari?! I didn’t expect to meet you here.

name: 啊，我明白了，这又是你的新生意吗，潘多拉？
value: Hmm... I see what you're up to, Pandora. Are you making a business out of this? Trading your help for favors?

name: 呵呵……你可真了解我，巫女殿下，有兴趣帮帮忙吗？
value: Hehe… You really know me well. Are you interested in helping out?

name: 这次我就勉强答应你了——不过这可是看在沈青儿的份上。
value: Alright, but only for Sim Cheong's sake.

name: 哎？！这就答应了？按照往日，你不是都要测试一下对方的实力才同意吗？
value: Really?! But don't you always demand a test of strength before agreeing to help?

name: 架是一定要打的，不过嘛，无论如何我都会帮这个忙的。
value: A fight is a given. But I'll help out either way, since she is a dear friend.

name: 你就好好感谢我吧，潘多拉，哼哼。
value: As for you Pandora... let's just say you owe me one.

name: 虽然我输了，但你们得承认，以目前的团队实力来看，我们还很难对抗强大的神明。
value: You may have beaten me, but even together, we won't stand a chance against the powerful gods we'll encounter here. Our party needs more strength.

name: 这也正是我所担心的，接下来的路可能不太好走。
value: That’s exactly what I’m worried about. The road ahead won't be easy.

name: 我相信只要团结，就能克服任何麻烦。
value: I believe that as long as we stick together, we can overcome any trouble.

name: 话倒没错，亲爱的。
value: You are right, my dear. But we should still take steps to prepare.

name: 幸好，还有个备用方案——我认识一个强悍的大家伙。
value: Fortunately, I have a plan. And it involves a formidable dragon.

name: 你是说……她？如果你真能说服她来帮忙，那我们的旅途将会顺利很多。
value: You mean… Storm Dragon? Our journey would be much easier with her on our team. That is, if you can actually convince her to help.

name: 她以前曾在东方呆过很长时间，后来留在了北欧神域，让我去和她聊聊吧……
value: There she is. Let me go talk to her. We used to know each other back when she lived in Asia, before she moved to the Norse realm.

name: 巴里，几千年未见了……这位年轻姑娘是？
value: Bari, long time no see… Who is this young lady?

name: 沈青儿，东方众神中的新星，她的子民有难，而我打算带她去昆仑梦境，找西王母碰碰运气。
value: This is Sim Cheong, the rising star of the Eastern gods. Her people are in trouble, and I plan to take her to the Kunlun Dreamland to seek Xiwangmu’s help.

name: 我明白了，你们想要我加入你们，一同护送她吧？
value: I see. So you want me to join you in escorting her?

name: 我可以帮你们，但是……沈青儿，我需要测试你。
value: I can help you, but first… Sim Cheong, I need to test you.

name: 你需要我做什么？
value: What do you want me to do?

name: 直面我的风暴，让我看看你的决心。
value: I want to see if you have enough determination to weather my storm.

name: 我是不会退缩的。
value: Nothing you can unleash will break my will.

name: 虽然你实力有限，但意志出奇地坚韧……你值得拥有拯救子民的荣耀。
value: Despite your feeble frame, your will is surprisingly strong.

name: 我会在接下来的旅途中保护你，为你披荆斩棘。
value: I will protect you on your journey and clear the way for you.

name: 看来西王母猜得没错，你们果然在这儿。
value: It seems that Xiwangmu was right. You are indeed here.

name: 火神祝融，在昆仑神域的梦境里见到她我可一点也不意外。
value: She is the fire goddess Zhu Rong. I’m not surprised to see her in the Kunlun Dreamland.

name: 西王母手上有能够治愈万疾的仙药，但从不轻易给予他人。
value: Xiwangmu has an elixir that can cure all diseases, but she does not give it to just anyone.

name: 真糟糕，你不会是来阻止我们的吧？
value: How selfish! Are you here to stop us?

name: 恰恰相反，我是个热心肠，如果你们连我这关都过不了，不如趁早回去，能省不少力气。
value: On the contrary, I’m a kind-hearted person. First you must pass my test, to prove that your journey won't be a waste of time.

name: 而如果你们能胜我，我就会在接下来的旅程中帮助你们。
value: And if you do beat me, I will lend you my aid.

name: 我会拯救我的子民，无论遇到什么样的困难。
value: I will save my people, no matter what difficulties I must face.

name: 那就上吧，时间可没多少能浪费了。
value: Then let's do this. Your people can't wait forever.

name: 够了够了，再打我就要“过热”了。
value: Enough, enough. I think we can stop right here.

name: 西王母托我在这里接应你们，以防你们被某些盗药的家伙盯上。
value: Xiwangmu asked me to meet you here and help you just in case you ran into trouble on the road. There are thieves roaming about.

name: 诶？原来你不是来考验我们的吗？
value: Huh? So you weren’t here to test us?

name: 哼，和你们打一场只是餐后活动而已。
value: I wanted to see what was so special about you, that made Xiwangmu want to help you.

name: 昆仑神域居然还有人敢偷药？
value: So what are the thieves after? Do they dare try to steal the medicine in Kunlun realm?

name: 非常遗憾，不久前还真有人得手了……也罢，不谈这些了。
value: Unfortunately, they've already succeeded not too long ago. But let's not talk about that now.

name: 接下来，就由我护送你们前往昆仑神域的顶峰吧。
value: First, I need to focus on escorting you to the peak of Kunlun realm.

name: 嫦娥？你怎么也在这？
value: Chang’e? What are you doing here?

name: 我？我当然是受命于西王母，在这里等着考验前来问药之人的。
value: Me? I’m here on Xiwangmu’s orders, to test those who come for the medicine.

name: 真麻烦……东方众神的考验，未免太多了点吧。
value: What a hassle… You Eastern Gods do like testing everyone, don't you?

name: 你们看着我干什么？我先前只是开个玩笑，可没真打算阻拦你们。
value: Why are you looking at me? I was just joking before, I didn’t really intend to stop you.

name: 有话之后再聊，看招啦！
value: She may have been joking, but I'm not. Let's see if you're worthy of this special medicine.

name: 停手停手！真是一群暴力的家伙……你们通过测试了。
value: Stop, stop! You have passed the test.

name: 那就请您为我们带路吧。
value: Then please lead the way to Xiwangmu. We must see her urgently.

name: 知道了，需要我的帮忙吗？
value: I see them. Do you need my help?

name: 不用，这将会是一场公平的较量。
value: No, I can deal with them on my own.

name: 哟，这不是卑弥呼大人和辉夜阁下吗？你们出现在这里，难道是……
value: Lady Himiko? Princess Kaguya? What are you doing here?

name: 我们在此的理由和你一样，也是为仙药而来，但我们之间必须决一胜负。
value: The same reason as you. We need the medicine of Kunlun.

name: 一决胜负？！为什么？
value: Why are you trying to stop us?

name: 据我所知，这种珍贵的仙药需经过几千年的炼制，世间仅存一份。
value: From what I know, the medicine is very difficult to make, and thieves stole the last batch. We were here first, and we need the medicine more than you. The next one is ours!

name: 等等！就没有别的办法吗？
value: Wait! We can settle this another way.

name: 呼……我失败了，辉夜，拜托你了……
value: I can't hold out any longer. Kaguya, I need your help!

name: 我一定不会辜负日出之国的人民。
value: I won’t let down you down!

name: 接下来，我将成为你们的对手！
辉夜小姐，请不要勉强自己。
value: Princess Kaguya, please don’t push yourself too hard.

name: 对不起，仙药我必须要得到，不然整个高天原，都将彻底迎来毁灭。
value: I must get the elixir, or else the whole heavenly realm will face destruction.

name: ……不管怎么样，我一定要试试，来吧！
咳咳……命运已经放弃大和众神了吗……
value: *Cough cough* Has fate abandoned the gods of Yamato…?

name: 就没有两全其美的办法吗？我不想看到衰亡降临在任何人身上……
value: Isn’t there a way to make everyone happy? I don’t want to see anyone suffer…

name: 如果能让更多的生命得救，让我付出什么样的代价都行，哪怕牺牲自己。
value: I’m willing to pay any price to save more lives, even if it means sacrificing myself.

name: 恐怕……
value: Cheong, I don't think that's an option...

name: 沈青儿，你有这样的仁慈之心，我非常欣慰。
value: You have a kind heart, Sim Cheong. I am very pleased.

name: 话不用多说了，你们跟我来吧。
value: There’s no need for more words. Follow me.

name: 沈青儿，如果你想寻求仙药，那么接下来必须通过最终的考验。
value: Sim Cheong, if you want the elixir, you must pass the final test.

name: 你刚刚说，为了求药愿意牺牲自己，是真的吗？
value: You just said that you are willing to sacrifice yourself for the elixir. Is that true?

name: 我明白这很难，但……但为了众生，我愿意这样。
value: I know it's hard, but yes. For the sake of all living beings, I am willing to do it.

name: 这药需要以神明的灵魂做为素材才能发挥效果，这意味着测试者需要面对另一个自己。
value: Well then listen closely. To make the elixir, a goddess must pour all of her divinity into it. In doing so, she must face her inner self. Even I have nearly lost myself in this process a few times.

name: 而在面对自己时一旦因恐惧而放弃，轻则丧失神格，重则一命呜呼，你可有此觉悟？
value: If you surrender to fear, you will either lose your divinity or die. That is why the elixir is so rare and difficult to make. Are you prepared to take this risk?

name: 这梦境会召唤你的幻影，她将与你战斗直至一方被彻底消灭……
value: Alright. Once you pour your divinity into this, a phantom of yourself will be summoned into this Dreamland. You must fight until one of you is completely destroyed…

name: ……你如能成功，幻影将替代你的灵魂，作为激活仙药的素材。
value: ...If you succeed, the phantom will be used to activate the elixir instead of your soul.

name: 我不会畏惧的，来吧。
value: Let's do this. For the sake of my people, I will not have any fear!

name: 虽然生死一线，但你成功了。
value: Yes. You put your life on the line and you succeeded.

name: 这份仙药已经能够消除一切衰亡之灾，带着它回去救治你的子民吧。
value: This elixir can remedy any disease. Take it and go back to heal your people.

name: 等等，这是否意味着大和的众生……
value: Wait, does this mean that the people of Yamato…

name: 非常遗憾，仙药只有一份……
value: I’m sorry, but there is only one elixir…

name: 天下生命没有贵贱之别，我……不愿意看到其他人遭受苦难，有什么办法吗？
value: I value all lives equally. I... don't want to see others suffer. Is there not another way?

name: 高天原所遭受的衰亡之灾，源于黄泉之神伊邪那美的诅咒。
value: Yamato is suffering due to the curse of Izanami, the goddess of the underworld.

name: 倘若她愿意让诅咒停止，那么仙药也并非必须，但你知道面对她的代价吗？
value: If she is willing to dispel the curse, then the elixir is not necessary. But Izanami... She is much more powerful than me or any other gods you have met.

name: 抱歉，辉夜……我不能在此牺牲，这个代价或许太过沉重。
value: I’m sorry, Kaguya… I can’t sacrifice myself here. My people need me.

name: 不用过于自责，我们也需要面对这份命运。
value: Don’t blame yourself. This is not your duty.

name: 大和众神也会坚定地完成自己的使命，就如你一样。
value: We will not forget your good intentions.

name: 沈青儿，我将帮你打开离开梦境的传送门，去拯救你的子民吧，时间不多了……
value: Sim Cheong, I will help you open the portal to leave the dream. Go and save your people. There’s not much time left…

name: 我明白，即便是灵魂坠落黄泉，我也会面对她！
value: I understand. Even if I have to risk falling into the underworld, I will face her!

name: 我将连接伊邪那美的梦境，但之后会发生什么我就不敢保证了。
value: I will connect to Izanami’s dream, but I can’t guarantee what will happen next.

name: 仁慈的少女，愿天照大神的光芒赐福于你，一切请小心……
value: Kind girl, may the light of Amaterasu bless you. Be careful…

name: 辉夜，我已知晓你们到来的意图……
value: Kaguya, I already know why you have come...

name: 伊邪那美阁下，无论是何原因，我恳请您收回对高天原的诅咒。
value: Lady Izanami, whatever the reason for your curse, I beg you to lift it.

name: 我感受到灵魂在腐朽，道义在消逝，生命将终归黄泉……
value: Souls decay, morality fades, and all life returns to the underworld in the end.

name: 我不过是让这一切早些到来而已。
value: I’m just making it happen sooner.

name: 不，万事万物都遵循自然之法，他们命运还没有结束。
value: No, everything happens in its own time. Fate is not yours to control.

name: 异邦的少女……你说得不错，但强存弱死也是自然法则的一环。
value: Outsider... Who are you to question me?

name: 作为黄泉之主，我有义务践行此理。
value: As ruler of the underworld, I have absolute authority over all lives.

name: 那么身为生命的守护者，我也将与众神一同阻止您……
value: Then as a guardian of life, I will stop you!

name: 有趣……如果你们在战斗中胜过我，我便收回诅咒。
value: Big words for such a weak little girl. You don't stand a chance! But if by some miracle you win, I will lift my curse.

name: 但如果你们失败了，我便取走你们所有人的灵魂，如何？
value: And if you fail, I will take your soul. Do you still dare to oppose me?

name: 我们准备好了，请开始吧……
value: I'm not afraid of you. This ends now!

name: 呵呵……真是意外，没想到我最终会输给你们……
value: What a surprise. Defeated by such weakling...

name: 您并没有使出全力，我可以感觉到……
value: You didn’t use your full strength. I can feel it…

name: 哼……或许命运今天站在你们一边吧，我会遵守约定，消除所有的诅咒。
value: Hmph… Maybe fate is on your side today. I will keep my promise and remove the curse.

name: 感谢您理解这一切……
value: Finally... The suffering will end for the people of Yamato!

name: 至于你……异邦的少女，我会在未来好好留意你的。
value: As for you, outsider, I will keep my eye on you in the future.

name: 因为我对你纯洁的灵魂很感兴趣，我期待在黄泉与你相见的那天，呵呵……
value: A soul as pure as yours will surely be delicious. I look forward to the day we meet again, in the underworld, little girl.

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_91
value: A moment of beauty, a lifetime of grace.

name: 用于提升沈青儿的梦境中记忆宝珠的等级
value: Used to upgrade the level of the Memoria Orb in Sim Cheong's Dreamland

name: 沈青儿女神碎片自选箱
打开宝箱选择沈青儿任意品质的碎片
value: Open the box and choose Sim Cheong's Shards of any quality

name: 3回合伤害、防御力、暴击值增加60%，暴伤增加40%
value: Increases DMG, DEF and Crit by 60%, Crit DMG by 40% for 3 rounds

name: 烘焙屋限时头像框，持续时间7天
value: Bakery Limited Avatar Frame (exprie after 7 days)

name: 进入战斗时，使全体友方女神获得沈青儿当前生命值30%的护盾（无法驱散，持续2回合）和3层【莲华】（无法驱散）。每层【莲华】使女神受到暴击时的伤害额外降低10%，每回合轮到女神行动时失去1层【莲华】同时驱散自身1个负面状态
value: When entering battle, bestows all allies a shield equal to 30% of Sim Cheong's current HP that lasts for 2 rounds and 3 layers of [Lotus Barrier] (both effects cannot be dispelled).\n\n[Lotus Barrier]: When receiving a critical hit, each layer of [Lotus Barrier] reduces received DMG by 10%. At the beginning of her turn, she loses one layer of [Lotus Barrier], dispelling one debuff on herself.

name: 挑战失败，是否要向好友求助？
value: Challenge failed. Do you want to ask for help from your friends?

name: 受到暴击时的伤害额外降低10%
value: When receiving a critical hit, reduces received DMG by 10%

name: 受到暴击时的伤害额外降低20%
value: When receiving a critical hit, reduces received DMG by 20%

name: 坏了，好像有什么麻烦精找上门来了，我得赶紧开溜。
value: Oh no! It seems trouble has come knocking at my door.

name: 没事，我说自己呢……你来找我有什么事情吗？
value: I, um... I was speaking about myself. Definitely not you... So why are you here?

name: 出大事了！月亮被人偷走了！
value: It's a disaster! Someone stole the moon!

name: 月亮被人偷走了？那……好像挺严重的样子啊，会有什么危害吗？
value: Did you say the MOON was stolen? That... is quite bad.

name: 我的家没啦！人们也不能赏月了，海水不会涨潮了，依赖月亮生存的动物也会受到影响！
value: Without the moon, the tides won't change and people will suffer.

name: 那你有线索吗？
value: Do you have any clue how this happened?

name: 有线索了人家才不会来找你呢。
value: I wouldn't be here if I did. That's why I need your help.

name: 说得我好像是什么邪神似的……好了，按照规则，对梦境有所求者，必须通过我的考验。
value: Well, if you want my help traversing the dreamland, you must pass my test.

name: 好呀好呀，我最近在王母娘娘那学了几个新招，正愁找不到人试试手。
value: Perfect. It gives me a chance to try out the new tricks Xiwangmu taught me.

name: ……你当我是个陪练吗？
value: ...Are you suggesting that I'm nothing more than a punching bag?

name: 好了好了，停手，让你的兔子从我头上离开，弄乱了我的发型！
value: Okay okay, stop. Get your bunny off my head! It's making a nest in my hair.

name: 我需要占卜一下来确认月亮的大致去向。
value: Let's see. I will use divination to find out what happened.

name: ……我看到一只巨大的黑影将它吞了下去。
value: ...I saw a huge black shadow swallowing the moon.

name: 它是华夏传说中巨大的黑狗，可以吞掉一切发光的东西。
value: It's a big black dog from Chinese legends, which swallows shiny things.

name: 它长什么样子？就是一条巨大的狗吗？
value: What does it look like? Just a big dog?

name: 我也没见过……都只是听说的。
value: I haven't seen it myself. I've only heard about it.

name: 大和神族对天狗的纪录倒是挺多的，我看要不去问问她们。
value: We should ask the knowledgable Yamato gods. Maybe they know more.

name: 辉夜阁下，好久不见啦。
value: Long time no see, Princess Kaguya.

name: 我是嫦娥啊，你的眼睛怎么回事？怎么灰蒙蒙的？
value: It's Chang'e. What happened to your eyes?

name: 我，什么也看不到……看不到月光，也看不到你。
value: I can't see anything... Not the moon, nor you.

name: 恐怕是因为月亮消失的原因，让她暂时性的失明了。
value: This must be because of the moon's disappearance.

name: 我……啊！月亮消失了，我内心的月魔要苏醒了！你们……你们快离开这里！
value: I-... ah. Oh no! The moon demon inside me is waking up. Get away from me quickly!

name: 不用害怕，那种东西不存在的哦，只是你内心另一面而已，就像月亮暗面一样。
value: Calm down, there's no such thing as a moon demon. It's just another side of you, like the dark side of the moon.

name: 我快控制不住了……
value: No... I can't control it anymore...

name: 那就释放它吧，我们会拯救你。
value: Then release it. We will defeat it to save you.

name: 谢谢你们，我感觉好多了。
value: Thank you. I feel better now.

name: 看来月亮的消失确实对很多人造成了影响。
value: It seems the moon's disappearance really is affecting people.

name: 辉夜妹妹，你的心魔并没有完全除去，月亮消失的越久，心魔就会出现的越频繁。
value: Princess Kaguya, your inner demon isn't gone. Without the moon, it will keep appearing.

name: 不如跟我们一起去把月亮找回来，这样你就不用忍受心智被剥夺的痛苦了。
value: Why don't you join us to get the moon back?

name: 我愿意加入你们，一起追回月亮！
value: Of course I will join you!

name: 不是我有意讽刺，就你们俩，恐怕还不够那个“天狗”塞牙缝的。
value: I hate to burst your bubble, but the two of you would be nothing more than a snack for that Dog.

name: 我？要是太过危险，我肯定第一个跑。
value: Me? I'm running at the first sign of danger.

name: 你得找个更厉害的家伙当靠山。
value: If you want to stand a chance, you need someone stronger.

name: 这么说得话，我倒是想到有个人会帮我。
value: In that case, I know someone who might help.

name: 火神祝融！她可是华夏神族鼎鼎有名的战神！最主要的是，她还欠我一顿饭！
value: Fire Goddess Zhu Rong! She's the Chinese Goddess of War. And most importantly, she owes me a favor.

name: 这么说你是有把握说服她来帮我们咯？那么走吧，我带你们去见她。
value: Well if you're confident you can convince her, I will take you to her.

name: 好了，咱们到了，剩下的就得靠你自己争取了。
value: Here we are. I brought you to Zhu Rong. The rest is up to you.

name: 诸位来找在下，所为何事？
出大事啦，月亮不见了！
value: Please help! The moon has disappeared!

name: 月亮不见了？这是怎么回事？
那只传说中的天狗把月亮给吞掉了！请你帮帮我，一起去把它追回来。
value: It was swallowed by the legendary Heavenly Dog. Please help me get it back.

name: 我明白了，不过我这会和人约了决斗呢，恐怕不能帮你。
value: I see, but... I have an appointment for a duel, so I can't come with you.

name: 决斗？为什么要决斗？和谁？
哎呀就是闲着无聊，想找人打一架。
value: Ugh, because I'm bored. I've been itching for a fight.

name: 什么？就你？别开玩笑了吧。
人家可是很厉害的，而且人家还有两个帮手哦。
value: Don't underestimate me and my allies.

name: 好吧好吧，就当正式比试前的热身。
value: I guess I could do with a warm-up.

name: 诶，不错嘛，你这几下子是谁教你的？
嘻嘻，不告诉你！好啦，是王母娘娘教我的。
娘娘真偏心，等回去了我也要让她教我。
value: Xiwangmu has taught you some interesting moves. When I return, I'll ask her to teach me, too.

name: 那你现在愿意和我一起追月亮了吗？
value: So are you willing to look for the moon with me now?

name: 好吧，反正这一架也让我稍微有点满足了，就陪你去逛逛吧。
value: Well since gave me a satisfying fight, I wouldn't mind stretching my legs a bit... I'm in.

name: 那么接下来去哪？辉夜姬，你知道关于天狗的事情吗？
value: So where to next? Princess Kaguya, what do you know about the Heavenly Dog?

name: 我知道的不多，但是我认识一个人是这方面的专家，我可以带你们去她那看看。
value: Not much. But I can take you to someone who is well-versed in this kind of thing.

name: 好漂亮的神社啊，这里一定住着一位法力强大的巫女。
value: What a beautiful shrine. There must be a powerful priestess living here.

name: 抱歉各位，神社今日闭馆了，如果想要求签的话还请改日再来。
value: Sorry, the shrine is closed today. If you're looking for a fortune telling, please come back another day.

name: 巫女，我们是来寻求帮助的。
value: Amaterasu, we've come for your help.

name: 辉夜公主？抱歉，我刚刚看走眼了，还以为你们是普通的客人。
value: Princess Kaguya? I'm sorry, I didn't realize it was you.

name: 那么究竟是什么事情需要我的帮助呢？
value: What do you need my help with?

name: 我们遇到一件很麻烦的事：月亮被天狗给吞下去了。
value: The moon was swallowed by the Heavenly Dog.

name: 天狗？您说的应该是华夏传说里的吞噬日月的天狗吧。
value: You mean the Heavenly Dog from Chinese legends? The one which devours the sun and moon?

name: 我对这个只是略有涉猎，我需要占卜一下。
value: Although I have only dabbled a bit in divination, let me try find it for you.

name: 我看到一头黑色的野兽……但我看不清它的面貌……
value: I can see... a black beast... but it's too shadowy to make out...

name: 当心，她被什么附身了。
value: Wait, don't touch her! She's been possessed by something...

name: 哼哼，我倒要好好看看，是谁妄想用占卜来监视我的尊身！
value: Hmph. I came to get a look at who would dare to spy on me.

name: 这不是潘多拉嘛，怎么着，又在干帮小狗狗找妈妈的活呢。
value: And who do I find, but Pandora. Are you helping lost children find their way again?

name: 看来你认识我，那想必我也认识你咯。不如现身来见我吧，别躲躲藏藏的了。
value: You have me at a disadvantage. You know me, but I don't know you. Why don't you reveal yourself?

name: 啊哈哈哈，那多没趣啊，我要用这副躯壳将你们都打趴下了，再考虑这个提议。
value: Haha that's too boring! Instead I'm going to destroy you all using this body.

name: 别打了！她已经恢复神智了！
……我刚刚怎么了？身体好痛，好像被人打过……
value: Ouch. What happened? And why do I feel like I was beaten up?

name: 抱歉，刚刚有个鬼鬼祟祟的家伙附上你的身，我们被迫把它打走了，对，被迫……
value: Well... Someone sneaky took over your body and we had no choice but to fight you. No choice at all...

name: 我看到了一只巨大的野兽，它的样子很难描述……我看到它身边有一群猫。
value: I saw a huge beast. I don't know how to describe it. But I did see cats surrounding it.

name: 猫？难道是……猫又？不可能，她那么可爱，怎么会做出这种事情呢？何况她没有那种力量。
value: Cats? Could it be... Nekomata? But she's too cute to do such a thing.

name: 不如我们先去找她问问？
嘿喵嘿喵，真好吃，这可比小鱼干好吃啊喵！
我决定，得空了再去整点……唔，最好下个月的供奉都拿来换这个吃！
value: It's even better than dried fish. It was worth it to exchange all the offerings for this!

name: 啊！你在吃什么？快把它放下！
value: What are you eating? Bad kitty! Give it here.

name: 什么啊喵，又有人和本喵抢吃的喵！看本喵不痛扁你喵！
value: You're stealing meow food! Hiss! I won't let you!

name: 别打了别打了喵！好吃的给你们，都给你们！喵！
value: Ow! Stop hitting meow! Here, here, you can have some.

name: 等等，这不是月亮！？
value: Wait what's this!? This isn't the moon!

name: 什么月亮啊喵，这是章鱼小丸子！
value: What meow-n? This is octopus balls!

name: 章鱼小丸子！是食物啊喵！
她好像在护食……真可爱！好想抱一抱啊！
value: How cute! She's protecting her food. I just wanna hug her, she's so cute!

name: 你别过来啊喵！本喵不要被抱……唔，唔，只准摸本喵的头哦……呼噜呼噜。
value: No hugging! Um... but you can pet meow head. Purr~fect.

name: 虽然猫口夺食可恶，但看你们诚心服侍本喵的情况下就原谅你们了喵。
value: Stealing meow food was claw-ful, but I will forgive you since you petted meow head.

name: 所以你们来找本喵到底是为了什么事情？
value: Why were you looking for meow?

name: 是这样的，月亮被一只大狗样子的怪物给吞下去了！
value: We're looking for a big black dog that swallowed the moon.

name: 本喵不明白，月亮被狗吃了你们倒是去找狗啊，来找本喵这只猫干什么喵？
value: ...I know I have a tail and ears, but you do realize that I'm a cat, right?

name: 话是这么说，但我们在它身边看到了猫，所以就想来问问你。
value: Well a divination revealed cats surrounding it.

name: 那没必要抢本喵吃的吧……
value: That's no reason to grab meow food.

name: 话说本喵前不久一直和熊女在一块，她长得倒是挺像狗的，胃口也那么大。
value: Hmm. I was with Ungnyeo earlier. She looks like a dog and has a big appetite.

name: 任何线索都不能放过，那就麻烦小猫猫给我们带带路吧！
value: We gotta follow any and every clue. Lead the way, kitty.

name: 哼~哼~哼！今天又是好天气呀，小蜜蜂在哪里啊，在~哪~里？
value: Hum~hum~ Such a lovely day today. Little bees~ Come out, come out, wherever you are.

name: 咦，来了群人，该不会是来抢蜂蜜的吧？
value: Huh!? Why are so many people here? Maybe...to steal my honey!?

name: 吓！是她们！我得赶紧开溜了！
value: No! I won't let them! I'll run away.

name: 呜呜呜……你们为什么要追我？
value: Wah! Why are you chasing me?

name: 那你为什么一看见我们就跑呀？
你们一脸气势汹汹，我以为是要抢我的蜂蜜……而且还有潘多拉，每次见到她都没好事。
value: You all look scary. I thought you wanted to steal my honey. And Pandora always brings trouble.

name: 她这副熊样，我看不像是能偷月亮的家伙……你们怎么看？
value: She looks more like a bear than a dog. Unless the moon is honey, I don't think she's the one who ate it.

name: 呃，确实，她看起来一点都不凶……即便显出真身的时候，也还是呆萌呆萌的样子。
value: Indeed. She doesn't look like a scary beast. She's actually really fluffy and cute!

name: 偷月亮？偷什么月亮？
value: Steal the moon? Steal what moon?

name: 月亮被天狗吞下了，但是我们都没见过天狗的样子，所以才错把你当成了那个坏蛋。
value: The moon was swallowed by the Heavenly Dog. But none of us have seen it before, so...

name: 我是熊，又不是狗，虽然以前也有人叫我狗熊来着……
value: I am a bear, not a dog.

name: 如果世界上有能吞下月亮的家伙，我觉得应该会是龙族！只有她们才有那么大的胃口。
value: If anyone could swallow the moon, it would be dragons! Only they have such a big appetite.

name: 说得好像也对诶，但是天狗不是狗嘛？熊看起来还挺像狗，但龙和狗却毫无相似点啊。
value: But aren't we looking for a dog? A bear looks a bit like a dog, but a dragon looks nothing like it.

name: 天狗也不一定是狗，说不定是一种指代呢？就像大和神族的天狗神。
value: Maybe the Heavenly Dog is not actually a dog. That could just be its name.

name: 唔，也有道理，那我们就去找龙吧！
value: Hmm. That is sound logic. Then let's go find ourselves a dragon!

name: 这里好像是风暴之龙的捕猎场，我们这样直接闯进来真的好吗？
value: We're now in the hunting grounds of Storm Dragon. Will we really be okay breaking in like this?

name: 别担心，就算被袭击了，祝融也会保护我们的，嘻嘻。
value: Don't worry. Zhu Rong will protect us. Hehe.

name: 可别总是指望我，要是场面太混乱了，我不一定能保证你们所有人的安全。
value: I will try, but I can't guarantee anything if it gets too dangerous.

name: 没关系啦，说不定风暴之龙在睡觉呢！
value: It's okay. Storm Dragon is probably sleeping.

name: 我怎么说来着？做好战斗准备吧，那家伙朝我们俯冲过来了！
value: I have a bad feeling about this... Watch out! Above us!

name: 你们不是我的猎物……为什么要跑进我的猎场？
value: You're not my usual prey... What are you doing in my hunting grounds?

name: 抱歉，风暴女士，我们是来找失踪的月亮的。
value: Sorry, Storm Dragon. We came here in search of the moon.

name: 没错，月亮被人偷走了，有个朋友说可能是龙族把它吃掉了。
value: Yes, the moon was swallowed. And we heard from a little bear that maybe a dragon ate it.

name: 龙？吃月亮？哈哈哈哈，我从来不知道谁的胃口有这么独特。
value: A dragon? Eating the moon? Haha even us dragons don't have such an appetite.

name: 显然月亮的消失和龙族没有任何关系，你不如去月夜见尊那里看看吧，说不定她知道什么。
value: We have nothing to do with that. Maybe the moon goddess Tsukuyomi knows something.

name: 这里的气氛很不对劲，我感受到一股寒冷的力量占据了这里……就像是雪夜的月光。
value: The atmosphere here is strange, it's very cold... Like moonlight on a snowy night.

name: 她好像……可能……看样子是不会想和我们好好讲话了。
value: I don't think she's here to have a nice chat with us.

name: 当心，她入魔了，准备战斗！
啊……感谢你们，让我重获清醒。
value: Thank you for bringing me back to my senses.

name: 月夜大人，你为什么会变成这样？
自从月亮消失后，我的内心就被一股黑暗占据。
value: Without the light of the moon, my heart was consumed by darkness.

name: 月夜见尊，你知道是谁偷走了月亮吗？真的是天狗作祟吗？
value: Do you know who stole the moon? Was it really the Heavenly Dog?

name: 抱歉，嫦娥仙子，我并不知道是谁偷走了月亮。
如果真的有天狗吞月的话， 恐怕只有埃及的阿努比斯神能做到这点了。
value: But if it's a dog that swallowed the moon... maybe... Anubis?

name: 可是她不是胡狼神吗？
value: The Egyptian Goddess of the Underworld? But isn't she the Jackal Goddess?

name: 嗅~嗅嗅~你们好像不是亡者。既然没死，来我这里干什么？
value: Sniff sniff~ You don't smell dead. Why have the living come to see me?

name: 嫦娥仙子，恕我直言，她长得和我占卜时看到的家伙也不太一样。
value: Chang'e, she doesn't look like the beast I saw.

name: 你们在那里嘀嘀咕咕什么呢？
value: What are you mumbling about over there?

name: 我们是来寻找月亮的，它被一条巨大的天狗给偷走了。
value: We're here to find the moon. It was swallowed by the Heavenly Dog.

name: 天狗？你看我长得像是会偷月亮的狗吗？
value: The Heavenly Dog? Are you saying I look like a dog? And swallowed the moon?

name: 看来你们还真是无礼呢，哼！
得给你们点小小得教训。
value: I will teach you some manners.

name: 好呀，既然要打架，那么即便你没有偷月亮，一会也要你吐一个出来！
value: I'm going to make you spit out the moon!

name: 怎么样，还要打吗？我可要放狗了！
value: Well? If you want to fight more, I will let the dogs out!

name: 好了好了，我相信你不是那个偷月亮的了——你身上确实没有月亮的气息。
value: Alright, alright. I believe you, you didn't swallow the moon.

name: 虽然都为犬类，但我可不爱乱吃东西。
value: Although I am also a canine, I don't eat strange things.

name: 说到偷走月亮，我确实知道一点点消息……
value: Well, if it's about swallowing the moon, I might know something..

name: 有个叫做阿佩普的家伙喜欢乱吃东西，连埃及的天空都被她吞过。
value: There is someone who likes to eat things. Apep the Devourer. She even swallowed the sky of Egypt once.

name: 最近她好像又从哪吞了一个发光的东西，我猜，大概就是月亮吧。
value: A little while ago, she swallowed something shiny. I guess it's probably the moon.

name: 我要在哪里能够找到她呢？
你确定真的要面对她吗？
value: Are you sure you want to face her?

name: 一路走来，你的力量已经有不少成长了，如果被她一口吞下，你的一切都将化为乌有。
value: You have gained much strength during your journey. If she swallows you, you will be reduced to nothing.

name: 那么如你所愿了，我将召唤阿佩普。
value: As you wish. I will summon Apep.

name: 吞噬一切的混沌啊，我以死者的庇护者之名召唤你，来到我的面前……
value: O all-consuming chaos. In the name of the Guardian of the Dead, I summon you...

name: 哎呀哎呀，原来是阿努比斯啊。
value: Well well, if it isn't Anubis.

name: 好久不见了呢，是又给我送祭品来了吗？这次是狗还是鳄鱼呢？
value: It's been a long time. Have you brought me another sacrifice?

name: 不好意思，我可没功夫打理你，是这几位，来找你讨要她们丢掉的东西了。
value: I don't have time for you. They are here to get back what you stole.

name: 没错，就是你这家伙！快把月亮还给我们！
value: You! Give us back the moon!

name: 哦？你说的就是那个发光的大白球吗？好啊？想要的话，就打败我吧。
value: Oh? Are you talking about that big shiny white ball? You'll have to beat me if you want it back.

name: 你比我想象中的更坚韧，小姑娘。这个大白球就还给你好了，反正也没那么好吃。
value: You're tougher than I thought, little girl. I'll return this ball to you. It wasn't that tasty anyway.

name: 太好了，这下子月亮就可以重回天际了。
value: Now the moon can return to the sky.

name: 到时候那些以为月亮的消失而迷失的大伙们，又可以过上正常的生活了。
value: Everyone's lives can return to normal.

name: 看起来你升华了，嫦娥——月亮的力量现在与你融为一体，你将晋升为新的月神。
value: Chang'e, the power of the moon is now within you. You've become the new moon goddess.

name: 真的吗？好像是哦……以后我将更加努力为了大家照亮黑暗中的天空！
value: Really? Oh I feel it. I will work hard to light up the night sky for everyone!

name: 很好，我已经为你打开了回去的路，跟着我的胡狼，你就不会迷失回去的路。
value: Very well, I have opened the way back for you. Follow my jackal.

name: 月亮是我们所有人的依靠，我必须要找回它，哪怕是付出我的一切！
value: So many depend on the moon. I have to get it back, even if it costs me everything!

name: 你说的对，那种能够吞下天空的家伙不是我能对付的，我应该回去禀报王母。
value: You are right. Someone who can swallow the sky is not something I can deal with. I should go back and report to Xiwangmu.

name: 用于神迹商店内商品的购买
value: Used to purchase items in the Miracle Shop

name: 用于提升嫦娥的梦境中记忆宝珠的等级
value: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Chang'e's Dreamland

name: 打开宝箱选择嫦娥任意品质的碎片
value: Open the box and choose Chang'e's Shards of any quality

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_92
value: Under the moonlight's glow, I have a rendezvous with you.

name: 嫦娥每次攻击时，额外附带敌人最大生命值2%的真实伤害（伤害值不超过嫦娥最大攻击力）和嫦娥攻击力3%的真实伤害。嫦娥击杀敌人时，会立即对敌方全体造成【月光激发】，【月光激发】为嫦娥3%攻击力*被击杀者【月光】层数的真实伤害（【月光激发】不会触发额外附带伤害，且当【月光激发】击杀敌人时不会再次造成【月光激发】）
value: When Chang’e attacks, deal extra True DMG equal to [2% of the target’s Max HP (the value cannot exceed Chang’e’s Max ATK) + 3% of Chang’e’s current ATK] ((The DMG [Moonlight Burst] dealt will not trigger this). When Chang’e defeats an enemy, inflicts [Moonlight Burst] on all enemies. (Enemies defeated by [Moonlight Burst] cannot trigger this effect again.)\n\n[Moonlight Burst]: Deals True DMG to all enemies equal to [the number of [Moonlight] marks * 3% of Chang’e’s current ATK].

name: 哇，没想到这里竟然出现了一个秘境，透过入口我感觉到有宝物在召唤我
value: What's this? A hidden tunnel? I sense lots of treasure. It calls to me from beyond the entrance.

name: 真是意外呢，看来这个秘境能通往众神的国度。
value: Amazing! This tunnel must connect to a secret realm, maybe a long lost kingdom of the gods.

name: 好激动好激动，我们赶紧去看看吧
value: I am so excited! Let's go and see what we can find there!

name: 呼呼，累死我了，没想到这秘境里面这么大。不过运气不错，快看看我找到了什么宝贝！
value: I'm exhausted. I didn't expect this place to be so big. But look, I found these!

name: 哇，这好像是记录众神过往的神迹卡，我们赶紧拿到神之遗迹修复一下吧。
value: Wow! These seem to be miracle cards once used by the gods to record the past. Let's take them to Gods' Relics and see if we can repair them.

name: 集齐碎片就可以修复解锁该神迹卡了啦
value: We need to collect more pieces to unleash the full power held within these miracle cards.

name: 太不可思议了，没想到修复后的神迹卡竟然能散发出这么巨大的神之力。我已经迫不及待去收集更多的神迹卡了。
value: Incredible! I wasn't expecting these miracle cards to emit so much power once repaired. I can't wait to collect more of them!

name: 幻兽寻宝完成领取奖励
以纯金打造的金字塔复制品，它们很小，小到只用一只手就能拿起。如此精巧的复制品，让人不禁产生怀疑，它的内部，是否也躺着一位法老王呢？
value: These pyramid replicas small enough to hold in one hand are made of pure gold. People often wonder if these delicate replicas were concealed inside the mummified remains of pharaohs.

name: 据说是使用女娲补填用的神石磨出来的石镜。石镜中精确的刻着日月星辰的方位，仿佛宇宙间的一切，都被收入其中。
value: It is said that this stone mirror is made of the sacred stone Nuwa used to mend heaven. The exact positions of the sun, moon, and stars are engraved upon it, indicating that the entire universe is contained within it.

name: 耀眼无比，华丽绝伦的项链。传说它可能是由珍珠制成的。可以使穿戴的女性更加美丽，使男人都无法抗拒。这个项链是女神弗蕾亚的宝物，平时绝不离身。
value: A dazzling, gorgeous necklace. It is said to be made of luxurious pearls, shimmering gems of the sea renowned for their beauty and rarity. Legend has it that wearing this enchanting talisman will imbue its bearer with an irresistible allure, a radiance so captivating that no man can resist her charms. The necklace was the treasure of Freyja, and she would never go anywhere without it.

name: 埃及金字塔守护者象征物所制的神圣收藏品，埃及王权的象征。通体为黄金和宝石打造，凝视它时，仿佛也感到了它的回视。
value: This elaborate artifact, made from gold and gemstones, is a symbol of protection and well-being. It once belonged to the Egyptian god of kingship. Staring at it may give one the eerie feeling that it is staring back at you.

name: 据说是基督受刑时，用来盛放他的血液的金杯。为了向世人证明基督非神，于是将他的血液盛起来，而神是不会流血的。
value: This elusive gold cup purportedly has miraculous healing powers and the ability to grant immortality.

name: 希伯来神话中存放摩西十诫的、最为神圣的宝物。如此精巧的工艺，到底出自和人之手，无从得知。
value: This blessed treasure made of wood and covered in gold is said to contain sacred stone tablets. Its craftsmanship is exquisite.

name: 它是由火山之心的熔岩打造出来的宝剑，火焰巨人苏特尔曾挥舞此剑，在彩虹桥上大杀四方，据说他挥出的每一剑，都能点燃一方的天空。
value: The sword, crafted from the molten lava at the heart of a volcano, was once wielded by the fire giant Surtr, who ravaged his enemies in battle on the Rainbow Bridge. Legend has it that each swing of the sword could ignite parts of the sky, leaving a trail of flames in its wake.

name: 又名“斯基德普拉特尼”，是北欧神工匠侏儒所制，送给弗雷的一艘飞船，大可装下所有北欧众神，小可放至口袋中，诸神黄昏发生时搭载众神至战场的宝物。
value: Skidbladnir is a magnificent ship crafted by a skilled Nordic dwarf for Freyr, the god of fertility and sunlight. It is capable of carrying all the Nordic gods at once, yet it can also be folded and stored in a pocket. This divine vessel is a treasured means of transportation for the gods, carrying them into battle during the fateful Twilight of the Gods.

name: 由昊天大帝所铸，赠予禹王用来支撑东海的基柱，名为定海神针，巨大，且奇重无比。昊天上帝为了使禹王等凡夫俗子能够移动，故施加”如意“咒法，念此咒，可将其自由放大缩小。
value: Forged by Emperor Haotian, it was given to King Yu to support the pillar of the East Sea. It was huge and incredibly heavy, called the Divine Needle of the Settled Sea. In order to enable King Yu and other mortals to move it, the Emperor of the Skies applied a wish-fulfilling spell, which, when recited, could freely enlarge or shrink it.

value: For every {0} cleared chapters of the Main Story, {1}{2}

name: TREASURE_CONDITION_3
value: For every {0} cleared level of Fear Abyss ({3}/{4}), {1}{2}
