name: 蝼蚁，臣服于你们的沙漠皇帝吧！
value: Bow down to me, you ants! I am the ruler of this desert!

name: 你问什么盯着人家，是我脸上有什么吗？
value: Why are you gawking at me like that? Is there something on my face?

name: 英勇无畏的战斗天使加百利神圣庇佑着世间，以强大的战斗力守护正义，无恶不击。
value: The world is under the protection of the valiant and holy battle angel Gabriel, who fights against evil with his mighty strength and divine blessing.

name: 如梦如幻，亦真亦假，让人恍若隔世。
value: It feels like a dream, like an illusion, both real and unreal, it transports people to another world.

name: 喂，想吃我的苹果吗？
value: Hey, do you want a bite of my apple?

name: 敢不敢和我来一场沙滩排球对决！
value: Are you brave enough to face me in a beach volleyball match!

name: 这么美好的夜晚，有没有兴趣与我共舞一曲呢？
value: What a lovely night, would you like to dance with me?

name: 咦，你也是来这里照顾这些小生命的吗？
value: Oh, are you here to look after these little ones too?

name: 熊女在温泉边轻松地泡着，水汽弥漫，绿叶掩映，她的脸上洋溢着满足的微笑，尽享这宁静舒适的时光。
value: Bear girl relaxed in the hot spring, surrounded by steam and green leaves, her face showed happiness, enjoying this calm and cozy time.

name: 书中自有黄金屋，书中自有颜如玉，你说对吗？
value: In books there are houses of gold, in books there are beauties of jade. Do you agree?

name: 一起去钓鱼吗？以为的能力，你想钓多大的都可以哦
value: How about we go fishing together? You can catch as big as you wish with your skill.

name: 这么好的天气，一起去冲浪吧，今天就不打铁了。
value: What a nice weather, let’s go surfing together, I don’t need to work on iron today.

name: 这世上敢如此直视我的眼睛的人可不多见呢！我承认，我开始对你有点兴趣了。
value: You are one of the few people in this world who can meet my gaze without flinching! I confess, you have piqued my curiosity.

name: 主人，要吃些我做的甜品吗？
value: Master, would you like to try some desserts I made?

name: 这种樱花盛开的季节最适合去狩猎了，你说呢？
value: This is the best time to hunt when the cherry blossoms are in full bloom, don’t you think?

name: 欢迎光临，想喝点什..什么吗...嗯？你是来找我的？
value: Welcome, what can I get you…hmm? Are you looking for me?

name: 许个愿吧！兴许我能帮你实现呢。
value: Make a wish! Maybe I can make it come true.

name: 今晚的烟花真绚丽呐，就和那一年一样。
value: The fireworks tonight are so splendid, just like that year.

name: 我相信，只要努力，所以人都能鲤跃龙门的
value: I believe that as long as you work hard, everyone can achieve their dreams.

name: 很高兴为您服务！我是猫...猫又，请多指教。
value: Nice to meet you! I am a cat…cat again, nice to know you.

name: 如此的大丰收，就不会有人遭受饥苦了吧
value: With such a bountiful harvest, no one will go hungry anymore.

name: 来和我决斗吧，招式会说明一切！
value: Come and fight me, the moves will speak for themselves!

value: Excess Pieces can be decomposed to shop currency

value: Pieces of a full-star Epic Miracle Card can be used as materials

name: 每次寻宝有概率获得以上奖励
value: Every treasure hunt gives you an opportunity to win the above rewards.

name: 神王奥丁的至宝之一，刻于石板上的符文。这是一种蕴含着魔力的文字，传说每个字节都代表着一种自然能量，当它们组成词语或者短句时，就能形成一个魔法。
value: Runestones were one of the supreme treasures of the god Odin. Runes written on stone slab harbored great magic and represented natural energy. Spells were created when these runes formed words or short sentences.

name: 由黄金和宝石打造，象征生命和轮回的十字型法器。它是法老王发号施令的工具，也是祭司们与亡灵沟通的圣物。
value: This symbol of life is a cross-shaped magical object made of gold and precious stones. The gods once gifted the pharaohs with this powerful symbol.

name: 这不是双子星吗？怎么想起来找我了？
请你帮帮我们，帮帮我的妹妹。
value: Please help us. Help my sister.

name: 在我沉睡时，她引发了一场星座间的巨大混乱……
value: While I was sleeping, she created chaos among the the Zodiac Signs.

name: 接着就变成这样了——一言不发，好像整个灵魂都被抽走了一样。
value: And then suddenly, her soul vanished from her body! She hasn't spoken a word since!

name: 让我看看……嗯，她的意识好像陷入了沉睡之中。
value: From the looks of her, she seems to be in a very deep state of sleep.

name: 没问题，不过找我帮忙可以要付出代价的……
value: Yes, but only at a price.

name: 我愿意付出任何代价来救我的妹妹，秘密与求知的女神！
value: To save my sister, I will pay any price you ask, Goddess of Secrets and Knowledge!

name: 秘密与求知的女神……呵呵，这美妙的称呼我可几百年没听到了，心情不错，就帮帮你好了！
value: Hehe, I haven't heard that title in centuries. I'm in a good mood, so I'll help you.

name: 不过按照规则，我需要先测试你的力量是否强大到能抵御梦境中的危险。
value: However, I must first test your strength to see if you're strong enough to survive the Dreamland. It's one of my rules.

name: 单从战斗力来看，你能做到一个灵魂操纵两个肉体，也还不赖嘛。
value: You handle yourself well in combat, especially for someone controlling two bodies with one soul.

name: 呼……这其实很勉强，已经是我的全部力量了……
value: That actually pushed me to my limits.

name: 我知道了，同为双生星座，我想双鱼座应该会对你的情况有所了解。
value: I see. Maybe Pisces will have some insight. After all, her zodiac sign is also a twin.

name: 潘多拉……？你今天看来挺闲的，平时可没见你有兴趣到其他人的梦境里转悠。
value: Pandora...? You must have a lot of free time to be wandering around in other people's dreams.

name: 别开玩笑了，我时间紧得很，有个熟人来找你帮忙。
value: Don't joke around. I'm actually pressed for time. My acquaintance needs your help.

name: 双子座？！对不起，我这里不欢迎你！
value: Gemini?! You're not welcome here after the havoc you've sown.

name: 不，不是这样的，你误会了……
value: Please, it's not what you think. There's been a misunderstanding.

name: 如果你再不离开，我可就不客气了！
value: Either leave now, or I'll kick you out by force.

name: 潘多拉……你为什么也帮助她？她可是差一点毁掉整个黄道的家伙！
value: Pandora... why are you helping her? She almost destroyed the entire Zodiac!

name: 抱歉了，她这次是我的委托人，能让她把话说完吗？
value: I promised to help her. We made a deal. Now, will you let her finish what she was saying?

name: 好吧，看在你的份上，我就听听她的解释吧。
双鱼座，之前星座间的骚乱并非我们的本意，黑暗之子好像失控了，才做了过分的事情。
value: Pisces, what happened wasn't our intention. My sister lost control and things got out of hand.

name: 而且她在离开黄道后，就变成了这样，好像丢失了灵魂一样。
value: And afterwards, her body became like this. As if she'd lost her soul.

name: 我怀疑有人在背后操控她，同为双生星座，你对她的情况有所了解吗？
value: My suspicion is that someone is manipulating her. Pisces, you are both twin signs. Do you have any idea what may have happened to her?

name: ……不太清楚，我们的两个灵魂共用一个身体，从来没有遇到失控的情况。
value: ...I am not sure. Unlike Gemini, our two souls share one body, and neither one of us has ever lost control.

name: 不过我知道一个人可能对此有研究——摩羯座，她以前是名为“潘”的大神。
value: But I do know someone who might have an idea. Capricorn was once the goddess Pan. She once tried to change into a fish, but got stuck as both a goat and a fish.

name: 是她？如果她还拥有曾经作为潘神时候的记忆和神力的话，或许可以帮助我们。
value: Capricorn? If she still has Pan's memories and powers, then she might be able to help.

name: 姐妹，别来无恙。
value: Sister, it is good to see you.

name: 这位是潘多拉女神，而这两位……你应该见过。
value: This is the goddess Pandora, and these two... Well, you know them.

name: 双子？她身上有股不好的气息……
value: Gemini? Why do I sense a horrible aura around her?

name: 不愧是所有星座中最敏锐的一个……你看出什么问题了吗？
value: You really are the most perceptive of all the Zodiac Signs. Can you see what's wrong with her?

name: 她的的灵魂似乎沾染上了别的东西，但很朦胧，我看不清楚。
value: Her soul is stained by something, but it's too hazy to see what is causing this influence.

name: 如果我激发自己的力量，是否能放大影响力，让你看得更清楚些？
value: If I draw on my power, would that amplify the influence and allow you to see the cause more clearly?

name: 这是个不错的方法，一场战斗会是个好选择。
value: That would work. And the best way to do that would be through battle.

name: 她身上好像有股冥界的能量。
value: The evil energy seems to be coming from the underworld.

name: 冥界？是哈迪斯那家伙吗？但她已经很久很久都没插手过众神之间的事了。
value: The underworld? Is it Hades then? But she hasn't meddled in the affairs of the gods for a long, long time.

name: 先不管那么多了，去问问她就知道了。
value: She doesn't care about that stuff. Regardless, it seems we'll need to pay her a visit.

name: 各位准备去哪？这样不经同意闯入别人的梦境，可不是什么礼貌的事情。
value: Where are you going? It's not polite to break into other people's dreams without consent.

name: 抱歉，天后大人，我们现在还有正事要做。
value: Sorry, but we have business we need to attend to.

name: 正事？帮我修剪玫瑰园这种吗？
别开玩笑了，那是您佣人该做的。
value: Hmph. That's something your servant should do.

name: 都过去那么久了，没想到你对我还有成见呀。
value: Even after all this time, you still think so little of me?

name: 对您这样喜怒无常的女神，我可喜欢不起来。
value: I don't like moody goddesses like you.

name: 既然这样的话，不如我们来打个赌吧。
value: In that case, why don't we make a bet?

name: 你们要是能在战斗中胜过我，就饶恕你们的无礼，而且我承诺帮你们完成“正事”。
value: If you defeat me in battle, I will forgive your rudeness and I will even help you attend to your business.

name: 但如果你们输了，那今天就拜托你们好好照顾照顾我的玫瑰园吧。
value: But if you lose, then please take good care of my roses.

name: 这可是你说的哦，来吧！
value: You'll regret those words! You're on!

name: 看来今天我的玫瑰园是修不成了。
value: It seems that my rose pruning will have to have to wait for another day.

name: 不过，我一向信守承诺……你们所谓的“正事”是什么？
value: However, I always keep my word. So what is this business of yours?

name: 天后大人，我的妹妹似乎被冥界的力量操控了，我们想去找哈迪斯问问。
value: My lady, my sister seems to be under the control of a power from the underworld. We want to ask Hades.

name: 冥王可不欢迎任何我们这样的人闯入，如果要和她较量，必须找个能打的。
value: Hades does not like intrusions from the likes of us. If you want to see her, you will need to find someone who can fight.

name: 雅典娜应该是个不错的人选，我们去找她吧。
value: Might I suggest Athena? She is a good candidate.

name: 雅典娜，找到你的梦境还真花了我们不少时间。
value: Athena. Finally. It took us quite a while to find your dream.

name: 潘多拉？还有天后？你们两个人凑在一起可真让我意外……
value: Pandora? And Queen Hera? I am surprised the two of you are together...

name: 以及……双子座？她怎么了？看起来黑暗之子像是丢失了神格。
value: And... Gemini? What's this? It looks like the Dark Twin has lost her divinity.

name: 战争女神，你能看出我妹妹身上发生了什么吗？
value: Goddess of War, can you see what's wrong with my sister?

name: 你想唤醒她吗？我建议你不要这么做，她身上似乎封印着不寻常的能量。
value: Do you wish to wake her up? I don't advise it. There seems to be an unsual energy sealed within her.

name: 可是，这样下去的话，我担心她会再次做出伤害其他人的举动。
value: But if it continues like this, I am worried that she will hurt others again.

name: 如果你只是担心她会伤害到其他人的话……我倒是有个办法。
value: If you're just worried about her hurting other people... I have a solution for that.

name: 如我所想，通过刚才的战斗，我更确定她是个巨大的威胁……
value: That battle confirmed my suspicions. She is a huge threat...

name: 雅典娜，你的不近人情的性子该变变了，有趣的事情可不只有战争。
value: Athena, this unkind temperament of yours needs to change.

name: 非常遗憾，在我看来只有绝对的理智，才能维护这个世界的秩序。
value: I'm being honest and rational. Understand that I believe only logic and reason can maintain the order of this world.

name: 这样会嫁不出去的哦。
value: Oh no-one is going to want to marry you at this rate.

name: 好吧，这次算你们赢了。
value: Anyway, you guys won this time.

name: 你不是一直想去和哈迪斯谈谈生意？要不要跟着我们一起去？
value: Don't you have some business to settle with Hades? Would you like to come with us?

name: ……她上次把雅典的灵魂都划到了斯巴达名下，这笔账是该和她算算了。
value: ...She mistakenly registered a soul from Athens under the name of Sparta, our enemies!

name: 另外，我知道有个家伙能帮我们打开通往冥界的路——美杜莎。
value: Hmm... Well, I know someone who can open the way to the underworld for us. Her name is Medusa.

name: 但是我听说她是个不太好说话的人……
value: But I heard she doesn't like to talk to others.

name: 没关系，作为她的“老朋友”，我会有办法让她开口的。
value: It doesn't matter. As her old friend, I will make her talk.

name: 美杜莎，赶紧出来见我，否则我就把你的神庙里摆满镜子！
value: Medusa, come out! Or I will fill your temple with mirrors!

name: 雅典娜……怎么又是你，真是做梦都不让人自在。
value: Athena... It's you again. Your presence always ruins my dreams.

name: 帮我做件事，我保证你就能继续安心做你的美梦。
value: If you do something for me, I promise you can continue your sweet dreams undisturbed.

name: ……她俩有仇吗？为什么一见面就要打架？
value: ...Are these two enemies? Are we about to fight?

name: 那可就说来话长了。
value: It's a long story. Get ready.

name: 算我倒霉了，说吧，你要我帮你干嘛？
value: Guess it's not my lucky day. So, what do you want from me?

name: 替我打开通往哈迪斯梦境的大门，我找那家伙……有点账要算。
value: Open the door to Hades' dream for me. I have a score to settle.

name: 呵……我猜来猜去也就是这事，真是麻烦。
value: Heh... I thought so. What a bothersome request.

name: 好了，冥界的大门打开了，你们快走吧，别再打搅我了。
value: Alright, the gate to the underworld is open. Stop bothering me now.

name: 快走吧，趁我没改变主意之前，唉……
value: Go, before I change my mind.

name: 方塔苏斯，冥王之手，恶梦的使徒，我可真不想见到你……
value: Ugh. Phantasos, Hand of Hades, Apostle of Nightmares. The last person I wanted to see.

name: 作为厄运的象征，我也对你没什么好感。
value: Well I don't like you much either, Miss Bad Luck.

name: 不过相对于哈迪斯，你这家伙的糟糕性格我倒还能忍受。
value: But unlike Hades, I can bear with your bad temper.

name: 这么在背后议论她可不好，毕竟，整个冥界都是她的耳目。
value: It's not good to talk about her behind her back. After all, the entire underworld is her eyes and ears.

name: 另外……光明之子，你妹妹的身上似乎散发着冥界的味道呢。
value: By the way... Light Twin, your sister seems to exude underworld energy.

name: 看来事情变得糟糕了，不是吗？
value: Does it look like she's getting worse?

name: 难说，虽然她身上确实有冥界的能量，但源头却不一定来自哈迪斯大人。
value: It's hard to say. Although she has the underworld energy, the source isn't necessarily Lord Hades.

name: 我确实对她身上的能量感兴趣……不如把她留在这里，让我好好研究研究如何？
value: I'm really interested in the energy in her... How about leaving her here and letting me study it?

name: 如果我能研究出超越哈迪斯大人力量的方式，也是个不错的交易呢。
value: I'm dying to find a way to surpasss Lady Hades in power.

name: 时间都过去这么久了，你的野心还是那么大。来吧，有本事就来抢！
value: Hah! Even after so much time, your ambitions are still as big as ever. Come and take her, if you can!

name: 把眼睛睁大点，见识见识我的恶梦吧！
value: Open your eyes wide - see my nightmare!

name: 非常遗憾，你的恶梦影响不到我们。
value: Such a pity... Your nightmares don't affect us.

name: 亲爱的，这可是在我的梦境中，你的力量再强也不过如此。
value: Darling, this is my Dreamland. Your powers are limited here.

name: ……这次就先放过你们，下次再见面的时候，我可不会留手了！
value: ...I'll let you go this time. But I won't hold back when we meet next time!

name: 总算送走了个危险的家伙，前方还不知道会有什么样的麻烦在等着我们。
value: Phew! We made it out of there safely. She's a dangerous foe. And who knows what other dangers lie ahead.

name: 希望我妹妹能平安度过这次危机。
value: I hope my sister can pull through this safely.

name: 梦境越来越模糊了，潘多拉，你确定一切还在你的掌控之中？
value: The dream is getting more and more blurry. Pandora, are you sure everything is still under your control?

name: 这有些奇怪……我没有感觉到哈迪斯的力量。
value: This is a bit strange... And I don't sense Hades' power.

name: 真是稀客，不过我的结界可不是想来就来，想走就走的呢。
伊邪那美？大和神明在希腊冥王的梦境里干什么？
value: Izanami? What is a Yamato goddess doing in the dream of the Greek goddess Hades?

name: 作为黄泉的掌控者，只要有死亡的地方，我便无处不在。
value: As master of the underworld, wherever death is, I am too.

name: 既然有幸光临我的梦境，不如留下来陪我聊聊天如何……
value: Since you are lucky enough to visit my Dreamland, how about staying for a chat...

name: 抱歉，我们赶时间。
value: Sorry, we are in a rush.

name: 哎呀，真是一群不解风情的家伙呢。
value: So rude... Next time, politely accept my invitation to chat and we won't have to fight.

name: 容我先告辞了，一会还有更重要的客人要见呐……呵呵。
value: Let's take our leave first. We have someone more important to meet.

name: 继续前进吧，前面好像就是哈迪斯的神殿了。
value: Yes, let's keep going. It seems that the temple of Hades is up ahead.

name: 潘多拉？你终于肯回来见我了。
value: Pandora? You finally came back to see me.

name: 别误会，我可不是来见你的，我是来帮我的委托人找你问话的。
value: No, this isn't about coming to see you. I'm here to help Gemini as part of an agreement.

name: 有什么不一样吗？不管如何，你终究还是得求我帮忙。
value: Either way, you'll still have to ask me for help.

name: 闲话少说，双子座身上的冥界能量是怎么回事？我打赌这事情又是你搞的鬼。
value: Enough chitchat. What is with the underworld energy radiating from Gemini? I bet that you're behind it... again.

name: 什么叫又？我难道干过那么多坏事吗？
value: What do you mean again? What have I ever done to you? ... I've never... Wait... What is...?

name: 不过挺有趣的，这个小家伙的身体里正在孕育新的力量。
value: ... How interesting. There is a new power growing inside this little one's body.

name: 而当她苏醒时，将会变成除了我，海拉，伊邪那美，阿努比斯之外的一位新冥界管理者。
value: And once her metamorphosis is complete, she will become a new ruler of the underworld alongside me, Izanami and Anubis.

name: 你……你在说什么？这不可能……
value: What are you talking about? She'll never...

name: 不相信吗？我来引导黑暗之子身体里真正的潜能，让你开开眼界吧！
value: You don't believe me? Let me use the true potential of the power within the body of the Dark Twin and show you.

name: 这力量……无比强大，但也让人畏惧，我还是头一次有这种感觉……
value: This power... it's amazing, but it's also terrifying. ... This is the first time I have felt like this...

name: 当黑暗之子体内的新力量苏醒后，你你将获得无穷的力量。
value: When this new power in the Dark Twinness awakens, you will gain infinite power.

name: 拥有强大的力量，保护另一个自己不是你追求的吗？ 现在做出选择吧。
value: Do you not wish to have great power to protect each other?

name: 我……只想回到原本的生活，和妹妹一起的平静生活！
value: I... just want things to go back to the way they were. I want a peaceful life with my sister!

name: 呵呵，我尊重你的选择，但在我唤醒黑暗之子后，你是不是会后悔，就是另一回事了。
value: I respect your choice, but you'll regret it once I interrupt this process to wake her up...

name: 黑暗之子，黄道之上的双子之星，听从我的呼唤，醒来吧……
value: Dark Twin, Twin Stars of the Zodiac. Heed my call, awaken from your slumber...

name: 姐姐，你为什么要打乱我的计划？我所做的一切，都是为了创造一个让你获得幸福的世界。
value: Sister! Why are you messing with my plans?! Everything I'm doing is to create a world where you can be happy!

name: 你难道忘了我们曾经的弱小？忘了那些利用我们的所谓的“女神”？
value: Have you forgotten how weak you are? Unlike me, you were born a mortal. I can change all of that!

name: 你错了，我已经很幸福了，因为你在我身边。
value: None of that matters! I'm happy as long as you are by my side.

name: 如果有一天你的灵魂消失了，那么即便是让我拥有整个世界，又有什么用呢？
value: If you destroy your soul... then what's the point?? Even if I had the whole world, I'd have nothing without you!

name: 你总是这么软弱……好吧，那就让我在战斗中让你明白力量的意义！
value: You have always been so weak. I will have to show you the meaning of power!

name: 为什么你不能接受我的做法？
value: Why can you just accept my plans?

name: 假如我的强大，要用我妹妹的生命来交换，那我宁愿不要！
value: If I have to trade my sister's life for that, then I don't want it at all!

name: 我明白了……即时拥有哈迪斯的力量，还是无法战胜你，真正强大的还是你的信念……
value: I... understand. It seems that even if I have the power of Hades, I still cannot defeat you. What is truly powerful is your love for me.

name: 哎呀呀……真是令人感动的场景，然而我们没时间继续欣赏了。
value: Oops I hate to interrupt such a touching scene, but...

name: 既然你不愿意牺牲妹妹，那么我只好收回黑暗之子身体里的能量了。
value: Since you are unwilling to sacrifice your sister, I have no choice but to take back the energy in her body.

name: 经过梦境试炼后，你们的默契大概也能赋予彼此强大的战斗力吧，呵呵……
value: However... After the trials you've faced in the Dreamland, perhaps this newfound understanding can make you both much stronger.

name: 虽然我很不想这么说，但我依旧需要谢谢你，哈迪斯。
value: As much as I hate to say it, I owe you my thanks, Hades.

name: 好了亲爱的，你想要的都得到了，是时候谈谈我的报酬了，哼哼……
value: Alright darling, you got what you wanted. It's time to talk about what you owe me.

name: 你说得对，力量是保护她的唯一方式……
value: You're right. Power is the only way to protect her...

name: 明智的选择，冥界期待着新的管理者，新世界的降临指日可待……
value: A wise choice. The underworld is looking forward to a new ruler. The advent of a new world is just around the corner...

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_93
value: I will always be by your side, in the starry sky or the deep sea tide.

name: 用于提升双子座的梦境中记忆宝珠的等级
value: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Gemini's Dreamland

name: 双子座女神碎片自选箱
打开宝箱选择双子座任意品质的碎片
value: Open the box and choose Gemini's Shards of any quality

name: 双子座攻击时如果敌人拥有护盾，则额外附带双子座10%攻击力的无视护盾的真实伤害，双子座造成伤害的50%转化为自身护盾，护盾持续1回合。如果双子座位于主阵容，进入战斗时获得【耀光】状态（无法驱散），暴击值、暴击伤害增加30%，持续2回合。如果双子座位于替补，进入战斗时获得【暗影】状态（无法驱散），提升50%异常抵抗，30%伤害减免，持续2回合。（没有替补的战斗中，双子座只能获得【耀光】状态）
value:
When Gemini attacks a shielded target, additionally deals True DMG equal to 25% of her ATK that ignores shields. 50% of the DMG dealt will be converted to a shield for her, lasting for 2 rounds.
If Gemini is in the main lineup when the battle begins, gains [Bright Light] for 2 rounds. Otherwise when Gemini enters combat, she gains [Dark Shadow] for 2 rounds. (Both effects cannot be dispelled) 

[Bright Light]: Increases Gemini's DMG Increase by 40% and CRIT by 30%.
[Dark Shadow]: IncreasesGemini's Debuff RES by 50% and Damage Reduction by 20%.

name: 提升50%异常抵抗，30%伤害减免
value: Increases Gemini’s Debuff RES by 50% and Damage Reduction by 30%

name: 对拥有护盾的敌人额外进行一次相同的攻击，但本次攻击不会无视护盾和法术抗性
value: Attacks the shielded enemy again, but the DMG dealt will not ignore the target’s shield and M.RES.

name: 集齐10个卢恩符石碎片可以合成卢恩符石
value: Collect 10 Runestone pieces to synthesize the Runestone Miracle Card

name: 集齐10个生命钥匙碎片可以合成生命钥匙
value: Collect 10 Key of Life pieces to synthesize the Key of Life

name: 集齐30个原初之火碎片可以合成原初之火
value: Collect 30 Original Fire pieces to synthesize the Original Fire Miracle Card

name: 集齐30个时间沙漏碎片可以合成时间沙漏
value: Collect 30 Time Hourglass pieces to synthesize the Time Hourglass Miracle Card

name: 集齐10个失落古卷碎片可以合成失落古卷
value: Collect 10 The Lost Scrolls pieces to synthesize the Lost Scrolls Miracle Card

name: 集齐10个稻荷面具碎片可以合成稻荷面具
value: Collect 10 Inari Mask pieces to synthesize the Inari Mask Miracle Card

name: 又称“死海文书”，是记载圣经中失落传说的神话古卷。在发明纸张之前，人们喜欢在鞣制后的羊皮上书写文字，那些上古的寓言，禁忌的咒语，统统以这种方式保存了下来。
value: Also known as the Dead Sea Scrolls, these are long-lost copies of mostly Hebrew text. They were preserved on parchment made from sheepskin since the people in that region had not yet discovered paper.

name: 供奉于大多数日本稻荷神社中的面具，一般是通灵仪式上的宝物，神主们戴上它，与鬼神进行沟通。
value: These masks are enshrined in most Inari shrines in Japan. They are typically considered ritual treasures worn by gods for communication with ghosts and other deities.

name: 普罗米修斯带给人类的最早的火种，智慧与文明的象征。即使没有任何燃料，它也永恒不灭。
value: Prometheus gifted humanity with the earliest kindling, and the resulting fire symbolized civilization and wisdom. The flame burns eternally, even without fuel.

name: 供奉于埃及神庙的贡品，是古代埃及众神少有的能够精准计时的工具，当一测被沙子填满，而另一侧空空如也时，则意味着需要进行昼夜更替了。
value: In ancient Egypt, this object was prized for their ability to accurately measure time. During temple worship, they helped priests mark the day's passing.

name: 暴击值、暴击伤害增加30%
value: Increases CRIT and CRIT DMG by 30%

name: 今日派遣次数达到上限
活动结束后积分保留
value: Points will be saved after the event ends

name: 用于提升芙蕾雅的梦境中记忆宝珠的等级
value: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Freyja's Dreamland

name: 芙蕾雅女神碎片自选箱
打开宝箱选择芙蕾雅任意品质的碎片
value: Open the box and choose Freyja's Shards of any quality

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_94
value: As I gaze at the stars, I wonder how our paths will cross and shape our fates.

name: 潘多拉，你在哪？我知道这梦境是你造出来的，别躲了！
value: Pandora,stop hiding! I know this is your Dreamland.

name: 这不是阿斯加德的芙蕾雅女神嘛，您大驾光临还真让我意外……
value: My, my, Freyja of Asgard? What a surprise.

name: 别贫嘴了，我需要你帮我个忙。
开门见山？我喜欢。说说看吧，你遇到什么麻烦了？
value: Straight to business? I like that. So, what do you need?

name: 奥丁失踪了，至今下落不明，我敢打赌她一定是又溜到某个角落逍遥快活去了。
value: Odin is missing again. I'm sure she's off somewhere having a good time again...

name: 阿斯加德不能一直处在没有统治者的境况下，我希望你帮我把她找出来。
value: But Asgard cannot remain without a ruler for long. So I need you to help me find her.

name: 明白，但按照梦境的规矩，为了不让你迷失在此，必须要测试测试你的实力。
value: Sure. But, as per my rules, you must first pass my test of strength.

name: 你的规矩可真多……我准备好了，来吧。
value: So many rules... Fine, let's do it.

name: 你的实力毋庸置疑。
value: There is no doubt about your strength.

name: 好了，咱们来商量商量对策吧。
value: Good. Then let's come up with a plan for retrieving Odin.

name: 据我所知，奥丁是北欧众神中最强大的吧？想把她弄回来，光我们两个的力量恐怕不行。
value: Odin is the most powerful of the Norse Gods, right? If we want to make her return, we will need more than just the two of us.

name: 没错，但你不用担心，只管告诉我奥丁的去向吧，帮手的事我来搞定。
value: You just worry about finding Odin for me. I will take care of finding strong allies.

name: 海姆达尔，阿斯加德的守护者，我有要事找你。
value: Heimdall, Guardian of Asgard and the Bifrost, I have business with you.

name: 芙蕾雅，什么风把你给吹来了。
value: Freyja, what brings you to me?

name: 奥丁去什么地方了，你号称无所不晓，应该不会不知道她的去向吧？
value: Where did Odin go? You know all who pass through the Bifrost, so you surely know her whereabouts, right?

name: 抱歉，这件事我曾向奥丁保证，绝不泄露她的去向。
value: I'm sorry, I promised Odin that I would not reveal her whereabouts.

name: 我要怎么样才能让你明白，奥丁的离开，让阿斯加德现在处于极大的危险之中。
value: You must understand that Odin's absence puts Asgard in great danger.

name: 我明白您的意思，但这关乎我的誓言。
誓言比阿斯加德的安危还重要吗？
value: Is your honor more important than the safety of Asgard?

name: 或许我有个办法可以帮助你，不过你得先和我打一架。
value: ...Perhaps there is a way I can help. But you will need to defeat me in battle.

name: 好，只要能把奥丁找回来，我无所谓用什么方法。
value: I will use any method necessary to ensure Odin's return to Asgard.

name: 打得不错，看来在梦境中，你的力量更强。
value: You fought well. It seems your strength is greater in the Dreamland.

name: 就……这么简单？你你并没有全力应战吧？
value: That was too easy. You didn't fight with your full strength, did you?

name: 我确实不能违背誓言告诉你奥丁的行踪，但作为你的俘虏，你有权要求我避开错误的路线。
value: ...I am now your prisoner, and as such, you can order me to advise you when you are going in the wrong direction.

name: 你是说，只要不直接指出具体的路就行了？我就知道靠得住你，我们走吧。
value: I see. So as long as you don't directly lead me to the correct path, you will not be breaking your oath? Let's go!

name: 索尔？你该不会也是奥丁派来拦路的吧？
value: Thor? Did Odin send you to block my way as well?

name: 奥丁？我也在找她，她同意了我和女武神们的决斗赛，可我等了半天都没见着她人。
value: Odin? I am also looking for her. She agreed to a duel with me and Valkyrie, but she never showed up.

name: 呵……她一向如此，我们去找她回来吧。
value: That is so like her. Join me - I will find her and make her return to Asgard.

name: 我是没问题，不过……在此之前，我想好好热个身——毕竟我可不希望在决斗赛上输掉！
value: I will join you, but... First, I want a warm up battle. After all, I don't want to lose my duel later.

name: 我就说你怎么会这么好说话，到头来还是要动手打架……行吧，我接受。
value: I was just thinking it's easy to talk to you, but I guess we still have to fight. Alright, I accept your challenge.

name: 那是我的荣幸，芙蕾雅女神。
value: It is an honor, Lady Freyja.

name: 还打吗，索尔？你已经输了。
value: Do you still want to continue, Thor? You have already lost.

name: 哼……这次算你赢了，不过热身准备也结束了，我们去找奥丁吧！
value: Hmph! I concede... this time. I've warmed up now, so let's go find Odin!

name: 前面就是女武神的梦境了，寻找奥丁的事情，我们可以让她一起来帮忙。
value: This is Valkryie's dream. We can ask her to help search for Odin.

name: 你最好小心些，我听说她最近在和其他人的比试中输了，现在正在气头上呢。
value: Be careful. I heard she recently lost a duel, so she's in a bad mood.

name: 天哪……你是幽灵吗？走路一点声音都没有……
value: Gods! Are you a ghost? Make some sound when you walk!

name: 你觉得我输了对吗？那就和我较量较量如何！
value: You think I'd lose? Fight me and see.

name: 你们北欧众神都是这么……随性的吗？
value: Are all Norse gods so... reckless and carefree?

name: ……别误会，只有她们这群拳头说话的家伙才这样。
value: ...Don't get the wrong idea about us. It's just hotheads like them that like to talk with their fists.

name: 平手而已，你怎么好意思觉得是你赢了？
value: It was a tie! Don't you dare think you won.

name: 行了，你们想再较量的话，不如尽快把奥丁找回来，让决斗大赛尽快开始。
value: Alright, alright. If you two want to fight again, let's get Odin back quickly so you can have your duel.

name: 不然你觉得为什么我们会在这儿？
value: Why would we be here otherwise?

name: 前面的好像是希芙，她在这儿干嘛？
value: That looks like Sif up ahead. What is she doing here?

name: 看样子她是在找什么东西。
value: She seems to be searching for something.

name: 我的头发……我的黄金头发，不见了？
value: My hair... my golden hair. It's gone!

name: 是你偷走了我的金发吗？
value: Did you steal my golden hair?

name: 你在瞎说什么？你的头发不是在脑袋上吗？
value: Isn't your hair on your head?

name: ……你这家伙，脑袋还挺硬，把你打趴下还真耗了我不少力气！
value: You're as tough as ever. That was a difficut fight.

name: 好痛，发生了什么事？
value: Ow... Why does my body hurt?

name: 啊？不是你怒气冲冲地朝我们冲过来了吗？
value: Huh? Did you forget you just attacked us?

name: 我刚才还在梦境里遇到洛基，几秒后我就失去意识了，一定是她捣的鬼……
value: ...A few moments ago I met Loki, but I can't remember what happened next. She must have done something to me.

name: 又是这家伙！如果让我抓到她，一定要把她头上那对角锯下来！
value: Her again! Next time I see her, I'm going to grab her by the horns and saw them off!

name: 不用下次了，很快她就会主动现身了，这次奥丁出走，肯定少不了她在旁边煽风点火。
value: I don't think you will have to wait long. Odin leaving is the perfect opportunity for her to stir up trouble. She wouldn't be able to resist.

name: 洛基，快出来！我知道你躲在这里！
value: Loki, I know you're there! Come out!

name: 我还准备给你们来个惊喜，没想到你们这么快就能发现我。
value: I was going to surprise you guys. I didn't expect you to find me first.

name: 你向来学不乖，老实交代，奥丁在哪儿？
value: You're always up to no good. Be honest, where is Odin?

name: 哎呀……原来奥丁不见了，这可真让人遗憾……不过我可不清楚她的下落。
value: Oh no... Odin is missing... Such a pity... But I have no idea where she is.

name: 你满脸不怀好意地说出这种话，实在让人信不过，或许只有拳头能让你开口了！
value: Your words don't match your expression. I guess we will have to beat the truth out of you!

name: 哼，看来几位在梦境中的力量，比我想象中大呢……
value: Hmph. It seems that your power is greater than I thought in this Dreamland.

name: 坦白的时间到了，亲爱的。
value: It's time for you to confess, sweetie.

name: 算了算了，看在旧日的交情上，我就帮你们一回好了。
value: Forget about that. Since we're old friends, I will help out just this once.

name: 奥丁现在在哪儿我不清楚，但她之前和北欧那几头龙混在一块。
value: I don't know where Odin is now, but she was with the Nordic dragons earlier.

name: 真是糟糕……我有不好的预感。
value: The dragons? I have a bad feeling about this.

name: 女神们，挑战的时刻到了，我将逐个击败你们，证明我有继承奥丁神权的资格！
value: Goddesses! I challenge you! I will defeat you one by one to prove that I am qualified to inherit Odin's divine right.

name: 好吧，如果不是在梦里，我保证你现在已经被送上断头台了。
value: How impudent! If we weren't in a dream right now, your heads would roll for this.

name: 遗憾的是，奥丁确实允诺强者可以继承阿斯加德的最高神权。
value: Unfortunately not. Since Odin has promised that the strongest will inherit her position as Supreme Ruler of Asgard.

name: 说得好！所以你们俩打算一起上？还是……
value: Is that so? Well then, do you two plan to come at us together? Or...?

name: 没必要，我一个人对付你们已经足够了！放马过来吧！我并不觉得人多就能赢！
value: Hah! I alone am enough to deal with you all. Bring it on!

name: ……在我的梦境中居然还能发挥出这么强大的力量，这不可能！
value: Impossible! How could you have such strength in my dream?

name: 输了就退下吧，姐妹，让我来告诉她们实力的差距……
value: If you've lost, sister, step aside. Let me show them the difference in strength.

name: 希望这里的温度会让你们产生回家了的感觉。
value: Does the cold temperature here remind you of home?

name: 既然你明白我们不惧寒冷，还想用冰雪来击败我们吗？
value: Since you already know that we aren't afraid of the cold, do you still think you can beat us with a little snow?

name: 我的力量可不只是普通的风雪……
value: My power is no ordinary snowstorm...

name: 我早就说过了，阿斯加德众神千年来都与北欧的冰雪为伴，不会惧怕任何寒冷。
value: I told you so. We Asgardian Gods have lived in the Nordic ice for thousands of years.

name: 我承认你们的实力，但遗憾的是，我不觉得奥丁会跟你们回阿斯加德……
value: I acknowledge your strength. But unfortunately, I don't think Odin will go back to Asgard with you...

name: 因为我已经厌倦当个 统治者了，亲爱的。
value: Because I am tired of ruling, my dear.

name: 奥丁，原来你还真躲在潘多拉的梦境里，你知道阿斯加德都遭遇了些什么吗？
value: Odin! So you really were hiding in Pandora's Dreamland. Do you have any idea what is happening to Asgard?

name: 不知道，但既然众神都完好无损，我相信你已经处理妥当了一切。
value: Nope, no idea. But since you are all in one piece, I believe you have everything under control.

name: 你可真能推脱，现在众神无首，万一希腊的那群好战的家伙打过来……
value: You really are shirking your duties... Asgard is weakened without a leader, what if those warmongerers from Greece come looking for a fight?

name: 啊……我只是想清闲一段日子而已，何况我已经宣布选出神权继承者的方法了，不是吗？
value: Ah I just want to relax. Besides, I have already announced how my successor will be chosen, haven't I?

name: 抱歉，众神可没同意你这个草率到家的决定。
value: Sorry, but we don't agree with your rash decision.

name: 阿斯加德不可以没有你的智慧，如果你一定要留在梦境里的话……
value: Asgard cannot be without your wisdom. So if you insist on staying in the Dreamland...

name: 我们就只能用一些不太温柔的手段把你请回去了。
value: We will have to do this the hard way.

name: 呵呵……想来硬的也不是不行，在希腊那群家伙的习惯里，还保留着弑神登位的传统呢。
你看上去不像是在开玩笑，那么我们只好让你吃点苦头了，大人。
value: ...You're serious about leaving. Then we will give you a hard time, my lady.

name: 不错，芙蕾雅，你的力量在梦境里成长的速度比我想象中快得多。
value: Not bad, Freyja. Your strength has grown much faster in the Dreamland than I could have imagined.

name: 你能让我看到如此强大的决心，或许阿斯加德在你手上会有更光明的未来。
value: You have displayed such strong determination. Perhaps Asgard will have a brighter future in your hands.

name: 自古以来，北欧众神一直尊崇武力与荣耀，如今你的力量已经超过了我。
value: Since ancient times, the Norse gods have always respected power and glory. And your strength has now surpassed mine.

name: 或许轮到你晋升成为新的阿斯加德守护者了。
value: Maybe it is time for you to become the new leader of Asgard.

name: 然而我并非最好的人选……
value: I am not the best candidate though...

name: 阿斯加德不需要一个王，也从来不是某个人说了算，而是需要集体的智慧。
value: Asgard does not need a single ruler to make decisions for all. But rather someone to lead the collective voices and wisdom of the gods.

name: 我很早就想做出改变了，不能由一个人的意志来决定每个人的命运。
value: I have long wanted to change the ruling system. The fate of all cannot be determined by one person's will.

name: 虽然我足够强大，但我的固执和偏见并非是好事，你却能给众神带来新的希望。
value: Although I am strong, my stubborness and prejudice is not good for Asgard. But you can bring new hope to the gods.

name: 呵呵，如果你执意这么认为，那么至少在你改变想法前，我会继续执政阿斯加德。
value: If you really think I would be suitable to lead Asgard, then I will undergo the Trial of the Guardian.

name: 很好，我知道你不会让我失望。
value: I am certain you won't let me down.

name: 当试炼开始时，我会模拟诸神黄昏的幻象，你将面对我们的终末。
value: When the trial begins, you will see a vision of Ragnarok and will have to face the end of Asgard.

name: 如果你们能通过我最大的敌人，洛基的考验，那么我就承认你有资格领导众神。
value: If you can defeat my worst enemy, Loki, then there will be no doubt that you are worthy to lead the Norse Gods.

name: 一定要小心！虽然是幻象，但她承载了我的神力，其危险程度不亚于真实的末日！
value: Be careful. Although it is an illusion, she carries my divine power and is as dangerous as if this were the real Ragnarok.

name: 看来命运如此，我们度过了诸神黄昏……
value: As fate would have it, we made it through Ragnarok.

name: 你做的很好，阿斯加德将迎来新的纪元，所有的人都将成为它的主人。
value: Well done. Asgard will usher in a new era, and all will have a say in its future.

name: 我会记住这份职责的，连同这份强大的力量。
value: I will accept this duty, along with this new power.

name: 不，传统不应就此改变。
value: No, age-old traditions should not be changed.

name: 如果你真的这么认为，那么我接受守护者试炼。
value: Well if you insist, then I will continue to rule Asgard. At least, until you change your mind...

name: 芙蕾雅释放技能或普通攻击时，有70%概率再次释放，每回合最多触发一次。芙蕾雅每回合行动时，使防御力最低的2名敌方女神获得【破甲】状态（无视异常抵抗），持续1回合。【破甲】状态的女神防御力降低芙蕾雅防御力的80%，韧性降低芙蕾雅韧性的20%
value: When Freyja releases a skill or normal attack, there is a 70% chance that it will be released again (can be triggered up to once per round). When Freyja is in action, inflicts [Sunder Armor] to 2 enemies with the lowest DEF for 1 round (ignores Debuff RES). \n\n[Sunder Armor]: Reduces the bearer’s DEF by 80% of Freyja’s DEF and FOR by 20% of Freyja’s FOR.

name: 1回合防御力降低芙蕾雅防御力的80%
value: Reduces the bearer’s DEF by 80% of Freyja’s DEF

name: 1回合韧性降低芙蕾雅韧性的20%
value: Reduces the bearer’s FOR by 20% of Freyja’s FOR

name: ANNIVERSARY_LETTER_OPENNING
value: <color=#fe8cc0>June</color> <color=#fe8cc0>18</color>, <color=#fe8cc0>2020</color>, marked the official launch of Idle Angels.By <color=#fe8cc0>Feburary</color> <color=#fe8cc0>11</color>, <color=#fe8cc0>2021</color>, <color=#fe8cc0>1 million</color> Angels had descended upon our world.\nFast forward to <color=#fe8cc0>June</color> <color=#fe8cc0>17</color>, <color=#fe8cc0>2023</color>, an impressive <color=#fe8cc0>10 million</color> angels have embarked on their adventure.\nTogether, we've made great progress in exploring the mysterious world.

name: ANNIVERSARY_LETTER_STARTING
value: {0}\nA holy light descended, bringing [{1}] the world with hope.\nRemember Princess Bari? She journeyed through this world with you.

name: ANNIVERSARY_LETTER_TIME

We hope you'll like it. Keep moving forward in the days to come!

name: ANNIVERSARY_LETTER_HONOR1
value: Amidst our shared journey, you competed with fellow adventurers.\n

name: ANNIVERSARY_LETTER_HONOR2
value: You earned the championship title of the Clash of Titans {0} times.\n

name: ANNIVERSARY_LETTER_HONOR3
value: You emerged victorious in the Glory Arena {0} times.\n

name: ANNIVERSARY_LETTER_HONOR4
value: You were bestowed the title of Lord of Gods {0} times.\n

name: 成功派遣一名女神产量提升{0}
value: Successfully dispatch an angel to increase output by {0}

name: 进驻要求：职业{0},品质{1}及以上
主线副本达到{0}后开启
value: Open after the Main Story reaches {0}

name: 快看，穹顶的群星在闪耀，命运的力量也同时出现，为何群星会汇聚到此？
value: Wow, look at the stars on the dome. They’re sparkling with the power of destiny. I wonder why they’re all here.

name: 星空和命运的力量凝聚在了一起，好像赋予了天使们全新的力量。
value: They seem to have fused with the power of sky and destiny. It’s like they gave us angels some new abilities.

name: 作为命星的主体，每位天使都觉醒了全新的力量，需要使用星之沙来激活新的能力。
value: Now, we are all empowered by the stars. Gathering those Stars Sand to activate an exclusive power for you angel.

name: 群星闪耀的力量更加耀眼，当多个女神聚集在一起时，会互相激发各自的力量，获得更加强大群星技能。
value: The starlight is dazzling! When we angel join forces, we boost each other’s powers and unleash amazing star combo skills.

name: 点击显示命星属性
value: Tap to display Destiny Star Attributes

name: 点击激活命星力量
value: Tap to activate the power of Destiny Star

name: 点击切换到群星
value: Tap to switch to the Collective Star

name: 主星为女神本体
value: The Main Star is the angel herself

name: 伴星为其他女神的主星
value: Collective Stars are the stars surrounding the Main Star

name: 达成一定的条件即可激活群星技能
value: Achieve certain conditions to activate special combo skills

name: 巴里，你发现了吗？这里出现了一个奇怪的入口，我们去看看怎么样？
value: Bari, do you see that? There’s a weird portal over there. Should we check it out?

name: 小心一点，这个好像是一个时间裂缝，我感觉不太对劲，好像有什么不好的事情要发生了。
value: Be careful. It looks like another time rift. I have a bad feeling about this. Something terrible might happen.

name: 放心，有我在这什么都不用怕，但是在这个裂缝外面好像看不出什么问题，要不我们进去看看吧？
value: Don’t worry. I’m here with you. Nothing can hurt us. But I don’t see anything wrong outside the rift. Maybe we should go in and see for ourselves?

name: 哎，等等我，你怎么还是这么冒冒失失的！
value: Hey, slow down! Why are you always so impulsive?

name: 巴里，火，到处都是火，整个世界都被燃烧起来了。
value: Bari, fire! There’s fire everywhere! The world is on fire!

name: 小心，穿过裂缝的时候我感觉到了时间女神的力量在被削弱了。
value: Watch out! I felt some mysterious source weaken the goddess of time's power when we crossed the rift.

name: 这里就是我们的世界，而且这个地方也很熟悉……好像是我们第一次相遇的地方？
value: This is our world. And that place… It’s where we first met, right?

name: 我们小心一点，查探一下到底发生了什么。
value: Let’s be cautious and figure out what’s going on.

name: 啊，巴里，我记得它，第一次战斗的时候打败的就是它。
value: Oh no, Bari! I recognize that thing! We beat it in our first fight!

name: 看，还有那边，那些曾经战斗过的怪物又再次出现了。
value: And look over there! Those old enemies are back!

name: 看来时间女神的力量出现了错乱，导致那些被消灭的怪物再次出现，并且变得更加危险了。
value: Something’s wrong with the order of time. It brought back those monsters we killed and made them stronger.

name: 完全不在怕的，能消灭它第一次，就能消灭它一万次。
value: But I’m not scared. If we can beat them once, we can beat them again and again.

name: 好，既然如此那就拿起武器继续战斗吧！
value: Alright then. Let’s grab our weapons and keep fighting!

name: 点击回到战场
value: Tap to return to the battlefield

name: 点击进入布阵界面
value: Tap to enter the Line-up interface

name: 点击布阵第一个队伍
value: Tap to create your first team

name: 点击布阵第二个队伍
value: Tap to create your second team

name: NORMAL_SKILL_DAMAGE_ADD
value: Increases DMG dealt by Normal Attack

name: 噩梦副本暂不支持快速战斗
value: Nightmare dungeons do not allow quick combat

name: 将一名女神与其他女神共鸣，即可使用她的装备、宝石、神器、内饰
value: Resonate an angel with other angels to use her Gears, Gems, Artifacts, and Attires

name: 限定女神的命星的激活材料
value: Activation materials for the limited angel's Destiny Star

name: 可用于女神命星升级
value: Can be used to upgrade Angel’s Destiny Star

name: 集齐50个碎片可以合成一个命星自选箱
value: Collect 50 pieces to synthesize a Destiny Star Optional Chest

name: 可以选择获得一个任意女神的命星
value: Select and obtain one Destiny Star of an Angel

name: 拥有({0}/{1})个女神主星等级达到Lv.{2}激活
value: Activate after ({0}/{1}) Angels' Main Star level reaches Lv. {2}

name: 打开宝箱选择任意经典女神的一个碎片（洛基及之前的所有稀有SSR+女神、稀有女神召唤券）
value: Open the treasure chest and choose one shard of any Classic Angel (including Loki and all previous SSR+ Angels or Superior Summon Scroll)

name: STAR_HOUSE_TIPS
value: Earn a Destiny Star after {0} summons

name: 群星取决于除自己外{0}个命星等级最高女神
value: The level of one angel’s Collective Star depends on the {0} angels with the highest level Main Star (excluding herself)

name: CHOOSE_GONGMING_HERO_TIPS
value: Please select an Angel for Resonance

name: 哟，这是谁呀，难道是陷入迷茫的女神，正在寻找指路明灯？
value: Yo, who's this here? Another lost and confused goddess looking for a guiding light?

name: 希腊的灾厄之女潘多拉？什么风把你吹到这来的？
value: Pandora, the Greek Daughter of Misfortune? What wind brought you here?

name: 有趣，与其说是我来到你身边，不如说是你误入了我的梦境。
value: Rather than me coming to you, it is you who have strayed into my Dreamland.

name: 让我来看看你的真名吧……阿斯加德的弗丽嘉，北欧的鲜花与爱之女神么？
value: Let me see which one we have today... Frigga of Asgard, Nordic Goddess of Flowers and Love?

name: 听说你可不是一个好应付的家伙呢，曾经有多少人因你而陶醉，又有多少人因你而心碎呢？
value: I heard you are a troublesome one to deal with. How many people have been intoxicated by you? How many people have suffered heartbreak because of you?

name: 那可都是些陈年往事了，现在的我可和过去不一样。
value: That is all in the past. I am not the same now as I used to be.

name: 哦……现在得称呼你“天后”大人了。不过你神情踌躇，是遇到什么麻烦了吗？
value: Oh yeah... Now I should be calling you Queen of Asgard... But why do you look so troubled, Your Majesty?

name: 我虽贵为北欧天后，可众神真的认同我的身份吗？我以前在北欧的名声可不怎么样……
value: I may be Queen of Asgard in name, but do the other gods even recognize my authority? My reputation in the North used to be quite bad...

name: 我想改善自己和阿斯加德女神们的关系，但不知道该如何去做。
value: I want to improve my relationship with the Asgardian goddesses, but I don't know how.

name: 改善自己的名声吗？那你至少算找对人了……
value: Improve your reputation? Well it's your lucky day! I've become rather good at granting wishes, heh.

name: 我建议你去找芙蕾雅，如果能与她和解，那么众神大概会相信你的决心。
value: I suggest you go to Freyja. If you can reconcile with her, then the others will probably trust your determination and resolve.

name: 真的吗？但我听很多人说过，请潘多拉帮忙的代价可不小……
value: Really? But I've heard a lot of people say that your help comes at a price...

name: 呵呵……代价等事成之后再谈也不迟，让我先看看你的能力。
value: Hehe... We can talk about the price later. Let me see your ability first.

name: 毕竟只有具备强大意志力和战斗力的人，才不至于在我的梦境中迷失……
value: After all, only those with a strong will and combat ability can traverse my Dreamland without fear of getting lost...

name: 胜负已分，至少在战斗这方面我还是很有信心的。
value: The outcome is clear. I am confident in my combat abilities, aren't you?

name: 我大概知道你为什么会和其他的北欧女神闹出矛盾了……你还真是个危险的家伙。
value: ...I am starting to understand why you're in conflict with the other Norse goddesses... You really are quite dangerous.

name: 我大概知道你的力量了，只不过如你所说，芙蕾雅肯定不会轻易被你说服。
value: Well, I have a good estimate of your strength now. But Freyja will not be so easily persuaded.

name: 我们得需要几个同伴……你有什么推荐人选吗？
value: You will need some more companions to back you up. Is there anyone you suggest?

name: 如果要我选的话，我看洛基非常适合，她平时总能想出奇怪的点子，我带你去找她。
value: Well since you asked, I think Loki would be a good choice. She always comes up with the most interesting and unique ideas.

name: 天哪……你可真会挑人……
value: Oh my gods... You really know how to pick them...

name: 我知道你在这里！十秒内你要是再不出来，我就把你的梦敲成碎片！
value: I know you are here! If you don't come out within 10 seconds, I will smash this place to pieces!

name: 我相信她一定是藏起来了，你仔细想想，她一般会藏在什么地方？
value: I believe she is hiding. Where does she usually like to hide?

name: 她会变成一些奇怪的东西……啊！我想起来了，她壁炉里的火还燃着呢！
value: She likes to shapeshift into random things... Ah! The fire was still burning in her hearth!

name: 你果然变成了炉火。
value: Sure enough, you changed into fire.

name: 你找到我也没有用！你说什么我都不听！你说什么我也不答应！
value: It's pointless to find me! I won't listen to you! I won't do what you want!

name: 她要逃跑了，快追上去！
value: She is running away! Quickly! Catch her!

name: 弗丽嘉大人，求您放过我吧，我保证再也不出现在您面前了！
value: Lady Frigga, please let me go! I promise I will never appear in front of you again!

name: ……你以前到底对诡诈之神做过什么可怕的事，她见你像老鼠见了猫一样……
value: ...What terrible things have you done to the Goddess of Deception? She's shaking like a mouse in front of a cat.

name: 够了够了，你们究竟想要我干嘛？只要肯放我走，我什么都答应你们！
value: Enough please. What do you want from me? Let me go and I will do anything!

name: 我想去和芙蕾雅和解。
value: I want to reconcile with Freyja.

name: 我觉得你不会成功的，毕竟谁都知道你的性格实在是……
value: Can't you ask me to do something easier? I don't think it's possible for you to reconcile. After all, everyone knows what your personality is like...

name: 所以我们才找到了你啊，弗丽嘉大人可是对你抱有期待呢。
value: That's why we came to find you. Lady Frigga has high expectations for you.

name: 好吧，我试试看，但对我来说，这真不是什么值得高兴的事情……
value: Ugh, I'll give it a try. But I'm not happy about it...

name: 前面就是索尔的宫殿了，想通往梦境中的阿斯加德，必须经过这里。
value: This is the door to Thor's palace. If you want to reach Asgard in this Dreamland, you must pass through here.

name: 大门关得可真够紧……不过洛基，你会有办法的，对吧？
value: The door is locked... Loki, you will have a way, won't you?

name: 索尔你这个酒鬼、蠢货、锤子脑袋！快出来！否则你的白日梦就到此为止了！
value: Thor! You drunkard! Fool! Hammer-head! Come out quickly! Otherwise I will steal Mjölnir!

name: 洛基，又是你这个麻烦家伙……上次挨揍的苦头你还没吃够么？
value: Loki! You troublesome pest... Haven't you had enough of the pain of being beaten up from last time?

name: 等等……！弗丽嘉？你在这里做什么？为什么你会和洛基在一起？
value: Wait a second... Frigga? What are you doing here? Why are you with Loki?

name: 别在意，亲爱的，我只是想与芙蕾雅和解，让洛基来找你帮忙而已。
value: Don't worry about that, my angel. I want to reconcile with Freyja. Loki's just here to help.

name: 所以她就是这么请我帮忙的？在我的门前破口大骂？
value: So her help is calling me names in front of my own palace?

name: 这个……只有这种办法，才能让你从酩酊大醉中清醒过来。
value: Well... You see... That's because it's the only way to wake you from your drunken nap.

name: 好吧，既然是弗丽嘉出面，我当然没理由不答应，不过我有个条件……
value: Since it's you asking, Frigga, I have no reason to decline. But...

name: 是和我比试比试吗？没问题……
value: Heh. You want a fight, right? Go ahead.

name: 到此为止吧，我认输，说实话，你的锤子比以前温柔多了。
value: Okay okay. Let's call it here. I admit defeat. I have to say though, your fighting style is... much gentler than before.

name: 毕竟我也是天后了，不能再那么粗暴下去了呢。
value: I am a queen now, after all. I can't be as rough as I used to be.

name: 事已至此，我同意和你们一起去芙蕾雅大人的梦境，但路上可能会遇到一些麻烦。
value: Anyway, I agreed to accompany you to Lady Freyja's dream, but we may run into some trouble on the way.

name: 因为要经过女武神们的梦境，她们可不像我这么好说话……
value: Yes, because we will have to pass through Valkyrie's dream. She isn't as easy-going as I am.

name: 弗丽嘉，我可没邀请你来我的军营，如果你再往前一步，我就要发起冲锋了。
value: Frigga, I did not invite you into the barracks of the Valkyries. If you take one more step, I will make you regret it.

name: 首席女武神，以弗丽嘉现在的身份而言，你至少要保持礼仪。
value: Leader of the Valkyries, you should remember Frigga's status. She is Queen. Show some respect.

name: 她以前目中无人的时候，可没有提到过什么礼仪。
value: And where was the respect when she treated us like shit?

name: 我为过去的所作所为向你道歉，也正因为如此，我需要去与芙蕾雅和解。
value: I apologize for my past actions. That is exactly why I want to see Freyja.

name: 好吧，如果你们能在战斗中胜过我，我就放你们过去。
value: Let's settle this with a fight. If you win, I will let you pass. If I win, you shall not pass!

name: 我接受这个挑战，除此之外，我希望你能与我一同前去和芙蕾雅谈谈。
value: I accept your challenge! But if I win, you will also come with me.

name: 这些话等打完再说吧！
value: You will have to beat me first!

name: 呼……索尔，我开始明白你为什么会帮她了。
value: Phew... Thor, I'm beginning to understand why you're helping her.

name: 很简单，她是除奥丁大人外北欧最重要的存在。
value: To put it simply, she is the most important existence to the Norse Gods, other than Lady Odin.

name: 她在成为天后之前，并不是一个光明正大、值得尊敬的人。
value: Before she was queen, she wasn't exactly a fair and honorable person...

name: 但这场战斗中她的技巧，已经让我见识到了她的荣耀感。
value: But during this battle, I glimpsed her sense of honor.

name: 我们是战士，战士的天职就是服从领主的命令，即便她要求我牺牲，那我也无可推辞。
value: We are warriors. We are duty-bound to obey our liege's orders. Even if she commanded my sacrifice, I would not complain.

name: 如今的我一定不会辜负你的信任，瓦尔基里。
value: I will not betray your trust in me, Valkyrie.

name: 没想到我躲到梦境里你还能找得到，唉……所以你这次又要去折腾哪个倒霉家伙？
value: I didn't think you'd be able to find me even in a dream. So who's the unlucky one you're going to mess with this time?

name: 芙蕾雅，我需要与她和解，然后修复自己与阿斯加德众神的关系。
value: I need to see Freyja. I want to reconcile with her and patch up my relationship with the other Asgardian gods.

name: 这代价恐怕不小，毕竟当年你和她可是为了争夺天后的地位而对立的……
value: That's not going to be easy. After all, you were rivals in the fight for the throne...

name: 所以我才来找你帮忙，无论其他人立场如何，作为大地女神，你始终会会支持我。
value: That's why I came to you for help. Regardless of other people's opinion, I know you will have my back.

name: 除非你的力量强到能够击败最强守护者海姆达尔，否则你依旧过不了彩虹桥。
value: Unless you are strong enough to defeat Heimdall, the Guardian of the Bifrost, you will not be able to cross that rainbow bridge into Asgard.

name: 要来试试吗？
value: Wanna see for yourself if I am?

name: 那当然，我可不希望白跑一趟。
value: Of course. I wouldn't want to go all the way there for nothing.

name: 这可真不像你以前的力量，弗丽嘉。
value: This is not like your old powers, Frigga.

name: 有你的帮忙后，我相信是能越过海姆达尔这道难关的。
value: With your help, I believe that we can handle Heimdall.

name: 唉……希望那个死脑筋能理解你的用意。
value: Ugh I do hope that mudsclehead understands your intentions.

name: 前方是芙蕾雅大人的宫殿，我不能让您随意通过，抱歉……即便您是天后。
value: Stop. Beyond this point is Lady Freyja's palace. I can let you go no further, not even if you are the Queen.

name: 我是过去向她问好的，并且向她传递我的和解邀请。
value: I wish to give her my greetings and an invitation to reconcile.

name: 是这样吗？我听说你在举办酒宴，试图和曾经交恶的女神改善关系。
value: Is that so? I heard that you are holding a banquet, with the intention of repairing bad relationships

name: 好吧，但出于对芙蕾雅大人的职责，我必须要保卫她的安全。
value: I see. But I must still abide by my duty to keep Lady Freyja safe.

name: 假如你们能胜我半筹，我就当你们击败了我，放你们通过。
value: If you can defeat me at half my power, I will consider it your victory and let you pass.

name: 谢谢你的通情达理，海姆达尔。
你们赢了，我不会继续阻拦你们，但请你们一定要谨慎行事。
value: You have won. I will not hinder your passage any further, but please be careful.

name: 请放心，不管如何我不是来惹麻烦，而是来解决问题的。
value: Rest assured, my intention is not to cause issues. But to resolve them.

name: 恕我直言……为什么洛基这个家伙会在这个队伍里呢？
value: With all due respect... what is Loki doing here?

name: 这个嘛……她是我重要的伙伴——至少这次是。
value: Well... she is a valuable asset to me. This time.

name: 嗯，你对我有什么意见吗？亲爱的？
value: Got something to say about me, sweetheart? Heh.

name: 好久没有看到如此强大的组合了，你们这阵势……是要去打架？
value: Well, well. What a powerful group of people. Such a team - are you guys looking for a fight?

name: ……我们只是去拜访芙蕾雅而已。
哼哼……你们有给我带礼物来吗？即使这里是梦境，但也属于龙神的地盘。
value: Hmph... Did you bring me a gift? Even though this is the Dreamland, this territory still belongs to us Dragons.

name: 要不然……我把洛基送您？实话说，她的装饰性还挺强的。
value: Um... I can give you Loki? Look at her, she'd make a very pretty decoration.

name: 我对这个家伙没兴趣，不管如何，想通过龙族的领地，礼物是必要的。
value: Not interested. If you want to pass through my territory, I expect a proper gift.

name: 火龙之主，你这话的意思……是想挑战阿斯加德最高的权威之一吗？
value: Lady Ember, do you mean... you want to challenge Asgard's Queen?

name: 索尔，我可是看着你长大的，也许你不知道，龙族的规矩可是奥丁也必须遵守的。
value: Little Thor, I watched you grow up. You may not know this, but even Odin must abide by the rules of the Dragon Clan.

name: 喔……这样吗？好，就让我看看这几千年来，你打架的本事成长了多少！
value: Clearly. Fine, let me see if your fighting skills have improved in the past thousand years! Or if I need to get out the diapers for you. Haha!

name: 打得不错，你们既然在战斗中能胜过我，礼物的事情就免了吧，哈哈。
value: What a good fight! I will consider that your gift.

name: 别这么说，我依旧会为你打造两座雕像，一座立在阿斯加德的花园中，一座送给你。
value: Don't be silly. I will have two statues built in your honor. One to stand in the Asgardens, and one for your territory.

name: 天后，你客气了，祝你和芙蕾雅聊得愉快。
value: You don't have to do so much for me, my Queen. I wish you luck in your chat with Freyja.

name: 芙蕾雅让我过来劝你回去，我总得要装装样子吧。
value: Freyja asked me to persuade you to go back. So I've got to at least look like I tried to.

name: 虽然现在的我不大想向你挥动锤子，不过……
value: I don't really feel like fighting you, but...

name: 动手吧，要是不通过我这关，今天你可见不到芙蕾雅了。
value: Do it, otherwise you can't see Freyja today.

name: 你的本事比以前强多了呐……
value: You are much stronger than before.

name: 不好意思，差点失控，我希望没有伤着你。
value: I almost lost control of myself, I'm sorry. I hope I didn't hurt you.

name: 看到你如今的成长我挺高兴，你以前糟糕的性格，可从不会主动和其他北欧女神和好。
value: I am proud to see how much you've grown. No one would have believed you'd take the initiative to reconcile with Freyja.

name: 神也是会改变的，至少我是这样。
value: Even immortal gods can change. At least, I have.

name: 呵呵……记得告诉芙蕾雅，你把我打了个落花流水，不然她可不甘心。
value: Remember to tell Freyja you kicked my butt, hehe. Otherwise I'll get in trouble.

name: 你还是来了，我的妹妹，弗丽嘉。
value: After everything, you still came. My sister, Frigga.

name: 我是来与你和解的，姐姐，当年为了天后的权位，我做过不少让你伤心的残酷之事。
value: I have come to reconcile with you, sister. I did many cruel things to you, for the sake of being Queen.

name: 我不会因此而对你产生偏见，你需要和解的是你自己。
value: It is not me you need to reconcile with. It is yourself.

name: 以前在天后这个位置的争夺中，我没有像个北欧勇士一样和你在战斗中分出胜负……
value: In the fight for the throne, I did not face you like a true Asgardian warrior...

name: 而是使用了权术、诡计和不公平的手段。
value: Instead, I used subterfuge and trickery to win.

name: 的确如此，但我已经原谅你了，继续纠结只会让你的内心继续沉沦，如果你实在难以释怀……
value: That is true, but I have forgiven you. Allowing such feelings to fester in your heart will only cause you pain. But if you really can't let go...

name: ……那么一场迟到的对决，或许能够平抚你内心的愧疚。
value: Then perhaps a duel may help to appease the guilt in your heart. Come sister, let us face each other as true Asgardian warriors.

name: 你说的没错，让我们开始吧。
value: You are right. Let's do it.

name: 看吧，即使是公平的战斗，你如今还是能胜过我，这也是我不反对你作为天后的原因。
value: See, even in a fair fight, you have the power to defeat me now. That is why I have no objections to you being Queen.

name: 我看得出来，你还是不肯放下自责，依旧会受到不安之心的折磨。
value: I see that you still cannot forgive yourself and will be tormented by your own guilt.

name: 告诉我，你真的能抛弃曾经的自己，接受我的原谅了吗？
value: Tell me, are you willing to let go of your former self and accept my forgiveness?

name: 我明白了，我会消除自己内心的阴影。
value: I understand, sister. I will chase away the shadows in my heart.

name: 那就面对她，然后从她手中夺回你的意志！
value: Then face your past self, and take back your willpower!

name: 我还没有想清楚这一切……
value: I need time to figure this all out...

name: 那么我会一直守护你，直到你能真正面对自己过去的那一天。
value: Then I will watch over you until the day when you are ready to face your past.

name: 呵呵，你又回来了，我的另一半。
value: Hehe, you returned to me, my other half.

name: 这么长时间没有品尝鲜血的滋味了，一定很怀念那种味道吧？我们的玫瑰园还在吗？
value: We haven't tasted blood in so long... You must miss it, right? Is our blood-soaked rose garden still alive?

name: 我已经不再培育玫瑰了，那块土地，如今已经成为了阿斯加德众神的乐园。
value: I no longer grow roses. That land has now become a paradise for the gods of Asgard.

name: 我真难以理解，阴谋与诡计曾让你得到天后的权力，但如今你却这么轻易地抛弃了。
value: Tsk. I don't understand you. You stopped at nothing to become Queen, but now you are willing to throw it away so easily.

name: 如今的我已经不需要依靠那些手段了，令人不齿的行为即使得到权力，也无法让众神信服。
value: I will no longer rely on those methods. Even if I gain power through such disgraceful deeds, power alone will not convince the gods.

name: 我哪怕失去自己的地位，也要换回自己在众神眼中真正的荣耀和尊严！
value: I must regain my honor and dignity in the eyes of the gods. Even if it costs me the throne!

name: 你真的做得到吗？尽管来试试吧……
value: Can you really do it? Go ahead and try...

name: 呵呵……我没想到自己真的会有被你击败的这一天……
value: I didn't think that you would actually defeat me...

name: 是的，我将与你道别，与过去的自己道别。
value: I will say goodbye to you, to my old self.

name: 你成长了不少呢……但作为你曾经的阴影，我不会这么容易就消散的……
value: You have grown a lot... But I am your shadow, I will not disappear so easily...

name: 只要你内心还有不舍、愧疚和胆怯，只要你还放不下过去的不安，我就迟早会回来找你……
value: As long as you still have regrets, guilt, and cowardice in your heart... As long as you still can't let go of the past... Sooner or later, I will return.

name: 我会记住自己曾经的过错，但我绝不会因此而踌躇不前。
value: I will remember my past mistakes, but I will no longer let them hold me back.

name: 用于提升弗丽嘉的梦境中记忆宝珠的等级
value: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Frigga's Dreamland

name: 弗丽嘉女神碎片自选箱
打开宝箱选择弗丽嘉任意品质的碎片
value: Open the box and choose Frigga's Shards of any quality

name: 为了迎接你，我可是摘下了整个玫瑰园的花来给你铺路呢……我期待着你会喜欢上这一切……
value: I plucked all the flowers from the rose garden to make a path for you… I hope you will love everything here…

name: 她是北欧神话中的天后，是家庭和婚姻的守护神。\n虽然贵为天后，但弗丽嘉更渴望以慈母的形象示人，她常化身老妪，替奥丁在凡间行善，亦或者是化身爱情使者，拯救那些相爱但被迫分离的情侣。
value: In Norse mythology, Frigga is considered the queen of the gods and the protector of family and marriage. Although, she prefers to be thought of as a loving mother than a queen.\nFrigga often transforms into an old woman, doing good deeds for Odin on Midgard, or into a love messenger, saving those lovers who are in love but forced to separate.

name: 一株荆棘中的红玫瑰，花瓣如鲜血般鲜艳欲滴，光是看上它一眼，就仿佛会被抽走灵魂……
value: A red rose among the thorns, its petals as bright and dripping as blood, just a glance at it, and it seems like it will suck away your soul…

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_96
value: Take my hand and dance with me.

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_97
value: In that hazy dream, I met you.

name: 用于嘉年华商店商品购买
value: Used to buy items in the Carnival Shop

name: 嘉年华巡游活动道具，使用后随机前进1~6格
value: Carnival Parade event item, upon usage, allows you to randomly advance 1 to 6 spaces

name: 嘉年华巡游活动道具，使用后任意前进1~6格
value: Carnival Parade event item, upon usage, allows you to freely move forward anywhere between 1 to 6 spaces

name: 完成一圈巡游获得额外奖励
累计投掷骰子{0}次
value: Total number of dice rolled {0} times

name: 对敌方全体造成200%的法术伤害，并有50%概率使全体敌方获得【中毒】【燃烧】【破甲】【击破】【流血】（持续2回合）
value: Deals 200% M.DMG to all enemies and has a 50% chance of inflicting [Poison], [Ignite], [Sunder Armor], [Pierce], and [Bleeding] for 2 rounds.

name: 对敌人全体造成负面状态数量*50%的法术伤害，并治疗我方全体弗丽嘉100%攻击力的生命值
value: Deals M.DMG equal to [50% * Number of Debuffs on the target] to each enemy and heals all allies of 100% of her ATK.

name: 对敌方全体造成220%的法术伤害，并有60%概率使全体敌方获得【中毒】【燃烧】【破甲】【击破】【流血】（持续2回合），【眩晕】【冰冻】（持续1回合）
value: Deals 220% M.DMG to all enemies and has a 60% chance of inflicting [Poison], [Ignite], [Sunder Armor], [Pierce], and [Bleeding] for 2 rounds; and [Stun] and [Freeze] for 1 round.

name: 对敌人全体造成负面状态数量*70%的法术伤害，如果负面状态数量大于3，则每个负面状态附带弗丽嘉攻击力30%的真实伤害。然后治疗我方全体弗丽嘉120%攻击力的生命值
value: Deals M.DMG equal to [70% * Number of Debuffs on the target] to each enemy. If the number of debuffs on that angel is 4 or more, additionally deals 30% True DMG equal to 30% Frigga's ATK for each debuff the target has. Then, heals all allies of 120% of her ATK.

name: 治疗量翻倍，溢出治疗量的100%转化为护盾，护盾持续2回合
value: Doubles the healing amount. 100% of the overflow healing is converted to shield, lasting 2 rounds

name: 进入战斗时，有50%概率使敌方攻击力最高的女神进入【孤立】状态（无视异常抵抗，无法驱散），战斗开始后不会受到任何增益状态，持续2回合。每回合行动时，使全体敌方获得1层【脆弱】状态（无视异常抵抗，可叠加，持续至战斗结束），每层使敌方受到伤害增加1%。
value:
When entering battle, there is a 50% chance to inflict [Isolated] on the enemy with the highest ATK. When Frigga is in action, inflicts 1 layer of [Malediction] on all enemies, lasting until the end of the battle.

[Isolated]: Cannot receive any buffs for 2 rounds (cannot be dispelled and ignores Debuff RES).
[Malediction]: Increases DMG taken by 1% for each layer (stackable, ignores Debuff RES).

name: 技能伤害提升15%，普攻伤害提升30%
value: Increases Skill DMG by 15%, Normal DMG by 30%

name: 击杀敌人后使自身伤害提升10%，可叠加至2层，持续至战斗结束
value: Killing an enemy increases self-DMG by 10%, stacking up to 2 layers and lasting until the end of the battle

name: 行动时使自身攻击力、吸血提升10%，可叠加至3层，持续至战斗结束
value: When taking action, increase self ATK and Leech by 10%, stacking up to 3 layers and lasting until the end of the battle.

name: 行动时，回复自身10%最大生命值，溢出回复量对随机敌人造成等额真实伤害
value: When taking action, restore 10% of self Max HP, and deal True DMG equal to the amount of overflowing healing to a random enemy.

name: 行动时使自身防御、伤害反弹提升10%，可叠加至3层，持续至战斗结束
value: When taking action, increase self DEF and DMG Reflection by 10%, stacking up to 3 layers and lasting until the end of the battle.

name: 受到技能伤害降低10%，异常抵抗提升10%
value: Receive 10% less DMG from skills and increase 10% Debuff RES

name: 受到的治疗效果提高20%，受到的护盾效果提高20%
value: Increases Healing Effect and Shield Effect by 20%

name: 治疗效果提升30%，异常抵抗提升10%
value: Increases Healing Effect by 30% and Debuff RES by 10%

name: 受到伤害时，自身恢复10%已损失生命值
value: When taking damgae, restore 10% of the lost HP value.

name: 每回合行动时，恢复生命值最低的友方女神50%的生命值
value: When taking action, restores 10% of the HP of the ally with the lowest HP.

name: 受到技能伤害降低10%，无视异常抵抗10%
value: Ignores 10% of the enemy's Debuff RES and reduces Skill DMG taken by 10%

name: 受到伤害时，使自身效果命中提高3%，可叠加10层，持续至战斗结束
value: When taking damage, increases self Effect ACC by 3% until the end of the battle (can be stacked up to 10 layers).

name: 每回合行动时，提升自身生命上限10%，可叠加至3层，持续至战斗结束
value: When taking action, increases Max HP by 10%, stacking up to 3 layers and lasting until the end of the battle

name: 负面状态被驱散时有30%概率失败
value: The debuffs on herself have a 30% chance to fail at being dispelled

name: 集齐55个弗丽嘉碎片可以召唤弗丽嘉
value: Collect 55 Frigga Shards to summon Frigga

value: Here are the rewards for your 3rd Anniversary Souvenir Card. Enjoy the treat!

value: Finish the current parade and go back to the beginning

name: 打开宝箱选择任意经典女神的一个碎片（洛基及之前的所有稀有SSR+女神、稀有女神召唤券）
value: Open the treasure chest and choose one shard of any Classic Angel (including Loki and all previous SSR+ Angels or Superior Summon Scroll)

value: Congratulations on ranking No. {0} in the Time Carnival. Here are your rewards:

value: Location requires higher building levels to unlock

value: Unlock after awakening one UR Angel

name: 巨龙流出的血液凝结而成的强大金属，有一天终将会为诸神带来毁灭……
value: A powerful metal formed from the blood of ancient dragons, one day it will bring about the destruction of the gods...

name: 受到伤害时，自身恢复10%已损失生命值
value: When damaged, recover 10% of lost HP.

value: Your chosen goddess' Star Mark has already reached the max level. Do you confirm?

value: When finishing one lap of the parade, get

name: 该女神暂未解锁命星系统
value: This Angel has not yet unlocked the Destiny Star system

name: 暂未获得该女神
value: This Angel has not been obtained yet

value: Unlock this battlepass to get the following rewards

name: 活动结束后自动回收嘉年华彩券
value: Carnival Vouchers will be automatically recycled after the event ends

name: 每层受到伤害增加1%
value: Increases DMG taken by 1% for each layer

name: 在闪耀的旋律中，谱写一段绚烂的恋曲！
value: Let a dazzling love song flow from the sparkling tune!

name: 进入战斗时，雅典娜进入【战神】状态，净化自身所有不良状态（包含不可驱散类型），并且免疫任何异常状态，持续1回合。雅典娜行动后，如果对位敌方女神当前血量低于雅典娜当前最大攻击力的1.5倍，则直接斩杀该敌人，无视一切效果。
value: When Athena enters the battle, she enters the [God of War], purifying herself of all debuffs, including those that can't be dispelled, and becomes immune to all debuffs for one round.\n\nAfter Athena takes action, if the HP of the enemy in her opposite position is less than 1.5 times of Athena's current Max ATK, she will directly execute that enemy, ignoring all effects.

name: 1回合，免疫异常效果
value: Gain immunity to debuffs for 2 rounds

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_98
value: The fierce wind that blows towards the battlefield

name: 用于提升雅典娜的梦境中记忆宝珠的等级
value: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Athena's Dreamland

name: 雅典娜女神碎片自选箱
打开宝箱选择雅典娜任意品质的碎片
value: Open the box and choose Athena's Shards of any quality

name: 活动结束后清空积分
value: 3rd Anniversary Coin will be automatically recycled after the event ends

name: 哎呀，看看这是谁来了
value: Oh my, look who we have here.

name: 大名鼎鼎的战争之主，智慧与庇护的使者，雅典娜女神！
value: The famous Goddess of Wisdom and War! The mighty Athena!

name: 奉承的话就不用多说了，我遇到了麻烦，需要你帮忙。
value: Stop with such flattery. I am in trouble and need your help.

name: 等等……你的神力……好像消失了？究竟发生了什么？
value: Wait... Your divine power... It's gone! What has happened?

name: 波塞冬挑起了战争，她发动大地震让雅典城沉入了海中，想将它变为新的亚特兰蒂斯。
value: Poseidon started a war! She caused an earthquake that sank Athens into the sea. She's trying to turn it into the new Atlantis!

name: 于是你付出了全部的神格来拯救雅典城？你还真是慈悲为怀啊。
value: So you gave all of your divinity to save the city? How compassionate of you.

name: 少说风凉话了，如果你真想帮忙，就把你的魔盒给我，我要用它来与波塞冬抗衡！
value: Cut the sarcastic comments. Just give me your magic box so I can use it to fight Poseidon.

name: 很遗憾，那破玩意恐怕派不上什么用场。但是别担心，我有办法帮你重获神力。
value: Unfortunately my magic box doesn't work that way. But I do have a way to help you regain your powers.

name: 很好，那接下来我们要怎么做？
value: Great! What do I have to do?

name: 按照我的规矩，你得先通过进入梦境的试炼……然而你现在是凡人之身，能行吗？
value: First of all, you have to pass my trial... But since you're mortal now, can you do it?

name: 呵……你最好别小瞧了凡人的力量！
value: Heh... You better not underestimate the power of mortals!

name: 你输了，潘多拉，这场决斗是战争之主的胜利！
value: You lost, Pandora. Victory belongs to me, the Goddess of War!

name: 看来即使失去神格的力量，你在战斗中也不见得会落下风。
value: It seems that even without your divinity, you are not one to be underestimated in battle.

name: 现在你可以告诉我你的计划了。
value: Yes, now tell me your plan.

name: 当然，只不过有点复杂。让我们去见见你的几个老朋友再说吧……
value: Well, it's a bit difficult to explain. Before that, let's go meet some old friends of yours.

name: 潘多拉，我可不记得邀请过你。
value: Pandora, I don't remember inviting you here.

name: 你不想见我无所谓，但这位女神大人想要见你可是件大事。
value: It doesn't matter if you don't want to see me. But, this goddess here wants to see you.

name: 雅典娜？我和你们这样的女神没什么好说的……等等，你身上没有神格的气息？
value: Athena? I have nothing to say to goddesses like you. Wait... you don't have a divine aura?

name: 让我猜猜，你变成凡人了？想不到你也有今天。
value: Oh let me guess! You're mortal? Hehe I didn't expect to enjoy to have a treat like you today.

name: 你口中的“今天”很快就要结束了，伴随着你被击败。
value: I think you'll find she's no mere treat. Instead, you'll taste defeat today.

name: 等一下，你们想干嘛？你以为你还是那个高高在上的战争女神吗？你只不过是一介凡人！
value: And how do you propose to do that? Do you think you're still the high and mighty Goddess of War? You're a mortal now!

name: 没错，但凡人战胜神明的故事，你听得还不够多吗？
value: Yes, I'm mortal. But don't you know? Even mortals can defeat gods.

name: 没想到你即使失去几乎所有神力，还是能如此轻易地击败我。
value: I didn't expect you to defeat me so easily without your divinity.

name: 奇怪，在与你的战斗中，我似乎感受到力量开始回归的迹象了。
value: Hmm it's strange but I think I feel the beginnings of my power returning.

name: 看来我的梦境开始起作用了呢，你每次击败梦境中的对手，都将找回一部分神格。
value: Hehe. Then my plan is working. Every opponent you defeat in this dreamland will help you regain a part of your divinity.

name: 这听起来可真让人兴奋，也就是说，我击败最后一个梦境中的对手时……
value: How exciting. So, when I defeat my last opponent...?

name: 你的神格就完全恢复了。
value: Your divinity will be fully restored.

name: 有意思，我会好好享受这个过程的，至于你……有兴趣作为见证者，与我同行么？
value: This method seems right up my alley, I will enjoy it. As for you... Care to join me and witness it?

name: 不错的点子，我也想看看凡人重新获得神权的过程。
value: Oh yes, I would like to see how a mortal can regain lost divinity.

name: 我猜，这儿你应该比我熟。
value: Here's your next opponent. But I guess you're more familiar with her than I am.

name: 在我还是神明的时候，她就是个非常难对付的家伙……
value: Even when I was a goddess, she was rather difficult to deal with.

name: 你忘了，曾经也有凡人击败过她，而且还是在你的帮助下，鼓起勇气吧。
value: Don't forget, mortals have beaten her once before. With aid from none other than yourself.

name: 雅典娜？你居然还敢出现在我的神庙门口……不对，你身上没有神格的气息……
value: Athena? How dare you show your face in my temple? Hold on, your divinity is gone.

name: 我用自己的神力保护了雅典城免受波塞冬的侵害。
value: I protected the city of Athens against Poseidon's attack, using my divine power.

name: 呵呵……这该说无私还是愚蠢呢？
value: What a selfless act. Or perhaps it's stupidity.

name: 不过你居然在凡人的状态下来见曾经的敌人，我佩服你的勇气。
value: And you actually came to meet me, your former enemy, in your mortal state. I admire your courage.

name: 击败你并不是什么困难的事，我知道你的所有弱点。
value: You pose no threat to me. I already know all your weaknesses.

name: 我很乐意在我的神庙里立一尊真正的“女神石像”！
value: Hehe well I'd love to have a statue of a goddess to decorate my temple.

name: 认输吧，战争之主可不是靠运气取得胜利的。
value: Throw in the towel, Medusa. The Goddess of War doesn't need to rely on luck to win.

name: 算我倒霉！你想拿我怎么样？
value: Aw, how unlucky for me! What do you want with me?

name: 安心，亲爱的，我只是借与你的这场战斗，取回我失去的一部分神力而已。
value: Don't worry, my dear. I just used this battle with you to regain part of my lost divinity.

name: 呵……上一个战胜我的凡人可是直接让我脑袋搬家了，话说回来你们打算去哪？
value: Heh... The last mortal who defeated me removed my head. Speaking of, where are you going?

name: 还能去哪，当然是帮女神取回神力，然后找波塞冬算总帐。
value: Where else? To regain the rest of my power, of course. And then to settle things with Poseidon.

name: 如果你是要找波塞冬麻烦，算我一个，她这次干的太过分了，把我的神庙淹了大半。
value: If you're going after Poseidon, count me in! She flooded my temple.

name: 我从没想过，有一天还能和你站在同一条阵线上。
value: I never thought that one day we would be on the same side.

name: 别得意忘形了，我们只是暂时合作而已。
value: Don't get carried away. This is only a temporary truce. Let's go.

name: 潘多拉，你带我来冥界干什么？我现在可是凡人，进去后可就很难再出来了。
value: Pandora, why have you brought me to the underworld? You know mortals cannot easily escape once stepping foot in here.

name: 放心，我们只是前往方塔苏斯的噩梦而已，并不需要渡过冥河。
value: Calm down, we're only going as far as the nightmare controlled by Phantasos. We don't need to cross the river Styx.

name: 我老远就感受到你们的气息了，你们既不是亡者，也不是沉睡之人，来我这里干什么？
value: I knew I sensed someone's aura approaching. You are neither dead nor asleep, what are you doing here?

name: 方塔苏斯，我需要你梦境中的一块精华结晶。
value: Phantasos, I need a crystal formed from the essence of your dream.

name: 暂且不说我会不会给你，我想先问问，你拿它是要做什么？
value: Hmm... If I did give it to you, what are you planning to do with it?

name: 我们需要将它合成一种替代神格的载体，然后为雅典娜提供神力。
value: We need to synthesize it into a replacement vessel for divinity, and then provide divine power to Athena.

name: 哦……？曾经不可一世的智慧与战争女神，居然会把自己的神格弄丢？
value: Oh? The once incomparable Goddess of Wisdom and War has actually lost her divinity?

name: 不过我可不是慈善家，想要的话，你们就来抢吧。
value: But I am not a philanthropist. If you want it, you will have to take it.

name: 以智慧与战争女神之名，那我就不客气了。
value: Then in the name of the Goddess of Wisdom and War, prepare yourself!

name: 我不明白，你是如何以凡人之躯击破我的梦境的？
value: I do not understand. How are you able to shatter my nightmare as a mortal?

name: 或许力量是制胜的一环，但智慧才是关键，你太过傲慢，否认了智慧对于凡人的重要性。
value: Strength may be the door to victory, but wisdom is the key. You failed to see that because of your arrogance.

name: 不管如何，我输给你是事实，就给你一块梦境结晶好了。
value: Well whatever, the fact is I lost to you. I will give you a dream crystal.

name: 另外，不如让我和你一块前行，看看你所谓的智慧是如何在战场上体现的。
value: In addition, let me go with you to see how your so-called wisdom is reflected on the battlefield.

name: 我并不反对，噩梦之神。
value: I have no objection, Goddess of Nightmares.

name: 接下来我们去黄道吧，去上面收集星辰之光，唤醒梦境结晶的能量。
value: Next, let's go to the Zodiac, to collect the light of the stars and awaken the energy of the dream crystal.

name: 这是黄道禁地，奥林匹斯的女神们，这里不属于你们该来的地方。
value: This is the forbidden area of the Zodiac. Goddesses of Olympus, this place is not for you.

name: 没关系，我只需要黄道上的一点星光。
value: It's okay, we just need a little starlight from the Zodiac.

name: 我也记得你，潘神，是我用计策把你变成现在这副模样的。
value: I also remember you, Goddess Pan. It was I who used trickery to turn you into what you are now.

name: 虽然我没有愤怒，也感受不到复仇的意义，但是我内心的正义驱使着我向你讨要公道。
value: ...I am not angry, nor do I want revenge, but the righteousness in my heart drives me to seek justice from you.

name: 我接受你的正义，来吧，以战斗来做个了断也是一种荣耀。
value: I accept your justice. Come, it's an honor to end it with a fight.

name: 虽然你的正义并没有获得胜利，但我欣赏你不屈的意志。
value: Although your justice did not prevail, I admire your unyielding will.

name: 胜利女神今天并不青睐我，好吧，你可以拿走黄道的任何东西作为战利品。
value: Victory doesn't favor me today. Well, you can take anything from the Zodiac as your prize.

name: 不用担心，我只需要一点点星光而已。
value: Don't worry, all I need is a little bit of starlight.

name: 雅典娜，你是在尝试寻回丢失的神格吗？或许我能在接下来的旅程中助你一臂之力？
value: Athena, are you trying to recover your lost divinity? Perhaps I can help you on your journey?

name: 你真的愿意帮助我吗？即使是在我曾经伤害过你的情况下。
value: Are you really willing to help me? Even though I have hurt you in the past.

name: 事实上，从潘神变成摩羯座，并不是什么太难以接受的事情。
value: The truth is, changing from the Goddess Pan to Capricornus was not too difficult to accept.

name: 雅典娜？你为什么会到黄道众星的梦境里来？
value: Athena? Why have you come to the dreams of the Zodiac?

name: 别来无恙，我遇到了点小麻烦。
value: It's been a while. I need a bit of help.

name: 你身上……好像不再拥有神格了？
value: You... don't seem to have your divinity anymore?

name: 我听说过你和波塞冬的战争。所以你是想从这里的传送门，直接前往波塞冬的宫殿？
value: I've heard of your war with Poseidon. So you want to use the portal here to go straight to Poseidon's palace?

name: 恐怕以你的凡人身躯无法在海洋待太久吧？我可以赋予你让凡人在海底呼吸的力量。
value: You won't be able to stay in the ocean for long with your mortal body. I can give you the power to breathe underwater.

name: 但碍于我传送门守护者身份，我无法直接将这种能力给你，除非你在战斗中……
value: But due to my status as the guardian of the portal, I can't just give you this ability...

name: 我明白了，我会对你手下留情的。
value: I understand. I'll go easy on you.

name: 快停手！真没想到你失去了神力还是这样所向披靡。
value: Stop! I really didn't expect you to still be so powerful after losing your divinity.

name: 别在意，我只是帮了伟大的智慧与战争女神一个小忙而已。
value: Of course, I'm just doing the great Goddess of Wisdom and War a small favor.

name: 我是大海与星空之门的守护者，你们是谁？来海底世界想做什么？
value: I am the Guardian of the Sea and the Celestial Gate, who are you? What do you want in the underwater world?

name: 和我一样的形象……梦境通道的守护者吗？
value: Is this phantom that looks like me... the guardian of the dream passage?

name: 海底的梦境并不允许你这样的存在。
value: The dream under the sea does not allow for an existence such as you to enter.

name: 遗憾的是，我也不希望你这样的存在出现在阻挡我的道路上！
value: Unfortunately, I also don't want an existence like you to stand in my way!

name: 真是强大的力量，好久没有看到如此精湛的战斗技巧了。
value: What a powerful display! It's been a long time since I saw such exquisite fighting skills.

name: 看来我已经恢复了大部分的神格，继续前进吧，我想尽快回到现实。
value: Looks like I've regained most of my divine power. Let's move on, I want to get back to the waking world as soon as possible.

name: 波塞冬！我现在就站在你的宫殿门口，难道要我把你的王座拆了，你才肯出来面对我吗？
value: Poseidon! I am standing in front of your palace right now. Come out and face me! Or do you want me to tear down your throne first?

name: 雅典娜，作为一个丢了神格的女神，我挺敬佩你还敢在梦境中找我对峙。
value: Athena, I admire you for daring to confront me in the dreamland, even without your divinity.

name: 波塞冬，我难以原谅你将雅典淹没的罪行，我将以战争女神的身份向你问罪！
value: Poseidon, I cannot forgive you for flooding Athens. As the Goddess of War, you will face my judgement!

name: 我以为你在丢失神格后，能理解我现在的处境，但看来我想多了。
value: I thought you could understand my current situation after losing your divinity, but it seems that I was hoping for too much.

name: 不，我明白你在降临现实世界后，失去原有的神力是一件痛苦的事情。
value: No, I understand that it was painful for you to lose your original divinity when you descended into the mortal world.

name: 但将全世界化为海洋，并不能成为你为了获取力量的借口。
value: But that's no reason to flood the whole world!

name: 那么没有必要多说什么了，只有战斗能解决问题！
value: Then there is nothing more to be said. We can only fight!

name: 一切结束了，波塞冬！让海水褪去，这件事我可以既往不咎。
value: It's over, Poseidon! Let the seas recede, and I will let this matter go.

name: 不，这是我唯一能够找回神格与力量的方式，我不能就这样放弃。
value: No, this is the only way I can regain my divine power and strength. I can't just give up like this.

name: 很好，如果你有胆量，我会给你第二次机会的。
value: Very well, I will give you a second chance if you dare.

name: 雅典娜，接下来的战斗，就由我来代替波塞冬吧。
value: Athena, I will step in for Poseidon in the next battle.

name: 波塞冬是我的姐妹，你应该对她保持应有的尊重。
value: Poseidon is my sister, and you should treat her with the respect she deserves.

name: 我很抱歉，如果她没有试图伤害我的子民，我很乐意这么做，但现在……
value: I'd be happy to do so if she hadn't tried to harm my people, but now...

name: 那就由我来代替她和你战斗吧。
value: Then let me fight you instead of her.

name: 你瞒不了我，作为战争女神，你早就渴望着和我对决的这一天了，没错吧？
value: You can't hide it from me. As the Goddess of War, you've been longing for the day when you get to face me in battle, right?

name: 呵呵……你好像看上去挺犹豫的，雅典娜大人，需要我再给你点自信？
value: Hehe. You seem to be hesitant, Lady Athena. Do you need me to give you some confidence?

name: 不……我会以凡人的身躯面对这场战斗。
value: No. I will face this battle in the body of a mortal.

name: 是我的胜利，即使是失去神格，我依然以凡人的身份战胜了众神之王。
value: It is my victory! Even without my original divinity, I still defeated the Ruler of Olympus.

name: 没错，雅典娜，你胜利了，你的仁慈与智慧，配得上你重新找回的神力。
value: Yes, Athena, you are victorious. Your kindness and wisdom are worthy of your rediscovered power.

name: 或许我们都该好好反省一下，作为神，我们是否都陷入了永恒的傲慢之中。
value: Perhaps we should all reflect on whether we, as gods, have fallen into eternal arrogance.

name: 话别说得这么冠冕堂皇，雅典娜，特洛伊之战的时候，你对特洛伊的子民又做了什么呢？
value: Don't talk so grandly, Athena, or did you forget what you did to the people of Troy during the Trojan War?

name: 你或许仁慈，但是否只是对自己的子民呢？对待他邦之民，你难道没有尽情宣泄怒火吗？
value: You may be merciful, but isn't it only to your own people? Haven't you vented your anger against the people of other countries?

name: ……我很抱歉，阿波罗，对于战争我始终都力求公正，但当时是你们让我别无选择。
value: ...I'm sorry, Apollo. I've always tried to be fair in wars, but you had left me with no other choice.

name: 以你现在的力量与我一战吧，如果你赢了，那我就认可你的意志！
value: Fight me with your current power. If you win, then I will recognize your will!

name: 很好，我很敬佩你的勇气和敢于面对责任之心。
value: Very well, I admire your courage and willingness to face responsibility.

name: 既然这样……让我们脱下盔甲，像两个人类一样解决恩怨吧！
value: Let us take off our armor and settle our grievances like two mortals!

name: 我无心与你战斗，这是没有意义之举！
value: I have no intention of fighting you, it's pointless!

name: 哼！如我所想的一样啊，智慧女神确实从不冲动。
value: Hmph! As I thought, the Goddess of Wisdom is not impulsive.

name: 那我们就在将来的战场上再决胜负吧，你带着雅典大军，而我则带着马其顿勇士！
value: Then let's decide the outcome on a future battlefield. You lead the Athenian army, and I will lead the Macedonian warriors!

name: 我接受你的挑战，这场凡人之身的战斗，如果我胜利了，希望你能够放下过去的恩怨。
value: I accept your challenge, this mortal battle. If I win, I hope you can let go of the grievances of the past.

name: 没问题，让我们开始吧。
value: No problem... if you win. Let's get started!

name: 呵……长本事了啊，智慧与战争女神，如果是之前的你，必然会被我击败。
value: Heh you really are skilled, Goddess of Wisdom and War. If it were the former you, it would have been my victory. But now...

name: 事实上我还让你你几招，如果全力以赴，这场战斗会更快结束。
value: In fact, I also let you show me your moves. If I went all out, the fight would have been over too soon.

name: 哼，就算你赢了吧，我们彼此间不再有恩怨。
value: Hmph! Even if you say that, you did win, so we no longer have any grudges against each other.

name: 但我希望你将来能践行自己对于正义的原则，无论是对自己的子民，还是对外邦人。
value: But I hope that in the future you will be fair and just not only for your own people but also everyone else.

name: 我必不会再让任何人失望。
value: I will never let anyone down again.

name: 同为北欧最有魅力的女神，我和芙蕾雅，你会更青睐谁呢？
value: Of the two most charming goddesses of the Nordic region, who would you favor more, Freyja or me?

name: 北欧众神们总说爱情会让人付出盲目的牺牲，果真如此吗？
value: Nordic gods often say love involves blind sacrifices. Is that so?

name: 听说，用相爱之人的血来浇灌玫瑰，会赋予它们强大的魔力……
value: I heard that watering roses with the blood of a loved one bestows them with powerful magic…

name: 我喜欢事物凋零时的感觉，就像蔷薇被铁锤敲碎的瞬间，也有一种独特的美……
value: I enjoy watching things wilt. The end result reminds me of roses smashed by a hammer. Beauty can be found even in its own destruction.

name: 我听说维纳斯对爱情之事颇有看法，挺想和她见上一面呢。
value: I’ve heard that Venus has quite some views on love, I’d like to meet her.

name: 我喜欢那些可爱美丽的东西，喜欢到想要把它们都捏碎……
value: I love adorable and beautiful things, so much that I want to crush them all…

name: 我想并非如此。
value: I don’t think it necessarily is.

name: 我听过这样的传闻！
value: I’ve heard such rumors as well!

name: 应该是假的吧？
value: It sounds like a myth to me.

name: 索尔应该会有同感。
value: Thor would probably feel the same.

name: 我有不好的预感……
value: I have a bad feeling about this…

name: 你有照过镜子吗？
value: Have you ever looked in the mirror?

name: 呃……对我也是一样？
value: Er… the same goes for me?

name: 是吗？呵呵……这句话是真话，还是谎话呢……？
value: Really? Is that the truth, or are you lying?

name: 哼，你好像在犹豫呢，是想成为我玫瑰园中的养料吗？
value: Hmm, you seem to hesitate. Would you rather become fertilizer in my rose garden.

name: 可如果不能为了爱而牺牲，那还算真挚的爱吗？
value: But isn’t love without sacrifice less genuine?

name: 那么，你会为了我牺牲什么呢？
value: So, what would you sacrifice for me?

name: 那么猜猜看，接下来我要对你做什么刺激的事情了呢……
value: So guess what exciting thing I am about to do next…

name: 有意思！我们来验证一下怎么样……？
她小时候可喜欢找我玩了，使用战锤的本事我可没少教她。
value: As a child, she enjoyed playing with me. I taught her a lot about wielding a hammer.

name: 哼，在战场上看到我击碎魔物的身姿后，我相信你会理解这种美感的。
value: Hmph, after witnessing me pulverizing monsters on the battlefield, I believe you would understand.

name: 为什么呢？我只是想和她分享一下恋爱的经验啊。
value: As a child, she enjoyed playing with me. I taught her a lot about wielding a hammer.

name: 我也这么觉得，至少作为爱神，她能理解我对爱情的理念。
value: I think so too, at least as a goddess of love, she would understand my philosophy of love.

name: 你是想问我会不会对自己也产生这样的想法？不瞒你说，的确会有……
value: Are you asking if I’ve had the same thought about myself? Indeed, I have…

name: 猜对了呢，我确实想把你用力抱在怀里，享受你慢慢窒息的过程……
value: You guessed it. I indeed want to hold you tight in my arms, relishing in your slow suffocation…

name: 暂未拥有该女神，是否确认选择
value: Angel not owned. Confirm your choice?

name: 蛋糕大宝箱活动道具，可用来开启蛋糕宝箱
value: Event items of the Sweet Surprise event. Collect and use them to unlock the Cake Chest.
